[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/mdo sde a bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@##/_/las brgya tham pa/_bam po nyi shu bdun pa/_grum stod ces bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe nags khrod cig na drang srong lnga brgya 
[\[1b.2\]]tsam gnas te/_de dag de na 'khod cing me'i sbyin sreg byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' 
[\[1b.3\]]brnyes pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/_skye mched drug 
[\[1b.4\]]la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 
[\[1b.5\]]'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni dar/_su ni rgud/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du 
[\[2a.2\]]gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las/_
[\[2a.3\]]'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las/_yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye 
[\[2a.4\]]shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras 
[\[2a.5\]]rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dul las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_drang srong lnga brgya po rnams gdul ba'i dus la bab bo snyam du dgongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis me'i sbyin sreg gi thab 
[\[2a.6\]]de dag thams cad kyi nang du sangs rgyas kyi zhabs kyi rjes mthong la/_de phyin cad me sbar bar mi nus pa de lta bur byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_rjes 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi me'i thab rnams kyi nang du me sbar mi nus par gyur pa las na/_rjes 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]'di ni dge ba zhig yin pa 'dra ste/_rjes 'di lha chen po'i rjes ma yin grang snyam nas/_drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi rjes de dag la bsreg bya phul nas/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus sbyin sreg de dag rang sbar bar gyur te/_me lce tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du thug par song ngo /_/
[\[2b.2\]]de nas drang srong rnams kyis de mthong nas ya mtshan du gyur te/_lha chen pos bdag cag la dgongs so snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams drang ba'i phyir/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal la thug pa'i bar du zhabs kyi rjes gcig nas gcig tu byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas drang 
[\[2b.3\]]srong de dag gis/_me'i sbyin sreg gi drung nas rjes gcig nas gcig tu sprul pa mthong nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_lha chen po ni lam 'dir gshegs so snyam nas zhabs kyi rjes gcig nas gcig tu rjes de dag la mchod pa byed cing dong nas/_de dag mthar gyis rgyal bu rgyal 
[\[2b.4\]]byed kyi tshal du zhugs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs te chos ston to/_/de nas drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa/_me lus kyi 
[\[2b.5\]]dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu/_me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu/_mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu/_mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa lta bu/_blo gsal zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 
[\[2b.6\]]mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba'i nyams bde ba ci 'dra ba de lta bu ni/_lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi gnas kyi sems la goms par byas pa la yang nyams bde ba de lta bu skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar 
[\[2b.7\]]mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_shes pa dang /_
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de nas drang srong de dag gis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du bden pa rtogs pa'i mod la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/de dag gis bden pa mthong nas/_stan las langs te bla 
[\[3a.2\]]gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi 
[\[3a.3\]]dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/_de rnams la lung yang phog ste/_de rnams 
[\[3a.4\]]kyis kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dag dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil 
[\[3a.5\]]du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang /_nye 
[\[3a.6\]]dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong 'di rnams la zhabs kyi rjes bstan pas drangs te rab tu phyung nas/_g.yung 
[\[3a.7\]]drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang /_bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang drang srong lnga brgya po 'di rnams ji ltar zhabs kyi rjes bstan pas drangs te rab tu phyung nas/_tshe 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad du bcug pa de nyon cig dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /_zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig 
[\[3b.2\]]rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_der gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa de'i tshe des skye 
[\[3b.3\]]bo phyi ma rnams la thugs brtse ba dang /_drang srong lnga brgya po de dag drang ba'i phyir/_rtags su rung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhabs kyi rjes byin gyis brlabs so/_/de'i tshe na lho phyogs na dka' thub kyi nags shig na drang srong lnga brgya tsam gnas pa de dag steng gi bar snang las ri spos kyi ngad 
[\[3b.4\]]ldang ba la chas te/_dong ba las de dag ri rab la rdugs pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhabs kyi rjes rnams kyi steng du rdugs nas de rnams ya mtshan du gyur te/_bdag cag rdzu 'phrul yang ma nyams la/_nam mkha' la yang thogs par gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de dag la dga' 
[\[3b.5\]]ba'i lhas/_de dag la smras pa/_khyed ni rdzu 'phrul ma nyams mod kyi/_khyed kyi 'og na sangs rgyas kyi zhabs kyi rjes yod la de'i steng du ni brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pas kyang 'gro mi nus so/_/de nas drang srong de rnams zhabs kyi rjes de la shin tu dga' bar gyur te/_dga' bar 
[\[3b.6\]]gyur nas sa la babs te/_zhabs kyi rjes de dag la bkur sti byed pa la zhugs so/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis de rnams drang ba'i phyir/_drang srong gnas pa la thug pa'i bar du zhabs kyi rjes gcig nas gcig tu byin gyis brlabs nas/_drang srong 
[\[3b.7\]]rnams kyis bsams pa/_rjes 'di dag ni lha chen po'i yin te/_'di ni lam 'dir gshegs so snyam nas/_rjes de thog thag tu drang srong gnas par dong nas/_drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis thag ring po zhig nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung mthong ngo /_/
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]mthong nas kyang de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur nas kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas zhabs la mgo 
[\[4a.2\]]bos phyag 'tshal te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab 
[\[4a.3\]]tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis de dag rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par 
[\[4a.4\]]mdzad nas/_de rnams la lung yang phog ste/_de dag gis der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang /_gang gis kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ma thob nas/_'chi kar de dag gis smon lam btab pa/_'di ltar bdag cag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi 
[\[4a.5\]]bstan pa la/_tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang /_gang gis kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ma thob kyi/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/_bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de/_bdag cag gis mnyes 
[\[4a.6\]]par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig_/ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe drang srong lnga brgya por 
[\[4a.7\]]gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/_drang srong lnga brgya po 'di dag kho na yin te/_de dag gis der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/_'chi kar smon lam btab ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na/_dge slong dag nga yang dag 
[\[4b.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'di rnams kyis nga mnyes par byas nas/_mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[4b.3\]]cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//long ba zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul mi thi la na/_lha chen po'i a mra'i tshal na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe yul mi thi la na/_khyim bdag tshogs can zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs 
[\[4b.4\]]spyod che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon 
[\[4b.5\]]pa dang /_bu byad ngan po long ba zhig btsas so/_/de nas khyim bdag des bu de mthong ngo /_/de mthong ma thag tu pha ma gnyis sdug bsngal chen po skyes te/_bdag cag gnyis brgya lam lan cig na bu btsas kyang de 'di 'dra bar gyur na bdag cag gnyis la bu byad ngan po long ba 'di lta bu mi 
[\[4b.6\]]dgos kyis/_phye ma red nam sros na phyir phyung la khyi rnams la sbyin no zhes byas nas/_pha ma gnyis kyis de phyir phyung ste/_lam po cher bor nas/_khyi rnams la byin no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang /_ye 
[\[4b.7\]]shes la mnga' brnyes pa ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/_skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni/_chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin 
[\[5a.2\]]mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang /_gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_
[\[5a.3\]]su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las/_'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du 
[\[5a.4\]]gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las/_ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas 
[\[5a.5\]]brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs 
[\[5a.6\]]pa/_khye'u 'di lung bstan pa'i dus la bab ste/_khye'u 'di las brten nas/_gdul bar bya ba'i skye bo mang po drang bar bya dgos so snyam du dgongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas khye'u de khyis za bar mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das nang par sngar 
[\[5a.7\]]bzhengs nas/_sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/_lhung bzed bsnams nas/_dge slong gi tshogs kyis zhabs 'bring byas te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/_yul mi thi lar gshegs te/_bcom ldan 'das khye'u de dang 'dab nye ba zhig tu bzhugs so/_/
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]de nas yul mi thi la na gnas pa'i skye bo mang pos/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang ya mtshan du gyur te/_sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma 
[\[5b.2\]]la bdag gis ci nas khye'u 'dis tshe rabs snga ma dran par 'gyur zhing tshig kyang smra la/_nga dang lhan cig tu gtam zer bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar byin gyis brlabs te/_khye'u des sngon gyi tshe rabs dran 
[\[5b.3\]]nas tshig smra zhing bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu gtam zer bar gyur te/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de la bka' stsal pa/_khye'u khyod mi sdug pa yin nam/_bcom ldan 'das mi sdug pa lags so/_/khye'u khyod mi sdug pa yin nam/_bde bar gshegs pa mi sdug pa 
[\[5b.4\]]lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyod pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mi sdug pa nyams su myong ba yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyod pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mi sdug pa nyams su 
[\[5b.5\]]myong ba mchis lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_khyod kyi mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen su yin/_gsol pa/_rang gi sems lags so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo phal po che rnams ya mtshan du gyur te/_sems can 'di lta bu sngon gyi tshe rabs dran la tshig kyang smra zhing /_bcom 
[\[5b.6\]]ldan 'das dang gtam zer ba su zhig gu snyam mo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyan slebs par dka' ba yin te/_de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba'i thugs ma thub nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dris pa btsun pa kun dga' bo sems can 'di lta bu 
[\[5b.7\]]sngon gyi tshe rabs kun kyang dran la tshig smra zhing /_bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu gtam zer ba 'di su zhig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyan slebs par 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]dka' bas na/_bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba'i thugs mi thub bo/_/kun dga' bos smras pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bdag gis kyang snyan slebs par dka' mod kyi khyed la snying brtse ba'i phyir zhu bar bya'o zhes byas nas/_
[\[6a.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa sems can 'di lta bu sngon gyi tshe rabs dran la tshig smra zhing /_bcom ldan 'das dang 
[\[6a.3\]]bka' mchid bgyid pa su lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo sems can 'di sdig pa byed byed pa yin te/_'dis sdig pa'i las mang po byas so/_/kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na yul mi thi la 'di nyid na/_rgyal po mi sdug pa zhes bya 
[\[6a.4\]]ba rgyal po byed de/_rgyal po de phrag dog can zhig tu gyur nas/_de gang gi tshe btsun mo'i 'khor gyis zhabs 'bring byas nas/_skyed mos tshal gyi sa'am gzhan gang du 'gro bar 'dod pa na/_de'i lam thams cad du mi med par byed de/_skar khung rnams dang sgo rnams kyang yol ba stug 
[\[6a.5\]]pos gcod par byed do/_/brgya la 'ga' zhig gis glo bur du btsun mo'i 'khor mthong na/_des de'i mig 'byin par byed de/_de lta bu'i tshul gyis des sems can mang po'i mig med par byas so/_/de nas phyi zhig na de'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyis zhabs 'bring byas te/_skyed mos tshal gyi 
[\[6a.6\]]nang du song ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten na mi bzhugs pa de'i tshe/_rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba/_bas mtha'i gnas mal na gnas pa/_'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu bse ru lta bu dag 'jig rten du byung ste/_rang sangs 
[\[6a.7\]]rgyas zhig lam de nas 'ongs pa de/_rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring ba rnams kyis ma tshor nas/_de de'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi mdun du bab ste/_bud med de dag gis de'i lus mdzes pa dang sems mdzes pa mthong nas de dag dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur nas kyang gdong g.yogs phye ste/_
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]btud cing phyag byas so/_/de nas rgyal pos kyang de thos te/_thos ma thag tu de phrag dog gi gzhi las khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa chen po skyes te/_de khros nas rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring ba rnams la bka' stsal te/_khyed deng la rab tu byung ba de'i mig gnyis phyung zhig ces bsgo'o/_/de 
[\[6b.2\]]nas de thos ma thag tu/_rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring ba rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas de bzung nas mig gnyis phyung ste/_rang sangs rgyas de yang sngon gyi las myong bar 'gyur ba de mngon sum du gyur pas rdzu ba yang ma dran na/_'phrul pa lta ci smos/_de nas rang sangs rgyas des bsams pa/_
[\[6b.3\]]nyon mongs pa 'di ni mngon par smas shing nyams par gyur te/_'khor ba na 'khor zhing yun ring por sdug bsngal chen po rnyed na mi rung gis/_'di'i ra mda' bya dgos so snyam ste/_steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang /_lam mer 'dug pa dang /_char 
[\[6b.4\]]'bebs pa dang /_glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan to/_/so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par byed de/_rgyal po des sdong po sog les bcad pa bzhin du zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_skal pa chen po dang ldan pa mar spyon/_bdag nyes par 
[\[6b.5\]]spyad pa'i 'dam du bying ba'i lag nas drang du gsol zhes byas so/_/bdag nyid chen po de yang gzhi des yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas rgyal po des de'i sku gdung la mchod pa byas te/_smon lam btab pa/_'di ltar bdag gis sems can dag pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byed du bcug pa'i 
[\[6b.6\]]las 'di'i 'bras bu bdag gis nyams su myong bar ma gyur cig_/'di ltar phyir yang bkur sti byas pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na/_bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der/_phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog shig_/'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags 
[\[6b.7\]]pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ci snyam du sems/_de'i tshe rgyal po mi sdug 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/_long ba 'di kho na yin te/_des rang sangs rgyas de'i mig gnyis phyung ba dang /_sems can stong phrag du ma'i mig med par byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas lo brgya phrag du ma dang /_lo stong phrag du mar dmus long 'ba' zhig tu 
[\[7a.2\]]gyur te/_sems can dmyal bar yang 'tshed par gyur to/_/de nas shi 'phos nas kyang tshe rabs lnga brgyar [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes te/_der yang 'dis dmus long du gyur pa 'ba' zhig gi sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur to/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]las shi 'phos nas tshe rabs lnga brgyar dud 
[\[7a.3\]]'gror skyes te/_der yang dmus long 'ba' zhig tu gyur to/_/dud 'gro las shi 'phos nas tshe rabs lnga brgyar mir skyes te/_thams cad du dmus long du gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/_btsun pa sems can 'di sdug bsngal 'di las nam thar bar 'gyur/_
[\[7a.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas las 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yid bzang zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de'i gsung rab la sems can 'di mir skye bar 'gyur te/_dbang po tshang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i gsung 
[\[7a.5\]]rab la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas dgra bcom pa nyid thob kyang nyal ba'i tshe/_las las skyes pa'i bya rog dag lhags nas mig gnyis 'byin par 'gyur la/_de gzhi des yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[7a.6\]]'da' bar 'gyur te/_der las 'di las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo phal po che de dag skyo ba chen po skyes te/_nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba na/_sdug bsngal 'di lta bu dag rnyed par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag yid skyo bar 
[\[7a.7\]]gyur par thugs su chud nas/_de dag dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na skye bo mang po de dag gis stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du/_kha cig gis ni dro bar gyur pa bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni spyi bo dang /_bden pa dang 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang /_'jig rten gyi chos 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]kyi mchog dang /_mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig 
[\[7b.2\]]gis ni rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni brgya byin du 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni tshangs par 
[\[7b.3\]]'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do/_/'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol/_chos la 'bab/_dge 
[\[7b.4\]]'dun la bab par gyur to/_/gcer bu pa 'od srung zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe ri khrod cig na bram ze dbul po cig gnas pa de zhing las kyis 'tsho bar byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am/_
[\[7b.5\]]bcu lon pa dang /_bu btsas te de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_khye'u 'di'i ming ci skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/_/khye'u 'di 'od srung gi rigs yin pas na/_khye'u 'di'i ming 'od srung du gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u 'od srung 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_
[\[7b.6\]]mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying gu rnams kyis bskyed bsrings nas/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_de pha ma dang lhan cig tu zhing las la 'gro'o/_/de nas des bltas na pha des srog chags stong phrag du ma kha 'dog par byed pa mthong nas/_pha la smras pa/_yab cig 
[\[7b.7\]]khyod kyis srog chags stong phrag du ma gyin da la sdug bsngal bar byed pa 'di lta bu'i 'tsho ba khyod la ci dgos/_phas smras pa/_bu bdag cag gi 'tsho ba ni 'di yin te gzhan med do/_/de nas khye'u des bsams pa/_bdag 'tsho ba 'di lta bu btang la nags khrod du gnas bca'o snyam nas/_
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]nges par 'byung bar chas so/_/de nas de gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes nas/_mthar gyis gdul bar bya ba rnams kyi don mdzad cing rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa kun tu rgyas par gyur to/_/
[\[8a.2\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs shing bdud rtsis 'gro ba rnams tshim par mdzad do/_/khye'u 'od srung gis kyang dge sbyong gau ta ma rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/_des ni bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs shing /_bdud rtsis 'gro ba rnams tshim par mdzad do zhes thos nas thos 
[\[8a.3\]]ma thag tu pha ma la gsol te/_yab yum bdag dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad du mchi'o zhes byas nas song ngo /_/de nas rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro zhes byas nas des der gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu mthong nas des bsam pa/_dge sbyong gau ta ma ni 'di yin no snyam nas/_
[\[8a.4\]]de de'i thad du rab tu byung ngo /_/rab tu byung nas kyang des ltas kyi dpyad lobs nas/_de de la slob dpon gyi mchog tu gyur to/_/de nas de'i ming 'od srung zhes bya ba gang yin pa de med par gyur te/_ming gcer bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig pa gcer bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig pa zhes 
[\[8a.5\]]bya bar gyur to/_/phyi zhig na des bdag nyid tshe zad pa'i rtags mthong nas bsams pa/_bdag ni zhag bdun na med par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dga' ba'i lhas de la sbran te/_gcer bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig pa/_mi dgar ma byed 
[\[8a.6\]]cig_/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'chi ba las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i lam ston pa yin te/_de ni rgyal po'i khab 'di nyid na bzhugs kyis/_de la bsnyen bkur gyis shig_/de ltar byas dang khyod la legs par 'gyur ro zhes byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu gcer 
[\[8a.7\]]bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig pa rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/_'od ma'i tshal logs su chas pa las/_lam phyed du de'i blo skyes pa/_dge slong rnams ni ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa yin la/_bdag ni gcer bur 'dug pas na/_de dag dang mngon sum du phrad du 'gro mi 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]phod kyis/_bdag re zhig 'od ma'i tshal du mi 'gro bar/_lam phyed 'di nyid du 'dug par bya'o/_/lam phyed 'di nyid du 'dug bzhin du bdag gis dge sbyong gau ta ma la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam mo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/_rnam 
[\[8b.2\]]pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/_skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 
[\[8b.3\]]la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni/_chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum 
[\[8b.4\]]mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang /_nyam nga ba dang /_gnod pa dang ldan/_
[\[8b.5\]]su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang /_thar pa dang /_'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor 
[\[8b.6\]]bdun med pa las/_'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las/_
[\[8b.7\]]ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_gcer bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig pa gdul ba'i dus la bab bo snyam du dgongs nas/_'od ma'i tshal nas byung ste/_sa phyogs gang na gcer bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig 
[\[9a.2\]]pa 'dug pa'i sa phyogs der gshegs nas/_gcer bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig pas thag ring po zhig nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu mngon sum du yang 
[\[9a.3\]]dag par mgu ba dang /_yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas gcer bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig pas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye gau ta ma gal te zhus nas/_zhu ba lung bstan 
[\[9a.4\]]pa'i slad du skabs phye na/_gau ta ma khyod la 'di nyid du/_phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung re zhig nga rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la 'gro dgos pas/_khyod kyis zhu ba lung bstan pa'i skabs su ma bab kyis/_kun dga' 
[\[9a.5\]]ra ba'i phyir rol du shog shig dang der khyod kyi zhu ba lung bstan pa'i skabs su bab bo/_/gsol pa/_kye ma gau ta ma gal te bdag kyang gzhan du 'gyur srid la/_yang na gau ta ma gzhan du 'gyur yang srid do/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du/_gcer bu pa 'od srung dang 
[\[9a.6\]]rus gcig pas gsol pa/_gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs phye na/_gau ta ma khyod la 'di nyid du phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de nas lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gcer bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig pa la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[9a.7\]]stsal to/_/'od srung re zhig nga rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la 'gro dgos pas/_khyod kyis zhu ba lung bstan pa'i skabs su ma bab kyis/_kun dga' ra ba'i phyi rol du shog shig dang /_der khyod kyi zhu ba lung bstan pa'i skabs su bab bo/_/gsol pa/_kye gau ta ma gal te 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]zhus nas/_zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs phye na/_gau ta ma khyod la 'di nyid du phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung khyod don 'di nyid lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du nges par gleng bar byed na ni/_'od srung khyod ci dang ci 
[\[9b.2\]]'dod pa zhus shig_/gsol pa/_gau ta ma ci lags/_sdug bsngal rang gis bgyis sam/_bka' stsal pa/_'od srung sdug bsngal rang gis byas so zhes ngas ma bshad do/_/kye gau ta ma ci lags/_sdug bsngal gzhan gyis bgyis sam/_'od srung sdug bsngal 
[\[9b.3\]]gzhan gyis byas zhes bya ba de ni ngas lung ma bstan to/_/kye gau ta ma ci lags/_sdug bsngal rang gis kyang bgyis la gzhan gyis kyang bgyis pa lags sam/_'od srung sdug bsngal rang gis kyang byas pa dang gzhan gyis kyang byas zhes bya ba de yang ngas lung ma bstan 
[\[9b.4\]]to/_/kye gau ta ma ci lags/_sdug bsngal rang gis ma bgyis pa dang /_gzhan gyis ma bgyis pa dang /_rgyu las byung ba yang ma lags sam/_'od srung 'di yang ngas lung ma bstan to/_/gau ta ma ci lags/_sdug bsngal bdag gis bgyis pa dang gzhan gyis 
[\[9b.5\]]bgyis pa dang /_rgyu las byung ba yang ma lags/_zhes bgyis pa yang lung ma bstan to zhes gsung ngam/_'od srung sdug bsngal rang gis byas pa dang /_gzhan gyis byas pa dang /_rgyu las byung ba yang ma yin nam/_zhes 'dri na/_lung ma bstan to zhes nga zer ro/_/kye gau 
[\[9b.6\]]ta ma ci lags/_sdug bsngal ma mchis pa kho na lags sam/_'od srung sdug bsngal ni ye med pa ma yin te/_yod pa kho na yin no/_/kye gau ta ma sdug bsngal rang gis bgyis pa lags na/_ci nas bdag gis sdug bsngal shes par 'gyur ba dang mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta 
[\[9b.7\]]bu'i chos bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bstan par smon to/_/'od srung gang gi tshe/_tshor ba yang de nyid yin la/_myong ba yang de nyid yin na ni/_de lta na sdug bsngal rang gis byas pa yin par 'gyur na/_'od srung nga ni de skad mi zer ro/_/'od srung gang gi tshor ba yang 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]gzhan yin la myong ba yang gzhan yin na ni/_de lta na sdug bsngal gzhan gyis byas pa yin par 'gyur na/_'od srung nga ni de skad mi zer ro/_/'od srung gang gi tshe tshor ba yang de nyid yin la/_myong ba yang de nyid yin pa dang /_gang gi tshe tshor ba yang 
[\[10a.2\]]gzhan yin la/_myong ba yang gzhan yin na ni/_de lta na sdug bsngal rang gis byas pa yang yin la/_gzhan gyis byas pa yang yin par 'gyur na/_'od srung nga ni de skad mi zer ro/_/'od srung gang gi tshe sdug bsngal rkyen rnams med par 'gyur na ni/_de lta na sdug 
[\[10a.3\]]bsngal rang gis byas pa dang /_gzhan gyis byas pa dang /_rgyu las byung ba yang ma yin par 'gyur na/_'od srung nga ni de skad mi zer ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtha' de gnyis la mi brten par/_dbu ma'i lam gyi chos ston cing 'di lta ste/_'di yod na 'di 
[\[10a.4\]]'byung la/_'di skyes pas 'di skye bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams 'byung /_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa 'byung /_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs 'byung /_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug 
[\[10a.5\]]'byung /_skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa 'byung /_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'byung /_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa 'byung /_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa 'byung /_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa 'byung /_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba 'byung /_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan 
[\[10a.6\]]dang smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_'di med na 'di mi 'byung la/_'di 'gags pas 'di 
[\[10a.7\]]'gag par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag_/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/skye mched drug 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag_/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /_
[\[10b.2\]]mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_gcer bu pa 'od 
[\[10b.3\]]srung dang rus gcig pa/_chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing /_dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de nas gcer bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig pas chos mthong /_chos rnyed chos rtogs/_chos kyi gting slebs/_som nyi las brgal the tsom las brgal te/_gzhan 
[\[10b.4\]]gyi dring mi 'jog cing gzhan gyis bkri ba med la/_ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la/_mi 'jigs pa thob nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ni mngon par 'phags 
[\[10b.5\]]lags so/_/mngon par zhugs pa lags so/_btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchis pa dang /_chos la skyabs su mchis pa dang /_dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis pa lags te/_bdag dge bsnyen lags par gzung du gsol/_bdag 
[\[10b.6\]]mngon par dad par gyur te/_deng slan cad snying thag pa nas skyabs su mchis pa lags so zhes gsol nas/_de ltar gcer bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing /_rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[10b.7\]]'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo /_/de nas gcer bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song nas/_ring por ma lon par ba drus ma zhig gis brdungs te bsad nas/_de 'chi kar dbang 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]po rnams dang zhing bzhin gyi mdog yongs su dag la/_pags pa'i mdog dkar por 'dug go/_/de nas dge slong mang po dag snga dro sham thabs dang /_chos gos gyon nas/_lhung bzed thogs te/_rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la dong nas/_
[\[11a.2\]]dge slong mang po rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na/_gcer bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig pas/_lam phyed de nyid du bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba zhus te/_de bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song nas ring po ma lon par ba drus mas brdungs te bsad nas/_de 'chi kar 
[\[11a.3\]]dbang po rnams dang zhing bzhin gyi mdog kyang yongs su dag la/_pags pa'i mdog dkar por 'dug go zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang rgyal po'i khab nas bsod snyoms blangs nas/_zas zos te phyis bsod snyoms blang ba spangs nas/_lhung bzed dang chos gos 
[\[11a.4\]]bzhag ste/_rkang pa bkrus nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_dge slong mang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[11a.5\]]ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'di na bdag cag dge slong mang po snga dro sham thabs dang /_chos gos gyon te/_lhung bzed thogs nas/_rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la mchis pa na/_btsun pa bdag cag dge slong mang po rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la rgyu ba rnams 
[\[11a.6\]]kyis gcer bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig pas shul phyed de nyid du/_bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba zhus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song nas ring po ma lon par ba drus mas brdungs te bkum nas de 'gum kar dbang po rnams dang zhing bzhin gyi mdog yongs su dag la/_
[\[11a.7\]]pags pa'i mdog dkar por mchis so zhes thos lags na/_btsun pa de'i 'gro ba ni gang lags/_skye ba'i gnas ni gang lags/_'chi ba'i gnas ni gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu de ni nor du gyur pa yin te/_des nga'i chos kyi 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]rjes su 'thun pa'i chos mngon par rtogs pas na/_des ni nga la gnod pa ma byas kyis/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu des ni 'di lta ste/_chos la lhag par bya ba byas nas/_mya ngan las 'das kyis/_de'i rus bu la rus bu'i mchod pa gyis shig ces bka' stsal te/_der 
[\[11b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gcer bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig pa mchog tu gyur par lung bstan nas/_rgyal po'i khab der lha rnams kyis gcer bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes bsgrags so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu gzhan mu stegs pa 
[\[11b.3\]]rnams kyis/_ras kyi ba dan bsgrengs te/_lam po che dang srang dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo rnams su bsgrags te/_dge sbyong gau ta ma na re nga'i chos 'dul ba 'ba' zhig la mthar thug pa yod kyis/_gzhan la med do zhe na/_nged kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod 
[\[11b.4\]]pa 'di yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes smras nas/_/de dag de'i thad du dong ste/_'di'i rus bu la mchod pa bya'o snyam mo/_/dge slong dag kyang de'i thad du dong ste/_'di'i rus bu la mchod pa bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas der mu stegs pa kun tu rgyu ba rnams na re 'di ni 
[\[11b.5\]]bdag cag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin gyis/_bdag cag gis 'di'i rus bu la mchod pa bya'o zhes zer ro/_/dge slong dag na re yang 'di ni bdag cag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin gyis/_bdag cag gis 'di'i rus bu la mchod pa bya'o zhes zer ro/_/
[\[11b.6\]]de nas gzhan mu stegs pa kun tu rgyu ba dag na re/_bdag cag gis dbang po ni lha gang dag gis rgyal po'i khab 'dir bsgrags pa yin no zhes zer ro/_/dge slong dag na re yang 'di su'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin pa/_lha de dag nyid la dri bar bya'o zhes zer ro/_/
[\[11b.7\]]de nas de thos ma thag tu gzhan mu stegs pa kun tu rgyu ba de dag gis/_lha de dag nyid la gsol ba btab ste/_'di su'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin pa dang /_su'i ma yin pa de lha rnams gsungs shig ces byas so/_/de nas chos rtogs pa'i lha rnams na re/_'di 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]ni dge slong rnams kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin te/_'dis bcom ldan 'das las chos rtogs nas/_des na 'di bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to/_/zhes zer ro/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu gzhan mu stegs pa kun tu rgyu rnams 
[\[12a.2\]]skyengs nas sa phyogs de nas dong ngo /_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis de'i rus bu rnams la rus bu'i mchod pa byas te/_'od ma'i tshal du dong nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa gcer bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig pa 'di las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas/_
[\[12a.3\]]ba drus mas brdungs te bkum lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di nyid kyis las de lta bu byas shing bstsags te/_'di sngon gyi gtam rgyud ni pus ka ra sa ra'i gtam rgyud las 'byung ba bzhin du/_ming po bzhis sring mo bzhi bsad pa'i bar du 
[\[12a.4\]]rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa gcer bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig pas las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas 'dis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes par ma bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon 
[\[12a.5\]]lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/gsol pa btsun pa/_'dis smon lam gang du btab lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[12a.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i grags pa kun tu 
[\[12a.7\]]rgyas par gyur to/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bA rA Na sIr gnas bcas te/_bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs shing bdud rtsis 'gro ba rnams tshim par mdzad do/_/de'i tshe yul de na bram ze'i khye'u zhig gnas pa des kyang /_bA rA Na sI na/_yang dag 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs te/_bdud rtsis 'gro ba rnams tshim par mdzad do zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang yul drang srong smra bar song nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung de ga la bzhugs pa der song ste phyin 
[\[12b.2\]]nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[12b.3\]]'od srung las chos thos nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs nas song ngo /_/de nas des tshe gcig tu sbyin pa dag byin zhing /_bsod nams dag byas te/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrung nas/_'chi kar smon lam btab 
[\[12b.4\]]pa/_'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs kyang /_yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u 
[\[12b.5\]]bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe bram zer gyur pa gang yin pa de ni gcer bu pa 'od srung dang rus gcig pa 'di kho na 
[\[12b.6\]]yin te/_des der sbyin pa dag byin zhing /_bsod nams dag byas nas tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrung nas/_'chi kar smon lam btab ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang 
[\[12b.7\]]yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas pa des na/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas so//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po nyi shu brgyad pa/_'od srung gtso bo zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na 
[\[13a.2\]]bzhugs te/_de'i tshe ri sul zhig na drang srong 'khor khri nyis stong yod pa zhig gnas te/_drang srong de yang bstan bcos thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa/_rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig ste/_des bram ze khri nyis stong po de dag bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la 
[\[13a.3\]]bkod do/_/de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/_mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang du las kyi rnam par smin pa lung bstan nas/_mtsho de nyid kyi nang nas 'khor lnga brgya dang /_nam mkha' las rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshegs so/_/drang srong de 'khor dang bcas pas 
[\[13a.4\]]kyang bcom ldan 'das mtsho de nyid kyi nang nas nam mkha' la gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das la dga' bar gyur nas/_thams cad bor te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang zhing /_de dag rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du zhugs nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[13a.5\]]'das ga la bzhugs pa der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong khri nyis stong po de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang 
[\[13a.6\]]shes pa dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na drang srong khri nyis stong po de rnams kyis stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du bden pa rtogs pa'i mod la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/drang srong gtso bo des ni thos 
[\[13a.7\]]pas rgyags shing dregs pas ci yang ma thob bo/_/de nas drang srong khri nyis stong po de rnams stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]btsun pa bdag cag legs pa gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong 
[\[13b.2\]]khri nyis stong po de dag la dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/_de rnams la lung yang phog ste/_de rnams kyis kyang brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa 
[\[13b.3\]]nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/drang srong gtso bo de ni rab tu byung yang ci yang ma thob bo/_/de nas des de thos nas 'bad pa la zhugs te/_des ring po ma lon par sde snod gsum lobs nas/_rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na de'i blo skyes pa/_
[\[13b.4\]]bdag gis sems can stong phrag du ma dag la chos ston la bdag nyid ni chos ston par mi 'dod de/_bdag gi grogs po 'di dag thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa nyid thob la bdag gis ni de thos nas ci bya gtol med par gyur te/_khyad par ci yang ma thob kyis/_bdag gis mnyan pa 
[\[13b.5\]]dang /_bsam gtan btang la re zhig bsgrim par bya'o snyam nas/_des thos pa de nyid sems pa dang /_'jal ba dang nye bar brtags pas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod 
[\[13b.6\]]chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag 
[\[13b.7\]]par rig pa thob pa srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang /_nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /_gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]pa/_btsun pa drang srong de thos pa'i rgyags pas dregs nas ci yang ma thob la/_slad kyis thos pa de nyid sems pa dang /_'jal ba dang /_nye bar brtags pas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa la 
[\[14a.2\]]gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis sems pa dang 'jal ba dang /_brtags pas bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga ci ltar bskyed pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 
[\[14a.3\]]'das pa'i dus na/_ri khrod cig na bram ze 'od srung gtso bo zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/_phyi zhig na de rtsa ba dang /_'bras bu dag gi don la ri'i sul zhig tu song ba las/_des der drang srong khri nyis stong mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu de dag la shin tu dga' bar 
[\[14a.4\]]gyur nas/_des bsams pa/_bdag ni khyim gyi chos la gnas la/_'di rnams ni khyim gyi gnas nas nges par byung ba las na/_'di rnams ni 'khor ba las grol ba yin gor ma chag gis ma la bdag kyang 'di kho na'i thad du rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam nas/_
[\[14a.5\]]des thams cad bor te/_drang srong de dag gi thad du rab tu byung ste/_de der song nas bstan bcos thams cad khong du chud par gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na drang srong gtso bo de shi nas/_bram ze'i khye'u khri nyis stong po de rnams drang srong de shi ba'i phyir/_shin tu mya ngan byed 
[\[14a.6\]]cing sdug bsngal la smre sngags 'don par byed do/_/de nas 'od srung gtso bo des de dag la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u dag ha cang mya ngan ma byed cig_/sdug bsngal bar ma byed cig_/smre sngags 'don par ma byed cig dang /_ngas khyod kyi dgos pa thams cad sbyar bar 
[\[14a.7\]]bya'o zhes byas nas/_des bram ze'i khye'u khri nyis stong po de dag thams cad bsdus te/_de dag la yid la byed pa'i lung yang phog nas/_de dag thams cad kyis kyang bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na 'od srung gtso bos 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]bsams pa bdag gi slob ma 'di rnams kyis ni bdag gi yid la byed pas chos 'di lta bu rtogs par gyur la/_bdag ni thos pa'i rgyags pas dregs pas ci yang ma thob na/_bdag la thos pa 'di ci dgos snyam nas/_des kyang sems pa dang /_'jal ba dang /_
[\[14b.2\]]nye bar brtags pas/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe 'od srung gtso bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/_drang srong 'di kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'di thos pa'i rgyags pas dregs pas ci yang 
[\[14b.3\]]ma thob la/_phyis thos pa de nyid sems pa dang 'jal bas nye bar brtags pas/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/da ltar yang 'di thos pa'i rgyags pas dregs pas sngar ci yang ma thob pa las/_phyis thos pa de nyid sems pa dang /_
[\[14b.4\]]'jal ba dang /_nye bar brtags pas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa drang srong 'khor dang bcas pa 'di rnams kyis las ci 
[\[14b.5\]]bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas/_'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes par ma bgyis la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bgyis 
[\[14b.6\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa 'di rnams kyis smon lam gang du btab lags/_bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye 
[\[14b.7\]]dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_gang gi tshe de sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/_phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_rgyal po mdzes ldan gyis 
[\[15a.2\]]de'i sku gdung la mchod pa byas te/_sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs nas/_mchod rten de la mchod pa chen po byas te/_mchod rten gyi dus ston gyi lugs btod do/_/de nas phyi zhig na mchod rten de'i mchod rten gyi dus ston la bab pa na/_rgyal po mdzes ldan gyi khams su 
[\[15a.3\]]gtogs pa/_ri khrod kyi rgyal po 'khor khri nyis stong dang ldan pa zhig gis kyang /_mchod pa'i las la brtson par byas nas/_smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su 
[\[15a.4\]]skye bar shog shig_/ston pa 'di dang 'dra ba'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas zhabs 'bring ba rnams kyis de mthong nas dris pa/_lha gcig gis smon 
[\[15a.5\]]lam ci btab lags/_de nas rgyal pos kyang de dag la rgyas par bsnyad do/_/de nas zhabs 'bring ba rnams kyis smras pa/_bdag cag gis kyang lha gcig las brten te/_ston pa 'di 'dra ba mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur 
[\[15a.6\]]cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe ri khrod kyi rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni drang srong 'di kho na yin no/_/de'i 
[\[15a.7\]]tshe 'khor khri nyis stong por gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/_bram ze khri nyis stong po 'di dag kho na yin te/_der mchod rten de la bkur sti byas nas/_smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/_gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]che ba'i rigs su skyes nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/drang srong khri nyis stong po 'di rnams kyis kyang /_
[\[15b.2\]]de nyid la brten nas/_'di rnams kyis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[15b.3\]]'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di dag thams cad rab tu byung ste/_der 'di dag thams cad kyis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/_dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na/_da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to//_//glang chen gnas zhes bya ba ni 
[\[15b.4\]]gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i glang po che'i bla/_glang chen snying po zhes bya ba/_phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa mang ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa/_rnam thos 
[\[15b.5\]]kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/_thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de nas phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_bu gzugs bzang zhing 
[\[15b.6\]]blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_khye'u 'di'i ming ci skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_khye'u 'di rgyu skar nag pa las skyes la/_gcig tu na glang po che'i bla glang chen snying po'i bu yin pas na/_khye'u 'di'i ming 
[\[15b.7\]]nag pa glang chen gnas zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u nag pa glang chen gnas/_'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings nas/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_khye'u de yi ge slob tu bcug ste/_rgyal rigs 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas tha dad pa 'di lta ste/_glang po che bzhon pa dang /_rta bzhon pa dang /_mtshon cha bcang ba dang /_'phong dang /_mdun du bsnur ba dang /_phyir bsnur ba dang /_
[\[16a.2\]]g.yul las thar bar bya ba dang /_lcags kyus gzung ba dang /_zhags pas gzung ba dang /_mda' bo che 'phangs pa dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phangs pa dang /_mtshon rtse gcig pa gdab pa dang /_'khor lo 'phang ba dang /_gcad pa dang /_gsheg pa dang lag 
[\[16a.3\]]pas gzung ba dang /_rkang pa'i stabs dang /_mgo bo bskyab pa dang /_rgyang mar 'phog pa dang /_sgra grags par 'phog pa dang /_gnad du 'phog pa dang /_gdon mi za bar 'phog par bya ba dang /_tshabs cher gtang ba rnams kyang bslabs nas/_gnas lnga la byang bar 
[\[16a.4\]]gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na de'i pha ma gnyis shi nas/_de rgyal po gzugs can snying pos glang po che'i blar bskos te/_pha'i las thabs de nyid byin to/_/de nas des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/
[\[16a.5\]]de nas phyi zhig na des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs te/_des sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/de rab tu byung nas sde snod 
[\[16a.6\]]gsum bslabs te/_rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na des bsams pa/_bdag gis thos pa'i sgo nas bya ba gang yin pa de dag ni byas zin gyis/_da phyin cad ni bdag gis yid la byed pa la 'bad par bya'o snyam du 
[\[16a.7\]]bsams te/_/des yid la byed pa bzung nas/_srod dang tho rangs mi nyal ba nyams su blangs te gnas pas/_'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi bsam gtan gyi bar du bskyed nas/_des slob ma lnga brgya bsdus te/_'khor dang ldan par gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]phyi zhig na de 'khor dang bcas pa ljongs rgyu zhing dong ste/_de mthar gyis spyod yul du rgyu ba las slar log nas/_blon po rnams kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la de rab tu byung ngo zhes gsol te/_lha gcig nag pa glang chen gnas ni rab tu byung la/_de yang bu ma mchis 
[\[16b.2\]]te/_bu ma mchis pas na de ci bdog pa thams cad lha gcig mnga' lags so zhes byas so/_/de nas rgyal pos smras pa/_nga ni shi ba'i nor dbang du zad kyis/_gson po'i ni mi dbang ste/_rigs kyi bu de yang da dung gson por 'dug la drang srong rnams ni phyir yang 'bab 
[\[16b.3\]]cing /_khyim na gnas par 'gyur yang srid do zhes byas nas/_rgyal pos de'i khyim nas ci yang ma bzhes so/_/de nas phyi zhig na de'i chung mas nag pa glang chen gnas 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa/_rgyal po'i khab tu lhags so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang de 'khor 
[\[16b.4\]]dang bcas pa spyan drangs te khyim du zan byin no/_/de nas de'i chung mas bsams pa/_ci 'di bya ba byas pa yin nam/_'on te so so'i skye bo yin zhig gu_/gal te so so'i skye bo yin ni 'di drang ba'i thabs shig bya'o snyam nas/_des de zan za ba'i tshe khang thog nas zangs 
[\[16b.5\]]gzhong gcig de'i mdun du bor nas/_de de'i sgras skrag par gyur la/_gcig tu na zan za ba'i tshe/_des zangs gzhong de la gris brud pa ltar yang byed de/_des de mthong nas bsams pa/_'di ni dgra bcom pa ma yin te/_'di ni so so'i skye bo yin pas bdag 
[\[16b.6\]]gis 'di drang nus so snyam nas/_rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_jo bo mi bzhugs pas bdag cag gi longs spyod 'di dag dmas par gyur te/_de bas na jo bos nga yang 'khor brgya lnga bcu dang khyim 'dir bshos gsol bar ci gnang zhes byas so/_/de nas nag 
[\[16b.7\]]pa glang chen gnas kyis chung ma la cang mi zer bar khas blangs nas/_des phyi de nyin de'i 'khor brgya lnga bcu dang /_zan byin nas yang phyi de nyin par 'khor brgya dang zan la bos so/_/de bzhin du mthar gyis bud med des 'khor je nyung je nyung du phris nas/_tha ma'i nyin par 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]gcig pu zan la bos te/_des zan byin nas de drang ba'i phyir phongs pa'i tshig smra zhing /_jo bo mi bzhugs pas 'di ltar bran rnams kyis kyang brnyas so zhes zer ro/_/des snga nas khol po khye'u zhig la bsgo ste/_gang gi tshe nga chos nyan cing 'dug pa 
[\[17a.2\]]de'i tshe/_khyod kyis nga lan gsum gyi bar du dgug pa thong la/_nga'i gan du shog cig ces spring shig de nas khyod kyi thad du 'ongs pa dang /_de'i 'og tu khyod kyis nga'i co to nas zung la/_jo bo'i mdun du rdegs shig ces byas te bzhag go/_/de nas khol po'i khye'u des kyang 
[\[17a.3\]]de kho na bzhin du byas nas/_bud med des smras pa/_jo bo da gzigs/_khyod nyid kyi mdun du yang bdag 'di kho na lta zhing mchis so zhes byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu nag pa glang chen gnas khro ba'i kun tu dkris pa chen po skyes nas/_de khros pas chung mas snga nas 
[\[17a.4\]]mal du ral gri bzhag pa de blangs nas/_shubs nas phyung ste khye'u de'i steng du brgyugs nas/_chung mas rkang pa la phyag byas te smras pa/_jo bo re zhig gzu lums ma mdzad par bslab pa'i gzhi rnams phul la de'i 'og tu 'di bcos pas slebs so/_/de nas nag pa glang chen 
[\[17a.5\]]gnas kyis chung ma de nyid kyi mdun du bslab pa'i gzhi rnams phul te/_chos gos tshon can rnams bor nas/_khyim pa'i gos rnams bgos te 'dug go/_/de nas chung ma na re/_'di ni bdag gis jo bo drang ba'i thabs bgyi ba'i slad du de ltar bgyis par bas kyi 
[\[17a.6\]]jo bos 'di la kho na du mi bzung bar gsol/_jo bo'i khyim gyi 'byor pa ni rgya che ba lags kyis/_da slan cad jo bo 'dod pa rnams kyang spyod cing bzhugs shig_/sbyin pa dag kyang sbyin par mdzod cig_/bsod nams dag kyang mdzod cig ces zer ro/_/de nas rgyal po 
[\[17a.7\]]gzugs can snying pos/_nag pa glang chen gnas kyis bslab pa rnams phul te/_nyams par byas so zhes thos nas rgyal pos de dgug pa btang nas de la sngon gyi las thabs byin no/_/de nas dge slong mang po de dag snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te/_lhung 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]bzed bsnams nas/_rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la dong ste/_dge slong mang po de dag rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la rgyu ba dang /_nag pa glang chen gnas kyis bslab pa rnams phul te/_nyams par byas so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang rgyal po'i khab 
[\[17b.2\]]nas bsod snyoms blangs nas/_zan zos te/_zas phyis len pa spangs nas lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag ste/_rkang pa bkrus nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs pa der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs 
[\[17b.3\]]gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_dge slong mang po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'di na bdag cag dge slong mang po snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos 'tshal te/_lhung bzed thogs nas/_rgyal po'i khab tu 
[\[17b.4\]]bsod snyoms la mchis pa na/_btsun pa bdag cag dge slong mang po rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la rgyu ba rnams kyis/_nag pa glang chen gnas kyis bslab pa rnams phul te/_nyams par bgyis so zhes thos lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams 
[\[17b.5\]]la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rigs kyi bu de ni yun ring du khyim du mi gnas te/_de ni yang nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nas phyi zhig na bcom ldan 
[\[17b.6\]]'das kyis nag pa glang chen gnas 'dul ba'i dus la bab par gzigs nas/_snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/_lhung bzed bsnams nas/_rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la gshegs te/_mthar gyis rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms bzhes nas/_
[\[17b.7\]]nag pa glang chen gnas kyi khyim gang na 'dug pa der gshegs te byon nas/_khyim gyi sgo na gzhes te/_de drang ba'i phyir 'od zer bkye nas des de'i khyim thams cad gser zhun ma'i kha dog lta bur snang bar gyur to/_/de nas nag pa glang chen gnas kyis bsams pa/_'od 'di 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]su'i yin zhig gu bcom ldan 'das kho na'i yin gor ma chag na/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der bzhugs te/_bdag la dgongs zhig gu snyam pa dang de'i skabs su phrin pa 'ong nas/_nag pa glang chen gnas la sbran te/_bcom ldan 'das sgo na bzhugs 
[\[18a.2\]]so zhes byas so/_/de nas gus par bsgrim pas bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs pa der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[18a.3\]]'das kyis bka' ci stsal pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyod khyim na gnas pa thong la tshur shog_/yang nga'i thad du rab tu byung shig ces bka' stsal to/_/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/_tshe rabs gzhan dang gzhan dag tu bla ma dang bla ma'i gnas lta bur gyur pa su'i 
[\[18a.4\]]ngag kyang ma bcag pas na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' yang sus kyang gcog nus pa med do/_/de nas des gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ci ltar stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin du 'brang ste/_bcom ldan 
[\[18a.5\]]'das kyis 'od ma'i tshal du khrid nas rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog ste/_des kyang brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong 
[\[18a.6\]]rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa nag pa glang chen gnas kyis las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas/_bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes par ma bgyis la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung 
[\[18a.7\]]nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa 'dis smon lam gang du btab lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_ri khrod kyi grong zhig na/_khyim bdag nag pa zhes bya ba/_phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa/_yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 
[\[18b.2\]]'gran pa zhig gnas pa las/_phyi zhig na de dpyid kyi dus na/_shing yal ga 'khrigs shing me tog rgyas pa'i skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ngo /_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten du mi 'byung ba'i tshe/_rang sangs rgyas sdug cing phongs pa rnams la snying brtse ba bas mtha'i gnas mal 
[\[18b.3\]]na gnas pa/_'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_rang sangs rgyas zhig ri khrod der bsod snyoms la 'gro 'dod nas/_des skyed mos tshal de na rol mo'i sgra grags pa thos nas/_des bsams pa/_bdag dgang dka' ba'i lto 
[\[18b.4\]]'di'i phyir ri khrod du 'gro ci dgos kyis/_skyed mos tshal 'di'i nang du song dang /_'di nas bdag gi bsod snyoms 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam ste/_rang sangs rgyas de skyed mos tshal der song nas/_khyim bdag des de lus mdzes pa dang /_sems mdzes pa de mthong ngo /_/
[\[18b.5\]]mthong nas kyang khyim bdag de rang sangs rgyas de la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/de dga' bar gyur nas bshos gsol te/_smras pa/_'phags pa khyod ga la bzhugs/_bdag gis khyod kyi bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/_/rang sangs rgyas kyis smras pa/_nags khrod 
[\[18b.6\]]ga ge mo zhig na 'dug go zhes smras nas/_rang sangs rgyas de song ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des dus dus su nags khrod der bshos 'bul zhing bsnyen bkur yang byed do/_/de nas yang phyi zhig na khyim bdag de de blta ba'i phyir song ba las/_rang sangs rgyas de shing zhig gi 
[\[18b.7\]]drung du gnas bcas te/_klu'i rgyal po lus bskyil te gnyid log pa bzhin skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/_/de nas khyim bdag des rang sangs rgyas de rab tu dben par gnas pa de mthong nas/_de yang rab tu dbyung bar 'dod pa'i sems skyes so/_/de nas de 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]rang sangs rgyas de'i thad du song nas rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_'phags pa bdag rab tu phyung zhig dang /_bdag kyang khyod kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/rang sangs rgyas kyis smras pa/_nga ni rab tu 'byin 
[\[19a.2\]]par mi byed do/_/drang srong rnams rab tu 'byin par byed kyis drang srong rnams kyi nang du song la rab tu 'byung bar gyis shig_/de nas de thos ma thag tu khyim bdag des khyim gyi 'khor btang nas/_sbyin pa byin cing bsod nams dag byas te/_drang srong rnams kyi nang du 
[\[19a.3\]]rab tu byung nas/_de der rab tu byung ste/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/de rab tu byung nas/_rang sangs rgyas de yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas drang srong de'i blo skyes pa bdag song la yon gnas kyi mchog dge ba'i bshes gnyen de 
[\[19a.4\]]la bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/'on kyang de las bdag gis gong ma'i khyad par rtogs par 'gyur ro snyam ste/_de nags khrod der song ba las/_des der rang sangs rgyas de ni ma mthong gis/_rang sangs rgyas gzhan zhig nags khrod der mthong nas/_des de la dris pa 'phags 
[\[19a.5\]]pa/_dge slong sha tshugs dang /_kha dog 'di lta bu zhig nags khrod 'di na 'dug 'dug pa gar song /_rang sangs rgyas kyis smas pa/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/des smras pa/_de gang du mya ngan las 'das/_de nas rang sangs rgyas des de'i sku gdung 
[\[19a.6\]]de dag bstan to/_/de nas de'i sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs nas bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_spos dang /_me tog rnams kyis bkur sti byas te/_smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der/_phyug 
[\[19a.7\]]cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog shig_/'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/yon tan 'di lta bu dag kyang bdag gis thob par shog shig_/
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]ces des smon lam btab nas/_sa phyogs de nas song ngo /_/de nas phyi zhig na/_de shi 'phos te/_dus las 'das nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe khyim bdag nag par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nag pa glang 
[\[19b.2\]]chen gnas 'di kho na yin te/_des rang sangs rgyas de la bkur sti byas nas/_smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/_gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_rang sangs rgyas bye ba 'bum phrag pas 
[\[19b.3\]]kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa/_nga lta bu 'dis mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas 
[\[19b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa nag pa glang chen gnas mchis brang gis thabs bgyis te/_'dod pa spyad du stsal ba la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang 'di chung ma des 
[\[19b.5\]]thabs byas nas/_ji ltar 'dod pa spyod du bcug pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_grong khyer bA rA Na sI na/_rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de'i tshe rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi mdun na 'don/_bram ze mes sbyin zhes bya ba 
[\[19b.6\]]zhig yod de/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_bu mtshe ma gnyis byung ste/_de gnyis kyi btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_khye'u 'di gnyis kyi ming ci skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_khye'u 'di gnyis mes sbyin gyi bu yin pas na/_khye'u gcig gi ming 
[\[19b.7\]]ni me'i bu zhes gdags so/_/gcig gi ming ni me lce zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u me'i bu dang /_me lce gnyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi snying gus bskyed bsrings nas/_gang gi tshe de gnyis cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_yi ge dang /_
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]bram ze'i spyod lam dang /_spyod pa dang /_oM zhes bya ba dang /_b+ho zhes bya ba dang /_gtsang sbra dang /_cho ga dang /_thal ba blang ba dang /_ril ba thogs pa dang /_nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang /_snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /_srid 'gal ba yod ni ma red/_
[\[20a.2\]]srung gi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin bya ba dang /_mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_blang ba dang /_kha ton bya ba dang /_kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas/_las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur to/_/de gnyis mthar gyis rig pa'i 
[\[20a.3\]]gnas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/phyi zhig na de gnyis kyis phas chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid 'dzin pa mthong ngo /_/de phyi zhig na de gnyis kyis blo skyes pa/_pha med pa'i 'og tu ni bdag cag gnyis pha'i las thabs su bsko bar 'gyur gyi/_bdag cag 
[\[20a.4\]]gnyis khyim na gnas pa btang ngo zhes zer ro/_/'di skad ces kyang zer te/_'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs pa'i mis ni rgyal srid kyi phyir bsad pa dang /_bcing ba dang /_brdeg pa'i las byed pa bas/_nags khung du shing shun gyi gos gyon zhing shing tog za la/_
[\[20a.5\]]gcan gzan dag dang lhan cig gnas kyang bla'i zhes zer nas/_pha ma la gsol te/_yab yum bdag cag gnyis dka' thub kyi nags tshal du mchi'o zhes byas so/_/pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa/_bu gnyis gang gi phyir/_drang srong rnams dka' thub spyod pa de ni 
[\[20a.6\]]khyod gnyis kyi lag na 'dug ste/_nged shi ba'i 'og tu khyed gnyis cod pan med pa'i rgyal srid 'dzin par 'ong ngo /_/khye'u de gnyis kyis smras pa/_bdag cag gnyis 'jigs pa yang 'di kho na yin te/_de'i phyir na nags khung du gnas bca' bar 'dod pas na/_bdag 
[\[20a.7\]]cag gnyis ni 'dod pa la longs spyod pa'i rngo mi thogs so/_/de ltar pha ma gnyis kyis de gnyis la lan mang du bkag kyang dgag ma nus nas/_de gnyis la pha mas smras pa/_rab tu byung bar gyis la/_gal te khyad par cung zad thob par gyur na/_nged gnyis la 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]bltar shog shig ces byas so/_/de nas de gnyis kyis smras pa/_khyed gnyis ci ltar dgyes pa bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes byas nas/_khye'u de gnyis kyis pha ma la 'phyi phyag 'tshal te/_nags khung du gnas bcas so/_/de gnyis der rab tu byung nas/_bsam 
[\[20b.2\]]gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na de gnyis kyi blo skyes pa/_bdag cag gnyis kyis pha ma la dam bcas pa/_gal te khyad par cung zad thob par gyur na/_khyed gnyis la bltar 'ong ngo zhes byas so/_/'dong ngo zhes zer nas steng 
[\[20b.3\]]gi nam mkha' la dong ste/_pha ma gnyis kyi thad du phyin to/_/de nas de mthong ma thag tu pha ma gnyis de gnyis la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/de dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/_khyed gnyis kyang bsod snyoms 'dod la/_nged gnyis kyang bsod nams 'dod kyis/_
[\[20b.4\]]'dir bdag cag gi skyed mos tshal du gnas par gyis shig dang /_bdag cag gnyis kyis khyed gnyis kyi zan sbyar ro zhes byas so/_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_khyed gnyis ji ltar dgyes pa bzhin du bgyi'o zhes byas nas/_skyed mos tshal de nyid du yal ga dang /_lo 
[\[20b.5\]]ma'i spyil po bcas nas 'khod do/_/de nas de gnyis bA rA Na sI'i phyogs kun tu bkur sti bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba dang /_ri mor bya ba dang /_mchod pa bya ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis mdun na 'don mes sbyin gyi bu gnyis de ltar rdzu 'phrul che 
[\[20b.6\]]zhing mthu che bar gyur to zhes thos nas thos ma thag tu ngo mtshar du gyur to/_/g.yar drangs nas zan byin no/_/zan byin nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_smras pa/_dus dus su khyed gnyis nga la bltar shog shig ces byas so/_/de nas de gnyis kyis smras pa/_lha ji ltar dgyes 
[\[20b.7\]]pa bzhin du bgyi'o zhes byas nas de gnyis song ngo /_/de nas dus dus su de gnyis steng gi nam mkha' las 'gro zhing /_rgyal po'i pho brang du 'dong bar byed de/_rgyal po tshangs pas byin la bltar 'gro'o/_/rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis kyang de gnyis 'ong nas nam 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]mkha' de nyid las pang du blangs te/_stan la bzhag nas/_bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir de mdun du 'dug go/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis 'bangs ri khrod pa rnams log 
[\[21a.2\]]nas dpung gi tshogs go bskon te chas nas/_des bu mo la bsgo ba/_bu drang srong de gnyis nam 'ongs pa dang /_ngas ci ltar bkur sti byed pa de kho na bzhin du khyod kyis kun gyis shig ces byas nas/_rgyal po de song ngo /_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po'i pho brang du drang srong me'i 
[\[21a.3\]]bu don ci zhig yod pa'i phyir/_des drang srong me lce btang ste/_de steng gi nam mkha' las rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs nas/_bu mo des drang srong nam mkha' la 'dug pa pang du blangs te 'khyud nas stan la bzhag go/_/bud med rnams ni reg na gdug pa yin te/_bu mo des reg 
[\[21a.4\]]ma thag tu drang srong me lce rdzu 'phrul de las nyams so/_/bu mo de yang drang srong de gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mthong nas chags par gyur te/_de de dang gnas dben pa zhig tu zhugs nas de dang lhan cig nyal po byas so/_/de nas de'i btsun mo'i 'khor 
[\[21a.5\]]gyis tshor te/_de dag gis bsams pa/_gal te bdag cag gis drang srong 'di la tshig 'ga' zhig byas na ni/_drang srong 'di rdzu 'phrul che bas dmod pa 'dor srid do snyam ste/_de dag 'jigs skrag nas/_cung zad kyang ma smras so/_/drang srong de yang rgyal po'i pho 
[\[21a.6\]]brang de nyid du 'dug cing rkang pas 'gror ngo tsha ste ma phod do/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis ri khrod pa phab nas phyir log ste/_rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs pa dang /_des drang srong me lce 'dir 'ongs so zhes thos nas/_thos ma thag tu rgyal po de de la bltar song ste/_
[\[21a.7\]]des bza' ba dang /_bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po dag phul lo/_/bu mos kyang drang srong de'i skom khyer te 'ongs so/_/de nas de mthong ma thag tu drang srong de shin tu chags par gyur to/_/drang srong de myos pa tsam du chags par gyur nas/_rgyal po de'i spyan sngar 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]lag pa brkyang nas/_lag pa nas bzung zhes byas pa dang /_rgyal po des mthong nas mthong ma thag tu ral gri rnon po thogs te/_drang srong de gsad par byas pa dang /_bu mos mthong nas drang srong de la smras pa/_mkhan po ci lags/_khyod gsang nan dgos pa'i phyir 
[\[21b.2\]]'khrul te khyod kyis 'dir phyag brkyang lags sam zhes byas so/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin de de bzhin du yid ches par gyur te/_drang srong 'di 'khrul to snyam du bsams nas/_skyen par skom phul lo/_/de nas de la zan byin nas chos nyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug 
[\[21b.3\]]go/_/de nas drang srong me'i bu dka' thub kyi nags tshal na 'dug pas bsams pa/_ji drang srong de da tsam gyi bar du ma 'ong na ci snyam ste/_des bltas na 'dod pa spyod par gyur la/_skabs su chud cing 'dug pa mthong nas/_'di deng du srog yal bar gyur srid do snyam nas/_steng 
[\[21b.4\]]gi bar snang las rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ong ngo /_/rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis kyang /_drang srong de nam mkha' de nyid las pang du blangs nas/_stan la bzhag ste/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/_/de nas des rgyal po de la chos tha gi tsam bshad nas/_nu bo 
[\[21b.5\]]khrid de steng gi nam mkha' las dka' thub kyi nags tshal du song ngo /_/de nas des de la yid la byed pa'i man ngag phog nas/_des phyir yang bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi btsun mo'i 'khor rnams 
[\[21b.6\]]kyis bsams pa/_bu mo 'dis ma legs pa 'di lta bu byas pa de/_gal te bdag cag gis ma gsol na/_bdag cag la yang 'di'i phyir gyod 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol to/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po tshangs pas byin 
[\[21b.7\]]zhe sdang chen po'i dbang du gyur nas/_des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas/_drang srong de'i gnas su song nas/_drang srong me lces rgyal po tshangs pas byin dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang chas te 'ongs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang sems pa la 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]zhugs te/_'di bsam pa ci lta bu zhig gis 'dir 'ongs snyam ste/_des bltas na bdag gsad par 'dod do snyam du rig nas/_de nyid dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/_steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin 
[\[22a.2\]]gyis drang srong me lce steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug pa mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu de'i khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa de med par gyur te/_the tsom skyes pa/_ji 'di ngas ji skad thos pa de bzhin du gyur tam/_'on te ma gyur zhig gu snyam nas/_tshigs su 
[\[22a.3\]]bcad de smras pa/_bram ze me lce bdag gis ni/_/'dod pa spyod ces sngar thos na/_/tshig de bden pa yin nam ci/_/'on te ci lags mi spyod dam/_/rgyal po chen po de bden te/_/khyod kyis gzhan la thos pa bzhin/_/bdag ni lam ngan zhugs gyur te/_/chags 
[\[22a.4\]]pa'i gnas su myos par gyur/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin the tsom skyes te/_drang srong me'i bu'i thad du song nas/_des drang srong de la dris pa/_drang srong ci lags/_de'i slad du bdag gis ji skad thos pa de kho na bzhin lags sam/_drang srong gis smras pa/_rgyal po 
[\[22a.5\]]chen po de kho na bzhin du bden mod kyis/_nyon mongs pa rnams ni de ltar mthu che'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'o na 'di ltar 'dod pa yang longs spyod par byed la/_rdzu 'phrul 'di lta bu dag dang yang ldan/_drang srong gis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po drang srong 'di gang gi tshe/_
[\[22a.6\]]'dod pa la spyod par gyur pa de'i tshe ni rdzu 'phrul las nyams so/_/'di gnas de nas bdag gis khrid de de la lung yang phog_/yid la byed pa'i thabs kyang bstan nas/_'dis kyang phyir yang rdzu 'phrul bskyed do/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po de de la dga' bar gyur nas 
[\[22a.7\]]des drang srong de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te bzod pa gsol nas song ngo /_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe drang srong me'i bur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i nu bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/_nag 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]pa glang chen gnas 'di kho na yin no/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i bu mor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/_chung ma 'di kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang des tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas las nyams par byas te/_'dod pa spyod pa la gnas par byas pa las/_de ngas de nas drangs te phyir yang bsam 
[\[22b.2\]]gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas par byas la/_da ltar yang 'dis 'di tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas las nyams par byas nas/_'dod pa la spyod pa la gnas par byas pa las de ngas de nas drangs te/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang /_bde
