[\[22b.3\]]ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag go/_/gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung nas/_des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/_dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des nad ltar rnam par grol 
[\[22b.4\]]bar gyur to//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po nyi shu dgu pa/_sa ra na zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe yul gyen du rgyal zhes bya ba na ni/_rgyal po rab snang zhes bya ba rgyal po byed do/_/yul dpa' rab ces bya ba na ni/_
[\[22b.5\]]rgyal po 'char ka zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de gnyis phan tshun mi 'thun par gyur pas/_dus dus su skye bo phal po che kha 'dog par byed do/_/de nas gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na'i bus nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa 
[\[22b.6\]]de'i tshe/_des bsams pa bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi sdug bsngal dang /_yid mi bde ba mang po sel ba yin/_bde ba dang yid bde ba rnam pa du ma bsgrub pa yin/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma sel ba yin/_dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma bsgrub pa yin la/_dge 
[\[22b.7\]]ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la brten te/_rus pa'i ri las ni brgal/_khrag dang /_mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams na/_bcom ldan 'das de'i bka' drin bdag gis ci ltar bsab par bya snyam mo/_/de nas yang bsams pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]'jig rten du 'byung ba gang yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni/_sems can la phan pa'i phyir 'byung ba kho nar zad kyis/_ma la bdag gis kyang sems can la phan par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas de sems pa la zhugs te/_bdag gis 'dul bar bya ba 'ga' 
[\[23a.2\]]lta ci yod snyam pa dang /_des bltas na yul dpa' rab ces bya ba na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po rnams lhag par bdag gis gdul bar bya ba yin par mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_
[\[23a.3\]]bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ljongs rgyu zhing mchi bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kA t+yA ya na'i bu khyod 
[\[23a.4\]]song la bdag brgal nas gzhan sgrol shig_/bdag grol nas gzhan grol bar gyis shig_/bdag dbugs phyung nas gzhan dbugs phyung shig_/bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_gzhan yongs su mya ngan las zlos shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya 
[\[23a.5\]]na'i bus/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_'khor lnga brgya dang ljongs rgyu zhing song ngo /_/de nas de mthar gyis rgyu zhing song song ba las/_yul gyen du rgyal du phyin te/_de der phyin nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la zhugs par 
[\[23a.6\]]byas so/_/yul dpa' rab tu song nas/_rgyal po 'char ka dad pa phun sum tshogs pa la gnas par byas so/_/skye bo phal po che yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad par byas so/_/de nas phyi zhig na yul dpa' rab kyi rgyal po 'char ka'i btsun mo la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am 
[\[23a.7\]]bcu lon pa dang /_bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_ming sa ra na zhes btags so/_/de nas khye'u sa ra na 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_mtsho'i 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]nang gi pad ma bzhin du sku drag par gyur to/_/de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_khye'u de yi ge slob tu bcug ste/_rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas tha dad pa 'di lta ste/_glang po che zhon pa dang /_rta 
[\[23b.2\]]zhon pa dang /_mtshon cha bcang ba dang /_'phong dang /_mdun du bsnur ba dang /_phyir bsnur ba dang /_g.yul las thar bar bya ba dang /_lcags kyus gzung ba dang /_zhags pas gzung ba dang /_mda' bo che 'phang ba dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phang ba dang /_mtshon rtse 
[\[23b.3\]]gcig pa gdab pa dang /_'khor lo 'phang ba dang /_gcad pa dang /_gsheg pa dang /_lag pas gzung ba dang /_rkang pa'i stabs dang /_mgo bo bskyab pa dang /_rgyang mar 'phog pa dang /_sgra grag par 'phog pa dang /_gnad du 'phog pa dang /_gdon mi za bar 'phog par bya 
[\[23b.4\]]ba dang /_tshabs cher gtang ba rnams kyang bslabs nas gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na gzhon nu sa ra na tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na'i bu las brten nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/_/
[\[23b.5\]]de nas des bltas na pha chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal po byed pa mthong ngo /_/de nas des bsams pa/_yab nongs pa'i 'og tu ni bdag rgyal sar 'jug par 'ongs te/_bdag la rgyal srid mi dgos kyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung la chu bo rnams las 
[\[23b.6\]]brgal bar bya ba dang /_sbyor ba rnams las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/_brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad par bya'o snyam nas yab yum la gsol te/_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na'i bu'i thad du rab tu byung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na'i bus 
[\[23b.7\]]bsams pa/_yul 'di nas bkar dgos so snyam nas/_de khrid de yul gyen du rgyal du song nas de na 'khod do/_/de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa sa ra na snga dro chos gos dang /_sham thabs gyon te/_lhung bzed thogs nas grong khyer gyen du rgyal du bsod snyoms la 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]song ngo /_/de yang spyod yul rgyus mi shes la lam po che dang srang gi rgyus la mi mkhas pa zhig ste/_de mthar gyis bsod snyoms rgyu zhing song song ba las/_rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi pho brang gi chab sgor phyin nas chab sgo ba rnams med pa'i skabs su de rgyal po'i 
[\[24a.2\]]pho brang gi nang du song nas/_de rgyal po'i btsun mo rnams kyis mthong na/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes te/_lus kyi sha rgyas par 'dug go/_/de nas de mthong ma thag tu de dag de la shin tu dga' bar gyur te/_de dag gis bsams pa/_dge slong 'di 'di ltar 
[\[24a.3\]]gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la na gzhon la/_tshangs par spyod pa la yang gnas so snyam mo/_/de nas de dag dga' bar gyur pas de'i stan bshams te 'dug tu bcug nas/_bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas nas/_tshe dang ldan pa sa ra na bskor te chos 
[\[24a.4\]]mnyan pa'i phyir gung la bzhag go/_/de nas de de na 'dug pa'i skabs su rgyal po gtum po rab snang btsun mo'i 'khor du 'ongs so/_/btsun mo rnams kyi lugs kyis na gang gi tshe/_rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor du 'ong ba de'i tshe/_langs te bsur 'gro ba yin na de rnams chos nyan pa 
[\[24a.5\]]las 'dun ches nas ldang ba dang bsu ba yang ma byas so/_/de nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis bsams pa/_ma la bdag btsun mo rnams kyis ma bsu ba 'di ci las gyur snyam nas/_rgyal pos de 'phrigs te/_khros bzhin du btsun mo'i 'khor du song ngo /_/de der song ste 
[\[24a.6\]]bltas na tshe dang ldan pa sa ra na btsun mo rnams kyis bskor ba mthong nas/_rgyal po de lhag par yang khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa skyes te/_de khros nas bsams pa/_dge slong gis nga'i chung ma mthong gis med do snyam mo/_/de nas des bsam pa/_re zhig 'di 'dod chags 
[\[24a.7\]]dang bral ba yin nam/_'on te 'dod chags dang ma bral ba yin brtag par bya'o snyam ste/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa sa ra na la smras pa/_ci khyod dgra bcom pa yin nam/_des smras pa/_rgyal po chen po ma yin no/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_ci khyod phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]rgyun du zhugs pa thob pa yin nam/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched thob pa yin nam/_bsam gtan bzhi pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[24b.2\]]dang po thob pa yin nam/_des smras pa rgyal po chen po ma yin no/_/de nas rgyal pos bsams pa/_dge slong 'di 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin la/_'di mkhan po dang slob dpon gyis ma bslabs kyis ngas 'di bslab par bya'o snyam nas/_zham ring ba rnams bos te 
[\[24b.3\]]de lcag gis zhen par bzhus te btang ngo /_/de nas de lcag gis bzhus pas pags pa ral nas khros te bsams pa bdag ma nyes par dus ngan pa'i rgyal po gtum po 'dis brdegs kyis/_bdag pha'i yul du song la pha'i yul du 'dug ste/_dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go 
[\[24b.4\]]bskon te song la/_dus ngan pa'i rgyal po gtum po 'di/_rdul bton te btang ngo snyam nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na'i bu ga la 'dug pa der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na'i bu'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_smras pa/_mkhan po bdag ma nongs par dus 
[\[24b.5\]]ngan pa'i rgyal po gtum po des/_bdag ma nyes par brdegs pas na bdag pha ma'i yul du mchis te/_der mchis nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te mchis la/_dus ngan pa'i rgyal po gtum po de rdul bton te btang gis/_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams 
[\[24b.6\]]bzhes su gsol/_gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_bu khro ba'i dbang du ma 'gro shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu byung bas ni/_'jig rten gyi chos brgyad de/_rnyed pa dang /_ma rnyed pa dang /_grags pa dang /_grags pa ma yin pa dang /_bstod pa dang /_smad pa dang /_
[\[24b.7\]]bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba thams cad bzod par bya'o zhes ma gsungs sam zhes byas te/_gnas brtan des de la lan mang du bkag kyang dgag ma nus nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na'i bus de la smras pa/_bu de ltar khyod 'gro 'dod na da ltar ni nam sros su nye ste/_
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]lam na seng ge dang /_stag dang /_gzig dang /_dred mo rnams kyi 'jigs pa yod kyis do nub kyi tshe la 'dir 'dug la nang par song shig ces byas so/_/de nas des smras pa/_mkhan pos ci skad bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal lo zhes byas nas/_gnas 
[\[25a.2\]]brtan de de dang gnas khang gcig tu nyal te/_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na'i bus de bzlog pa'i phyir des byin gyis brlabs te/_ci nas de nyal ba'i rmi lam du des bslab pa phul te/_pha'i yul du song nas phas de'i rgyal srid la dbang byed du bcug ste/_dpung gi tshogs yan lag 
[\[25a.3\]]bzhi byin nas 'di skad ces bsgo ste/_khyod kyis thog ma kho nar las su bya ba ni dgra tshar gcod par gyis shig_/ces byas nas/_de thos ma thag tu des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas/_rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi yul du dmag drangs pa las/_rgyal po 
[\[25a.4\]]gtum po rab snang gis de'i g.yul pham par byas te/_thub par byas nas/_rgyab kyis phyogs par byas te/_gson por bzung nas gsod du btang ste/_de nas gshed ma'i mi rnams kyis khrid de gsod pa'i sar phyin du nye ba dang /_des bltas na rmi lam nyid na tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[25a.5\]]kA t+yA ya na'i bu grong khyer gyen du rgyal na bsod snyoms byed cing 'dug pa mthong nas des kus btab ste/_mkhan po bdag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol/_bdag la dka' ba mdzad pa dang /_srog phangs pa sbyin par mdzad du gsol/_zhes zer zhing 'dug pa rmi lam mthong bar 
[\[25a.6\]]byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas de des skrag nas sad kyang rmi lam la yang dag pa tsam du 'dzin cing de bzhin du rdol nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na'i bus de la smras pa/_bu khyod kyis rmi lam mthong bar zad kyis ma 'jigs shig_/de nas de thos ma thag tu sa ra na dga' 
[\[25a.7\]]bar gyur nas sems pa la zhugs te/_sa ra na zhes bya ba de ni nga nyid yin zhing 'dug la/_bdag gis ni sems can gcig la yang 'tshe ba ma byas na/_da bdag khro ba'i dbang du song ste/_rmi lam du yang skye bo mang po de snyed bsad kyis/_don du gnyer ba 'di lta bu bdag gis 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]btang ngo snyam mo/_/de nas gnas brtan gyis de'i yid skyo bar gyur par rig nas/_de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na sa ra nas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas rgyal po gtum po rab 
[\[25b.2\]]snang gis bdag gis dge slong lcag gis bzhus pa gang yin pa de/_rgyal po 'char ka'i bu yin no zhes thos nas/_de'i thad du song ste rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas bzod pa gsol te/_de nyid las brten nas tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na'i bu zhag bdun gyi bar du bshos la spyan drangs 
[\[25b.3\]]so/_/de nas phyi zhig na tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA ya na'i bus bsams pa/_rnyed pa dang bkur sti skyes kyis bcad dgos so snyam nas/_tshe dang ldan pa sa ra na dang lhan cig tu rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sa ra na ji ltar gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos so/_/
[\[25b.4\]]thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa sa ra nas las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes lags/_las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas/_rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis lcag gis bzhus la/_
[\[25b.5\]]'dis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes par ma bgyis nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[25b.6\]]dge slong dag 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags te/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs pas byin rgyal po byed do/_/phyi zhig na de'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyis zham ring byas te/_skyed mos tshal gyi sar song ba las rgyal po gnyid kyis 
[\[25b.7\]]log go/_/bud med rnams ni me tog dang /_'bras bu la sred de/_de'i btsun mo rnams skyed mos tshal der phan tshun du rgyu ba la zhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du mi 'byung ba de'i tshe/_rang sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_rang sangs 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]rgyas zhig skyed mos tshal der mtshan mo dgongs mal btab nas/_lus mdzes pa dang /_sems mdzes pa de lta bu bud med de dag gis mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu de la sems dga' ba skyes so/_/dga' ba skyes nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i 
[\[26a.2\]]phyir mdun du 'khod do/_/de nas rgyal po de sad nas/_btsun mo'i 'khor mi snang na/_khros te ral gri rnon po thogs nas/_rjes gar byung ba thog thag tu song ba las/_rgyal po des rang sangs rgyas de btsun mo'i 'khor la chos 'chad cing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang dge slong 
[\[26a.3\]]gis nga'i chung ma mthong ngo snyam ste/_de lhag par yang khro ba'i kun tu dkris pa skyes nas/_des zham ring 'khor rnams la bsgo ste/_rang sangs rgyas de lcag gis zhen par bzhus te btang ngo /_/de nas rang sangs rgyas des bsams pa/_nyon mongs pa 'di ni smas zhing nyams par 
[\[26a.4\]]gyur te/_'di gtan du 'khyams na mi rung gis ra mda' bya dgos so snyam du bsams nas/_nam mkha' la 'phags te 'bar ba dang /_lam mer 'dug pa dang /_char 'bab pa dang /_glog 'gyu ba la sogs pa'i cho 'phrul bstan no/_/so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyis 
[\[26a.5\]]myur du dad par gyur te/_de mthong ma thag tu de la shin tu dga' bar gyur te/_dga' bar gyur nas sdong po sog les bcad pa bzhin du de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_skal ba chen po dang ldan pa mar spyon/_bdag nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba'i lag nas drongs shig 
[\[26a.6\]]ces byas so/_/de nas rang sangs rgyas de de nyid la snying brtse ba'i phyir sa la babs nas des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_bzod par gsol nas/_ci srid 'tsho'i bar du yo byad thams cad bstabs te/_skyed mos tshal de nyid du yal ga dang lo ma rnams kyi spyil po phub nas/_yo byad 
[\[26a.7\]]thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas so/_/de nas phyi zhig na rang sangs rgyas des bsams pa/_bdag la lus khol ba 'dis ci dgos kyis bdag zhi ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams su 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas 'bar ba dang /_lam mer 'dug pa dang /_char 'bab pa dang /_glog 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul bstan te/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas rgyal po des de'i sku gdung la mchod pa byas nas/_sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs te/_mchod rten de la bsnyen bkur chen po byas nas smon lam btab pa/_kye ma 'di ltar bdag gis sems can dag 
[\[26b.2\]]pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa'i las 'di bdag gis myong bar ma gyur cig_/bdag gis phyir yang bkur sti byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na/_bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba/_de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog shig_/'di bas 
[\[26b.3\]]kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong 
[\[26b.4\]]dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sa ra na 'di kho na yin te/_des der rang sangs rgyas la gnod pa byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der lus la lcag gis bzhus pas lcag 'og tu shi nas/_
[\[26b.5\]]'dis rang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa nga lta bu mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas la nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/gzhan 
[\[26b.6\]]yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung nas/_'dis der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyad de dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na/_da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to//_//[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi brtul zhugs can zhes bya ba ni/_gleng 
[\[26b.7\]]gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe yul bi de ha'i ljongs kyi [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi brtul zhugs can [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi pags pa gyon zhing rwa thogs pa/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams dang lhan cig tu rtswa za zhing chu 'thung ba lnga brgya tsam zhig 'khod do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/_skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang 
[\[27a.2\]]chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni/_chos nyid kyis nyin 
[\[27a.3\]]dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang /_nyam nga ba dang /_gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni 
[\[27a.4\]]ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang /_thar pa dang /_'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 
[\[27a.5\]]'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis 
[\[27a.6\]]brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus 
[\[27a.7\]]las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi brtul zhugs can lnga brgya po rnams gdul ba'i dus la bab bo snyam du dgongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi brtul zhugs can de rnams kyis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de dag rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]bar mthong la/_mthong nas de rnams kyang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de dag dang lhan cig tu rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro bar 'gyur ba de lta bur byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas de dag der song nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de dag mi snang bar byas so/_/de nas skye bo phal po che de dag gis de 
[\[27b.2\]]rnams mthong nas rnam par smod par byed do/_/de ltar smad nas de rnams rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/_'od ma'i tshal logs su chas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la thugs brtse ba'i phyir mdun du bzhugs so/_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi brtul zhugs can lnga brgya po de 
[\[27b.3\]]dag gis thag ring po zhig nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de dag bcom ldan 'das la dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs pa der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos 
[\[27b.4\]]mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang shes pa dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi brtul zhugs can lnga brgya po de dag gis stan de 
[\[27b.5\]]nyid la 'khod bzhin du/_bden pa mngon par rtogs pa'i mod la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum byas te/_de dag gis bden pa mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung 
[\[27b.6\]]ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs 
[\[27b.7\]]par mdzad nas de dag la lung yang phog go/_/de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]ldan 'das dge slong 'di rnams kyis las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi cha lugs su mchis la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams dang lhan cig tu rtswa za zhing chu 'thung bar gyur nas/_'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes par 
[\[28a.2\]]ma bgyis la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di rnams nyid kyis las byas shing bsags te/_dge slong 
[\[28a.3\]]dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i/_kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha 
[\[28a.4\]]dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po dang thabs cig tu ljongs rgyu shing gshegs pa las/_rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na dka' thub kyi gnas zhig na bram 
[\[28a.5\]]ze 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa zhig gnas pa des/_bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/_khye'u 'od srung gi dge slong [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bzhin du rgyu ba 'di dag la ltos/_'di rnams ni gnas med de/_gang dga' bar rgyu bar 
[\[28a.6\]]byed do zhes byas so/_/de nas phyi zhig na bram ze des/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas/_de bram ze'i khye'u de dag dang lhan cig tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi thad du rab tu byung ngo /_/de dag der rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa 
[\[28a.7\]]spyad na yang /_yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob nas/_de dag gis 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_'di ltar bdag cag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]ma thob kyis/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon 
[\[28b.2\]]mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe dge slong lnga brgyar gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi brtul zhugs can 'di dag kho na yin te/_de rnams kyis der dge slong rnams 
[\[28b.3\]]la tshig rtsub po smras te/_'di dag ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bzhin du rgyu'o zhes byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/_tshe rabs lnga brgyar [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]su skyes nas/_da ltar srid pa tha ma dang /_gnas tha mar gyur pa'i bar du yang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi cha lugs 'dzin par gyur to/_/de rnams kyis 
[\[28b.4\]]der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/_'chi kar smon lam btab ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/_bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes 
[\[28b.5\]]par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang /_shin tu mnyam pa dang /_
[\[28b.6\]]shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'di rnams kyis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon 
[\[28b.7\]]sum du byas so//_//zla ba zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze che zhing mtho ba zla ba bde ba zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/_des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/_phyi 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]zhig na de'i chung ma la bu mo chags nas/_de la yid la 'dod pa 'di lta bu zhig skyes te/_gzhung gi rtsod pa rnams dang /_lhan cig tu gtam zer yang ci ma rung snyam mo/_/de nas des khyim thab la bsnyad de/_jo bo bdag la yid la 'dod pa 'di lta bu zhig skyes 
[\[29a.2\]]te/_bdag gzhung gi rtsod pa rnams dang lhan cig tu gtam zer yang ci ma rung snyam bgyid do zhes byas so/_/bram ze de yang ltas la mkhas pa zhig ste/_de'i blo skyes pa 'di ni lto na 'dug pa'i sems can de'i mthu yin te/_des na de'i yid la 'dod pa de lta bu skyes so snyam mo/_/
[\[29a.3\]]de nas zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_bu mo gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_bu mo 'di'i ming ci skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_de nas bu mo 'di zla ba bde ba'i bu mo yin pas na/_bu mo 'di'i ming zla ba 
[\[29a.4\]]zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas bu mo zla ba 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur nas/_gang gi tshe de chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe/_khyim de nyid du yi ge bslabs te/_de ring po ma lon par yi 
[\[29a.5\]]ge mthar phyin nas/_des khyim de nyid du pha las bstan bcos thams cad lobs te/_gzhung gi rtsod pa thams cad tshar bcad nas des tshig tu bya ba thos so cog lobs so/_/de nas phyi zhig na des mnyan du yod pa 'di nyid na dge sbyong gau ta ma thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa 
[\[29a.6\]]yin par bdag nyid khas 'che ba zhig yod do zhes thos nas/_thos ma thag tu bu mo de yang ya mtshan du gyur te/_bdag song la dge sbyong gau ta ma de ji 'dra ba blta bar bya'o snyam ste/_pha ma gnyis la gsol nas/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/_bu mo des thag ring po zhig nas 
[\[29a.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa/_me lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu/_me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu/_mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu/_mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]pa lta bu/_blo gsal zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba'i nyams bde ba ci 'dra ba de lta 
[\[29b.2\]]bu ni lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zhi gnas kyi sems la goms par byas pa la yang nyams bde ba de lta bu skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de de ltar dga' ba skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs pa der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos 
[\[29b.3\]]mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_shes pa dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na bu mo zla bas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta 
[\[29b.4\]]ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom 
[\[29b.5\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/
[\[29b.6\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI la gtad nas/_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs de rab tu phyung nas/_bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas de la lung yang phog go/_/des kyang brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_
[\[29b.7\]]dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/der gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma rnams kyis las la 'du ba logs zhig tu gyis shig ces gsungs pa las/_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don mi nus nas/_de bcom 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das la skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 
[\[30a.2\]]rnams kyis kyang las kyi 'du ba logs shig tu gyis shig_/dge slong ma rnams kyis kyang las kyi 'du ba logs shig tu gyis shig_/ces bka' stsal la/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la ni so sor thar pa bstan/_dge slong ma rnams la ni ma bstan lags na/_
[\[30a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzung bar 'tshal lags so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshig re re nas zlos shing chos gsungs mi srid de/_de'i skabs med do/_/de nas der bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i 
[\[30a.4\]]bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI la bka' stsal pa/_kye gau ta mI gal te lan cig smras pas 'dzin nus na ni bstan par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/de nas de'i tshe dge slong ma zla ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te/_dge slong ma zla bas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba 
[\[30a.5\]]de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa bstan du gsol/_lan cig bka' stsal pas/_bdag gis gzung bar 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la so sor thar 
[\[30a.6\]]pa'i mdo bstan te/_lan cig bka' stsal pas/_dge slong ma zla bas lobs nas/_des sde snod gsum yang lobs so/_/tshig tu bya ba ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad kyang thos ma thag tu lobs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/
[\[30a.7\]]de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa dge slong ma zla bas las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes la/_'dis bstan bcos thams cad kyang lobs te/_gzhung gi rtsod 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]pa thams cad tshar bcad nas/_'dis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes par ma bgyis la bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis la/_'dis thos pa thams cad kyang 
[\[30b.2\]]'dzin nus te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa 'dis smon lam gang du btab lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[30b.3\]]pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i/_kha lo sgyur ba/_bla 
[\[30b.4\]]na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung ngo /_/de gang las rab tu byung bar gyur pa'i mkhan mo de/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis thos pa 'dzin pa 
[\[30b.5\]]rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/_/de nas des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/_'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang 
[\[30b.6\]]ma thob kyis/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/_bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_
[\[30b.7\]]nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig_/ji ltar bdag gi mkhan mo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang shAkya thub pa/_shAkya'i rgyal po des 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par shog cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung ba'i dge slong mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/_dge slong ma zla ba 'di kho na 
[\[31a.2\]]yin te/_des der rab tu byung nas tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/_'chi kar smon lam btab pa des na dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang /_shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes 
[\[31a.3\]]par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas/_ngas 'di thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to//_//mi'am ci 
[\[31a.4\]]gnyis zhes bya ba de la/_mi'am ci dang po ni gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/_khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa 
[\[31a.5\]]zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am/_bcu lon pa dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mdog 
[\[31a.6\]]bzang ba/_gser gyi mdog can mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/_lag pa ring ba dpral ba'i dbyes che ba sna mtho ba/_sna legs pa/_smin ma stug pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas te/_khye'u 'di'i ming ci skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_
[\[31a.7\]]khye'u 'di mchog tu byad gzugs mdzes te/_byad gzugs mi'am ci dang 'dra bas na/_khye'u 'di'i ming mi 'am ci zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u mi 'am ci 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_mtsho'i nang 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_yi ge dang /_khong rtsis dang /_shod dgod pa dang /_lag rtsis dang /_dbyung ba dang /_sba ba dang /_dgram pa dang /_gos brtag pa dang /_nor bu brtag pa dang /_rin po che brtag pa dang /_
[\[31b.2\]]spos brtag pa dang /_sman brtag pa dang /_glang po che brtag pa dang /_rta brtag pa dang /_go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te/_yi ge mkhas pa dang /_klog mkhas pa dang /_mdzangs pa dang /_bya ba la gsal ba dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar 
[\[31b.3\]]gyur to/_/de nas grong khyer chen po drug po thams cad du de'i grags pa rgyas par gyur te/_mnyan du yod pa na/_khyim bdag che ge mo'i bu byad gzugs mi 'am ci dang 'dra ba zhig skyes so zhes grags so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo phal po che ya mtshan du gyur te/_de blta 
[\[31b.4\]]ba'i phyir dong ngo /_/de nas de byad gzugs kyis rgyags pas dregs nas su la yang phyag mi 'tshal/_su la yang mi ldang ste/_byad gzugs nga dang mtshungs pa med do snyam mo/_/de nas de'i pha ma gnyis kyis bsams pa/_'di'i nga rgyal bsal dgos te/_'di la bcom ldan 
[\[31b.5\]]'das bstan par bya'o snyam nas smras pa/_bu su yang nga dang mtshungs pa med do snyam du byad gzugs kyis rgyags pas dregs par ma byed cig_/bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das ma mthong ste/_khyod ni de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi phod/_stong gi char yang nye bar mi phod/_'bum gyi 
[\[31b.6\]]char yang nye bar mi phod do zhes byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu de ya mtshan du gyur to/_/bdag pas dge sbyong gau ta ma ches gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa blta snyam nas/_skye bo mang pos g.yog byas te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/khye'u des thag ring po 
[\[31b.7\]]zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa/_me lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu/_me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu/_mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa lta bu/_
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]blo gsal zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de'i byad gzugs kyis rgyags pas dregs pa de med par gyur to/_/de nas de bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur 
[\[32a.2\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_shes pa dang /_rang bzhin thugs 
[\[32a.3\]]su chud nas/_de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na khye'u mi 'am cis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du/_'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas pha ma 
[\[32a.4\]]gnyis la gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_des kyang brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_
[\[32a.5\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de'i byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa bsal nas/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang /_bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i 
[\[32a.6\]]dus na yang ngas 'di'i byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa bsal nas/_ji ltar bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas par byas pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_grong khyer bA rA Na sI na bram ze zhig gnas pa des/_thabs zlar bab 
[\[32a.7\]]pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas/_de 'o ma dang /_zho dang mar 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_byad gzugs kyis rgyags pas dregs nas/_su la yang gsong por smra ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_ldang ba mi byed do/_/de nas de'i tshe pha ma gnyis kyis bsams pa/_
[\[32b.2\]]'di'i byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa bsal dgos so/_/de ltar ma byas na 'di zhi bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de'i tshe bA rA Na sI'i sa phyogs zhig na/_drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/_rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig gnas te/_de nas bram ze des drang srong de la gsol 
[\[32b.3\]]pa/_khye'u 'di byad gzugs kyis rgyags pas dregs nas/_su la yang gsong por smra ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang ldang ba yang mi bgyid kyis/_khyod kyis de'i byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa bsal du gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas drang srong des bram ze de la cang mi smra 
[\[32b.4\]]bas khas blangs so/_/de nas bram ze de drang srong de'i thad nas song nas/_bu la smras pa bu khyod byad gzugs bdag dang mtshungs pa med do snyam du byad gzugs kyis rgyags par ma byed cig_/dka' thub kyi gnas che ge mo zhig na drang srong zhig gnas te/_de la ni khyod kyi byad 
[\[32b.5\]]gzugs kyis brgya'i char yang nye bar mi phod/_stong gi char yang nye bar mi phod/_'bum gyi char yang nye bar mi phod do zhes byas so/_/de nas de ya mtshan du gyur to/_/de ya mtshan du gyur nas/_drang srong de ga la 'dug pa der song ste/_drang srong des khye'u de mthong nas des khye'u 
[\[32b.6\]]de bas ches byad gzugs bzang bar bdag nyid sprul to/_/de nas khye'u des thag ring po zhig nas drang srong de ches gzugs bzang ba dang /_ches blta na sdug pa dang ches mdzes pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de'i byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa med par gyur te/_drang srong de la yang dga' 
[\[32b.7\]]bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur nas/_drang srong de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go/_/de nas des de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de nas khye'u de drang srong de nyid las rab tu byung ngo /_/de rab tu byung nas bsam 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe khye'u de nyid du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khye'u mi 'am ci 'di kho na yin 
[\[33a.2\]]te/_de'i tshe yang ngas 'di'i byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa bsal nas/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas par byas so/_/da ltar yang ngas 'di'i byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa bsal nas/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang /_bde ba'i 
[\[33a.3\]]mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag go/_/gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung ste/_der 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/_dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pas na/_de'i phyir da ltar rnam par 
[\[33a.4\]]grol bar gyur to//_//mi 'am ci gnyis pa ni/_gleng gzhi yul ser skya'i gnas na bzhugs te/_der gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yab dang /_sras mjal bar mdzad pa de'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das kyis/_nyi ma gcig ni rgyal po zas gtsang gi der 
[\[33a.5\]]bshos gsol to/_/phyi nyin ni btsun mo'i 'khor du bshos gsol to/_/der gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das btsun mo'i 'khor du bshos gsol nas/_slar gshegs pa de'i tshe/_grags 'dzin ma khang thog tu song nas/_bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing 'dug go/_/de nas gang 
[\[33a.6\]]gis skabs su mi mthong bar gyur pa de'i skabs su/_khang thog nas mchongs nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus sa gzhi stan shing bal gyi nang tshang can 'dra bar bsgyur te/_ci nas de la cung zad kyang mi gnod par mdzad do/_/de nas skabs de rnams dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/_
[\[33a.7\]]dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa grags 'dzin mas bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du/_rang gi srog btang ba la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang nga'i 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]phyir 'dis ci ltar rang gi srog btang ba de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_grong khyer bA rA Na sI na/_rgyal po tshangs pas byin rgyal po byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[33b.2\]]bshor du song ba las/_de rta kha ma thub nas/_dpung gi tshogs kyang logs shig tu lus/_rgyal po yang logs shig tu song ste/_de dpung dang bral nas lus ngal ba dang /_lus sdug bsngal ba dang /_lus zhig par gyur te nags khrod cig tu zhugs te 'dug go/_/
[\[33b.3\]]nags khrod de na mi'am ci zhig mi 'am ci mo dang lhan cig tu pi wang thogs te rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/de nas rgyal po des de mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu rgyal po de mi 'am ci mo de la shin tu chags par gyur to/_/de 'dod chags kyi dbang du gyur nas/_mi 'am 
[\[33b.4\]]ci de dug mdas gnad du bsnun te/_de sa phyogs de nyid du shi'o/_/de nas rgyal po des mi 'am ci de bsad pa'i 'og tu mi'am ci mo'i thad du song ste/_smras pa/_bzang mo tshur shog bdag cag gnyis dga' mgur spyad par bya'o/_/mi'am ci mos smras pa/_khyim thab shi 
[\[33b.5\]]ba'i ro mdun na 'dug bzhin du bdag ci ltar khyod dang dga' mgur spyod par bya/_re zhig 'di'i rus bu la mchod pa byas nas/_de'i 'og tu khyod ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas/_des shing rnams bsdus te/_spungs pa'i steng du mi 'am ci'i rus bu de bzhag nas me 
[\[33b.6\]]btang ste/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas gang gi tshe rus bu de bsregs pa'i shing de dag la me 'bar bar gyur pa de'i tshe/_mi 'am ci mo de nyid me'i nang du mchongs nas/_de der shi'o/_/de nas rgyal po chen po de re thag chad nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_
[\[33b.7\]]bdag gis don gzhan bsam bsam nas/_/log par gzhan du gyur gyis med/_/mi 'am ci mo spyad snyam nas/_/bdag gis srog chags gnyis bsad do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe mi'am cir gyur pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe mi 'am ci mor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni grags 'dzin ma 'di kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'dis nga'i phyir bdag nyid yongs su btang la/_da ltar yang 'dis nga'i phyir bdag nyid yongs su btang ngo /_/las brgya tham pa las 
[\[34a.2\]]sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa rdzogs so//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po sum cu pa/_sdom ni/_gang po mchod sbyin le lo can/_/mgon med dang ni nyam chung ba/_/pad ma gnyis dang lta ba dang /_/rin chen nor dang stobs phrog pa/_/gang po dang ni don 
[\[34a.3\]]gzigs dang /_/stobs brtson rtsal dang mya ngan med/_/'thun mdzad dang ni pad ma yi/_/bla ma gnyis dang legs mthong dang /_/rin chen gtsug tor chu rlabs dang /_/rnam par rgyal ba tha ma'o/_/zhes bya ba ni sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa'o/_/gang po zhes bya ba ni/_gleng 
[\[34a.4\]]gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe lho phyogs kyi ri bo'i ljongs na/_ri brags kyi grong zhig na bram ze che zhing mtho ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa/_
[\[34a.5\]]byams pa'i rang bzhin can/_snying rje dang ldan pa/_sems can la mnyes gshin pa sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba/_gang po zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/_de ni khyim na gnas pa dang /_rab tu byung ba rnams dang /_slong ba thams cad la gtong zhing sdud par byed do/_/dus dus 
[\[34a.6\]]su mchod sbyin gyi gnas bcas nas mchod sbyin yang byed do/_/de nas mchod sbyin gyi dus zhig la bab pa'i tshe/_bstan bcos thams cad kyi gzhung rnams la rtog cing /_gang dang gang gi lta ba ci 'dra ba zhig snyam ste/_des gzhung de dag yid la bzhag nas/_sems pa dang 
[\[34a.7\]]'jal ba dang yongs su rtog par byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na bram ze des mchod sbyin bya bar brtsams nas/_mchod sbyin byed pa der ston pa thams cad 'dus par gyur to/_/bram ze des kyang ston pa thams cad kyi gzhung yid la bzhag nas sems pa la zhugs pa las/_lta 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]ba'i rnam pa de dag la de'i sems mgu bar ma gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i dge bsnyen rnams kyis bram ze de'i mdun du sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod do/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu bram ze des bcom ldan 'das la blta 'dod par gyur to/_/de nas phyi 
[\[34b.2\]]zhig na de'i blo skyes pa/_dge sbyong dang bram ze stong phrag du ma dag gis mchod sbyin la 'ongs nas longs spyod par byed la/_bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma de ni mi 'ong ba na/_kye ma de yang bdag gi mchod sbyin la 'ong ste/_longs spyod par byed kyang ci ma rung snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[34b.3\]]'das kyis bram ze de'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas dgongs pa/_bram ze de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par sems bskyed par 'gyur la de kho na la brten te/_bdag gis skye bo mang po la phan gdags so snyam du dgongs nas/_dge slong 
[\[34b.4\]]mang pos zhabs 'bring byas te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/_bram ze de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/_ri brags kyi grong khyer der gshegs so/_/bcom ldan 'das der gshegs nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ma la bdag gis ci nas mchod sbyin gyi gnas der mchod 
[\[34b.5\]]sbyin gyi bdag po dang /_skye bo mang po gzhan rnams kyis bdag gcig pu mthong la/_dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams sus kyang mi mthong ba de lta bur byin gyis brlab bo snyam du dgongs te/_de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas/_mchod sbyin gyi gnas su gshegs so/_/de nas bram 
[\[34b.6\]]ze des thag ring po zhig nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas su mchod pa rnams 
[\[34b.7\]]la longs spyod par mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang po khyod kyis nga'i lhung bzed 'di bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dag gis ma bkang gi bar du longs spyod par mi bya'o/_/bram ze des smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma ji ltar dgongs pa de bzhin 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]du bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/_bram ze des mchod sbyin byed pa der bza' ba dang /_bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po bshams pa de dag blangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed dgang bar byas na/_dgang ma nus nas des nga rgyal bskyed de/_bdag gis 
[\[35a.2\]]lhung bzed 'di ma bkang bar mi gtang ngo snyam nas/_g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed bza' ba dang bca' bas dgang ba la brtson par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_da ni kha zas 'dis dge slong stong gi zan chog go snyam du 
[\[35a.3\]]dgongs nas/_lhung bzed de gang bar bstan to/_/de nas bram ze des bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed gang bar mthong nas dga' bar gyur to/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed gtams lags kyis/_bcom ldan 'das gau ta mas ci bder gsol shig ces byas so/_/
[\[35a.4\]]de nas bram ze de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/_mchod sbyin gyi gnas de nyid du dge slong stong gi stan sprul te/_chu ra rnams bkang nas/_bcom ldan 'das gral gyi gtso bo la bzhugs so/_/dge slong gzhan rnams kyang rgan rim bzhin bkod do/_/de nas dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar 
[\[35a.5\]]bzhugs nas/_'dri ma mkhan rnams kyis brims so/_/de nas bram ze des kyang de dag thams cad mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no snyam ste/_de dga' bar gyur nas/_bcom 
[\[35a.6\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_gsol pa/_zla ba gsum gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gyi gsos sman dang /_sman zong rnams sbyar bar 
[\[35a.7\]]'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas bram ze des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du yo byad thams 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]cad sbyar te/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas/_tha ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[35b.2\]]na bza' 'bum ri ba phul lo/_/dge slong gzhan dag la yang ras zung re phul nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[35b.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i/_kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bcom 
[\[35b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bram ze de la bka' stsal pa/_bram ze legs so legs so/_/bram ze khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar 
[\[35b.5\]]gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i/_kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[35b.6\]]byang chub tu lung bstan nas/_mchod sbyin gyi gnas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur te/_'od ma'i tshal du zhugs par gyur to//_//mchod sbyin zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze zhig gnas te/_des thabs 
[\[35b.7\]]zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]byas nas/_rigs dang 'thun par ming btags te/_'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_yi ge dang bram ze'i spyod lam dang /_spyod pa dang /_oM zhes bya ba dang /_b+ho zhes bya ba 
[\[36a.2\]]dang /_gtsang sbra dang /_cho ga dang /_thal ba blang ba dang /_ril ba thogs pa dang /_nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang /_snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /_srid srung gi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin bya ba dang /_mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang /_sbyin pa dang 
[\[36a.3\]]blang ba dang /_kha ton bya ba dang /_kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas/_las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur te/_des mthar gyis rig pa'i gnas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas bstan bcos thams cad khong du chud nas/_gzhung gi rtsod pa thams cad 
[\[36a.4\]]tshar bcad do/_/de nas phyi zhig na de'i pha ma gnyis shi nas des bsams pa/_byad gzugs dang thos pas bdag dang mtshungs pa yang med na/_lhag pa lta ga la yod snyam mo/_/de'i pha ma yang sngon dus dus su mchod sbyin byed de/_bram ze rnams kyis de la smras pa/_khye'u khyod 
[\[36a.5\]]kyi pha ma yang dus dus su mchod sbyin byed kyis/_khyod kyis kyang pha'i lugs dang 'thun par gyis shig_/khye'u de na re byad gzugs dang thos pas bdag dang mtshungs pa med na/_ci'i phyir bdag gis 'di dag la sbyin pa sbyin zhes zer ro/_/de nas thos ma thag tu bram ze de dag de la mi 
[\[36a.6\]]dga' bar gyur te/_de dag gis phyin cad de dang mi 'drul bar nang khrims bcas so/_/de yang de dag la mi dga' bar gyur te/_bdag la yon gnas 'di lta bu dag ci dgos snyam mo/_/de nas phyi zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa bram ze'i khye'u 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[36a.7\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par sems bskyed par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te/_bram ze'i khye'u de'i khyim du sa brtol te gyen du 'phags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od btang ste/_de'i khyim 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]de mthong ma thag tu gser zhun ma'i kha dog lta bur snang bar byas so/_/de nas de mthong ma thag tu bram ze'i khye'u de bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gdan 
[\[36b.2\]]bshams pa la bzhugs su gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u de la sbyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos de lta bu bstan te/_de nas bram ze'i khye'u des sbyin pa btang ba'i 'dod pa skyes nas/_des 
[\[36b.3\]]sbyin pa byed 'dod nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gis sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag bgyid pa rngo thogs par bgyid pa de lta bur bdag la mi bdog lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la gter bstan te/_de mthong ma thag tu 
[\[36b.4\]]khye'u de bcom ldan 'das la lhag par yang dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_gsol pa/_zla ba gsum gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang gzims cha dang /_gdan dang snyun gsos dang /_
[\[36b.5\]]sman zong rnams sbyar bar 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_mnyan 
[\[36b.6\]]du yod pa dang /_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar du mchod sbyin gyi gnas bcas nas dril bsgrags te/_bdag ya mtshan can thams cad la mchod sbyin bgyis kyi su mchod ston dang yon 'dod pa de dag bdag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas su shog la longs spyad par gyis shig_/de nas bram ze 
[\[36b.7\]]rnams na re bram ze la sdang ba la/_bdag cag longs spyod par mi bya'o zhes zer ro/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'us smras pa/_gal te longs spyod par mi byed na/_bdag gis khyod kyi phyir yon dpag pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad bdag gis dge sbyong gau ta ma 'khor dang bcas pa 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]rnams la phul la/_de kho na'i bstan pa la tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o/_/de nas bram ze rnams kyis bsams pa/_bram ze'i khye'u 'di ni ji skad smras pa bzhin du byed pa yin pas na/_des de kho na ltar byed srid de/_de ltar na bdag cag yon gyis pham par 'gyur 
[\[37a.2\]]ro snyam nas/_de dag gis de'i nang khrims bshig nas/_mchod sbyin gyi gnas su song ste longs spyad do/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u des zla ba gsum gyi bar du ya mtshan can rnams kyi bza' ba dang /_bca' ba gtsang ba bzang po sbyar te/_thams cad la yon mang po phul te/_tha ma'i 
[\[37a.3\]]nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pas tshim par byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la na bza' 'bum ri ba phul lo/_/dge slong gzhan rnams la yang re re la ras zung re phul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gser gyi mdog 
[\[37a.4\]]lta bu'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa mthong nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa 
[\[37a.5\]]dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i/_kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u de la bka' stsal 
[\[37a.6\]]pa/_bram ze'i khye'u legs so legs so/_/bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa/_ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig 
[\[37a.7\]]rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i/_kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das don gzigs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs nas/_bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs so//_//le lo can zhes bya ba ni/_
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/_khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa/_yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las 
[\[37b.2\]]chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_rigs 
[\[37b.3\]]dang 'thun par ming btags te/_'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/khye'u de le lo can mchog tu le lo che ba zhig ste/_khri la nyal zhing khri las ldang du mi btub nas/_
[\[37b.4\]]pha ma gnyis kyis de la dris pa/_bu khyod la lus kyi nad dam/_sems kyi gdung ba 'ga' lta yod dam zhes byas nas/_de le lo'i dbang gis de dag la cung zad kyang smrar mi btub nas/_pha ma gnyis kyis de sman pa la bstan nas/_sman pa na re/_'di la lus kyi nad kyang ci yang 
[\[37b.5\]]med la/_sems kyi gdung ba ci yang med kyis/_le lo kho nas khri las ldang du mi btub par zad do zhes zer ro/_/de nas de la pha ma gnyis kyis lan mang du bsgo ste/_bu de ltar ma byed cig_/khyod 'di ltar 'dug pas bde ba thob par mi nus so/_/mi rnams nye bar 'tsho ba ni bsgrub 
[\[37b.6\]]phod pa'i 'bras bu yin no zhes lan mang du brtun kyang de bslang ma nus so/_/de nas phyi zhig na pha ma gnyis kyi sems skyes pa/_yon gnas dag spyan drangs la bshos gsol na/_de dag mthong na zhes bskyed de/_ldang yang srid do snyam nas/_de dag gis ston pa drug g.yar 
[\[37b.7\]]drangs te zan byin nas khye'u des de dag mthong yang ma langs so/_/de nas khyim bdag gis bsams pa/_dge sbyong gau ta ma ni bsod nams can che bar grags pa/_tshig btsan pa yin pas na/_khye'u 'dis de mthong na zhes bskyed de ldang bar 'gyur yang srid do snyam nas/_de'i 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]phyi nyin sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du spyan drangs te/_de nyid kyi nub mo bza' ba dang /_bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po sbyar nas nang par sngar langs te/_gdan bshams la chu ra bkang ste bzhag nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phrin gyis 
[\[38a.2\]]gdugs tshod bskul ba/_btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos gsol lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te/_gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/_chos gos dang sham thabs 
[\[38a.3\]]gsol te/_lhung bzed bsnams nas/_dge slong mang pos zham ring byas nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/_khyim bdag de'i bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/de nas 
[\[38a.4\]]khye'u des thag ring po zhig nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mdzes shing yid du 'thad la/_dbang po zhi ba/_thugs mchog tu dul ba/_rnam par zhi ba dang ldan pa/_gser gyi mchod sdong ltar dpal 'bar ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de gus par sgrims pa'i shugs kyis 
[\[38a.5\]]langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_pha ma gnyis dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/_rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang 
[\[38a.6\]]bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas nas/_ci bzhed pa bstabs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te/_bstsang sder ni gyu/_phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/_stan ches dma' ba dag blangs te/_chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan 
[\[38a.7\]]sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de la brtson 'grus kyi bsngags pa brjod de/_bu brtson 'grus kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nas khye'u des bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa 'di 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]ni bzang ste/_bdag gis brtson 'grus zhan pas bla ma'i khyad par thob par mi nus kyis/_ma la bdag gis rgya mtsho'i nang du 'gro ba bsgrubs la/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la bkur sti bya'o snyam nas/_rgya mtsho'i nang du 'gro ba'i zong khyer te rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 
[\[38b.2\]]zhugs nas/_des rin po che'i gling du 'gro ba'i don du bsgrubs te/_rgya mtsho'i gru bo che'i don grub nas/_mnyan du yod par 'ong ste/_des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du spyan drangs nas yo byad thams cad sbyar te/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge 
[\[38b.3\]]slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas/_tha ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das la na bza' 'bum ri ba phul lo/_/dge slong gzhan dag 
[\[38b.4\]]la yang re re la ras zung re phul nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /_
[\[38b.5\]]zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i/_kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de la bka' stsal pa/_khye'u legs 
[\[38b.6\]]so legs so/_/khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i/_kha lo 
[\[38b.7\]]sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi rtsal dang ldan pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so//_//mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]pa na/_bram ze dbul po 'tsho bas phongs pa zhig gnas te/_de yang gso ba mang zhing g.yog 'khor mang ba zhig ste/_des bsams pa bdag gis phyug po gang zhig la brten te/_'tsho ba btsal bar bya snyam mo/_/de nas des bsams pa khyim bdag mgon 
[\[39a.2\]]med zas sbyin ni snying rje can sbyin pa la sred pa yin te/_des ni bdag la dgos pa thams cad kyis sdud par nus so snyam mo/_/de nas de'i grib ma dang mi 'bral ba bzhin du de'i phyir 'brang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'phrigs nas dris pa/_bram ze khyod nga la rag 
[\[39a.3\]]las pa ci yod/_bram zes smras pa/_khyim bdag rag ci yang las te/_khyod la brten nas 'tsho ba btsal bar 'dod do/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de'i 'tshog chas thams cad sbyor ba la zhugs so/_/de nas phyi zhig na de khyim bdag 
[\[39a.4\]]mgon med zas sbyin dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo /_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi lugs kyis na/_nyin gcig bzhin du g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang /_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'gro zhing phyag dar byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na de'i bya ba zhig byung 
[\[39a.5\]]nas des bram ze de mngags te/_deng khyod kyis rgyal bu rgyal bu byed kyi tshal du phyag dar gyis shig ces byas nas/_khyim bdag de song ngo /_/bram ze de yang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi byi dor byed pa la zhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa bram ze 'di bla na med 
[\[39a.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par sems bskyed par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas cung zad tsam zhig byi dor byas pa de tsam yang byi dor byas par mi mngon pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas/_de des g.yengs te nyi ma 
[\[39a.7\]]rangs pa thal bar gyur to/_/de nas des bsams pa da ni bdag gis mnyan du yod par mi phyin to snyam nas/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du dgongs mal btab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi nang du bram ze de'i mal chos te/_khyod kyang de'i 'dab tu 'dug la/_des khyod la ci dris pa de'i lan khyod kyis thob shig_/gzhan yang dge slong rnams la bsgo ba/_dge slong dag gis dge ba bcab pa dang /_sdig pa bshags pa'i tshul gyis gnas 
[\[39b.2\]]par gyis shig ces ngas bstan mod kyis/_'on kyang bram ze 'di la snying brtse ba'i phyir/_sus rdzu 'phrul ci lta bu thob kyang rung ste/_des rdzu 'phrul de lta bu ston cig ces gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/_btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[39b.3\]]dga' bos dge slong rnams la bsgo ba/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 'di'i nang na bram ze 'dug pa de'i mal chos la/_de'i 'dab tu 'khod cig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas de de na 'dug pa la dge slong rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gzhan dang /_gzhan dag ston pa la zhugs so/_/de nas bram 
[\[39b.4\]]ze des mthong nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dris pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba 'di dag su dag cig_/ci 'dra ba zhig gu snyam mo/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams yin no/_/de nas 
[\[39b.5\]]bram ze des bsams pa/_slob ma rnams kyang 'di kho na ltar phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan na/_dge sbyong gau ta ma lta ci smos te/_de ci 'dra ba zhig gu snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i sems bskyed de/_kye ma srod la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 
[\[39b.6\]]'ong na legs so/_/nam phyed na lha'i dbang po brgya byin nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ong na legs so/_/tho rangs na ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ong na legs so snyam du dgongs so/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs bskyed pa'i 'phral 'phral du rgyal po chen po 
[\[39b.7\]]bzhi dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs so/_/de nas bram ze des mthong nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dris pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di 'dra ba 'di dag su dag cig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]dga' bos smras pa/_'di dag ni rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa yin no/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu bram ze de bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur te/_mir 
[\[40a.2\]]gyur pa la yang 'di lta bu'i gnas thob pa yod pa lta/_kye ma bdag kyang sangs rgyas su gyur te/_'jig rten du 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas des bsams pa gnas 'di lta bu ni yid smon du byas pa tsam gyis 'grub par mi 'gyur gyis/_ma la bdag gis sbyin pa dag byin 
[\[40a.3\]]zhing bsod nams dag byas la/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab bo snyam mo/_/nam nangs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_mnyan du yod par chas so/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yang g.yog 'khor lnga 
[\[40a.4\]]brgya dang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du dong ste/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis thag ring po zhig nas bram ze de mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bram de la smras pa/_bram ze khyod kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du de'i bar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos cung zad cig mthong ngam/_de nas 
[\[40a.5\]]bram ze des khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la thams cad bsnyad do/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bram ze de la smras pa/_bram ze khyod kyis ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba de lta bu dag mthong na/_khyod ci 'dod par gyur/_bram ze des smras pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[40a.6\]]byang chub 'dod mod kyis/_khyim bdag 'on kyang gnas de lta bu ni yid smon tsam gyis 'grub par mi 'gyur bas na/_bdag gis slong mo byas la sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag bya bar 'dod do/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/_bram ze de la 
[\[40a.7\]]nor gyi phung po chen po byin no/_/bram ze des kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du spyan drangs nas/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du yo byad thams cad sbyar nas/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi bar du yo byad thams 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas/_tha ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pas tshim par byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la na bza' 'bum ri ba phul lo/_/dge slong gzhan dag la yang re re la ras zung re phul nas/_bla na med pa yang 
[\[40b.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na/_bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig 
[\[40b.3\]]rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de la bka' stsal pa/_bram ze legs so legs so/_/bram ze khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_
[\[40b.4\]]'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs 
[\[40b.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan med ces bya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so//_//nyam chung ba zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la mthar gyi bu bdun byung nas/_de dag rigs dang 'thun par ming btags te/_'o ma dang /_
[\[40b.6\]]zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bsams pa/_bdag gi byis pa 'di dag mdza' sde dag gi nang du gzud par bya'o/_/de yang dad pa dang ldan 
[\[40b.7\]]pa rnams kyi nang du gzud par bya'i/_ma dad pa rnams kyi nang du ni gzud par mi bya'o/_/gal te ma dad pa rnams kyi nang du btsud par gyur na ni/_'di dag kyang de dag gi bstan pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mi lta bar 'gyur srid do snyam nas/_sangs rgyas pa'i mdza' sde'i nang du btsud do/_/de 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]la ma dad pa'i mdza' sde gang yin pa de dag ni gar thabs dang grong rgyu ba dang /_smad 'tshong ma rnams la chags shing 'khod do/_/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu rnams ni/_dge bsnyen gyi mdza' sde rnams dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la 
[\[41a.2\]]lhag par bya ba byed pa dang /_bsnyen gnas dang /_chos mnyan pa la chags shing 'khod do/_/mnyan du yod pa de na bram ze'i khye'u dbul zhing 'tsho bas phongs pa zhig 'dug pa des bsams pa bdag mdza' sde dag gi nang du zhugs la/_bdag gis de dag la brten nas 'tsho ba btsal bar 
[\[41a.3\]]bya'o snyam nas/_dge bsnyen gyi mdza' sde'i nang du 'jug par 'dod de dris pa/_nor gyi bungs ci tsam gyis na khyod kyi nang du 'jug tu dbang /_de dag gis smras pa/_kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgyas nged kyi nang du 'jug tu dbang ngo /_/bram ze'i khye'u des smras pa/_bdag la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya lta 
[\[41a.4\]]ga la yod/_de'i steng du khyed ni dbang phyug gis chog par 'dug la sbyin pa la sred pa yin na/_bdag ni dbul po 'tsho bas phongs pa zhig yin pas na/_bdag gis khyod la nor de snyed dbul mi nus so/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu rnams kyis smras pa/_gal te khyod 
[\[41a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad par byed na ni/_nged kyis khyod la kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya sbyin no/_/bram ze'i khye'us smras pa/_dge sbyong gau ta ma de'i yon tan rnams bdag gis mi shes na/_dge sbyong gau ta ma de'i yon tan rnams ci lta bu yin/_de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi 
[\[41a.6\]]bu rnams kyis bram ze'i khye'u de la sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod do/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu bram ze'i khye'u de/_sangs rgyas la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/_bdag kyang khyed kyi nang du 'jug par bgyi'o/_/bdag kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_
[\[41a.7\]]chos dang /_dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi bar bgyi'o/_/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu de rnams kyis bram ze'i khye'u des tshig de lta bu brjod pa thos so/_/thos nas kyang de rnams kyis de la kAr ShA pa Na brgya phrag du ma byin no/_/bram ze'i khye'u de yang de rnams kyi nang du zhugs 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]so/_/de nas phyi zhig na mdza' sde bo de rnams kyi blo skyes pa/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum gyi bar du spyan drangs la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes zer ro/_/de'i nang na kha cig na re bdag cag kun gyis zla ba gsum thog thag tu de 'ba' zhig byed cing 
[\[41b.2\]]'dug mi nus kyi/_nyin res kyis bshos gsol bar bya'o zhes zer ro/_/bram ze'i khye'us smras pa/_bdag ni dbul la 'tsho bas phongs te/_nyin res gzung ba de lta bu bdag gis mi nus so zhes zer ro/_/der kha cig na re su sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bshos gsol 
[\[41b.3\]]mi nus pa de ni/_bdag cag gi nang nas gud du byung cig ces zer ro/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'us bsams pa/_bdag gi 'di rnams kyi nang du de'u ma chud de chud na/_bdag 'di rnams kyi nang nas 'byung ba ni cha ma yin no snyam nas smras pa/_bdag gis nyin res mjug tu gyis la/_khyod kyi 
[\[41b.4\]]lhag rol ci yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bdag la byin cig_/mdza' sde bo rnams kyis smras pa/_khyod ci ltar dga' ba de bzhin du bya'o zhes byas nas/_de rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum gyi bar du spyan drangs nas/_nyin res kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge 
[\[41b.5\]]slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis zla ba gsum gyi bar du bsnyen bkur byas so/_/der de dag gi lhag rol ci yod pa de dag thams cad bram ze'i khye'u de la byin nas/_bram ze'i khye'us de dag thams cad bsdus te/_gzhan dag kyang kAr ShA pa Na gzhan dag 'bul du bcug nas/_tha ma'i 
[\[41b.6\]]nyin par des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du spyan drangs te/_rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la yang bskul nas/_des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lam yang mdzes par byas/_grong khyer yang mdzes par byas nas/_de nyid kyi mtshan mo 
[\[41b.7\]]bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po sbyar ro/_/nang par sngar langs nas gdan bshams te/_chu ra bkang nas bcom ldan 'das la phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul ba/_btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]te/_gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/_lhung bzed bsnams nas/_dge slong mang pos zhabs 'bring byas te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/_bram ze'i khye'u de'i bkad sa 
[\[42a.2\]]ga la ba der gshegs te phyin nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/_rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang 
[\[42a.3\]]pos tshim par byas te/_ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la che ba la 'os pa'i na bza' phul lo/_/dge slong gzhan dag la yang re re la ras zung re phul nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na/_bdag 
[\[42a.4\]]'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_
[\[42a.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u de la bka' stsal pa/_bram ze'i khye'u legs so/_/legs so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u khyod/_'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[42a.6\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'thun mdzad ces bya bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes gsungs 
[\[42a.7\]]so//_//pad ma gnyis zhes bya ba de la/_pad ma gnyis zhes bya ba de la/_pad ma dang po ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi lugs kyis na/_nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro zhing /_bcom ldan 'das la bdug pa dang /_
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]phye ma dang /_spos dang me tog rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas/_chos nyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de'i tshe kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma'i gnas dga' ldan gyi pad ma'i mtsho'i nang na/_dus ma yin par pad ma zhig skyes nas/_de'i blo skyes pa/_rgyal po gsal rgyal nyin 
[\[42b.2\]]gcig bzhin du dus gsum du dge sbyong gau ta ma la bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang spos dang me tog rnams kyis bkur stir byed kyi pad ma 'di bdag gis de la 'bul bar bya'o snyam nas/_de khyer te mnyan du yod par song ngo /_/de'i tshe sred med kyi bu la dad pa zhig ya mtshan can thams cad la 
[\[42b.3\]]mchod sbyin byed pa la zhugs so/_/de nas des mi des dus ma yin pa'i pad ma de lta bu khyer te/_'ong ba yang mthong nas/_des de la smras pa/_kye mi khyod kyi pad ma 'o ni bdag la byin cig dang /_'di bdag gis legs ldan sred med kyi bu la mchod par bya'o/_/khyod la yang bdag gis kAr 
[\[42b.4\]]ShA pa Na lnga brgya sbyin no zhes byas so/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang /_bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir chas pa las/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis mi de tshig de skad zer ba thos so/_/thos nas kyang des bsams pa/_'di ni nyes par 
[\[42b.5\]]bshad pa'i chos can yin na/_nor gyi bungs 'di snyed cig nyos te sred med kyi bu la 'bul bar 'dod na/_ci'i phyir ngas nor ches mang du bskyed de nyos la/_bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar mi bya snyam nas/_des kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma la smras pa/_ngas khyod la kAr ShA pa Na stong sbyin
