[\[42b.6\]]gyi/_pad ma 'o ni nga la byin cig_/de nas sred med kyi bu la dad pa des thos nas nga rgyal skyes te/_des kAr ShA pa Na nyis stong sbyin par byas so/_/de bzhin du de gnyis kyis kAr ShA pa Na 'bum gyi bar du gong nas gong du bskyed do/_/de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma de'i blo skyes pa/_'di ltar 
[\[42b.7\]]khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin lta bus mi zhig gi phyir 'bum gtong bar byed pa dang sbyar na/_dge slong gau ta ma de ni che ba zhig yin gor ma chag na/_ci'i phyir bdag nyid song la/_bcom ldan 'das de la mchod par mi bya snyam du bsams nas/_kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma des khyim bdag 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]mgon med zas sbyin la smras pa/_khyim bdag bdag la nor mi dgos kyi/_bdag nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das de la mchod par bya'o zhes byas nas/_pad ma de khyer te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas/_kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma des/_thag ring po zhig nas sangs 
[\[43a.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa/_me lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu/_me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu/_mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu/_mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa lta bu/_
[\[43a.3\]]blo gsal zhing dri ma med la/_rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' ba skyes so/_/dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom 
[\[43a.4\]]ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir steng du bor na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus pad ma de shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro'o/_/gzhes na ni sdod do/_/de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma des/_cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/_lhag par yang bcom 
[\[43a.5\]]ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa 
[\[43a.6\]]dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma de la bka' stsal 
[\[43a.7\]]pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]legs so legs so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyod 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so//_//pad ma gnyis pa ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa de nyid 
[\[43b.2\]]na/_kun dga' ra ba srung ba zhig 'dug pa/_de'i mtsho'i nang nas dus ma yin par pad ma zhig skyes te/_de'i blo skyes pa/_pad ma 'di bdag gis rgyal po gsal rgyal la dbul bar bya'o/_/'on tang bdag gi longs spyod chen po dag gi 'byung khungs su 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de khyer 
[\[43b.3\]]te rgyal po'i pho brang du chas te song ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang /_ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro 
[\[43b.4\]]ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/_skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_yang dag pa'i 
[\[43b.5\]]seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni/_chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su 
[\[43b.6\]]ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags 
[\[43b.7\]]pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu yod par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/'dul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs 
[\[44a.2\]]rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par sems bskyed par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas/_snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed 
[\[44a.3\]]bsnams nas/_mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs so/_/de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma des/_thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur nas bsams pa/_
[\[44a.4\]]bdag gis rgyal po gsal rgyal btang la/_bcom ldan 'das la bdag nyid kyis mchod pa bya'o snyam nas/_des pad ma de bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi nam mkha' la bor ba las/_bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus pad ma de shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das gshegs 
[\[44a.5\]]na ni 'gro'o/_/gzhes na ni sdod do/_/de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma des cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/_lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag 
[\[44a.6\]]'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_
[\[44a.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma de la bka' stsal pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]legs so legs so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyod 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so//_//
[\[44b.2\]]lta ba zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas te/_khyim bdag de yang 
[\[44b.3\]]byams pa'i rang bzhin can/_snying rje dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa/_sbyin pa la sred pa/_ya mtshan can thams cad dang lta ba mtshungs pa/_sbyin pa la blo snyoms pa zhig ste/_des dus dus su mchod sbyin chen po byed la/_bstan bcos spyod pa rnams kyi gzhung 
[\[44b.4\]]spyod par byed do/_/des bltas na thams cad kyang bdag la ni stod/_gzhan la ni smod par byed pas/_de dag gis khyim bdag de'i sems ma mgu'o/_/de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag des/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bsngags pa thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_des chos thams 
[\[44b.5\]]cad rtogs pa las na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin par nges so snyam nas/_bsngags pa thos ma thag tu sems skyes pa/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das de bdag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas 'dir gshegs kyang ci ma rung snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs 
[\[44b.6\]]pa/_bdag gis khyim bdag de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed par bya dgos la/_'di la brten nas 'dul bar bya ba phal po che drang du yod do snyam nas/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te/_khyim bdag de'i mchod sbyin gyi gnas su zhugs par gyur to/_/de nas khyim bdag 
[\[44b.7\]]des thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang dga' ba skyes so/_/dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye ma 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas su gshegs te/_longs spyod par mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde 
[\[45a.2\]]bar bzhugs par rig nas/_rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te/_ci bzhed pa bstabs nas chos nyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spro ba bskyed nas/_khyim 
[\[45a.3\]]bdag de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'dod pa skyes nas/_des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum spyan drangs te/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du yo byad thams cad sbyar nas/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo 
[\[45a.4\]]byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas te/_tha ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das la na bza' 'bum ri ba phul lo/_/dge slong gzhan dag la yang re re la ras zung re phul nas/_bla na med pa yang 
[\[45a.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten 
[\[45a.6\]]mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i/_kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag legs so legs so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyod 'jig 
[\[45a.7\]]rten long ba 'dren pa med pa/_ston pa med par/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das legs mthong zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po sum cu gcig pa/_rin po che zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa nas ded dpon zhig gis zong khyer te/_rgya mtsho chen po'i 
[\[45b.2\]]nang du chas so/_/ded dpon de yang mo ltas gtso bor 'dzin pa zhig ste/_de zong rnams rnga mo dang bong bu la sogs pa la bkal nas/_mnyan du yod pa'i phyi sgo chen mo las byung ste/_lam po cher zhugs nas des sems 'di lta bu bskyed de/_gal te bdag rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas/_
[\[45b.3\]]nye zho med par bde bar 'ongs te/_rgya mtsho'i gru bo che'i don grub nas/_phyir 'khor bar gyur na sgo 'dir bdag gi sgo'i dus ston bya'o/_/lam po che 'dir yang lam gyi dus ston bya'o zhes byas nas rgya mtsho chen por song ngo /_/de nas de rin po che'i gling bgrod par bsgrubs te/_rgya mtsho 
[\[45b.4\]]chen po'i nang nas 'gram du byung nas/_des bsams pa/_bdag gru bo ches rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs te/_des na bdag gis nor chen po bsgrubs kyis/_bdag gis rgya mtsho'i 'gram 'di nyid du rgya mtsho'i lha rnams dang /_gru bo che la gnas pa'i lha rnams la bkur 
[\[45b.5\]]sti bya'o snyam nas/_des rgya mtsho'i 'gram de nyid du lha rnams la bkur sti chen po byas te/_mnyan du yod par chas so/_/de nas de mthar gyis rgyu zhing song song ba las/_mnyan du yod par phyin nas/_mnyan du yod par zong rnams bzhag ste/_des grong khyer gyi phyi sgo chen po dang /_
[\[45b.6\]]lam po che de'i lha rnams la mchod pa chen po byas nas/_sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa la zhugs te/_des rin po che'i phung po chen po spungs nas/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dang /_spyod pa pa dang kun tu rgyu dang /_sdug cing phongs pa dang /_bkres pa rnams la sbyin pa byed pa la 
[\[45b.7\]]zhugs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang /_ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]grol ba/_skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar par brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_yang dag 
[\[46a.2\]]pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni/_chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum/_mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar 'gyur/_su ni gnod 
[\[46a.3\]]pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang /_nyam nga ba dang /_gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa dang /_'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las 
[\[46a.4\]]lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las/_'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i 
[\[46a.5\]]rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu yod par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar 
[\[46a.6\]]bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa ded dpon 'di ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par sems bskyed par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/_
[\[46a.7\]]lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong mang pos zham ring byas te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/_sgo de nyid nas mnyan du yod pa'i nang du gshegs pa dang /_ded dpon des thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' ba skyes so/_/dga' ba skyes nas des rin po che spar gyis btab ste/_bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas de dag sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_bcom ldan 'das kyi stong du lding khang lta bur 
[\[46b.2\]]chags te 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro'o/_/gzhes na ni sdod do/_/de nas ded dpon des cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/_lhag par yang dga' ba skyes so/_/dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_gsol pa/_zla ba gsum gyi bar du 
[\[46b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams sbyar bar 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung 
[\[46b.4\]]bas ded dpon de la gnang ngo /_/de nas ded dpon des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du yo byad thams cad sbyar te/_des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen 
[\[46b.5\]]bkur byas nas/_tha ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das la na bza' 'bum ri ba phul lo/_/dge slong gzhan dag la yang re re la ras zung re phul nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[46b.6\]]pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na/_bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen 
[\[46b.7\]]pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i/_kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ded dpon legs so legs so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyod 'jig rten long ba 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams 
[\[47a.2\]]kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug tor can zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so//_//nor zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma 
[\[47a.3\]]blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_rigs dang 'thun par ming 
[\[47a.4\]]btags te/_de 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings nas/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang khong rtsis dang /_shod dgod pa dang /_lag rtsis dang dbyung ba dang /_sba ba dang /_dgram pa dang /_gos brtag pa dang /_nor bu brtag pa dang /_rin po che 
[\[47a.5\]]brtag pa dang /_spos brtag pa dang /_sman brtag pa dang /_glang po che brtag pa dang /_rta brtag pa dang /_go mtshon brtag pa la bslabs te/_yi ge mkhas pa dang /_klog mkhas pa dang /_mdzangs pa dang /_bya ba la gsal ba dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang 
[\[47a.6\]]bar gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na des zong khyer te/_rgya mtsho'i nang du song ba las/_rgya mtsho'i gru bo che'i don grub nas phyir 'ongs so/_/khyim bdag des kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la brten nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab 
[\[47a.7\]]pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/_/de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du spyan drangs te/_rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas nas/_ci bzhed pa bstabs te/_chos nyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang shes pa dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de nas khyim bdag de 'khor dang bcas pas/_stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i 
[\[47b.2\]]ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas yang dang yang du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'gro zhing /_bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan par byed do/_/bdag gi bu yang dang yang du dran par byed de/_
[\[47b.3\]]kye ma de yang 'dir 'ongs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed par gyur la/_chos 'di lta bu dag kyang thob na ci ma rung snyam mo/_/de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag gi bu de rgya mtsho'i gru bo che'i don grub ste/_phyir 'ongs nas des skyed mos tshal du rdzas rnams bzhag nas/_pha ma 
[\[47b.4\]]gnyis blta ba'i phyir shin tu rings par bdag gi khyim du song ba las/_de'i pha ma gnyis chos nyan pa'i phyir rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas/_khyim bdag gi bu des pha ma gnyis chos nyan pa'i phyir/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang de yang rgyal 
[\[47b.5\]]bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du song ste/_de der phyin nas bdag gi pha ma gnyis blta bar bya'o snyam pa las/_khyim bdag gi bu des pha ma gnyis chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom 
[\[47b.6\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_pha ma gnyis kyi mgul nas 'jus nas chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de'i mdun du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spro ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i gtam bka' 
[\[47b.7\]]stsal to/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu khye'u de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'dod pa skyes so/_/de nas khyim bdag de bcom ldan 'das las chos thos nas/_bu dang lhan cig tu bdag gi khyim du song ngo /_/der song nas de gnyis kyis bu de la smras pa/_bu khyod 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]kyis rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas bdag cag gnyis la ci zhig khyer te 'ongs/_khye'us smras pa/_rin po che rin thang che ba dag btsal te mchis so/_/pha ma gnyis kyis de la smras pa/_bu khyod kyis ni rgya mtsho'i nang du song nas sdug bsngal stong phrag grangs med pa myong 
[\[48a.2\]]ste/_rin po che tha mal pa dag khyer te 'ongs so/_/bdag cag gis ni 'di nyid na 'dug bzhin du/_tshegs chung ngus rin po che rin thang chen po dag rnyed do/_/khye'us smras pa/_'o na tshegs chung ngus rnyed pa'i rin po che dag ci 'dra ba blta bar 'tshal lo/_/de nas pha ma gnyis kyis de la bdag cag 
[\[48a.3\]]nyid kyi yon tan rgyas par brjod do/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu khye'u de lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das la dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos nyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 
[\[48a.4\]]'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i rkyen du 'tsham pa'i chos bstan to/_/de nas khyim bdag gi bu des/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam gyi mjug rdzogs par rig nas/_stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 
[\[48a.5\]]thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/zla ba gsum gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams sbyar bar 'tshal 
[\[48a.6\]]na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gi bu de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag gi bu des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du yo 
[\[48a.7\]]byad thams cad sbyar te/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas/_tha ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das la na bza' 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]'bum ri ba phul lo/_/dge slong gzhan dag la yang re re la ras zung re phul nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[48b.2\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas 
[\[48b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de la bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag gi bu legs so legs so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyod 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_
[\[48b.4\]]bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu rlabs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so//_//stobs phrog ces bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa 
[\[48b.5\]]na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe byang phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po dang /_lho phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po gnyis phan tshun mi 'thun par gyur te/_dus dus su skye bo phal po che kha 'dog par byed do/_/de gnyis kyi mdza' bo bshes shing gcugs pa ni/_rgyal po gsal rgyal yin te/_
[\[48b.6\]]rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa/_bdag gis thabs ci lta bu zhig gis de gnyis bsdum par bya snyam nas/_de'i blo skyes pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni ma dul ba dul ba yin na/_ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab bo snyam nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[48b.7\]]ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa byang phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po dang /_lho phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]gnyis phan tshun mi 'thun par gyur te/_de gnyis kyis dus dus su skye bo phal po che kha 'dog par bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das ni ma dul ba dul ba lags na thugs brtse ba'i slad du/_de gnyis kyi khon sbyang ba'i slad du nan tan mdzad du gsol/_de nas 
[\[49a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de/_rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas 
[\[49a.3\]]song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te/_byang phyogs kyi yul pan tsa la dang /_lho phyogs kyi yul pan tsa la gnyis kyi bar mtshams su gshegs te bzhugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas de dag 'thab par sems pa de lta bur byin 
[\[49a.4\]]gyis brlabs so/_/de nas byang phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po dang /_lho phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po gnyis kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir/_so so nas drangs so/_/de dag g.yul 'gyed par brtsams pa las/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[49a.5\]]mthus de gnyi gas rang rang pham ste ma nus nas/_gzhan gyis thub par mthong ste/_de gnyis so so nas shing rta re re la zhon te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[49a.6\]]kyang ci nas de gnyis gcig gis gcig mi mthong bar byin gyis brlabs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa 'di gnyis las gcig ni nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/_/gcig gis 
[\[49a.7\]]ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par sems bskyed par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas/_gcig la ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i gtam gsungs so/_/gcig la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la spro bar 'gyur ba'i 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]gtam gsungs so/_/de nas lho phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par 
[\[49b.2\]]gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/_
[\[49b.3\]]bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/_de la lung yang phog ste/_des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/byang phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po yang stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig 
[\[49b.4\]]tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/zla ba gsum gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_
[\[49b.5\]]snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams sbyar bar 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po la yang cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas byang phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal pos/_bcom 
[\[49b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rang gi yul du spyan drangs te/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi bar du yo byad thams cad sbyar nas/_yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen 
[\[49b.7\]]bkur byas te/_tha ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das la na bza' 'bum ri ba phul lo/_/dge slong gzhan dag la yang re re la ras zung re phul nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde 
[\[50a.2\]]bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pan tsa la'i rgyal po de la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po legs so legs so/_/
[\[50a.3\]]ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rgyal po chen po khyod 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla 
[\[50a.4\]]na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/las brgya tham pa las/_sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa rdzogs so//_//sdom ni/_bu dang ri yi gcong rong glud/_/'thab dang rnyis bzung gong ma sreg_/
[\[50a.5\]]phag dang mi rgod sha za dang /_/dbang po'i mgo ni tha ma yin/_/bu zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/_bram ze zhig gnas te/_des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma 
[\[50a.6\]]la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_rigs dang 'thun par ming btags te/_'o ma dang zho dang mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings 
[\[50a.7\]]so/_/'dod pa rnams ni tshwa chu dang 'dra ste/_ci tsam du bsten pa de tsam du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas phyis kyang mthar gyis bram ze'i bu gcig nas gnyis nas bdun gyi bar du byung nas/_de rnams rigs dang 'thun par ming btags te/_'o ma dang zho dang /_mar dang zhun mar dang /_
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_de dag gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang bram ze'i spyod lam dang /_spyod pa dang /_oM zhes bya ba dang /_b+ho zhes bya ba dang /_gtsang sbra dang /_cho ga dang /_thal ba blang ba dang /_ril ba thogs pa dang /_nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /_mchod 
[\[50b.2\]]sbyin gyi rig byed dang /_snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /_srid srung gi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin bya ba dang /_mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_blang ba dang /_kha ton bya ba dang /_kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas/_las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram 
[\[50b.3\]]zer gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na bram ze des bu de dag thams cad khyim phub ste/_bram ze de'i khyim na nor ci yod pa de dag thams cad so sor bgos nas bu de dag la byin no/_/de nas phyi zhig na bram ze de'i chung ma yang shi_/bram ze de yang rgas te mig gis mi mthong bar gyur nas/_des 
[\[50b.4\]]de rnams kyis khyim nas bskrad de/_de gzhan dag gi khyim du slong zhing 'tsho bar byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang /_ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran par nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas 
[\[50b.5\]]pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/_skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 
[\[50b.6\]]'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni/_chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs 
[\[50b.7\]]shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang /_nyam nga ba dang /_gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa dang /_'bras bu la gzhag 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las/_'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_
[\[51a.2\]]su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu yod par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/
[\[51a.3\]]rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de gdul ba'i dus la bab par dgongs nas/_sngo dro chos gos dang sham 
[\[51a.4\]]thabs gsol te/_lhung bzed bsnams nas/_mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs te/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod par gshegs pa na/_bram ze rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa/_khar ba dang snod thogs shing gzhan dag gi khyim du slong ba de gzigs 
[\[51a.5\]]so/_/gzigs nas bram ze de la bka' stsal pa/_bram ze rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa/_khyod ci'i phyir khar ba dang snod thogs shing /_gzhan gyi khyim du slong zhing 'dug_/bram zes gsol pa/_kye ma gau tam bdag gi bu bdun mchis te/_de rnams bdag gis gsos nas 
[\[51a.6\]]bskyed bsrings nas/_thos pas kyang mthar phyin par bgyis te bzhag nas/_mchis brang dang bcas te btsems te bdag gi khyim na ci bdog pa de dag thams cad kyang bdag gis so sor bgos te stsal na/_de rnams kyis bdag khyim nas bskrad pas na/_khar ba dang snod thogs shing 
[\[51a.7\]]gzhan dag gi khyim du slong zhing rgyu bar bgyid do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de la bka' stsal pa/_bram ze khyod kyis nga las tshigs su bcad pa bslabs te/_kun chub par byas la/_bu de rnams 'khor gyi nang na 'khod pa las bsgrags par nus sam/_bram zes gsol 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]pa/_kye ma gau ta ma bdag gis rngo thogs zhes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_gang dag btsas nas dgar 'gyur ba/_/gang phyir nor ni kun bsags pa/_/de dag bdag gis tshems dang sbyar/_/bdag ni khyim nas bskrad par 
[\[51b.2\]]gyur/_/nor zad pas ni gang dag gis/_/bdag spangs de dag de na min/_/srin po bu yi cha lugs can/_/pha pha zhes brjod de mi brjid/_/rta rgan zho sha zad pa bzhin/_/na tshod yal bar gyur pa na/_gzhon nu rnams kyis pha rgan zhig_/gzhan gyi khyim du slong bar gyur/_/rten 
[\[51b.3\]]la ma phan bu rnams pas/_bdag gi khar ba 'di bdam ste/_/khar ba 'di yi yon tan mthus/_/ba lang rdung zhing 'ong ba dang /_/sbrul dang khyi za zlog par byed/_/mun pa'i nang na mdun du 'gro/_/ya nga'i gnas su tshod kyang rig_/rdeg 'chos na yang bdag la rton/_/de nas bram ze 
[\[51b.4\]]des bcom ldan 'das kyi tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa 'di dag thos nas/_bu rnams kyi 'khor du song ste brjod nas/_bu rnams kyis de thos ma thag tu pha la bzod par gsol te/_snga mkho bzhin du khyim gyi bdag por bzhag go/_/de nas phyi zhig na/_bram ze des bsams pa/_
[\[51b.5\]]bdag gi dpal dang skal ba dang ldan pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni/_bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma de'i bka' drin yin na/_ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma de bshos gsol la/_rin thang che ba'i na bza' dbul bar bya gor ma chag snyam nas/_bram ze des bcom 
[\[51b.6\]]ldan 'das spyan drangs te/_bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po dag gsol nas/_rin thang che ba'i na bza' phul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de dang bu de rnams la de dag dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de nas bram ze de 'khor dang bcas pas/_stan de 
[\[51b.7\]]dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du/_'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom 
[\[52a.2\]]ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de la dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/_de la lung yang phog ste/_des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas nyon 
[\[52a.3\]]mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bram ze rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa 'di bu rnams kyis khyim nas bskrad nas/_'di bcom ldan 'das kyis thabs 
[\[52a.4\]]dang ldan pas/_snga mkho'i gnas su slar sor chud par mdzad nas/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang /_bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang 
[\[52a.5\]]bram ze 'di bu rnams kyis rang gi khyim nas bskrad pa na/_'di ngas snga mkho'i gnas su bzhag nas/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la ji ltar gnas par byas pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_grong khyer tsam pa zhes bya ba na/_khyim 
[\[52a.6\]]bdag cig gnas pa de la snga phyir bu bdun byung nas de dag gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur nas/_khyim bdag des bu de dag thams cad khyim phub ste/_de'i ci bdog pa de dag thams cad kyang so sor bgos nas/_de rnams la byin no/_/khyim 
[\[52a.7\]]bdag de yang rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs par gyur nas/_de bu de rnams kyis khyim nas bskrad de/_de rgas bzhin zong khyer te yul gzhan du chas so/_/de'i tshe dka' thub kyi gnas zhig na/_drang srong rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig gnas te/_dka' thub kyi gnas de'i 'dab cig 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]tu de 'ongs nas/_drang srong des khyim bdag de mthong nas smras pa/_khyim bdag rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa khyod ci'i phyir yul gzhan du chas te 'gro/_de nas khyim bdag des gtam de drang srong de la rgyas par bsnyad do/_/de nas drang srong gis smras pa/_khyim bdag 
[\[52b.2\]]khyod ngas ci nas bu de rnams kyis mchod pa dang rim gro byed par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/_drang srong des khyim bdag de phyir zlog ste rang gi gnas su khrid nas/_drang srong des de'i bu rnams la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na bu de rnams kyis pha de khyim du bos nas/_snga 
[\[52b.3\]]mkho bzhin du bzhag go/_/de nas khyim bdag des snga ma'i drin lan bsab pa'i phyir drang srong de khyim du zas byin nas/_de'i thad du rab tu byung ste/_de rab tu phyung nas bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe drang srong du gyur 
[\[52b.4\]]pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bram ze 'di kho na yin no/_/de'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni bu 'di dag kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'di rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs par gyur nas/_
[\[52b.5\]]khyim nas bskrad pa las ngas thabs dang ldan pas snga mkho'i gnas su bcug ste bzhag nas/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas par byas so/_da ltar yang 'di rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs par gyur nas/_khyim nas bskrad pa las ngas thabs dang ldan 
[\[52b.6\]]pas snga mkho'i gnas su bcug ste bzhag nas/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang /_bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag go/_/gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung ste/_der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/_
[\[52b.7\]]dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na/_da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to//_//ri zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des/_thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_rigs dang 'thun par ming btags nas/_de 'o ma 
[\[53a.2\]]dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /_khong rtsis dang /_shod dgod pa dang /_lag rtsis dang /_dbyung ba dang /_sba ba dang /_dgram pa dang /_gos brtag pa dang /_nor bu brtag pa dang /_rin po 
[\[53a.3\]]che brtag pa dang /_spos brtag pa dang /_sman brtag pa dang /_glang po che brtag pa dang /_rta brtag pa dang /_go mtshon brtag pa la bslabs te/_yi ge mkhas pa dang /_klog mkhas pa dang /_mdzangs pa dang /_bya ba la gsal ba dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_brtag pa rnam pa 
[\[53a.4\]]brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na de phas mdza' sde rnams kyi nang du btang ngo /_/mdza' sde bo de rnams ni lta ba dang /_'dod pa tha dad pa phan tshun mi 'thun par smra ba sha stag ste/_gang dag gang la dga' ba de dag de'i bsngags pa rjod par byed do/_/khyim bdag gi bu 
[\[53a.5\]]de ni rang bzhin gyis mdzangs pa zhig ste/_thams cad kyi gzhung lugs 'dri bar byed na/_la la ci zer/_la la ci zer bar gyur nas/_lta ba'i rnam pa de dag mi 'dod cing /_mi bzod la rung bar mi 'dzin to/_/de nas phyi zhig na dge bsnyen zhig gis sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa 
[\[53a.6\]]yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du brjod nas/_de thos ma thag tu khyim bdag gi bu des dris pa/_sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ba 'di dag ni sngon ma byung na sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de su zhig_/de nas dge bsnyen des de dang 'thun pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod do/_/de nas khyim bdag 
[\[53a.7\]]gi bu de bcom ldan 'das blta bar 'dod par gyur to/_/de nas des thams cad bor te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos nyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de thos nas khyim bdag gi bu de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur to/_/de nas khyim bdag gi bu des bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam mjug rdzogs par rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi 
[\[53b.2\]]rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo /_/de nas phyi zhig na de sbyin pa gtong ba'i sems skyes la/_khyim na ni ci yang mi bdog par mthong nas/_de'i blo skyes pa/_bdag rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du song la/_gal 
[\[53b.3\]]te bdag gi lan cig tsam rin po che'i gling bgrod pa bsgrub nus par gyur na yang /_de ltar na bde blag tu sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag kyang byed nus so snyam nas/_tshong pa lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu zong khyer te/_rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du song nas/_des rin po che'i gling bgrod pa 
[\[53b.4\]]bsgrubs te/_phyir 'dzam bu'i gling logs su chas pa las/_de dag rlung mi bzod pa byung nas/_des gru bo che de ri'i gcong rong zhig tu btsangs so/_/de nas rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs phyir log pa dang /_tshong pa de dag 'jigs shing skrag ste/_bdag cag ni shi zin no/_/bdag cag 
[\[53b.5\]]gi srog ni med zin no/_/da bdag cag la dga' ba byed pa dang /_srog phangs pa sbyin pa su yod ces 'dzer to/_/de nas ded dpon gyis smras pa/_ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su deng shig dang /_des bdag cag phongs 
[\[53b.6\]]pa dang /_dkos thag pa dang gnod pa dang phrad pa las skyabs mdzad par 'gyur ro zhes byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu tshong pa de rnams sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ste/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni 'di lta ste/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ci yang 
[\[53b.7\]]mi gzigs pa dang /_mi mkhyen pa dang /_thugs su ma chud pa ma mchis na/_kye ma btsun pa bdag cag phongs shing dkos thag la gnod pa dang phrad pa rnams la skyabs mdzad du gsol/_srog phangs pa stsal du gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]gru de rang nyid ri'i gcong rong de nas phyir log ste/_rgya mtsho'i 'gram du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bur byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas de dag rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram du byung nas/_mthar gyis mnyan du yod par song ste/_mnyan du yod par rdzas rnams bzhag nas/_
[\[54a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'o byas nas/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ni bdag cag la dka' ba mdzad mdzad pa lags/_srog phangs pa stsol ba 
[\[54a.3\]]lags so zhes gsol nas/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_shes pa dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de nas ded dpon la 
[\[54a.4\]]sogs pa tshong pa lnga brgya po rnams kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du/_'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag 
[\[54a.5\]]cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge slong tshur 
[\[54a.6\]]shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/_de dag la lung yang phog nas/_de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dag 
[\[54a.7\]]dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /_gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs 
[\[54b.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa tshong pa lnga brgya po 'di rnams ded dpon 'di la brten te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jigs pa chen po las bskyabs nas/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang /_bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs/_
[\[54b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang tshong pa lnga brgya po 'di rnams kyis/_ded dpon 'di la brten te/_ngas 'jigs pa chen po las bskyabs nas/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la ci ltar bkod 
[\[54b.4\]]pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_grong khyer bA rA Na sI na dka' thub kyi gnas zhig na/_drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/_rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig gnas te/_de yang bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i skye bo mang pos bkur stir bya ba dang /_bla 
[\[54b.5\]]mar bya ba dang /_ri mor bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba zhig go/_/de nas phyi zhig na bA rA Na sI na tshong pa lnga brgya tsam gyis/_drang srong de la bsnyen bkur byas nas/_rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du song ste/_de dag gi rin po che'i gling bgrod pa bsgrubs nas/_phyir 'dzam bu'i gling logs su chas 
[\[54b.6\]]pa las/_de dag gi gru bo che rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs kyis thang la 'phangs nas/_de dag der 'jigs shing skrag par gyur te/_bdag cag 'tsho ba'i dus skabs med do snyam nas/_de dag lha rnams la gsol ba 'debs par byed do/_/de nas ded dpon gyis smras pa/_bdag cag gis 
[\[54b.7\]]lha gzhan dag la gsol ba gdab ci dgos/_bdag cag drang srong de nyid la skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o/_/'on kyang des bdag cag phongs shing dkos thag pa dang /_gnod pa dang phrad pa la skyabs byed par 'gyur zhing /_srog phangs pa sbyin par byed do/_de nas de thos ma thag_/
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]tu tshong pa lnga brgya po de dag drang srong de kho na la skyabs su dong ngo /_/de nas drang srong de la dga' ba'i lhas drang srong de la sbran nas/_drang srong des tshong pa lnga brgya po de dag rdzu 'phrul gyis rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas phyung ste/_rang gi dka' thub kyi tshal du bkod do/_/de 
[\[55a.2\]]nas tshong pa rnams kyis bsams pa/_bdag cag gson por gyur pa ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni drang srong 'di'i mthu yin no snyam nas/_sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas/_thams cad drang srong de'i thad du rab tu byung ste/_de dag der rab tu byung nas/_bsam 
[\[55a.3\]]gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa dang /_tshong par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag 
[\[55a.4\]]ni/_tshong ba 'di rnams kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'di rnams kyis ded dpon 'di kho na la brten nas/_ngas 'jigs pa chen po las bskyabs te/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod do/_/da ltar yang 'di rnams kyis ded dpon 'di la brten 
[\[55a.5\]]nas/_ngas 'jigs pa chen po las bskyabs te/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang /_bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do/_/gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di dag thams cad rab tu byung ste/_der 'di 
[\[55a.6\]]rnams kyis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/_dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na/_da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to//_//glud ces bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag 
[\[55a.7\]]phyug cing nor mang la/_longs spyod che ba yongs su 'dzin pa/_yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]spyod do/_/khyim bdag de yang bu mi gshin pa zhig ste/_bu dang bu mo btsas so cog 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag de'i bsen ni/_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa yin te/_des khyim bdag de skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la gnas par byas nas/_sbyin 
[\[55b.2\]]pa dag sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' byed du bcug go/_/de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas nas/_khyim bdag des bsams pa/_thabs ci ltar byas na/_
[\[55b.3\]]khye'u 'di tshe ring bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam nas/_de'i blo skyes pa/_'phags pa ma 'gags pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing bsod nams dang ldan pa/_che bar grags pa yin pas na/_'di la bdag gi bu 'di g.yog tu phul na/_'di'i mthus tshe ring bar 'gyur yang srid do snyam nas/_
[\[55b.4\]]pha ma gnyis kyis khye'u de tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la phul nas/_de nyin gcig bzhin du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du khrid cing gso bar byed la/_dge slong gi cha lugs su bcug nas/_dge slong dag dang lhan cig tu bsod snyoms la rgyu bar byed do/_/de nas de gang gi tshe shed bye 
[\[55b.5\]]bar gyur pa de'i tshe/_khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du spyan drangs nas/_rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang /_bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te/_ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/_khye'u de'i glud du gser dngul mang po phul 
[\[55b.6\]]lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang khyim bdag de la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/_gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/bcom ldan 'das gshegs nas/_
[\[55b.7\]]khyim bdag des khye'u de'i chos gos tshon can rnams phud de/_khyim pa'i gos dang rgyan rnams bskon no/_/de nas de'i khyim pa'i gos dang rgyan bskon no cog mi snang bar gyur te/_/chos gos tshon can de dag 'ba' zhig byung bar gyur to/_/de nas gang gi tshe cha lugs de bsgyur 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]ma nus pa de'i tshe/_dge slong gi cha lugs su 'dug bzhin du gso bar byed de/_khyim de nyid du ne'u ldangs kyi grogs po lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu yi ge slob tu bcug go/_/de nas de rang gi khyim der yang dga' ba med na/_gzhan du lta ci smos te/_gtsug 
[\[56a.2\]]lag khang 'ba' zhig tu 'gro 'dod par gyur to/_/de nas khyim bdag des bu de gtsug lag khang du khrid nas de nyid du gsos so/_/de nas des gtsug lag khang de nyid du bstan bcos thams cad rtogs par gyur nas/_de phyir khyim du 'gro mi 'dod do/_/gtsug lag khang du 'dug 
[\[56a.3\]]bzhin du des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i thad du rab tu byung nas/_bsnyen par rdzogs te/_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas de la lung yang phog nas/_des kyang brtson pa 
[\[56a.4\]]dang bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/dgra bcom par gyur nas bsams pa/_bdag gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba 'ga' lta ci yod snyam ste/_des bltas na bdag gi pha ma la sogs pa ne'u ldangs 
[\[56a.5\]]kyi grogs po lnga brgya 'dul bar gyur pa mthong nas/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te/_rang gi khyim du pha ma gnyis kyi mdun nas sa brtol te byung ngo /_/de nas de mthong ma thag tu pha ma gnyis kyis de la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur nas chos nyan pa'i 
[\[56a.6\]]phyir mdun du 'dug go/_/de nas des pha ma de gnyis kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang shes pa dang /_rang bzhin rtogs nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na pha ma de gnyis 'khor dang bcas pa stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i 
[\[56a.7\]]ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_bden pa mthong nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la bkod de/_sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' yang byed du bcug nas/_khyim de khron pa dang 'dra 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]bar byas te bzhag go/_/des ne'u ldangs kyi grogs po lnga brgya po de dag skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la bkod do/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa khyim bdag gi bu 'dis las ci bgyis na/_las de'i 
[\[56b.2\]]rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes la/_bcom ldan 'das kyang 'dis mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes par ma bgyis nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid 
[\[56b.3\]]mngon sum du bgyis te/_'di nyid la brten nas pha ma la sogs pa dang /_ne'u ldangs kyi grogs po lnga brgyas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyang 'dis mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes par ma bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon 
[\[56b.4\]]lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa 'di rnams kyis smon lam gang du btab lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgus tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[56b.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe grong khyer bA rA Na sI na 
[\[56b.6\]]khyim bdag cig gnas pa las/_phyi zhig na de'i bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi 
[\[56b.7\]]rnams blangs so/_/de gang gi nyin par btsas pa de kho na'i nyin par khyim bdag gzhan gyi bu lnga brgya yang btsas te/_gang gi tshe de dag cher skyes pa de'i tshe brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur te/_de nas de dag so so'i pha ma rnams kyis mdza' sde'i nang du btang ngo /_/de nas phyi zhig na dpyid kyi 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]dus su mdza' sde bo de rnams skyed mos tshal shing ljon pa yal ga 'khrigs shing /_me tog rgyas pa'i nang du 'gro 'dod par gyur nas/_ne'u zla rnams kyis khye'u de sngon du btang bar 'dod de/_khyod sngar song la bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon gyis shig dang /_bdag 
[\[57a.2\]]cag kyang don grub nas 'ong ngo zhes byas so/_/de nas de der song nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po dag sta gon byas so/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas pa yang sa phyogs de logs nas/_bA rA Na sIr bsod snyoms la chas te 
[\[57a.3\]]gshegs so/_/de nas khye'u des thag ring po zhig nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang des bsams pa/_yon gnas kyi mchog 'di lta bu bsod snyoms la chas te gshegs la/_bdag gis kyang 
[\[57a.4\]]tshegs chung ngus bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sbyar ba yod na/_bdag gis je yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas pa la bshos gsol la/_de'i 'og tu bdag gis grogs po rnams kyi bza' ba dang bca' ba gzhan dag sbyar bar bya'o snyam nas/_des 
[\[57a.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas pa skyed mos tshal de nyid kyi nang du spyan drangs te/_bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te/_ci bzhed pa bstabs nas chos nyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[57a.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis de la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/_gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/de nas khye'u des mdza' sde bo rnams kyi phyir bza' 
[\[57a.7\]]ba dang bca' ba gzhan dag sta gon byed pa la zhugs so/_/de nas mdza' sde bo de rnams skyed mos tshal der lhags nas/_bdag cag gi bza' ba dang bca' ba sta gon byas pa de dag thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'khor dang bcas pa la phul lo zhes thos 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]so/_/de thos ma thag tu de dag shas cher khros te/_de dag khros nas khye'u de bsad par byas so/_/de nas khye'u de 'jigs shing skrag par gyur nas/_drang srong smra bar song ste/_des gnas de nas pha ma gnyis la bzlugs te/_pha ma gnyis kyis 'thab mo zhi bar bya bar 
[\[57b.2\]]brtsams pa las/_zhi bar byed ma nus nas/_khye'u des pha ma gnyis la gsol te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung ngo /_/de rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum lobs te rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar gyur 
[\[57b.3\]]nas/_des pha ma gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la bkod nas/_sbyin pa dag dang /_sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' byed du bcug go/_/de nas mdza' sde bo de rnams kyis de rab tu byung ba mthong nas/_'gyod pa skyes te/_bdag cag gis ma legs pa byas so/_/snyam 
[\[57b.4\]]nas/_de dag gis de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_bzod pa gsol to/_/de las skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang blangs so/_/de nas phyi zhig na dge slong de nad kyis thebs nas/_de rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang /_lo ma dang me tog dang /_'bras bu'i sman rnams 
[\[57b.5\]]kyis rim gro byas kyang /_sos par byed ma nus te/_des 'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_kye ma 'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 
[\[57b.6\]]bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog shig_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed 
[\[57b.7\]]par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/de'i pha ma gnyis dang mdza' sde bo de rnams kyang de'i mdun du 'dug par gyur te/_de rnams 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]kyis kyang thos nas smon lam btab pa/_bdag cag kyang khyod kho na la brten te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag rnams kyis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i 
[\[58a.2\]]tshe sde snod gsum par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/_khyim bdag gi bu 'di kho na yin no/_/de'i tshe pha ma gnyis su gyur pa gang yin pa de gnyis ni da ltar gyi pha ma 'di gnyis kho na yin no/_/de'i tshe mdza' sde bor gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/_da ltar gyi ne'u ldangs lnga brgya po 'di 
[\[58a.3\]]dag kho na yin no/_/des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/_'chi kar smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/_gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[58a.4\]]sangs rgyas 'od srung dang /_shin tu mnyam pa dang shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs 
[\[58a.5\]]nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/der de'i pha ma gnyis dang mdza' sde bo de rnams kyis kyang smon lam btab pa des na/_da ltar yang 'di kho na la brten nas/_'di rnams kyis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas so//_//las brgya tham 
[\[58a.6\]]pa/_bam po sum cu gnyis pa/_'thab pa zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe yul ko sa la dang /_yul ma ga d+hA'i bar mtshams na/_seng ge mthu rtsal bdo ba gnyis 'dug ste/_de gnyis de na 'dug pas/_skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed 
[\[58a.7\]]de/_'drul bcad do/_/de gnyis kyis lam chod pas/_su yang lam der 'gro mi nus par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang /_ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]gsum la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro ba lnga las rnam par grol ba/_skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms 
[\[58b.2\]]par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni/_chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni 
[\[58b.3\]]phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang /_nyam nga ba dang /_gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang /_thar pa dang 'bras bu la 
[\[58b.4\]]gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las/_'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i 
[\[58b.5\]]rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams smin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu yod par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_
[\[58b.6\]]dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge de gnyis 'dul ba'i dus la bab par dgongs nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 
[\[58b.7\]]khyod song la dge slong rnams la/_bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA phyogs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs kyis/_su bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro 'dod pa de dag chos gos long shig ces bsgo shig ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das dbyar 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]gnas shing /_dbyar bzhugs nas/_dge slong mang pos zham ring byas te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/_rgyal po'i khab tu chas te/_mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs gshegs nas/_seng ge'i nags khung du byon nas/_seng ge 
[\[59a.2\]]de gnyis zas tshol du song song ba las/_de gnyis phrad nas 'thab par chas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang de gnyis la thugs brtse ba'i phyir mdun logs su gzhes so/_/de nas thag ring po zhig nas/_seng ge de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas 
[\[59a.3\]]kyang seng ge gnyis khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa med par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur nas/_de gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du blta 
[\[59a.4\]]zhing 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la bka' stsal pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyed gnyis sngon gyi nyes par spyod pa'i las kyis dud 'gro'i nang du skyes na/_khyed gnyis da ltar yang de 'ba' zhig gi rgyu byed cing 'dug go/_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gnyis 'di ltar 
[\[59a.5\]]'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag go/_/chos thams cad ni bdag med do/_/mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o/_/nga la sems dga' bar gyis shig dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang bral bar 'gyur yang srid do zhes bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das gshegs so/_/
[\[59a.6\]]de gnyis bcom ldan 'das las chos thos nas kha 'tshos so/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams ni me'i drod che ste/_bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed bzhin du shi nas lha'i nang du skyes so/_/lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes ma thag pa ni/_chos nyid kyis sems 
[\[59a.7\]]rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/_bdag gang nas shi 'phos gang du skye/_las gang gis skyes snyam mo/_/de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang /_lha'i nang du skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa de gnyis kyis mthong ngo /_/de nas de gnyis kyis 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]bsam pa/_bdag cag gnyis zhag lon nas/_gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni/_bdag cag gnyis kyi cha ma yin gyi/_bdag cag gnyis zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas sngon seng ger gyur pa'i lha'i bu 
[\[59b.2\]]rna cha gdub kor dag cing mgul rgyan thogs pa/_lus do shal dang /_se mo dos brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang /_ta ma la'i lo ma dang /_spr-i ka la sogs pas byugs pa de gnyis kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa 
[\[59b.3\]]la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra ba dag gis thu ba bkang ste/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal 
[\[59b.4\]]nas/_chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de gnyis kyis chos thos nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/_de gnyis kyis bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/
[\[59b.5\]]de nas dge slong rnams kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/_'jig rten 
[\[59b.6\]]skyong ba bzhi'am/_lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gzhan 'ga' zhig_/bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/_
[\[59b.7\]]'jig rten skyong ba bzhi'am/_lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gzhan 'ga' zhig nga blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyis/_dge slong dag khyed kyis nags khung dgon pa na/_seng ge gnyis phan tshun 'thab cing 'dug pa mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_ngas de gnyis la chos bstan te/_de gnyis kyis nga las chos thos nas kha 'tshos te/_de gnyis shi 'phos te dus las 'das pa las lha'i nang du skyes te lhar gyur nas/_nga'i thad du 'ongs te/_de gnyis la ngas chos bstan nas/_nga las 
[\[60a.2\]]chos thos pa des na/_de dag gis bden pa rnams mthong ste/_de gnyis kyis bden pa mthong nas/_rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge de gnyis kyi khon byang bar 
[\[60a.3\]]mdzad de/_mtho ris dang thar pa thob par mdzad la/_yul 'khor gnyis kyi 'jigs pa bsal ba la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di gnyis kyi khon byang bar byas nas/_bsam gtan bzhi 
[\[60a.4\]]dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod de/_yul 'khor gnyis kyi 'jigs pa yang ci ltar bsal ba de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_yul kA shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin dang /_bi de ha'i rgyal po dbang chen sde gnyis phan tshun mi 'thun par 
[\[60a.5\]]gyur nas/_de gnyis kyis dus dus su skye bo phal po che kha 'dog par byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na de gnyis kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas/_g.yul 'gyed par 'dod pa'i phyir/_sa mtshams na 'khod do/_/de gnyis 'khod pa'i 'dab na dka' 
[\[60a.6\]]thub kyi gnas zhig na/_drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/_rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig gnas pa des/_de gnyis la snying brtse ba'i phyir/_steng gi nam mkha' la 'ongs nas/_de gnyis kyi bar mtshams su 'dug go/_/de nas drang srong de mthong nas de 
[\[60a.7\]]gnyis kyi khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa med par gyur nas/_drang srong de la shas cher dga' bar gyur to/_/de gnyis dga' bar gyur nas/_drang srong de la smras pa/_bka' stsal pa ci mchis/_drang srong des smras pa/_khon byang bar gyis shig_/rgyal po de gnyis kyis smras 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]pa/_drang srong gis ci skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/_mjal dum byas te/_drang srong gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/_chos nyan pa'i phyir/_drang srong gi mdun du 'dug go/_/drang srong des kyang de gnyis la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan to/_/de nas rgyal po 
[\[60b.2\]]de gnyis kyis so so'i bu rab rgyal sar bcug nas/_drang srong de nyid kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin 
[\[60b.3\]]pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe kA shi'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin dang /_bi de ha'i rgyal po dbang chen sder gyur pa gang yin pa de gnyis ni/_seng ge 'di gnyis kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang ngas 'di gnyis kyi khon byang bar byas nas rab tu byung ste/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon 
[\[60b.4\]]par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/da ltar yang ngas 'di gnyis kyi khon byang bar byas nas/_mtho ris dang thar pa thob par byas so/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa 'di gnyis kyis las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas seng ger skyes lags/_las ci bgyis na/_de nas shi 
[\[60b.5\]]'phos nas lha'i nang du skyes la 'di gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes par ma bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'das pa'i las kyang yod/_da ltar gyi las kyang yod de/_'das pa'i las gang zhe na/_yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[60b.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di gnyis dge bsnyen du gyur te/_kha mi mkhas pa des/_'di gnyis khros pas/_skye bo mang po la dud 'gro zhes bya ba'i tshig smras la/_der 'di gnyis kyis tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs 
[\[60b.7\]]nas/_'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/_bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe dge bsnyen du gyur pa gang yin pa de gnyis ni/_seng ge 'di gnyis kho na yin te/_de gnyis kyis der skye bo mang po la dud 'gro zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni dud 'gror skyes so/_/de gnyis kyis 
[\[61a.2\]]der tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs nas/_'chi kar smon lam btab pa des ni/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang /_shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs 
[\[61a.3\]]mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'di gnyis kyis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas pa 'di ni 'das pa'i dus kyi las yin no/_/da ltar byung ba'i las gang zhe na/_'di gnyis seng ger gyur nas/_nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des na lha'i nang du skyes te/_'di 
[\[61a.4\]]ni da ltar byung ba'i las yin no//_//rnyis bzung ba zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/_nags khrod cig na/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rngon pa dag cig gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bshor pa'i phyir rgya dang rnyi dang /_'jol rlubs dang /_
[\[61a.5\]]rnyi mang po dag btsugs nas/_der [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mang po zhig bzung ngo /_/rngon pa de dag kyang nang par sngar langs te/_nags khrod der song nas/_de dag gis der [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]ci zin pa rnams mda' 'phangs te bsad nas/_de dag las nyung shas cig lus so/_/de'i tshe sa phyogs der 
[\[61a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyang gshegs so/_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de rnams dang /_rngon pa de rnams kyis thag ring po zhig nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur nas/_rngon pa de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la 
[\[61a.7\]]ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_shes pa dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_de 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na rngon pa de rnams kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_de dag gis bden pa mthong nas/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing /_
[\[61b.2\]]dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/_de dag la 
[\[61b.3\]]lung yang phog ste/_de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bzhin du shi 'phos te/_dus las 'das nas lha'i nang du skyes 
[\[61b.4\]]so/_/lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes ma thag pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/_bdag gang nas shi 'phos/_gang du skyes/_las gang gis skyes snyam mo/_/de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang lha'i nang du skyes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la sems 
[\[61b.5\]]dga' bar gyur pa de dag gis mthong ngo /_/de nas de dag gis bsams pa/_bdag cag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/_bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo/_/
[\[61b.6\]]de nas sngon [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing mgul rgyan thogs pa/_lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang /_ta ma la'i lo ma dang spr-i ka la sogs pas byug pa dag gis 
[\[61b.7\]]de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/_bcom 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan to/_/de dag gis chos thos nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/_de dag 
[\[62a.2\]]gis bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo /_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa bcom ldan 'das ci lags/_mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/_
[\[62a.3\]]lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi'am/_lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gzhan 'ga' zhig bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ma dang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs 
[\[62a.4\]]pa'am/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi'am lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gzhan 'ga' zhig nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyis/_dge slong dag khyod kyis nags khung dgon pa na/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]lnga brgya rngon pa rnams kyis mda' 
[\[62a.5\]]'phangs te bsad pa mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa mthong lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_de dag nga la sems dga' bar gyur bzhin du shi 'phos nas dus las 'das pa las lha'i nang du skyes te/_lhar gyur nas nga'i thad du 'ongs te/_de dag la ngas chos bstan 
[\[62a.6\]]nas/_nga las chos thos pa des na de dag gis bden pa rnams mthong ste/_de dag gis bden pa mthong nas/_rang gi gnas su song ngo /_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa rngon pa de dag gis las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par 
[\[62a.7\]]smin pas gdol pa'i rigs su skyes lags/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de dag gis las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]su skyes nas/_'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes par ma bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di dag thams cad rab tu byung ste/_dge slong 'thab krol can kha mi mkhas pa sha stag tu gyur te/_dge slong dag la der de rnams kyis gdol pa zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod do/_/kha cig 
[\[62b.2\]]gis dud 'gro zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod de/_gang dag gis dud 'gro zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod pa de dag ni dud 'gror skyes so/_/gang dag gis gdol pa zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod pa de dag ni gdol par skyes so/_/de dag gis der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/_
[\[62b.3\]]dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des ni da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to//_//gong ma sreg ces bya ba ni/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_tshong pa lnga brgya dang /_sprang po lnga brgya dang /_thabs 
[\[62b.4\]]cig tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/_nags khrod cig tu lam phyung ste/_bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i tshe/_nags khrod de'i nang gi gnas su me chen po 'bar nas/_des skye bo phal po che dag 'jigs shing skrag par gyur te/_bdag cag ni tshig zin no/_/
[\[62b.5\]]bdag cag ni 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i skabs med do snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che dag 'jigs shing skrag par gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang 'gron po de rnams kyi mdun logs su gshegs nas/_tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_sangs 
[\[62b.6\]]rgyas kun gyi stobs gang dang /_/dgra bcom rnams kyi stobs gang dang /_/sangs rgyas dkon mchog gzi brjid kyis/_/me khyod lam ni dbye bar gyis/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs gang dang /_/dgra bcom rnams kyi stobs gang dang /_/dam chos dkon mchog gzi brjid 
[\[62b.7\]]kyis/_/me khyod lam ni dbye bar gyis/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs gang dang /_/dgra bcom rnams kyi stobs gang dang /_/dge 'dun dkon mchog gzi brjid kyis/_/me khyod lam ni dbye bar gyis/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs ma thag tu me zhi bar gyur 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]nas/_tshong pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur nas/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan to/_/de nas de dag gi nang 
[\[63a.2\]]nas kha cig gis ni dro bar gyur pa bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni spyi bo dang /_bden pa dang 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang /_'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog dang /_mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis 
[\[63a.3\]]ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do/_/
