[\[63a.4\]]kha cig gis ni stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni brgya byin du 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni tshangs par 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[63a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do/_/'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol/_chos la 'bab/_dge 'dun la bab par byas te bkod do/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che zhugs 
[\[63a.6\]]kyis tshig par gyur pa las thar bar mdzad nas/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang ngas dud 'gro phal cher me'i 'jigs 
[\[63a.7\]]pa las bskyabs nas ji ltar 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su bkod pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_nags khrod cig na bya phal cher gnas so/_/de nas nags khrod der shing skam po gcig la gcig drud pa las me byung nas/_bya de dag gi 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]nang nas 'gro nus pa de dag ni dong ngo /_/'gro mi nus pa dang /_sgo nga rnams ni de nyid du bor ro/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gong ma sreg tu skye ba zhig yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' des thag ring po zhig nas me 'bar zhing 'ong ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de sems can 
[\[63b.2\]]de dag la snying rje skyes te/_bdag gis sems can sdug bsngal dang phrad pa 'di rnams kyi phyir yang brtson 'grus ma bskyed na bdag gis sems can rnams 'khor ba las ji ltar bsgral bar bya snyam du bsams nas/_byang chub sems dpa' des 'dab ma chur spangs nas/_me 
[\[63b.3\]]chen po'i steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug ste/_'dab ma sprugs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'di dag 'dab ma yod mod kyis/_/'di dag da dung 'phur mi nus/_/'di dag rkang pa yod mod kyis/_/'di dag da dung 'gro mi nus/_/'di rnams pha ma 'phur te song /_/me khyod 
[\[63b.4\]]sdod la ma 'gul zhig_/bden dang bden tshig gang yin pa/_/bdag gis byams sems rab bsgoms pa'i/_/bden pa'i tshig ni 'di yis na/_/me khyod sdod la ma 'gul zhig_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don 
[\[63b.5\]]gyi phyir mi dga' zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang des bsams pa/_'di ni bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te/_sems can la phan pa'i phyir mi dga' zhing 'dug gis/_ma la bdag gis grogs bya'o snyam nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[63b.6\]]gyis char mo che phab ste/_me de zhi bar gyur nas sems can de dag thams cad me'i 'jigs pa las thar bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe bya gong ma sreg tu gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe nags 
[\[63b.7\]]khrod de na gnas pa'i sems can du gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni skye bo phal po che 'di dag kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang ngas de dag me'i 'jigs pa las thar bar byas te/_'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su bkod do/_/da ltar yang ngas me'i 'jigs pa las thar bar byas nas/_
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang /_bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do/_/gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la/_'di dag thams cad kha cig ni rab tu byung ngo /_/kha cig ni dge bsnyen du gyur 
[\[64a.2\]]te/_der 'di rnams kyis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs nas/_dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des ni da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to//_//pha zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe rgyal po'i 
[\[64a.3\]]khab na khyim bdag nor can zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang 
[\[64a.4\]]lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mdog bzang ba/_gser gyi kha dog can mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa lag pa 
[\[64a.5\]]ring ba/_dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/_sna mtho ba/_sna legs pa/_smin ma stug pa zhig btsas te/_khye'u de btsas ma thag tu skye bo phal po ches blta na sdug par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par 
[\[64a.6\]]byed de/_khye'u 'di btsas ma thag tu skye bo phal po ches bltas na sdug par gyur pas na/_de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming blta na sdug ces gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u blta na sdug_/'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings nas/_
[\[64a.7\]]rgyal po'i khab thams cad du de'i grags pa rgyas par gyur to/_/de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes nas mthar gyis gdul bar bya ba'i don mdzad cing /_rgyal po'i khab tu byon pa de'i tshe/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od ma'i tshal gzhes nas/_
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]sems can stong phrag du ma skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la bkod do/_/skye bo mang po de dag kyang sde tshan nas sde tshan dang /_pha tshan nas pha tshan dang /_dga' sde nas dga' sder dus dus su bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dong bar byed do/_/phyin cad khye'u 
[\[64b.2\]]de blta ba'i phyir 'dong bar mi byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na khye'u blta na sdug gis dris pa/_sngon cad ni skye bo mang po 'di dag nga blta ba'i phyir 'ong na/_da ni nga blta ba'i phyir mi 'ong ba ci las gyur/_de dag gis smras pa/_de dag ni da ltar bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'dong bar 
[\[64b.3\]]byed do/_/khye'us smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba de lta bu su zhig_/de nas pha ma gnyis kyis de la bcom ldan 'das kyi bsngags pa rgyas par brjod do/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu khye'u de ngo mtshar du gyur te/_bdag bas ches blta na sdug pa de ji lta bu zhig snyam nas/_
[\[64b.4\]]pha ma gnyis la smras pa/_yab yum bdag bcom ldan 'das de blta ba'i slad du mchi bar 'tshal lo/_/pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa/_bu thabs cig tu 'dong ngo zhes smras nas/_pha ma gnyis kyis khye'u de khrid de/_'od ma'i tshal du song nas/_khye'u des thag ring po zhig nas 
[\[64b.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing spa bar byas pa/_me lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu/_me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu/_mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu/_mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs 
[\[64b.6\]]kyis spras pa lta bu/_blo gsal zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas de la pha'i 'du shes kyang byung ste/_des pha pha zhes sgra phyung ste/_bcom ldan 'das ga la 
[\[64b.7\]]ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_pha tsam du 'dzin cing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du 'dug go/_/de'i pha ma gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi rkyen du 'tsham pa'i chos bstan nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas khyim bdag nor can dang /_de'i chung mas bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam mjug rdzogs par rig nas/_khye'u'i lag pa nas bzung ste 'gro'o 
[\[65a.2\]]zhes byas na/_khye'u de bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas dbral bar ma nus so/_/de nas pha ma gnyis kyis bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi khyim du spyan drangs dang /_thabs des na 'di bdag gis khyim du dkrid nus par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[65a.3\]]'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dgung bdun gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi khyim du bshos gsol bar ci gnang zhes byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la cang mi gsung 
[\[65a.4\]]bas gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo song la bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal zas sta gon gyis shig_/bdag ni khye'u dang lhan cig tu 'dug go zhes byas nas/_khyim bdag 
[\[65a.5\]]ni khye'u de dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du mtshan mo dgongs mal btab bo/_/chung mas kyang de nyid kyi mtshan mo bza' ba dang /_bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po sbyar nas/_nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams nas/_chu ra bkang ste bzhag nas/_bcom 
[\[65a.6\]]ldan 'das la phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul ba/_btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/_
[\[65a.7\]]lhung bzed bsnams nas/_dge slong mang pos zham ring byas te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/_khyim bdag de'i bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]so/_/de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/_rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te/_ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/_bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol 
[\[65b.2\]]zin te/_bstsang sder ni gyu phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/_stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor dang bcas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_
[\[65b.3\]]shes pa dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_de dag dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na khyim bdag de 'khor dang bcas pas/_stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras 
[\[65b.4\]]bu mngon sum du byas so/_/de ltar bden pa mthong nas/_khye'u des pha ma gnyis la gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 
[\[65b.5\]]'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing /_dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad 
[\[65b.6\]]nas/_de la lung yang phog ste/_des kyang brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_
[\[65b.7\]]nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dbang po dang /_nye 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byis pa stong phrag du mas mthong yang su yang 'di kho na ltar bcom 
[\[66a.2\]]ldan 'das la mjal bar mi bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khye'u 'di ni nga'i 'das ma thag pa'i tshe rabs lnga brgyar bur gyur pas na/_sngon gyi bag chags de kho nas 'dis nga la mjal bar byed do/_/gsol pa/_khye'u 'dis las ci bgyis na 
[\[66a.3\]]las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_'di gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur la/_'dis bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par bgyis nas/_mi mnyes par mi bgyis te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab 
[\[66a.4\]]tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/gsol pa btsun pa 'dis smon lam gang du btab lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[66a.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i 
[\[66a.6\]]kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_der gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gis/_bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes nas/_rgyal po'i pho 
[\[66a.7\]]brang mdzes ldan du gshegs pa de'i tshe/_rgyal po mdzes pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi phyir/_gtsug lag khang rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa zhig byas nas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig la 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]phul lo/_/rgyal po mdzes pa de'i lugs kyis na/_nyin gcig bzhin du 'khor dang bcas te/_gtsug lag khang du 'gro zhing gtsug lag khang gi byi dor byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po mdzes pa de gtsug lag khang du song ba las bya ba zhig byung nas des bu thu bo bskos 
[\[66b.2\]]te/_deng khyod kyis gtsug khang gi byi dor gyis shig ces bsgo nas rgyal po song ngo /_/de nas rgyal po'i bu 'khor dang bcas pa gtsug lag khang gi byi dor byed pa la zhugs pa las/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gis ci nas rgyal po'i bu de nyi 
[\[66b.3\]]ma nub kyi bar du yang /_gtsug lag khang gi byi dor byed mi nus pa de lta bur byin gyis brlabs nas/_de gtsug lag khang de nyid du dgongs mal btab bo/_/des der dgongs mal btab nas/_dge slong rnams cho 'phrul dag byed pa yang mthong /_brgya byin dang /_
[\[66b.4\]]tshangs pa la sogs pa 'ong ba yang mthong ngo /_/de nas de mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur nas/_gtsug khang de nyid na dge slong dag gi rim gro byed pa la brtson par gyur te/_phyir grong khyer du 'gro mi 'dod par gyur to/_/de der lo lnga stong gi 
[\[66b.5\]]bar du dge slong rnams la rim gro byed cing 'dug ste/_byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang bskyed nas/_des tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs nas/_'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 
[\[66b.6\]]'gyur ba de dang der gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur cig_/bdag gis ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid 
[\[66b.7\]]mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe rgyal po'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khye'u 'di kho na yin te/_des der yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams la bkur sti byas nas/_
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa 
[\[67a.2\]]dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas la nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/des der byams pa bsgoms 
[\[67a.3\]]pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pa des ni gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur to/_/gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung ste/_der 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/_dbang 
[\[67a.4\]]po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to//_//mi rgod ces bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa nas/_rgyal po'i khab kyi bar mtshams na/_shing sA la'i nags khung na/_mi rgod lnga brgya tsam 
[\[67a.5\]]zhig khro zhing gnas te/_de dag de na 'khod pas skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na der 'gron po mang po dag cig bcom nas/_tshong pa rnams rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi thad du dong ste/_rgyal po la gsol nas/_rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bu 'phags skyes po 
[\[67a.6\]]dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa bsgrogs te/_der btang nas des mi rgod lnga brgya po de dag gson por bzung ste 'ong nas/_rgyal po gsal rgyal la phul lo/_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mi rgod lnga brgya gsod du btang ste/_gshed ma rnams kyis mi rgod lnga 
[\[67a.7\]]brgya po de dag bsad pa'i sar khrid pa na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang /_ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran par nye bar bzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang 
[\[67b.2\]]ldan pa/_/yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni/_chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su 
[\[67b.3\]]ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs shing nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du 
[\[67b.4\]]bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su 
[\[67b.5\]]smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu yod par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs 
[\[67b.6\]]yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rgod lnga brgya 'dul ba'i dus la bab par dgongs nas/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te/_rgyal po'i khab 
[\[67b.7\]]tu gshegs so/_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thag ring po zhig nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci la gshegs lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bu lnga brgya po de rnams ma bsad par thong shig_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_gal te rab tu byung na btang bar 'tshal lo zhes 
[\[68a.2\]]gsol nas/_de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mi rgod lnga brgya po de dag phyir zlog ste/_bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du khrid nas rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/_de dag la 
[\[68a.3\]]lung yang phog ste/_de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rgod lnga brgya 
[\[68a.4\]]srog phangs pa stsal te/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang /_bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang ngas rigs kyi bu lnga brgya po 'di rnams 
[\[68a.5\]]srog phangs pa byin te/_ci ltar bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_yul bi de ha zhes bya ba na/_rgyal po dbang chen sde zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po des dpung gi tshogs 
[\[68a.6\]]yan lag bzhi go bskon nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bshor du song ba las/_rgyal po de la blon po lnga brgyas glags btsal te/_de dag gis bsams pa/_da ni rgyal po 'di bdag gi lag na 'dug gis/_'di 'dug pa kho na'i tshe/_bdag cag gis 'di bsad do snyam mo/_/'jig rten 
[\[68a.7\]]pa dag ni dgra dang zin gyi nang du 'dug ste/_der gzhan dag gis rgyal po la sbran nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po dbang chen sdes blon po lnga brgya po de dag gsod du btang ste/_de dag gshed ma rnams kyis khrid nas/_nags khrod cig tu zhugs te bsad ces byas pa las/_nags 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]khrod de na drang srong zhig gnas te/_drang srong des blon po lnga brgya po de dag rgyal po dbang chen sde la gtong du bcug nas/_dka' thub kyi gnas su khrid de rab tu byung ngo /_/rab tu phyung nas de dag gis kyang bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/dge 
[\[68b.2\]]slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe blon po lnga brgya por gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni rigs kyi bu lnga brgya po 'di dag kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang de dag gsod du btang ba 
[\[68b.3\]]las ngas srog phangs pa byin te/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod do/_/da ltar yang 'di rnams ngas srog phangs pa byin nas/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang /_bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do/_/gzhan yang yang dag par 
[\[68b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la 'di rnams rab tu byung nas/_'di rnams kyis der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/_dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na/_da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to//_//sha za zhes bya ba ni/_gleng 
[\[68b.5\]]gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa dang /_rgyal po'i khab kyi bar mtshams na sha za stong gnas te/_de dag gis de phyogs su 'drul bcad de/_yul ma ga d+hA dang yul ko sa la'i skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed do/_/de nas rgyal po gsal 
[\[68b.6\]]rgyal gyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la pho nyas bzlugs te/_mnyan du yod pa dang rgyal po'i khab kyi bar mtshams na/_sha za stong gnas te/_de dag de na 'khod pas/_yul gnyis la gnod pa chen po byed pa khyod kyis shes sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyang khyod kyi 
[\[68b.7\]]khams na bzhugs na/_sha za de rnams kyi phyir khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba'i rigs so zhes spring ngo /_/de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_
[\[69a.2\]]yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/_chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/_cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po gzugs can 
[\[69a.3\]]snying pos/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam gyi mjug rdzogs par rig nas/_stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun 
[\[69a.4\]]pa bcom ldan 'das kyis klu ma rungs pa dag dga' bo dang nye dga' la sogs pa yang btul/_gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 'brog gnas la sogs pa yang btul na/_yul ma ga d+hA dang /_ko sa la gnyis kyi bar mtshams na/_sha za'i tshogs chen po gnas te/_de dag 
[\[69a.5\]]de na 'khod pas skye bo mang po la gnod pa bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sha za'i tshogs de dag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du 'dul bar gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po gzugs 
[\[69a.6\]]can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sha za de rnams 'dul ba'i dus la bab par gzigs nas/_
[\[69a.7\]]rgyal po'i khab nas mi snang bar gyur te/_sA la'i nags khung sha za rnams kyi 'dab tu gshegs so/_/de nas sha za de rnams kyis thag ring po zhig nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang gzugs mi sdug par bsgyur te/_shugs chen pos bcom ldan 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]'das kyi thog tu brgyugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed de/_kye ma rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin che bar grags so cog dang lhan cig tu nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs na legs so snyam du dgongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs bskyed 
[\[69b.2\]]ma thag tu rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu/_gnod sbyin che bar grags so cog dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi 
[\[69b.3\]]bu dang /_gnod sbyin che bar grags so cog gzhan dag gis sha za'i tshogs rnams gtses nas de dag 'jigs shing skrag ste/_phan tshun du 'byer bar brtsams pa las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag 'dul ba'i phyir/_kho ra khor yug nas me lce chen po sprul nas/_de 
[\[69b.4\]]dag gis bdag cag nyid me lce chen pos 'khor ba mthong ste/_'bros kyang ma nus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung 'ba' zhig zhi bar mthong ste/_skyabs 'tshol zhing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das la bskor nas 'khod do/_/de 
[\[69b.5\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sha za de rnams la bka' stsal pa/_khyod sngon gyi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyis sha za'i skye gnas dma' bar skyes la da ltar yang khyed skye bo mang po la gnod par byed na/_'di nas shi 'phos na khyed kyi 'gro ba ni cir 'gyur/_skye gnas ni ci yin/_'gro ba'i 
[\[69b.6\]]sa ni gang yin/_de dag gis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la bka' ci stsal/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da phyin chad sdig pa las bzlog la/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams zung shig_/sha za rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[69b.7\]]'das kyis bdag cag la bka' ci skad stsal ba de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/_sha za de rnams kyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs te/_de phyin cad sdig pa'i las spangs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la de dag dang 'tsham pa'i 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]chos bstan nas/_shing sA la'i nags khung nas mi snang bar gyur te/_'od ma'i tshal du gshegs so/_/sha za de rnams kyang bla na med pa'i lam la gnas par gyur nas/_phan tshun 'drul ba rnams la chu sbyin par byed do/_/kha zas kyang sbyin par byed do/_/
[\[70a.2\]]lam stor ba rnams la yang lam ston par byed do/_/de nas yul kA shi dang /_yul ko sa la'i mi rnams ngo mtshar du gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar 'dul bar dka' ba 'di dag btul lo/_/zhes 'dzer to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[70a.3\]]'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sha za 'di dag kyang btul te/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang 'dzin du stsal la/_skye bo phal po che la yang sman btags pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 
[\[70a.4\]]'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di rnams sdig pa'i las las bzlog ste/_ci ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_sa phyogs 'di nyid na sha za'i tshogs chen po gnas gnas te/_de dag 
[\[70a.5\]]'di na gnas pas yul kA shi dang /_ko sa la'i mi rnams ma rungs par byed pa las/_rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na dka' thub kyi gnas zhig na drang srong zhig gnas te/_skye bo mang po de dag gis sha za de dag gdul ba'i phyir drang srong de la gsol ba btab nas/_drang srong des 
[\[70a.6\]]sha za de dag btul te/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe sha zar gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/_sha za 'di dag kho na 
[\[70a.7\]]yin te/_de'i tshe yang ngas 'di dag btul te/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod do/_/da ltar yang ngas 'di dag sdig pa'i las las bzlog ste/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod do//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po sum cu gsum pa/_dbang 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]po'i mgo zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe yul yangs pa can na/_'phong gi slob dpon dbang po'i mgo zhes bya ba 'phong gi rig pa thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa zhig gnas pa des/_lits+tsha bI lnga brgya la 'phong gi rig pa bslabs nas/_de 
[\[70b.2\]]dag kyang de la mthar phyin par gyur te/_stobs po cher yang gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa rnams dang /_yangs pa can na gnas pa rnams 'gras par gyur te/_rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas/_g.yul 
[\[70b.3\]]'gyed pa'i phyir yangs pa can na gnas pa rnams kyi steng du drangs so/_/de nas 'phong gi slob dpon dbang po'i mgos/_rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa rnams kyis g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir/_bdag cag gi steng du drangs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir 
[\[70b.4\]]'khor lnga brgya dang chas te/_rgyal po'i khab kyi dmag gi steng du drangs so/_/de dag gis drangs nas skye bo mang po kha btag ste/_de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi dmag mi rnams 'bros so/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum nas lan lnga'i bar du rgyal po'i khab kyi skye bo mang po rnams 
[\[70b.5\]]kha btag go/_/de nas 'phong gi slob dpon dbang po'i mgos mi lnga stong mda' 'phangs te bsad do zhes thog thag tu grags so/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol te/_btsun pa dbang po'i mgo de ni bdag cag gi dgra ma 
[\[70b.6\]]lags pa'i dgra/_'gran zla ma lags pa'i 'gran zla lags te/_btsun pa des ni mi lnga stong tsam kha btag lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du/_dbang po'i mgo 'dul bar gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab kyi 
[\[70b.7\]]mi rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas dong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas mi snang bar gyur te/_yangs pa can du gshegs 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas phyin cad dbang po'i mgo 'phong mi shes pa de lta bur byin gyis brlabs nas/_de rmongs par gyur te/_ci'i phyir bdag 'di kho na ltar ma rung bar gyur snyam mo/_/de nas des ci ltar bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs 
[\[71a.2\]]bzhugs pa las/_dgyes bzhin du yangs pa can du gshegs pa thos nas/_des bsams pa bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa yin pas na/_ci'i phyir bdag 'phong gi rig pa mi shes par gyur pa thugs su chud do snyam nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[71a.3\]]ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_shes pa dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_de dang 
[\[71a.4\]]'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na dbang po'i mgos stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas/_stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu 
[\[71a.5\]]gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_
[\[71a.6\]]bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dbang po'i mgo re zhig slob ma rnams la sbron cig dang /_de'i 'og tu khyod rab tu byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos por bya ba ni 
[\[71a.7\]]sla'o/_/des gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ste/_de yangs pa can du song nas/_lits+tsha bI lnga brgya po rnams ci nas de dag thams cad rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par 'gyur ba 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]de lta bu'i chos bstan to/_/de nas de rnams kyis pha ma la gsol te/_dbang po'i mgo dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[71b.2\]]'das kyis de dag gi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_shes pa dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/_de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na lits+tsha bI lnga brgya po de rnams kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi 
[\[71b.3\]]shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas/_stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[71b.4\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom 
[\[71b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis de rnams la dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/_de dag la lung yang phog ste/_de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon 
[\[71b.6\]]sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang po'i mgo la brten nas/_lits+tsha bI lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra 
[\[71b.7\]]bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang dbang po'i mgo la sogs pa lits+tsha bI lnga brgya po 'di rnams ngas sdig pa las bzlog ste/_ci ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]la bkod pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_grong khyer gru 'dzin ces bya ba na/_rgyal po dbang chen zhes bya ba rgyal po byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po de'i btsun mo la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_khye'u gzugs 
[\[72a.2\]]bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/_mdog bzang ba gser gyi mdog can/_mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa lag pa ring ba/_dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/_sna mtho ba sna legs pa/_smin ma stug pa zhig btsas so/_/de nas de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_khye'u 'di'i ming 
[\[72a.3\]]ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/_khye'u 'di dbang chen gyi bu yin pas na/_khye'u 'di'i ming dbang chen sde zhes gdags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas khye'u dbang chen sde 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes 
[\[72a.4\]]pa de'i tshe/_khye'u de yi ge slob tu bcug ste/_rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas tha dad pa 'di lta ste/_glang po che zhon pa dang /_rta zhon pa dang /_mtshon cha bcang ba dang /_'phong dang /_mdun du bsnur ba dang /_phyir 
[\[72a.5\]]bsnur ba dang /_g.yul las thar bar bya ba dang /_lcags kyus gzung ba dang /_zhags pas gzung ba dang /_mda' bo che 'phang ba dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phang ba dang /_mtshon rtse gcig pas gdab pa dang /_'khor lo 'phang ba dang /_gcad pa dang /_gsheg pa dang /_lag 
[\[72a.6\]]pas gzung ba dang /_rkang pa'i stabs dang /_mgo bo bskyab pa dang /_rgyang mar 'phang ba dang /_sgra grag par phog pa dang /_gnad du phog pa dang /_ma tshor bar phog pa dang /_gdon mi za bar phog par bya ba dang /_tshabs cher gtang ba rnams kyang bslabs nas/_gnas lnga la byang bar gyur 
[\[72a.7\]]to/_/de nas des bltas na/_pha dang blon po lnga brgya po de rnams chos ma yin pas rgyal po byas nas/_des bsams pa bdag gis rgyal srid btang la dka' thub kyi nags tshal du 'gro bar bya'o snyam ste/_pha ma la gsol nas nags 'dab tu gnas bcas so/_/de nas phyi zhig na de'i 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]pha shi'o/_/de shi nas nyi 'og gi rgyal po dag gis yul du gnod pa byed pa la zhugs nas/_blon po rnams kyis bsams pa/_bdag cag jo bo med pa'i phyir nyi 'og gi rgyal po dag gis gnod pa byed kyis/_rgyal po'i sras spyan drangs te/_rgyal sar gzhug go snyam nas rgyal po'i bu 
[\[72b.2\]]de'i thad du blon po chen po song ste/_des rgyal po'i bu la smras pa/_jo bo khyod kyi yab nongs kyis tshur gshegs/_yab kyi rgyal srid bzhes su gsol/_des smras pa gal te khyod dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas par gyur na de'i 'og tu byas pa sleb bo zhes byas nas/_des 
[\[72b.3\]]blon po chen po de dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas par byas so/_/blon po chen po des kyang blon po lnga brgya po de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod do/_/de nas des rgyal po'i bu de spyan drangs te/_rgyal sar bcug go/_/de nas de der 'ongs pas yul khams na gnas pa'i skye 
[\[72b.4\]]bo mang po thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe rgyal por gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe blon po chen por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po'i mgo 'di kho na yin no/_/
[\[72b.5\]]de'i tshe blon po lnga brgya por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni lits+tsha bI lnga brgya po 'di dag kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang ngas dbang po'i mgo 'di kho na la brten nas/_blon po lnga brgya po rnams sdig pa las bzlog ste/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod do/_/da ltar yang ngas lits+tsha bI lnga brgya 
[\[72b.6\]]po 'di rnams dbang po'i mgo 'di la brten nas/_sdig pa las bzlog ste/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang /_bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do/_/gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la 'di dag thams cad rab tu byung nas/_
[\[72b.7\]]der 'di rnams kyis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/_dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na/_da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to/_/las brgya tham pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa rdzogs so//_//sdom ni/_brgya byin rgyal po rngon pa 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]dang /_/rmongs pa dang ni bram ze gsum/_/khyab 'jug dang ni 'thab mo klu/_/shi bi gnyis dang kau shAm+bI/_/brgya byin zhes bya ba ni/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang na/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i rgyal srid kyi mnga' bdag byed do/_/
[\[73a.2\]]chos nyid kyis na lha'i bu 'chi 'pho ba'i tshe/_nye ba'i snga ltas lnga 'byung bar 'gyur te/_lha ni rang gi 'od dang ldan pa yin na de'i tshe 'od chung bar 'gyur ro/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gos dang /_rgyan rnams dang /_gos dang rgyan gyi shing rnams dang /_me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnams 
[\[73a.3\]]rlung gis bskyod na/_yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba yin na/_de'i tshe de dag gi sgra yid du mi 'ong ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams kyi gos reg na 'jam pa yin na/_de'i tshe de dag gi gos reg na rtsub par 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams kyi lus la dri ma mi chags pa yin na/_de'i tshe de dag 
[\[73a.4\]]gi lus la dri ma chags par 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams kyi mig mi 'dzums pa yin na/_de'i tshe de dag gi mig 'dzums par 'gyur ro/_/nye ba'i ltas lnga la ma gtogs pa 'chi 'pho ba'i ltas lnga 'byung bar 'gyur te/_gos rnams la dri ma mi chags pa las dri ma chags par 'gyur ro/_/me 
[\[73a.5\]]tog phreng ba rnams mi rnying pa las rnying par 'gyur ro/_/lus las dri nga ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mchan khung gnyis nas rngul 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu 'chi 'pho ba na rang gi stan la 'dug mi 'dod par 'gyur ro/_/de nas phyi zhig na lha'i dbang po brgya byin la nye ba'i ltas lnga po rnams 
[\[73a.6\]]byung ste/_des nye ba'i ltas de dag byung bar tshor nas/_tshor ma thag tu de shas cher 'jigs pa skyes te/_da su la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_su zhig gis bdag gnas 'di nas shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur bar nus zhig gu snyam mo/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs kyis smras pa/_kau 
[\[73a.7\]]shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhud la/_dge sbyong dang bram ze khong dge ba'i rang bzhin can bkur ba rnams la/_thabs ci zhig gis na bdag gnas 'di nas 'pho bar mi 'gyur zhes rmed cig_/de dag nyid la skyabs su bzhud cig_/de nas de thos ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs dang lhan cig tu/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_'dzam bu'i gling du 'ongs te/_de dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gzhan dang /_gzhan dag gi thad du song nas/_thabs ci zhig gis na/_lha'i bu 'chi 'pho bar gyur pa las/_'chi 'pho bar mi 
[\[73b.2\]]'gyur zhes dris na/_de dag gis de nyid la khyod su yin zhes phyir dris so/_/des smras pa/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin yin no/_/de nas de dag gzhi de las dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/_bdag cag la lha'i dbang po brgya byin bltar 'ongs pa 'di ni bdag cag gis 
[\[73b.3\]]rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes zer nas/_de dag de la skyabs su 'gro bar byed do/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar bdag ni 'di rnams la 'dri bar 'dod cing /_skyabs su 'gro bar 'dod pa las/_'di dag bdag la skyabs su 'gro bar byed na/_
[\[73b.4\]]bdag dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag lta bu la dri ci dgos snyam nas re thag chad de/_de dag la re ba med par gyur to/_/de nas de'i skabs su byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pas/_gzigs pa rnam pa bzhis 'jig rten la gzigs nas 'dod pa la spyod pa'i 
[\[73b.5\]]rigs drug tu tshig tu brjod cing kun tu sgra bsgrags te/_grogs po dag nga ni 'dzam bu'i gling du nying mtshams sbyor ba len cing /_'gro ba rnams kyang bdud rtsis tshim par byed kyis/_khyod las su bdud rtsi 'dod pa de dag 'dzam bu'i gling du nying mtshams sbyor ba long shig dang /_der 
[\[73b.6\]]ngas khyod la bdud rtsi'i bgo bsha' bya'o zhes byas nas/_byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/_bdag cag gis dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams la bsnyen bkur bya ci dgos/_byang chub sems 
[\[73b.7\]]dpa' 'di yum gyi lhums su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs pas na/_de gang gi tshe bltams pa de'i tshe/_bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur bas/_de'i 'og tu bdag gis bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas/_de'i tshe lha'i bu bzhi de'i srungs mar btang ngo /_/bdag nyid kyang dus dus su byang 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]chub sems dpa'i thad du srung ba'i phyir 'gro bar byed do/_/bltams pa'i mod la yang bdag nyid kyis blangs so/_/sku cher skyes pa'i tshe yang des skyo ba bskyed do/_/nges par 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par byas so/_/byang chub kyi snying por yang bsrung ba'i phyir song 
[\[74a.2\]]ngo /_/de nas gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes nas/_lnga sde dang nye ba'i lnga sde dang /_grong gi byis pa stod rim lnga bcu dang /_bzang sde'i sde tshan rnams btul ba dang /_dga' mo dang dga' stobs ma bden pa rnams la bkod pa dang /_lteng rgyas 'od srung 
[\[74a.3\]]dang /_chu klung 'od srung spun rab tu byung ba dang /_ga yAr gshegs nas cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum bstan pa dang /_'od ma'i tshal nags khrod du rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang lha brgyad khri dang yul ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag stong phrag du ma bden pa rnams la bkod pa 
[\[74a.4\]]de'i tshe/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/_da dung 'di ni bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba lung bstan pa zhu ba'i dus ma yin no snyam mo/_/de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po bden pa rnams la gnas par byas nas/_rgyal po'i 
[\[74a.5\]]khab tu gshegs te/_'od ma'i tshal gzhes nas/_dge slong shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis rab tu phyung ste/_bstan pa rgyas par mdzad nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang /_ye shes la mnga' 
[\[74a.6\]]brnyes pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/_skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul pa/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam 
[\[74a.7\]]gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs pa dang /_nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song 
[\[74b.2\]]du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug 
[\[74b.3\]]par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu yod 
[\[74b.4\]]par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_bdag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[74b.5\]]'khor brgyad khri dang bcas pa bden pa rnams la dgod par bya dgos so snyam du dgongs nas/_rgyal po'i khab nas mi snang bar gyur te/_rgyal po'i khab kyi lho phyogs na/_bram ze'i grong a mra'i nags khrod ces bya ba de'i byang phyogs na/_ri bi de ha'i dbang po'i brag phug tu gshegs nas 
[\[74b.6\]]me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/_da ni bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba lung bstan pa zhu ba'i dus la bab po snyam nas/_lha'i 'khor brgyad khri dang /_lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs dang /_dri za'i bu zur phud lnga pa dang thabs 
[\[74b.7\]]cig tu sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang nas mi snang bar gyur te/_ri bi de ha lar 'khod nas/_der lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_de ma yin pa'i lha stong phrag du ma'i kha dog gi mthus ri bi de ha thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dbang po'i brag phug tu 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]zhugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang des bsams pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa las na/_yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba dang blta ba dang 
[\[75a.2\]]bsnyen bkur bya ba'i dus la ma bab po snyam nas/_thang cig cang mi zer bar 'dug nas dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pa la smras pa/_bu gtsug phud lnga pa khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das sngar bzhengs par byed nus sam/_de ltar byas pa dang /_de'i 'og tu bdag cag blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba dang /_
[\[75a.3\]]bsnyen bkur bya ba sla bar 'gyur ro/_/gtsug phud lnga pas smras pa/_kau shi ka bdag gis nus ches so zhes smras nas/_g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang /_bai DUr+ya'i pi bang blangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_gtso bo la 'os pa dang /_dgra bcom pa la 'os 
[\[75a.4\]]pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das bzhengs su gsol nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka bcom ldan 'das bzhengs lags te/_khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das la blta 
[\[75a.5\]]bar 'gro ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i dus la bab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_kye ma dbang po'i brag phug 'di ni dog ches la lha'i 'khor ni mang ches kyis/_ma la bdag gis phug 'di ci nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa/_bde blag tu chos 
[\[75a.6\]]nyan cing 'khod du yod pa de lta bur byin gyis brlab par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang po'i brag phug yangs par byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs dang lha brgyad khri dang thabs cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba 
[\[75a.7\]]der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos nyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gtam rgyud snga ma'i don/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_brgya byin gyis zhu ba zhus pa btsun pa lha rnams dang /_mi rnams 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]dang lha ma yin rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_dri za rnams dang /_lus tha dad pa gzhan dag kyang rung ste/_de dag gi sbyor ba ci lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka lha rnams dang /_mi rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams 
[\[75b.2\]]dang /_klu rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_dri za rnams dang /_lus tha dad pa gzhan dag kyang rung ste/_de dag gi sbyor ba ni phrag dog dang ser sna yin te/_de dag 'di snyam du kye ma bdag kho na med pa dang /_'gran zla med pa dang /_gnod pa med pa dang /_'thab 
[\[75b.3\]]mo med pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba med pa dang 'gyed pa med pa dang /_rtsod pa med pas gnas par bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi/_'on kyang de dag ni khon dang bcas pa dang /_'gran zla dang bcas pa dang /_gnod pa dang bcas pa dang /_'thab mo dang bcas pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang bcas 
[\[75b.4\]]pa dang /_'gyed pa dang bcas pa dang /_rtsod pa dang bcas pa la gnas so/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_btsun pa de ni de lags so/_/de ni de lags te/_lha rnams dang /_mi rnams dang /_lha ma yin rnams dang /_klu rnams dang /_nam mkha' lding rnams dang /_dri za rnams 
[\[75b.5\]]dang /_lus tha dad pa gzhan dag kyang rung ste/_de dag gi sbyor ba ni phrag dog dang ser sna lags te/_de dag ni 'di snyam du kye ma bdag kho na med pa dang /_'gran zla med pa dang gnod pa med pa dang /_'thab mo med pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba med pa dang /_'gyed pa med pa dang /_rtsod 
[\[75b.6\]]pa med par gnas par bya'o/_/snyam du mi sems mod kyi/_'on kyang de dag ni khon dang bcas pa dang /_'gran zla dang bcas pa dang /_gnod pa dang bcas pa dang /_'thab mo dang bcas pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang bcas pa dang /_'gyed pa dang bcas pa dang /_rtsod pa dang bcas pas 
[\[75b.7\]]gnas lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don 'di bdag gis rtogs nas/_som nyi las brgal te/_the tsom dang bral lags so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das las zhu ba lung bstan pa thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]pa la mngon par bstod cing /_rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba phyi ma zhus pa/_btsun pa phrag dog dang /_ser sna'i gzhi ni ci lags/_kun 'byung ba ni ci lags/_rnam pa ni ci lags/_ci las ni skyes lags/_gang mchis na phrag 
[\[76a.2\]]dog dang ser sna 'byung bar 'gyur lags/_gang ma mchis na phrag dog dang ser sna 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka phrag dog dang /_ser sna'i gzhi ni dga' ba dang /_mi dga' ba'o/_/kun 'byung ba ni dga' ba dang mi dga' ba'o/_/
[\[76a.3\]]rnam pa ni dga' ba dang mi dga' ba'o/_/skye ba ni dga' ba dang mi dga' ba ste/_dga' ba dang mi dga' ba yod na/_phrag dog dang ser sna 'byung bar 'gyur la/_dga' ba dang mi dga' ba med na phrag dog dang ser sna 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_btsun pa de 
[\[76a.4\]]ni de lags so/_/de ni de lags te/_phrag dog dang ser sna'i gzhi ni dga' ba dang mi dga' ba lags so/_/kun 'byung ba ni dga' ba dang mi dga' ba lags so/_/rnam pa ni dga' ba dang mi dga' ba lags so/_/skye ba ni dga' ba dang mi dga' ba lags te/_dga' ba dang mi khyed la rang lta mchog 'dzin gyi lta ba de ha cang ldan gi/_
[\[76a.5\]]dga' ba mchis na/_phrag dog dang ser sna 'byung bar 'gyur la/_dga' ba dang mi dga' ba ma mchis na/_phrag dog dang ser sna 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don 'di bdag gis rtogs nas/_som nyi las brgal te/_the tsom dang bral lags 
[\[76a.6\]]so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das las zhu ba lung bstan pa thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba phyi ma zhus pa/_btsun pa dga' ba dang mi dga' ba'i gzhi ni ci lags/_
[\[76a.7\]]kun 'byung ba ni ci lags/_rnam pa ni ci lags/_ci las ni skyes lags/_gang mchis na dga' ba dang mi dga' ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/_gang ma mchis na dga' ba dang mi dga' ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]dga' ba dang /_mi dga' ba'i gzhi ni 'dun pa'o/_/kun 'byung ba ni 'dun pa'o/_/rnam pa ni 'dun pa'o/_/skye ba ni 'dun pa'o/_/'dun pa yod na dga' ba dang mi dga' ba 'byung bar 'gyur la 'dun pa med na dga' ba dang /_mi dga' ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/brgya byin gyis 
[\[76b.2\]]gsol pa/_btsun pa de ni de lags so/_/de ni de lags te/_dga' ba dang mi dga' ba'i gzhi ni 'dun pa lags so/_/kun 'byung ba ni 'dun pa lags so/_/rnam pa ni 'dun pa lags so/_/skye ba ni 'dun pa lags te/_'dun pa mchis na dga' ba dang mi dga' ba 'byung 
[\[76b.3\]]bar 'gyur la/_'dun pa ma mchis na dga' ba dang mi dga' ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don 'di bdag gis rtogs nas/_som nyi las brgal te the tsom dang bral lags so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das las 
[\[76b.4\]]zhu ba lung bstan pa thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba phyi ma zhus pa/_btsun pa 'dun pa'i gzhi ni ci lags/_kun 'byung ba ni ci lags/_rnam pa ni ci lags/_ci las ni skyes lags/_
[\[76b.5\]]gang mchis na 'dun pa 'byung bar 'gyur la/_gang ma mchis na 'dun pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka 'dun pa'i gzhi ni rtog pa'o/_/kun 'byung ba ni rtog pa'o/_/rnam pa ni rtog pa'o/_/skye ba ni rtog pa ste/_rtog pa yod na 
[\[76b.6\]]'dun pa 'byung bar 'gyur la/_rtog pa med na 'dun pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_btsun pa de ni de lags so/_/de ni de lags te/_'dun pa'i gzhi ni rtog pa lags so/_/kun 'byung ba ni rtog pa lags so/_/rnam pa ni rtog pa 
[\[76b.7\]]lags so/_/skye ba ni rtog pa lags te/_rtog pa yod na 'dun pa 'byung bar 'gyur la/_rtog pa med na 'dun pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don 'di bdag gis rtogs nas som nyi las brgal te/_the tsom dang bral lags so/_/de nas 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das las zhu ba lung bstan pa thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba phyi ma zhus pa/_btsun pa rtog pa'i gzhi ni ci lags/_kun 
[\[77a.2\]]'byung ba ni ci lags/_rnam pa ni ci lags/_ci las ni skyes lags/_gang mchis na rtog pa 'byung bar 'gyur la/_gang ma mchis na rtog pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka rtog pa'i gzhi ni spros pa'o/_/kun 'byung 
[\[77a.3\]]ba ni spros pa'o/_/rnam pa ni spros pa'o/_/skye ba ni spros pa ste/_spros pa yod na rtog pa 'byung bar 'gyur la/_spros pa med na rtog pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka de ltar na spros pa yod na rtog pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rtog pa yod na 'dun pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'dun pa yod na 
[\[77a.4\]]dga' ba dang mi dga' ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dga' ba dang mi dga' ba yod na phrag dog dang ser sna 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/phrag dog dang ser sna yod na dbyug pa thogs pa dang /_mtshon cha thogs pa dang /_'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'gyed pa dang rtsod pa dang g.yo byed pa dang 
[\[77a.5\]]'drid pa dang chad pas gcod pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zer ba dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na spros pa med na rtog pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rtog pa med na 'dun pa 'byung 
[\[77a.6\]]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'dun pa med na dga' ba dang mi dga' ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dga' ba dang mi dga' ba med na phrag dog dang ser sna 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/phrag dog dang ser sna med na dbyug pa thogs pa dang /_mtshon cha thogs pa dang /_'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_
[\[77a.7\]]'gyed pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_g.yo byed pa dang /_'drid pa dang /_chad pas gcod pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zer ba dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma 'gag par 'gyur te/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]gsol pa/_btsun pa de ni de lags so/_/de ni de lags te/_rtog pa'i gzhi ni spros pa lags so/_/kun 'byung ba ni spros pa lags so/_/rnam pa ni spros pa lags so/_/skye ba ni spros pa lags so/_/spros pa mchis na rtog pa 'byung bar 'gyur la/_spros pa ma mchis na rtog pa 
[\[77b.2\]]'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don 'di bdag gis rtogs nas som nyi las brgal te/_the tsom dang bral lags so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das las zhu ba lung bstan pa thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[77b.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba phyi ma zhus pa/_btsun pa spros pa 'gag par 'gyur ba'i lam zhes gsung na/_btsun pa spros pa 'gag par 'gyur ba'i lam gang lags/_dge slong lam gang la zhugs na spros pa 
[\[77b.4\]]'gag par 'gyur ba'i lam la zhugs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka spros pa 'gag par 'gyur ba'i lam ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag 
[\[77b.5\]]pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/'di ni spros pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam zhes bya ste/_de lta bu la zhugs pa'i dge slong ni spros pa 'gog 
[\[77b.6\]]par 'gyur ba'i lam la zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_btsun pa de ni de lags so/_/de ni de lags te/_spros pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam la zhugs pa de ni de lags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don 'di bdag gis rtogs 
[\[77b.7\]]nas/_som nyi las brgal te the tsom dang bral lags so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das las zhu ba lung bstan pa thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]phyi ma zhus pa/_btsun pa spros pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam la zhugs pa'i dge slong gis so sor thar pa'i sdom pa'i rgyu chos du zhig mchis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka spros pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam la zhugs pa'i dge slong 
[\[78a.2\]]gi so sor thar pa'i sdom pa'i rgyu ni chos drug yod de/_drug gang zhe na/_mig gis shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams dang /_rna bas shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang /_snas shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang /_lces shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang /_lus kyis shes par bya ba'i reg bya 
[\[78a.3\]]rnams dang /_yid kyis shes par bya ba'i chos rnams so/_/kau shi ka mig gis shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams la yang bsten par bya ba dang /_bsten par bya ba ma yin pa rnam pa gnyis yod de/_de la mig gis shes par bya ba'i gzugs gang yin pa rnams bsgrubs te/_
[\[78a.4\]]gnas par bya ba'i 'os ma yin par ngas shes nas/_de dag nges par spang bar bya'o zhes nga zer ro/_/mig gis shes par bya ba'i gzugs gang yin pa rnams bsgrubs te/_gnas par 'os pa ni bsten par bya'o zhes nga zer ro/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni de'i lung ston pa la dus 
[\[78a.5\]]mkhyen par bstan to/_/de bzhin du rna bas shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang /_snas shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang /_lces shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang /_lus kyis shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnams dang /_yid kyis shes par bya ba'i chos rnams la yang bsten par bya ba dang /_bsten 
[\[78a.6\]]par bya ba ma yin pa rnam pa gnyis yod do zhes nga zer ro/_/de la yid kyis shes par bya ba'i chos bsgrubs te/_gnas par bya ba'i 'os ma yin par shes pa gang yin pa de dag ni mngon du nges par spang ba yin no zhes nga zer ro/_/de la yid kyis shes par bya ba'i chos bsgrubs te/_
[\[78a.7\]]gnas par bya ba'i 'os yin par shes pa gang yin pa de dag ni/_de'i skabs su de bzhin gshegs pas de bsgrub par bya ba'i lung bstan pa'i dus mkhyen nas/_dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes nga zer ro/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]btsun pa de ni de lags so/_/de ni de lags te/_spros pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam la zhugs pa'i dge slong gi so sor thar pa'i sdom pa'i rgyu chos drug mchis te/_mig gis shes par bgyi ba'i gzugs rnams dang /_rna bas shes par bgyi ba'i sgra rnams dang /_snas shes par 
[\[78b.2\]]bgyi ba'i dri rnams dang /_lces shes par bgyi ba'i ro rnams dang /_lus kyis shes par bgyi ba'i reg bya rnams dang /_yid kyis shes par bgyi ba'i chos rnams lags te/_de la btsun pa mig gis shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams la yang bsten par bgyi ba dang /_bsten 
[\[78b.3\]]par bgyi ba ma lags pa rnam pa gnyis mchis zhes khyod gsung ste/_de mig gis shes par bgyi ba'i gzugs rnams bsgrubs te/_gnas par bgyi ba'i 'os ma lags par shes pa gang lags pa de dag ni/_mngon du nges par spang ba lags so zhes khyod gsung /_de la mig 
[\[78b.4\]]gis shes par bgyi ba'i gzugs rnams bsgrubs te/_gnas par bgyi ba'i 'os lags par shes pa gang lags pa de dag ni/_de'i skabs su de bzhin gshegs pas de lung bstan pa'i dus mkhyen nas/_dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes khyod 
[\[78b.5\]]gsung /_yid kyis shes par bgyi ba'i chos rnams kyi bar du yang de bzhin du sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don 'di de bzhin du bdag gis rtogs lags te/_mig gis shes par bgyi ba'i gzugs ci lta bu dag bsten na/_mi dge ba'i chos rnams mngon 
[\[78b.6\]]par 'phel bar 'gyur la/_dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mig gis shes par bgyi ba'i gzugs rnams ni bsten par mi bya'o zhes khyod gsung /_mig gis shes par bgyi ba'i gzugs ci lta bu dag bsten na/_mi dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su 
[\[78b.7\]]'grib par 'gyur la/_dge ba'i chos rnams mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mig gis shes par bgyi ba'i gzugs rnams ni bsten par bya'o zhes khyod gsung /_de bzhin du rna bas shes par bgyi ba'i sgra rnams dang /_snas shes par bgyi ba'i dri rnams dang /_lces 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]shes par bgyi ba'i ro rnams dang /_lus kyis shes par bgyi ba'i reg bya rnams dang /_yid kyis shes par bgyi ba'i chos rnams ci lta bu dag bsten na/_mi dge ba'i chos rnams mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur la/_dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su 'grib par 'gyur 
[\[79a.2\]]ba de lta bu yid kyis shes par bgyi ba'i chos rnams ni bsten par mi bya'o zhes khyod gsung /_yid kyis shes par bgyi ba'i chos ci lta bu dag bsten na/_mi dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su 'grib par 'gyur la/_dge ba'i chos rnams mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lta bu yid kyis 
[\[79a.3\]]shes par bgyi ba'i chos rnams ni bsten par bya'o zhes khyod gsung ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don 'di bdag gis rtogs nas/_som nyi las brgal te the tsom dang bral lags so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das las zhu ba lung bstan pa 
[\[79a.4\]]thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba phyi ma zhus pa/_btsun pa spros pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam la zhugs pa'i dge slong gis chos du zhig ni spang bar bgyi/_chos du la ni brtson 
[\[79a.5\]]par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka spros pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam la zhugs pa'i dge slong gis chos gsum ni spang bar bya'o/_/chos gsum la ni brtson par bya'o/_/'di lta ste gang gis rtog par dpyod pa'o/_/kau shi ka tshig la yang 
[\[79a.6\]]bsten par bya ba dang /_bsten par bya ba ma yin pa rnam pa gnyis yod do zhes nga zer ro/_/de la tshig bsgrubs te/_gnas par bya ba'i 'os ma yin par shes pa gang yin pa de dag ni/_mngon du nges par spang bar bya'o zhes nga zer ro/_/de la tshig bsgrubs te gnas par bya 
[\[79a.7\]]ba'i 'os yin par shes pa gang yin pa de dag ni/_de'i skabs su de bzhin gshegs pas de bsgrub par lung bstan pa'i dus mkhyen nas/_dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes nga zer ro/_/kau shi ka rtog pa la yang bsten par bya ba dang /_bsten par bya ba 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]ma yin pa rnam pa gnyis yod do zhes nga zer ro/_/de la dpyod pa bsgrubs te gnas par bya ba'i 'os ma yin par shes pa gang yin pa de dag ni/_mngon du nges par spang bar bya'o zhes nga zer ro/_/de la dpyod pa bsgrubs te gnas par bya ba'i 'os yin par shes pa gang yin pa de dag ni/_
[\[79b.2\]]de'i skabs su de bzhin gshegs pas de lung bstan pa'i dus mkhyen nas/_dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes nga zer ro/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_btsun pa de ni de lags so/_/de ni de lags te/_spros pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam la 
[\[79b.3\]]zhugs pa'i dge slong gis/_chos gsum ni spang bar bgyi/_chos gsum la ni brtson par bgyi ste/_'di lta ste gang gis tshig dang rtog pa dang dpyod pa'o/_/btsun pa tshig kyang bsten par bgyi ba dang /_bsten par bgyi ba ma lags pa rnam pa gnyis yod do zhes khyod gsung ste/_
[\[79b.4\]]de la tshig bsgrubs te gnas par bgyi ba'i 'os ma lags par shes pa gang lags pa de ni/_mngon du nges par spang bar bya'o zhes khyod gsung /_de la tshig bsgrubs te/_gnas par bgyi ba'i 'os lags par shes pa gang lags pa de ni/_de'i skabs su de bzhin gshegs 
[\[79b.5\]]pas de bsgrub par lung bstan pa'i dus mkhyen nas/_dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes khyod gsung ngo /_/btsun pa rtog pa dpyod pa yang bsten par bgyi ba dang /_bsten par bgyi ba ma lags pa rnam pa gnyis yod do zhes khyod gsung ste/_de la dpyod 
[\[79b.6\]]pa bsgrubs te/_gnas par bgyi ba'i 'os ma lags par shes pa gang lags pa de dag ni/_mngon du nges par spang ba lags so zhes khyod gsung /_de la dpyod pa bsgrubs te gnas par bgyi ba'i 'os lags par shes pa gang lags pa de dag ni/_de'i skabs su 
[\[79b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pas de lung bstan pa'i dus mkhyen nas/_dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes khyod gsung ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don 'di bdag gis rtogs te/_tshig ci lta bu dag bsten na/_mi dge ba'i chos rnams mngon 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]par 'phel bar 'gyur la/_dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig ni bsten par mi bya'o zhes khyod gsung /_tshig ci lta bu de dag bsten na mi dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su 'grib par 'gyur la/_dge ba'i chos rnams mngon par 
[\[80a.2\]]'phel bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig rnams bsten par bya'o zhes khyod gsung /_rtog pa dang dpyod pa ci lta bu dag bsten na/_de'i mi dge ba'i chos rnams mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur la/_dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rtog pa dang dpyod pa ni 
[\[80a.3\]]bsten par mi bya'o zhes khyod gsung /_dpyod pa ci lta bu dag bsten na de'i mi dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su 'grib par 'gyur la/_dge ba'i chos rnams mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams ni bsten par bya'o zhes khyod gsung ste/_bcom ldan 
[\[80a.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don 'di bdag gis rtogs nas/_som nyi las brgal te/_the tsom dang bral lags so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das las zhu ba lung bstan pa thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la 
[\[80a.5\]]mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba phyi ma zhus pa/_btsun pa spros pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam la zhugs pa'i dge slong gis lus rnam pa du zhig na/_rnam pa gnyis mchis zhes gsung /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi 
[\[80a.6\]]ka spros pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam la zhugs pa'i dge slong gis lus rnam pa gsum la/_rnam pa gnyis yod do zhes nga zer te/_yid bde ba'i lus dang yid mi bde ba'i lus dang btang snyoms kyi lus so/_/kau shi ka de'i yid bde ba'i lus kyang bsten par bya ba dang /_bsten par 
[\[80a.7\]]bya ba ma yin pa rnam pa gnyis yod do zhes nga zer ro/_/de la yid bde ba'i lus bsgrubs te/_gnas par bya ba'i 'os ma yin pa shes pa gang yin pa de ni mngon du nges par spang bar bya ba yin no zhes nga zer ro/_/de la yid bde ba'i lus bsgrubs te/_gnas par bya ba'i 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]'os yin par shes par bya ba gang yin pa de ni/_de'i skabs su de bzhin gshegs pas de lung bstan pa'i dus mkhyen nas/_dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes nga zer ro/_/kau shi ka yid mi bde ba'i lus dang /_btang snyoms kyi lus kyang bsten par bya ba 
[\[80b.2\]]dang /_bsten par bya ba ma yin pa/_rnam pa gnyis yod do zhes nga zer ro/_/yid mi bde ba'i lus dang /_btang snyoms kyi lus bsgrubs te gnas par bya ba'i 'os ma yin par shes pa gang yin pa de ni mngon du nges par spang bar bya ba yin no zhes nga zer ro/_/de la yid mi bde 
[\[80b.3\]]ba'i lus dang /_btang snyoms kyi lus bsgrubs te gnas par bya ba'i 'os yin par shes pa gang yin pa de ni/_de'i skabs su de bzhin gshegs pas de lung bstan pa'i dus mkhyen nas/_dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes nga zer ro/_/lha'i dbang po 
[\[80b.4\]]brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_btsun pa de ni de lags so/_/de ni de lags te/_spros pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam la zhugs pa'i dge slong gis lus rnam pa gsum la/_rnam pa gnyis mchis so zhes khyod gsung ste/_yid bde ba'i lus dang /_yid mi bde ba'i lus dang /_
[\[80b.5\]]btang snyoms kyi lus so/_/btsun pa yid bde ba'i lus kyang bsten par bgyi ba dang /_bsten par bgyi ba ma lags pa rnam pa gnyis mchis so zhes khyod gsung ste/_de la yid bde ba'i lus bsgrubs te/_gnas par bgyi ba'i 'os ma lags par shes pa gang lags pa de 
[\[80b.6\]]ni/_mngon du nges par spang ba lags so zhes khyod gsung /_de la yid bde ba'i lus bsgrubs te/_gnas par bgyi ba'i 'os lags par shes pa gang lags pa de ni/_de'i skabs su de bzhin gshegs pas de lung bstan pa'i dus mkhyen nas/_dran pa dang shes bzhin dang 
[\[80b.7\]]ldan pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes khyod gsung /_/yid mi bde ba'i lus dang /_btang snyoms kyi lus kyang bsten par bgyi ba dang /_bsten par bgyi ba ma lags pa rnam pa gnyis mchis so zhes khyod gsung ste/_de la yid mi bde ba'i lus dang /_btang snyoms kyi lus bsgrubs 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]te/_gnas par bgyi ba'i 'os ma lags par shes pa gang lags pa de ni/_mngon du nges par spang bar bgyi ba lags so zhes khyod gsung /_de la yid mi bde ba'i lus dang /_btang snyoms kyi lus bsgrubs te/_gnas par bgyi ba'i 'os lags par 
[\[81a.2\]]shes pa gang lags pa de ni/_de'i skabs su de bzhin gshegs pas de lung bstan pa'i dus mkhyen nas/_dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes khyod gsung ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don 'di bdag gis rtogs te/_yid bde ba'i 
[\[81a.3\]]lus ci lta bu dag bsten na/_de mi dge ba'i chos rnams mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur la/_dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid bde ba'i lus ni bsten par mi bya'o zhes khyod gsung /_yid bde ba'i lus ci lta bu dag bsten na/_de mi dge ba'i chos 
[\[81a.4\]]rnams yongs su 'grib par 'gyur la/_dge ba'i chos rnams mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid bde ba'i las ni bsten par bya'o zhes khyod gsung /_yid mi bde ba'i lus dang /_btang snyoms kyi lus ci lta bu dag bsten na/_de'i mi dge ba'i chos rnams mngon par 
[\[81a.5\]]'phel bar 'gyur la/_dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ba/_de lta bu'i yid mi bde ba'i lus dang /_btang snyoms kyi lus ni bsten par mi bya'o zhes khyod gsung /_yid mi bde ba'i lus dang /_btang snyoms kyi lus ci lta bu dag bsten na/_des mi dge ba'i 
[\[81a.6\]]chos rnams yongs su 'grib par 'gyur la/_dge ba'i chos rnams mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid mi bde ba'i lus dang /_btang snyoms kyi lus ni bsten par bya'o zhes khyod gsung ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don 'di bdag gis rtogs 
[\[81a.7\]]nas/_som nyi las brgal te/_the tsom dang bral lags so//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po sum cu bzhi pa/_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das las zhu ba lung bstan pa thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba phyi ma zhus pa/_btsun pa sems can thams cad 'dod pa gcig pa dang /_'dun pa gcig pa dang /_dad pa gcig pa dang /_bsam pa gcig pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau 
[\[81b.2\]]shi ka sems can thams cad ni 'dod pa gcig pa dang /_'dun pa gcig pa dang /_dad pa gcig pa dang /_bsam pa gcig pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka 'jig rten 'di dag ni khams tha dad pa yin gyi/_khams gcig pa ma yin te/_de dag ni khams gang dang gang 'dzin pa de dang de nan 
[\[81b.3\]]gyis mchog tu 'dzin cing /_mngon par zhen nas rjes su spyod par byed de/_'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug pa'o snyam du sems so/_/kau shi ka gal te 'jig rten 'di dag khams tha dad pa dang /_khams du ma pa yin du zin na ni/_sems can 'di dag khams gang dang gang 
[\[81b.4\]]'dzin pa de dang de nan gyis mchog tu 'dzin cing /_mngon par zhen nas/_rjes su spyod par byed de/_'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug pa'o snyam du mi sems pa zhig na gang gi phyir 'jig rten 'di dag khams tha dad pa dang /_khams du ma pa yin te/_de'i phyir sems can 'di dag khams gang 
[\[81b.5\]]dang gang 'dzin pa de dang de nan gyis mchog tu 'dzin cing mngon par zhen nas/_rjes su spyod par byed do/_/'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug pa'o snyam du sems so/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_btsun pa de ni de lags so/_/de ni de lags te/_sems can thams cad 
[\[81b.6\]]ni 'dod pa gcig pa dang /_'dun pa gcig pa dang /_dad pa gcig pa dang /_bsam pa gcig pa ma lags te/_btsun pa 'jig rten 'di dag ni khams tha dad pa dang /_khams du ma pa lags te/_de dag khams gang dang gang 'dzin pa de dang de nan gyis mchog tu 'dzin cing mngon 
[\[81b.7\]]par zhen nas/_rjes su spyod par bgyid do/_/'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug pa'o snyam du sems lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don 'di bdag gis rtogs nas/_som nyi las brgal te/_the tsom dang bral lags so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]gyis/_bcom ldan 'das las zhu ba lung bstan pa thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba phyi ma zhus pa/_btsun pa ci lags/_dge sbyong dang bram ze thams cad g.yung 
[\[82a.2\]]drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang /_gtan du dri ma dang bral ba dang /_gtan du tshangs par spyod pa'i mthar phyin pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka dge sbyong dang bram ze thams cad g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa dang /_gtan du dri ma dang bral ba dang /_
[\[82a.3\]]gtan du tshangs par spyod pa'i mthar phyin pa ma yin gyis/_dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze su yang rung ste/_bla na med pa'i rnam par grol ba la srid pa yang dag par zad cing /_yang dag par sems shin tu rnam par grol bar gyur pa de dag ni g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa dang /_gtan du 
[\[82a.4\]]dri ma dang bral ba dang /_gtan du tshangs par spyod pa'i mthar phyin pa yin no/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_btsun pa de ni de lags so/_/de ni de lags te/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze thams cad g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang /_gtan du dri ma dang bral 
[\[82a.5\]]ba dang /_gtan du tshangs par spyod pa'i mthar thug pa ma lags te/_dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze gang yang rung ste/_bla na med pa'i rnam par grol bar gyur pa las/_srid pa yang dag par zad cing /_yang dag par sems shin tu rnam par grol ba de dag ni/_g.yung drung gi mthar 
[\[82a.6\]]thug pa dang /_gtan du dri ma dang bral ba dang /_gtan du tshangs par spyod pa'i mthar phyin pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don 'di bdag gis rtogs shing /_chos bdag gis rtogs nas/_som nyi las brgal te/_the tsom dang bral zhing zug rngu phyung 
[\[82a.7\]]nas/_yongs su yi chad pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/_bdag gis bdag gang lags snyam du bdag gi yid la phyir skye bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/btsun pa zhu ba lung bstan pa khyad par rtogs pa gang dag bdag gis ma thob pa las/_da ni bdag gis yun ring po zhig 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]lags na/_bcom ldan 'das la brten te/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal nas/_som nyi dang yid gnyis kyi zug rngu rtsa ba nas bton lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka 
[\[82b.2\]]sngon cad dge sbyong dang /_bram ze gzhan dag la yang dri ba 'di lta bu dris pa dran nam/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_btsun pa glo ba la dran pa lags te/_dus gcig cig na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang du lha rnams 'dus shing 'khod par gyur te/_'di 
[\[82b.3\]]ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshol zhing mchis pa las/_de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma rnyed nas/_stan las langs te/_so sor gyes pa de dag gi nang nas/_lha 
[\[82b.4\]]che bar grags so 'tshal gnas nas shi 'phos shing mi snang bar gyur nas/_btsun pa lha che bar grags so 'tshal gnas nas shi 'phos pas bdag kyang skrag cing bag tsha bar gyur te/_bdag kyang gnas 'di nas shi 'phos par mi 'gyur grang snyam nas/_bdag dge sbyong dang /_bram ze 
[\[82b.5\]]gcig pu dben par gnas pas gnas shing mchis pa/_gang dang gang mthong ba de dang de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lags snyam nas/_de dag gi thad du mchis na/_de dag gis bdag la khyod su yin zhes 'dri bar bgyid de/_
[\[82b.6\]]bdag gis de dag la bdag ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin yin no zhes bgyis nas/_de dag dga' zhing mgu ste/_kye ma bdag gis brgya byin mthong ngo zhes ched du brjod pa ched du rjod par bgyid de/_de dag bdag la 'dri bar bgyid kyis/_de dag la bdag 'dri bar mi bgyid lags 
[\[82b.7\]]so/_/de dag bdag la skyabs su mchi bar bgyid kyis/_bdag de dag la skyabs su mchi bar mi bgyid lags so/_/da slan cad bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags te/_bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchis lags so/_/rtogs pa la ni mtha' ma mchis/_/bdag 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]la the tsom nem nur mchis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshol ba'i phyir/_/ring po zhig tu 'khyam 'khyam ste/_/long ba bdag ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/bsnyen bkur bgyid du mchis mchi na/_/bdag gis ji ltar mnyes pa'i thabs/_/de dag la ni dris pa las/_/lam 
[\[83a.2\]]dang de bzhin bsgrub pa yang /_/de dag yang gi gtam ma 'tshal/_/bdag ni cung zad ci 'dod pa/_/rtog par gyur dang dpyad pa dang /_/yid kyi 'gro dang 'ong ba yis/_/sems ni thugs kyis thugs su chud/_/yid kyang yid kyis rig gyur nas/_/de dag thams cad de ring du/_/
[\[83a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das ni dgra bcom gyis/_/bsgrags shing lung yang bstan par gyur/_/khyod ni sangs rgyas ston pa khyod/_/rgyal ba khyod kyis bdud kyang btul/_/khyod kyis bag nyal bcad nas kyang /_/rgal nas skye dgu sgrol bar mdzad/_/'jig rten du ni khyod sangs rgyas/_/khyod 
[\[83a.4\]]las lhag pa yang ma mchis/_/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/_/gang zag khyod kyi zla ma mchis/_/dpa' bo chen po khyod la 'dud/_/skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/srid pa'i zug rngu 'byin pa ste/_/nyi ma'i rigs skyes khyod la 'dud/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[83a.5\]]stsal pa/_kau shi ka khyod kyis sngon chad bden pa thob pa dang /_yid bde ba thob pa 'di lta bu nyams su myong bar dran nam/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_yid bde ba thob pa ni bdag gis myong bar dran lags so/_/bden pa thob pa ni nyams su myong ba mi dran lags so/_/btsun pa lan 
[\[83a.6\]]gcig cig na/_lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa na/_lha rnams ni rgyal/_lha ma yin rnams ni pham nas/_bdag gis 'di snyam du sems te/_da ni bdag lha'i grong khyer du mchis la/_lha'i longs spyod gang lags pa dang /_lha ma yin gyi longs spyod gang lags pa de dag 
[\[83a.7\]]lhan cig tu tshogs pa dga' bzhin du longs spyod par bgyi'o/_/snyam pa de ni yid bde ba thob pa lags te/_de ni yun ring por 'thab mo'i mtha' can lags/_mtshang 'dru ba'i mtha' can lags/_'gyed pa'i mtha' can lags/_rtsod pa'i mtha' can lags so/_/btsun 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]pa bdag gis yid bde ba thob pa dang /_bden pa mthong ba 'di ni yun ring por 'thab mo ma mchis pa'i mtha' can lags/_mtshang 'dru ba ma mchis pa'i mtha' can lags/_'gyed pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' can lags/_rtsod pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' can lags so/_/btsun 
[\[83b.2\]]pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i bka' drin stsal ba gang lags pa de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/_bdag gnas 'di nas shi 'phos nas mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba dang /_rdzas dang yo byad mang ba dang /_bdog 
[\[83b.3\]]pa mang ba dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_mdzod dang /_bang ba'i tshogs mang ba'i rigs gang lags pa dang /_mdza' bo dang /_grogs po dang /_phu nu dang /_nye du mang ba dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba mang ba de lta bu'i khyim du 
[\[83b.4\]]skal ba mnyam par skye bar gyur cig_/de nas bdag mthar gyis skyes te/_dbang po rnams smin nas/_sbyin bdag byin zhing bsod nams dag bgyid nas/_skra dang kha spu bregs te/_chos gos tshon can bgos nas yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_
[\[83b.5\]]btsun pa bdag 'os par gnas shing /_gal te bka' lung thob na bka' lung bzhin bgyid par gyur cig_/de ltar bdag 'os par gnas na/_sdug bsngal gyi mthar thug pa ni de lags so snyam bgyid do/_/gal te bka' lung ma thob na ni de ltar na bdag gzugs mchis pa'i 
[\[83b.6\]]lha'i lus skyes pa/_dbang po ma nyams shing dbang po tshang ba yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/_mdog bzang ba/_rang la 'od mchis pa/_nam mkha' la 'gro ba/_dga' ba'i zas za ba/_dga' ba'i zas dang ldan pa/_tshe ring ba yun ring du gnas pa der/_bdag
