[\[83b.7\]]'gran zla ma mchis par skye bar shog shig snyam bgyid do/_/lha lus 'di las shi 'phos shing /_/mi ma yin pa'i tshe spangs nas/_/rmongs pa med par mngal du 'jug_/bdag gi yid ni sdom la dga'/_/man ngag gis ni phongs mi 'gyur/_/bstan pa'i lam la rten 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]bcas shing /_/tshangs par spyod la gzhol bgyis nas/_/bsod snyoms rgyu ba spyad par bgyi/_/bdag ni 'os par gnas nas kyang /_/gal te bka' lung thob gyur na/_/bka' lung stsal ba bzhin du bgyi/_/de nyid bdag gi sdug bsngal mtha'/_/gal te 
[\[84a.2\]]de ltar ma gyur nas/_/tshe yi mtha' ni zad pa'i tshe/_/'og min lha ni gang yin pa/_/de dag tu ni skye bar shog_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rgyun du zhugs pa lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa bdag ni rgyun du zhugs pa lags so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i re ba 
[\[84a.3\]]yang bdag la mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka legs so legs so/_/de'i skal ba khyod la yod de/_de yang bag yod pas 'thob bo/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_gang gis bdag ni zhi 'gyur la/_/rgyun du zhugs par nges 
[\[84a.4\]]'byung ba/_/bcom ldan khyod las gzhan la med/_/khyod kyi bstan las gzhan la med/_/khyad par rgya chen dang po'i gzhi/_/gzhan dag lta la ga la mchis/_/khyad par thob pa ci 'dra ba/_/sngon chad gzhan las yong ma thob/_/btsun pa bdag ni 'di nyid na/_/mchis 
[\[84a.5\]]shing lha lus bgyid bzhin du/_/bdag gis tshe ring thob lags kyis/_/blo ldan de ltar gzung du gsol/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_lha brgyad khri chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes te/_des bden 
[\[84a.6\]]pa mthong nas/_stan de kho na las shi 'phos nas/_stan de kho na nyid la phyir skyes so/_/de ltar de shi 'phos pa dang /_skyes pa ni mig mi 'dzums pa dang /_mi snang bar gyur pa dang /_lus kyi reg pa'i sgo nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen to/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_lha ma 
[\[84a.7\]]yin gyi bu mo bde sogs kyis kyang rtogs so/_/de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs kyis/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la smras pa/_kau shi ka khyod shi 'phos nas/_skyes lags sam/_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_bde sogs nga shi 'phos nas phyir skyes te/_'di na 'dug bzhin du 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]phyir bdag gi tshe thob par gyur to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bden pa mthong nas dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' zhing yi rangs te/_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 
[\[84b.2\]]thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ni 'phags lags so/_/'phags lags so/_/deng slan cad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dge bsnyen lags pa dang /_khong nas dga' ste skyabs su mchis lags par gzung du gsol/_de nas 
[\[84b.3\]]lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pa la smras pa/_bu khyod ni bdag la phan pa dang bde ba yin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro bar thog ma khyod kyis bskul to/_/bu zur phud lnga pa bdag cag 'di nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul du dong nas/_khyod kyis sngon yun 
[\[84b.4\]]ring po nas 'dod cing smon pa gang yin pa'i dri za'i rgyal po dum bu ru'i bu mo bzang mo zhes bya ba 'od [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de/_khyod kyi chung mar sbyin no/_/dri za rnams kyi dbang po khyod kyi pha'i rgyal sar yang gzhug go/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la smras pa/_grogs 
[\[84b.5\]]po dag bdag gis sngon cad mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la/_dus gsum du tshangs pa la 'os pa'i 'dud pa byed pa gang yin pa de ni/_bdag gis da phyin cad bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid la tshangs pa la 'os pa'i 'dud pas 'dud par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 'di 
[\[84b.6\]]nyid tshangs pa yin/_tshangs par gyur pa yin/_zhi ba yin/_zhi bar gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_lha gzhan rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_mdun gyis phyogs shing 
[\[84b.7\]]phyir nur nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'dud bzhin du/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mig lam du mi snang bar gyur pa'i sa nas/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus 
[\[85a.2\]]pa/_btsun pa lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas/_rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar gyur la/_'dis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes par ma bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das lha brgyad khri bo 'di rnams kyis kyang las 
[\[85a.3\]]ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas brgya byin 'di kho na las brten nas/_'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes par ma bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/gsol pa 'di rnams kyis 
[\[85a.4\]]smon lam gang du btab lags/_bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen 
[\[85a.5\]]pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_des gang gi tshe bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes nas/_rgyal po'i pho brang mdzes ldan du gshegs pa de'i 
[\[85a.6\]]tshe/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi phyir rgyal po mdzes pas/_gtsug lag khang lnga brgya brtsigs te/_gnas khang drug stong byas nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul te/_gtsug 
[\[85a.7\]]lag khang de dag tu yo byad thams cad sbyar nas/_'khor brgyad khri dang bcas pas/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la/_mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyur to/_/de nas gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]'khor ba 'jig sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/_phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe/_rgyal po mdzes pas de'i sku gdung la mchod pa byas nas/_sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs te/_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[85b.2\]]yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/_mchod rten de la mchod pa chen po byas te/_smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/_bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der gal te/_lhar skye bar gyur na ni/_lha che bar grags pa/_lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu gyur 
[\[85b.3\]]cig_/gal te mir skye bar gyur na ni mi che bar grags pa mi rnams kyi nang nas rgyal srid kyi mnga' bdag tu gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas rgyal pos smon lam 'debs pa zham ring ba rnams kyis mthong nas dris pa/_lhas smon lam ci zhig btab lags/_de nas des de dag la 
[\[85b.4\]]rgyas par bsnyad nas/_de thos ma thag tu de dag gis kyang mchod rten de la bkur sti byas nas/_smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na/_bdag cag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing /_nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog 
[\[85b.5\]]shig_/rgyal po 'di kho na la brten nas/_bdag cag gis ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe rgyal po mdzes par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di kho na 
[\[85b.6\]]yin te/_des der yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur byas nas/_smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/_ched 'ga' mir skyes pa'i tshe ni lha che bar grags par gyur te/_lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag byas so/_/
[\[85b.7\]]ched 'ga' mir skyes pa'i tshe ni/_mi che bar grags par gyur nas/_mi rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi mnga' bdag byas te/_dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas so/_/de'i tshe zham ring ba brgyad khrir gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/_lha brgyad khri po 'di dag kho na yin te/_de dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig nyan thos 
[\[86a.2\]]kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur byas nas/_smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der/_phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_brgya byin 'di kho na la brten nas 'di rnams kyis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes 
[\[86a.3\]]par ma byas so//_//rgyal po zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/_bram ze zhig gnas pa des/_thabs zlar bab pa las/_chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/_phyi zhig 
[\[86a.4\]]na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa na bu btsas nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_yi ge dang bram ze'i spyod lam dang /_spyod pa dang /_oM zhes bya ba dang /_b+ho zhes bya ba dang /_gtsang sbra dang /_cho ga dang thal ba blang ba dang /_ril pa thogs pa dang /_nges 
[\[86a.5\]]brjod kyi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang /_snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /_srid srung gi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin bya ba dang /_mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_blang ba dang /_kha ton bya ba dang /_kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas/_las 
[\[86a.6\]]rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur te/_de mthar gyis rig pa'i gnas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na de'i pha ma gnyis shi'o/_/de gnyis shi nas khye'u des bsams pa/_bram ze rnams kyi lugs kyis na/_lo bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad 
[\[86a.7\]]nas/_de'i 'og tu chung ma len par byed kyis/_bdag gis kyang lo bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o snyam nas/_des lo bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas chung ma blangs te/_de'i chung ma gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang /_g.yem 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]zhing skyes pa 'dod pa zhig ste/_de khyim thab rgan po dang lhan cig 'dug pas snying mi tshim nas/_des skyes pa gzhan btsal to/_/de nas phyi zhig na de'i blo skyes pa/_bdag gis khyim thab 'di ji srid 'di na 'dug pa'i bar du ni/_bdag skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig nyal ba'i 
[\[86b.2\]]skabs med kyis/_bdag gis 'di yul gzhan du gtang bar bya'o snyam nas/_bram ze de la smras pa/_ji ltar jo bo'i khyim na ji yang mi bdog na/_khyod kyis bdag blangs te ci bgyi/_bdag pha ma'i khyim du slar mchi'o/_/'on kyang bdag gis 'tshal ma bde blag tu 'tshal du mchis 
[\[86b.3\]]so/_/bram zes smras pa/_bzang mo mi dga' bar ma byed cig_/bdag cag bram ze rnams la slong mos 'tsho ba yang yod kyis/_bdag yul gzhan du song la nor btsal te/_phyir 'ong ngo zhes byas nas/_chung ma la brgyags phogs te song ngo /_/de song nas kAr ShA pa Na 
[\[86b.4\]]mang po zhig rnyed nas de dag khyer te/_mnyan du yod par chas pa las/_de lam du mi rgod kyis bcom nas de shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur te/_gal te bdag khyim du song na ni bram ze mo dang 'thab mo chen po 'byung bar 'gyur gyis/_bdag gis 'tsho ba 'di lta bu btang la/_
[\[86b.5\]]nags khung thibs por song ste/_bdag 'chi bar bya'o snyam nas/_de nags khung thibs por song ste/_shing ka nas thag pas btags nas/_'gag par byas pa las/_de'i skabs su bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_bram ze 'di nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_
[\[86b.6\]]nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba zhig na/_'di lta bu'i gzu lums byed cing 'dug go snyam du dgongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar gyur te/_nags khung thibs po der gshegs nas/_bcom 
[\[86b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bram ze de la bka' stsal pa/_bram ze gzu lums ma byed cig_/ngas khyod la nor sbyin no zhes bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la gter bstan te/_bram ze khyod kyi nor 'di yin gyi srog phangs pa ma dor cig ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das slar 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]gtsug lag khang du gshegs so/_/de nas bram ze des nor de dag khyer te rang gi khyim du song nas/_de khyim gyi 'byor pa rgyas par byas te bzhag nas sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa la zhugs so/_/de nas phyi zhig na de'i blo skyes pa/_dge sbyong gau tam ni 
[\[87a.2\]]bdag la phan pa dang dben pa yin gyis/_bdag khyim na gnas pa btang la/_de'i thad du rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam ste/_khyim gyi 'khor btang nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir 
[\[87a.3\]]spyan sngar 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_shes pa dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na bram ze des stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du/_'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye 
[\[87a.4\]]shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[87a.5\]]to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog 
[\[87a.6\]]ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/_de la lung yang phog ste/_des kyang brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[87a.7\]]'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bram ze 'di dbul bas 'jigs nas/_bdag nyid 'gum par bgyid pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis nor gyi phung po chen po dang sprad de/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang /_bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang bram ze 'di dbul bas 'jigs nas/_bdag nyid 'chi bar byas pa las/_ngas nor gyi phung po chen po byin nas/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la ci ltar gnas par byas pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung 
[\[87b.2\]]ba 'das pa'i dus na/_grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po dbang chen sde zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom 
[\[87b.3\]]rkun dang /_nad dang /_mu ge med pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/_bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du chos bzhin du rgyal srid byed do/_/rgyal po de yang byams pa'i bdag nyid can 
[\[87b.4\]]snying rje dang ldan pa/_sems can la byams pa/_sbyin pa la dga' ba zhig ste/_de sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed de/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_sdug cing phongs pa dang bkren pa rnams la ci dang ci 'dod pa sbyin par byed do/_/bza' ba dang bca' ba mang po dag sta 
[\[87b.5\]]gon byas te/_srog chags nam mkha' la gnas pa dang /_chu na gnas pa dang /_thang la gnas pa rnams la sbyin par byed do/_/'jig rten dag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par byed do/_/de nas phyin cad bdag gis sems can rnams la thams cad sbyin no zhes dam 
[\[87b.6\]]bcas so/_/de nas chos bzhin du rgyal po byed pas/_mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang de la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba'i phyir brtson par byed de/_de dag gis dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par 'bebs shing 'bru rnams rgyas par byed do/_/rgyal po de'i 'dab 
[\[87b.7\]]kyi nyi 'og gi rgyal po ni/_chos ma yin pas rgyal po byed de/_shing sgrog dang /_rkang sgril dang /_lag sgril dang /_an pan gdags pa rnams kyis/_yul na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po la gnod pa byed de/_de'i mi rnams nan gyis dpya bla skyes rgyud mas 'jigs te/_rgyal po 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]dbang chen sde'i yul du dong ste 'khod do/_/de nas phyi zhig na nyi 'og gi rgyal po de blon po mang pos zhabs 'bring byas nas/_yul bltar song song ba las/_des bltas na grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_grong khyer dang /_nags khrod kyi grong dang /_tshong dus 
[\[88a.2\]]rnams stongs par mthong nas/_blon po rnams la kwa'i ci'i phyir yul stongs pa la thug par gyur ces dris nas blon po rnams na re/_lha rgyal po dbang chen sde'i yul 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang ldan la/_skye bo mang po de dag kyang dpya khral ma mchis 
[\[88a.3\]]pa dang 'dra bar 'khod pas na/_skye bo phal po che rnams der dong ste 'khod do zhes zer ro/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu nyi 'og gi rgyal po de khros nas/_dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te/_rgyal po dbang chen sde dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir drangs so/_/de nas rgyal po dbang chen sde 
[\[88a.4\]]nyi 'og gi rgyal po de khros nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te/_bdag dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir drangs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang blon po rnams bsogs te bsgo ba/_kye ngas ni tshe gcig gi 'tsho ba tsam gyi phyir sdig pa byed mi phod kyis/_gal te khyod yul phung 
[\[88a.5\]]bar 'gyur mi 'dod na ni/_nyi 'og gi rgyal po de la phyag 'tshol cig_/nga ni de la gnod pa byed mi phod do zhes byas nas/_tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_nags kyi nang na shing shun shar bu'i gos gyon cing /_/'bras bu za la gcan gzan dag dang 'grogs kyang bla'i/_/'jig rten pha rol 
[\[88a.6\]]dag gis 'dzem pa'i mi rnams kyis/_/rgyal srid dag gi phyir ni gsod dang bcing mi bya/_/de nas blon po rnams kyis bsams pa/_rgyal po 'di ni su la yang gsod mi phod de/_bdag cag kun med par gyur na mi rung gis/_bdag cag thams cad gyi na la sdug bsngal bar gyur pa 
[\[88a.7\]]bas ni/_bdag cag gis 'di gcig pu bor yang bla'o snyam nas de dag gis rgyal po bor te/_nyi 'og gi rgyal po de la babs so/_/de nas rgyal po dbang chen sdes kyang tshor te/_blon po 'di rnams kyis bdag bor ro snyam nas/_nags kyi nang du gnas bcas te/_de der song nas 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]rtsa ba dang 'bras bu za zhing 'dug go/_/de song ba'i 'og tu nyi 'og gi rgyal po de 'ongs nas yul mi rnams phab ste/_rgyal po de gar song zhes dris na/_blon po rnams na re lha bros lags so zhes zer ro/_/de nas nyi 'og gi rgyal pos yul de cham du phab ste/_dpa' bo thams cad 
[\[88b.2\]]kyi bya dgar bgo bsha' byas nas/_yul de nyid du btab ste 'dug go/_/de nas de'i tshe ri khrod kyi grong zhig na/_bram ze dbul po 'tsho bas phongs pa zhig gnas te/_mthar gyis de'i bu dang bu mo mang po btsas nas/_de gso ba mang la yul der mu ge yang byung nas/_de khyim gyi 
[\[88b.3\]]bza' mi rnams bskyang ma nus so/_/de nas bram ze des bA rA Na sI na rgyal po dbang chen sde zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_rgyal po de yang byams pa'i bdag nyid can/_snying rje dang ldan pa sems can la byams pa/_sbyin pa la dga' ba/_thams cad sbyin par byed pa zhig go zhes thos 
[\[88b.4\]]nas/_bdag de'i thad du 'gro bar bya'o/_/de'i thad du song ba dang bdag ni nor de las 'ong ngo snyam nas bA rA Na sIr song ngo /_/de der song nas rgyal po dbang chen sdes nags su gnas bcas so zhes thos so/_/de thos ma thag tu bram ze de shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur nas bsams 
[\[88b.5\]]pa/_bdag de'i thad du dka' thub kyi nags tshal du song ba dang /_de de na 'dug kyang bdag la nor sbyin par 'gyur yang srid do snyam nas/_sa phyogs gang na byang chub sems dpa' gnas pa der song ste/_de'i thad du song nas byang chub sems dpa' des de la tshig 'jam pos 
[\[88b.6\]]mgu bar byas te/_rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dag byin nas dris pa/_khyod 'dir ci la 'ong /_bram zes smras pa/_da ltar mu ge byung ste/_phongs shing gnod par gyur la/_bdag la gso ba yang mang na/_bdag gis de dag gso yang ma nus nas/_bdag gis thos na rgyal 
[\[88b.7\]]po dbang chen sde ni thams cad sbyin par byed do zhes thos nas/_de bdag gi nor gyi 'byung khung du 'gyur ro snyam ste/_khyod kyi thad du mchis so/_/byang chub sems dpa'as smras pa/_des nags kyi nang du gnas bcas so zhes khyod kyis ma thos sam/_da de la nor ga la yod/_
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]de nas de thos ma thag tu bram ze de re thag chad nas brgyal te sa la 'gyel to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'as de'i gdong du chu gtor te de bslang ngo /_/de nas des bsams pa bdag la 'tsho ba 'di lta bu ci dgos kyis bdag song la nags stug po'i nang du 
[\[89a.2\]]zhugs te/_'chi bar bya'o snyam nas thag pa khyer te nags stug po'i nang du zhugs nas shing ka nas thag pas btags te 'gag par byas pa las/_byang chub sems dpa'as mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu snying rje skyes nas/_des bsams pa gal te bram ze 'dis bdag 
[\[89a.3\]]khrid de dgra'i thad du song na ni des 'di la nor gyi phung po sbyin par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_bram ze de la smras pa/_bram ze gzu lums ma byed cig dang /_ngas khyod kyi dbul ba gcad par bya'o/_/bram ze khyod tshur shog_/nga phyin ka log tu dam por bcings la/_rgyal po che ge mo zhig gi 
[\[89a.4\]]thad du khrid de song shig dang /_des khyod la nor gyi phung po chen po sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/bram zes smras pa/_bdag ni khyod lta bu 'chings mi phod do/_/byang chub sems dpa'as smras pa/_the tsom med par gyis la nga chings la khrid de song shig_/de las thabs gud na ma mthong ngo /_
[\[89a.5\]]de nas bram ze na re khyod ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bgyi'o zhes bgyis nas/_bram ze des byang chub sems dpa' phyin ka log tu bcings nas khrid de bA rA Na sIr chas so/_/de nas de skye bo mang po de dag gis mthong nas ngo shes te/_de dag rgyal po'i thad du song ste gsol na/_de dag la rgyal 
[\[89a.6\]]po yid ma ches nas/_de gtad bzhin du rgyal po'i pho brang nas phyung ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i thad du song nas/_bram ze des/_byang chub sems dpa' dam du bcings te khrid de 'ongs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang dris pa 'di khyod kyis ga las khrid de 'ongs/_des smras pa/_
[\[89a.7\]]'di ni lha'i dgra lags te/_'di ni bdag gis dka' thub kyi nags tshal na gnas pa las mthus bzung nas khrid de mchis so/_/de nas rgyal pos bsams pa/_rgyal po 'di ni lus che zhing stobs che la/_bram ze 'di ni lus nyam chung bas na/_'dis 'di gzung bar ga la 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]nus te/_'di ni snying rje che la sems can la byams pas na/_'dis bdag gis bdag bcings nas/_'di la byin gor ma chag snyam ste/_bram ze de la smras pa/_bram ze 'di khyod kyis ji ltar bzung ba drang por smros shig_/de nas bram ze des rgyal po de la ji ltar gyur pa bzhin du bsnyad do/_/
[\[89b.2\]]de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po de dad par gyur nas sems can dag pa 'di lta bu la bdag gis gnod pa byas so snyam nas bdag nyid kyis bkrol te/_rgyal po'i pho brang du spyan drangs nas yan lag thams cad kyis 'khyud de/_seng ge'i khri'i steng du bzhag nas/_cod pan gyi thabs bud 
[\[89b.3\]]de/_byang chub sems dpa'i dbu la btags nas smras pa/_khyod ni rgyal po'i 'os lags kyi/_bdag ni 'os ma lags so zhes byas nas/_des de la dpung gi tshogs dang /_dkor mdzod rnams phul nas bzod pa gsol te rang gi yul du song ngo /_/de nas rgyal po dbang 
[\[89b.4\]]chen sdes/_bram ze de la nor gyi phung po chen po byin nas/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas par byas so/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe rgyal po dbang chen sder gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe bram zer gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/_bram ze 
[\[89b.5\]]'di kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'di dbul bas 'jigs pas/_bdag nyid 'chi bar byas pa las/_ngas nor gyi phung po chen po byin nas/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas par byas so/_/da ltar yang 'di dbul bas 'jigs pas/_bdag nyid 'chi bar byas pa las/_
[\[89b.6\]]ngas nor gyi phung po chen po byin nas/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang /_bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do//_//rngon pa zhes bya ba ni/_bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hAr ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/_rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas rgyal po'i khab kyi 
[\[89b.7\]]'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe lhas byin ni rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po la rtag tu nyes pa byed de gang dang gang la nyes pa byed pa de dang de/_bcom ldan 'das la nyes pas sting bar byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la chos gos snam sbyar gyon te/_dge slong su yang rung ba zhig grogs su khrid la/_rgyal po'i khab tu lam po che dang srang dang /_bzhi mdo dang sum mdo dag tu bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams la lhas byin nam/_
[\[90a.2\]]lhas byin gyi phyogs kyis su la nyes pa byas pa des sangs rgyas sam chos sam dge 'dun la 'dog par ma byed cig ces sgos shig_/gal te lhas byin ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no zhes zer na/_sngon ni rdzu 'phrul che na da ni de'i rdzu 'phrul nyams so/_/zhes gyis shig ces bka' 
[\[90a.3\]]stsal to/_/de nas kun dga' bo song ste/_rgyal po'i khab tu lam po che dang /_srang dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dag tu bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams la bsgo nas/_phyin cad bcom ldan 'das la nyes pas sting bar mi byed do/_/de nas phyi zhig na bcom ldan 'das 
[\[90a.4\]]bsnyung bar gyur nas/_sman pa 'tsho byed kyis bcom ldan 'das la sman mar lcags mda' zhes bya ba phul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed la bka' stsal pa/_'tsho byed ngo mtshar che'am/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che lags so/_/
[\[90a.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_'tsho byed rmad du byung ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rmad du byung lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'tsho byed khyod shes sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag 'tshal lags so/_bka' stsal pa/_'tsho byed khyod mi shes sam/_gsol pa bcom 
[\[90a.6\]]ldan 'das bdag ma 'tshal lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'tsho byed ci zhig ngo mtshar che/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das pa rnams rtswa za zhing chu 'thung la/_de dag las bdud rtsi 'di grub cing /_des sman mar lcags mda' zhes bgyi ba bsgral lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_
[\[90a.7\]]'tsho byed ci zhig rmad du byung /_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba las/_dam pa'i chos bstan pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi bsgrub pa bzang po 'byung lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'tsho byed khyod ci zhig shes/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das skyes slan 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]cad gdon mi 'tshal bar 'gum par 'tshal lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_'tsho byed khyod ci zhig mi shes/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das su gang du mchi ba de ma 'tshal lags so/_/de nas dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa/_sangs 
[\[90b.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa 'tsho byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs te gsungs pa rtogs pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis nga'i dgongs te gsungs pa/_
[\[90b.3\]]ci ltar rtogs pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_ri khrod kyi grong zhig na khyim bdag phyug cing /_nor mang la longs spyod che ba zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/
[\[90b.4\]]de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang khye'u zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du rgyas par sbyar nas/_rigs dang 'thun par ming btags so/_/
[\[90b.5\]]de'i 'og tu yang de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las bu zhig btsas te/_de'i yang btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming btags so/_/de nas des bsams pa bdag gi bu lon 'tshob pa dang /_nor spyod pa skyes zin gyi zong khyer la bdag yul 
[\[90b.6\]]gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas yang bsams pa bdag gi chung ma 'di byad gzugs bzang bas/_bdag gis 'di la kAr ShA pa Na mang po byin te song na ni/_skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig tu dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur yang srid kyis/_ma la bdag gis 'di la kAr ShA pa 
[\[90b.7\]]Na nyung zhig byin te 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/_des de la kAr ShA pa Na nyung ngu zhig byin nas/_de ma yin pa gser rnams ni bum pa'i nang du bcug ste/_bum pa'i mgrin pa mu tig gi phreng bas bcings nas/_dur khrod du shing rta rna zhes bya ba'i drung du sbas te bzhag nas zong khyer te yul 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]gzhan du song nas/_des der rnyed pa mang po grub nas des der yang chung ma blangs te 'dug nas de'i bu mang po btsas so/_/de nas chung ma snga ma gdu bu zhes bya bas lag 'ongs dang /_des nye dus bshugs pa tsam gyis bu gnyis gsos mnags nas/_bu gnyis 
[\[91a.2\]]kyis smras pa/_bdag cag gnyis kyi pha gar song /_mas smras pa/_bu yul ga ge mo zhig na gnas che ge mo zhig na 'dug ste/_de nor phun sum tshogs pa chen po dang ldan zhes kyang grag gis/_der song shig dang gal te na khyed kyi 'tsho ba'i thangs cung zad sbyin yang srid do zhes byas 
[\[91a.3\]]so/_/de nas phu bo shos pha tshol du song ba las de lam nas lam du 'khor 'khor te/_mthar gyis pha'i drung du phyin nas/_phas bzhin gyi gzugs las ngo shes nas skad phyung ste smras pa/_khyod ga las 'ongs/_da gar 'gro zhes byas nas des rgyas par bsnyad do/_/de nas phas 
[\[91a.4\]]bsams pa/_'di ni bdag gi bu de kho na yin no snyam nas/_des de bdag gi thad du bzhag nas bsgo ba/_bu khyod kyis su la yang bdag gi pha yin zhes ma zer cig ces byas nas/_des de la byams par gyur to/_/de nas bu gzhan rnams kyis yab khye'u 'di su'i lags/_phas smras pa/_
[\[91a.5\]]nga'i mdza' bo'i bu yin no/_/de nas de dag gis bsams pa/_'di ltar 'di las shin tu byams pa las na/_'di nyid kyi bu yin gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas de dag gcig la gcig smras te/_'di ni bdag cag gi phu bo yin no zhes zer ro/_/de nas phas bsams pa/_
[\[91a.6\]]dgra'i nang na ni 'di lta ste/_mas dbyen 'di ma rung ba yin te/_'di bsad du 'ong gis phyir btang ngo /_/de lta mod kyis gal te bdag gis cung zad cig 'di la byin na yang ltod pa can yin pa'i phyir lam du bsad du 'ong na/_ma la bdag gis 'di phyir btang ngo snyam nas/_yi ge zhig bris 
[\[91a.7\]]te byin pa/_gnas nas shar phyogs logs su dpag tshad gcig tsam na/_/grong nas grong du mgyogs kyi rna ba'i shing drung na/_/thabs la mkhas pa bag dang ldan pas brkos nas kyang /_/bdag dang nor skal gcig pa khyod kyis gsol bar gyis/_/mgul na 'dug pa gang yin 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]de ni gdu bur byin zhes zer ba zhig yi ger bris nas byin te/_des yi ge de khyer nas chas te song ba las/_nu bo rnams kyis lam du bzung ste/_pha las khyod kyis ci thob ces smras so/_/des smras pa/_ci yang ma thob ste/_yi ge 'di byin par zad do zhes byas so/_/de nas de 
[\[91b.2\]]dag na re 'di ni phas brid pa lta ste song shig ces byas nas de btang ste/_mthar gyis rang gi khyim du phyin nas/_re zhig ngal so shing /_'dug 'dug nas mas smras pa/_khyod kyis pha las ci thob/_bus smras pa/_ci yang ma thob mod kyi/_yi ge 'di lta bu zhig thob bo/_/mas 
[\[91b.3\]]smras pa/_bu khyod phas brid de/_lam gyi tshegs byung ba kho nar zad de ci yang ma grub bo/_/bus smras pa/_yul de ni che ba yin te/_bdag 'drid par mi byed do zhes byas nas/_de yi ge de dpyod pa la zhugs te/_grong nas zhes bya ba ni gang du skyes pa de yin te/_de ni 'dir 
[\[91b.4\]]grong zhes bstan to/_/grong du zhes bya ba ni gang du phyung ste/_bsreg pa'i sa yin no/_/mgyogs kyi rna ba'i shing gi drung zhes bya ba la mgyogs zhes bya ba ni rta yin te/_de ni rna ba'i shing zhes bya ba ni rta rna zhes bya ste/_shing rta rna'i drung la bya'o/_/gnas nas shar phyogs logs 
[\[91b.5\]]su zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs yin no/_/dpag tshad gcig tsam na zhes bya ba de ni dpag tshad gcig kho na la bya'o/_/des tshigs su bcad pa de lta bur dpyad nas/_mtshan mo mi mi rgyu ba'i tshe dur khrod du song nas/_de'i 'dab na rta rna zhes bya ba'i shing zhig 'dug ste/_des de'i 
[\[91b.6\]]shar phyogs logs su bcal te gnya' shing gang tsam tshun cad brkos pa dang /_re zhig na gser gyi bum pa mgrin pa mu tig gi phreng bas bcings pa zhig mthong nas/_de dga' ches te de blangs nas khyim du song ste/_mu tig gi phreng ba bkrol nas ma gdu bu la byin no/_dge 
[\[91b.7\]]slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'tsho byed 'di kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'dis nga'i dgongs te gsungs pa rtogs so/_/da ltar yang 'dis nga'i dgongs te gsungs pa rtogs 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]so/_/de nas 'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni rdo rje lta bu'i sku mnga' la sku che bas na/_sman mar nyung ngus 'di gso bar mi nus so snyam ste/_des brtags nas sman mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis srang la bcal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi skur 
[\[92a.2\]]gsol te/_lhung bzed kyi lhag ma ni dge slong rnams la bstabs pa las/_bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed kyi lhag ma'o snyam nas/_dge slong rnams kyis btud cing btung ngo /_/de nas lhas byin gyis bsams pa/_bdag gis kyang sman mar btung ngo snyam nas/_des 'tsho 
[\[92a.3\]]byed la dris pa/_'tsho byed dge sbyong gau ta mas sman mar ci zhig 'thungs/_'tsho byed kyis smras pa/_srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gsol to/_/lhas byin gyis smras pa/_ngas kyang srang sum cu rtsa gnyis btung ngo /_/'tsho byed kyis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das ni rdo rje lta bu'i sku mnga' 
[\[92a.4\]]la sku che bas na/_sman mar de snyed gsol ba dang /_'ju bar spyod kyis khyod kyis ni 'ju bar mi nus so/_/lhas byin gyis smras pa/_nga yang rdo rje lta bu'i lus can yin na/_ci'i phyir 'ju bar mi nus zhes byas nas/_des kyang srang sum cu rtsa gnyis 'thungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[92a.5\]]kyis ni zhu bar gyur/_lhas byin gyis ni zhu bar ma gyur to/_/de nas phyi nyin yang 'tsho byed kyis bcom ldan 'das la sman mar 'bras chan gyi khu ba dang sbyar ba gsol to/_/lhas byin gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol pas/_nga rgyal gyi dbang gis ma zhu bzhin du sman mar 'bras 
[\[92a.6\]]chan gyi khu bar sbyar te 'thungs pas/_zug gzer gyis btab ste/_gnad la bab pa'i na tshas thebs nas/_gzhi des sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong nas/_nyin mtshan du gnyid kyang mi log par gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[92a.7\]]kun dga' bo ni/_phu nu bo la byams te des gtam de/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag glang po che'i sna lta bu 'khor lo dang /_bkra shis dang /_g.yung drung ris dang ldan pa/_bsod nams brgya phrag du ma las byung ba 'jigs pa thams cad 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]dbugs 'byin par byed pa'i phyag brkyang ste/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las thal nas lhas byin gyi mgo la bzhag ste/_bden pa bskul ba mdzad pa/_bden pa gang gis nga'i bu gcig pa sgra gcan zin bzang po sdug gu la ci lta ba bzhin du sems lhag chad med par lhas byin la yang de 
[\[92b.2\]]kho na bzhin du sems na/_bden pa des 'di'i nad zhi bar gyur cig ces gsungs nas/_bden pa bskul ba de kho na'i mod la lhas byin gyi nad zhi bar gyur te/_srog yal ba las phyir thob par gyur to/_/de nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag mthong nas ngo shes te/_des bsams pa 
[\[92b.3\]]'di ni dge sbyong gau ta ma'i lag pa yin no snyam nas/_de yun ring po nas sems kyi rgyud g.yo sgyus bsgrubs pa'i rgyags pas gos shing dbang du byas pas na/_de ltar sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid kyis nad zhi bar byas kyang /_'di skad du don grub khyod kyis sman dpyad legs par lobs te/_
[\[92b.4\]]'dis ni khyod 'tsho ba rnyed par nus so zhes zer ro/_/de nas 'khor na 'khod pa rnams kyis sgra bsgrags pa/_lhas byin nad tshabs chen pos gzir te srog yal ba la/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa bskul bas sos par mdzad do zhes 'dzer to/_/lhas byin gyi phyogs su shin tu 
[\[92b.5\]]zhen zhen pa rnams kyis kyang de thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo mtshar che bar brjod do/_/kye ma 'di'i byams pa ni yang dag par phun sum tshogs par gyur to/_/kye ma sems can rnams la snying rje bsgoms so zhes 'dzer to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis lhas byin la smras pa/_lhas 
[\[92b.6\]]byin khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sos par mdzad do/_/gyin da srog dang bral zin to/_/lhas byin gyis smras pa/_'di ni yid sgyur bar byed pa'i sgyu shes te/_des na 'jig rten thams cad zhi bar byed do/_/de nas de dag 'di ni drin du mi gzo ba dang /_byas pa mi tshor ba zhig go 
[\[92b.7\]]snyam ste/_dong nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_the tsom skyes te/_the tsom thams cad gcod pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa lhas byin drin du mi gzo ba dang /_byas pa mi tshor ba dang /_byas pa chud gson pa la gzigs/_
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang 'di ji ltar drin du mi gzo ba dang /_byas pa mi tshor ba dang /_byas pa chud gson par byed pa de nyon cig dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_yul bi 
[\[93a.2\]]de ha zhes bya ba na/_rgyal po dbang chen sde rgyal po byed de/_de'i tshe na gas khung dgon pa zhig na khron pa zhig yod de/_khron pa de'i nang du srog chags lnga lhung ste/_mi dang /_seng ge dang /_sbrul dang /_byi ba dang /_bya khra rnams so/_/rngon pa zhig kyang nags khung dgon pa de na 
[\[93a.3\]{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bshor zhing 'dug pa las/_skom zhing gdungs nas khron pa de'i drung du song ste/_des khron pa de'i nang du bltas na mi des mthong ma thag tu kus btab ste/_kye grogs po bdag cag gi skyabs gyis shig ces byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu rngon pa de yang de dag la 
[\[93a.4\]]snying rje skyes nas/_gal te bdag gis 'di rnams ma phyung na ni/_'di dag thams cad gyin da la 'chi bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/_des thag pa khyer te 'ongs nas de dag thams cad khron pa de'i nang nas bton to/_/de nas phyi zhig na rngon pa de [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor zhing nags khung du song 
[\[93a.5\]]ba las/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge des mthong nas/_seng ges rngon pa la smras pa/_grogs po khyod ci'i phyir nags khung 'di na rgyu zhing 'dug_/rngon pas smras pa/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bshor ba'i phyir bdag 'di na rgyu zhing 'dug ste/_bdag gi 'tsho ba 'di yin no/_/seng ges smras 
[\[93a.6\]]pa/_grogs po khyod nyon mongs par ma byed cig_/ngas khyod la drin lan glan par bya ste/_khyod 'di na 'dug na ngas nyin gcig bzhin du [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bzang ngo cog bsad de/_sha ji snyed dgos pa de snyed sbyin no zhes smras nas/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge song ste/_des nyin 
[\[93a.7\]]gcig bzhin du [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bzang ngo cog bsad nas/_mi de la sha mang po sbyin no/_/de nas phyi zhig na rngon pa des sha khur gyis bskyal te/_rang gi khyim du 'gro ba na/_de bya khra des mthong nas ngo shes te/_khra des rngon pa de la smras pa/_grogs po khyod dka' bas 'tsho ba 'di 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]lta bu zhig gis 'tsho zhing 'dug gam/_rngon pas smras pa/_bdag cag gi 'tsho ba ni 'di yin te/_thabs 'dis bdag 'tsho ba tshol lo/_/de nas khra des bsams pa/_mi 'dis sngon bdag gi srog phyung bas na/_'di la bdag gis drin lan bsab dgos so snyam nas/_
[\[93b.2\]]des smras pa/_grogs po khyod 'dir 'dug shig dang bdag gis khyod kyi dbul ba gcad par bya'o zhes byas nas song ngo /_/de nas khra des rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du song nas/_bdag gi 'dir ci zhig rnyed par gyur cig gu bdag gis de khyer nas mi de la sbyin par bya'o snyam ste/_steng 
[\[93b.3\]]gi nam mkha' la lding bzhin du bltas na/_de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang de na rgyal po dbang chen sde'i btsun mo dam pas rgyan thams cad bkrol nas gab tse'i nang du bzhag ste/_skra bkrus pa las khras rgyan rnams khyer nas mi de la byin te/_des khyer te rang gi khyim du chas pa las/_mi 
[\[93b.4\]]des mthong nas ngo shes te dris pa grogs po khyod kyis 'di ga las rnyed/_rngon pas de la smras pa/_khras bdag la byin no zhes smras nas/_rngon pa de bdag gi khyim du song ngo /_/de nas rgyal po dbang chen sdes/_bya ba thams cad la bsgo ba/_khyod deng la bya tshang thams cad du song 
[\[93b.5\]]ste/_rgyan de dag khyer te shog shig ces byas so/_/mi snga ma des kyang tshor nas bsams pa/_'dis bdag la lan gnyis khron par lhung ba las phyung na mi rung gis/_bdag rgyal po'i thad du song la gsol bar bya'o/_/'on kyang des bdag la bya dga' sbyin par 'gyur ro snyam 
[\[93b.6\]]nas/_mi de song ste rgyal po la gsol pa/_rngon pa che ge mo zhig gis lha'i rgyan rnams khyer ro zhes byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu de la bya dga' chen po byin no/_/de nas rngon pa de bkug ste/_rgyan rnams kyang phrogs nas khri mon du bcug go/_/de khri mon na 'dug pa na byi ba des 
[\[93b.7\]]mthong nas ngo shes te des bsams pa/_mi gang gis bdag gi srog phyung ba de ni 'di yin gyis/_'di la bdag gis drin lan bsab par bya'o snyam nas/_des smras pa/_grogs po khyod ci nyes te khri mon 'dir bcug_/de nas des de la rgyas par thams cad bsnyad do/_/de nas 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]byi ba des smras pa/_grogs po khyod brtan por mdzod la/_spro ba chen po bskyed cig dang /_ngas khyod 'di na 'dug pa'i tshe/_zas dang skom gyis mdo mi gzung bar bya'o zhes byas nas/_byi ba des mi de khri mon na 'dug pa de la zas dang /_skom gyis mdo mi 
[\[94a.2\]]gzung bar byas so/_/de nas phyi zhig na mi de khri mon na 'dug bzhin du/_sbrul gdug pa des srog gcig tu byas te/_'di la ngas drin lan glan par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_mi de la smras pa/_kye mi khyod ngas khri mon 'di nas thar bar byas te/_dbang phyug gi bdag po chen 
[\[94a.3\]]po la gzhag par bya'o zhes byas nas/_ngas rgyal po 'di dug gis zin par byas la/_de bdag gi dug gis ci bya gtol med par gyur pa dang /_de'i tshe khyod khri mon na 'dug pas/_rgyal po 'di gzhan sus kyang sos par byed mi nus te/_nga 'ba' zhig gis gso nus so zhes 
[\[94a.4\]]gyis shig_/de nas rgyal po des khyod dgug pa dang /_khyod der song la ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor gyis la/_me sbar te sngags 'di bzlas brjod gyis shig dang /_khyod kyi sgra thos pas nga 'ong gis khyod kyis nga 'ongs pa dang /_'di skad du/_yang na mer mchongs shig_/
[\[94a.5\]]yang na rgyal po'i dug med par gyis shig ces byos shig dang /_ngas khyod la 'di skad du bdag ni me'i nang du mchongs par bya'i/_rgyal po'i dug ni med par mi bya'o zhes bya'o/_/de nas khyod kyis nga la 'di skad du khyod kyis srog bor du zin kyang /_ngas kyang rgyal po'i srog mi gtong gi_/
[\[94a.6\]]khyod kyis rgyal po 'di'i dug med par mi byar mi rung ngo gyis shig dang /_ngas khyod kyi tshig gis rgyal po'i dug med par bya'o/_/'on tang de'i tshe rgyal po khyod la mnyes par gyur nas/_khri mon nas btang ste/_nor gyi phung po chen po sbyin par 'gyur ro zhes byas nas/_sbrul gdug pa de 
[\[94a.7\]]song ste rgyal po de dug gis zin nas/_rgyal po de ci bya gtol med par gyur nas/_rngon pa des btson srungs rnams la smras pa/_rgyal po 'di sus kyang dug med par mi nus te/_ngas 'di'i dug med par bya'o zhes byas so/_/de nas btson srungs rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]to/_/de nas rgyal pos mi de bkug ste smras pa/_kye gal te mi khyod kyis nga'i srog gi skyabs byed nus par gyur na/_ngas khyod la nor gyi phung po chen po sbyin no zhes byas so/_/de nas mi des smras pa/_lha brtan por mdzod la spro ba chen po bskyed cig dang /_bdag mchis bzhin 
[\[94b.2\]]du khyod grongs par mi 'gyur ro zhes byas nas/_mi des ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas nas/_me sbar te sngags brjod do/_/de nas de thos nas sbrul gdug pa de dkyil 'khor gyi drung du 'ongs te 'dug go/_/de nas mi des smras pa/_khyod ni 'di na 'dug pa don gnyis shig bya 
[\[94b.3\]]dgos te/_yang na ni rgyal po'i dug med par gyis shig_/yang na ni me'i nang du mchongs shig ces byas so/_/de nas sbrul gdug pas smras pa/_bdag ni 'di na 'dug pa don gnyis bya dgos pa las/_yang na bdag nyid gtang bar bya dgos so/_/yang na rgyal po bsad 
[\[94b.4\]]dgos so zhes byas nas/_sbrul gdug pa de mngon du phyogs shing 'dug pa las/_mi des bzlog ste smras pa/_khyod kyis srog bor du zin kyang ngas rgyal po'i srog mi gtang gis/_khyod kyis rgyal po 'di'i dug med par mi byar mi rung ngo zhes byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag 
[\[94b.5\]]tu sbrul gdug pa des rgyal po'i dug med par byas so/_/de nas rgyal po mnyes par gyur nas/_rngon pa de nor gyi phung po byin te btang ngo /_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe rngon par gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe 
[\[94b.6\]]mi'i rgyal po la gsol pa gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'di drin du mi gzo ba dang /_byas pa mi tshor ba dang /_byas pa chud gson par gyur to//_//las brgya tham pa/_bam po sum cu lnga pa/_rmongs pa zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod 
[\[94b.7\]]pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe yul shur par ka na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des/_thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_khye'u 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_ming rmongs pa zhes btags so/_/de nas khye'u rmongs pa 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_de gang 
[\[95a.2\]]gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_yi ge dang /_khong rtsis dang /_shod dgod pa dang /_lag rtsis dang /_dbyung ba dang /_sba ba dang /_dgram pa dang /_gos brtag pa dang /_nor bu brtag pa dang /_rin po che brtag pa dang /_spos brtag pa dang /_sman brtag pa dang /_glang po che brtag 
[\[95a.3\]]pa dang /_rta brtag pa dang /_go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te/_yi ge mkhas pa dang /_klog mkhas pa dang /_mdzangs pa dang /_bya ba la gsal ba dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_brtag pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na de'i lus shur bu yungs 'bru 
[\[95a.4\]]tsam sha stag gis khyab par gyur te/_shur bu de dag kyang smin te rdol nas/_de'i lus rmas zhu lub tu g.yogs par gyur to/_/de nas de'i phas sman pa thams cad las yo byad sbyar te gsos kyang /_de sos par byed ma nus nas/_de ci tsam du tshab che bar gyur pa de tsam du/_
[\[95a.5\]]lus las rnag khrag 'dzag ste/_dri nga ba byung ngo /_/de nas de'i lus thams cad spos chu sna tshogs kyis byugs te gos kyis g.yogs nas gso bar byed do/_/de nas de'i phu nu rnams kyis mthong nas ming spos te/_khye'u 'di'i lus gos dang /_rgyan rnams kyis g.yogs 
[\[95a.6\]]te gsos pas na/_'di'i ming sbas pa zhes bya'o zhes zer ro/_/de nas de la la las ni rmongs pa zhes bya bar shes so/_/la las ni sbas pa zhes bya bar shes so/_/de nas phyi zhig na de'i pha ma gnyis shi'o/_/pha ma gnyis shi nas las su bya ba thams cad khye'u des tshis 
[\[95a.7\]]byed de/_de las gang byed kyang rung /_zhing blas byed kyang rung /_tshong byed kyang rung /_gru'i las byed kyang rung /_de las byas so cog 'jig cing 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas khyim bdag rmongs pa de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis 'dir las gang byed kyang rung ste/_
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]zhing blas byed kyang rung /_tshong byed kyang rung /_gru'i las byed kyang rung /_bdag gi las byas so cog 'jig cing 'grub par mi 'gyur na/_'jig rten na mi 'jig pa'i chos gang 'jig par mi 'gyur ba 'ga' lta yod dam zhig gu snyam mo/_/de nas khyim bdag rmongs pa de'i mdza' bo dang /_
[\[95b.2\]]grogs po dang phu nu dang /_rgan rabs rnying gi sngon gyi lha zhig khyim bdag rmongs pa'i khyim gyi sgo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_khyim de thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/_khyim bdag rmongs pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag khyod kyis 'jig rten na 'jig 
[\[95b.3\]]pa'i chos can gang yin pa dang /_'jig pa'i chos can ma yin pa gang yin pa mi shes sam/_khyim bdag gis smras pa/_lha bdag gis ni 'jig rten na 'jig pa'i chos can gang yin pa dang /_'jig pa'i chos can ma yin pa gang yin pa mi shes na/_lha khyod kyis 'jig 
[\[95b.4\]]rten na 'jig pa'i chos gang yin pa dang /_'jig pa'i chos can ma yin pa gang yin pa shes sam/_lhas smras pa/_khyim bdag ngas kyang 'jig rten na 'jig pa'i chos can gang yin pa dang /_'jig pa'i chos can ma yin pa gang yin pa mi shes so/_/khyim bdag gis smras pa/_
[\[95b.5\]]lha 'o na 'jig rten na 'jig pa'i chos can gang yin pa dang /_'jig pa'i chos can ma yin pa gang yin pa sus shes/_lhas smras pa/_khyim bdag shes pa yod de/_dge sbyong gau ta ma shAkya'i bu/_shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs te/_chos gos tshon can rnams 
[\[95b.6\]]bgos nas/_yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/_des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_bcom ldan 'das des ni 'jig rten na 'jig pa'i chos can gang yin pa dang /_'jig pa'i chos 
[\[95b.7\]]can ma yin pa gang yin pa mkhyen to/_/khyim bdag gis smras pa/_lha bcom ldan 'das de da ltar ga la bzhugs/_lhas smras pa/_khyim bdag shar phyogs kyi ljongs na/_yul mnyan du yod pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de'i nang na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_da ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhugs kyis/_khyim bdag khyod 'dod na/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song la der phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la don 'di dris la/_bcom ldan 'das des khyod la ji skad du lung bstan 
[\[96a.2\]]pa de bzhin du zung shig ces smras nas/_lha de de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu khyim bdag rmongs pa bcom ldan 'das la blta 'dod par gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na yul shur par ka'i tshong pa mang po de dag zong khyer te/_mnyan du yod par dong nas/_de 
[\[96a.3\]]dag der dong bas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed par gyur te/_skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs nas/_de dag phyi zhig na zong dang rin rnams khyer te yul shur pa ra kar 'ongs nas/_de dag gis khyim bdag rmongs pa'i mdun du/_sangs 
[\[96a.4\]]rgyas dang chos kyi bsngags pa brjod do/_/'di skad ces kyang smras te/_bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa yin gyi/_de blta ba'i phyir khyod song shig dang /_des khyod kyi lus dang sems kyi nad gso bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas des tshig de thos nas lhag 
[\[96a.5\]]par yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du bltar 'gro ba'i spro ba skyes so/_/de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag rmongs pas rgyags mang po khyer te/_bzhon pa bzang po la zhon nas yul shur pa ra ka'i sa nas bar zhag gis mnyan du yod par phyin te/_de ji srid du bzhon du rung ba'i sa de srid du 
[\[96a.6\]]bzhon pas song nas/_bzhon pa las babs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_khyim bdag rmongs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[96a.7\]]skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ni rnag can gyi lus 'di dman par gyur pa/_ngo tsha bar gyur pas na spang bar 'tshal lo/_/smad par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag lus 'di ni nad lta bu yin no/_/phol mig lta bu yin no/_/zug 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]rngu lta bu yin no zhes bka' stsal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis phung po 'di nyid las brtsams nas/_de la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na khyim bdag rmongs pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du/_'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes 
[\[96b.2\]]bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas bsams pa/_gal te bdag gi lus 'di kho na lta bur ma gyur na/_bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ste/_chu bo rnams las yang dag par 
[\[96b.3\]]brgal bar bya ba dang /_sbyor ba rnams las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/_brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad par bya ba zhig gu snyam mo/_/de ltar rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu khyim bdag de'i lus lag mthil bzhin du rma med par gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[96b.4\]]de lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das la dga' bar gyur to/_/de nas de dga' bar gyur nas stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[96b.5\]]btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur 
[\[96b.6\]]shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog ste/_des kyang brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dgra bcom pa khams 
[\[96b.7\]]gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /_so 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /_gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rmongs pa snga dro sham 
[\[97a.2\]]thabs dang chos gos gyon te/_lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song ba las/_ba drus mas brdungs te bsad nas/_de 'chi kar dbang po rnams rnam par dang zhing /_bzhin gyi mdog yongs su dag pa la pags pa'i mdog dkar por gyur to/_/de nas dge 
[\[97a.3\]]slong mang po snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gyon te/_lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la dong ba las dge slong mang po mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la dong ba rnams kyis yul shur par ka'i khyim bdag rmongs pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/_ba drus mas brdungs 
[\[97a.4\]]te bsad nas de 'chi kar dbang po rnams rnam par dang zhing bzhin gyi mdog yongs su dag ste/_pags pa'i mdog dkar bar gyur to zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang dge slong mang po rnams mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms blangs te/_zan zos nas zas phyis len pa spangs nas/_lhung 
[\[97a.5\]]bzed dang chos gos bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_dge slong mang po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[97a.6\]]to/_/btsun pa 'di na bdag cag dge slong mang po snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos 'tshal te/_lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la mchis pa las/_yul shur par ka'i khyim bdag rmongs pa zhes bgyi ba de/_ba drus mas brdungs te bkum nas/_de 'gum 
[\[97a.7\]]kar dbang po rnams rnam par dang zhing bzhin gyi mdog yongs su dag ste/_pags pa'i mdog dkar par gyur to zhes thos lags na/_de'i 'gro ba ni gang lags/_de'i skye gnas ni gang lags/_'gro ba'i sa ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]dag rigs kyi bu de ni nga'i chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos rtogs pas na nor du gyur pa yin no/_/dge slong dag rigs kyi bu de mya ngan las 'das kyis/_'di'i rus bu la rus bu'i mchod pa gyis shig_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rmongs pa mchog tu gyur par lung 
[\[97b.2\]]bstan nas/_dge slong mang po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du mnyan te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas dong nas/_de dag gis de'i rus bu la rus bu'i mchod pa byas te/_rus bu'i mchod rten brtsigs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags 
[\[97b.3\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa rmongs pas las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas/_ba drus mas brdungs te bkum lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[97b.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di nyid kyis las de lta bu byas shing bsags pa'i steng du lhag par yang nga'i smon lam las gyur te/_puska ra'i sngon gyi rgyud las byung ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa rmongs pas las ci bgyis na/_
[\[97b.5\]]las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes lags/_las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas lus rma'i zhu lub tu yog par gyur te/_'di'i lus las rnag khrag 'dzag cing 'di'i lus las dri nga ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/_'dis bcom 
[\[97b.6\]]ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes par ma bgyis nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis te/_rab tu byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu/_de'i lus la rma ma mchis par 
[\[97b.7\]]gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/_'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/_phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_las dge ba dang /_mi dge ba byas shing 
[\[98a.2\]]bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/lus can dag gi las rnams ni/_/bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge 
[\[98a.3\]]slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/_de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag gnyis shig gnas pa las de gnyis phan tshun 'gras nas/_de'i nang nas gcig gis rgyal po la nor mang po zhig phul te/_
[\[98a.4\]]khyim bdag cig shos rgyal po la brnyas nas de rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis shags 'gyed pa'i tshe g.yo shags kyis pham par byas nas khyim bdag de la byin te/_des de rang gi khyim du khrid nas lcag gis zhen par gzhus nas/_lcag rma de dag gi nang du dug gi phye mas gtor te/_
[\[98a.5\]]de'i lus de sha snag bu bzhin du gyur nas/_de phu nu rnams kyis nor mang po zhig gis blus te/_sman pa'i lung gis de'i lus sos par byas so/_/de nas phyi zhig na de skyo ba skyes nas bdag khyim na gnas pas chog gis/_dka' thub kyi nags tshal du 'gro'o snyam ste/_sbyin bdag 
[\[98a.6\]]sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas/_dka' thub kyi nags tshal du rten bcas so/_/de der song nas slob dpon med pa dang /_man ngag med par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dran par byas nas/_rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas des 
[\[98a.7\]]bsams pa/_khyim bdag des bdag gi rgyud las bsod nams ma yin pa chen po bskyed kyis/_bdag song la khyim bdag de'i ra mda' bya'o snyam nas/_gnas de nyid nas nam mkha' las khyim bdag de ga la ba der song nas/_'bar ba dang /_lam mer 'dug pa dang /_char 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]'bab pa dang /_glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan to/_/so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par 'gyur te/_de sdong po sog les bcad pa bzhin du de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_smras pa/_skal ba chen po mar spyon/_bdag nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las 
[\[98b.2\]]lag nas drang du gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas de kho na la snying brtse ba'i phyir sa la babs nas/_des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_bzod pa gsol nas smras pa/_'phags pa khyod kyang bsod snyoms bzhed la/_bdag kyang bsod nams 'tshal bas/_bdag gi skyed mos 
[\[98b.3\]]tshal 'di nyid du bzhugs shig dang /_bdag gis yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/_/de nas rang sangs rgyas des khyim bdag de la cang mi smra bas gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des rang sangs rgyas de'i phyir yal ga dang lo ma'i spyil po phub nas/_yo byad thams 
[\[98b.4\]]cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed pa la zhugs so/_/de nas phyi zhig na rang sangs rgyas des bsams pa/_bdag gis rnag can gyi lus 'dis bya ba gang yin pa de ni bdag gis byas zin gyis/_ma la bdag zhi ba'i dbyings su 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/_'bar ba dang /_lam mer 'dug 
[\[98b.5\]]pa dang /_char 'bab pa dang /_glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan nas/_phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas khyim bdag des de'i sku gdung la mchod pa byas nas/_sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs 
[\[98b.6\]]te/_mchod rten de la bkur sti chen po byas nas/_smon lam btab pa/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog shig_/'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston 
[\[98b.7\]]pa mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/yon tan 'di lta bu dag kyang bdag gis thob par shog shig_/bdag gis 'di la gnod par byas pa'i las de bdag la 'ong bar ma gyur cig_/ci ste las 'di'i rnam par smin pa bdag la gdon mi 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]za bar 'ong bar gyur na yang /_rab tu byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu/_bdag gi bkra mi shis pa de med par gyur te/_bkra shis pa 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe khyim bdag tu gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 
[\[99a.2\]]rmongs pa 'di kho na yin te/_des khyim bdag de'i lus la lcag gis gzhus nas/_dug gi phye mas gtor ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der lus 'di lta bur gyur to/_/des phyir yang rang sangs rgyas de la bkur sti byas nas/_smon 
[\[99a.3\]]lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/_dge slong dag nga rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa nga lta bu 'dis mnyes par byas te/_mi 
[\[99a.4\]]mnyes par ma byas la/_rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu de'i bkra mi shis pa med par gyur nas/_bkra shis pa byung bar gyur te/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/gzhan 
[\[99a.5\]]yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung ste/_der 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to//_//bram ze gsum zhes bya ba de la/_bram 
[\[99a.6\]]ze dang po ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze zhig gis mchod sbyin bya bar brtsams te/_mchod sbyin byed pa der rgyal khams tha dad pa'i bram ze rnams 'dus par gyur te/_de dag gis bsams pa/_mchod sbyin byed pa gang du 
[\[99a.7\]]'thab mo dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'gyed pa dang /_rtsod pa 'byung ba'i mchod sbyin de ni mi 'grub bo snyam mo/_/de nas phyi zhig na mchod sbyin byed pa der ljongs na gnas pa'i bram ze dang /_mthil na gnas pa'i bram ze yon gyi phyir 'dus pa rnams 'thab mo byung nas/_mthil 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams kyis smras pa/_khyed ni zhing blas kyis 'tsho ba tshol ba yin pas na/_yon 'di rnams ni khyod la 'os pa ma yin no/_/nged ni yon gnas yin pas na/_yon 'di rnams ni nged la 'os so zhes zer ro/_/ljongs na gnas pa rnams na re/_kye khyod rnams kyang 
[\[99b.2\]]rgyal po'i dpa' bo la bsten pa yin pas na/_khyod ni yon gyi gnas ma yin gyi nged ni yon gnas yin pas/_yon gyi 'os yin no zhes zer nas/_de dag der 'thab mo dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_'gyed pa dang /_rtsod pas g.yem spyo zhing 'khod pa'i skabs su/_bram ze gzhan zhig gis 
[\[99b.3\]]mchod sbyin byed pa'i gnas de nas gser dang /_dngul dang /_bza' ba dang /_bca' ba mang po khyer te bros pa las/_de bram ze de dag gis bzung nas khu tshur dang /_rdog pa dag gis shin tu zhen par brdegs te bor ro/_/de nas de brdegs btsogs pas 'chi bas 'jigs shing skrag nas/_
[\[99b.4\]]rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du zhugs so/_/de der zhugs nas/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyod lam mdzes shing sgra bskyungs te/_ca co med par 'khod pa mthong ngo /_/mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dga' bar gyur to/_/de dga' bar gyur nas 
[\[99b.5\]]bsams pa/_bdag bram ze byed pas chog gis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung bar bya'o snyam nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[99b.6\]]ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 
[\[99b.7\]]tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog ste/_des kyang brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_des dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas bsams pa/_bdag gis gdul bar bya ba 'ga' lta ci yod snyam ste/_des bltas na mchod sbyin gyi bdag po la sogs pa/_bram ze stong phrag mang po 'dul bar 'gyur ba 
[\[100a.2\]]mthong nas/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te/_gnas de nyid nas nam mkha' la mchod sbyin gyi gnas der song nas mchod sbyin gyi bdag po dang /_bram ze gzhan de dag gis dge slong de steng gi nam mkha' las 'ong ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de dag dge slong 
[\[100a.3\]]de la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur nas de rnams kyis pang gis 'khyud de stan la bzhag nas/_rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod do/_/de nas dge slong des de dag la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na mchod sbyin gyi bdag po dang /_
[\[100a.4\]]bram ze de dag gis stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /_chos la 'bab pa 
[\[100a.5\]]dang /_dge 'dun la bab par byas te bkod do/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bram ze 'dis las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas 'dis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/_mi mnyes par ma bgyis 
[\[100a.6\]]la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/_/gsol pa/_'dis smon lam gang du btab lags/_
[\[100a.7\]]dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na bram ze zhig gnas pa las/_gtan tshigs snga ma bzhin du gyur te/_rab tu byung nas des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi kar smon lam 
[\[100b.2\]]btab pa/_'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la/_tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang /_yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa 
[\[100b.3\]]gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/
[\[100b.4\]]dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe bram zer gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/_bram ze 'di kho na yin te/_des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/_'chi kar smon lam btab ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang 
[\[100b.5\]]yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na/_dge 
[\[100b.6\]]slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas la/_nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_
[\[100b.7\]]nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//bram ze gnyis pa ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze zhig gnas pa des/_thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/_phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu btsas te/_rigs dang 'thun par ming btags nas/_de 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying gus 
[\[101a.2\]]bskyed bsrings te/_gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_de yi ge bslabs so/_/bram ze rnams kyi lugs kyis na/_tshes brgyad dang bco lnga'i nyin par bsang bar byed de/_res 'ga' ni grong khyer ltar 'gro'o/_/res 'ga' ni mu stegs ltar 'gro ba'am/_lha ltar 'gro ba'am/_
[\[101a.3\]]yam sreg shing thur 'gro'o/_/de nas phyi zhig na bram ze'i khye'u des bsang dus la bab nas/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo /_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i nang na bzhugs shing chos ston te/_bram ze'i khye'u des thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[101a.4\]]'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[101a.5\]]kyis de'i rkyen dang 'tsham pa'i chos bstan nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la gnas par byas so/_/de nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam gyi mjug rdzogs par rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs nas/_
[\[101a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo /_/de nas phyi zhig na bram ze'i khye'u des mchod sbyin bya bar brtsams nas/_bram ze'i khye'u mchod sbyin gyi gnas na 'dug pas bsams pa/_gal te bcom ldan 'das 
[\[101a.7\]]mchod sbyin gyi gnas 'dir gshegs te/_longs spyod par mdzad cing /_bcom ldan 'das gral gyi gtso la bzhugs na mchod sbyin gyi gnas mdzes par 'gyur ro snyam nas des bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs te/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das mchod sbyin gyi gnas 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]'dir longs spyod cing gshegs par gyur cig ces bsams so/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u des sems bskyed ma thag tu/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te/_mchod sbyin gyi gnas su gshegs nas/_mi snang bar bram ze thams cad kyi 
[\[101b.2\]]gral gyi gtso la bzhugs so/_/bram ze'i khye'u des ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gral gyi gtso la bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bram ze'i khye'u des bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/_bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim 
[\[101b.3\]]par byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mchod sbyin gyi gnas de longs spyod nas/_mi snang bar bram ze thams cad la 'od zer btang nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshegs so/_/de nas bram ze de dag gis mchod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par mthong 
[\[101b.4\]]ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de dag na re bdag cag gi mchod sbyin grub po zhes zer ro/_/kha cig na re bdag cag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas su mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa byung ngo zhes zer ro/_/gzhan kha cig na re 'di tshangs pa ma yin gyis/_dbang phyug de bdag cag gi mchod sbyin gyi 
[\[101b.5\]]gnas su gshegs so zhes zer ro/_/gzhan kha cig na re 'di tshangs pa yang ma yin/_dbang phyug kyang ma yin gyis/_khyab 'jug de bdag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas 'dir byung ngo zhes zer ro/_/bram ze'i khye'u na re khyod rnams thams cad ni bslus pa yin te/_mchod sbyin gyi 
[\[101b.6\]]gnas 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das gshegs so zhes zer ro/_/de nas bram ze rnams bram ze'i khye'u la yid ma ches nas/_bram ze'i khye'us smras pa/_bdag gis sang nang par khyed kyi mngon sum du 'gyur bar bya'o zhes byas nas/_bram ze'i khye'u des phyi nyin bram ze thams cad 
[\[101b.7\]]'tshogs pa'i nang du/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa btsugs nas/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal logs su phyogs te/_thal mo sbyar nas sems bskyed de tshig tu smras pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ni 'di lta ste/_'das pa 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba ci yang mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_mi rtogs pa'am/_thugs su mi chud pa ci yang mi mnga' na/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /_thabs cig tu bdag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas 
[\[102a.2\]]'dir gshegs te longs spyod par gsol zhes byas so/_/de nas de skad ces brjod pa'i mod la/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong mang pos zham ring byas te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/_nam mkha' las mchod sbyin gyi gnas der gshegs te/_mi 
[\[102a.3\]]snang bar bram ze de rnams kyis gdan bshams pa la bzhugs nas/_bram ze'i khye'u des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mchod sbyin gyi gnas kyi dbus su bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[102a.4\]]'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byas so/_/de nas bram ze rnams na re khye'u 'di ni smyos te gcig pu ci yang bla zhing 'dug go zhes zer ro/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'us smras pa/_bdag ni smyos pa ma yin gyi/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong 
[\[102a.5\]]gi dge 'dun gyis zham ring byas te/_mchod sbyin gyi gnas kyi dbus na bzhugs so zhes byas so/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u des de skad brjod ma thag tu/_ci nas bram ze de dag thams cad kyis/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par/_mchod sbyin gyi gnas 
[\[102a.6\]]kyi dbus na bzhugs par mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bur bzhugs so/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u des 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par bza' ba dang /_bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te/_ci bzhed 
[\[102a.7\]]pa bstabs nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te/_bstsang sder ni gyu/_phyag ni bcabs par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u de la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/_gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/de nas bram ze rnams gzhi de las khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa chen po skyes te/_nged kyi phyir bza' ba dang bca' ba bshams pa de dag 
[\[102b.2\]]dge sbyong gau ta ma la byin no zhes zer zhing de dag khros pas bram ze'i khye'u de gsad par byas pa las bros te/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song na/_'on kyang bram ze'i khye'u de dag de'i phyi bzhin du 'brangs te/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar du song nas smras pa/_bdag cag gis 
[\[102b.3\]]'di rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gsad par mi nus te/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis yongs su gzung ba yin pa'i steng du/_rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis khrims bcas so snyam du rig nas phyir log go/_/bram ze'i khye'u de ni 'jigs shing skrag nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[102b.4\]]'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_khams dang /_shes pa dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud 
[\[102b.5\]]nas/_de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_de nas bram ze'i khye'u des stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_des bden pa mthong nas stan las 
[\[102b.6\]]langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten nas/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 
[\[102b.7\]]'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams las phyung ste/_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gom pa 'dor du stsal ba dang /_'khor ba'i mthas gtugs pa dang /_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho rnams skams pa dang /_rus pa'i ri bo rnams las bsgral ba dang /_thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/_bdag cag la phas kyang ma bgyis/_mas kyang ma bgyis/_rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/_lha rnams 
[\[103a.2\]]kyis kyang ma bgyis/_nang mi dang gnyen mang po rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/_dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags so/_/btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen 
[\[103a.3\]]par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/_de la lung yang phog 
[\[103a.4\]]ste/_des kyang brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bram ze'i khye'u 'di bram ze 
[\[103a.5\]]rnams kyis 'gum par chad pa las/_de 'jigs shing skrag nas rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i 
[\[103a.6\]]dus na yang bram ze'i khye'u 'di bram ze 'di dag kho nas gsad par byas pa las/_'di 'jigs shing skrag nas rab tu byung ste/_'di ltar tshe gcig gi bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la 
[\[103a.7\]]skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de'i tshe bA rA Na sI na bram ze zhig gnas pa des/_thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las de la bu yang med/_bu mo yang med de/_phyi zhig na de'i lag pa 
[\[103b.2\]]la rkom tshugs bcas te/_bsam pa 'di ltar bdag gi khyim na nor dang /_gser dang ldan par 'dug kyang bu yang med/_bu mo yang med pas/_bdag shi ste dus las 'das pa'i 'og tu ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur la/_bdag la bu med pas 
[\[103b.3\]]'jig rten du yang rung bar mi 'ong ngo snyam nas/_sems khongs su chud nas 'dug go/_/de nas des 'di lta bur yi dam bcas te/_gal te bdag gi bu skyes par gyur na mchod sbyin du byas te/_bram ze rnams la yon mang po dbul bar bya'o zhes zer zhing de bu skyer re zhing 
[\[103b.4\]]'dug ste/_de ring ngam sang du bdag gi bu skye bar 'gyur ro snyam sems bzhin du/_de'i ngang du bram ze rgas nas bu yang med/_bu mo yang med par gyur to/_/de nas phyi zhig na bram ze des bsams pa/_bdag la bu yang med/_bu mo yang med pas/_sbyin pa gtong ba 
[\[103b.5\]]ma byas la bdag kyang rgas kyis/_da ni bdag gi bu skyes kyang rung /_mi skye yang rung ste/_sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas phyi zhig na des mchod sbyin byas te/_bram ze rnams la yon mang po phul bas/_yon de dag 'gyed pa'i tshe/_
[\[103b.6\]]'thab mo chen po byung ste/_mchod sbyin gyi bdag pos 'thab mo zhi bar bya'o zhes byas nas/_bram ze rnams kyis de nyid kyi steng du brgyugs te gsad do snyam pa las/_de 'jigs shing skrag nas drang srong smra ba'i gnas su song ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[103b.7\]]rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo /_/de der rab tu byung nas/_tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/_'chi kar smon lam btab pa/_'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la/_tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs ci yang ma thob kyis/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur 
[\[104a.2\]]cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe bram zer gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bram ze'i khye'u 'di kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang 'di bram ze rnams 
[\[104a.3\]]kyis gsad par byas pa las/_'di 'jigs shing skrag nas rab tu byung ste/_tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/_'chi kar smon lam btab ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[104a.4\]]ldan 'das de/_bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig_/de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na/_dge slong dag nga yang dag 
[\[104a.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang /_shin tu mnyam pa dang /_shugs mnyam pa dang /_mdzad pa mnyam pa dang /_thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/_'dis nga mnyes par byas te/_mi mnyes par ma byas la/_da ltar yang 'di bram ze rnams kyis gsad par byas
