[\[104a.6\]]pa las/_'di 'jigs shing skrag nas rab tu byung ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//_//bram ze gsum pa ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/_bram ze 
[\[104a.7\]]zhig gis mchod sbyin byas nas/_gser dang dngul mang po bram ze rnams la yon du phul ba las/_de dag yon 'gyed pa'i tshe/_'thab mo chen po byung nas/_der ljongs na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams na re/_khyed ni rgyal po'i dpa' bo rnams la brten pa yin gyi/_nged 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]ni yon gnas yin te/_yon dbul ba'i 'os yin pas na/_yon nyi rim du dbang ngo zhes zer ro/_/mthil na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams na re/_khyod ni zhing blas kyis 'tsho ba tshol ba yin gyi/_nged ni yon gnas yin te/_yon dbul ba'i 'os yin pas na/_yon nyi rim du dbang ngo 
[\[104b.2\]]zhes zer ro/_/de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro ba lngar 'gro ba 
[\[104b.3\]]las rnam par grol ba/_skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_yang dag pa'i 
[\[104b.4\]]seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa rnams ni/_chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs shing 'dug_/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su 
[\[104b.5\]]ni phongs pa dang /_nyam nga ba dang /_gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa dang /_'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag 
[\[104b.6\]]nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las/_'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge 
[\[104b.7\]]ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las/_ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu dang bcas par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams 'dul ba'i dus la bab par dgongs nas dge slong mang pos zham ring byas te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du 
[\[105a.2\]]bdar nas/_sa de nyid nas nam mkha' las mchod sbyin gyi gnas der gshegs te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs te/_de mthong ma thag tu de rnams bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/dga' bar gyur nas chos mnyan pa'i 
[\[105a.3\]]phyir spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de dag la bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag chad pa drag po rnam pa lnga'i gzhir 'gyur ba'i 'thab mo'i rtsa ba 'di'i phyir 'thab tu ci yod ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chags pa de nyid spangs pa las 
[\[105a.4\]]brtsams nas/_de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na bram ze brgya phrag du ma dag gis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du/_kha cig gis ni dro bar gyur pa bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni spyi bo dang bden pa dang 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang /_'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog dang mthong ba'i 
[\[105a.5\]]snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni rab tu 
[\[105a.6\]]byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i sa bon bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni brgya byin du 'gyur ba dang /_kha cig gis ni tshangs par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[105a.7\]]kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /_kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed do/_/'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol/_chos la 'bab/_dge 'dun 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]la bab par byas te bkod nas/_gtsug lag khang du gshegs so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bram ze 'di rnams kyis las ci bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das mnyes par 
[\[105b.2\]]bgyis te/_mi mnyes par ma bgyis/_kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa nyid du mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la/_
[\[105b.3\]]'di rnams las kha cig ni dge bsnyen du gyur to/_/kha cig ni rab tu byung nas der de dag gi tshe gcig tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bsrungs te/_dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na/_da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to//_//las 
[\[105b.4\]]brgya tham pa/_bam po sum cu drug pa/_khyab 'jug ces bya ba ni/_bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hAr ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po dge slong stong dang thabs cig ste/_thams cad kyang sngon gyi ral pa can sha stag go/_/de dag thams cad 
[\[105b.5\]]kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_rang gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba/_yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas/_sems rnam par grol ba sha stag dang lhan cig tu yul ma ga d+hAr ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa 
[\[105b.6\]]las/_yul ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten rab brtan zhes bya ba na smyig ma'i nags khrod kyi rgyud thog thag gshegs nas/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rab brtan du byon nas/_ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten rab brtan gyi phyogs der bzhugs so/_/de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i 
[\[105b.7\]]rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po dge slong stong dang thabs cig tu yul ma ga d+hAr ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/_yul ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten rab brtan zhes bya ba na/_smyig ma'i nags khrod du byon to zhes 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]thos so/_/thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /_rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang /_shing rta khri nyis stong dang /_rgod ma stong brgyad brgya dang /_yul ma ga d+hA na gnas pa'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag stong phrag du ma dag dang thabs cig tu rgyal po'i khab nas 
[\[106a.2\]]byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ba las/_grong khyer gyi sgor byung ba na de'i mgo bo las cod pan lhung nas/_de 'di snyam du sems te bdag gis bcom ldan 'das blta ba ma legs pa zhig tu 
[\[106a.3\]]mi 'gyur grang snyam mo/_/de nas lha rnams kyis sbran pa/_'di ni legs par 'gyur te/_khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya ba ni legs par 'gyur ba yin no/_/de lta mod kyis khyod gang dag dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa de dag kha cig ni 
[\[106a.4\]]khri mon du bcug cing 'dug_/kha cig ni yul dag na 'dug gi_/rgyal po khyod kyis btson rnams gtang ba'i rigs so/_/ljongs dag tu yang dril bsgrags te/_de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir deng shig ces byas so/_/de nas 
[\[106a.5\]]de thos ma thag tu rgyal po gzugs can snying pos btson rnams btang nas/_yul na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po thams cad bsdus te/_skye bo phal po che de dag dang lhan cig tu yul ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten rab brtan zhes bya ba na/_smyig ma'i nags khrod kyi rgyud thog thag tu song nas/_
[\[106a.6\]]des rang gi dpung gi tshogs rnams la phyir bltas te/_des dmag tshogs chen po mthong nas rgyags pa skyes te/_byad gzugs dang mthu dbang nga dang mtshungs pa med do snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas de bas kyang 
[\[106a.7\]]ches blta na sdug pa dang /_ches byad gzugs bzang po'i rgyal po lnga brgya mngon par sprul nas/_de dag la chos ston cing bzhugs so/_/de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/_de ji srid bzhon pas 'gro bar 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]bya ba'i sa de srid du bzhon pa la zhon te song nas/_rgyal thabs rnam pa lnga ste/_gtsug tor dang /_gdugs dang /_ral gri dang /_nor bu dang /_rnga yab rnams dang /_lham khra bo rnams bzhag nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/_rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 
[\[106b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na/_rgyal po ches gzugs bzang zhing ches mdzes pa lnga brgya chos nyan cing 'khod pa mthong nas de'i byad gzugs kyis rgyags pa gang yin pa de med par gyur to/_/de nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te bdag gis bdag gi ming dang rus nas 
[\[106b.3\]]ma smos na/_bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis mi dgongs so snyam nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_rang gi 
[\[106b.4\]]ming rus lan gsum gyi bar du smos te/_btsun pa bdag ni yul ma ga d+hA'i bdag po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lags so/_/btsun pa bdag ni yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lags so zhes byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[106b.5\]]stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de ni de yin te/_khyod ni yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yin no/_/rgyal po chen po rang gi stan gang yin pa la 'dug cig_/de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[106b.6\]]zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/yul ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das dang mngon sum du yang dag 
[\[106b.7\]]par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/kha cig ni thag ring po zhig 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das mthong nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug go/_/de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_ci dge 
[\[107a.2\]]sbyong chen po de 'od srung gi thad na tshangs par spyad pa spyod dam/_'on te lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dge sbyong chen po'i thad na tshangs par spyad pa spyod zhig gu snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyi sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas/_
[\[107a.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_lteng rgyas gnas pa khyod kyis ci mthong na/_/'dir ni me spangs drang srong brtul zhugs spangs/_/'od srung khyod kyis sbyin sreg ci'i phyir spangs/_/don de nga la kun nas brjod par gyis/_/gsol pa/_'di na kha 
[\[107a.4\]]cig zas dang btung ba rnams/_/khu bcud 'khor dang bud med bsngags par bgyid/_/de rnams phung po'i dri ma mthong bas na/_/bdag ni mchod sbyin me la dga' ma mchis/_/bka' stsal pa/_khyod ni 'dod pa rnams la mi dga' zhing /_/zas skom stan rnams la yang mi dga' 
[\[107a.5\]]na/_/khyod ni ji ltar lha mi'i 'jig rten na/_/yid dga' 'od srung dris pa'i lan thob shig_/gsol pa/_phung po med pa zhi bcom ci yang med/_/'dod dang srid la ma chags gzhan mi 'gyur/_/gzhan gyis dkrir med go 'phang mthong bas na/_/bdag ni mchod sbyin me la 
[\[107a.6\]]dga' ma mchis/_/mchod sbyin rnams dang brtul zhugs me rnams kyis/_/grol bar 'gyur snyam bdag gi yid kyang rmongs/_/'chi 'pho ma mchis gnas mchog ma mthong bas/_/skye 'chi'i rjes 'brang bdag ni long bar gyur/_/mi mchog skyob pas legs gsungs 'dus 
[\[107a.7\]]ma byas/_/go 'phang de ni bdag gis da mthong ngo /_/thub pa rnam 'dren gau tam bden pa'i rtsal/_/khyod ni skye bo mang phyir byung ba lags/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab tu rnam par phye ba'i chos rnams la/_/gnas kyis gshegs su bab pa gang yin pa/_de ni khyod kyis 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]legs par bsams pa yin/_/khyod kyis gtan la phebs pas legs par 'ongs/_/'od srung 'khor rnams skyo ba rab bskyed cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_
[\[107b.2\]]shar phyogs kyi steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/_spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de/_'chag pa dang /_sdod pa dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal bar byed do/_/me'i khams la snyoms par 'jug par byed de/_tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can me'i khams 
[\[107b.3\]]la snyoms par zhugs pa'i lus las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs byung ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod ka dang /_shel gyi kha dog lta bu rnams byung ngo /_/cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par byed do/_/lus kyi stod nas ni me 'bar la/_lus 
[\[107b.4\]]kyi smad nas ni chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab bo/_/lus kyi smad nas ni me 'bar la/_lus kyi stod nas ni chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab bo/_/shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs su yang de dang 'dra bar byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od 
[\[107b.5\]]srung ral pa can gyis phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bzhi bstan nas/_rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa bsdus te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud 
[\[107b.6\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags so/_/bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa ni bdag gi ston pa lags so/_/bdag ni bde bar gshegs pa'i nyan thos lags so/_/
[\[107b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung de ni de yin no/_/de ni de yin te/_'od srung khyod kyi ston pa ni nga yin no/_/khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no/_/'od srung khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can rang gi stan 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug go/_/de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de dge sbyong chen po gau ta ma'i thad na tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa yin gyis/_dge sbyong chen po lteng rgyas 'od srung gi thad na tshangs par 
[\[108a.2\]]spyad pa spyod pa ni ma yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po gzugs ni skye yang skye la 'grib kyang 'grib ste/_de'i skye ba yang rig par bya dgos la/_'grib pa yang rig par 
[\[108a.3\]]bya dgos so/_/rgyal po chen po tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang skye yang skye la/_'grib kyang 'grib ste/_de'i skye ba yang rig par bya dgos la/_'grib pa yang rig par bya dgos so/_/rgyal po chen po gzugs skye ba dang /_
[\[108a.4\]]'grib pa'i chos can yin par rig nas/_gzugs de yongs su shes so/_/rgyal po chen po tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa yang skye ba dang /_'grib pa'i chos can yin par rig nas/_rnam par shes pa de yongs su shes so/_/rgyal 
[\[108a.5\]]po chen po gzugs yongs su shes na/_gzugs de la bdag gi bdag yin no snyam du 'dzin par mi byed/_len par mi byed/_gnas par mi byed/_mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/rgyal po chen po tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa 
[\[108a.6\]]yongs su shes na/_rnam par shes pa de la bdag gi bdag yin no snyam du 'dzin par mi byed/_len par mi byed/_gnas par mi byed/_mngon par zhen par mi byed do/_/rgyal po chen po gzugs la mi 'dzin/_mi len mi gnas/_mngon par zhen par mi byed na/_dpag 
[\[108a.7\]]tu med pa/_grangs med pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes nga zer ro/_/rgyal po chen po tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la mi 'dzin/_mi len mi gnas/_mngon par zhen par mi byed na/_dpag tu med pa/_grangs med pa/_mya ngan las 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]'das pa zhes nga zer ro/_/de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_ji ste gzugs bdag ma yin zhing /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa bdag ma yin na/_bdag gam sems can nam/_srog 
[\[108b.2\]]gam/_skye ba'am/_gso ba'am/_gang zag gam/_shed bu'am/_shed can nam/_byed pa'am/_byed pa po'am/_smra ba po'am/_tshor ba po'am/_skyed pa po'am/_kun tu skyed pa por su zhig 'gyur/_ma skyes shing /_ma byung la 'byung bar mi 'gyur na yang phung po 'di dag 
[\[108b.3\]]ni 'dor la/_phung po gzhan ni len par mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyi sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bdag bdag ces bya ba ni/_so so'i skye bo thos 
[\[108b.4\]]pa dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis so sor bzung bar zad kyi/_'di na bdag kyang med/_bdag gi yang med do/_/dge slong dag skye ba na/_sdug bsngal 'di nyid skye la/_'gag pa na sdug bsngal 'di nyid 'gag go/_/skye ba na 'du byed rnams nyid skye la/_'gag pa na 'du byed rnams 
[\[108b.5\]]nyid 'gag go/_/rgyu de dag dang rkyen de dag la brten nas/_sems can rnams kyi 'du byed kyi rgyud 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pas ni sems can rnams kyi 'du byed kyi rgyud kyi nying mtshams sbyor ba thugs su chud nas/_'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba 'dogs par 
[\[108b.6\]]mdzad do/_/lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sems can rnams 'chi 'pho zhing 'dug pa dang /_skye zhing 'dug pa dang /_kha dog bzang po dang /_ngan pa dang /_bde 'gror 'gro ba rnams dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba rnams dang /_sems can las ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[108b.7\]]'gro ba rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/kye sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa dang /_ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa dang /_yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa dang /_'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]dang /_log par lta ba dang /_log par lta ba'i las dang /_chos yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir rgyu de dang /_rkyen des lus dang bral te/_shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kye 
[\[109a.2\]]sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa dang /_ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa dang /_yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa dang /_'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang /_yang dag par lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i las 
[\[109a.3\]]dang /_chos yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir rgyu de dang rkyen des lus dang bral te/_shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag ngas de ltar shes shing de ltar mthong bas na/_nga ni 'di skad du/_nga ni bdag de yin no zhe'am/_nga ni 
[\[109a.4\]]sems can nam/_srog gam/_skye ba'am/_gso ba'am/_gang zag gam/_shed bu'am/_shed can nam/_byed pa'am/_byed pa po'am/_smra ba po'am/_tshor ba po'am/_skyed pa po'am/_kun du skyed pa po yin no zhes mi zer ro/_/ma skyes shing ma byung la 'byung bar mi 'gyur na yang /_phung 
[\[109a.5\]]po 'di dag ni 'dor la/_phung po gzhan ni len par mi 'gyur ro snyam du mi 'dzin to/_/chos kyi brda tsam ni ma gtogs so/_/de la chos kyi brda ni 'di lta ste/_'di yod na 'di 'byung la/_'di skyes pas 'di skye bar 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams 'byung /_
[\[109a.6\]]'du byed rnams kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa 'byung /_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs 'byung /_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug 'byung /_skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa 'byung /_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'byung /_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa 
[\[109a.7\]]'byung /_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa 'byung /_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa 'byung /_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba 'byung /_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig pa 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_'di med na 'di mi 'byung la/_'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed rnams 'gag_/'du byed rnams 'gags pas rnam 
[\[109b.2\]]par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag_/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/
[\[109b.3\]]sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas/_rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'gag 
[\[109b.4\]]par 'gyur te/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig pa 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de ltar na rgyu byung na/_sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur la/_rgyu 'gags na sdug bsngal 'gag par 'gyur te/_lam chad pas 'jug par mi 'gyur la/_
[\[109b.5\]]nying mtshams sbyor ba med pas 'gag par 'gyur te/_sdug bsngal gyi mtha' ni de kho na yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la lan gnyis su bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_gzugs rtag pa yin 
[\[109b.6\]]nam/_mi rtag pa yin/_gsol pa btsun pa de ni mi rtag pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal ba yin nam/_sdug bsngal ba ma yin/_gsol pa/_btsun pa de ni sdug bsngal ba lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_mi rtag cing sdug bsngal la/_
[\[109b.7\]]rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la ci thos pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos bdag tu 'dzin cing /_'di ni bdag gi yin no/_/'di ni bdag yin no/_/'di ni bdag gi bdag yin no snyam du 'dzin tam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]pa/_rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa rtag pa yin nam/_mi rtag pa yin/_gsol pa/_btsun pa de ni mi rtag pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal 
[\[110a.2\]]ba yin nam/_sdug bsngal ba ma yin/_gsol pa/_btsun pa de ni sdug bsngal ba lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_mi rtag cing sdug bsngal la/_rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la/_ci thos pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos bdag tu 'dzin cing /_'di ni 
[\[110a.3\]]bdag gi yin no/_/'di ni bdag yin no/_/'di ni bdag gi bdag yin no snyam du 'dzin tam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa de ni ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de bas na gzugs gang yang rung ste/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba nang gi'am/_
[\[110a.4\]]phyi rol gyi'am/_rags pa'am/_cha phra ba'am/_ngan pa'am/_bzang po'am/_nye ba'am/_ring ba gang yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni bdag gi yang ma yin/_de ni bdag kyang ma yin/_de ni bdag gi bdag kyang ma yin te/_de kho na ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag 
[\[110a.5\]]pa'i shes rab kyis blta bar bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa gang yang rung ste/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba nang gi'am/_phyi rol gyi'am/_rags pa'am/_cha phra ba'am/_
[\[110a.6\]]ngan pa'am/_bzang po'am/_nye ba'am/_ring ba gang yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni bdag gi yang ma yin/_de ni bdag kyang ma yin/_de ni bdag gi bdag kyang ma yin te/_de kho na ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du/_yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis blta bar bya'o/_/de ltar 
[\[110a.7\]]mthong ba'i thos pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos ni gzugs las skyo bar 'gyur ro/_/tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa las skyo bar 'gyur ro/_/skyo na ma chags par 'gyur ro/_/ma chags na rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam par 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]grol na bdag ni rnam par grol lo snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/_bdag gi skye ba ni zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad zin to/_/bya ba ni byas so/_/srid pa 'di las gzhan med do snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_yul 
[\[110b.2\]]ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la sogs pa lha brgyad khri dang /_yul ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos chos 
[\[110b.3\]]mthong /_chos rnyed/_chos rtogs/_chos kyi gting slebs/_som nyi las brgal/_the tsom las brgal te/_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing gzhan gyis kri ba med la ston pa'i bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_
[\[110b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag ni 'phags lags so/_/'phags lags so/_/btsun pa bdag ni sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/
[\[110b.5\]]bdag deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du khong nas dad pa'i dge bsnyen lags par gzung du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/_/ji srid 'tsho'i bar 
[\[110b.6\]]du bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_stan dang /_snyun gsos dang /_sman zong rnams sbyar bar 'tshal lo zhes gsol to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun 
[\[110b.7\]]pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la sogs pa lha brgyad khri dang yul ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag stong phrag du ma skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams dang /_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang /_bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]dang /_gzhi de las bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pas 'jig rten kun tu rgyas par gyur pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang rgyal po gzugs can snying po la sogs pa lha brgyad khri dang /_
[\[111a.2\]]yul ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag stong phrag du ma mang po 'di rnams bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la ngas ji ltar bkod pa dang /_gzhi des na nga'i grags pas 'jig rten du rgyas par gyur pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag 
[\[111a.3\]]sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_grong khyer rdul ldan zhes bya ba na/_rgyal po phyogs kyi bdag po zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab pa zhi ba dang /_
[\[111a.4\]]'khrug pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom rkun dang /_nad dang /_mu ge med pa dang /_'bras sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/_gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/_bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du chos bzhin du rgyal srid 
[\[111a.5\]]byed do/_/de nas rgyal po de btsun mo dang /_lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las btsun mo la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/_ming rdul 
[\[111a.6\]]zhes bya bar brtags so/_/de nas khye'u rdul pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/_ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/_de ma ma brgyad kyis/_'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_
[\[111a.7\]]mar gyi nying gu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/_mtsho'i nang gi pad ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_khye'u de yi ge slob tu bcug ste/_rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po rnams kyi 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas tha dad pa 'di lta ste/_glang po che bzhon pa dang /_rta bzhon pa dang /_mtshon cha bcang ba dang /_'phong dang /_mdun du bsnur ba dang /_phyir bsnur ba dang /_g.yul las thar bar bya ba dang /_lcags kyus gzung ba dang /_zhags pas gzung 
[\[111b.2\]]ba dang /_mda' bo che 'phang ba dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phang ba dang /_mtshon rtse gcig pa gdab pa dang /_'khor lo 'phang ba dang /_gcad pa dang /_gsheg pa dang /_lag pas gzung ba dang /_rkang pa'i stabs dang /_mgo bo bskyab pa dang /_rgyang mar 'phang ba dang /_sgra grags 
[\[111b.3\]]par 'phang ba dang /_gnad du phog pa dang /_gdon mi za bar phog par bya ba dang /_tshabs cher gtang ba rnams kyang bslabs nas gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to/_/rgyal po phyogs kyi bdag po'i mdun na 'don ni bram ze khyim bdag khyab 'jug ces bya ba yin te/_de yang mkhas shing 
[\[111b.4\]]gsal la yid gzhungs pa/_rtsis mgo'i thabs shes pa'i shes rab dang /_dpyod pa dang ldan pa zhig ste/_de rgyal po phyogs kyi bdag po'i rgyal po'i phrin las su bya ba thams cad byed la/_rgyal po phyogs kyi bdag pos kyang /_mdun na 'don bram ze khyab 'jug de la 
[\[111b.5\]]rgyal srid gtad nas/_khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng na 'dug cing bud med 'ba' zhig dang /_sil snyan gyis rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/_/phyi zhig na bram ze khyab 'jug gi chung ma la bu chags nas/_de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang /_bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na 
[\[111b.6\]]sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas te/_khye'u'i ming me skyong zhes btags so/_/de nas khye'u me skyong 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_zhun mar dang /_mar gyi nying gus bskyed bsrings te/_de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/_yi ge dang /_
[\[111b.7\]]bram ze'i spyod lam dang /_spyod pa dang /_oM zhes bya ba dang /_b+ho zhes bya ba dang /_gtsang sbra dang /_cho ga dang /_thal ba blang ba dang /_ril ba thogs pa dang /_nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /_mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang /_snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /_srid srung gi rig byed dang /_
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]mchod sbyin bya ba dang /_mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang /_sbyin pa dang /_blang ba dang /_kha ton bya ba dang /_kha don slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas/_las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur te/_de mthar gyis rig pa'i gnas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]
[\[112a.2\]]brgyad la byang bar gyur to/_/de nas de'i phas khye'u me skyong la smras pa/_bu khyod ni yab 'das pa'i 'og tu yab kyi thabs kyi rgyal sar 'jug par 'gyur la/_khyod ni 'di'i mdun na 'don du 'gyur gyi/_'di la khyod kyis skor cig_/snga nas bskor dang /_khyod la 'bras 
[\[112a.3\]]bu yod par 'gyur ro/_/me skyong gis smras pa/_jo bos ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/_gzhon nu rdul gyi phyi bzhin du grib ma bzhin du 'brang ngo /_/de nas phyi zhig na bram ze khyab 'jug shi nas/_de shi ba'i phyir rgyal po phyogs kyi bdag po shin tu mya ngan byed 
[\[112a.4\]]cing /_sdug bsngal la smre sngags 'don par byed do/_/de nas gzhon nu rdul gyis gsol pa/_lha khyod ci'i slad du bram ze khyab 'jug gum pa'i slad du/_shin tu thugs ngan mdzad cing 'o brgyal la/_smre sngags 'don cing bzhugs/_rgyal pos smras pa/_bram ze khyab 
[\[112a.5\]]'jug ni nga'i rgyal po'i phrin las su bya ba thams cad byed byed de/_de'i mthus pa'i snying khral chung ngur 'dug go/_/gzhon nu rdul gyis gsol pa/_lha khyod bram ze khyab 'jug gum pa'i slad du ha cang thugs ngan ma mdzad/_ha cang 'o brgyal bar ma mdzad ha cang smre sngags 'don par 
[\[112a.6\]]ma mdzad cig dang /_lha mkhan po de nyid kyi bu bram ze'i khye'u me skyong zhes bgyi ba/_pha bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa zhig mchis pa de/_lhas mdun na 'don du bsko bar gsol/_'on tang des lha'i rgyal po'i phrin las su bgyi ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de 
[\[112a.7\]]thos ma thag tu rgyal po phyogs kyi bdag pos/_bram ze'i khye'u me skyong dgug pa btang nas mdun na 'don du bcug go/_/de nas des kyang rgyal po de'i bya ba thams cad nyams su blangs so/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po phyogs kyi bdag pos/_gzhon nu rdul rgyal sar bcug nas/_
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]phyogs kyi bdag po shi'o/_/de nas de'i ming gzhon nu rdul zhes bya ba de med par gyur nas/_rgyal po rdul zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po rdul gyis kyang bram ze'i khye'u me skyong dgug pa btang nas/_de la smras pa/_mkhan po khyod kyis ci ltar nga'i yab kyi rgyal po'i phrin 
[\[112b.2\]]las su bya ba thams cad byas pa de bzhin du nga'i yang gyis shig_/bram ze'i khye'us gsol pa/_lha de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/_bram ze'i khye'u me skyong gis rgyal po rdul gyi rgyal srid kyi bya ba thams cad nyams su blangs so/_/de nas de'i ming me skyong zhes bya ba gang 
[\[112b.3\]]yin pa de med par gyur nas/_me skyong khyab 'jug ces bya bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe rgyal po rdul gyi sngon gzhon nu'i tshe/_mdza' zhing bshes la gcugs pa/_rgyal rigs gzhon nu drug cig yod pa de dag_/rgyal po de'i thad du 'ongs nas smras pa/_lhas bdag cag gi yul 
[\[112b.4\]]dbog tu gsol/_de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal pos me skyong khyab 'jug la bka' stsal te/_mkhan po khyod kyis sa chen po 'di cha bdun du bgos la/_cha drug ni gzhon nu 'di rnams la byin cig_/cha gcig ni nga'i bya'o/_/des gsol pa/_lha de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes 
[\[112b.5\]]byas nas/_me skyong khyab 'jug gis sa chen po 'di cha bdun du bgos te/_cha drug ni gzhon nu drug po rnams la byin no/_/cha gcig ni rgyal po rdul gyi skal bar lus shing 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po rdul gyis rgyal rigs drug po de dag rang rang gi rgyal srid la bkod do/_/de nas 
[\[112b.6\]]me skyong khyab 'jug ni 'dzam bu'i gling du tshangs par bkur te/_bram ze khyab 'jug ni tshangs pa'i lam yin no snyam du 'dzin cing /_tshangs pa'i lam yin par blta'o/_/de nas phyi zhig na/_bram ze khyab 'jug 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag ni rgyal khams thams cad kyi mi rnams 
[\[112b.7\]]kyis tshangs par bkur te/_bram ze khyab 'jug ni tshangs pa'i lam yin no snyam du 'dzin cing /_tshangs pa'i lam yin par lta la/_gna'i bram ze rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa/_sde tshan gyi slob dpon chen po dag las bdag gis thos na/_bram ze gang gis dbyar zla ba bzhi'i 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]bar du byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnas pa de la/_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bltar 'ong ngo zhes zer gyis ma la bdag gis thams cad spangs te/_khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng du song la/_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang 
[\[113a.2\]]ldan pa'i sems kyis gnas par bya gor ma chag snyam nas/_rgyal po la gsol pa/_lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_bdag ni dbyar zla ba bzhi tshangs pa'i gnas kyis gnas par 'tshal te/_de bas na lhas lha nyid kyi rgyal po'i phrin las su bgyi ba gang lags pa thams cad 
[\[113a.3\]]bgyid pa'i mdun na 'don gzhan zhig bsgo bar gsol zhes smras so/_/de nas rgyal po rdul gyis smras pa/_khyod ci ltar dga' ba de bzhin du bya'o/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu bram ze khyab 'jug chen pos las su bya ba thams cad spangs nas/_khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng du song ste/_khang 
[\[113a.4\]{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng na 'dug cing /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnas so/_/de nas phyi zhig na de la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bltar 'ongs nas/_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i kha dog gi mthus/_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[113a.5\]]de dag thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/de nas de mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bdag gis kha dog 'di 'dra ba/_/sngon cad ma thos ma mthong ste/_/kha dog bzang zhing gzugs bzang ba/_/grogs po khyod ni su zhig lags/_/mi mjed kyi bdag po 
[\[113a.6\]]tshangs pas smras pa/_gzhon nu brgya byin la sogs dang /_/de bzhin lus can gzhan dag kyang /_/bdag ni tshangs pa'i lus su shes/_/khyab 'jug de ltar shes par gyis/_/bram ze che zhing ma thob khyab 'jug gis smras pa/_tshangs pa khyod la 'dud par bgyi/_/tshangs pa khyod 
[\[113a.7\]]la mchod par 'tshal/_/bdag gi tshig ni gsan nas kyang /_/lan ni myur du bka' stsol cig_/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas smras pas/_khyab 'jug khyod kyis smras pa yi/_/tshig ni bdag gis gzung bar bya/_/'dri ba yid la ci 'dod pa/_/bram zes nga la dri bar 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]gyis/_/tshe 'di yi ni don yang rung /_/phyi ma'i tshe yi don yang rung /_/khyod kyis dris pa de dang de/_/ngas ni nges par dpyad par bya/_/bram ze khyab 'jug chen pos smras pa/_bdag gi the tsom gzhan brtags the tsom rnams/_/bram ze kun 'gyed gzhon nu dri bar gyis/_/
[\[113b.2\]]gang la gnas shing ci la bslab bgyis na/_/rdul med mi yis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten thob/_/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas smras pa/_tshangs pa mi yis nga rgyal spangs byas la/_/rtse gcig btud de snying rjes mos byas shing /_/dri nga med cing 'khrig pa rab spangs la/_/
[\[113b.3\]]de la gnas shing de la bslab byas nas/_/rdul med mi yis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten thob/_/bram ze khyab 'jug chen pos smras pa/_tshangs pa gang dag mi yi dri nga lags/_/chu 'gram chus yog bzhin du gang gis g.yogs/_/ngan song rgyu ste 'jig rten thams cad bsgribs/_/
[\[113b.4\]]tshangs pa thob pa'i lam yang yong mi shes/_/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas smras pa/_khro dang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang ngan sems 'tshe ba dang /_/ngan du byed dang blo phyed phra ma dang /_/chags dang sdang dang de bzhin gti mug dang /_/'chab pa dang ni ser sna gtum tshig rnams/_/bram 
[\[113b.5\]]ze 'di dag mi yi dri nga ba/_/chu 'gram chus yog bzhin du de yis g.yogs/_/ngan song rgyu ste 'jig rten thams cad bsgribs/_/tshangs pa thob pa'i lam yang yong mi shes/_/chos 'di rtag tu spyod pa yin/_/de rnams las ni 'das gyur na/_/tshangs pa dag tu skye 'gyur gyis/_/khyod 
[\[113b.6\]]kyi brtan por bsgrims par gyis/_/de skad ces smras nas/_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa mi snang bar gyur nas/_/ring po ma lon par bram ze khyab 'jug chen pos bsams pa/_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas ji skad 
[\[113b.7\]]bshad pa'i don bdag gis shes te/_'di ltar bdag khyim par 'dug ste/_khyim na gnas bzhin du ni gcig tu brtul te/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba spyad par dka' na/_ma la bdag 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]gis skra dang kha spu bregs te gos tshon can rnams bgos la/_yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po rdul/_bram ze khyab 'jug chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bram ze khyab 'jug 
[\[114a.2\]]chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bram ze khyab 'jug chen pos rgyal po rdul la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yul bdag rgyal chen rdul gyis ni/_/de ring bdag gi tshig gson cig_/khyod nyid kyis ni rgyal srid srungs/_/khyab 'jug 
[\[114a.3\]]bdag ni spro ba med/_/rgyal po rdul gyis smras pa/_khyod kyi 'dod pa ma skongs pa/_/de ni bdag gis nges par bskang /_/khyod kyi gnod pa bdag gis bsal/_/khyab 'jug bdag ni ma dor cig_/khyab 'jug chen pos smras pa/_bdag ni 'dod pa ma skongs med/_/bdag la 
[\[114a.4\]]gnod pa byed pa'ang med/_/mi ma yin pa'i tshig thos nas/_/khyim na gnas par spro ba med/_/rgyal po rdul gyis smras pa/_bram ze su yi tshig thos pas/_/nga dang 'dod pa spong byed pa/_/mi ma yin pa ci 'dra ba/_/dris pa de ni bdag la smros/_/khyab 'jug chen pos smras pa/_snying rje 
[\[114a.5\]]la ni gnas nas kyang /_/dben pa'i bsam gtan byed pa na/_/de tshe tshangs pa byung nas ni/_/phyogs rnams thams cad snang bar byas/_/bdag gis de yi tshig thos nas/_/khyim na gnas pa spro ba med/_/rgyal po rdul gyis smras pa/_mkhan po khyod nam bdag gi bu thu bo rgyal sar ma 
[\[114a.6\]]bcug gi bar du sdod cig dang /_mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag kyang rab tu 'byung bar bya'o zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bram ze gang du 'gro ba der/_/bdag kyang der ni 'gro bar bya/_/bdag gis khyod kyi slob ma byed/_/bdag gi ston pa khyab 'jug khyod/_/khyab 'jug chen 
[\[114a.7\]]pos smras pa/_so so'i skye bo gar chags pa/_/'dod pa de ni spangs par gyis/_/'dod pa rnams la ma lta bar/_/bden pa'i chos la gnas par gyis/_/rgyal po rdul gyis smras pa/_tshangs pa dag par skye ba'i phyir/_/nam mkha' dri med lta bu dang /_/nor bu bai dUr+ya dag ltar/_/
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya/_/khyab 'jug chen pos smras pa/_rgyal po chen po de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na/_de ltar mdzod cig ces byas nas/_bram ze khyab 'jug chen pos rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po drug la smras pa/_kye bdag ni skra dang kha spu bregs te/_chos gos tshon 
[\[114b.2\]]can bgos la/_yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'dod na/_khyod ji ltar byed/_de dag gis smras pa/_mkhan po khyod lo bdun gyi bar du sdod cig dang /_lo bdun lon nas bdag cag gi bu dang nu bo dag rgyal sar bcug la/_mkhan po rab 
[\[114b.3\]]tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo /_/khyab 'jug chen pos smras pa/_kye lo bdun ni ha cang yun ring ches so/_/'dod pa rnams ni chags par 'gyur ba'o/_/longs spyod rnams ni rgyags par 'gyur ba'o/_/'tsho ba dang 'chi ba ni drod gzung dka'o/_/lo 
[\[114b.4\]]bdun lon nas khyod rab tu 'byung ngam mi 'byung yang gtol med kyis/_bdag je rab tu 'byung ngo /_/de dag gis smras pa/_mkhan po khyod re zhig sdod cig dang /_lo drug gam/_lnga'am/_bzhi'am/_gsum mam/_gnyis sam/_gcig gam/_de bzhin du zla 
[\[114b.5\]]ba bdun nam/_drug gam/_lnga'am/_bzhi'am/_gsum mam/_gnyis sam/_gcig gam/_zhag bdun nam/_drug gam/_lnga'am/_bzhi'am/_gsum mam/_gnyis sam/_gcig lon na/_bdag cag gis bu dang nu bo rnams rgyal sar bcug 
[\[114b.6\]]nas/_mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag cag kyang rab tu byung ngo /_/khyab 'jug gis smras pa/_kye zhag bdun yang ha cang yang yun ma [{]rings sam[,]ring ngam[}]/_'dod pa rnams ni chags par 'gyur ba'am/_longs spyod pa rnams ni rgyags par 'gyur ba'am/_'tsho ba dang /_
[\[114b.7\]]'chi ba'i drod gzung dka'o/_/zhag bdun lon nas kyang khyod rab tu 'byung ngam/_mi 'byung gtol med kyis bdag je rab tu 'byung ngo /_/de dag gis smras pa/_zhag bdun yang btang ste/_deng nyid du bdag cag gi bu dang nu bo dag rgyal sar bcug nas/_mkhan po 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]rab tu 'byung ba'i rjes su bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo /_/khyab 'jug gis smras pa/_khyed kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na/_de ltar gyis shig_/de nas bram ze khyab 'jug chen pos/_rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po drug gi 'khor bltas nas/_bram ze che zhing 
[\[115a.2\]]mtho ba bdun bltas so/_/bram ze che zhing mtho ba bdun bltas nas/_bshes pa'i bud med bzhi bcu bltas so/_/bshes pa'i bud med bzhi bcu bltas nas/_bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya bltas so/_/bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya bltas nas/_shing rta kha lo ba rnams dang /_glang po 
[\[115a.3\]]che'i kha lo ba rnams dang /_rta pa rnams dang /_shing rta pa rnams dang /_mtshon cha can rnams dang /_'phong ba rnams dang /_zham ring ba rnams dang /_tshal za ba rnams dang /_drag shul can rnams dang /_dpa' bo rnams dang /_rab gnon rnams dang /_tshan po che chen po 
[\[115a.4\]]rnams dang /_rgyal po'i sras du ma dag bltas te/_kye bdag ni skra dang kha spu bregs nas/_gos tshon can rnams bgos la yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung na khyed ci ltar byed sems/_de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag kyang mkhan po rab 
[\[115a.5\]]tu 'byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo /_/khyab 'jug gis smras pa/_khyed kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na/_de bzhin du gyis shig ces byas nas/_bram ze khyab 'jug chen pos khyim gyi 'khor thams cad btang ste/_sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas te/_du ma zhig 
[\[115a.6\]]dbul bor te btang nas/_skra dang kha spu bregs te/_gos tshon can rnams bgos nas/_yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/rab tu byung nas kyang nags khrod cig tu gnas bcas nas/_yal ga dang lo ma'i spyil po phub ste/_de de na 'dug 
[\[115a.7\]]nas bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed de/_rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar gyur to/_/khyab 'jug rab tu byung nas rgyal po rdul g.yog 'khor 'bum phrag du ma dang /_skra dang kha spu bregs te/_gos tshon can rnams bgos nas/_yang dag pa'i dad pa kho 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/de bzhin du rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po drug gi 'khor dang /_bram ze che zhing mtho ba bdun dang /_bshes pa'i bud med bzhi bcu dang /_bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya dang /_shing rta'i kha lo pa rnams dang /_glang po che'i kha lo pa rnams dang /_
[\[115b.2\]]rta pa rnams dang /_shing rta pa rnams dang /_mtshon cha can rnams dang /_zham ring ba rnams dang /_tshal za ba rnams dang /_drag shul can rnams dang /_dpa' bo rnams dang /_rab gnon pa rnams dang /_tshan po che chen po rnams dang /_rgyal po'i sras du ma dag skra dang kha 
[\[115b.3\]]spu bregs te/_gos tshon can rnams bgos nas/_yang dag pa'i dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par khyab 'jug rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ste/_bram ze khyab 'jug gis thams cad la yid la byed pa'i lung phog nas/_de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang /_bsgrub pa dang /_
[\[115b.4\]]'bad pas bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/de nas bram ze che zhing mtho ba khyab 'jug gi ming bram ze che zhing mtho ba khyab 'jug ces bya bar gyur pa de med par gyur nas/_ston pa khyab 'jug ces bya bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i 
[\[115b.5\]]tshe ston pa khyab 'jug ces bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe rgyal po rdul ces bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/_rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di kho na yin no/_/de'i tshe rgyal po rdul gyis mgo drangs pa'i skye bo 'bum phrag du mar gyur pa gang yin pa de dag 
[\[115b.6\]]ni/_rgyal po gzugs can snying pos mgo drangs pa'i lha brgyad khri dang /_yul ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag stong phrag [:]du ma [#]mang po 'di dag kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang ngas rgyal po rdul la sogs pa yul gyi mi du ma dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag stong phrag 
[\[115b.7\]]du ma rab tu byung nas/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod de/_gzhi [#]des na nga'i [#]grags pas 'jig rten rgyas par gyur to[#]/_/da ltar yang ngas [#]rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang [#]/_lha brgyad khri dang /_ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]stong phrag du ma dam pa'i chos kyi [#]bcud kyis tshim par byas nas/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang /_bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do//_//[:]las brgya tham pa[#]/_bam po sum cu [#]bdun pa [:]ste tha ma[#]/_'thab [#]mo zhes bya ba ni/_
[\[116a.2\]]gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe mnyan du yod [#]pa na skye bo phal po che [#]'thab pa dang /[ :]mtshang 'dru [#]ba dang /_'gyed pa dang /_rtsod [#]pa la zhugs shing 'khod do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/_rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang /_
[\[116a.3\]]ye shes la mnga' brnyes [#]pa/_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/_'gro ba [#]lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/_skye mched drug la mkhas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/_rnam par thar pa 
[\[116a.4\]]brgyad la bsam gtan pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/_stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs [#]pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis [#]nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum ste/_nyin mtshan dus 
[\[116a.5\]]drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/_su ni rgud/_su ni dar/_su ni phongs [#]shing 'dug_/su ni nyam [#]nga bar gyur[#]/_su ni gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni phongs [#]pa dang nyam [#]nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/_su ni ngan song du gzhol/_su ni ngan song du 'bab/_su 
[\[116a.6\]]ni ngan song du bab/_su ni ngas [#]ngan song nas phyung ste[#]/_mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/_su ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/_su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las/_'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed 
[\[116a.7\]]du gzhug par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed [#]pa las bskyed par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams [#]bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/_su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes [:]kyi mtshon [#]gyis brtol bar bya/_su la ni sangs rgyas byung [#]bas brgyan pa'i 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]'jig rten 'bras bu yod par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs [#]pa 'jug go/_/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi [#]gnas/_/dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/_/gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_
[\[116b.2\]]skye bo phal po [#]che gdul ba'i dus la bab ste/_de dag ngas [#]'thab pa dang /[ :]mtshang 'dru [#]ba dang /_'gyed pa dang /_rtsog [#]pa las bzlog ste/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang /_bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la dgod par bya [#]snyam du dgongs nas/_snga dro sham thabs 
[\[116b.3\]]dang chos gos gsol te/_lhung bzed bsnams nas/_mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs te/_skye bo phal po che ga la ba der [#]gshegs nas/_skye bo phal po che de dag gis thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar [#]
[\[116b.4\]]bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi [#]phyir gdan bshams [#]nas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs bzhugs su gsol/_de nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal 
[\[116b.5\]]po che la bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag ci byed cing 'khod gzhan dang 'thab dgos na gzhan dang 'thab cing 'dug gam[#]/_de rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag su dang 'thab 'tshal lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' [#]stsal pa/_grogs po dag 
[\[116b.6\]]'o na 'khod cig [#]dang /_ngas khyod [#]la rgyas par bshad [#]par bya'o/_/de nas skye bo phal po che de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan [#]'das kyis skye bo phal po che [#]de dag la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[116b.7\]]khyod [#]ni nyon mongs pa rnams dang 'thab dgos kyis[#]/_nyon mongs pa [:]spong ba'i [#]phyir 'bad par gyis shig ces [#]bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la de lta bu dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/_des na de dag gi khro ba'i kun nas dkris [#]pa med par gyur nas/_stan de dag nyid la 'khod 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/_de dag gis bden pa mthong nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar [#]te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de [#]logs su thal 
[\[117a.2\]]mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa [#]bdag cag [#]legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung [#]ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/_bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par [#]
[\[117a.3\]]spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la [#]dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste bsnyen [#]par rdzogs par mdzad nas/_de dag la lung yang phog ste/_de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang /_bsgrub [#]pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad 
[\[117a.4\]]spangs nas/_dgra [#]bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_de dag [#]dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar 
[\[117a.5\]]gyur pa/_rig pas [:]sgo nga'i sbubs [#]bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa [#]thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti [#]la mi lta ba dbang po dang /_nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed [#]pa dang /_gus 
[\[117a.6\]]par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che 'thab pa las zhi bar mdzad [#]nas/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang /_bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la 
[\[117a.7\]]bkod pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar [#]'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang ngas [#]skye bo phal po che 'di dag bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la ji ltar bkod pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]dus na ri khrod kyi grong [:]zhig na bram ze [#]zhig gis mchod sbyin byas te/_mchod sbyin byed pa der bram ze rnams stan gyi phyir 'thab [#]pa las de'i tshe dka' [#]thub kyi gnas shig na/_drang srong 'khor lnga brgya yod pa zhig gnas so/_/de nas mchod sbyin byed pa [#]der drang srong des bram ze de dag 
[\[117b.2\]]'thab pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/_de lta bu dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan [:]te/_des na [#]'thab mo de yang zhi bar gyur la/_bram ze rnams kyang skyo ba skyes nas/_de nyid kyi thad du [#]rab tu byung ngo /_/de dag der rab tu byung nas bsam gtan bzhi [#]dang mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/dge 
[\[117b.3\]]slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe bram zer [#]gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/_skye bo phal po che 'di dag kho na yin no[#]/_/de'i tshe yang ngas skye bo phal po che 'thab pa zhi bar byas nas 
[\[117b.4\]]bsam gtan bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa [#]lnga la bkod [#]do/_/da ltar yang ngas skye bo phal po che 'thab pa zhi bar byas nas/_g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang /_bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do/_/gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 
[\[117b.5\]]gi bstan pa la 'di dag thams cad rab tu byung [#]nas/_der 'di rnams kyis tshe gcig [#]tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/_dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na/_da [#]ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to//_//klu zhes bya ba ni/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na 
[\[117b.6\]]bzhugs te/_de'i tshe [#]rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi blon po [:]chen po [#]zhig gyod cig la btags te/_ci [:]bdog pa phrogs [#]nas/_khri mon du bcug pa las/_de [#]der zas dang skom gyis [#]mnar te shi'o/_/de nas des smon lam log par btab nas/_shi 'phos te dus las 'das 
[\[117b.7\]]pa'i 'og tu/_gnod sbyin ma rungs pa zhig tu skyes nas/_des yul ko sa la de thams cad du mi nad btang ste[#]/_skye bo phal po che de [#]dag kha dag [#]par gyur nas/_ltas mkhan dag gis smras pa/_blon po chen po des 'chi kar [#]smon lam log par btab nas/_gnod sbyin 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]ma rungs par skyes te/_des mi nad 'di dag btang [#]ngo zhes byas so/_/de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo mang po de [#]dag ci bya gtol med par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa/_'di ni sus kyang 'dul [#]bar mi nus kyis[#]/_da [#]'di'i phyir 
[\[118a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab dgos so snyam ste/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste [#]phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi [#]zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[118a.3\]]la [#]'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni [#]klu ma rungs pa dga' bo dang /_nye dga' bo la sogs pa [:]gzhan dang [#]gzhan dag kyang btul/_gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 'brog [#]gnas la sogs pa gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang btul na[#]/_btsun pa blon po [:]chen 
[\[118a.4\]]po [#]che ge mo zhig gis smon lam log par btab ste[#]/_gnod sbyin ma rungs par skyes nas/_des bdag gi yul du mi nad btang na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse [#]ba'i slad du/_gnod sbyin ma rungs pa de gdul [#]bar gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po 
[\[118a.5\]]gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas [#]gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su [:]yi rangs [#]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi [#]zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi [#]thad nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom 
[\[118a.6\]]ldan 'das kyi [#]rdzu 'phrul gyis/_gnod sbyin de [#:]rgyal bu [#]rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi [:]'dab tu [#]bzhag nas/_bcom ldan 'das [:]kyis de btul [#]ba'i phyir me chen po sprul te/_de'i [:]kho ra [#]khor yug nas bdag nyid me chen pos 'khor bar mthong ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi [#]zhabs kyi drung 
[\[118a.7\]]'ba' zhig zhi bar mthong ngo /_/de nas de 'jigs shing skrag nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste [#]phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin ma rungs pa de [#]la bka' stsal pa/[ :]bzhin bzangs [#]khyod kyis sngon [#]mi dge ba'i las byas pas/_rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis [#]
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]bsad [#]pa yin na/_da yang khyod 'dir skyes nas skye bo mang po kha 'dogs [#]par byed na/_'di nas [#]shi 'phos pa'i 'og tu khyod kyi [#]'gro ba ni gang yin/_skye gnas ni gang yin/_'gro ba'i sa ni gang yin/_gnod sbyin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ci stsal/_
[\[118b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sdig pa'i las 'di thong [#]shig_/gnod sbyin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]bdag la bka' ci stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo/_/de skad ces gsol [:]te/_des [#]skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs nas 
[\[118b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag gis sdig pa'i las btang [:]lags te[#]/_btsun pa [:]deng slan cad [#]mnyan du yod pa na [#]gnas pa'i skye bo mang po rnams kyi srung [#]ma dang /[ :]skyabs rnams [#]ni bdag lags so/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[118b.4\]]gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin ma rungs pa de [#]btul nas/_skye bo phal po che de [#]dag 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su bkod pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang ngas gnod sbyin 
[\[118b.5\]]ma rungs pa 'di btul [#]nas/_skye bo phal po che ji ltar 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su bkod pa de nyon cig[# ]/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI na rgyal po tshangs pas byin rgyal po byed de[#]/_de'i tshe yul ka shir [#]klu gdug pa dug [#]mi bzad pa zhig byung ste[#]/_des 
[\[118b.6\]]grong yang stongs [#]par byed[#]/_ljongs kyang stongs [#]par byed cing /_bA rA Na sI'i [#]phyogs su chas [#]pa las rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis thos nas/_de thos ma thag tu 'jigs pa chen [#]po skyes te/_des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te btang nas/_khyed [#]deng la klu gdug pa 
[\[118b.7\]]de sod cig [#]ces bsgo'o/_/de nas de dag gis de'i [#]rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_gsol pa/_lha de ni dpung gi tshogs kyis dgum [#]par mi nus kyis[#]/_sngags sam sman gyis [:]de dgum [#]par nus lags so/_/yang na dge ba'i tshul gyis bkur ba'i dge sbyong [#]dang /_bram 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]ze rnams kyis gdul bar nus lags so zhes gsol to/_/de nas de'i tshe bA rA Na sI de nyid na gdol pa'i khye'u byams pa'i rang bzhin can/_snying rje che ba sems can la byams pa zhig gnas pa des/_skye bo mang po de [#]dag ci bya gtol med par gyur pa 
[\[119a.2\]]mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu de [#]snying rje skyes nas des skye [#]bo mang po rnams la smras pa/_khyod [#]ci bya gtol med par bya mi dgos kyis[#]/_bdag gis [#]klu gdug pa de gdul bar bya'o zhes byas so/_/de nas de'i pha ma gnyis na re/_de ni dbugs gdug pa yin te khyod kyis 
[\[119a.3\]]de gdul [#]mi nus so/_/[:]khye'u des [#]smras pa/_byams pa'i go cha gyon pa la [#]des cung [#]zad kyang gnod par byed mi nus so zhes byas nas/_khye'u des phyogs gang [#]na klu gdug pa [#]'dug pa'i phyogs der song nas klu gdug [#]pa des thag ring po zhig nas khye'u de mthong ngo /_/mthong nas 
[\[119a.4\]]kyang khros nas khye'u de la dbugs btang ngo /_/de nas khye'u des [#]byams pa la snyoms par zhugs nas byams pa'i lta bas klu gdug [#]pa de la bltas te/[ :]des bltas [#]ma thag tu dug med par gyur to/_/de nas khye'u des klu sbrul de lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas mi mi gnas pa'i 
[\[119a.5\]:]sa phyogs su [#]bzhag [#]go/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin dang /_skye bo mang po gzhan dag gis gdol pa'i khye'u che ge mo zhig gis klu gdug pa btul lo [#]zhes thos [#]nas thos ma thag tu rgyal po de rang nyid gdol pa'i khye'u de'i thad du song nas des khye'u de la dam pa sna [:]gcig 'dam du 
[\[119a.6\]]bcug ste/_khye'u khyod la dam pa sna gcig byin [#]no zhes byas so/_/khye'us smras pa/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te/_gnas par mdzod cig_/yul na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la [:]gzud par [#]mdzod cig ces byas [#]so/_/de 
[\[119a.7\]]nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis khye'u de la [#]longs spyod kyi byings [#]chen po byin nas/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te 'dug go/_/yul na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe [#]gdol 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]pa'i khye'ur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe klu gdug par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/_gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 'di kho na yin no/_/de'i tshe skye bo phal po [:]cher gyur pa [#]gang yin pa de dag [#]ni/_yul ko [#]sa la na gnas pa'i 
[\[119b.2\]]skye bo mang po 'di dag kho na yin te/_de'i tshe yang ngas klu gdug pa de [#]btul nas/_skye bo phal po che 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su bkod do/_/da [#]ltar yang ngas gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 'di btul nas/_skye bo phal po che 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su bkod do/_/gzhan yang 
[\[119b.3\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la 'di dag thams cad dge bsnyen du gyur te/_der 'di rnams kyis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa [#]spyad nas/_dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na/_da [#]ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to//_//shi [:]bi 
[\[119b.4\]]gnyis zhes [#]bya ba de la/_shi bi [#]dang po ni/_bcom ldan 'das [:]gyad kyi [#]yul du ljongs [#]rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/_chu klung mtha' [#]ldan dang /_grong khyer [:]ku sha'i [#]bar gyi lam nas gud [#]du [:]bzur te[#]/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs 
[\[119b.5\]]pa'i bla gos bzhi [:]bltab tu bgyis te thing [#]shig dang /_nga'i rgyab mi bde ba [#]de [#]re zhig bsti [#]bar bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du mnyan [#]nas/_bla gos bzhi bltab [#]tu byas te[#]/_bting 
[\[119b.6\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla gos bzhi [:]bltab tu [#]bgyis te bting lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis da [#]de'i dus la [#]bab par dgongs su gsol/[ :]de nas [#]bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]chos gos snam [#]sbyar [:]stug por bltab ste [#]
[\[119b.7\]]'phongs su bzhag nas/_snang ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa dang /_dran pa dang ldan pa dang /_shes bzhin dang ldan pa'i 'du shes thugs la dgongs [:]shing glo [#]g.yas phyogs [:]kyis gzims te[#]/_zhabs gcig gi steng du gcig bzhag [#]go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]dgongs te/_'khor 'dir so so'i skye bo'i dge slong ji snyed 'dus shing 'tshogs [#]pa de dag thams cad ci sangs rgyas kyis 'dul [#]ba yin nam/_'on te nyan thos kyis 'dul [#]ba yin zhig gu snyam du dgongs so/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_
[\[120a.2\]]'di na [#]kha cig ni sangs rgyas kyis 'dul [#]bar 'gyur ro/_/kha cig ni nyan thos kyis [:]'dul bar [#]'gyur [#]snyam du [#]dgongs nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod byang chub kyi phyogs rnams las spobs par gyis shig_/de skad ces bka' 
[\[120a.3\]]stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas 'khor thams cad du sgra des gang bar 'gyur ba de [:]lta bur [#]byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas dge slong mang po dag gis tshig de lta bu [:]gsungs pa'i [#]sgra thos nas/_de dag gis bsams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[120a.4\]]bo la/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi gtam gyis shig par bskul bas na da [#]ni tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos [:]sbrang bu'i [#]sbrang rtsi btsir [#]ba bzhin du [#]chos snyan [#]no cog [#]ston par 'gyur [:]snyam ste[#]/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste [#]lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das la bskor te 'khod 
[\[120a.5\]]do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun [#]dga' bos dge slong rnams la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag [#]dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag [:]dben pa [#]la rten [#]pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la rten [#]pa 'gog pa la rten [#]pa/_rnam par [:]spong bas [#]yongs su bsgyur ba ni/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[120a.6\]]nyid kyis [#]mngon par shes pas/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bstan to [:@]tshe dang ldan pa dag chos rnam par 'byed pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dga' ba dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la rten [#]
[\[120a.7\]]pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la rten [#]pa/_'gog pa [:]la rten [#]pa/_rnam par spong bas [#]yongs su bsgyur ba ni/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis [#]mngon par shes pas/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bstan to [@#]zhes/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos byang chub kyi yan lag 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]'di dag [#]nyid las brtsams [#]nas dge slong rnams la [#]de lta bu dang 'thun [#]pa'i chos bstan te/_des [#]na nyan thos dang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'brel pa gang yin pa de dag gis stan de dag [#]nyid la 'khod bzhin du/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te[#]/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas 
[\[120b.2\]]so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i gtam gyi mjug [#]rdzogs par thugs su chud nas bzhugs [#]te/[ :]skyil mo krung [#]bcas nas sku [#]drang por [:]bsrangs te[#]/_dran pa mngon du bzhag [#]nas bzhugs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa [:]kun dga' bo 
[\[120b.3\]]la bka' stsal pa[#]/_kun dga' bo khyod brtson 'grus [:]ston tam[#]/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus ston lags so[#]/_/bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod [#]brtson 'grus [:]ston tam/_gsol pa/_bde bar gshegs pa brtson 'grus ston lags so/_/bka' 
[\[120b.4\]]stsal pa/_kun dga' bo brtson 'grus [#]ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro [#]zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi phyogs 'di [#]dag nyid las [#]brtsams nas/_de lta bu dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan [#]te/[ :]des na [#]bcom ldan 'das dang dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[120b.5\]]'brel [#]pa gang yin pa de dag gis stan de dag [#]nyid la 'khod bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum [#]du byas te/_de dag [#]dgra bcom pa [#]khams gsum pa'i [#]'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/_gser dang bong bar [#]mnyam pa/_nam 
[\[120b.6\]]mkha' dang lag mthil [#]'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/_rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs [#]bcom pa/_rig pa dang [#]mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_bkur sti [#]
[\[120b.7\]]la mi lta ba/_dbang po dang /_nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed [#]pa dang /_gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur [#]to/_/[#]de nas de'i tshe dge slong zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_snyan pa'i chos ni gsan pa'i phyir/_/ston pa [:]snyun bzhin [#]nyid 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]kyis bskul/_/khyod la byang chub yan lag rnams/_/yod na dge slong khyod [#]shod cig_/gnas brtan [#]kun dga' mkhas shing grags[#]/_/[:]byang bar [#]gyur pas legs zhes gsol/_/dpa' bo khyod kyi gsung [#]rab la/_/dkar ba'i chos rnams de dag 
[\[121a.2\]]mnga'/_/dran dang rnam 'byed brtson 'grus dang /_/dga' dang rab sbyangs ting [#]'dzin dang /_/btang snyoms 'di dag rdul med pa/_/khyod kyi byang chub yan lag lags/_/byang chub yan lag bcud thos nas/_/byang chub yan lag bcud kyang rtogs/_/bcom ldan snyun [#]tshabs che [:]ba las[#]/_/gnod pa de las 
[\[121a.3\]:]zhi bar [#]gyur/_/dam chos rin chen 'di ston [#]pa'i/_/chos kyi mnga' bdag de nyid kyang /_/dam chos gsan par bzhed gyur na/_/gzhan lta [:]ci ltar de mi nyan[#]/_/stobs bcu mnga' bas nye rgyal ni/_/dge slong rnams kyi shes rab mchog_/bstan pa gang yin de nyid kyang /_/
[\[121a.4\]]chos mnyan [#]'dod pas gzir [#]bar 'gyur[#]/_/mdo sde 'dul ba ma mo 'dzin/_/mkhas shing tshul dang tshul min shes/_/de dag dam chos nyan byed [#]na/_/gzhan lta [#]ji ltar de mi nyan/_/mkhas pa shes 'dod sems bzhag [#]nas/_/chos bzhin nyan par byed pa ni/_/sangs 
[\[121a.5\]]rgyas gsung rab skyon med la/_/de bzhin dga' ba thob par 'gyur/_/yid dga' lus kyang shin tu sbyangs/_/bde ba yang ni myong bar 'gyur/_/bde [:]bar gyur nas [#]sems nyid kyis[#]/_/ting 'dzin la yang reg par 'gyur/_/sems ni mnyam par gzhag [#]pa yis/_/'du 
[\[121a.6\]]byed yul [#]gyi rnam par [#]rig_/srid pa'i 'gro las skyo [#]bar 'gyur/_/chags med sems kyis [#]grol bar 'gyur/_/rtag tu srid 'gro skyo gyur [#]na/_/lha dang mi la chags pa med/_/bud shing med pa'i me bzhin du/_/dgra bcom rnams ni mya ngan 'da'[#]/_/dam chos mnyan [#]pa'i 
[\[121a.7\]]phan yon ni/_/mang po gzhan yang rgyal bas bstan/_/de phyir 'di [#]ni yod snyam du/_/ston pa'i bka' ni mnyan par bya/_/de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ni legs par [:]smras pa [#]gsung ba dang /_legs 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]par [:]smras par [#]bzhed pa lags te[#]/_legs par [:]smras pa'i [#]don gyi slad du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bskul [#]ba [#]mdzad nas/_bkur sti [#]dang ldan pas gsan kyang gsan/_bshad kyang bshad pa la [#]gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[121b.2\]]stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni da [#]ltar 'ba' zhig legs par smras pa [:]gsung ba [#]dang /_legs par smras pa bzhed pa ma yin gyis[#]/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'das pa'i dus na yang legs par [:]smras pa [#]gsung ba dang /_legs par smras pa bzhed pa yin 
[\[121b.3\]]te/_legs par smras pa'i don gyi phyir/_ngas mchog tu dka' ba ji ltar spyad [#]pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_rgyal po'i pho brang bzhi [#]ldan zhes bya ba na/_rgyal po [#]shi bi [#]zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/_de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /[ :]rgyas pa dang [#]/_
[\[121b.4\]]bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'thab [:]pa zhi ba dang /_'khrug pa [#]dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_chom [#]rkun dang /_nad dang /_mu ge med pa dang /_'bras sA [#]lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he dang ldan par 
[\[121b.5\]]'dug ste/_gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs [#]la bu gcig [#]pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du chos bzhin du rgyal srid byed do/_/rgyal po de yang byams pa'i rang bzhin can/_snying rje dang ldan pa/_sems can la byams pa'i [#]sbyin pa la sred pa zhig ste[#]/_de sbyin pa dag sbyin [#]zhing bsod 
[\[121b.6\]]nams dag byed pa la zhugs [#]te/_zas 'dod pa la ni zas sbyin par byed/_skom 'dod pa la ni [#]skom sbyin par byed/_gos 'dod pa la ni gos sbyin par byed/_rgyan 'dod pa la [#]ni rgyan sbyin [#]par byed/_mal stan 'dod pa la ni mal stan sbyin par byed/_bzhon [#]pa 'dod pa la 
[\[121b.7\]]ni bzhon pa sbyin par byed/_yo byad gzhan 'dod pa [#]la ni yo byad gzhan [#]sbyin par byed [:]do/_/[#]nad gso ba'i nad brang bcas te/_yo byad thams cad sbyar nas/_sman pa rnams dang /_nad g.yog [#]rnams bskos te/_nad pa rnams dang /_mgon med pa rnams kyi rim gro byed do/_/
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]bza' [#]ba dang [:]bca' ba [#]mang po dag kyang sta gon [#]byas te/_nam mkha' la gnas pa dang /_chu la [#]gnas pa dang /_thang la gnas pa'i srog chags rnams la sbyin par byed do/_/des yi [#]dam 'di lta bu yang bcas te/[ :]deng phyin cad [#]bdag gis thams cad la 
[\[122a.2\]]thams cad sbyin par bya ste/_'jig rten dag dge ba [#]bcu'i las kyi lam la dgod par bya'o zhes dam bcas nas/_des 'jig rten thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod [#]do/_/der dge ba bcu'i las kyi [#]lam yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir sems can phal cher shi 
[\[122a.3\]]ba'i 'og tu lha'i nang du skyes nas/_de dag gis lha'i gnas rnams gang bar gyur to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/_'di ci zhig sgrub brgya byin du 'gyur ba sgrub bam[#]/_'on te tshangs par 'gyur ba sgrub [:]zhig gu [#]snyam mo/_/de nas [:]des bltas na[#]/_bla na 
[\[122a.4\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub cing 'dug go/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/_ci 'di sems can brtan po yin nam/_'on te sems can mi brtan pa yin pa [#]bdag gis je [#]brtags la/_gal te sems can brtan po yin na ni mchod par [#]bya'o/_/
[\[122a.5\]:]'di lta ste[#]/[ #]sems can brtan po ma yin na [#]yang /_'di'i sems stobs bskyed par bya'o snyam nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bdag nyid srin po'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/_rgyal po shi [:]bi'i khang bzangs kyi char khebs [#]la 'dug ste/_tshigs su bcad 
[\[122a.6\]]pa'i phyed [#]smras pa/_kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag_/skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin/_/zhes smras nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po shi bis lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can gyis tshig 
[\[122a.7\]]de lta bu brjod pa thos so/_/thos nas kyang des bsams pa/_gcig [#]tu na ni [#]mya ngan las 'das pa'i rten cing 'brel bar [#]'byung ba'i sgo phye'o/_/gcig tu na ni [#]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam bstan to snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po shi bis [#]lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]yin pa'i cha lugs can/_khang [:]bzangs kyi char khebs la [#]'dug pa [#]mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang skyen [#]par langs nas/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar [#]te/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_smras pa/_
[\[122b.2\]]grogs po tshigs su bcad pa de [:]tshang bar [#]smros shig dang /_bdag gis slob ma bgyis te mnyan to[#]/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_khyod kyis [#]bdag gi slob [#]ma byas pas ci la phan/_bdag ni bkres shing skom [#]pas gzir te/_ci [:]za gtol [#]med par bla [#]zhing 'dug go/_/byang 
[\[122b.3\]]chub sems dpas smras pa/_grogs po tshigs su bcad pa [:]tshang bar [#]smros shig dang /_bdag gis khyod kha zas kyis tshim par bya'o/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i [#]cha lugs can gyis smras pa/_grogs po khyod kyis nga kha zas kyis tshim par byed [#]nus sam[#]/_
[\[122b.4\]]nga'i kha zas dang skom ji lta [#]bu yin pa de ni khyod kyis sbyin par dka'o/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_khyod kyi zas skom ci yin/_des smras pa/_mi 'phral du bsad pa'i sha dron mo [#]ni za/_khrag dron mo [#]ni 'thung ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpas bsams [#]pa/_de lta 
[\[122b.5\]]bu'i sha khrag ni gsod par [#]ma byas kyi bar du mi rnyed la/_bdag gis legs par smras pa'i don gyi [#]phyir sems can gzhan su la yang gnod par [#]byed mi phod do snyam nas smras pa/_gal te bdag gi sha khrag khyod za zhing 'thung phod na ni grogs po bdag gis sbyin nus ches kyis[#]/_
[\[122b.6\]]tshigs su bcad pa tshang bar smros shig dang /_legs par [:]smras pa'i [#]don gyi phyir bdag gis khyod la [:]rang gi [#]sha khrag sbyin no/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin [#]gyis tshigs su bcad pa tshang bar smras pa/_kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag_/skye zhing [#]'jig [#]pa'i chos can yin/_/
[\[122b.7\]]skyes nas 'gag par 'gyur ba ste[#]/_/de dag nye bar zhi ba bde/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas tshigs su bcad pa [:]tshang ba de gus par [#]mnos nas/_yun ring po [#]zhig tu/_kha [:]ton du [#]sbyangs nas bsams pa/_'di ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer gyi rten cing 'brel bar 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]'byung [#]ba'i sgo yin no/_/'di ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer gyi lam yin no/_/lam 'dis [#]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad nges par 'byung [#]ngo snyam nas/_mtshon cha rnon po blangs te smras pa/_grogs po legs par smras pa'i 
[\[123a.2\]]don gyi phyir yon bzhes [#]shig ces [#]byas nas/_brang gi phyogs gcig [#]nas sha bcad [#]de/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can la byin te smras pa/_grogs po 'grangs [#]sam/_des smras pa/_ma 'grangs [#]so/_/de bzhin du brang gi phyogs ya [#]gcig [#]nas 
[\[123a.3\]]sha [#]bcad de byin [#]no/_/de bzhin du dpung pa'i sha rnams dang [#]/_lus thams cad kyi sha bcad cing [#]byin nas smras pa[#]/_grogs po 'grangs [#]sam/_des [#]smras pa/_ma 'grangs [#]so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas bsams [#]pa/_da [#]ni lus ril gyis yongs su gtang [#]ba'i dus kho 
[\[123a.4\]]na la bab bo snyam nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na[#]/_bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa ston pa med par/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig 
[\[123a.5\]]pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu [:]'dul ba'i [#]kha lo [:]sgyur ba[#]/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas nas/_tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_sbyin pa 
[\[123a.6\]]chen por [#]gyur pa 'di yis ni[#]/_/srid pa dag tu rang byung sangs rgyas shog_/sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ma bsgral ba'i/_/skye bo phal chen [:]brgal nas bsgral [#]bar bgyi/_/de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab nas/_smras pa/_
[\[123a.7\]]grogs po bdag gis [#]lus 'di ci ltar [#]dga' bar gyis shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpas [#]sems bskyed ma thag tu sa rnam pa [#]drug tu g.yos so/_/nam mkha' la 'khod pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang [#]me tog gi char phab nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_grogs po legs so/_/
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]legs so khyod kyis [:]mchog tu [#]dka' ba'i las byas so zhes 'dzer to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/_byang chub sems dpa' 'dis [#]mchog tu dka' ba byas te/_bdag gis [:]'di'i lus [#]snga mkho [#]bzhin du [:]bsgyur bar [#]ni nus mod kyis[#]/_'on kyang bdag 
[\[123b.2\]]gis [#]'di nyid kyi spro ba [#]tshod zin par bskyed dgos so snyam nas/_byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_grogs po khyod [:]bdag gis [#]sha rnams gcod cing rgyus pa dang /_rtsa brang breng rnams gse ba na/_sems mi dga' ba cung zad tsam [#]skyes sam/_byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_
[\[123b.3\]]grogs po bdag gi [#]sha rnams gcod cing /_rgyus pa [:]dang rtsa [#]brang breng rnams [:]gse ba na[#]/_sems mi dga' ba cung [#]zad kyang ma skyes kyis[#]/_bdag gis [#]sdug bsngal myong ba na/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /_yi dgas su skyes pa'i sems can [#]rnams 'ba' zhig 
[\[123b.4\]]la/_snying rje'i [#]dbang du gyur to/_/lha'i dbang [#]po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can gyis smras pa/_grogs po khyod kyi tshig [#]de la su zhig yid ches/_byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_bdag gis khyod la bden pa bskul ba de lta bus yid ches par bstan to/_/brgya byin 
[\[123b.5\]]gyis smras pa[#]/_de ltar khyod kyis bden pa [#]bskul bar chad na/_je khyod bdag gis [#]lus 'di bden pa bskul bas snga [#]mkho bzhin du gyur [#]cig_/de skad ces [#]smras ma thag tu byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'di ltar bdag gi [#]sha rnams 
[\[123b.6\]]gcod cing /_rgyus pa dang rtsa brang breng rnams [:]gse ba [#]na/_sems cung [#]zad [:]tsam yang [#]mi dga' [#]ma [#]skyes te/_bdag gis [#]sdug bsngal myong ba na/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /_yi dgas su [:]skyes pa'i [#]sems can rnams 'ba' zhig la snying [:]rje ba'i [#]dbang du gyur na/_
[\[123b.7\]]bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig [:]de dag gis bdag gi [#]lus snga mkho [#]bzhin du gyur cig ces byas so/_/de skad ces [#]brjod ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i lus snga mkho [#]bzhin du gyur to/_/de nas de mthong [#]ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi [#]rangs te/_cha lugs [:]mi snang bar [#]
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]byas nas/_rang bzhin gyi gzugs su bsgyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/_bdag gis khyod la gnod pa'i bsams pas mi dga' ba [#]byas pa ni [#]ma yin gyis[#]/_khyod nyid kyi spro ba bskyed [#]pa'i phyir bdag gis khyod mi 
[\[124a.2\]]dga' bar byas par zad do/_/khyod kyi [#]brtson 'grus 'di 'dra ba dang /_spro ba 'di 'dra ba [:]las na[#]/_gdon mi za bar khyod yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur [#]gyis[#]/_de'i tshe bdag dran par mdzod cig[# ]/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya 
[\[124a.3\]]byin gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' la bzod pa gsol nas/_de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe rgyal po shi bir gyur pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/_de'i tshe yang nga [#]legs par [:]smra bas [#]smra 
[\[124a.4\]]ba dang /_legs par smra bar 'dod par gyur na/_da ltar de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa na legs par smra bas [#]smra ba dang /_legs par smra bar [#]'dod par ci ste mi mdzad/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag nga ni chos dang [#]po byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro//_//shi bi [#]gnyis 
[\[124a.5\]]pa ni/_gtan tshigs dang /_sngon gyi rgyu [#]snga ma dang 'dra ba las/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/_khyod kyis bdag gi [#]slob ma byas pas ci la phan/_nga khyod la gnod pa zhig zer gyis[#]/_gal te gnod pa de khyod kyis byed phod na ni/_de'i 
[\[124a.6\]]'og tu tshigs su bcad pa de [#]ngas khyod la brjod par bya'o[#]/_/byang chub sems [#]dpas smras pa/_grogs po tshigs su bcad pa de [:]je brjod [#]cig dang /_khyod kyis bdag la gnod pa [#]ci [#]byed [#]du bcug pa de dag thams cad bdag gis bgyi'o/_/grogs po tshigs su bcad [#]pa de [#]tshang bar 
[\[124a.7\]]smros shig dang [#]/_de skad ces [:]brjod ma [#]thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du tshigs su bcad pa de tshang bar brjod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar [#]nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can ga la ba de 
[\[124b\]]
