[\[124b.1\]]logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_tshigs su bcad pa de [:]tshang bar [#]mnos te[#]/_yun ring mo zhig tu kha [:]ton sbyangs nas[#]/_khab sor bzhi pa stong shing leb la btsugs pa de lta bu shing leb gnyis kyi bar du bdag nyid nyal te 'tshir [#]bar byed do/_/de de na 'dug [#]bzhin du bla na med 
[\[124b.2\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste[#]/_kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na[#]/_bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa/_ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra [#]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs 
[\[124b.3\]]pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu [:]'dul ba'i [#]kha lo sgyur [#]ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas nas/_tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_sbyin pa chen por gyur pa 'di yis [#]ni/_/srid pa dag tu rang byung sangs rgyas shog_/
[\[124b.4\]]sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ma bsgral ba'i/_/skye bo phal chen [:]brgal nas bsgral [#]bar bgyi/_/de nas yang [#]shing leb kyi bar du btsir ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i lus thams cad la [#]khrag 'bab par gyur nas/_sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/nam mkha' la 'khod [#]pa'i lha 
[\[124b.5\]]rnams kyis kyang me tog gi char phab nas legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/lhag ma rnams ni shi bi'i [#]gtam rgyud snga ma bzhin du bden pas bskul nas/_lus snga mkho [#]bzhin du sor chud par gyur pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o//_//[:]kau shAM bI [#]zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[124b.6\]]ldan 'das yul [:]kau shAM bI [#]na/_khyim bdag gdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe [:]kau shAM bI'i [#]dge slong ma rungs pa mthu rtsal che ba/_mdo sde 'dzin pa/_'dul ba 'dzin pa/[ :]ma mo 'dzin pa[#]/_rtsa 'jing [#]che ba/[ :]g.yog 'khor [#]mang ba zhig gnas te/_de'i 
[\[124b.7\]]dge slong grogs po mang po gzhan dag kyang yod la/_de dag kyang ma rungs ba/_mthu rtsal che ba/_mdo sde [#]'dzin pa/_'dul ba 'dzin pa/_ma mo 'dzin pa/_rtsa 'jing [#]che ba/_g.yog 'khor mang ba sha stag go/_/yul yangs pa can gyi dge slong zhig [#]kyang yul [:]kau shAM bIr [#]
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]'ongs te/_de yang ma rungs pa/_mthu [#]rtsal che ba/_mdo sde 'dzin pa/_'dul ba 'dzin pa/_ma mo 'dzin pa/_rtsa 'jing [#]che ba/_g.yog 'khor mang ba zhig yin [#]la/_de'i dge slong grogs po [#]gzhan dag kyang yod la/_de dag kyang ma rungs pa/_mthu rtsal 
[\[125a.2\]]che ba/_mdo sde 'dzin pa/_'dul ba 'dzin pa/_ma mo 'dzin pa/_rtsa 'jing [#]che ba/_g.yog 'khor mang ba sha stag go/_/de nas de [#]de dag dbyar gnas bcas nas/_nang khrims bcas te/_bdag cag gi nang nas gang gis [:]chu ra [#]stong pa ci yang med pa/_chu med pa mthong na de nyid 
[\[125a.3\]]kyis dgang bar bya'o/_/yang na yo byad kyi zhal ta byed pa la sbran par bya'o/_/bdag gis kyang ma bkang yo byad kyi [#]zhal ta byed pa la yang [#]ma sbran na/_de bdag cag gis gzhi de las nyes pa 'chags [#]su gzhug [#]go zhes zer ro/_/de nas der dbyar gnas bcas pa rnams yang 
[\[125a.4\]]dag [:]pa'i gtam [#]gtan la 'bebs [#]pa na/_tshig rtsub [#]pos 'dres nas [#]gcig la gcig [#]glags 'ba' zhig lta zhing 'khod do/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag cig [#]gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du bshos la spyan drangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong [#]mang [:]pos 
[\[125a.5\]]zham ring [#]byas te/_khyim bdag de'i khyim du gshegs so/_/bcom ldan 'das gshegs nas/_yangs pa can gyi dge slong de chab khung [#]sar song ste/_bkru bshal byas nas/_chu ra'i nang du chu [:]nyung ngu [#]zhig las ma lus par mthong nas bsams pa/_dge slong thams cad 
[\[125a.6\]]dong zin pas/_da ni su yang chab khung sar 'gro ba [#]med kyis[#]/[ #]chu ra 'di rang gis [#]dgang bar [#]yang mi dgos/_yo byad kyi zhal ta byed pa la sbran yang mi dgos so snyam nas/_des chu nyung [:]bzhin du [#]bor te song ngo /_/de song nas ring zhig lon pa'i 'og tu [:]kau shAM bI'i [#]dge slong de chab 
[\[125a.7\]]khung [#]sar 'gro bar chas pa las/_des bltas na chu ra'i nang na [#]chu nyung ngu zhig las med pa mthong nas/_des kyang sngar [#]yangs pa can gyi dge slong [#]des bkru bshal byas te [#]song ba mthong nas/_des bsams pa/_dge slong 'di ni las rnam [#]gnyis byed par 'gyur te/_yang na ni bdag nyid 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]kyis [:]chu ra [#]'gengs par byed par 'gyur ro[#]/_/yang na ni yo byad kyi [#]zhal ta byed pa la sbron [#]par byed do snyam nas [:]de la [#]sdod cing 'dug go/_/de nas de la lhan cig 'khod pa'i slob ma rnams kyis smras pa/_mkhan po dge slong thams cad ni dong lags na/_khyod 'di na ci la gzhes[#]/_
[\[125b.2\]]des smras pa/_bkru bshal [:]bya bar [#]'dod de[#]/_yangs pa can gyi dge slong des bkru bshal byas te song bas na/_de 'ongs te yang na ni kho bdag gis chu ra 'gengs par [:]byed par [#]'gyur ro/_/yang na ni yo byad kyi zhal ta byed pa la sbron par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis smras pa/_mkhan 
[\[125b.3\]]po [:]de 'khor [#]dang bcas pa ni dong lags kyis[#]/_'dir ma gzhes shig_/de nas [:]des chu ra [#]de dge slong rnams la bstan te/_khyod [#]ltos shig chu 'di tsam gyis [#]bkru bshal [:]bya bar [#]rung ngam/_de dag gis smras pa/_mkhan po khyod kyis 'di na [#]chu med do zhes de [:]nyi tshe [#]zhig gsungs [#]shig dang /_
[\[125b.4\]]bdag cag gis khyod kyi rtsa [#]'jing [#]dang /_mthu dang grogs bgyi'o zhes byas nas dong ngo /_/yangs pa can gyi dge slong de yang 'gyod pa skyes nas/_des lhan cig gnas pa'i slob ma rnams la smras pa/_kye [#]bdag gis [#]'dir bkru bshal byas pa las/_chu ra'i nang na chu nyung shas cig 
[\[125b.5\]]las ma lus bzhin du bor te 'ongs [#]la/_dge 'dun gyi [#]nang khrims bcas pa ni yang na bdag nyid kyis dgang bar bya ba dang [#]/_yang na yo byad kyi zhal ta byed pa la sbran dgos pa yin na/_de bdag rang gis kyang ma bkang la/_yo byad kyi [#]zhal ta byed pa la yang ma sbran na/_bdag [#]'dir [:]'ongs 
[\[125b.6\]]pa'i [#]'og tu dge slong 'ga' zhig bkru bshal byed [#]par mi 'gyur grang zhes byas so/_/de nas de dag gis smras pa/_mkhan po khyod kyis 'di [#]skad du/_de'i nang na chu yod do zhes [:]nyi tshe zhig [#]gsungs shig dang /_bdag [#]gis khyod kyi rtsa [#]'jing [#]dang /_mthu dang grogs bgyi'o zhes [:]byas nas dong ngo [#]/_/

[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]:]bshams nas gaN+DI [#]brdungs te/_dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod par gyur nas/[ :]kau shAM bI'i [#]dge slong des yangs pa can gyi dge slong [:]de la gleng ba [#]dang /_des smras pa/_'di'i [#]nang na chu yod do/_/des smras pa/_chu de tsam gyis bkru [:]bshal byar [#]chog gam zhes byas 
[\[126a.2\]]nas de dag gis de la yus [#]med par bsnyon pa'i phyir dgar ba'i las byas so/_/de nas yangs pa can gyi dge slong [:]de dag [#]gis las de [:]bshig ste[#]/_gyes nas gso sbyong gi las logs [:]shig tu [#]byas so/_/de nas gzhi de las de dag 'thab pa dang /[ :]mtshang 'dru [#]ba dang /_'gyed pa dang /_rtsod

[\[126a.6\]]dge slong dag gzhan yang dgar bar [#]bcad [#]pa'i dge slong gis [#]ni 'di ltar bya dgos te[#]/_dgar bar [#]bcad [#]pa'i dge slong ni ma rungs pa/[ :]mthu rtsal che ba/_mdo sde 'dzin pa/_'dul ba 'dzin pa/_ma mo 'dzin pa/_rtsa 'jing che ba/_g.yog 'khor mang ba yin la/_dge slong grogs po mang po

[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]gleng ba de chos bzhin du mnyan [#]par mi bya'o/_/de dag gis kyang bdag mi snang bar dgar bar byed [:]do/_/phyir [#]bcos su med pa dang /_phyir 'byung du med par sdig pa'i lta bas dgar bar byed de/_gzhi des na dge 'dun gyi 'thab mo dang /_mtshang 'dru [#]ba dang /_'gyed pa dang rtsod pa [#]'byung bar 'gyur

[\[126b.3\]]'brang ba'i [#]rjes su 'brang ba rnams btang nas/_dgar [#]bar byed pa'i dge slong dang /_dgar bar byed pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang /_dgar bar [#]byed pa'i rjes su 'brang [:]bar byed pa'i [#]rjes su 'brang ba rnams bkug nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag [#]khyed [#:]'thab ste[#]/_mtshang [#]'dru [#]zhing [#]'gyed

[\[126b.7\]]rungs pa/_mthu rtsal che ba/_mdo sde 'dzin pa/_'dul ba 'dzin pa/_ma mo 'dzin pa/_rtsa 'jing [#]che ba/_g.yog 'khor [#]mang ba yin te/_bdag gis de la 'dod pa ma yin pas [#]gleng bar [#]byas/_'dod pa ma yin pas dran par byas nas[#]/_des nyes pa de chos bzhin du mnyan [#]par mi byed na[#]/_de bdag [#]gis [#]
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]mi snang bar dgar bar [#]byas te/_phyir bcos su med pa dang /_phyir 'byung du med par [#]sdig pa'i [:]lta bas [#]dgar bar byas te[#]/[ :]gzhi des na [#]dge 'dun gyi 'thab [#]mo dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang 'gyed pa dang /_rtsod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas/_'dod pa ma yin pas [#]gleng bar ma byed cig_/
[\[127a.2\]]'dod pa ma yin pas dran par [#]ma byed cig_/gal te 'dod pa ma yin pas gleng bar byed na 'gal bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal [#]kyang /_de bzhin du 'thab cing mtshang 'dru [#]la 'gyed cing rtsod de 'khod nas da dung yang [#]gso sbyong byas par mi rtsi [#]na[#]/_skabs kyi gtam [#]de dge slong 
[\[127a.3\]]rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to[#]/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgar [:]bar bcad [#]pa'i dge slong dang /_dgar bar [#]bcad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang /_dgar bar [#]bcad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams bkug nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed 'thab ste/_mtshang 'dru zhing 
[\[127a.4\]]'gyed la rtsod cing ma 'khod cig [#]ces ngas bsgo yang /_de bzhin du khyed [:]'thab ste[#]/_mtshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la/_rtsod cing 'khod de da dung yang [#]gso [#]sbyong [#:]byas par [#]mi rtsi [#]ba bden nam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mad lags so/_/[#]dge slong dag khyed [:]'thab ste[#]/_mtshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsod par ma byed 
[\[127a.5\]]cig dge slong dag khyed [:]'thab ste[#]/_mtshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsod cing 'khod na ni/_gso sbyong byed dam skabs 'byed pa'i las byed dam/_gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las byed dam/_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las byed kyang rung ste/_las de dag 'jig par gyur [#]te/_bzhag [#]dgos pa yin no/_/
[\[127a.6\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag [#]khyed ni de dag las tha dad par gnas par byed la de dag kyang khyed las tha dad par [#]gnas par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/dge slong dag [#]tha dad par [#]gnas pa ni [#]'di gnyis yin te/_gang bdag nyid kyis bdag tha dad par gnas par 'dogs pa dang /_gang dge 'dun 
[\[127a.7\]]'thun pas tha dad par [#]gnas par 'dogs pa'o/_/de la dge slong dag [#]bdag gis bdag tha dad du gnas par 'dogs pa ci lta bu zhe na/_'di ltar dge slong gis shes bzhin du chos bzhin gyi phyogs la [#]chos bzhin ma yin pa'i phyogs yin par 'jog pa de lta bu ni/_bdag gis bdag tha dad par 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]gnas par [#]'dogs pa yin no/_/dge 'dun gyi [#]chos bzhin du tha dad par 'dogs pa ci lta bu zhe na/_'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong mi snang bar [#]dgar bar byas te/_phyir bcos su med pa dang /_phyir 'byung du med par sdig pa'i lta bas dgar bar byed pa ste/_de lta bu ni dge 'dun gyi [#]tha dad

[\[127b.3\]]gnas par 'dogs pa ci lta bu zhe na/_'di ltar dge slong gis shes bzhin du chos bzhin ma yin pa'i phyogs la chos bzhin gyi phyogs yin par 'jog pa ste/_de lta [:]bu ni [#]bdag gis bdag lhan cig tu gnas par 'dogs pa yin no/_/dge 'dun gyis chos bzhin du lhan cig [#]tu [#]

[\[127b.5\]]'das kyis dgar bar [#]bcad pa'i dge slong [:]dang /_dgar bar bcad [#]pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang /_dgar bar [#]bcad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams btang nas/_dgar bar byed pa'i dge slong dang /[ :]dgar bar byed pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang [#]/_dgar bar [#]byed pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rjes su 'brang ba 
[\[127b.6\]]rnams bkug nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong [#]dag khyed [:]'thab ste[#]/_mtshang 'dru [#]zhing 'gyed la rtsod cing ma 'khod cig ces ngas bsgo na [#]yang /_de bzhin du khyed 'thab ste/_mtshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsod cing 'khod de [#]da dung [:]yang gso sbyong byas pa la [#]gso sbyong byas [:]par mi rtsi [#]ba bden nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan [#]
[\[127b.7\]]mad lags so zhes byas [#]nas/_de lta bu'i [#]dge 'dun gyi [#]chos bzhin du [:]lhan cig [#]tu [:]gnas par [#]'dogs [#]pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du [#]snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/de ltar de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal kyang de bzhin du 'thab cing mtshang 'dru la 'gyed cing rtsod de 'khod do/_/de nas khyim bdag cig [#]
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du bshos la spyan drangs nas/_dge slong de [#]dag der [#]dong [#]ngo /_/de nas [:]de dag [#]bcom ldan 'das kyis yo byad kyi zhal ta byed pa la bshos 'dir drongs shig ces bka' stsal to[#]/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das [:]rnams ni [#]rnam pa 
[\[128a.2\]]lnga'i phyir/_yo byad kyi zhal ta byed pa la bshos len du 'jug par [:]mdzad de[#]/_nang du yang dag par [#]'jog par bzhed pa dang /_lha rnams la chos ston par bzhed pa dang /_nad pa gzigs par bzhed pa dang /_mal stan gzigs par bzhed pa dang /_nyan thos rnams la bslab pa'i 
[\[128a.3\]]gzhi bca' [#]bar bzhed pa rnams kyi phyir ro/_/skabs 'dir ni [#]bcom ldan 'das [:]kyis 'dul ba la [#]bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa'i phyir ro[#]/_/yo byad kyi zhal ta byed pa la [#]bshos len du btang [#]ngo /_/de nas dge slong mang po khyim der dong ba rnams [#]stan la 'khod nas [:]'thab ste[#]/_mtshang 
[\[128a.4\]]'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsod par [:]gyur to[#]/_/de dag 'thab ste mtshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsod cing 'khod [:]do/_/'tsham [#]pa ma yin pa'i lus [:]kyi las [#]dang /[ :]'tsham pa [#]ma yin pa'i ngag gi las [:]byed cing 'dug [#]la/_ci tsam na rdeg par [#]byed do/_/de nas bshos len du song bas bshos blangs 
[\[128a.5\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song [#]ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig [#]tu [#]'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bshos len pa'i dge slong de la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ci dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas 
[\[128a.6\]]bzang [#]pos tshim par gyur tam/_gsol pa btsun pa de ni de [#]lags te[#]/_dge slong gi dge 'dun [#]kha zas bzang [#]pos ni [#]tshim par gyur lags na/_btsun pa 'on kyang dge slong mang po [#]khyim der mchis pa rnams 'thab ste/_mtshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsod par gyur to/_/
[\[128a.7\]]de dag [:]'thab ste[#]/_mtshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsod cing 'khod de/_'tsham [#]pa ma lags pa'i lus kyi las dang /_'tsham [#]pa ma lags pa'i ngag gi las [:]bgyid cing 'khod [#]la ci tsam [#]na rdeg [#]par yang bgyid do zhes gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das [#]bshos gsol 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]nas/_gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du zhabs bkrus te/_nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i phyir gtsug lag khang gi nang du gshegs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das [:]phye ma red [#]nang du yang dag [#]'jog las bzhengs nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan 
[\[128b.2\]]bshams pa la bzhugs so/_/gdan la bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed [#]khyim der dong ba rnams 'thab ste/_mtshang 'dru zhing 'gyed la rtsod par gyur nas khyed [#]'thab ste/_mtshang 'dru [#]zhing 'gyed la 
[\[128b.3\]]rtsod cing 'khod [#]de/[ :]'tsham pa [#]ma yin pa'i lus kyi [#]las dang /[ :]'tsham pa [#]ma yin pa'i ngag gi las byed cing 'khod la/_ci tsam na rdeg [#]par yang byed pa bden nam/_btsun pa mad lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_khyim [:]
[\[128b.4\]]bdag der dong ba'i [#]dge slong sde sder chad pa rnams la khrims su [:]bya ba'i [#]chos rnams ngas bca' bar bya ste/_dge slong sde sder chad pa rnams kyis rtsod pa'i gcugs [#]kyi gnas so [:]cog spongs [#]shig_/dge slong tha mal par [#]'dug pa [:]rnams kyis ni dge slong sde sder chad pa [#]rnams dang /_nyin 
[\[128b.5\]]bar yang rung [#]/_mtshan mo [#]yang rung /_nang par yang rung /_dro la yang rung ste/_gtsug lag khang gcig [#]gam/_dgon pa'am[#]/_grong 'dab gcig tu gnas par ma byed cig_/lhan cig tu yang gnas par ma byed cig[# ]/lam [#]gcig [#]tu yang ma 'gro shig_/lam [#]du yang ma 'grogs shig_/
[\[128b.6\]]brda [#]yang ma byed cig_/[:]brda skad kyang [#]ma byed [#]cig_/tha mal par gnas pas[#]/_rtsod pa'i gcugs [#]de [:]khong du [#]chud nas/_chos bzhin dang 'dul ba bzhin du zhi bar byed nus la/_ston pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir/_'thun par byed nus na ni zhi bar [#]byed pa'i thabs [#]dag cing /_
[\[128b.7\]]'dul ba dang [:]'thun pa gcig [#]gis rtsod pa'i gcugs de zhi bar byas pa zhes bya'o/_/las brgya tham pa las sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa [:]rdzogs te [#]las brgya tham [#]pa rdzogs so[#]//_//
[\[129a\]]
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]{D341}]mdzangs blun zhes bya ba'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_dpe sna tshogs bstan pa'i le'u/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA'i dkyil 'khor rnam par rgyal ba na bzhugs te/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_
[\[129b.2\]]ring por ma lon pa zhig na 'di snyam du dgongs par gyur to/_/sems can 'di dag ni yun ring po nas phyin ci log gis yongs su bslad de/_bstan cing bcos su yang shin tu dka' bas/_ji srid du 'jig rten na bzhugs kyang phan pa'i don med kyis/_des na lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 
[\[129b.3\]]'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o snyam du dgongs ma thag tu/_de'i tshe na tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes shing rtogs nas/_nam mkha' las babs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas/_der phyin pa dang /_zhabs la mgo bos phyag 
[\[129b.4\]]'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol zhing bskul ba dang /_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshangs ris kyi lha dag sems can 'di dag nyes pa'i dri mas yongs su glags te/_'jig rten gyi bde ba la chags nas/_
[\[129b.5\]]shes rab dang ldan pa'i sems med pas/_ci srid du 'jig rten na bzhugs kyang bya ba don med par 'gyur te/_mya ngan las 'das na bde'o snyam du dgongs so/_/de nas tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis/_yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgya mtsho 
[\[129b.6\]]yongs su gang ba/_chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs pa bstan cing 'dul ba'i dus la yang bab/_sems can 'di dag las grol bar 'gyur ba yang shin tu mang na/_ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'da' bar dgongs te/_shin tu mdongs par gyur pa 'di dag gi mgon dang skyabs mi 
[\[129b.7\]]mdzad/_bcom ldan 'das ni sngon bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa 'das pa'i pha rol na/_sems can gyi don du thos pa tshol zhing tshol ba na/_chung ngu na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gyi slad du yang bdag gi lus dang /_chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bu mo dang /_ci'i slad du mgon ma mchis 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]pa 'di dag yongs su gtang bar dgongs/_sngon 'das pa'i dus yun ring po na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po chen po kha dog dam pa zhes bgyi ba/_'jig rten 'di la dbang sgyur ba zhig byung ste/_rgyal po de la rgyal phran ni brgyad khri bzhi stong mnga'/_ljongs chen po stong phrag drug cu'i 
[\[130a.2\]]nang na/_grong khyer yang khri phrag brgyad cu mnga' ste/_rgyal po de la btsun mo ni stong phrag nyi shu/_blon po chen po ni stong phrag bcu snyed mnga'o/_/rgyal po kha dog dam pa de'i gzi brjid dang /_mthu dpe ma mchis par che ste/_'byor pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_mi la sogs pa 
[\[130a.3\]]skye bo mang zhing rab tu mang ba dang ldan pa des 'di snyam du bsams te/_bdag gis ni rin po che dang /_longs spyod kyis 'gro ba thams cad la phan btags kyi/_dam pa'i chos kyi phan 'dogs par ma gyur te/_'di dag ni bdag gi skyon du 'gyur gyis/_dam pa'i chos gang na mchis pa btsal te/_
[\[130a.4\]]thams cad dgrol bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_'di skad ces bkar btags so/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di na su la dam pa'i chos yod pa de/_bdag la ston par gyur na/_de yid dang mi 'gal bar ci dang ci 'dod pa sbyin no zhes bsgrags kyang ston nus pa ma byung ngo /_/de'i tshe na 
[\[130a.5\]]rgyal po de mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/_mi dga' bar gyur pa ngal bso pos thos nas sad pa'i slad du/_bdag gis lus gnod sbyin zhig tu sprul nas/_de'i mdog shin tu sngo ba/_gnag pa/_mig khrag ltar dmar ba/_mche ba gyen du byung ba/_skra gyen du bsgreng ba/_kha nas me 
[\[130a.6\]]'bar ba/_pho brang gi sgor mchis nas/_su zhig chos thos par 'dod pa nga las nyon cig ces smras so/_/rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas/_shin tu dga' mgu ste/_gnod sbyin de bsu nas mgo bos phyag byas te/_stan mthon po la bzhag nas/_blon po dang /_'khor 
[\[130a.7\]]mang po dag bsdus te_/chos nyan du gzhug pa'i slad du 'khor bar bskor to/_/de'i tshe na gnod sbyin gyis rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chos thos par bya ba ni shin tu dka' bas/_chos nyan par 'dod na/_'di tsam gyis chog pa ma yin no/_/zhes smras pa dang /_
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]rgyal pos de la thal mo sbyar te/_khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de mi 'gal bar thams cad sbyin no zhes smras so/_/de nas gnod sbyin des rgyal po la smras pa/_rgyal po khyod kyi btsun mo dang sras gang phangs pa/_kho bo zar bcug na/_dam pa'i chos sbyin no zhes smras pa dang /_de'i tshe na 
[\[130b.2\]]rgyal po chen po des btsun mo'i nang na gang phangs pa dang /_sras kyi mchog gnod sbyin la phul te/_gnod sbyin gyis 'khor mang po'i nang du kun gyis mthong bzhin du zos so/_/de'i tshe na rgyal po de'i blon po rnams de ltar gyur pa mthong nas/_cho nges btab ste/_sa la 'gre bzhin 
[\[130b.3\]]du rgyal po chen po mi rigs pa'i las 'di lta bu dag thong shig ces gsol ba btab kyang /_rgyal po de dam pa'i chos tshol ba'i phyir shin tu brtan pas bzlog ma nus so/_/de'i tshe na gnod sbyin des rgyal po'i btsun mo dang sras zos nas/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so/_/'du byed 
[\[130b.4\]]thams cad mi rtag ste/_/ji tsam skye ba sdug bsngal bcas/_/lnga phung mtshan ma med pas stong /_/bdag dang bdag gi ba yang med/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras pa dang /_rgyal po dga' mgu rangs te/_ba spu'i nyag ma tsam gyi 'gyod pa'i sems ma skyes so/_/de nas yi ger bris nas/_
[\[130b.5\]]'dzam bu'i gling kun tu bsgrags te/_thams cad slob tu bcug go/_/de nas ngal bso pos bdag nyid kyi lus su slar bsgyur nas shin tu legs so ngo mtshar rmad do zhes bstod cing bsngags te/_rgyal po'i btsun mo dang /_sras kyang sngon bzhin du cang ma nongs so/_/de'i dus na rgyal po de ni 
[\[130b.6\]]sangs rgyas lags te/_bcom ldan 'das sngon yang chos kyi slad du de lta bu'i dka' ba mdzad na/_da ji srid du sems can mang po yongs su btang ste/_mya ngan las 'da'o zhes gsung /_bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang sngon bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa'i pha rol na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po chen 
[\[130b.7\]]po ka na shi ni pa li zhes bya ba zhig rgyal phran mang po la dbang bgyid de/_grong khyer ni brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed la mnga' mdzad/_btsun mo dang pho brang gi slas ni stong phrag nyi shu mnga' ste/_blon po chen po yang stong phrag bcu snyed yod do/_/rgyal po de shin tu snying rje dang ldan pas/_mi la sogs pa skye bo mang po'i pha ma 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]lta bur gyur to/_/de'i tshe rgyal po des 'di snyam du sems so/_/bdag kyang 'gro ba mang po kun gyi gtso bor gyur la/_skye bo mang po 'di dag kyang bdag la mos shing dga' bas/_bdag gis dam pa'i chos kyi nor bu rin po che thams cad la phan gdags so snyam du 
[\[131a.2\]]bsams nas/_blon po cig gis thams cad du bkar btags te/_su la dam pa'i chos mchis pa bdag la ston par gyur na/_ci dang ci 'dod pa yid bzhin du sbyin no zhes bsgo ba dang /_de'i tshe na bram ze le'u du ci zhes bgyi ba zhig pho brang gi sgor mchis te/_bdag la dam pa'i chos 
[\[131a.3\]]yod do zhes smras so/_/rgyal po des de skad ces thos nas/_phyi rol tu bsus te/_phyag byas nas stan bting ba la bzhag go/_/bram ze de stan bting ba la 'dug nas/_rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas thal mo sbyar nas/_ston pa chen po gti mug gis mdongs par gyur pa la 
[\[131a.4\]]dam pa'i chos dbye zhing bstan pa'i dus la bab bo zhes bskul ba dang /_bram ze des rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag gis shes pa 'di nyid gyin da tsam gyis lobs pa ma yin pas/_thos par 'dod na 'di tsam gyis chog pa ma yin no/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_ci 
[\[131a.5\]]dang ci 'dod pa smros shig dang /_thams cad yid bzhin du sbyin no zhes smras pa dang /_bram ze des rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyi lus la mar me stong btsugs te/_mchod pa byed nus na chos bstan par bya'o zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal po de lhag par 
[\[131a.6\]]dga' mgu rangs nas/_de'i tshe pho nya cig ban glang rgyang grags brgya stong du phyin pa gcig bskyon te/_'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/rgyal po ka na shi ni pa li de ste zhag bdun na chos kyi phyir lus kyi sha phug ste/_mar me stong 'dzugs so zhes rgyal phran dang 
[\[131a.7\]]mi thams cad la bsgo'o/_/de dag gis de skad bsgo ba thos pa dang /_so so nas mya ngan gyis gdungs te/_rgyal po gang na ba der lhags nas/_/phyag byas te thams cad kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jig rten 'di ni ci tsam 'tsho ba'i srog dang bcas pa thams cad rgyal po 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]khyod la rten pa ni/_long ba dmigs bu la rten pa'am/_bu chung ma la rten pa dang 'dra na/_rgyal po mi bzhugs pa'i slad du na/_gang la skyabs su mchi bar bgyi/_gal te sku la mar me stong btsugs na/_gdon mi za bar srog dang bral na/_ci'i slad du bram ze gcig tsam gyi 
[\[131b.2\]]slad du 'jig rten 'di'i sems can yongs su btang bar dgongs/_de'i tshe na btsun mo dang /_sras dang rgyal tshab dang /_slas lnga brgya dang /_blon po stong phrag bcu snyed kyis thal mo sbyar nas gsol ba btab kyang /_rgyal po yi dam la brtan pas ma bzlog ste/_nam nga mngon 
[\[131b.3\]]par sangs rgyas pa na/_khyod rnams gdon mi za bar bsgral lo zhes smras pa dang /_de'i tshe na skye bo mang pos rgyal po de yi dam la brtan par de dag gis rtogs nas/_rab tu mi dga' ste/_cho nges btab nas sa la 'gyel to/_/rgyal po de'i bsam pa ma gyur te bram ze la 'di skad 
[\[131b.4\]]ces smras so/_/nga'i lus la mar me stong gzug pa'i dus la bab kyis/_phug cig ces bsgo ba dang /_des rgyal po'i lus phug nas mar me'i snying po snum gyis bskus pa dang /_'khor mang pos de ltar gyur pa de dag mthong nas/_ri 'gyel ba bzhin du lus sa la brdabs so/_/
[\[131b.5\]]de nas rgyal pos bram ze la ston pa chen po thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_sngar bdag la chos bstan nas/_de'i 'og tu mar me tshugs shig_/gal te tshe'i dus byas na/_chos thos par mi 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_bram zes tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rtag pa 
[\[131b.6\]]thams cad zad par 'gyur/_/mtho ba de yang mthar lhung ngo /_/'du ba yod na bral bar 'ong /_/skye ba yod na 'chi bar 'gyur/_/zhes tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras ma thag tu/_rgyal po de dga' mgu rangs te/_'gyod pa'i sems med bzhin du 'di skad ces dam bcas so/_/
[\[131b.7\]]bdag chos tshol ba 'di yang sangs rgyas su bsgrub pa'i phyir te/_phyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/_ye shes kyi 'od kyis sems can gti mug gis mdongs pa rnams shin tu snang bar gyur cig ces yi dam bcas ma thag tu gnam sa yang rab tu g.yos so/_/gnas gtsang ma'i ris 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]kyi lha'i pho brang gi bar du g.yos pas/_lha de dag nam mkha' las babs te/_lus kyis mchod pa'i gnas su lhags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus de ltar zhig pa lha de dag gis mthong nas/_steng gi nam mkha' yongs su gang ba de dag ngus te/_ngus 
[\[132a.2\]]pa'i mchi ma char bzhin du bab nas/_lha rdzas kyi me tog kyang char bzhin du phab ste/_mchod pa byas so/_/de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang po yang rgyal po gang na ba der 'ongs nas/_rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bstod cing bsngags te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar 
[\[132a.3\]]shin tu sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa 'di la sems 'gyod par ma gyur tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_'gyod pa med do/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po 'di ltar lus 'dar zhing nyams mi bde bzhin du 'gyod pa med ces smras pa 'di cis yid ches par 'gyur/_rgyal pos smras 
[\[132a.4\]]pa/_gal te bdag thog ma nas tha ma'i bar du 'gyod pa'i sems med pa yin na/_lus kyi rma 'di snga ma bzhin du sos par gyur cig ces smras ma thag tu lus snga ma kho na bzhin du rma med par gyur to/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po de ni sangs rgyas lags te/_bcom ldan 'das sngon yang sems 
[\[132a.5\]]can gyi slad du mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal dang bsngos te chos brnyes na/_da ci'i slad du 'gro ba thams cad chos kyi snang ba dang /_bral bar yongs su btang ste/_mya ngan las 'da' bar dgongs/_gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das sngon 'das pa'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po 
[\[132a.6\]]chen po bying ling gar li zhes bgyi bar gyur pa na/_rgyal phran rnams la dbang bgyid de/_grong khyer ni brgyad khri bzhi stong dang ldan/_btsun mo dang pho brang gi slas ni stong phrag nyi shu mnga' ste/_rgyal tshab dang rgyal bu ni lnga brgya ste/_blon po chen po stong phrag bcu mnga'o/_/rgyal po 
[\[132a.7\]]de snying rje dang ldan pas 'bangs thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar dgongs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po chen po de dam pa'i chos la mos shing dga' bas blon po cig la bsgos nas 'di skad ces bkar btags so/_/gang su yang rung ba la/_mdo sde'am dam pa'i chos yod pa bdag la 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]bstan par gyur na/_ci dang ci 'dod pa yid bzhin du sbyin no zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas bram ze'i le'u ngu chu zhes bya ba pho brang gi sgor 'ongs nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag la dam pa'i chos yod de/_gang thos par 'dod pa la bstan par bya'o/_/zhes smras pa rgyal pos thos 
[\[132b.2\]]nas rab tu dga' mgu rangs te/_phyi rol tu bsus nas rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_tshig snyan par smras nas/_pho brang gi nang du khrid de/_de stan bting ba la bzhag nas thal mo sbyar te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/ston pa chen po bdag la dam pa'i chos 
[\[132b.3\]]bstan du gsol/_bram zes smras pa/_bdag gis lus kun tu sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong nas yun yang ring po zhig lon te/_gdod lobs pas/_rgyal po chen po thos par 'dod na/_'di tsam gyis chog pa ma yin no/_/rgyal pos thal mo sbyar te/_ci dang 
[\[132b.4\]]ci 'dod pa smros shig dang /_ston pa khyod la mi phangs pa thams cad 'bul lo/_/bram zes smras pa/_gal te khyod kyi lus la lcags gzer stong gis btab na/_khyod la chos sbyin no zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/de ste 
[\[132b.5\]]zhag bdun na dngos po 'di dag bsgrub bo zhes smras so/_/de'i tshe na rgyal po des pho nya zhig glang po che rgyang grags brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed du 'gro ba zhig la bskyon te/_'dzam bu'i gling kun tu 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/rgyal po chen po bying ling gar lis/_de ste zhag 
[\[132b.6\]]bdun na lus la lcags gzer stong gis 'debs so zhes bsgo ba dang /_blon po dang 'gro ba mang pos thos nas thams cad rgyal po'i drung du lhags te/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag cag phyogs bzhi na 'khod pa'i 'gro ba thams cad rgyal po'i yon tan dang /_bka' drin 
[\[132b.7\]]gyis so so nas bde ba dang skyid pa la longs spyod de/_rgyal po chen po da bdag gi slad du gsol ba btab ste/_sku la lcags gzer stong gis mi gdab tu gsol zhes gsol pa/_de'i tshe na btsun mo dang /_pho brang gi slas dang /_rgyal tshab dang /_rgyal bu dang /_blon po thams 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]cad kyis kyang gsol ba btab ste/_rgyal po chen po bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_mi gcig gi slad du sku tshe'i dus mdzad cing 'bangs thams cad spang ba mi rigs so/_/de la rgyal pos 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag ni yun ring po nas 
[\[133a.2\]]'khor ba na lus grangs med pa chud gsan te/_bar 'ga' ni 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gis lus 'di bsad pa'i rus pa dkar po spungs pa ni ri rab bas kyang mtho/_mgo bcad pa'i khrag gzags pa ni chu klung lnga bas kyang che/_ngus pa'i mchi ma ni rgya mtsho 
[\[133a.3\]]bzhi bas kyang lhag ste/_de ltar rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas lus srog chud gsan kyang /_lan 'ga' yang chos kyi phyir ma yin te/_da bdag gis gzer bu btab la sangs rgyas su bsgrub bo/_/phyis mngon par sangs rgyas nas shes rab kyi ral gris khyed kyi kun nas nyon mongs 
[\[133a.4\]]pa'i nad bcad par byed na/_ci'i phyir nga'i byang chub kyi sems kyi bar du gcod par byed ces smras pa dang /_de nas 'khor mang po rnams kyang cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas rgyal pos bram ze la smras pa/_ston pa chen po thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_sngar chos bstan nas de'i 
[\[133a.5\]]'og tu lcags gzer gyis thob cig_/gal te tshe'i dus byas na chos thos par mi 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_bram ze des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'du byed thams cad mi rtag ste/_/skye ba thams cad sdug bsngal bcas/_/chos kun stong pas bdag po med/_/bdag 
[\[133a.6\]]gi ba yang yod ma yin/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras nas/_/lus la lcags gzer stong gis btab bo/_/de'i tshe na rgyal phran dang /_blon po dang /_'khor mang po rnams kyis de lta bur gyur pa mthong nas/_ri chen po 'gyel ba bzhin du lus sa la brdabs te/_ngus 
[\[133a.7\]]nas ci yang mi dran par sa la 'gre'o/_/de'i tshe na gnam sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas/_'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams kyi lha rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/_thams cad nam mkha' las babs nas/_byang chub sems dpa' de'i drung du lhags te/_de ltar chos 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]kyi phyir sdug bsngal chen po lus kyis myong bar mthong nas/_thams cad ngus te mchi ma char bzhin du bab nas lha rdzas kyi me tog gis mchod par byas so/_/de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang po rgyal po gang na ba der 'ongs nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po shin tu brtson 'grus 
[\[133b.2\]]brtsams te/_sdug bsngal la ci mi snyam pa 'di chos kyi phyir ram/_'on te brgya byin nam/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'dod dam/_'on te bdud kyi rgyal po'am/_tshangs pa'i rgyal po'am/_dbang phyug chen po 'dod ces smras pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_bdag gis 
[\[133b.3\]]byas pa 'di ni khams gsum gyi bde ba myong bar 'dod pa ma yin gyi/_bsod nams ci snyed yod pa 'di sangs rgyas 'dod pa'i phyir ro/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_bdag gis bltas na rgyal po'i lus 'dar zhing mi bzod pa la bltas na/_'di skad ces zer zhing 'gyod pa med 
[\[133b.4\]]ces smras pa 'di cis yid ches par 'gyur/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gal te bdag gis smras pa bden te/_'gyod pa'i sems med na/_bdag gi lus snga ma kho na bzhin du rma med par gyur cig ces smras ma thag tu snga ma kho na bzhin du gyur nas/_lha dang mi rnams 
[\[133b.5\]]dga' mgu rangs par gyur to/_/de'i tshe yang 'gro ba mang po bskyab pa'i slad du chos btsal na/_bcom ldan 'das ni chos kyi rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs shing yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan na/_ci'i slad du 'gro ba mang po yongs su btang ste/_chos kyang mi bshad par 
[\[133b.6\]]mya ngan las 'da' bar dgongs/_bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa'i pha rol na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po chen po tshangs pa lha zhes bgyi ba la/_rgyal tshab dam gam zhes bgyi ba zhig mchis te/_rgyal bu de dam pa'i 
[\[133b.7\]]chos la mos shing dga' bas dam pa'i chos phyogs kun tu btsal na yang ma rnyed nas/_mya ngan gyis gdungs te/_yi mug par gyur pa las/_de'i tshe na brgya byin lha'i dbang pos de'i bsam pa shin tu shes shing rtogs nas/_bram ze zhig tu sprul te rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]'ongs nas/_dam pa'i chos bdag la yod de bstan par bya'o zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal bus thos nas phyi rol nas bsus te/_rkang pa la phyag byas nas/_pho brang gi nang du khrid de/_stan bting ba la bzhag go/_/rgyal bus thal mo sbyar te/_ston pa 
[\[134a.2\]]chen po thugs brtse ba'i slad du/_dam pa'i chos bstan du gsol/_zhes smras pa dang /_bram zes smras pa/_bslab cing lobs pa yang shin tu dka' la/_slob dpon gnyer zhing shes par 'gyur ba yang sla ba ma yin pas/_'di tsam du chog par 'gyur ba ma yin te/_
[\[134a.3\]]chos thos par 'dod pa ni rigs pa ma yin no/_/rgyal bus smras pa/_ston pa chen po ci dang ci 'dod pa gsungs shig dang /_bdag gis lus dang /_chung ma dang /_bu pho'i bar du bzhed na yang thams cad mi phangs te/_bka' bzhin du bgyi'o/_/bram zes smras pa/_
[\[134a.4\]]gal te me'i dong zabs su khru bcu pa'i nang me mur gyis bkang la de'i nang du mchongs te mchod pa byas na dam pa'i chos bstan to zhes smras pa dang /_de'i tshe na rgyal bu des slob dpon gyi lung bzhin du me dong chen po byas so/_/de nas rgyal po dang /_btsun mo dang /_blon po dang /_
[\[134a.5\]]pho brang gi slas kyis de lta bur gyur pa dag thos nas/_lus dang sems mi bde bar gyur nas/_thams cad rgyal bu'i pho brang du lhags nas/_rgyal bu la yang gsol ba btab/_bram ze la yang kun gyis nan gyis bskor nas/_btsun pa thugs rje bar dgongs te/_bdag 
[\[134a.6\]]cag gi slad du rgyal bu 'di me'i dong du mchong bar mi mdzad du gsol/_'khor ram/_chung ma'am/_bu mo'am/_bdag gi lus bzhed na yang 'bul lo zhes gsol pa dang /_bram zes smras pa/_bdag gis nan gyis mi byar mi rung ba ni med kyis rgyal bus cir 
[\[134a.7\]]brtsams par zad de/_gal te de ltar nus na ni/_chos bstan par yang bya/_ci mi nus na ni chos kyang mi bstan to zhes smras so/_/'khor rnams kyis kyang de'i dam bcas pa brtan par shes shing rtogs nas cang mi smra'o/_/de'i tshe rgyal pos kyang pho nya zhig_/glang po che rgyang 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]grags brgya stong du 'gro ba zhig bskyon te/_'dzam bu'i gling kun tu btang nas/_rgyal tshab da ma gam/_de ste zhag bdun na chos 'dod pa'i phyir me'i dong du mchong gis/_khyed mthong bar 'dod na myur du shog shig ces bsgo'o/_/de'i tshe rgyal phran dang /_'bangs mang po 
[\[134b.2\]]dag ngu zhing nyam chung bdag kyang gcig gis gcig khrid de/_rgyal bu'i thad du lhags nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar nas thams cad kyis tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag ni rgyal bu khyod la brten te/_bdag 
[\[134b.3\]]cag gi pha ma dang 'dra ba khyod me dong du mchong na/_'bangs 'di dag thams cad la mgon skyabs dang /_gnas med par 'gyur gyi mi 'ga' tsam gyi phyir/_'bangs thams cad kyi dpung gnyen med par ma mdzad ces gsol pa dang /_de nas rgyal bus mi mang po de dag la 'di 
[\[134b.4\]]skad ces bsgo'o/_/nga ni yun ring po nas 'khor bar 'khor ba na/_lus grangs med pa zhig 'phos par gyur te/_mi'i nang du skyes pa na/_'dod pas chog mi shes pas gcig la gcig 'tshe zhing gnod par gyur to/_/mtho ris kyi lhar skyes pa na yang lha'i tshe zad pa na/_'dod 
[\[134b.5\]]pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal myong ngo /_/sems can dmyal bar skyes pa na yang mer tshig pa dang /_zangs su bskol ba dang /_ral gri dang mtshon chas dmyal zhing gtubs pa dang /_gdug pa'i chu la 'bog pa dang /_ral gri'i so la 'dzeg cing nyin gcig la yang tshe 'phos pa 
[\[134b.6\]]grangs med pa zhig myong ste/_na ba dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal rus pa la thug pa brjod kyis mi lang ba zhig myong ngo /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes pa na yang /_lus kyis mi bzod pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong ngo /_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su ni lus nyid chud gzan du gyur te/_khal lci 
[\[134b.7\]]ba bkal nas rtswa las mi za ba'i sdug bsngal bzod par dka' ba myong bas/_lus dang srog chud gsan kyang /_dam pa'i chos kyi phyir dge ba'i sems cung zad tsam yang bskyed ma myong bas/_da ni lus btsog pa dman pa 'di chos kyi phyir mchod pa byed kyis/_bdag gi bla na med pa'i 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bar du gcod pa'i las ma byed cig_/bdag ni sangs rgyas su bsgrub pa'i phyir/_lus 'di yongs su gtong ste/_nam mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_khyod la chos kyi sku sbyin par bya'o zhes smras pa dang /_'khor mang po yang mi 
[\[135a.2\]]smra bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe na rgyal bu de me dong gi khar 'greng nas/_bram ze de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ston pa chen po bdag la sngar dam pa'i chos ston cig_/gal te tshe'i dus byas na chos mi thos so zhes gsol pa dang /_bram ze des tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras 
[\[135a.3\]]so/_/byams pa'i sems ni goms par bya/_/zhe sdang khro ba'i 'du shes spangs/_/snying rje chen pos sems can skyobs/_/kun la snying brtse mchi ma gzags/_/dga' ba chen po goms par bya/_/gzhan la'ang bdag dang 'thun pa'i chos/_/byang chub sems kyis 
[\[135a.4\]]bskyab pa ni/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod par ldan/_/zhes tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras ma thag tu me dong du mchongs pa las/_brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i rgyal pos lag pa ya re nas zin te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi 'gro ba thams cad ni rgyal po khyod kyi 
[\[135a.5\]]bka' drin gyis mi bde ba'i bag med na da me dong du mchong na/_'bangs thams cad kyi pha ma tshe 'phos pa dang 'dra bas/_ci'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad yongs su btang ste/_me dong du mchong zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal bu des lha'i rgyal po dang 'khor mang po la bltas te/_khyod kyis 
[\[135a.6\]]bdag bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bar du gcod pa'i las ma byed cig ces smras pa dang /_thams cad cang mi smra ba dang /_de ma thag tu me dong du mchongs so/_/de'i tshe gnam sa rab tu g.yos so/_/bar snang gi lha rnams kyang ngus nas mchi ma char bzhin bab bo/_/
[\[135a.7\]]me dong de yang me tog gi rdzing bur gyur to/_/rgyal bu de yang pad ma'i steng du 'dug par gyur nas/_lha thams cad kyis me tog gi char pus mo nub pa tsam du phab bo/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po tshangs pa lha ni/_rgyal po yab zas gtsang ma lags so/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]de'i ma ni yum lha mdzes lags so/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu rgyal tshab de ni bcom ldan 'das lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na yang /_'gro ba mang po bskyab pa'i slad du chos btsal na/_da yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa na/_ci'i slad du shin tu gdung bar 
[\[135b.2\]]gyur pa'i sems can mang po la chos kyi char mi 'bebs par mya ngan las 'das par dgongs/_bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bskal pa grangs med tshad med pa 'das pa'i pha rol na/_de'i tshe de'i dus na yul bA rA Na sI 'dir drang srong lnga brgya zhig gnas te/_drang srong de dag gis ston pa 
[\[135b.3\]]ud pa la zhes bya ba de dam pa'i chos slob cing bsgom pa la dga' bas kun tu rgyu zhing /_su la dam pa'i chos yod pa de bdag la smra na/_ci dang ci 'dod pa yid bzhin du sbyin zhing de'i g.yog bya'o zhes bya bar bsgrags pa dang /_bram ze zhig der 'ongs nas de la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[135b.4\]]so/_/bdag la dam pa'i chos yod de/_thos par 'dod na bstan par bya'o zhes smras pa dang /_drang srong des thos nas thal mo sbyar te/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du dam pa'i chos bstan du gsol/_zhes smras pa dang /_bram ze des smras pa/_
[\[135b.5\]]chos lobs pa yang shin tu dka' ste/_sdug bsngal mang po myong bas chos lobs pa yin gyis/_'di tsam gyis chos thos par 'dod par rigs pa ma yin no/_/khyod snying nas thos par 'dod na/_kho bos bsgo ba bzhin du byos shig_/drang srong gis smras pa/_ston pa 
[\[135b.6\]]chen po'i bka' bzhin du mi 'gal bar bgyi'o/_/zhes smras pa dang /_de la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/gal te khyod kyi pags pa bshus te shog shog tu byas la/_rus pa ni smyu gur byas/_khrag ni snag tsar byas te/_ngas bstan pa'i chos yi ger bris na/_khyod la chos 
[\[135b.7\]]bstan to/_/zhes smras so/_/de nas drang srong des de skad ces smras pa thos nas/_rab tu dga' mgu rangs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la bkur stir bya ba'i phyir/_pags pa bshus nas shog shog tu byas/_rus pa ni smyu gur byas/_khrag la snag tsar byas nas/_
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]dus la bab kyi myur du gsungs shig ces smras pa dang /_bram zes tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/lus kyi spyod pa rab bsdams shing /_/srog gcod rku dang g.yem mi bya/_/phra ma [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang tshig rtsub dang /_/'khyal ba smra bar mi bya'o/_/'dod pa 
[\[136a.2\]]rnams la mi chags shing /_/zhe sdang sems kyang med par bya/_/ngan par blta ba kun spangs na/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'o/_/zhes tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras ma thag tu/_yi ger bris nas 'dzam bu'i gling kun tu bsgrags te/_mi mang po thams cad kyis de la 
[\[136a.3\]]slob cing ci ltar bstan pa bzhin du nan tan byed du bcug go/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na yang /_sems can mang po'i slad du chos tshol ba la 'gyod pa'i thugs mi mnga' na/_da ci'i slad du chos kyang ma bstan par thams cad yongs su btang ste/_mya ngan las 'da' bar 
[\[136a.4\]]dgongs/_bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs ma mchis tshad ma mchis pa'i pha rol na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po shi bi zhes bgyi ba zhig byung ba dang /_rgyal po de bzhugs pa'i pho brang ni de ba brta zhes bgyi ste/_'byor pa/_bde ba/_lo legs pa/_
[\[136a.5\]]longs spyod dpag tu med pa dang ldan no/_/de'i tshe na rgyal po de 'dzam bu'i gling 'di la dbang mdzad de/_rgyal phran ni brgyad khri bzhi stong /_ljongs ni stong phrag drug cu'i nang na/_grong khyer khri phrag brgyad cu dang /_btsun mo dang pho brang gi slas stong phrag nyi shu dang /_rgyal bu lnga 
[\[136a.6\]]brgya tsam dang /_blon po chen po stong phrag bcu mnga' ba la dbang mdzad de/_thams cad la byams pa dang /_snying rjes ma khyab pa med do/_/de'i tshe na brgya byin lha'i dbang po lus kyi yon tan lnga dang bral te/_tshe'i dus byed du nye bas shin tu mi dga' ste/_mya ngan byed pa bi shwa karmas 
[\[136a.7\]]mthong nas/_brgya byin la ci'i slad du mya ngan mdzad cing mi dgyes ces gsol ba dang /_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_nga ni tshe'i dus byed du nye bas tshe 'phos pa'i ltas mngon du byung na/_'jig rten 'dir sangs rgyas kyi chos ni nub par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten na mi 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]bzhugs na/_kho bo gang la skyabs su 'gro ba mi shes pas mya ngan byed do/_/bi shwa karmas smras pa/_lha'i dbang po 'dzam bu'i gling na rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa shi bi zhes bya ba zhig bzhugs te/_shin tu yi dam la brtan zhing brtson 'grus brtsams 
[\[136b.2\]]pas gdon mi za bar mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/_de la skyabs su song na gdon mi za bar dpung gnyen du 'gyur te/_bgegs las rnam par thar bar 'gyur ro/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_gal te byang chub sems dpa' yin na/_sngar bgam dgos kyis sad du 'dong ngo /_/
[\[136b.3\]]khyod kyis ni phug ron zhig tu sprul cig_/nga ni khra bzhin du sprul te/_mgyogs par khyod kyi phyi bzhin du 'ong gi rgyal po de gang na bzhugs par song la/_skyabs btsal nas bgam ste/_de sgyu yod dam/_bden pa rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/bi shwa karmas smras pa/_lha'i dbang po 
[\[136b.4\]]skyes bu chen po byang chub sems dpa' la 'tshe ba mi sha'i mchod pa'i rigs kyis/_shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po 'di lta bus gtse ba'i mi rigs so zhes smras pa dang /_brgya byin lha'i dbang pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bdag ni de la ngan sems min/_/gser ltar 
[\[136b.5\]]sad nas mngon par 'gyur/_/bden pa rtogs par 'dod pa na/_/byang chub sems dpa' sad par bya/_/zhes tshigs su bcad pa de skad smras nas/_bi shwa karma ni phug ron du sprul/_brgya byin ni khra ru sprul/_phug ron gyi phyi bzhin du 'brangs te/_bzung la thug pa ltar 
[\[136b.6\]]byas pa dang /_phug ron skrag dngangs nas/_rgyal po'i mchan khung du zhugs te/_rgyal po la srog gi skyabs gsol to/_/khra yang mod la phyin te/_pho brang gi drung gang na ba der 'dug nas/_rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/phug ron 'di ni bdag gi zas lags te/_
[\[136b.7\]]'dir rgyal po la babs kyis myur du bdag la stsol cig_/bdag ni bkres pas rab tu nyen to zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_kho bos ni gang bdag la skyabs su 'ongs so cog la phyir mi gtong bar dam bcas pas/_'di yang mi sbyin no zhes smras pa dang /_yang 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]khras smras pa/_rgyal pos gsungs pa ltar thams cad kyi skyabs mdzad do zhe na/_gal te bdag gi zas mi stsal na bdag kyang 'tsho ba dang bral na/_ci bdag kyang thams cad kyi nang du ma gtogs sam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_khyod la sha gzhan zhig sbyin na za'am/_
[\[137a.2\]]khras smras pa/_bdag ni gsar du bkum pa'i sha rlon pa mchis na 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal po des 'di snyam du bsams so/_/bdag gis gsar du bsad pa'i sha rlon pa zhig sbyar na ni/_gcig bsad de gcig gso bar rigs pa ma yin te/_don med do snyam du 
[\[137a.3\]]bsams nas yang 'di snyam du sems so/_/bdag 'ba' zhig gis lus ma gtogs par gzhan ci tsam srog dang bcas pas thams cad ni srog phangs so snyam bsams nas/_gri rnon po thogs nas brla'i sha bcad nas khra la byin te/_phug ron gyi srog blus so/_/khras 
[\[137a.4\]]smras pa/_rgyal po khyod sbyin bdag du gyur te/_thams cad la snyoms na/_bdag bya chung ngu zhig lags kyang snyoms par mdzad 'tshal bas/_gal te phug ron gyi srog blu na srang gis btsal te/_mnyam par mdzad du gsol zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal pos srang long shig 
[\[137a.5\]]ces bka' stsal te/_srang gi khu ler ni phug ron bzhag_/srang gi gzhir ni sha bcad de spungs na/_brla'i sha zad kyang phug ron bas yang ngo /_/phrag pa gnyis dang /_rtsib logs g.yas g.yon dang /_lus kyi sha zad par bcad kyang /_phug ron dang mnyam par ma gyur 
[\[137a.6\]]nas/_rgyal po nyid bzhengs te/_srang gi nang du 'gro bar gzas pa las nyams kyis ma nus te/_sa la 'gyel nas brgyal lo/_/de nas ring zhig lon pa dang /_dran par gyur nas/_bdag gi sems la 'di skad ces smad do/_/thog ma med pa'i dus nas khyod kyis ma nus 
[\[137a.7\]]nas/_khams gsum du 'khor zhing sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong bar gyur kyang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs su ma gyur to/_/brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dus la bab ste/_le lo bya ba'i dus ma yin no zhes rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas brgyad bkag ste/_de nas 'bad 'bungs nas 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]srang gi gzhi'i nang du phyin pa dang /_da ni legs so zhes rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes so/_/de'i tshe gnam sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas/_lha rnams kyi pho brang yang 'gul zhing ldeg par gyur te/_gzugs kyi khams kyi lha man cad lhags nas steng gi bar snang la 'khod 
[\[137b.2\]]do/_/byang chub sems dpas shin tu dka' ba spyad cing lus dang gtan ma rung bar byas te/_chos kyi phyir lus dang srog la mi lta bar gyur pa'i dngos po de dag mthong nas/_mchi ma char bzhin du zag cing ngus te/_lha rdzas kyi me tog char bzhin du bab nas mchod pa byas so/_/
[\[137b.3\]]de'i tshe brgya byin gyis sngon gyi lus su bsgyur te/_rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal pos 'di lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba mdzad pa 'dis ci zhig bzhed/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhed dam/_brgya byin nam/_bdud kyi rgyal po'am/_khams gsum gyi dbang po bzhed 
[\[137b.4\]]dam/_ci zhig bzhed ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_bdag 'dod pa ni khams gsum gyi che ba can gyi longs spyod 'dod pa ma yin te/_bsod nams ci byed kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod do zhes smras pa dang /_brgya byin gyis smras pa/_'di ltar lus 
[\[137b.5\]]zhig cing ma rung bar byas te/_rus pa la thug pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa 'di la mi 'gyod dam zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal pos 'gyod pa med do zhes smras so/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_'gyod pa med ces smras mod kyis/_de ltar lus 'dar zhing rdag la dbugs chad pa tsam du 
[\[137b.6\]]smra yang mi nus pa la bltas na/_'gyod pa med par cis yid ches par 'gyur/_rgyal pos smras pa/_bdag thog ma nas tha ma'i bar du ba spu'i nyag ma tsam gyi 'gyod pa'i sems med na/_bdag ci dang ci 'dod pa gdon mi za bar 'gyur te/_smras pa'i tshig 'di bden na bden pa'i 
[\[137b.7\]]tshig smras pas/_bdag gi lus 'di snga mkho bzhin du rma med par gyur cig ces smras ma thag tu rgyal po'i lus sngon bas kyang lhag par bzang por gyur te/_lha dang mi'i 'jig rten du bcas pa thams cad dga' mgu rangs nas/_ngo mtshar rmad du gyur to/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]po shi bi ni da ltar sangs rgyas lags te/_bcom ldan 'das sngon 'das pa'i dus na yang /_sems can mang po'i slad du/_sku tshe la ma gzigs na/_da bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgya mtsho ni yongs su rdzogs/_chos kyi rgyal mtshan dag bsgrengs/_chos kyi rnga yang rab tu 
[\[138a.2\]]brdungs/_chos kyi sgron ma yang rab tu gsal bar mdzad de/_phan pa dang bde ba'i don mdzad pa'i dus la bab na/_ci'i slad du chos kyang ma bstan par sems can thams cad yongs su btang ste/_mya ngan las 'da' bar dgongs/_de'i tshe na tshangs pa'i rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs 
[\[138a.3\]]pa'i spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi sku tshe la chos ci ltar btsal ba dang /_sems can gyi slad du dbu stong tsam yang btang bar gyur to/_/zhes bstod cing bsngags pa byas so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i rgyal pos gsol pa bzhin 
[\[138a.4\]]du gnang bar mdzad nas/_yul bA rA Na sI na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]la mi 'jigs pa byin pa'i gnas su gshegs nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to/_/de ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas dkon mchog gsum yang 'jig rten na mngon sum du gyur to/_/de'i tshe de skad ces gsungs nas lha 
[\[138a.5\]]dang /_mi dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin sde brgyad la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa thams cad mngon par dga' nas rjes su spyod do/_/dpe sna tshogs bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na 
[\[138a.6\]]rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bsod snyoms kyi dus la bab nas/_sham thabs dang chos gos bgos nas lhung bzed bsnams te/_kun dga' bo dang bsod snyoms la gshegs so/_/de'i tshe na 
[\[138a.7\]]grong khyer de na rgan mo zhig la bu rtag tu rku ba gnyis shig yod de/_nor bdag gis zin nas zhal che ba'i mdun du khrid de/_khrims dang sbyar nas bsad pa la thug nas/_rigs ngan skrag ste gsod pa'i gnas su khrid pa las/_bcom ldan 'das rgyang ma nas gshegs pa rgan mo ma 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]smad gsum gyis mthong nas/_sangs rgyas gshegs pa'i phyogs su phyag 'tshal nas/_lha'i nang na gtso bo thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_bdag gi bu 'gum pa la thug pa 'di'i skyabs mdzad du gsol zhes smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsan nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[138b.2\]]thugs rje chen pos de dag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_de dag gi srog bskyab pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal te/_rgyal po la gsol ba 'debs su btang ba dang /_rgyal pos kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du de dag btang ngo /_/de 
[\[138b.3\]]dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin dran zhing rab tu dga' ba skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin chen pos bdag 
[\[138b.4\]]cag gi tshe srog lhag ma tsam zhig lus par gyur na/_lha'i gtso bo thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_bdag cag la chos rab tu 'byung bar ci gnang zhes gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par 'ongs so zhes bka' stsal pa na/_skra dang kha spu rang byi ste/_gos kyang ngur smrig tu 
[\[138b.5\]]gyur to/_/de dag shin tu dang ba'i sems brtan par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ci rigs pa'i chos bstan nas rdul dang dri ma zad de/_dgra bcom par gyur to/_/de'i ma rgan mo de yang chos thos pas lan cig phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/de'i tshe kun dga' bos de lta 
[\[138b.6\]]bu'i dngos po ngo mtshar che ba dag mthong nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan de snyed cig mnga'o zhes bsngags te/_yang 'di snyam du rgan mo ma smad gsum po 'dis sngon legs pa ci zhig bgyis na/_da ltar bcom ldan 'das dang phrad de/_nyes pa chen po las kyang thar la/_
[\[138b.7\]]mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob nas lus gcig gis phan pa dang /_bde ba'i don thob pa legs so snyam du bsam pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen nas kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ma smad gsum po 'di ni ngas da ltar 'di 'ba' zhig gi dus su gsos 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]par ma zad kyi/_sngon 'das pa'i dus na yang nga'i bka' drin gyis gsos so/_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sngon 'das pa'i dus na yang ma smad gsum po 'di dag ci ltar gsos pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/_
[\[139a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i pha rol na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'di na rgyal po shing rta chen po zhes bya ba zhig yod de rgyal po des rgyal phran lnga stong snyed la dbang byed do/_/rgyal po de la sras gsum 
[\[139a.3\]]mnga' ste/_rab ni sgra chen po zhes bya'o/_/'bring po ni lha chen po zhes bya'o/_/tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]ni sems can chen po zhes bya ste/_sras tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]de chung ngu nas byams pa dang snying rjer ldan te/_thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra'o/_/de'i tshe rgyal po de blon po dang bcas/_btsun 
[\[139a.4\]]mo dang sras su bcas te/_phyi rol tu 'chag cing dong ba las/_cung zad cig ngal bso ba'i bar du sras gsum po tshal gyi nang du song ba las/_stag mo zhig bu byung nas zhag du ma lon pa bkres shing skom pas nyen te/_phyir yang bu zos la thug pa zhig mthong nas/_rgyal 
[\[139a.5\]]bu tha [{]chungs kyis [,]chung gis [}]phu bo gnyis la smras pa/_stag mo 'di ni shin tu sdug bsngal gyis gzir te/_nyam chung la rid pas shi la thug pa 'di lta bu/_bu byung ma thag pa yang zos su 'dod do zhes smras pa dang /_phu bo gnyis kyis khyod zer ba bden no zhes zer ro/_/nu bos yang phu bo 
[\[139a.6\]]gnyis la smras pa/_stag mo 'dis zas su ci za zhes dris na/_phu bo gnyis kyis smras pa/_'di bsad ma thag pa'i sha rlon pa dang /_khrag dron mos de'i yid tshim par 'gyur ro zhes smras so/_/yang smras so/_/yang smras pa/_gang su yang rung ste de lta bu'i dngos pos 'di'i srog skyabs te/_
[\[139a.7\]]mi nyams par byed nus pa yod dam/_phu bo gnyis kyis smras pa/_de ni shin tu yang dka' bas med do/_/de nas rgyal bu tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]des yid la 'di snyam du bsams so/_/bdag yun ring po nas 'khor ba na 'khor zhing /_lus srog grangs med pa zhig chud gsan te/_
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]bar 'ga' ni 'dod chags kyi phyir/_bar 'ga' ni zhe sdang gi phyir/_bar 'ga' ni gti mug gi phyir/_lus btang yang chos kyi phyir bsod nams kyi zhing dang /_lan 'ga' yang ma phrad pa'i lus 'di ci rung snyam bsams nas/_gsum kar 'grogs te song ba las/_ring por ma 
[\[139b.2\]]phyin par phu bo gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mched gnyis sngar gshegs shig dang /_bdag don zhig gnyer te/_slad bzhin par mchi'o/_/zhes smras so/_/lam de nyid du zhugs te stag mo'i tshang gang na yod par myur du song nas/_stag mo'i drung du nyal ba dang /_stag 
[\[139b.3\]]mo kha thams pas za ma nus so/_/de'i tshe rgyal bus shing gi tshal pa rnon pos lus la khrag phyung nas/_stag mo la bldag tu bcug pa dang /_kha yang phyes nas lus kyi sha ma lus par zos so/_/phu bo gnyis kyis bltas na/_ring zhig tu ma 'ongs pas/_phyir rjes bzhin du 
[\[139b.4\]]tshol du dong ba las sngar smras pa'i tshul brtags na gdon mi za bar stag mo ltogs pas bsad do bsams nas der phyin te bltas na/_nu bo tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]stag gis zos te/_sha dang khrag gis kun tu bsgos nas/_rtsog rtsog pa ltar 'dug par mthong ngo /_/lus sa la brdabs te 
[\[139b.5\]]brgyal lo/_/ring zhig lon pa dang /_dbugs phyir byung nas/_cho nges 'debs te sa la 'gre zhing khams par gyur to/_/de'i tshe na btsun mo yum mnal ba'i rmi lam na/_phug ron gsum zhig kun tu 'phur zhing rtse ba las/_nang gi chung ngu gcig khras khyer ba snyam rmis ma 
[\[139b.6\]]thag tu sad nas/_skrag dngangs te rgyal po la bsnyad do/_/bdag gis gtam du thos na/_phug ron ni bu pho'i bla ste/_phug ron nang gi chung ngu khras khyer ba na/_bdag gi bu nang gi sdug pa la bkra mi shis nges kyis zhes de ma thag tu kun tu tshol ba btang ba las/_ring por ma lon 
[\[139b.7\]]par rgyal bu gnyis ni 'ongs kyis/_bu nang gi sdug pa cang ma nyes sam ga re zhes dris na/_phu bo gnyis skad kyis brnangs te/_ring shig tu dbugs kyang ma phyin smra yang ma nus nas/_de'i 'og tu dbugs phyin pa dang /_stag gis zos so zhes smras so/_/lha mo des de skad 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]smras pa thos nas khams te/_sa la 'gyel nas ring zhig lon pa dang /_dbugs phyin te/_bu gnyis dang btsun mo dang /_pho brang gi slas su bcas te myur bar rgyal bu gang du tshe 'phos pa'i gnas su song ngo /_/de'i tshe stag mos rgyal bu'i sha ni zad par zos zin 
[\[140a.2\]]gyis/_rus pa dang khrag 'ba' zhig gis sa la rtsog rtsog pa ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/btsun mos ni mgo nas bzung ngo /_/rgyal pos ni lag pa nas bzung ste/_cho nges btab nas ngus pa dang /_der yang khams nas ring zhig lon te/_phyir sangs so/_/rgyal bu 
[\[140a.3\]]sems can chen po de der tshe 'phos nas/_dga' ldan lha'i gnas su skyes so/_/de ci'i phyir bdag ci spyad pas 'dir skyes snyam bsams te/_lha'i mig gis rgyud lnga kun tu bltas na/_bdag tshe 'phos pa'i rus bu tshal na 'dug pa la pha mas bskor te/_shin tu yid la 
[\[140a.4\]]gcags pas/_mya ngan gyi zug rngus sdug bsngal zhing cho nges 'debs pa mthong nas/_lhas bsams pa/_bdag gi pha ma 'di ltar mi dga' ba'i rkyen gyis gal te na lus dang srog gi bar chad du 'gyur gyis/_de la spro ba bskyed cing gtam byar 'gro'o snyam bsams 
[\[140a.5\]]nas/_nam mkha' las babs te steng gi nam mkha' las tshig snyan pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis pha ma gnyis la spro ba bskyed do/_/pha ma gnyis kyis nam mkha' la bltas nas/_lha khyod su zhig lags pa bdag la smros shig ces smras pa dang /_lhas smras pa/_
[\[140a.6\]]bdag ni rgyal bu sems can chen po zhes bya ba yin te/_bdag gis lus stag mo ltogs pa bsnyod pas dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas su skyes so/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar mkhyen par mdzod cig_/ci tsam sred pa dang bcas pa'i chos ni mthar 'jig par 'ong ngo /_/skye ba 
[\[140a.7\]]yod na nges par 'jig go/_/sdig pa byas na sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/dge ba byas na mtho ris su skye ste/_skye ba dang 'jig pa kun la srid na/_ci'i slad du dga' ba 'ba' zhig gi phyir mya ngan gyi rgya mtshor ltung ba mi tshor ram/_dge ba'i chos la brtson 'grus mdzod 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]ces pa dang /_de'i pha mas smras pa/_khyod ni snying rje chen pos stag mo bsnyod de thams cad la snying brtse ba yin na/_bdag cag btang ste/_tshe'i dus byas pas/_deng ni khyod dran pa'i phyir sha yang dum bu dum bur chad pa tsam du sdug bsngal gyis gdungs te/_snying rje chen po 
[\[140b.2\]]spyod pa khyod 'di ltar bya ba'i rigs sam/_de nas yang lha des tshig snyan pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas bzhams te/_spro ba bskyed pas de'i pha ma yang spro ba cung zad skyes nas/_rin po che sna bdun gyi sgrom byas te/_rus bu de'i nang du bcug ste sbas pa'i steng du mchod rten byas so/_/
[\[140b.3\]]lha yang phyir gnas su song ngo /_/rgyal po dang 'khor mang po rnams kyang phyir pho brang du song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_khyod kyi yid la ci snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po shing rta chen po de su yin snyam du sems/_de ni da ltar 
[\[140b.4\]]nga'i yab rgyal po zas gtsang ma yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po de'i btsun mo de ni da ltar nga'i yum sgyu ma lha mdzes yin no/_/de'i dus na sras rab sgra chen po de ni byams pa yin no/_/sras 'bring po lha chen po ni ba mi su tra yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]
[\[140b.5\]]sems can chen po ni de gzhan du ma sems shig_/da ltar nga yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na stag phrug ni mi 'di gnyis yin te/_ngas sngon yang yun ring po nas bgegs las thar bar byas te srog bskyabs nas bde bar byas so/_/da mngon par sangs rgyas nas kyang bgegs 
[\[140b.6\]]las thar bar mdzad nas/_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su grol lo/_/de'i tshe na kun dga' bo dang /_'khor mang po thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/_/sems can chen pos stag mo la lus byin pa'i le'u ste 
[\[140b.7\]]gnyis pa'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe nam gyi cha stod la lha gnyis shig sangs rgyas gang na ba der 'ongs so/_/
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]lha de'i lus kyi 'od kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gser gyi mdog ltar gcig tu snang bar byas so/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyis ci rigs su dam pa'i chos bstan pas sems rnam par grol te/_gnyi gas byang chub kyi 'bras bu thob nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[141a.2\]]zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyir yang lha'i gnas su dong ngo /_/phyi de nyin nam nangs ma thag tu/_kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/mdang lha gnyis shig mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyis na/_de'i lus kyi 
[\[141a.3\]]'od kyis kun tu snang zhing mdzes par bgyis pa 'di sngon las ci zhig bgyis pas de 'dra'i 'bras bu thob par gyur ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sngon sangs rgyas 'od srung mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos 'jig 
[\[141a.4\]]par nye ba na/_bram ze gnyis shig gis nyin zhag gcig pa'i tshul khrims brgyad mnos te/_de dag la gcig gis ni lhar skye bar shog cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/gcig gis ni rgyal por gyur cig ces smon lam btab nas/_phyir khyim du 'ong ngo /_/de la gcig khyim 
[\[141a.5\]]du 'ongs nas/_chung mas zan la bos nas khyos 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyi dro kha zas mi za'i khrims mnos pas mi 'dod do zhes pa dang /_chung mas smras pa/_khyod ni kun tu rgyu yin te/_bdag cag gi chos kyi tshul khrims yod na/_ci'i phyir ston 
[\[141a.6\]]pa gzhan gyi tshul khrims mnos/_gal te bdag dang lhan cig zan mi za na khyod ci skad smras pa bzhin du kun tu rgyu gzhan dag la bsnyad de/_khyod dang lhan cig tu 'du shing gtam zer du mi gnang bar skrod du gzhug go/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_khyos ma bzod de dngangs 
[\[141a.7\]]skrag nas chung ma dang lhan cig tu dus ma yin par zan zos so/_/mi de gnyis tshe'i dbang thang ci tsam du thub pa bzhin du so so nas tshe'i dus byas so/_/rgyal por smon pa de ni tshul khrims bsrungs pas rgyal po'i rigs su skyes so/_/lhar skye bar smon pa de ni tshul khrims zhig 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]pas klu zhig tu skyes so/_/de'i tshe na rgyal por skyes pa de'i bza' shing gi ra ba bsrung ba zhig_/nyin gcig bzhin du shing thog rnam pa sna tshogs skyel skyel ba las/_phyis dus gzhan zhig na/_chu mig cig gi nang nas ku shu kha dog dang dri bsung dang ldan pa zhig rnyed nas/_'di 
[\[141b.2\]]snyam du sems so/_/bdag shing thog skyel zhing phan tshun 'gro ba'i tshe/_rtag tu sgo bas bkag ste/_legs par 'gro mi ster gyis/_ku shu 'di sgo ba 'di la sbyin no snyam nas/_rgyal po'i chab sgo ba la sbyin no/_/chab sgo bas kyang shing thog de blangs nas/_'di snyam du bsams 
[\[141b.3\]]so/_/zhu zhing gsol ba la 'gro ba'i tshe/_rtag tu nyug rum gyis bkag nas/_nyams 'phags su 'gror med kyis/_ku shu 'di ni nyug rum de la sbyin snyam du bsams nas/_nyug rum la byin no/_/nyug rum gyis kyang blangs nas/_btsun mo la phul lo/_/btsun mos 
[\[141b.4\]]thogs nas rgyal po la phul lo/_/rgyal pos ku shu de zos nas/_rab tu mngar zhing lhag par dri bsung dang ldan pa zhig nas/_btsun mo la ku shu 'di gang nas rnyed ces dris pa dang /_btsun mos kyang ji ltar rnyed pa'i gtam zhib tu byas nas/_gcig nas gcig tu thug ste/_
[\[141b.5\]]tha mar ra ba bsrung ba la thug nas/_rgyal pos ra ba bsrung ba bkug nas/_de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga'i bza' shing gi ra ba na shing thog 'di lta bu yod na/_ci'i phyir nga la mi 'bul bar gzhan dag la sbyin zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_ra ba bsrung ba des thog ma ji ltar 
[\[141b.6\]]rnyed pa zhib tu gsol to/_/de nas rgyal pos ra ba bsrung ba de la deng phyin cad ku shu 'di lta bu rtag tu phul cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_ra ba bsrung ba des 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ku shu 'di ni 'bras bu las skyes pa ma lags te/_chab mig cig gi nang nas rnyed pas slan cad ni 
[\[141b.7\]]bdag gis mi rnyed de/_mi 'byor to zhes gsol pa dang /_de la yang rgyal pos khyod kyis phyin cad ma rnyed na/_khyod kyi lus dum bur bcad do zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_ra ba bsrung ba de phyir gnas su song nas mya ngan byed cing ngus pa dang /_ngu ba'i sgra chen po de klu zhig gis 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]thos nas/_klu de mi zhig tu sprul nas de la 'di skad du khyod ci'i phyir mi dga' zhing ngu zhes dris so/_/ra ba bsrung ba des ci ltar gyur ba'i gtam klu la zhib tu smras pa dang /_klu de mi snang bar gyur nas ring po ma lon par gser gyi gzhong ba cig gi nang shing tog bzang 
[\[142a.2\]]pos bkang ste/_mi de la byin nas khyod kyis shing tog 'di khyer la rgyal po la phul la phrin du yang 'di skad gyis shig_/rgyal po dang bdag tu bshes te/_sngon tshe snga ma la gnyi ga kun tu rgyu ba yin pa las nyin zhag gcig pa'i khrims brgyad mnos te/_so sor smon lam 
[\[142a.3\]]btab pa las/_rgyal po ni tshul khrims bsrung bas rgyal por gyur te/_bdag ni tshul khrims nyams pas klur skyes kyi/_da yang khrims bsrung zhing lus 'di las thar bar dga'o/_/nyin zhag gcig pa'i khrims brgyad kyi cho ga bdag la stsal du gsol/_ci ste ma gnang na 
[\[142a.4\]]rgyal po'i yul yang rgya mtshor bsgyur ro zhes 'phrin spring ngo /_/de nas ra ba bsrung ba des shing tog khyer te/_rgyal po la phul nas/_klus spring pa'i 'phrin yang rgyal po la rdzogs par bsnyad pa dang /_rgyal po de mi dga' bar gyur to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i tshe na 'jig rten 
[\[142a.5\]]na sangs rgyas kyang mi bzhugs/_dam pa'i chos kyang nub nas nyin zhag gcig pa'i khrims brgyad kyi dpe yang mi rnyed do/_/don de ma bsgrubs na ni gnod pa mngon du byed kyis dogs pas/_rtog pa la zhugs te/_mi dga' bar sems shing 'dug pa las/_rgyal po des 
[\[142a.6\]]blon po mchog gcig yod pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/klu zhig nga la khrims brgyad kyi dpe slong gis/_mi snyed du mi gnang ngo zhes bka' stsal nas/_blon pos gsol pa/_'jig rten na chos kyang ma mchis na bdag gis gang nas rnyed ces gsol pa dang /_rgyal 
[\[142a.7\]]po des blon po de la khyod kyis ma rnyed na bsad do zhes bka' stsal to/_/blon po de shin tu mi dga' bzhin du song nas khyim du phyin pa dang /_blon po de la pha rgas 'khogs pa zhig yod do/_/phas bltas na sngon cad ni bdag gi bu 'dzum mul te mdangs dang bcas pas gtam zer na/_
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]deng ci'i phyir sngon cad dang mi 'dra bar ngo 'dzum nag ste gtam zer ces byas pa dang /_des ji ltar gyur pa pha la zhib tu gtam byas so/_/de'i phas smras pa/_bdag gi khyim na ka ba zhig las rtag par 'od 'byung ste/_de'i nang na ci yod ltos shig ces bsgo ba dang /_ka ba phyung ste 
[\[142b.2\]]gshags na de'i nang nas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bcu gnyis kyi mdo dang /_nyin zhag gcig pa'i khrims brgyad kyi dpe byung nas/_blon po des rgyal po la phul lo/_/rgyal pos thob nas rab tu dga' mgu rangs te/_khrims brgyad kyi dpe gser gyi sgrom bur bcug nas klu 
[\[142b.3\]]la bskur to/_/klu des thob nas shin tu dga' bas rgyal po de la rin po che yang mang du phul lo/_/nyin zhag gcig pa'i khrims brgyad bsrungs nas gzhan dag kyang bsrung bar bskul to/_/de nas de'i tshe 'phos nas lhar skyes so/_/rgyal po de yang de bzhin du/_khrims 
[\[142b.4\]]bsrungs pas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas gnas lhan cig tu lhar skyes te/_de gnyis mdang nam gyi cha stod la nga'i spyan sngar 'ongs te/_ci rigs par chos bstan pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas/_ngan song gsum dang yongs su bral te/_lha dang mi'i longs 
[\[142b.5\]]spyod myong zhing mthar mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du thob par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs pa la 'khor mang po thams cad rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/kun tu rgyus tshul khrims bsrungs pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//
[\[142b.6\]]'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe yul de na khyim bdag cig la bu khye'u zhig btsas na/_khye'u de dbyibs legs shing blta na 
[\[142b.7\]]sdug pa bzang ba zhig ste/_btsas nas ring po ma lon par smra yang shes so/_/khye'u des pha ma la bcom ldan 'das da ltar bzhugs sam zhes dris pa dang /_da ltar bzhugs so zhes smras pa dang /_'o na btsun pa shA ri'i bu dang /_kun dga' bo la sogs pa bzhugs sam zhes dris 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]pa dang /_de yang bzhugs so zhes smras so/_/khye'u de'i pha mas bu btsas ma thag tu smra shes pa 'di ni mi ma yin no snyam nas/_ngo mtshar ba dang ya mtshan du gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la zhus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang khyod kyi bu 'di mtshan dang ldan te/_
[\[143a.2\]]the tsom ma byed cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_khye'u de'i pha ma rab tu dga' mgu rangs te phyir khyim du 'ongs so/_/de nas khye'u des pha ma la sangs rgyas dang dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams spyan drongs shig ces gsol pa dang /_de'i pha mas sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun spyan drangs nas/_
[\[143a.3\]]yo byad sbyar dgos te/_'phral du 'byor pa yang ma yin no zhes bsgo ba dang bus smras pa/_khang pa'i nang phyag dar dang chag chag byos te/_gdan thing la/_gdan mthon po gsum zhig sgrigs te thing shig dang /_zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan par yang rang 'ong ngo /_/bdag gi tshe 
[\[143a.4\]]snga ma'i pha ma yang da ltar yul bA rA Na sIr mchis kyi/_de yang bos shig ces smras so/_/de'i pha mas kyang bus smras pa bzhin du mi zhig glang po che la bskyon te/_de'i pha ma yang bos nas 'ongs so/_/gdan mthon po gsum bshams pa de gcig la ni sangs rgyas 
[\[143a.5\]]bzhugs su gsol cig_/gcig la ni tshe snga ma'i pha ma bzhugs cig_/gcig la ni da ltar lus bskyed pa'i pha ma bzhugs shig skad pa dang /_de nas sangs rgyas kyang dge slong gi 'khor dang bcas te gshegs nas/_gdan bting ba la rim bzhin du bzhugs te/_
[\[143a.6\]]zhal zas bzang pos kyang thams cad khyed cing chog par gyur nas/_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan nas/_khye'u de'i pha ma gnyis dang khyim gang gi mi chen po dang /_chung ngu thams cad kyis kyang chos thos nas rab tu dga' ste/_kun gyis 'bras bu dang po thob par 
[\[143a.7\]]gyur to/_/khye'u de yang phyis cher skyes nas rab tu byung ste/_brtson 'grus brtsams pas dgra bcom pa yang thob par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la kun dga' bos gsol pa/_dge slong 'dis sngon legs pa ci zhig bgyis na/_che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skyes te 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]chung ngu nas smra yang 'tshal la/_rab tu byung nas kyang mngon par shes pa myur du thob par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_mi 'di tshe snga ma la yul bA rA Na sI'i khyim bdag gi bu las khyim bdag tshe 'phos nas/_so chis zhig ste dbul phongs 
[\[143b.2\]]par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten na bzhugs pa dang 'phrad kyang /_mchod pa bya ba'i longs spyod med pas/_de mi dga' nas rigs che zhing mtho ba tsam la gla za bar khas blangs nas/_lo gcig lon pa dang gser srang stong tsam rnyed do/_/de la 
[\[143b.3\]]rigs che zhing mtho ba zhig gis khyod chung ma mi len nam zhes dris pa dang /_nga mi 'dod do zhes smras so/_/des yang dris pa/_'o na gser 'di ci zhig bya zhes dris pa dang /_des sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la bsod snyoms zhig gsol bar dgos so zhes smras 
[\[143b.4\]]so/_/rigs che zhing mtho ba des smras pa/_khyod sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun spyan drang 'dod na/_kho bos gser sbyar te/_zhal zas la sogs pa'i g.yos kyang bshams kyis/_kho bo'i khyim du spyan drongs shig ces smras pa dang /_dbul po des kyang de 
[\[143b.5\]]bzhin du bya'o zhes smras pa dang /_zhal zas bshams te/_sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun spyan drangs so/_/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis tshe'i dus byas nas kyang khyim bdag de'i khyim du skyes te/_da yang sangs rgyas spyan drangs nas chos thos nas kyang byang chub thob par 
[\[143b.6\]]gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_sngon gyi mi dbul po de ni khyim bdag gi khye'u dge slong 'di yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs pa la 'khor mang po thams cad rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/lus btsongs nas 
[\[143b.7\]]mchod pa byas pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe yul de nyid na tshong pa lnga brgya tsam zhig rgya mtshor rin po 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]che len du 'gro ba de dag gis 'di ltar bgros so/_/bdag cag gis mi'i nang na mkhas shing shes pa zhig ded dpon du bkri'o zhes bgros nas/_dge bsnyen khrims lnga pa zhig khrid de/_rgya mtshor zhugs so/_/rgya mtsho'i dbus su phyin pa dang /_rgya mtsho'i lha de 
[\[144a.2\]]srin po zhig tu sprul nas/_lus gzugs shin tu mi sdug cing /_sngo la gnag pa/_mche ba gyen du byung ba/_mgo la me 'bar ba zhig drung du 'ongs nas gru 'di nga la byin cig ces smras te/_tshong pa la 'di skad ces dri'o/_/'jig rten na gang dag 'jigs su rung ba nga las 
[\[144a.3\]]'da' ba yod dam zhes dris pa dang /_dge bsnyen gyis smras pa/_khyod bas shin tu lhag par 'jigs pa yod do/_/rgya mtsho'i lhas smras pa/_de lta bu su zhig_/dge bsnyen gyis smras pa/_'jig rten na glen pa gti mug can/_mi dge ba'i las rnams bag med par byed pa 
[\[144a.4\]]srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_tshig 'khyal pa smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_zhe gcod pa'i tshig smra ba dang /_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang che ba dang /_ngan par lta ba dag tshe 'phos nas sems can dmyal 
[\[144a.5\]]bar skye ste/_sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong ba rnams sems can dmyal ba'i srung mas khrid de/_la la ni mtshon gyis dmyal zhing gtubs/_la la ni shing rtas phan tshun du drangs nas khams tshad du bcad/_la la ni gtun gyis brdungs/_la la ni rang thag gis btags/_la la ni 
[\[144a.6\]]ral gri'i ri la 'dzegs/_la la ni mi'i shing rta dang zangs khol ba dang chab rom dang ngan skyugs kyi nang du bskol ba la sogs pa/_sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad pa rnam pa sna tshogs de lta bu dag lo brgya stong gi bar du myong ba de ni/_khyod bas shin tu yang lhag par 'jigs su rung ngo 
[\[144a.7\]]zhes smras pa dang /_rgya mtsho'i lhas thos nas de ma thag tu mi snang bar gyur to/_/yang rgya mtsho'i nang du song ba las/_rgya mtsho'i lha de mi'i nang nas shin tu rid cing nyam thag pa rtsa dang rus pa tsam 'brel pa zhig tu sprul nas gru 'di nga la byin cig ces smra zhing de la 'di skad ces dri'o/_/
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]'jig rten na rid cing nyam thag pa nga las lhag pa yod dam zhes dris pa dang /_dge bsnyen gyis smras pa/_khyod pas shin tu lhag par nyam thag cing rid pa yod do/_/rgya mtsho'i lhas smras pa/_de lta bu de su yin/_dge bsnyen gyis smras pa/_gang glen zhing gti mug can rang 
[\[144b.2\]]bzhin gyis 'jungs zhing ser sna byed la/_'dod pas phrag dog byed la sbyin pa mi shes pa dag tshe 'phos nas/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skyes te/_lus ni ri bo tsam/_mgrin pa ni mo khab tsam du gyur te/_skra 'dzings pa gnag cing rid pa/_lo brgya stong gi bar du chu'i ming yang mi 
[\[144b.3\]]thos pa de ni khyod bas kyang shin tu lhag par rid do zhes smras ma thag tu mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas yang song song ba las rgya mtsho'i lha de mi'i nang nas gzugs byad shin tu bzang po zhig tu sprul nas/_gru 'di nga la byin cig ces smras te/_tshong pa dag la 'jig rten mi'i nang na nga 
[\[144b.4\]]tsam du gzugs byad bzang la mdzes pa yod dam/_dge bsnyen gyis smras pa/_khyod bas brgya 'gyur stong 'gyur gyis lhag par bzang ba yod do/_/rgya mtsho'i lhas smras pa/_bdag bas lhag par bzang ba de su zhig_/dge bsnyen gyis smras pa/_'jig rten na 
[\[144b.5\]]mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa/_dge ba bcu phun sum tshogs par spyod pa/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las yongs su dag pas/_dkon mchog gsum la shin tu dad pa/_ci 'byor pa des mchod pa byed pa'i blo can de ni/_tshe 'phos nas mtho ris kyi lhar skyes te/_
[\[144b.6\]]gzugs byad legs par shin tu sdug pa shin tu mdzes pa/_de ni khyod bas brgya 'gyur stong 'gyur gyis lhag ste/_khyod dang de gnyis bskrun na/_spre'u zhar ma dang bkra shis ma bskrun pa dang 'dra'o/_/de nas rgya mtsho'i lhas chu snyim pa gang bcus nas dge bsnyen de la snyim 
[\[144b.7\]]pa gang gi chu mang ngam/_rgya mtsho'i chu mang /_zhes dris pa dang /_dge bsnyen gyis snyim pa gang gi chu mang gi rgya mtsho'i chu ni mang ba ma yin no zhes smras so/_/rgya mtsho'i lhas smras pa/_khyed 'di skad du smras pa'i tshig de bden pa yin nam/_dge bsnyen gyis smras pa/_tshig 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]'di ni bden pa yin gyis [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa ma yin no/_/bden par cir mngon/_smras pa rgya mtsho'i chu mang mod kyi/_gdon mi za bar skam pa'i dus yod do/_/bskal pa mes 'jig tu nye ba na nyi ma gnyis shar te chu mig dang lteng ka kun bskams so/_/nyi ma gsum 
[\[145a.2\]]shar ba na/_chu bran thams cad bskams so/_/nyi ma bzhi shar ba na chu bo thams cad bskams so/_/nyi ma lnga shar ba na rgya mtsho chen po yang snga ma las 'grib bo/_/nyi ma drug shar ba na sum nyis 'grib bo/_/nyi ma bdun shar ba na rgya mtsho chen po yang bskams te/_
[\[145a.3\]]ri rab lhun po yang rnyil rdo rje'i mtha' la thug pa'i bar du tshig cing 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig shin tu dad pa'i sems kyis chu snyim pa gang tsam sangs rgyas la mchod dam/_dge 'dun la phul lam/_pha ma la phul lam/_dbul phongs la byin nam/_gcan 
[\[145a.4\]]gzan la byin na/_bsod nams 'di ni bskal pa du mar yang mi zad de/_de bas na rgya mtsho'i chu ni nyung gis/_snyim pa gang gi chu ni mang bar rig par bya'o/_/de nas rgya mtsho'i lha rab tu dga' ste/_des dge bsnyen de la rin po che mang du phul nas/_rin po che dam pa dag 
[\[145a.5\]]sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun la yang bskur ro/_/dge bsnyen dang tshong pa rnams rin po ches chog par gyur nas/_phyir yang bde bar yul du phyin to/_/de'i tshe dge bsnyen de dang /_tshong pa lnga brgya tsam sangs rgyas gang na ba der 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos 
[\[145a.6\]]phyag 'tshal te/_so so nas rin po che thogs pa dang /_rgya mtsho'i lhas bskur ba yang sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun la phul te/_de dag pus mo sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag kyang ston pa'i bstan pa la rab 
[\[145a.7\]]tu 'byung ngo zhes smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge bsnyen dag legs par 'ongs so zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_skra dang kha spu rang byi ste/_chos gos gyon pa'i dge slong du gyur to/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyis ci rigs pa'i chos bstan cing phyis 'dod pa kun zad de/_
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]dgra bcom par gyur to/_/'khor mang po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/rgya mtsho'i lhas dris pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//bam po gnyis pa/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das bya 
[\[145b.2\]]ka lan da ka gnas pa 'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na yul de na blon po chen po shin tu phyug pa zhig la bu tsa med do/_/de'i tshe na chu klung gang gA'i 'gram na/_ma Ni b+ha dra zhes bya ba'i lha rten zhig yod de/_thams cad de la phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa byed de/_blon po 
[\[145b.3\]]chen po de yang lha rten de'i gan du song nas/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag la bu tsa med de/_lha khyod yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa zhes thos kyis/_'gro ba kun la skyobs pa khyod gzhan gyi smon lam bskang bar nus na/_bdag kyang bskyab tu gsol lo/_/gal 
[\[145b.4\]]te bdag la khyod kyis bu cig stsal na/_gser dang dngul gyis lha khyod kyi sku yang g.yogs shing /_bzhugs pa'i rten yang spos dang byug pas byug go/_/ci ste mngon par rtags med na/_lha khyod kyi rten yang bshig la/_khyod kyi lus la mi gtsang ba dang bshang gcis kyang
