[\[145b.5\]]bsku'o zhes smras pa dang /_lha des thos nas 'di snyam du bsams so/_/blon po de ni phyug cing btsan la mthu che bas/_smad rigs tsam gyis 'di'i bur mi 'gyur te/_bdag mthu chung bas 'di'i smon lam bskang mi nus so/_/gal te smon pa bzhin du ma byas na gdon mi za 
[\[145b.6\]]bar mi sdug par tho 'tshams so bsams nas/_rten bsrung ba'i lha des ma Ni b+ha dra la gsol pa dang /_de yang de lta bu'i mthu med pas/_rnam thos kyi bu gang na ba der song nas/_rnam thos kyi bu la gsol to/_/rnam thos kyi bus kyang bdag gi mthu tsam gyis bu yod par mi 
[\[145b.7\]]nus so snyam bsams nas/_rnam thos kyi bu de brgya byin gang na ba der song ste 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag gi blon po ma Ni b+ha dra zhes bgyi bas bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o/_/rgyal po'i khab na blon po zhig bdag la bu slong ste/_smon pa bzhin du byas na ni mchod pa dang rim gro 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]yang byed do/_/smon pa bzhin du ma byas na rten yang bshig ste mi sdug par bya'o zhes dam bcas pas/_de ni dam bcas pa bzhin du gdon mi 'tshal bar bgyid na/_brgya byin lha'i dbang po khyod kyis de la bu zhig mchis par mdzad du gsol zhes gsol pa dang /_
[\[146a.2\]]brgya byin gyis smras pa/_'di ni shin tu yang dka' mod kyis/_da ltar rgyu zhig snang ngo /_/de'i tshe na lha'i sras po zhig yon tan lnga dang bral nas tshe'i dus byed du nye ba zhig yod de/_de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod ni tshe'i dus byed par nges pas/_dus byas na blon po de'i bur 
[\[146a.3\]]skyes shig ces smras so/_/lha'i sras pos smras pa/_bdag ni rab tu 'byung zhing dam pa'i chos spyod par dad de/_gal te rigs che zhing mtho bar skyes na/_rab tu 'byung bar dka'o/_/rigs tha mal par gyur na sla'o zhes gsol pa dang /_brgya byin gyis yang smras pa/_lha 
[\[146a.4\]]khyod der skyes shig dang /_rab tu 'byung bar dad na/_ngas kyang grogs bya'o zhes smras so/_/lha'i sras po de der tshe 'phos nas/_blon po de'i rigs su de'i btsun mo'i rum du skyes te/_phyis btsas na dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug pa bzang ba zhig btsas te/_mtshan 
[\[146a.5\]]mkhan la bstan nas/_mtshan mkhan gyis kyang bltas te/_bu 'di thog ma gang nas rnyed ces dris nas/_chu klung gang gA'i lha las bslangs so/_/zhes byas pa dang /_bu de'i ming yang gang gA dar zhes bya bar btags so/_/phyis tshad du phyin par skyes pa dang /_des 
[\[146a.6\]]pha ma la bdag ni rab tu byung bar gsol lo zhes smras so/_/de la pha mas smras pa/_kho bo ni 'di lta bur phyug cing btsan te/_longs spyod chen po dang ldan la/_bu ni khyod gcig pur zad de/_nga'i rigs bsab cing pha ma gso dgos kyi mi gnang ngo zhes bsgo ba dang /_
[\[146a.7\]]khye'u des bsams pa bzhin du ma 'grub pas shin tu mi dga' ste/_'di snyam du lus 'di med par byas la/_rigs tha mal pa cig tu skyes te/_rab tu 'byung bar gsol na/_'di las sla yang srid snyam du bsams nas/_song ste phyi rol tu byung nas/_brag mthon po zhig la 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]mchongs so/_/brag la mchongs te sa la lhung na yang snad pa'am nyams pa med do/_/de nas chu chen po'i 'gram du song ste/_chur mchongs na yang chus g.yengs te mnyes par phyir byung ngo /_/btsan dug zos na yang dug gis ma thub cing /_gnod par ma gyur nas/_
[\[146b.2\]]yang 'di snyam du bsams so/_/bdag gis rgyal po'i khrims dang 'gal ba zhig byas na/_rgyal pos bsad kyang srid snyam bsams nas/_rgyal po'i btsun mo dang slas rnams pho brang gi phyi rol du byung ste/_skyed mos tshal gyi rdzing bur khrus byed du dong nas/_de dag gis 
[\[146b.3\]]gos dang rgyan bkrol te shing la bzhag go/_/de ltar gos dang rgyan shing la bzhag pa gang ga dar song bas mthong ba dang /_skyed mos tshal du zhugs te/_btsun mo de dag gi gos dang rgyan pang pas btab nas/_sgor byung ba dang /_sgo srung gis bzung ste/_rgyal po ma skyes dgra 
[\[146b.4\]]la phul lo/_/rgyal pos de skad ces thos nas rab tu khros te/_mda' gzhu blangs nas rgyal po nyid lag dar te khye'u la 'phangs nas mda' 'phangs pa khye'u la ma song gi phyir yang rgyal po'i drung du lhung ngo /_/lan gsum gyi bar du de ltar gyur nas/_rgyal po dngangs te/_
[\[146b.5\]]gzhu yang bor nas khye'u la khyod lha'am klu'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam/_gnod sbyin nam/_ci zhig zhes smras so/_/khye'us gsol pa/_bdag la gsol ba sna cig mchis/_de gnang na legs par smra zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras 
[\[146b.6\]]so/_/khye'us gsol pa/_bdag ni lha yang ma lags klu yang ma lags te/_rgyal po'i khab kyi blon po'i bu lags so/_/bdag rab tu byung bar dad na/_bdag gi pha mas ma gnang na/_bdag gi lus 'di gzhan du skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du rang 'chi'o snyam nas/_brag 
[\[146b.7\]]mthon po la mchongs/_chur yang mchongs/_btsan dug kyang 'tshal na 'gum du ma btub nas/_rgyal po'i khrims las 'gal ba zhig bgyis na 'gum par 'gyur snyam bsams te/_rgyal pos 'gum par bgyi ba pas kyang 'di ltar ma 'gum ste/_da 'di 'dra bar gyur na rgyal 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]pos thugs rje bar dgongs te/_bdag rab tu 'byung bar gnong shig ces gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos kyang khyod rab tu byung bar gnang ngo zhes bka' stsal nas/_khye'u de khrid de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nas/_ci ltar gyur ba bcom ldan 'das la zhib tu 
[\[147a.2\]]gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rab tu 'byung bar gnang nas lus la chos gos gyon cig ces pa dang dge slong du gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ci rigs par chos bstan nas/_sems rnam par grol te dgra bcom par gyur nas/_rig pa gsum dang /_mngon 
[\[147a.3\]]par shes pa drug dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang ldan par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das khye'u gzhon nu 'dis sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig bsgrub na/_brag la mchongs kyang ma gum la chab tu mchongs 
[\[147a.4\]]kyang gnod par ma gyur/_btsan dug 'tshal kyang ma gum/_mda' 'phangs kyang smas par ma gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das dang mjal nas 'khor ba'i mtha' las grol bar gyur ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sngon 
[\[147a.5\]]'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa 'das pa na/_yul bA rA Na sI zhes bya ba na/_rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_rgyal po de'i btsun mo dang pho brang gi slas su bcas nas/_skyed mos tshal du rol du gshegs so/_/skyed mos tshal de na pho brang gi slas dag 
[\[147a.6\]]gis glu blangs pa dang /_ra ba'i phyi rol du mi zhig gis skad chen pos ram bu bteg pa rgyal pos thos so/_/rgyal pos de thos nas khros te mi de zung la sod cig ces bka' stsal to/_/de'i tshe blon po zhig phyi rol nas nang du 'ongs pa las/_mi btson du bzung ba mthong ba dang /_
[\[147a.7\]]g.yog 'khor rnams la 'dis ci nyes te bzung zhes dris na/_de dag gis ci'i phyir bzung ba'i gtam zhib tu smras pa dang /_blon po des de dag la re zhig ma bsad par sdod cig kho bos rgyal po la gsol zhes smras nas pho brang gi nang du song ste/_rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]'gum du khrid pa'i mi des 'gum la thug pa'i las ma bgyis so/_/glu blangs pa'am ram bu bteg pa ni gzugs su mi snang bas/_mi rigs pa'i glo ba rings pa dang /_btsun mo la ngan du bgyi ba ma lags kyis/_de'i srog la thugs brtse bar dgongs te btang bar rigs so zhes 
[\[147b.2\]]gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos kyang ma bsad par thong shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_mi de yang blon po'i g.yog byed pa la zhugs te/_phyis lo mang zhig lon pa dang /_'di snyam du sems so/_/'dod chags kyis smas pa ni ral gri bas rno ste/_bdag 'di ltar nyam thag pa yang 
[\[147b.3\]]'dod chags kyi phyir ro snyam bsams nas/_blon po de la bdag rab tu 'byung zhing thar pa'i lam bsgom du ci gnang zhes gsol nas/_blon po des kyang khyod thar pa'i lam bsgom na bdag kyang bgegs mi byed kyis/_khyod thar bar gyur nas yang phyir bdag dang phrad par shog shig 
[\[147b.4\]]ces bsgo'o/_/de nas mi de yang dben par song nas don dam pa yid la byas te/_brtson 'grus brtsams pas rang sangs rgyas su gyur nas/_phyir yang grong khyer du song ste/_blon po chen po gang na ba der 'ongs so/_/blon po chen po de rab tu dga' nas bsod snyoms dang /_
[\[147b.5\]]'tsho ba'i yo byad rnam pa bzhi mi brel bar phul lo/_/de nas rang sangs rgyas de steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas/_sku la chu 'bab pa dang /_me byung ba dang /_'od zer cher gtong ba la sogs te/_cho 'phrul rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad bstan to/_/blon po chen po des de lta bu dag 
[\[147b.6\]]mthong nas tshad med pa'i spro ba skyes pas 'di skad du dam bcas so/_/mi 'di bdag gi drin gyis 'tsho bar gyur gyis/_bdag gar skyes kyang btsan cing phyug pa dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_gzhan pas brgya 'gyur stong 'gyur du shin tu 'phags shing /_ye shes dang bsod nams kyang 
[\[147b.7\]]'di dang mnyam par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/_de'i tshe de'i dus na blon po des mi cig srog bskyabs te/_'bras bu thob par byas pa de ni 'di yin no/_/de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis gang nas gang du skyes kyang srog gi bar 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]chad du ma gyur te/_da nga dang 'phrad nas 'bras bu mchog thob par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la 'khor mang po thams cad yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o lha'i bu gang gA dar zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos 
[\[148a.2\]]pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi btsun mo chen po 'bar li zhes bya ba la bu mo zhig btsas nas/_bu mo de'i ming ni rdo rje 
[\[148a.3\]]zhes bya ba btags so/_/bzhin rab tu mi sdug pa/_lus kyi sha shin tu rtsub pa stag lpags ltar sra ba/_skra yang rta rngog ltar bshor ba zhig ste/_rgyal pos kyang bu mo de mi sdug pas mi dga' nas pho brang gi nang du sus kyang ma mthong ba'i gnas zhig tu bskyed do/_/
[\[148a.4\]]bu mo de de ltar bzhin du mi sdug kyang /_btsun mo chen po la btsas pas mi sdug bzhin du sus kyang mi mthong bar bskyed de/_phyis cher skyes nas bag mar btang ran pa dang /_rgyal po rab tu mi dga' nas/_blon po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/thog ma cho 
[\[148a.5\]]rigs mtho bas rje'u rigs su gtogs pa las da 'khyams te/_nor dang longs spyod mi bdog pa cig tshol la khrid de shog ces bsgo'o/_/de nas blon po des kyang cho rigs kyis mtho zhing rje'u rigs kyi bu las 'khyams nas dbul phongs pa zhig rnyed de/_rgyal po la phul 
[\[148a.6\]]lo/_/rgyal pos kyang de dang mi med par dben pa'i gnas zhig tu gsang ste/_nga la bu mo byad bzhin mi sdug pa zhig yod de/_bag mar btang ran na/_gnyen zla ma rnyed kyis cho rigs che zhing mtho ba khyod dbul zhing ci yang med mod kyi/_khyod kyi chung mar sbyin gyi long shig 
[\[148a.7\]]ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de nas khye'u des pus mo sa la btsugs nas rgyal po'i bka' bzhin du bgyi'o/_/rgyal po chen pos bdag la khyi mo zhig stsal na yang blang bar 'tshal na/_rgyal po'i sku gdung la gtogs pa sras mo stsal na lta ci smos te/_bka' bzhin du blang bar 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]'tshal lo zhes gsol to/_/rgyal pos kyang sras mo de dbul po'i chung mar byin te/_de'i gnas khang la sogs pa byas nas/_sgo rim pa bdun du byas te/_dmag pa la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/khyod gang du 'gro ba'i tshe/_khyod nyid kyis sgo chod la lde mig kyang khyer cig_/
[\[148b.2\]]nga'i bu mo rab tu mi sdug pa 'di ni ci nas kyang phyi mi gzhan gyis mi mthong bar sgo rab tu sdoms shig ces bsgo nas/_nor dang longs spyod la sogs pa yo byad thams cad ci dgos pa chog par byin te/_blon por bcug go/_/de nor bu rin po che dang longs spyod mang po dang ldan 
[\[148b.3\]]par gyur pas/_dus phyi ma zhig na rigs che zhing mtho ba gzhan dang ston mo bya bar thams te/_ston mo la khyo shug dang /_bu tsha yang 'dus te rtse bar byas pa las/_gzhan kun ni chung ma dang 'grogs te 'ongs na blon po de 'ba' zhig gi chung ma ma 'ongs pas grogs po dag the 
[\[148b.4\]]tsom du gyur te/_yang na ni mi 'di'i chung ma mnga' byad shin tu mdzes shing bzang mo zhig go/_/yang na ni shin tu mi sdug cing gzhan gyis mthong du mi rung ba zhig yin pas/_khrid de ma 'ongs so snyam nas the tsom za bas/_de dag de'i chung ma blta bar bgros nas/_yid 'thun par 
[\[148b.5\]]gsang ste/_mi 'di chang gis ra ro bar byas te mi dran pa'i 'og tu lde mig brkus te/_mi lnga tsam zhig de'i chung mar blta bar btang ngo zhes bgros so/_/de'i tshe na mi de'i chung mas sngon bdag gis sdig pa ci bgyis na khyim thab sdang ste/_'di 'dra'i mun khung du bcug nas nyi ma dang zla ba tsam 
[\[148b.6\]]yang bltar med de/_mi gzhan yang mi mthong snyam ste/_shin tu mi dga' nas yang 'di snyam du bsams so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten na bzhugs te/_sems can gang sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa dag gi mgon dang skyabs mdzad de thar bar mdzad do zhe na/_
[\[148b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la bdag rgyang ma nas phyag 'tshal lo/_/thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_bdag gi mdun du mngon sum du gshegs shing /_bdag la cung zad cig zhal ston par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam bsams so/_/bu mo de'i bsam pa shin tu dag cing mos par mkhyen nas 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das de'i khyim du gshegs te/_bu mo de'i mdun du sngon gyi las kyis dbu mthon mthing gis mtshan pa mngon par bstan pa bu mo des mthong bar mdzad do/_/bu mo des bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu mthon mthing mthong nas/_lhag par yang dga' zhing mgu rangs 
[\[149a.2\]]te/_bsam pa shin tu dag par gyur to/_/bsam pa shin tu dag pas bu mo de'i skra yang shin tu 'jam zhing mthon mthing gi kha dog tu gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yang zhal mngon sum du bstan pa bu mo des mthong nas/_mthong ma thag tu dga' mgu rangs pas bu mo de bzhin 
[\[149a.3\]]yang bzang zhing mdzes par gyur te/_mi sdug pa dang rtsub pa yang med par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sku sta zur yan cad mngon par bstan te/_gser gyi mdog lta bu'i 'od lham mer snang bar mdzad pa bu mo des mthong nas/_sangs rgyas la lhag par dga' zhing dga' 
[\[149a.4\]]mgu rangs par gyur to/_/de ltar dga' mgu rangs pas mi sdug pa thams cad med par gyur te/_shin tu mdzes shing sdug pa ni lha'i bu mo ltar 'jig rten na dpe zla med par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir/_sku rdzogs par bstan pas/_
[\[149a.5\]]bu mo de mig mi 'dzums par blta zhing sngar bas kyang lhag par dga' mgu rangs nas/_lus kyi mtshan thams cad 'jig rten na dpe zla med par shin tu bzang zhing /_mi sdug pa'i bag chags kyi lhag ma cung zad tsam yang ma lus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ci rigs su chos bstan 
[\[149a.6\]]nas/_sdig pa kun zad de/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyang slar gshegs so/_/de nas de ma thag tu mi lnga pos kyang sgo phyes te/_nang du lhags na de'i chung ma rab tu mdzes shing bzang ba zla med par mthong nas/_gcig la gcig 
[\[149a.7\]]'di skad du mi 'di'i chung ma ni shin tu bzang zhing mdzes pas mi khrid do zhes smras te/_de dag gis de'i chung ma mthong nas phyir yang sgo bcad de/_de dag gang na 'dug par 'ongs nas/_mi des ma tshor bar lde mig kyang phyir lus la btags so/_/mi de ra ro ba las sangs nas kun 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]gyis te phyir khyim du 'ongs pa dang /_bdag gi chung ma mnga' byad shin tu bzang zhing mdzes te/_mi'i nang nas shin tu dkon par gyur pa mthong nas rab tu dga' ste/_chung ma la khyod su yin zhes smras pa dang /_chung mas kyang bdag na khyed kyi chung ma'o zhes smras so/_/khyos smras pa/_
[\[149b.2\]]khyod ni rab tu yang mi sdug pa zhig na/_ci'i phyir 'di ltar bzang zhing mdzes par gyur ces dris pa dang /_chung mas smras pa/_bdag gis sangs rgyas mthong bas lus 'di ltar gyur to zhes gtam zhib tu smras so/_/chung mas yang smras pa/_bdag gi yid la da ni bdag 
[\[149b.3\]]yab rgyal po dang 'phrad 'dod kyis/_rgyal po la bdag 'di skad mchi'o zhes gsol cig_/khyos kyang rgyal po la de bzhin du gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos dmag pa la de skad ma zer bar myur du song la phyir 'byung du mi gnang bar sdoms shig ces bka' stsal to/_/dmag 
[\[149b.4\]]pas yang gsol pa/_rgyal po'i sras mo ni bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis lha mo dang 'dra bar bzang zhing mdzes mar gyur to/_/rgyal pos dmag pa la bka' stsal pa/_khyod bden pa de ltar gyur na/_myur du khrid de shog cig ces bsgo nas/_shing rta 
[\[149b.5\]]brgyan te sras mo pho brang gi nang du bsu'o/_/rgyal pos bu mo de de ltar bzang zhing mdzes par gyur pa mthong nas rab tu dga' mgu rangs te/_rgyal po dang /_btsun mo dang /_dmag pa dang /_bu mor bcas te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der phyin pa dang /_sangs rgyas la phyag 
[\[149b.6\]]'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bu mo 'dis sngon bsod nams ci zhig bgyis na/_rigs che zhing mtho la longs spyod mang po nor dbyig 
[\[149b.7\]]dang ldan pa'i rigs su skyes la/_sdig pa'i las ci bgyis na/_byad gzugs shin tu mi sdug cing pags pa dang skra yang dud 'gro'i lta bur gyur ces gsol pa dang /_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po'i sras mo mnga' byad bzang zhing mdzes pa 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]dang /_mi sdug pa la tshe rabs snga ma la bsod nams dang /_sdig pa'i las byas pa las gyur to/_/sngon 'das pa'i dus yun ring po na/_yul bA rA Na sI zhes bya ba de'i yul mi khyim bdag rab tu phyug pa nor da byig tshad med pa dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/_khyim a ro/_khong khro 'dra langs gi med la/_
[\[150a.2\]]bdag des/_khyim na ci bdog pa thams cad rang sangs rgyas cig la mchod cing 'bul lo/_/rang sangs rgyas de'i sku shin tu rtsub la ngan pa mi sdug pa skems pa zhig ste/_khyim bdag de la bu mo chung ngu zhig yod pa des/_nyin gcig bzhin du rang sangs rgyas de gshegs 
[\[150a.3\]]pa mthong ba dang /_bu mo des kha na ma tho ba'i sems skyes te/_brnyas smad de/_'di skad du byad bzhin mi sdug la lus kyi pags pa rtsub pa 'di re mi sdug ces kha na ma tho ba byas so/_/rang sangs rgyas de rtag tu de'i khyim du gshegs shing mchod pa bzhes nas yun ring po 
[\[150a.4\]]zhig lon pa dang /_mya ngan las 'da' bar bsams te/_yon bdag de'i phyir steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas sku la me 'bar ba dang /_chu 'bab pa dang /_shar phyogs nas mi snang bar gyur nas nub phyogs su 'byung ba dang /_nub phyogs nas mi snang nas shar 
[\[150a.5\]]phyogs su 'byung ba dang /_lho phyogs nas mi snang nas byang phyogs su 'byung ba dang /_byang phyogs nas mi snang nas lho phyogs su 'byung ba dang /_nam mkha' stong pa la nyal ba dang 'dug pa la sogs pa'i cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan te/_khyim de'i mi thams cad kyis cho 
[\[150a.6\]]'phrul de dag mthong bar byas nas/_nam mkha' las babs te/_de'i khyim du gshegs so/_/khyim bdag de yang lhag par dga' mgu rangs par gyur to/_/bu mo de yang shin tu 'gyod pa skyes nas/_rang sangs rgyas de la 'di skad du/_bdag gis sngar kha na ma tho ba'i 
[\[150a.7\]]nyes pa yang dang yang bgyis pa de dag bdag gis dngos sdig tu mi 'gyur bar 'gyod tshangs gsol nas/_rang sangs rgyas des kyang 'gyod tshangs byed par gnang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na/_bu mo de ni da ltar rgyal po'i bu mo 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]'di yin te/_de'i tshe mi dge ba'i sems kyis/_'phags pa rang sangs rgyas la smad pa'i ngag gi nyes pas/_de phyin cad rtag tu mi sdug pa'i lus myong bar gyur to/_/phyis cho 'phrul mthong nas/_'gyod pas ni phyis mnga' byad shin tu bzang ba dang /_blo dang ldan par gyur 
[\[150b.2\]]to/_/rang sangs rgyas la mchod pa byas pas/_gang nas gang du skyes kyang rigs che zhing longs spyod 'byor pa dang /_mthar yang rnam par grol bar gyur to/_/de bas na rgyal po chen po ji tsam du sems can gyi rigs su gtogs pa thams cad ni lus dang ngag gi nyes pa shin 
[\[150b.3\]]tu bsrung zhing /_gzhan la brnyas pa dang smad par mi bya'o/_/de'i tshe na rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_'khor mang po thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa thos nas/_bsam pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i dad pa dang ldan 
[\[150b.4\]]par gyur to/_/de ltar bsam pa shin tu rnam par dag pas/_la la ni 'bras bu dang po nas 'bras bu bzhi pa'i bar du thob par gyur to/_/la la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/la la ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur te/_'khor de dag thams cad 
[\[150b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu mo rdo rje'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin 
[\[150b.6\]]gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe grong khyer de na khyim bdag cig gi chung ma la bu zhig btsas te/_ming yang gser dbyig ces btags nas/_byad gzugs legs pa/_bzang zhing shin tu mdzes 
[\[150b.7\]]pa 'jig rten na zla med pa/_khye'u de sngon gyi las kyis lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcang nas byung ngo /_/khye'u de'i pha ma yang shin tu ya mtshan du gyur te/_bkra shis so snyam nas khye'u de'i khu tshur gnyis phyes te bltas na/_khye'u'i lag mthil nas gser gyi dong tse re re yod de/_
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]pha ma gnyis rab tu dga' ste/_gser gyi dong tse gnyi ga blangs te/_blangs pa'i shul du da rung yang yod par gyur nas yang nas yang blangs so/_/de bzhin du pha ma gnyis kyis gser gyi dong tse lag mthil nas blangs pas bang mdzod gang yang bu'i lag nas dong tse 
[\[151a.2\]]zad par ma gyur to/_/khye'u de phyis cher skyes nas pha ma la bdag rab tu 'byung ngo zhes gsol pa dang /_pha mas kyang yid bzhin du gnang ngo zhes smras so/_/de nas khye'u gser dbyig_/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/_zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_sangs 
[\[151a.3\]]rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/_ston pas bdag la rab tu 'byung bar ci gnang zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u gser dbyig khyod rab tu 'byung bar gnang ngo zhes bka' stsal to/_/de ltar sangs 
[\[151a.4\]]rgyas kyis gnang nas khye'u gser dbyig skra dang kha spu bregs te/_chos gos gyon nas dge sbyong du gyur to/_/phyis lo grangs tshang ste/_bsnyen par rdzogs ran nas dge 'dun la dad pa gsol te/_bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol to/_/bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge 'dun la 
[\[151a.5\]]rim gyis phyag 'tshal te/_mthar gyis phyag 'tshal ba na/_lag pa gnyis sa la gar reg par gser gyi dong tse re re yod de/_de bzhin du mthar gyis phyag 'tshal ba thams cad du gser gyi dong tse yod par gyur to/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas brtson 'grus bsgoms pas dgra 
[\[151a.6\]]bcom par gyur to/_/kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gser dbyig 'di sngon bsod nams ci zhig bgyis na/_thog ma btsas nas da tsam gyi bar du gser gyi dong tse thogs pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/_
[\[151a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_rtag par nyon la shin tu yid la zung shig dang khyod la bstan par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_kun dga' bos de bzhin du thos par 'tshal lo zhes gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sngon 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]'das pa'i dus na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi pha rol tu sangs rgyas gser thub ces bya ba 'jig rten du gshegs te/_dam pa'i chos kyis sems can gyi don byed pa ni brjod cing dpag tu med do/_/sangs rgyas de dge 'dun dang bcas nas yul rgyu zhing gshegs pa 
[\[151b.2\]]las/_khyim bdag rigs che zhing mtho ba 'byor pa dang /_longs spyod dang ldan pa rnams kyis zhal zas rnam pa sna tshogs bshams te/_sangs rgyas dang nye gnas 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la mchod pa byas so/_/de'i tshe na mi dbul po longs spyod ci yang mi bdog pa cig 
[\[151b.3\]]rtag tu ri la shing 'thu zhing 'tshong ngo /_/phyis shing btsongs pa'i rin du dong tse gnyis shig rnyed nas mi dbul po des sangs rgyas dang /_dge 'dun du bcas pa rgyal po'i pho brang du spyan drangs nas gshegs pa mthong nas/_rab tu dga' mgu rangs te/_dong tse gnyis bdog 
[\[151b.4\]]pa de sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun la phul nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_dong tse gnyis bzhes so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_de'i tshe na mi dbul po des dong tse gnyis shig_/sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun la 
[\[151b.5\]]phul bas/_bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du/_lag na gser gyi dong tse rtag tu thogs par gyur te/_nor dang rin po che dang /_'tsho ba'i longs spyod zad mi shes par gyur to/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na mi dbul po de ni dge slong gser dbyig 'di yin te/_mi 'di ci 
[\[151b.6\]]ste dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu ma thob pa na yang ma 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang tshad dpag tu med do/_/de bas na kun dga' bo sems can thams cad kyis sbyin pa sbyin pa'i las la brtson par bya'o/_/de'i tshe na kun dga' bo dang /_'khor mang po rnams sangs rgyas 
[\[151b.7\]]kyis gsungs pa 'di thos nas dad cing mos par gyur nas/_la la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob/_la la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa thob bo/_/la la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/la la ni phyir 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas te/_'khor thams cad sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o/_/gser dbyig gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 
[\[152a.2\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe yul de na khyim bdag rigs che zhing mtho ba'i chung ma la bu zhig btsas nas/_byad gzugs legs pa/_blta na sdug pa/_bzang ba/_
[\[152a.3\]]mdzes pa zhig btsas so/_/btsas ma thag tu nam mkha' las lha rdzas kyi me tog char bzhin du bab ste/_khang pa kun gang ba las bu'i ming yang lha'i me tog ces btags so/_/khye'u de phyis cher skyes nas sangs rgyas gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku 
[\[152a.4\]]mdog dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dpe med pa mthong nas/_rab tu dga' ba skyes te 'di snyam du sems so/_/bdag 'jig rten 'dir skyes kyang 'phags pa'i gtso bo dang phrad kyis sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drang ngo snyam bsams nas/_
[\[152a.5\]]sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang bcas te/_sang gi gdugs la bdag gi mchis brang du bsod snyoms ngan pa zhig sbyar gyis/_bsod snyoms bzhes pa'i slad du gshegs par ci gnang zhes gsol pa dang /_de'i 
[\[152a.6\]]bsam pa dag par mkhyen pas gshegs par gnang ngo /_/de nas lha'i me tog phyir khyim du 'ongs pa dang /_phyi nyin sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun rnams kyang de'i khyim du gshegs so/_/lha'i me tog gis lha'i khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]nang du rin po che'i gdan mang po sprul te/_rgyan gyis brgyan 
[\[152a.7\]]pa las/_sangs rgyas dang /_dge 'dun rnams gdan de las rim gyis bzhugs su gsol nas/_lha'i me tog gis zhal zas rnam pa sna tshogs dgos par bsams pa dang /_de'i bsod nams kyis bsams pa bzhin du 'byor te/_sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun rnams la bsod 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]snyoms kyi bya ba byas so/_/lhung bzed blangs te/_lha'i me tog la chos mang po rgyas par bstan nas/_lha'i me tog gi khyim gang gi mi kun gyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/de nas lha'i me tog gis pha ma la rab tu 'byung zhing sangs rgyas kyi nye gnas su mchi 
[\[152b.2\]]bar gsol pa dang /_pha mas kyang de bzhin du gnang nas/_khye'u des sangs rgyas gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong 
[\[152b.3\]]legs par 'ongs so zhes bka' stsal nas/_skra dang kha spu rang byi ste/_ngur smrig gyon par gyur nas/_sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin du nan tan du byas nas dgra bcom par gyur to/_/de nas kun dga' bos de ltar gyur pa mthong nas/_sangs rgyas gang na ba der song ste/_
[\[152b.4\]]phyin nas pus mo sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge slong lha'i me tog 'dis sngon bsod nams ci zhig bgyis na/_lha'i me tog rang 'bab cing /_rin po che'i gdan dang zhal zas sna tshogs yid bzhin du sprul pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[152b.5\]]'das kyis bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_thos par 'dod na legs par nyon cig_/sngon 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas gser thub ces bya ba 'jig rten du gshegs te/_sems can gyi don rgyas par mdzad do/_/de'i tshe na 
[\[152b.6\]]dge 'dun mang po grong rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/_khyim bdag rigs che zhing mtho bdag gis mchod pa byas so/_/de'i tshe na mi dbul po zhig la longs spyod ci yang mi bdog pas/_dge 'dun de la rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes so/_/bdag gis ni ci nas kyang mchod 
[\[152b.7\]]du med do snyam nas/_spang dang ne'u gsing las me tog rnam pa sna tshogs btus te/_dge 'dun la gtor nas bsam pa dag pas phyag dar byas te song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_de'i tshe de'i dus na mi dbul po me tog gis 'thor ba de ni dge 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]slong lha'i me tog 'di yin no/_/de ltar sngon 'das pa'i dus na bsam pa dag pa'i dad pas me tog bsdus te/_dge 'dun la gtor nas smon lam btab pas/_bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du gang dang gang du skyes kyang byad gzugs legs shing bzang ba dang /_
[\[153a.2\]]blta na sdug pa dang /_ci ltar bsam pa bzhin du bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_khri stan la sogs pa yid bzhin du 'byor cing ldan te/_bsod nams des 'bras bu'i bar du thob par gyur to/_/de bas na kun dga' bo sems can thams cad kyis kyang sbyin pa chung ngu la bsod 
[\[153a.3\]]nams med snyam nas ma brnyas shig_/lha'i me tog ltar ci yang 'byor cing 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas kun dga' bo dang 'khor mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/lha'i me tog gi le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//
[\[153a.4\]]'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i dus na khyim bdag cig gi chung ma zhig la bu btsas nas/_khye'u de btsas pa'i tshe nam mkha' las rin 
[\[153a.5\]]po che sna bdun char bzhin du bab ste/_de'i khyim yongs su gang ngo /_/de nas mtshan mkhan bos te/_bu'i mtshan bltas na/_bu'i mtshan rab tu bzang ngo zhes khyim bdag la smras nas/_khyim bdag de rab tu dga' ste/_mtshan mkhan de la bu'i ming btags par gsol ba dang 
[\[153a.6\]]khye'u 'di btsas pa'i tshe ltas ji lta bu byung zhes dris pa dang /_khyim bdag gis kyang khye'u 'di btsas pa'i tshe na nam mkha' las rin po che sna bdun char bzhin du bab nas/_khyim yongs su gang bar byas so zhes smras pa dang /_mtshan mkhan gyis bsod nams las ming 
[\[153a.7\]]btags te/_khye'u de'i ming lha'i rin chen zhes bya bar gdags so/_/phyis chen por skyes nas mang du thos shing shes pa mang ba dang /_sgyu rtsal yang zla med par gyur te rab tu 'byung bar dad pas pha ma la phyi phyag 'tshal nas/_sangs rgyas gang na ba der song ste/_phyin pa dang 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag rab tu 'byung ngo zhes gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong legs par 'ongs so zhes bya ba gnang nas/_skra dang kha spu rang byi ste/_lus 
[\[153b.2\]]la chos gos gyon par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pas dgra bcom par gyur to/_/kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong lha'i rin chen 'dis/_sngon bsod nams ci zhig bgyis na thog ma btsas pa'i tshe na nam 
[\[153b.3\]]mkha' las rin po che char bzhin bab cing /_bgo ba dang bza' ba lhun gyis grub nas/_cis kyang mi brel bar gyur/_sangs rgyas kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_sngon 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas gser thub ces bya ba 'jig rten du gshegs te/_'jig rten na 
[\[153b.4\]]sems can gyi don mdzad pa ni brjod kyis mi lang ngo /_/de'i tshe na dge 'dun mang po grong rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/_de'i tshe grong khyer na gnas pa'i khyim bdag mang pos dge 'dun spyan drangs te/_mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas so/_/de'i tshe na mi dbul po zhig dad pas rjes su 
[\[153b.5\]]yi rangs pa'i sems skyes kyang /_longs spyod dang mchod pa'i yo byad ci yang med pas rde'u dkar ru las byas pa'i nor bu spar gang gis dge 'dun la gtor nas/_smon lam chen po btab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_de'i tshe de'i dus na mi dbul po 
[\[153b.6\]]nor bu spar gang gis dge 'dun la gtor ba de ni/_dge slong lha'i rin chen 'di yin no/_/'das pa'i dus na bsam pa dag pa'i dad pas rde'u dkar ru'i nor bu spar gang gis/_dge 'dun la gtor ba tsam gyis bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du bsod nams tshad med pas/_nor 
[\[153b.7\]]bu rin po che mang ba dang /_bgo ba dang bza' ba lhun gyis grub cing /_longs spyod cis kyang mi brel bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe na bsam pa dag pa'i dad pa tsam gyis/_nga 'jig rten na gshegs pa dang /_'phrad nas 'bras bu'i bar du thob par gyur to/_/de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams kyang 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas bsam pa dag pa'i dad pa skyes te/_la la ni 'bras bu dang po nas 'bras bu bzhi pa'i bar du thob par gyur/_la la ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i sems bskyed par gyur to/_/'khor mang po de dag thams cad/_bcom 
[\[154a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/lha'i rin chen gyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 
[\[154a.3\]]'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa zhig na/_thog mar kauN+Di n+ya la sogs te dge slong lnga rab tu byung ngo /_/de'i 'og tu chu bo 'od srung spun la sogs pa dge slong stong rab tu byung ngo /_/de nas de ma yin pa rab tu phyung zhing chos la gnas pa yang mang bar 
[\[154a.4\]]gyur nas/_rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams dga' ba tshad med pa skyes te/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du gshegs pa ni ngo mtshar rmad de so so'i skye bo mang po'i don mdzad do zhes bstod cing bsngags so/_/gzhan yang 'di skad du kauN+Di n+ya dang /_chu bo 'od srung gi 'khor la 
[\[154a.5\]]sogs pa thog ma rab tu byung ba de dag_/sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'phrin las gang 'thun na/_nang gi thog mar chos kyi bdud rtsi myong bar gyur ces smras so/_/dge slong de dag gis de skad ces smras pa thos nas/_de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /_
[\[154a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sngon 'das pa'i dus na 'di dag gi phyir/_ngas yi dam chen po bcas te/_nam mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sngar 'di dag gi don bya bar shog shig ces dam bcas so/_/dge slong rnams kyis de skad 
[\[154a.7\]]thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon thugs dam ci ltar bcas pa thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_rgyas par bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_khyed rtag par nyon la yid la zung shig dang khyed la bstan par bya'o/_/sngon 'das 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]pa'i dus na bskal pa tshad med pa/_grangs med pa/_dpag tu med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_brjod kyis mi lang ba 'das pa'i pha rol na/_yul bA rA Na sI zhes bya bar rgyal po rtsod byung zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_de'i tshe yul de na drang srong bzod pa can zhes bya ba 'khor slob ma lnga 
[\[154b.2\]]brgya dang ri'i gnas na gnas shing /_bzod pa bsgom mo/_/de'i tshe rgyal po des btsun mo dang /_pho brang gi slas dang /_blon por bcas te/_ri la rol tu gshegs pa las/_gnas shin tu mnyel te/_gzims pa dang /_pho brang gi slas rnams sngon du dong nas/_gnas 
[\[154b.3\]]dang me tog rnams lta zhing song song ba las/_drang srong bzod pa can lus drang por bzhag ste/_shin tu sems bzhin du 'dug pa mthong nas/_de la dad pa'i sems skyes te/_me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor to/_/btsun mo de dag de'i mdun du 'khod de chos nyan to/_/rgyal 
[\[154b.4\]]po gzims pa las sad nas/_btsun mo rnams mi snang ba dang /_blon po bzhi dang /_btsun mo btsal ba las btsun mo rnams/_drang srong gi mdun du 'khod pa mthong nas/_drang srong de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod skye mched mtha' yas kyi ting nge 'dzin bzhi thob pa'am/_
[\[154b.5\]]smras pa ma thob bo/_/smras pa/_'o na tshad med pa bzhi thob pa'am/_ma thob bo/_/smras pa 'o na khyod bsam gtan bzhi thob pa'am/_de yang ma thob bo zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal po de khros te/_yon tan de dag khyod kyis ma thob na/_khyod ni ma rabs tha mal pa yin te/_
[\[154b.6\]]bud med rnams dang dben pa skyabs yod pa'i gnas na 'dug pa de ji ltar yid ches su rung /_rtag tu 'di na gnas pa khyod su zhig lags/_las ci zhig byed ces smras pa dang /_drang srong gis rgyal po de la bdag ni 'di na bzod pa bsgom mo zhes smras so/_/de nas rgyal pos 
[\[154b.7\]]ral gri phyung nas khyod bzod pa bsgom zhe na/_bzod dam mi bzod sad do zhes drang srong gi lag pa gnyis bcad de khyod su yin zhes dris na/_bdag ni bzod pa can no zhes smras so/_/de nas rkang pa gnyis bcad na 'on kyang bzod pa can no zhes smras so/_/de'i tshe na 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]gnas rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas nye gnas lnga brgya tsam yang nam mkha' la 'phur te der lhags nas/_slob dpon de la de lta bu'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong na bzod pa'i sems nyams par ma gyur tam zhes smras so/_/drang srong gis smras pa/_bdag gi 
[\[155a.2\]]sems ma gyur/_ma nyams so zhes smras so/_/rgyal po yang dngangs skrag nas drang srong la smras pa/_khyod bzod pa can yin par cis yid ches par 'gyur/_drang srong gis smras pa/_bdag gis smras pa'i tshig [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa ma yin te/_bden na bden pa des khrag 'o mar 
[\[155a.3\]]'gyur zhing yan lag bcad pa yang sos te/_snga ma kho na bzhin du gyur cig ces smras ma thag tu/_khrag 'o mar gyur nas yan lag sos te/_snga ma kho na bzhin du gyur to/_/rgyal pos de ltar bzod pa dang ldan pa mthong nas/_lhag par 'jigs skrag ste/_bdag 
[\[155a.4\]]ci'i slad du drang srong chen po la gnod pa bgyis/_bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_'gyod tshangs bya bar gnang shig ces gsol to/_/drang srong gis smras pa/_khyod ni bud med kyi phyir mtshon thogs nas/_bdag gi yan lag gcod mod kyi/_bdag bzod pa ni sa dang 
[\[155a.5\]]'dra bas/_phyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/_shes rab kyi ral gris khyod kyi dug gsum chod par shog shig ces smras so/_/de'i tshe na ri de'i klu dang /_lha rnams kyis drang srong de la rgyal po des 'tshe zhing gnod pa byas pa mthong nas so so nas khros te sprin bsdus nas 'brug dang 
[\[155a.6\]]ser ba dang /_gnam lcags phab ste/_rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa bsad par byas pa las/_drang srong gis khyod nga'i phyir/_'di lta bus 'di la 'tshe ba dang /_gnod pa ma byed cig ces bsgo'o/_/rgyal po des der 'gyod tshangs byas te/_drang srong de rtag tu pho brang du 
[\[155a.7\]]spyan drangs te/_mchod pa byas so/_/de'i tshe na slob dpon gzhan la zhugs pa kun tu rgyu stong tsam zhig_/drang srong bzod pa can la rgyal po de dad cing mos pa mthong nas/_phrag dog skyes te/_bden pa mi snang ba'i gnas nas sa rdul dang btsog cing sme ba'i bag gis drang srong 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]de la gtor to/_/de'i tshe kun tu rgyu nga la sas gtor ba brgya phrag bcu po de ni/_da ltar chu bo 'od srung la sogs pa'i dge slong brgya phrag bcu yin te/_de'i tshe na yi dam bcas pa las/_bdag bzod pa bsgom pa rgyun mi chad pa 'dis/_nam mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/_bdud 
[\[155b.2\]]rtsi'i chus khyod kyi rdul dang dri ma bkrus te/_'dod pa'i btsog pa yongs su dag par shog shig ces dam bcas so/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe na drang srong bzod pa can de shes par 'dod na/_gzhan du ma sems shig_/de ni da ltar nga yin no/_/rgyal po rtsod byung dang blon po bzhi ni kauN+Di n+ya 
[\[155b.3\]]la sogs pa dge slong lnga sde yin no/_/de'i tshe bzod pa bsgoms pa ni/_'di dag gi don sngar bya'o zhes dam bcas pas/_mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_sngar 'di dag sdug bsngal las yongs su grol bar mdzad do/_/dge slong rnams sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la rjes su 
[\[155b.4\]]yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/bzod pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe kun dga' bos 
[\[155b.5\]]bsod snyoms kyi bya ba byas nas/_tshal zhig gi nang na bsam gtan du 'dug ste/_'di snyam du rtog pa skyes te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du gshegs pa ngo mtshar che ste/_sems can mang po yang rab tu bde ba la bkod/_kauN+Di n+ya la sogs pa'i dge slong lnga 
[\[155b.6\]]sde dge ba'i rtsa ba ci bsags na/_chos kyi sgo rnam par phye ma thag tu 'jug par gyur/_chos kyi rnga brdungs ma thag tu thog mar thos par gyur/_chos kyi bdud rtsis thog mar ngoms par gyur/_snyam du rtog pa skyes nas/_'dug pa las langs te sangs rgyas gang na ba der song ste 
[\[155b.7\]]phyin pa dang /_ci ltar bsam pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong kauN+Di n+ya la sogs pa ni sngon 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas sha dang khrag gis bkres skom pa las chog par byin te/_bde bar byas pas de bas na nga 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /_sngar rnam par grol ba la bkod de rgyu dang rkyen med pa ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_sngon 'das pa'i dus na ci lta bur bkres pa dang skom pa las bde bar mdzad pa bstan du 
[\[156a.2\]]gsol/_'khor mang po 'di dag gis thos nas rtogs par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sngon 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i pha rol na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po byams pa'i stobs zhes bya ba 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi 
[\[156a.3\]]stong snyed la dbang byed pa zhig byung ngo /_/rgyal po de la btsun mo stong phrag nyi shu yod do/_/blon po ni stong phrag bcu yod do/_/rgyal po de byams pa dang snying rjer ldan te/_tshad med pa bzhi spyod cing 'gro ba thams cad la snying brtse bas/_dge ba bcu'i srid 'dzin te/_thams 
[\[156a.4\]]cad kyis bkur ba/_yul na dgra med cing lo legs par 'byor ba bde ba skyid pa dang ldan pa ste/_rims gtong ba'i [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag_/mi'i khrag dang mdangs 'phrog cing za ba las/_de'i tshe na yul mi thams cad lus dang ngag dang yid bsrung ste/_dge ba bcu la gnas pas/_yi 
[\[156a.5\]]dgas ma rungs pa dag bza' ba ma rnyed nas/_kun ltogs te mthu med par gyur to/_/de'i tshe na gnod sbyin lnga zhig rgyal po'i gan du 'ong zhing 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag gi zas ni mi'i mdangs dang khrag la ltos te/_lus dang srog 'tsho ba las rgyal pos bkar btags 
[\[156a.6\]]te/_thams cad dge ba bcu la gnas pas/_bdag cag zas dang skom ma rnyed de/_nyam thag nas srog la bab bo/_/rgyal po bdag cag la yang thugs mi brtse'am zhes gsol nas/_rgyal pos kyang de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir/_lus kyi yan lag lnga las rtsa lnga bcad nas/_
[\[156a.7\]]gnod sbyin rnams so so nas snod bzed de khrag las ngoms par 'thung du bcug go_/de dag khrag gis ngoms nas shin tu dga' mgu rangs par gyur to/_/de dag khrag gis ngoms nas/_dge ba bcu la ci nus su spyod cig ces bskul to/_/da ltar nga'i lus las khrag phyung ste/_khyod 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]ngoms shing bde bar byas pa ltar/_phyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_chos kyi sku'i tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab kyis khyod kyi dug gsum bsal te/_'dod pas gdungs pa las shin tu bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god par shog shig ces smras so/_/
[\[156b.2\]]kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po byams pa'i stobs de ni da ltar nga yin no/_/gnod sbyin lnga po de ni kauN+Di n+ya la sogs pa dge slong lnga yin no/_/ngas gang nas gang du skyes par de dag thog mar bsgral bar smon lam btab bo/_/de bas na ngas thog mar chos bstan ma thag tu rnam 
[\[156b.3\]]par grol bar gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_'khor mang po rnams sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs nas mngon par bstod do/_/rgyal po byams pa'i stobs kyi sbyin pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//bam po gsum pa/_'di skad bdag gis thos 
[\[156b.4\]]pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab/_bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 'od ma'i tshal na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'bras bu dang po thob nas/_dad pa dang bsnyen bkur 
[\[156b.5\]]bya bar sems sngon bas kyang lhag par gyur pas/_bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa bzhi rtag tu 'bul te/_skye bo mang po dag kyang 'thun par dge ba la spro'o/_/yul de na rdzogs byed la sogs pa'i ston pa drug sngar byung bas/_ngan par lta ba log 
[\[156b.6\]]par ston te/_'gro ba mang po bslus pas/_de la gang bslad par mthong ba dag ni ngan par lta ba dag la yid ches pas/_sdig can gyi phyogs mang zhing rgyas par gyur to/_/rgyal po de'i gcung zhig kyang ston pa drug la yid ches pas ngan par lta ba la yid zhen te/_thar pa'i lam lam ma 
[\[156b.7\]]yin par bzung nas/_longs spyod ci bdog pa gtor nas de la 'bul te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyi ma shar ba lta bu shes rab kyis kun tu lham mer mdzad kyang /_ngan par lta bas glags pas de la mos pa'i sems med do/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying po de de la lhag par 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]sdug par 'dzin pas thabs kyis sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur bya bar bskul na yang /_ngan par lta ba la zhen pas bsgo ba bzhin du ma byas so/_/sangs rgyas la mchod pa gyis shig ces yang dang yang bskul na/_bdag la yang ston pa yod de/_gau ta ma la bsnyen bkur mi 
[\[157a.2\]]byed do/_/'on kyang rgyal po'i bka' tshul gyis bcag par rigs pa ma yin pas/_mchod ston chen po bshams nas/_ma bos par gang rang 'ong ba la bsod snyoms sbyin no zhes byas nas mchod pa'i yo byad bshams te/_stan bting nas ston pa drug gi 'bod pa btang nas/_de ma 
[\[157a.3\]]thag tu lhags te gral gyi thog ma la 'dug go/_/sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun rnams rang ma byon pas/_rgyal po gang na ba der phyin nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma spyan drongs shig ces yang dang yang du bka' stsal te/_bdag gis mchod pa bshams nas/_gdugs 
[\[157a.4\]]tshod la bab na/_ci'i slad du mi gshegs/_rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/_khyod nyid spyan 'dren du 'gro mi nus na yang mi zhig gdugs tshod la bab bo zhes spyan 'dren pa thong shig_/rgyal po'i gcung gis kyang spyan 'dren du btang ba las/_bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang 
[\[157a.5\]]bcas te gshegs nas/_gral rim bzhin du bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis ston pa drug gral gyi ltag na 'dug pa yang gral gyi tha mar song ngo /_/ston pa drug ngo tsha zhing skyengs nas/_langs te gral gyi ltag tu 'dug na yang /_ma tshor bar gral gyi mjug tu song ste/_
[\[157a.6\]]de bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar du gral gyi gong du song yang da dung gral gyi 'og tu 'dug par gyur na/_mthu med par gyur nas/_skyengs bzhin du gral gyi tha mar 'dug go/_/yon bdag gis gnas brtan la chu brims nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar khyod kyi ston pa la brims shig_/
[\[157a.7\]]ces bka' stsal pa dang /_yon bdag gis chu snod thogs te ston pa drug la chu brims nas/_chu snod kyi kha 'gags te chu 'byung du ma btub pas/_phyir yang sangs rgyas la mthar gyis gsol na/_chu yang byung ste lag pa bkrus so/_/lag pa bkrus nas sbyin bdag gis bsod 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]snyoms thogs te smon lam btab par gsol na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/_thog ma yang nged kyi phyir ma yin pas/_yang khyod nyid kyi ston pa la smon lam btab par gsol cig ces bka' stsal pas/_sbyin bdag chen po ston pa drug gi 
[\[157b.2\]]mdun du song ste smon lam btab par gsol na/_ston pa drug kha thams nas smra ma nus te/_sangs rgyas la gsol cig ces lag brda byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang tshangs pa'i dbyangs lta bu'i gsung gis smon lam btab bo/_/smon lam btab nas sbyin bdag 
[\[157b.3\]]gis bsod snyoms gnas brtan la brims pa las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar khyod nyid kyi ston pa nas brims shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_'brim pa rnams kyis ston pa drug la brims na/_zhal zas kyi rnam pa steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags te/_brim du med par gyur to/_/
[\[157b.4\]]de nas sangs rgyas logs su brim du chas pa dang /_zhal zas kyang so so'i lag tu 'ongs so/_/mthar gyis brims te sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun bsod snyoms kyi bya ba byas nas kha lag bkrus te/_phyir yang gdan la bzhugs nas chos bstan par gsol to/_/de la yang 
[\[157b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod nyid kyi ston pa drug la ston par gsol cig ces bka' stsal to/_/ston pa drug kyang kha thams nas/_sangs rgyas la gsol cig ces lag brda byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis shin tu mnyen zhing 'jam pa'i gsung phyung ste/_'khor mang 
[\[157b.6\]]po la chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par phye zhing bstan pas/_'khor mang po yid tshim par gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas/_thams cad kyis rtogs shing khong du chud do/_/gzugs can snying po'i gcung ni chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur to/_/
[\[157b.7\]]'khor gzhan dag ni 'bras bu dang po nas 'bras bu gsum pa'i bar du thob nas rab tu byung ste/_zag pa zad do/_/la la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur nas ci ltar smon pa bzhin du yongs su rdzogs pas so so nas yang dag 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]pa gang yin pa shes shing rtogs te/_dkon mchog gsum la dad cing mos kyi ston pa drug la mi dad de/_de la bsnyen bkur mi byed par gyur to/_/de nas ston pa drug po shin tu sems 'khrugs nas khros te/_dben pa'i sa phyogs su song nas rtog pa la zhugs so/_/
[\[158a.2\]]de nas bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_bdag gis yun ring mo zhig nas dge sbyong gau ta ma la bgegs byas nas/_skabs ma rnyed kyis da ni bdag gis ci nas kyang bgegs bya'o snyam bsams nas/_bdud sdig can gyis rdzogs byed lta bur bdag mngon par sprul 
[\[158a.3\]]nas/_phyugs lhas kyi bu ma ska ri dang /_rnam par smra ba'i bu kun nas rgyal ba dang /_skra'i lwa ba can mi pham pa dang /_kA t+yA ya na nog can dang /_gnyen gyi bu gcer bu pa gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_de dag gi mdun du me 'bar ba dang /_chu 'bab pa dang /_glog 'gyu bar 
[\[158a.4\]]cho 'phrul ston pa la zhugs pa dang /_de dag gis rdzogs byed khyod kyi yon tan rnam pa mang po 'di lta bu 'thob bam/_smras pa thob bo/_/de rnams kyis so so nas 'di snyam du bsams so/_/bdag gcig pu ma gtogs par 'di dag thams cad ni rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che bar 
[\[158a.5\]]so sor ston to snyam bsams so/_/de nas dus phyi zhig na rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug 'dun khang du 'dus te lhags nas/_gtam 'di lta bu dag skabs su smra ste/_bdag cag rnams la sngon gyi rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag phyug po dang /_tshong dpon 
[\[158a.6\]]dang /_ded dpon dag gis rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_mchod pa byas shing /_bdag cag gi gos dang /_zas dang /_mal stan dang /_nad kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams rnyed par gyur na/_da ni dge sbyong shAkya'i bu 'di la rim gro dang /_bkur stir byed do/_/
[\[158a.7\]]gos dang /_zas dang /_mal stan dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad rnams ma rnyed par gyur gyis/_da ni bdag cag rnams kyis dge sbyong gau ta ma mi'i bla ma'i chos kyi cho 'phrul la 'jug go/_/de ste dge sbyong gau ta mas mi'i bla ma'i chos kyi cho 'phrul gcig ston pa la zhugs na/_
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]bdag cag gis gnyis bstan to/_/dge sbyong gau ta mas gnyis na bdag cag gis bzhi'o/_/dge sbyong gau ta mas bzhi na bdag cag gis brgyad do/_/dge sbyong gau ta mas brgyad na bdag cag gis bcu drug go/_/dge sbyong gau ta mas bcu drug na bdag cag gis sum cu rtsa 
[\[158b.2\]]gnyis so/_/dge sbyong gau ta mas ci snyed du mi'i bla ma'i chos kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa la bdag cag gis nyis 'gyur sum 'gyur lta bur mi'i bla ma'i chos kyi cho 'phrul bstan par bya'o/_/de nas rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug_/rgyal po gzugs can snying po gang na ba der song 
[\[158b.3\]]ste drung du phyin pa dang /_rgyal po gzugs can snying po la rgyal ba dang /_tshe ring bar shog shig ces brjod nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha bdag cag rnams ni cho 'phrul dang ldan zhing shes par smra ba lags na/_dge sbyong gau ta ma yang bdag nyid cho 'phrul dang ldan zhing shes par 
[\[158b.4\]]smra'o zhes mchis na/_shes par smra ba ni shes par smra ba dang /_lhan cig mi'i bla ma'i chos kyi cho 'phrul 'gran du gzhug pa'i rigs kyis/_bdag cag sprod cig ces smras pa dang /_rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bgad de 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod rnams re glen/_sangs 
[\[158b.5\]]rgyas ni yon tan che ba/_rdzu 'phrul che ba/_cho 'phrul thogs pa med pa yin na/_khyed 'dra ba ni srin bu me khyer nyi ma la 'gran pa'am/_ba rmig gi chu rgya mtsho la bsgrun pa'am/_wa sdar ma seng ge la 'gran pa'am/_byi brun gyis ri rab lhun po la 'phang mthon dman 'gran pa dang 'dra ste/_
[\[158b.6\]]che chung khyad zhugs par mngon pas/_ngan par lta ba khyed ha cang glen ches so/_/ston pa drug gis yang smras so/_/mngon par rtags phyir 'byung ba rgyal pos ma gzigs te/_bdag cag gis cho 'phrul chen po 'gran na mngon te/_bsgrun pa'i 'og tu gang rgyal ba mngon no/_/rgyal 
[\[158b.7\]]pos smras pa/_'gran 'dod na lta 'gran la rag ste/_khyed skyengs kyi dogs so/_/khyed cho 'phrul 'gran par gyur na/_ded kyis kyang khyod kyi cho 'phrul mthong bar gyis shig_/ston pa drug gis smras pa/_da ste zhag bdun na cho 'phrul 'gran gyis/_gar 'gran pa'i sa phyogs phyi bdar 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]mdzod cig ces smras so/_/ston pa drug gis de skad smras nas/_phyir 'ong ba'i 'og tu rgyal po gzugs can snying po sangs rgyas gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_'di skad ces gsol to/_/ston pa drug gis ni bcom ldan 'das la cho 'phrul 'gran zhes mchi ste/_
[\[159a.2\]]bdag gis bkag na yang ma thub kyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul gyi mthu bstan te/_ngan par lta ba las bzlog nas/_dge ba la bkod du gsol/_cho 'phrul bstan pa yang bdag cag gis mthong bar mdzad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po 
[\[159a.3\]]la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga bdag dus mkhyen gyis gang du 'gran pa'i gnas yangs pa zhig tu byi dor gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas/_rgyal po gzugs can snying pos blon po mang po la bka' stsal te/_gnas yangs pa bde ba zhig tu phyag dar byas nas/_seng ge'i khri bshams 
[\[159a.4\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan btsugs te shin tu mdzes par brgyan to/_/de ltar cho 'phrul 'gran par byas pa'i dus su de'i nyin par thams cad mthong du re'o/_/de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab nas gshegs te/_yangs pa can du bzhud do/_/yangs 
[\[159a.5\]]pa can na lits+tsha bI dang /_mi mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa bsu'o/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du gshegs pa yang gdod shes shing /_rtogs pas ston pa drug kyang 'di skad du/_dge sbyong gau ta ma'i cho 'phrul gyis bdag cag la ni mi thub bo zhes byas na 
[\[159a.6\]]khyod yid mi ches te/_cho 'phrul 'gran pa'i dus byas pa las byol nas/_yangs pa can du byol lo zhes bsgrags te/_ston pa drug kyang nga rgyal lhag par skyes nas/_so so nas spro ba skyes te/_de bsnyag tu dong ngo /_/de'i tshe na rgyal po gzugs can snying po yang theg pa lnga brgya bshams 
[\[159a.7\]]te/_rgyal po dang blon po'i 'khor khri phrag bcu bzhi snyed kyang 'tsho ba'i rgyags khyer nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su yul yangs pa can du dong ngo /_/ston pa drug kyang yul yangs pa can du phyin nas lits+tsha bI rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag dge sbyong gau ta ma dang cho 'phrul 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]'gran par gnang na/_da ste zhag bdun na cho 'phrul 'gran par bgyi'o/_/de nas lits+tsha bI rnams bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste 'di skad ces gsol to/_/glen pa chen po ston pa drug ni yon tan dang ldan snyam ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang cho 'phrul 'gran no zhes mchis 
[\[159b.2\]]na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshar bcad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nga nyid dus mkhyen to/_/de nas lits+tsha bI rnams yul mi rnams dang /_yo byad rgyal po gzugs can snying po bzhin du sbyar te/_sang lta bur 'gran pa las/_de ring lta bu bcom ldan 
[\[159b.3\]]'das dge 'dun dang bcas pa yul kau shAM bIr gshegs so/_/kau shAM bI'i rgyal po u dra ya na zhes bya bas kyang blon por bcas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa bsu'o/_/yangs pa can gyi mi rnams sang lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa las/_kau shAM bIr 
[\[159b.4\]]gshegs so zhes thos pa dang /_ston pa drug pos kyang bcom ldan 'das gshegs so zhes thos nas/_sngar bas kyang lhag par nga rgyal skyes te/_yang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo /_/yang de'i tshe li ts+tsha bI rnams kyang theg pa lnga brgya bshams nas/_'khor khri phrag 
[\[159b.5\]]bdun dang gzugs can snying po'i 'khor dang bcas te/_kau shAM bIr sangs rgyas dang ston pa drug cho 'phrul 'gran pa la bltar dong ngo /_/ston pa drug po kau shAM bIr phyin nas/_rgyal po u dra ya na la gtam snga ma byas te/_dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di sdod du ma btub nas bdag cag la 
[\[159b.6\]]byol gyis/_rgyal pos bdag cag dang cho 'phrul 'gran par dus thob cig ces gsol pa dang /_u dra ya nas sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ston pa drug ni bcom ldan 'das dang cho 'phrul 'gran no zhes mchis na mkhyen tam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[159b.7\]]stsal pa/_nga nyid dus mkhyen to/_/de nas u dra ya nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po bzhin du sbyar te/_bshams pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas te/_yul war gyir gshegs so/_/war gyi'i rgyal po shun tsid las kyang mi mang po dang de 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa bsu'o/_/kau shAM bI'i mi rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yul war gyir gshegs pa gzod thos kyis/_ston pa drug kyang phyi bzhin song ngo /_/de'i tshe rgyal po u dra ya na 'khor stong phrag brgyad khri dang rgyal po gzugs can snying po la sogs 
[\[160a.2\]]pa thams cad dang 'grogs te yul war gyir gshegs so/_/de nas ston pa drug pos rgyal po shun tsi da la la bdag cag dge sbyong gau ta ma la cho 'phrul 'gran par gyis shig ces gsol pa dang /_rgyal po des kyang de bzhin du gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis nga nyid dus 
[\[160a.3\]]mkhyen to zhes bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po des kyang yo byad sbyar te bshams pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas te/_yul ti ki tsa shi rir gshegs so/_/yul ti ki tsa shi ri'i rgyal po in dra ba mi zhes bya bas/_'khor mang po dang de bzhin 
[\[160a.4\]]gshegs pa bsu'o/_/de'i tshe rgyal po shun tsi da la 'khor khri phrag lnga dang /_rgyal po gzugs can snying po la sogs pa thams cad dang 'grogs te/_yul ti ki tsa shi rir dong ngo /_/ston pa drug po yang yul der phyin nas/_rgyal po in dra ba mi la skad chen por dge sbyong gau 
[\[160a.5\]]ta ma dang /_bdag cag cho 'phrul 'gran par gyis shig ces zlog ma thub bo/_/de'i tshe in dra ba mis/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas de bzhin du gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis nga nyid dus mkhyen to zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nas rgyal po des kyang yo byad bshams 
[\[160a.6\]]te/_dus la bab pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas te/_yul bA rA Na sIr gshegs so/_/yul de'i rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya bas kyang /_'khor mang po de dag dang de bzhin gshegs pa bsu'o/_/ti ki tsa shi ri'i mi dag de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud par 
[\[160a.7\]]gdod shes nas/_ston pa drug kyang de'i rjes su song ngo /_/rgyal po in dra ba mis kyang 'khor khri phrag drug dang bcas te/_rgyal po gzugs can snying po la sogs pa rgyal po thams cad dang 'grogs te gnas der song ngo /_/ston pa drug kyang de'i phyir phyin te/_de bzhin du rgyal po de la gsol nas 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]rgyal po des de bzhin du gsol pa dang /_nga nyid dus mkhyen to zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nas rgyal po des kyang yo byad sbyar te bshams pa las/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas te yul ser skyar gshegs so/_/yul ser skya'i shAkya'i rigs rnams gcig gis gcig 
[\[160b.2\]]sbran nas/_thams cad 'dus te de bzhin gshegs pa bsu'o/_/yul bA rA Na sI'i mi rnams kyis kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud par gzod rtogs nas ston pa drug po yang rjes su song ngo /_/rgyal po tshangs sbyin 'khor khri phrag brgyad cu dang /_gzugs can snying po la sogs te 
[\[160b.3\]]rgyal po drug char yang 'khor dang bcas te/_bcom ldan 'das gang du gshegs pa'i rjes su dong ngo /_/ston pa drug kyang der phyin pa dang /_shAkya'i rigs rnams la dge sbyong gau ta ma dang /_cho 'phrul 'gran par byas pa las nged kyi mthu che ba las byol lo zhes yengs ma gtam du byas 
[\[160b.4\]]so/_/de nas shAkya'i rigs rnams kyis de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis nga nyid dus mkhyen to zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nas shAkya'i rigs rnams kyis kyang yo byad sbyar cing bshams pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang 
[\[160b.5\]]bcas pa/_yul mnyan du yod par gshegs so/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yang 'khor dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa bsu'o/_/shAkya'i rigs rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud par gzod rtogs te/_ston pa drug pos kyang rjes bzhin du 
[\[160b.6\]]bsnyags so/_/shAkya'i rigs rnams kyang 'khor khri phrag dgu dang rgyal po gzugs can snying po la sogs te/_rgyal po rnams dang /_'khor rnams kyis mnyan du yod pa'i ljongs yongs su gang ngo /_/ston pa drug po yang der phyin nas/_rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad du dge sbyong 
[\[160b.7\]]gau ta ma dang /_bdag cag cho 'phrul 'gran par dus byas pa las dus la bab pa dang byol zhing 'bros te/_da ni 'khor mang po yang rgyal po'i yul du tshogs kyis/_rgyal po chen po bdag cag 'gran du chug cig ces gsol pa dang /_rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bgad de/_'di skad du bcom 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]ldan 'das kyi yon tan ngo mtshar che ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab na/_ci'i phyir khyod lta bu'i ma rabs ci yang mi shes pa/_chos kyi rgyal po chen po dang cho 'phrul 'gran par byed ces bsgo'o/_/'on kyang ston pa drug po dag drod mi thub ste/_nga rgyal bsnyems pas/_rgyal po gsal 
[\[161a.2\]]rgyal gyis/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ston pa drug po dag cho 'phrul 'gran par yang dang yang du bskul gyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshar bcad de/_cho 'phrul gyi bye brag dbye bar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis nga nyid dus mkhyen to 
[\[161a.3\]]zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis blon po rnams la bka' stsal nas/_cho 'phrul 'gran pa'i gnas mnyam zhing phyag dar byas te/_me tog dang spos mang du bshams shing seng ge'i khri btsugs nas ba dan dang /_rgyal mtshan la sogs pas brgyan te/_'khor 
[\[161a.4\]]mang po 'dus so/_/de'i tshe dpyid zla ra ba tshes gcig gi nyin bar bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul 'gran pa'i gnas su gshegs pa dang /_rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mchod pa'i yo byad dang zhal zas bshams te/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag dar phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshems 
[\[161a.5\]]shing gsol nas/_tshems shing sa la btsugs so/_/sa la btsugs ma thag tu skyes nas yal ga dang /_lo ma rgyas pa mtho khyad dpag tshad lnga brgya bar gyur to/_/yal ga dang /_lo ma kho ra khor yug kyang dpag tshad lnga brgya khebs so/_/de ma thag tu me tog shing rta'i 'phang 
[\[161a.6\]]lo tsam skyes nas 'bras bu yang bre lnga shong ba'i bum pa tsam du gyur to/_/rtsa ba dang /_yal ga dang /_'dab ma la sogs pa thams cad rin po che sna bdun du gyur nas/_kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs su 'tshar zhing 'bar te/_nyi zla'i 'od kyang zil gyis gnon to/_/gang gis 'bras bu de 
[\[161a.7\]]zos na/_bdud rtsi'i ro bas kyang lhag par gyur te/_dri bsung gis kun tu mngad pa'i dris phog pa thams cad kyang bde zhing tshim par gyur to/_/rlung bsung can gyis yal ga dang /_lo ma la reg na shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i chos kyi sgra byung ngo /_/mi thams cad kyis shing de la shin tu dad pa'i sems 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]skyes te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pas/_thams cad kyi yid dang 'thun ste/_'bras bu thob pa dang /_lhar skye ba yang rab tu mang ngo /_/de'i phyi nyin rgyal po u dra ya nas spyan drangs nas mchod pa sbyar ro/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pas sku'i g.yas g.yon du rin po 
[\[161b.2\]]che'i ri gnyis sprul te/_shin tu mtho ba/_mdzes pa/_rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi kha dog ltar 'tsher ba/_shing rnam pa sna tshogs ri de la skyes pa/_me tog dang /_'bras bu rab tu rgyas pa/_sgra skad shin tu snyan pa 'byung ba/_ri gcig gi rtse mo la 'bras bu ro brgya dang ldan pa/_
[\[161b.3\]]'jam zhing mngar ba rab tu 'byung ba ste/_mi mang po de la yid bzhin du tshim par za'o/_/ri gcig gi rtse mo la rtswa shin tu mngar ba dang /_'jam pa skyes te/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams de la yid bzhin du za zhing tshim par sprul te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la ci rigs 
[\[161b.4\]]su chos bstan pas sems rnam par grol te/_bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pas/_mtho ris kyi lhar skyes pa'i grangs kyang rab tu mang ngo /_/de'i phyi nyin rgyal po shun tsi da las spyan drangs te mchod pa sbyar ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal bsil nas/_zhal bsil 
[\[161b.5\]]ba'i chu slar sa la bor ba rin po che'i rdzing du gyur nas/_kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad nyis brgya yod pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyis rnam par spras pa/_kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs su 'tsher ba rdzing bu de'i chu yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa/_rdzing gi zhabs kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi bye mas bdal ba/_
[\[161b.6\]]pad ma che khyad shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba la 'di lta ste/_pad ma sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dkar po dang /_dmar po dang /_le brgan dang /_mar gdal sogs pa'o/_/pad ma de'i dri yang kun tu mngad cing bro la/_pad ma dam pa'i kha dog ci lta ba bzhin du 
[\[161b.7\]]'od zer 'tsher te/_de'i 'od zer gyis gnam sa kun snang bar byas te/_'khor mang po thams cad kyang rin po che'i rdzing de la blta zhing /_kun tu dga' nas bstod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i yo byad sbyar nas/_chos rnam pa mang po bstan te/_go zhing rtogs par mdzad 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]nas/_la la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/la la ni 'bras bu thob nas mtho ris kyi lhar skyes pa dang /_bsod nams kyi las bskyed pa yang dpag tu med do/_/de'i phyi nyin rgyal po in dra ba mis mchod pa'i yo byad bshams te/_sangs 
[\[162a.2\]]rgyas spyan drangs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i nyin par rin po che'i rdzing bu de'i ngos bzhin/_yur ba chen po brgyad brgyad yod pa la/_phyir yang 'khor zhing rdzing de nyid du 'bab pa dang /_chu 'bab pa'i sgra las dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_
[\[162a.3\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_rnam par thar pa gsum dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_tshad med pa bzhi la sogs te/_chos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byung zhing chos kyi sgra de las chud 
[\[162a.4\]]cing rtogs nas sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu dang /_mtho ris kyi lhar skye ba dang /_bsod nams kyi las bskyed pa yang rab tu mang ngo /_/de'i phyi nyin rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis spyan drangs te/_mchod pa'i yo byad bshams so/_/de'i nyin par bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas gser 
[\[162a.5\]]gyi mdog lta bu'i 'od zer bkye nas/_stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu snang bar byas te/_'od des reg pa'i sems can thams cad gdug pa gsum dang /_sgrib pa lnga dang bral te lus dang sems rab tu bde ba ni ji ltar dge slong dag bsam gtan gsum pa dang 'dra'o/_/'khor mang 
[\[162a.6\]]po rnams sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la mos pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan te/_bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang mtho ris kyi lhar skyes pa dang /_bsod nams kyi las bskyed pa yang grangs med do/_/de'i phyi nyin li ts+tsha bI rnams kyis spyan drangs nas mchod pa'i 
[\[162a.7\]]yo byad sbyar ro/_/de'i nyin par bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po de dag thams cad gcig gi bsam pa gcig gis shes par byas te/_so so'i dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i las kyang rtogs par byas nas so so nas dga' ste/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags so/_/de dag 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]gis bcom ldan 'das la dam pa'i chos nyan pas/_khong du chud cing rtogs nas sangs rgyas su smon lam 'debs pa dang /_'bras bu thob pa dang /_mtho ris kyi lhar skye bar smon pa yang grangs med do/_/de'i phyi nyin shAkya'i rigs rnams kyis sangs rgyas spyan drangs nas/_
[\[162b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i nyin par 'khor de dag thams cad so so nas/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por bsgyur te/_rin po che sna bdun dang bu stong dang ldan par sprul nas/_rgyal phran dang /_blon po rnams kyis bsti stang du byas par mthong ste/_so so nas ngo mtshar rmad du byung 
[\[162b.3\]]ba'i spro ba skyes nas/_spro ba de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos rnam par phye zhing bstan pas/_so so'i yid tshim par gyur te/_bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_la las 'bras bu thob pa dang /_lha dang mir skyes pa grangs med par gyur to/_/de'i phyi 
[\[162b.4\]]nyin brgya byin gyis sangs rgyas spyan drangs te/_seng ge'i khri bshams nas/_bcom ldan 'das de la bzhugs pa dang /_brgya byin gyis g.yon nas mchod pa byed/_tshangs pa'i rgyal pos ni g.yas nas mchod pa byed do/_/'khor mang po rnams kyang cang mi smra bar 'khod pa la/_
[\[162b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gis seng ge'i khri la mnan pa dang /_seng ge'i khri las glang po che'i skad lta bu'i sgra chen po zhig byung ba dang /_de ma thag tu srin po chen po lnga zhig byung nas/_ston pa drug gi khri drangs nas bshig go/_/phyag na rdo rje ni rdo rje'i rtse mo la me 'bar ba thogs 
[\[162b.6\]]te/_ston pa drug gi mgor gzas so/_/ston pa drug po 'jigs skrag nas byer zhing bros te skyengs nas/_kha cig ni chur mchongs nas tshe 'phos so/_/ston pa drug gi 'khor las stong phrag dgu bcu ni/_sangs rgyas la skyabs su gsol nas/_rab tu 'byung bar gsol pa 
[\[162b.7\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par 'ongs so/_/zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_skra dang kha spu rang byi ste dge slong du gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la ci rigs par chos bstan pas zag pa kun zad de/_nyon mongs pa las rnam par grol nas dgra bcom par 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku'i ba spu'i bu ga brgyad khri nas 'od zer bkye nas/_nam mkha' yongs su gang bar mdzad de/_'od zer de dag re re'i thog ma la pad ma chen po re re sprul nas/_pad ma de dag re re'i steng na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor 
[\[163a.2\]]dang bcas pa dam pa'i chos ston pa re re sprul te/_'khor mang po kun gyis sprul pa de lta bur mthong bar byas pas/_lhag par dad pa'i sems skyes te/_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis ci rigs par chos bstan nas/_de la kha cig ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa nas/_kha 
[\[163a.3\]]cig ni 'bras bu thob pa dang /_lha dang mir skye ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs bskyed pa yang grangs med do/_/de'i phyi nyin tshangs pa'i rgyal pos sangs rgyas spyan drangs te/_bcom ldan 'das sku tshangs lha la thug gi bar du shin tu mtho ba/_lham me lhang nger bzhugs pa sprul nas/_
[\[163a.4\]]'od zer chen pos gnam sa kun tu snang zhing gsal bar mdzad do/_/de thams cad kyis mthong ba dang gsung yang thos par gyur nas/_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis ci rigs su chos rnam pa sna tshogs phye zhing bstan pas/_'khor mang po bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 
[\[163a.5\]]nas 'bras bu thob pa dang /_lha dang mir skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yang grangs med do/_/de'i phyi nyin rgyal chen bzhi'i rgyal pos spyan drangs te/_de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku rgyal chen bzhi'i ris nas srid pa'i rtse mo 
[\[163a.6\]]la thug gi bar du skus yongs su gang bar mthong bar mdzad nas/_sku de dag las 'od zer chen po bzhi 'byung zhing /_'khor rnams la ci rigs su dam pa'i chos ston pa'ang gsal bar thos shing mthong bar mdzad nas/_'khor de dag lhag par dga' ba skyes te/_ci rigs su chos 
[\[163a.7\]]bstan pas/_bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa nas/_'bras bu thob pa dang /_lha dang mir skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yang grangs med do/_/de'i phyi nyin khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/_sangs rgyas spyan drangs te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i nyin par byams 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas/_gser gyi mdog ltar seng ge'i khri la bzhugs bzhin du sku mi snang bar mdzad nas/_'od zer chen po bkye ste/_shin tu 'jam pa'i gsung gis dam pa'i chos rnam par phye zhing bstan te/_'khor mang po de dag gis thos par byas nas/_bla na 
[\[163b.2\]]med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas/_la la ni 'bras bu thob/_la la ni lha dang mir skye ba'i bsod nams bskyed pa yang grangs med do/_/de'i phyi nyin khyim bdag tsin das sangs rgyas spyan drangs te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i nyin par byams 
[\[163b.3\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas/_gser gyi mdog lta bu'i 'od zer bkye ste/_stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de kun 'od zer gyis gang bar byas nas/_'od kyis reg pa'i sems can de dag thams cad gdug pa gsum gyi sems kun zhi nas/_snying rje'i sems skyes te/_
[\[163b.4\]]sems can thams cad gcig la gcig pha ma lta bu'am/_phu bo lta bu'am/_nu bo lta bu mdza' zhing sdug par gyur te/_de'i 'og tu chos rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pas/_bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa dang /_'bras bu thob pa dang /_
[\[163b.5\]]lha dang mir skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yang grangs med do/_/de'i phyi nyin rgyal po shun tsi da las sangs rgyas spyan drangs te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i nyin par seng ge'i khri la bzhugs nas/_sku'i lte ba nas 'od zer gnyis shig phyung ste/_sku las 'dom bdun tsam 'phags nas/_
[\[163b.6\]]de'i steng na pad ma re re yod de/_pad ma la sprul pa'i sangs rgyas sprul te/_sprul pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi lte ba nas 'od zer byung ste/_rnam pa gnyis su gyes nas 'dom bdun tsam du 'phags te/_pad ma yang yod la pad ma'i steng na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs te/_de 
[\[163b.7\]]bzhin du mthar gyis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi bar du de dang 'dra ba dag sprul te/_'khor mang po thams cad de lta bu dag mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la ci rigs su chos bstan pas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]la gnas pa dang /_'bras bu thob pa dang /_lha dang mir skye ba yang grangs med do/_/de'i phyi nyin rgyal po u dra ya nas sangs rgyas spyan drangs te/_bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po u dra ya nas me tog gis gtor ba dang /_gtor ba'i me tog rnams de ma thag tu rin po 
[\[164a.2\]]che'i shing rta stong nyis brgya lnga bcus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu snang zhing /_thams cad kyis mthong bar byas so/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyis ci rigs par nad pa la sman btang ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos bstan pas/_kha cig ni bla na med pa'i byang chub 
[\[164a.3\]]tu sems bskyed de/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa dang /_lha dang mir skye ba yang grangs med do/_/de'i phyi nyin rgyal po gzugs can snying pos sangs rgyas spyan drangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po de la sngar 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po zhal zas kyi 
[\[164a.4\]]snod sbyor cig_/gdugs tshod kyi dus la bab na/_snod kun zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan par rnam pa sna tshogs rang gang ste/_'khor mang po thams cad la chog par gyur te/_de dag zos nas lus sems rab tu bde bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag sa la brdabs 
[\[164a.5\]]pa dang /_sems can dmyal ba [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dag na/_sems can tshad med pa sdug bsngal myong bar mthong ba dang /_de dag so so nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag gis sngon sdig pa ci lta bu zhig byas pas/_sdug bsngal 'di lta bu myong bar gyur to zhes smras te/_'khor 
[\[164a.6\]]mang po thams cad kyis thos shing mthong bar byas nas/_thams cad snying brtse ba'i sems skyes te/_dngangs nas ba spu langs pa tsam du skrag par gyur te/_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis ci rigs su chos bstan te/_de dag gi sems tshim par gyur nas/_la la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub 
[\[164a.7\]]tu sems bskyed do/_/la la ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas te/_lha dang mir skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yang grangs med do/_/sems can dmyal ba de dag gis sangs rgyas mthong zhing chos thos pa'i rkyen gyis shin tu dad pa'i sems skyes te/_de dag tshe'i dus byas nas 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]thams cad lha dang mir skyes so/_/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che ba'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba/_sku'i mtshan gzhan bltar snang na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[164b.2\]]pa'i zhabs kyi mthil na 'khor lo'i mtshan mnga' ba 'khor rnams la bstan du gsol/_zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs brkyang ste/_'khor mang po thams cad la zhabs kyi mthil na 'khor lo'i mtshan mnga' ba thams cad la bstan to/_/'khor thams cad kyis 
[\[164b.3\]]zhabs kyi 'og gi 'khor lo'i mtshan ri mo bris pa lta bur shin tu gsal ba mthong nas skyo mi shes par blta 'dod do/_/lhag par dga' ba'i sems skyes te/_yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod nams ci zhig mdzad na/_'di lta bu'i 
[\[164b.4\]]'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ngas sngon 'das pa'i dus na dge ba bcu'i las dag kyang byas/_gzhan dag byed par yang bskul bas 'di lta bu'i mtshan shin tu gsal bar ldan par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal pos yang bcom ldan 
[\[164b.5\]]'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba bcu'i las ji ltar mdzad pa dang /_gzhan dag dge ba bcu byed par ji ltar bskul ba thugs brtse bar dgongs te bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/_shin tu rtag par nyon la yid la zung shig 
[\[164b.6\]]dang bstan par bya'o/_/sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med tshad med pa'i pha rol na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po shing rta ni mo zhes bya ba/_rgyal phran ni brgyad khri bzhi stong la dbang byed de/_grong khyer khri phrag bcu yod/_blon po chen po ni stong phrag bcu yod de/_rgyal po de la 
[\[164b.7\]]btsun mo stong phrag nyi shu yod kyang /_sras gcig kyang med pas rgyal po rab tu mi dga' ste/_gdung tshab pa yang med snyam nas/_shin tu mya ngan gyis non te/_lha mtshun kun la mchod nas phyis dus gzhan zhig na/_btsun mo chen mo su li pa la zhes bya ba sems can dang ldan par 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]gyur te/_de tshun cad btsun mo yang yid gzhungs shing mkhas pa dang /_mnyen zhing des pas 'gro ba mang po yang dge ba la 'god par mos pa dang /_phyis zla ba tshang ba dang /_bu khye'u zhig btsas te/_byad gzugs legs pa blta na sdug pa/_phal las 'phags 
[\[165a.2\]]par bzang ba/_ba spu'i bu ga kun nas 'od 'byung ba zhig btsas te/_rgyal po yang bu de la shin tu sdug par sems pas skyo mi shes pa tsam du rtog ste/_mtshan mkhan la bstan nas/_mtshan mkhan gyis kyang mtshan bzang ngan brtags na/_khye'u 'di ni shin tu ngo mtshar che'o/_/
[\[165a.3\]]zhes dga' ba skyes nas khye'u 'di'i mtshan dang sbyar na gling bzhi la dbang bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes rgyal po la smras pa dang /_rgyal po yang rab tu dga' nas mtshan mkhan la khye'u'i ming thogs shig ces smras pa dang /_mtshan mkhan gyis rgyal po la khye'u 'di ma'i rum du zhugs nas/_
[\[165a.4\]]ngo mtshar che ba'i ltas ci byung zhes dris pa dang /_khye'u'i mas lhag par yid gzhungs shing des pa dang /_dge bar 'god pa la dga' bar gyur to zhes smras nas/_mtshan mkhan gyis khye'u'i ming shes rab 'od ces btags te/_rgyal tshab du dbang bskur nas mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan te gzhan 
[\[165a.5\]]pas 'phags par gyur to/_/de nas dus phyis zhig na rgyal po chen po tshe 'phos nas/_blon po rnams kyis rgyal bu de rgyal por dbang bskur bar gsol pa dang /_rgyal bus blon po rnams la ngas ni rgyal po mi nus so zhes bsgo'o/_/blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/_da rgyal po 
[\[165a.6\]]chen po nongs te rgyal bu ma lags pa rgyal po gzhan 'ga' yang med do/_/da rgyal bus rgyal po mi mdzad na su zhig rgyal por gzhug ces gsol pa dang /_rgyal bus smras pa/_'jig rten 'di dag ni mi rigs pa'i sdig pa'i chos byed do/_/bsad pa dang /_chad pas bcad pa'i 
[\[165a.7\]]las byas na/_kho bo la kha na ma tho ba'i las mi chung ste/_gal te khyed yul mi thams cad kyis dge ba bcu'i las byed nus na/_kho bo yang rgyal po byed nus so zhes bsgo'o/_/blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/_'di ni legs te rgyal sar gshegs te dbang mdzod cig dang /_
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam thams cad bgyid par bkar btags so zhes gsol pa dang /_mod la rgyal bu yang rgyal sar gshegs nas mi thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam spyod par yid 'thun te bka' bzhin du byas so/_/de'i tshe bdud kyi rgyal pos phrag dog byas te/_
[\[165b.2\]]rgyal po'i srid mi rung bar bya ba'i phyir skur yig bris nas rgyal phran kun la springs te/_sngar dge ba byos shig par bkar btags pa ni dge ba byas kyang mngon rtags med de/_bdag nyon mongs pa las phan pa'i don med kyis/_da phyin cad yid bzhin du mi dge ba bcu la bag 
[\[165b.3\]]med par spyod cig_/ces springs pa'i skur yig rgyal phran rnams kyi lag tu 'ongs nas/_rgyal phran rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/_rgyal po chen po ci'i phyir sdig pa'i las byed par bskul snyam nas 'di ni rigs pa ma yin te/_yid ma ches par rgyal po la zhus pa dang /_rgyal 
[\[165b.4\]]pos de skad ces gsol pa thos nas/_dngangs shing ngo mtshar du gyur te/_ngas ni 'di skad du bsgo ba med na/_ci'i phyir 'di 'dra bar gyur ces dngangs nas/_rgyal po nyid yul kun tu gshegs te/_mi mang po sngon las gyur tam/_ma gyur rtog par gshegs pa las/_
[\[165b.5\]]bdud kyi rgyal pos/_lam khar mi zhig me dong chen po rab tu 'bar ba'i nang du sdug bsngal gyis snying rje rje skad du 'don pa'i sgra rgyal pos thos par sprul nas/_rgyal po yang de'i thad du gshegs nas/_khyod su zhig ci nyes zhes dris nas/_mi des smras pa/_bdag gis 
[\[165b.6\]]sngon mi 'di dag dge ba bcu'i las la bkod pas/_da shin tu mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu dag myong bar gyur to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_dge ba byed par bskul bas/_'di ltar sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa ni chos med de/_khyod 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong 
[\[165b.7\]]bar gyur na/_dge ba byed par bskul nas/_dge ba byed pa de dag dge ba'i 'bras bu thob pa'am/_smras pa de ni dge ba'i 'bras bu thob ste/_dge ba byed par bskul ba 'ba' zhig sdug bsngal 'di lta bu myong ngo /_/rgyal pos de skad ces thos nas shin tu dga' ste/_'di 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]skad ces smras so/_/mi pha rol pos dge ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur na lta/_sdug bsngal myong yang bla'i/_'gyod pa med do zhes smras pa dang /_bdud kyi rgyal pos thos nas/_de dag de ma thag tu mi snang bar byas so/_/de nas rgyal po yul kun 
[\[166a.2\]]tu gshegs te/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam kun tu bsgrags te/_'bangs thams cad lus dang /_ngag dang yid kyi sgo nas dge ba la 'dun te/_thams cad kyis rgyal po'i yon tan bsngags pas/_de'i tshe gser gyi 'khor lo dang /_rin po che sna bdun
