[\[166a.3\]]dang ldan nas/_gling bzhi kun tu gshegs te/_dge ba la bkod pa lhur byas so/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po chen po de ni da ltar nga'i yab zas gtsang ma yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu de'i ma yum de ni/_da ltar nga'i yum lha mdzes ma yin no/_/
[\[166a.4\]]rgyal po shes rab 'od/_mi mang po dge ba bcu la bkod pa de ni nga yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na yang nga nyid dge ba bcu nyams su blangs te/_gzhan dag kyang dge ba bcu la bkod pas/_de'i phyir zhabs kyi 'og na 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan par gyur to/_/de 
[\[166a.5\]]nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/_yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ston pa drug po myos shing bslad pa'i 'khor du bcas pa rang gis tshod mi 'dzin te/_rnyed pa dang grags pa la chags nas/_phrag dog gi sems skyes te/_bcom 
[\[166a.6\]]ldan 'das dang cho 'phrul 'gran par gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gcig mdzad na/_bdag cag gis gnyis bgyi'o zhes mchi ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan kyang /_ston pa drug gis cho 'phrul gcig tsam 
[\[166a.7\]]yang bstan ma nus te/_ngo tsha zhing skyengs nas chur mchongs te/_gum pa 'di dag ni ha cang yang myos te/_'khrul to snyam bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po ston pa drug po 'di dag rnyed pa dang grags pa'i phyir/_nga dang 'gran par 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]'dod nas srog 'dor ba 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/_sngon 'das pa'i dus na yang nga dang 'gran par 'dod pa las/_lus dang srog gi bar du yang bral lo/_/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/_pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[166b.2\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sngon 'das pa'i dus na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ston pa drug dang 'gran pa bdag cag la bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po rtag par yid la zung shig dang /_sngon 'das 
[\[166b.3\]]pa'i dus na/_bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa 'das pa'i pha rol na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po ma ha sha ku li zhes bya ba rgyal phran lnga brgya la dbang byed pa zhig byung ste/_rgyal po de la btsun mo lnga brgya yod kyang /_khye'u rigs 'tshob pa gcig kyang med pas 
[\[166b.4\]]rgyal po des 'di snyam du sems so/_/nga ni rgas 'khogs te bu gcig tsam yang rigs 'tshob pa med na/_gal te nga 'das pa'i 'og tu rgyal phran rnams gcig la gcig mi nyan cing dmag 'dren te/_sems can rnams kyang ma nyes par 'chi la/_srid kyang 'khrugs 
[\[166b.5\]]par 'gyur ro/_/snyam bsams nas/_mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te sems khongs su chud do/_/de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang pos rgyang ma nas rgyal po de mi dga' zhing /_sems khongs su chud pa mthong nas/_nam mkha' las babs te/_sman pa zhig 
[\[166b.6\]]tu sprul nas/_rgyal po de'i gan du song ste/_rgyal po khyod ni ci'i phyir 'di ltar yi mug cing mi dga' zhes dris pa dang /_rgyal pos kyang snga ma bzhin gtam byas so/_/sprul pa'i sman pas rgyal po la smras pa/_rgyal po khyod mya ngan ma byed cig_/bdag ni 
[\[166b.7\]]khyod kyi phyir gangs kyi rir song nas/_gangs kyi ri'i sman rnam pa mang po btus te/_btsun mo dag zar bcug na zos ma thag tu btsun mo dag kun sems can dang ldan par 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas tshig 'di ni bdag gi mya ngan 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]sangs par byed do/_/snyam bsams nas/_sman pa la khyod kyis 'di ltar nus na shin tu legs so zhes smras so/_/de'i tshe na sprul pa'i sman pa de gangs kyi ri la song nas/_sman rnam pa mang po btus te/_khur du khyer te/_phyir rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs so/_/
[\[167a.2\]]de nas sman rnams 'o ma la bskol te/_btsun mo chen mo la byin pa dang /_btsun mo chen mos sman de mnam zhing yid kyang ma ches pas 'thung du ma btub pa dang /_sprul pa'i sman pa yang phyir lha'i gnas su song ngo /_/sman de la btsun mo chung ngu gzhan dag gis 'thungs te/_
[\[167a.3\]]btsun mos de dag 'thungs nas ring por ma lon par so so nas sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_de dag gis de bzhin du btsun mo chen mo la smras pa dang /_btsun mo chen mo 'gyod de mi dga' nas sman de'i lhag ma ci yod ces dris na zad do zhes smras so/_/'o na sman gyi 
[\[167a.4\]]tshigs ma tsam yod dam zhes dris na/_sman gyi tshigs ma ni yod do zhes smras so/_/de nas btsun mo chen mos sman gyi tshigs ma 'o ma'i nang du bskol te 'thungs pa dang /_ring por ma lon par sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_btsun mo gzhan dag sngar sman 'thungs 
[\[167a.5\]]pa ni zla ba tshang nas so so nas bu khye'u sha stag btsas te/_bzang ba blta na sdug pa'o/_/rgyal po rab tu dga' nas btsun mo chen mo sras nam btsa' ba 'ba' zhig sems so/_/btsun mo chen mo yang zla ba tshang nas khye'u zhig btsas te/_byad bzhin mi sdug pa 
[\[167a.6\]]shing dum lta bu zhig btsas nas/_rgyal po dang btsun mo mi dga' ste/_bu'i ming sdong dum zhes bya bar btags so/_/de nas gsos bskyed de cher skyes nas phu bo rnams ni thams cad chung ma len te/_rgyal bu sdong dum 'ba' zhig chung ma ma blangs so/_/dus 
[\[167a.7\]]gzhan zhig na pha rol po'i rgyal pos dmag drangs nas/_nye bar 'ongs pa dang /_rgyal bu lnga brgyas kyang dmag gi tshogs bshams te/_pha rol po'i dmag la rgol du song song ba las g.yul las pham nas phyir pho brang du bros nas 'ongs so/_/rgyal bu sdong 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]dum gyis phu bo rnams la smras pa/_khyod ci'i phyir 'di lta bur 'jigs skrag ste bros zhes dris na/_phu bo rnams kyis smras pa/_nged dmag dang bcas te pha rol po'i dmag la rgol du song ba las g.yul pham nas pha rol po'i dmag gis btab nas/_bros 
[\[167b.2\]]pa yin no/_/rgyal bu sdong dum gyis smras pa/_dgra de tsam gyis bdag cag la bsngo bar mi nus kyis/_bdag cag gi mes po'i gzhu dang /_dung da ltar lha rten gyi gnas na yod pa 'on cig dang /_bdag de dag la rgol du 'gro'o zhes smras so/_/rgyal 
[\[167b.3\]]bu de'i mes po ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yin te/_mi mang po bzlog nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i gzhu g.yer por btegs te/_rgyal bu la phul lo/_/rgyal bus gzhu blangs te brdungs nas gzhu rgyud springs pa'i sgra 'brug skad zer te/_dpag tshad 
[\[167b.4\]]bzhi bcu'i bar du thos par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal bus dung dang gzhu thogs te/_gcig pu dgra la rgol du song nas sngar dung bus te/_dung gi sgra gnam lcags 'bab pa skad grags pas/_pha rol po'i dmag gis thos pa tsam gyis 'jigs skrag ste 
[\[167b.5\]]thams cad byer ro/_/de nas rgyal bu yang phyir log nas rgyal po dang /_btsun mos gdod sdug par sems te/_rgyal bu'i chung ma blang bar sems so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po li shi pa tsa zhes bya ba la bu mo zhig yod de/_'jig rten na dkon par bzang ngo zhes 
[\[167b.6\]]thos nas/_rgyal pos pho nya btang nas bu mo mna' mar blangs te/_rgyal bu'i nang nas byad gzugs bzang ba zhig dmag pa yin no zhes bstan te/_rgyal po des bu mo sbyin par byas so/_/de nas rgyal po rab tu dga' nas mna' ma bsu ba'i yo byad bshams 
[\[167b.7\]]te/_rgyal bu sdong du ma nyid kyang chung ma bsur btang nas nyin par chung ma dang ma phrad par gyis la/_mtshan mo phrad par gyis shig ces bsgo nas btang ngo /_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na bu mo de phu nu mo gzhan dag dang phrad nas/_so so nas khyo'i yon tan ci 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]yod pa smras pa dang /_rgyal bu sdong dum gyi chung mas kyang khyo la bstod do/_/kho mo'i khyo ni dpa' la stobs kyang gyad dang mnyam ste/_lus kyi sha yang shin tu 'jam mo zhes smras pa dang /_phu nu mos smras pa/_khyod ma smra shig_/
[\[168a.2\]]khyod kyi khyo ni shin tu yang mi sdug ste/_sdong dum dang 'dra bas ci ste khyod nyin par mthong na dngangs par 'gyur ro zhes smras so/_/sdong dum gyi chung mas phu nu mo de dag de skad ces smras pa thos nas/_yid la bzung ste mtshan mo mar me sbar nas/_khyo 
[\[168a.3\]]gnyid kyis log pa'i 'og tu mar me phyung ste/_bltas na shin tu mi sdug par mthong nas dngangs skrag ste/_mod la phyir pha ma'i gnas su bros so/_/rgyal bu sdong dum gyis nam nangs nas gzod tshor te mi dga' nas gzhu dang dung thogs te/_chung 
[\[168a.4\]]ma'i yul du chung ma snyags su song ngo /_/yul der phyin nas blon po zhig la gnas te/_'dug 'dug pa las dus gzhan zhig na/_rgyal phran drug gi rgyal pos kyang rgyal po li shi pa tsa la bu mo bzang mo zhig yod ces thos nas/_so so nas dmag 
[\[168a.5\]]dang chas te bu mo slong du 'ongs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po li shi pa tsa mi dga' nas/_blon po rnams bsdus te bgros nas/_gal te bu mo 'di rgyal po gcig la byin na ni gcig mi dga' zhing 'khon du 'dzin pas/_ci ltar byas na dgra 'di dag med par 'gyur 
[\[168a.6\]]zhes bgros pa dang /_blon po gcig gis bu mo 'di dum bu dum bur byas la/_dum bu re re byin la de dag yid tshim par 'gyur ro zhes smras so/_/blon po kha cig gis 'di skad du la la zhig gis dmag 'di bzlog nus na/_bu mo yang chung mar byin la yul 
[\[168a.7\]]phyed kyang bya dgar byin no/_/zhes bkar btags na rung ngo zhes smras so/_/rgyal pos kyang gros de mnyan te bkar btags pa dang /_de'i tshe rgyal po sdong dum gzhu dang dung thogs te/_grong khyer gyi phyi rol tu dgra gang na 'dug par song nas dung bus te gzhu rgyud 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]springs pa tsam gyis pha rol po'i dmag thams cad skrag nas g.yul 'gul yang ma nus so/_/de nas de dag gi dmag gi nang du song nas rgyal po drug char gyi mgo bcad de cod pan blangs nas dmag de rnams kyang 'khor du bsdus so/_/rgyal po li shi pa tsa rab tu dga' ste/_bu 
[\[168b.2\]]mo yang chung mar byin nas/_rgyal po chen por bcug ste rgyal po drug gi srid gcig tu bsdus nas/_dmag gi tshogs dang bcas te chung ma dang 'grogs nas phyir bdag gi yul du 'ongs so/_/rgyal pos kyang sras phyir 'ongs so zhes thos nas phyi rol tu bsus te rgyal srid kyang rgyal bu la byin pa las 
[\[168b.3\]]byed du ma btub nas/_phyir yab la gtad de sngon bzhin du chung ma dang lhan cig tu 'dug nas/_chung ma la khyod ci'i phyir mtshan mo kho bo bor te bros zhes dris na/_khyod ni mi sdug ches nas mi ma yin snyam ste skrag nas bros so/_/de nas rgyal bus me long blangs te me long gi nang du bltas na bdag gi 
[\[168b.4\]]mdog shin tu mi sdug pa mthong nas lus de la blta mi 'dod pa tsam du skyo nas/_tshal zhig gi nang du song nas mchi ma byas pa las brgya byin lha'i dbang pos rgyang ma nas mthong ste de'i drung du 'ongs nas ci'i phyir khyod mchi ma byed zhes dris nas/_rgyal pos de bzhin du smras pa dang brgya byin gyis spro ba 
[\[168b.5\]]bskyed de/_rin po che'i nor bu cig kyang byin nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod rtag tu nor bu 'di spyi bo la thogs shig dang nga dang 'dra bar bzang zhing mdzes par 'gyur ro zhes bsgo nas rgyal bus nor bu spyi bo la thogs ma thag tu bdag gi lus sngon bas lhag par gyur pa tshor nas phyir pho brang gi nang du 'ongs 
[\[168b.6\]]nas gzhu dang dung blangs te rtser 'gro ba las chung mas ngo ma shes te 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod su zhig 'di la ma reg shig kho mo'i khyo 'ongs nas gnod par gyur ta re chung ma la smras pa/_nga khyod kyi khyo yin no zhes smras na chung ma yid ma ches te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/kho mo'i khyo ni shin tu mi sdug 
[\[168b.7\]]ste/_khyod ni shin tu yang bzang ba zhig byung na ci ltar kho mo'i khyo yin zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal bus spyi bo'i nor bu bkrol ma thag tu phyir mi sdug par mthong nas rab tu dga' ste/_ci'i phyir 'di ltar gyur ces dris na rgyal bus ci'i phyir de ltar gyur pa rgyas par gtam byas nas/_de phyin cad khyo shug gnyis 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]mdza' ste/_rgyal bu'i ming sdong dum zhes bya ba yang ming rjes nas rgyal bu su lan shan zhes ming btags so/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal bu des 'di snyam du bsams so/_/da ni dmag dang chas te pho brang zhig bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_gang nas gzhi yangs shing 
[\[169a.2\]]mnyam pa zhig tu song ste/_'dir pho brang gyis ces bsgo ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po bzhi zhig mir sprul nas 'dir pho brang mdzad na ci las mdzad ces dris na/_rgyal bu su lan shan gyis smras pa/_sa las bya'o zhes bsgo ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po bzhis ci'i phyir rin po che las mi mdzad ces smras so/_/
[\[169a.3\]]rgyal pos smras pa/_pho brang chen po zhig bya dgos na rin po che de snyed cig ga las rnyed ces smras pa dang /_klu'i rgyal pos bdag cag gis 'bul lo zhes smras nas de'i ngos bzhir chu mig re re sprul te 'di skad ces smras so/_/shar phyogs logs kyi chu mig las bcus te byas na thams cad 
[\[169a.4\]]bai dUr+yar 'gyur ro/_/lho phyogs logs kyi chu mig las bcus te byas na thams cad gser du 'gyur ro/_/nub phyogs logs kyi chu mig las bcus te byas na/_thams cad dngul du 'gyur ro/_/byang phyogs ngos kyi chu mig las bcus te byas na thams cad shel du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[169a.5\]]zhes smras so/_/rgyal bus kyang de dag gis smras pa bzhin du chu mig las bcus nas de bzhin du gyur to/_/de nas pho brang gi ra ba kho ra khor yug dpag tshad bzhi brgya pa cig byas nas de'i nang du pho brang dpag tshad bzhi bcu pa zhig byas te/_lam gyi srang na khang bu brtsegs pa dang 
[\[169a.6\]]skyed shing dang khrus kyi rdzing bu yang rin po che sna bzhi las byas so/_/bzang khyad lha'i pho brang dang 'dra bar byas so/_/zin ma thag tu rin po che sna bdun yang yod par gyur te/_gling bzhi la dbang byed cing dge ba rgyas par byas so/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po 
[\[169a.7\]]ma ha sha ku la ni da ltar nga'i yab rgyal po zas gtsang ma yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na btsun mo de ni da ltar nga'i yum lha mdzes ma yin no/_/rgyal bu mi sdug pa sdong dum ni da ltar nga yin no/_/de'i chung ma de ni skye dgu'i bdag mo yin no/_/de'i chung ma de'i pha de ni 'od srung yin no/_/
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]rgyal po drug gis dmag drangs te bu mo 'dod pa de dag ni ston pa drug po 'di dag yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na yang nga dang gzugs las rtsod pas ngas de dag kun bsad nas dmag tshogs kyang 'khor du bsdus pas da ltar gyi bar du rnyed pa dang grags pa la phrag dog byed pa'i phyir/_nga 
[\[169b.2\]]dang 'gran par 'dod kyang cho 'phrul med de/_bsams pa ltar ma gyur pas chur shi ba yin no/_/de ltar de dag gi 'khor khri phrag dgu bcu yang nga'i 'khor du bsdus nas nga'i nye gnas su gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[169b.3\]]to/_/rgyal po sdong dum de sngon bsod nams ci zhig bgyis pas 'di ltar mthu stobs che la shin tu mi sdug par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/_rgyu dang rkyen yod de bstan par bya'o/_/sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med pa'i pha rol na 'dzam bu'i 
[\[169b.4\]]gling 'dir yul bA rA Na sI zhes bya ba na drang srong ri zhes bya ba rang sangs rgyas zhig gnas so/_/rang sangs rgyas de la rlung nad yod pas rlung nad kyi sman 'bru mar 'thung dgos pa las/_'bru mar 'tshag pa'i khyim du song nas 'bru mar bslang ba dang /_'bru mar 'tshag pa des de la khros te mgo dang shing 
[\[169b.5\]]dum bu 'dra ba rkang lag dang /_shing tshal 'dra ba 'di las byed du mi btub kyi zho gcig nams kyang 'byin du mi btub/_slong mo 'ba' zhig la 'tsho ba ltos pa 'di zhes spyos shing brgyad nas/_'on kyang mar gyi tshigs ma phul lo/_/rang sangs rgyas des mar gyi tshigs ma thob 
[\[169b.6\]]nas sgor byung ste/_phyir 'gro ba las sgor khar mar 'tshag pa'i chung ma dang phrad nas/_rang sangs rgyas de la dad pa'i sems skyes te/_skyes bu khyed gang nas gshegs mar gyi tshigs ma 'dis ci zhig mdzad ces dris pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas des kyang de bzhin du drang por gtam byas nas/_
[\[169b.7\]]chung ma des rang sangs rgyas de phyir bos nas/_khyim du khrid nas lhung bzed blangs te/_'bru mar lhung bzed bkang nas phul te/_khyo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod kyis skyes bu 'di la mar gyi tshigs ma phul ba shin tu nyes kyis kha'i nyes pa 'gyod tshangs gyis 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]shig ces bsgo nas mi des kyang 'gyod pa'i sems skyes te/_'gyod tshangs byas nas khyo shug yid 'thun par rang sangs rgyas de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa slan cad kyang mar dgos na rtag tu 'on zhig ces smras nas/_rang sangs rgyas des kyang rtag tu de'i khyim 
[\[170a.2\]]nas mar blangs te/_de dag gi byas pa gzo ba'i phyir/_de dag gi drung du cho 'phrul bstan te/_steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas/_chu 'bab pa dang /_me 'bar ba dang /_cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to/_/mar 'bul ba'i khyo shug gnyis kyis de lta bu'i cho 'phrul mthong nas/_
[\[170a.3\]]lhag par dga' zhing dad pa'i sems skyes te/_mi des chung ma la smras pa/_khyod kyis mar phul ba'i bsod nams ci yod pa kho bo dang thun mong du gyur te/_bdag cag khyo shug tu shog shig ces smras pa dang /_chung mas smras pa/_khyod kyis skyes bu chen po 'di la tshig ngan pa smras te/_
[\[170a.4\]]mar gyi tshigs ma phul nas/_dad pa'i sems med pas gang du skyes kyang shin tu mi sdug par 'ongs na/_khyod dang ci ltar khyo shug byed ces smras so/_/khyos smras pa/_kho bo rtag tu nyon mongs te yongs su mar 'tshag pa'i las byas na ci'i phyir khyod kyis sbyin pa'i 'bras bu nga dang lhan cig 
[\[170a.5\]]tu mi bsngo/_/nga mi nyan gyis khyod dang khyo shug tu bya dgos so/_/chung mas smras pa/_ci ste khyod dang khyo shug tu gyur na/_khyod mi sdug ches bas kho mos khyod bor te mtshan mo bros su 'ong ngo /_/khyos smras pa/_ci ste khyod bros na yang ngas phyir snyags la/_khyod thob par byas nas phyir 
[\[170a.6\]]'ong ngo zhes khyo shug gnyis gcig la gcig smras pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas de la lus dang srog phyogs nas 'gyod tshangs byas so/_/de'i tshe na rang sangs rgyas des khyo shug de gnyis la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/khyod khyo shug gnyis kyis nga la mar byin pas na nga'i nad sos kyis khyo shug 
[\[170a.7\]]gnyis cir smon pa smros shig_/de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bsgo ba dang /_mi khyo shug gnyis rab tu dga' nas pus mo sa la btsugs nas/_'di skad ces smon lam btab bo/_/bdag cag khyo shug gnyis lha'am mi gang du skyes kyang yid bzhin du 'grub par gyur 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na mar 'tshag pa'i mi de rgyal bu sdong dum yin no/_/de'i chung ma ni sdong dum gyi chung ma nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe rang sangs rgyas la sdong dum dang 'dra zhes tshig ngan pa smras te/_khros bzhin du mar gyi tshigs ma byin pas skye ba thams cad du 
[\[170b.2\]]shin tu mi sdug par gyur to/_/phyis 'gyod tshangs byas te mar bzang po phul bas skye ba thams cad du phyis bzang zhing sdug par gyur to/_/mar phul bas na skye ba thams cad du mthu stobs dang ldan te thams cad du thub par gyur to/_/de'i bsod nams kyis ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur te/_
[\[170b.3\]]gling bzhi la dbang zhing 'dod pa lnga yid bzhin du spyod par gyur to/_/dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las rnam par smin pa ni nam yang med par mi 'gyur te/_de bas na lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las bsrung ba la nan tan bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_rgyal po gzugs can 
[\[170b.4\]]snying po la sogs te rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_'khor rnam pa bzhi dang /_lha dang klu la sogs pas thos nas/_la la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/la la ni lan cig phyir ldog pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/la la ni rang sangs rgyas 
[\[170b.5\]]kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed/_la la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur nas/_'khor thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/ston pa drug btul ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//
[\[170b.6\]]bam po bzhi pa/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod spungs pa'i ri la bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la bser ma'i snyun gyis bzung nas/_sman pa 'tsho byed kyis sman rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang mar du sbyar 
[\[170b.7\]]te/_nyin re bzhin sman srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis gsol lo/_/lha sbyin ma rungs pa de phrag dog gi sems bskyed nas/_sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa'o zhes bsgrags te/_bcom ldan 'das sman gsol zhes thos nas sman 'dod cing /_sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar bya ba'i phyir/_sman pa 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]'tsho byed la bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba'i sman nga la yang sbyor te byin cig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas 'tsho byed kyis sman sbyar te lha sbyin la byin pas/_nyin re re la sman srang bzhi bzhi thong shig ces bsgo ba dang /_lha sbyin gyis da ltar bcom ldan 'das nyin re re srang du gsol zhes 
[\[171a.2\]]dris pa dang /_'tsho byed kyis bcom ldan 'das da ltar nyin re re srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis gsol zhes smras pa dang /_lha sbyin gyis kho bo la yang nyin re srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gnyis byin cig ces bsgo ba dang /_'tsho byed kyis smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang khyod 
[\[171a.3\]]mi 'dra ste/_khyod kyis mang du zos na mi zhu bas gdon mi za bar phyis nad du 'gyur zhes smras pa dang /_lha sbyin gyis smras pa/_ci tsam zos na zhu ba'i drod kho bo la yod de/_kho bo dang sangs rgyas bye brag ci yod zhes smras nas/_sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar nyin gcig la sman srang sum cu rtsa 
[\[171a.4\]]gnyis gnyis btang nas sman ma zhu ste/_rtsa kun tu zug nas nyam thag ste/_shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i skad phyung nas 'bod 'grogs so/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_rgyang ma nas phyag brkyang nas lha sbyin gyi mgo la byugs pas mod la sman kun zhu nas/_
[\[171a.5\]]na tsha'i sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur te/_lha sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag yin par shes nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal bu don grub kyis shes pa'i rtsal du sman yang bslabs te/_sman pa yang mkhas pa lta ste mi 'dod do zhes smras so/_/de'i tshe kun dga' 
[\[171a.6\]]bos de skad ces smras pa thos nas/_shin tu mi dga' ste/_pus mo sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha sbyin 'di ni bka' drin mi 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la thugs brtse bar dgongs nas/_de'i nad yongs su bsal 
[\[171a.7\]]kyang slar mi dge ba'i sems kyis tshig mi dgos par smras te/_rtag tu bcom ldan 'das la bsngo'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_lha sbyin gyis da ltar 'di 'ba' zhig tu nga la mi dge ba'i sems bskyed nas nga la gnod par sems par 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]ma zad kyis/_sngon 'das pa'i dus na yang nga la sdig pa'i sems bskyed nas nga bsad par gyur to/_/kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_'das pa'i dus na lha sbyin gyis ci ltar bgyis pa bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[171b.2\]]sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med pa'i pha rol na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yul bA rA Na sI zhes bya ba na/_rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba khro zhing gtum la snying rje med de/_'dod chags dang zhe sdang che ba/_sdig pa'i las kyis gtses shing gsod pa'i las la 
[\[171b.3\]]dga' ba zhig byung ngo /_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i rmi lam du gcan gzan gyi lus spu gser ltar 'dug pa/_spu'i thog ma la gser lta bu'i 'od 'byung zhing g.yas g.yon thams cad gser gyi mdog tu snang bar byed pa'i gcan gzan gcig cig rmis nas/_de ma thag tu sad de 'di snyam du 'di 
[\[171b.4\]]ltar bdag gis rmi lam du mthong ba 'di ni gdon mi za bar yod kyis/_rngon pa dag de'i pags pa tshol du gzhug go snyam du bsams nas/_rngon pa rnams bsdus te 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/kho bo'i rmi lam du gcan gzan gser gyi mdog can spu'i thog ma la gser gyi mdog lta bu 'byung 
[\[171b.5\]]ba cig rmis te/_'di lta bu zhig yul 'di na yod par nges kyis khyod rnams kyis kun du tshol la/_de'i pags pa bshus te nga la phul cig dang /_khyod kyi bu tsha rabs bdun tshun cad du skyid cing bde bar bya'o/_/gal te snying nas ma btsal lam le lo zhig byas te/_ma rnyed na khyed rnams rtsa rgyud 
[\[171b.6\]]tshun cad med par bya'o zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas rngon pa de dag shin tu mi dga' ste/_dben pa'i phyogs zhig tu thams cad 'dus nas 'di skad ces bgros so/_/rgyal pos rmis pa'i gcan gzan de ni gna' nas ma mthong ste/_gal te bdag cag gis ma rnyed na/_rgyal po'i bka' 
[\[171b.7\]]khrims gnyan pas bdag cag gsod par 'gyur ro zhes bgros nas/_lhag par mi dga' ba'i sems skyes te yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/shing khung 'di dag na sbrul gdug pa dang gcan gzan ma rungs pa mang bas/_lam ring por 'gro zhing srog mi phangs par don bsgrub du ni srog 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]dang bsdos su yang mi nus pas/_bdag cag gi nang na mi gang nus pa gcig cig tshol du btang ngo /_/gal te mi des mthong bar gyur na/_gdod bdag cag sbran par byas na legs so zhes smras pa dang /_mi zhig la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod srog dang bsdos te kun du 
[\[172a.2\]]tshol du song cig_/gal te rnyed na nged spyi las nor bkal te mang du sbyin no/_/gal te khyod ma 'khor na yang khyod kyi bu dang /_chung ma la sbyin no zhes smras te/_mi des kyang 'di snyam du bdag ni mi mang po 'di lta bu'i phyir lus dang srog yal yang bla'o snyam bsams nas/_'gro ba'i yo byad 
[\[172a.3\]]bshams te/_ri nags tshal nyam nga ba kun du tshol du song song ba las yun ring zhig lon pas shin tu nyam thag nas/_dbyar tsha ba'i dus su bye ma tsha ba pus mo nub tsam zhig tu phyin pa dang ngal chad de/_skom gyis gdungs pas srog chad la thug pas 'di skad ces smras so/_/snying rje dang ldan 
[\[172a.4\]]pa su zhig bdag 'di ltar sdug sdug pa'i lus dang srog gi skyabs su 'gyur ba yod dam zhes smras pa dang /_de'i tshe na ri de la gcan gzan kun ta zhes bya ba lus kyi spu'i mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu la spu'i thog ma la gser gyi 'od 'byung ba zhig yod pa des rgyang ma nas mi des smras pa'i tshig 
[\[172a.5\]]thos nas/_shin tu snying brtse ba'i sems skyes te/_gang na chu mig grang mo yod pa'i nang du lus bcug nas mi de'i drung du 'ongs te/_mi de la pang pas 'khyud nas cung zad nyams brtas pa dang /_chu 'gram du khrid de bkrus te shing tog bsdus te zar bcug go/_/de nas mi de sor chud 
[\[172a.6\]]nas 'di snyam du sems so/_/gcan gzan 'di ni rgyal pos 'dod pa kho na yin no/_/bdag srog dang bral ba las srog gi skyabs byas te/_drin gzo ba [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang ma byas par 'di la gsod pa'i sems ci ltar yang bskyed/_/gal te ma rnyed na ni rngon pa de dag gnyen dang bcas su de dag 
[\[172a.7\]]thams cad gyod las thogs par 'gyur ro snyam bsams nas/_mi dga' zhing 'dug pa las gcan gzan gyis khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar mi dga' zhes dris na/_mchi ma blags nas rgyas par smras pa dang /_kun tas 'di la khyod mi dga' ma byed cig_/nga'i pags pa 'di shin 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]tu thob sla ba yin te/_kho bos bsams na tshe snga ma la lus grangs med pa zhig btang yang /_lus kyi bsod nams su 'gyur ba'i las ma byas te/_lus kyi pags pa 'dis de dag gi srog skyob bo zhes smras nas/_rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/_khyod kyis kho bo 
[\[172b.2\]]srog ma bcad par pags pa bshus te khyer cig_/'gyod pa'i sems med par khyod la sbyin no/_/de'i tshe rngon pa des pags pa dal gyis bshus nas kun tas 'di skad ces smon lam btab bo/_/bdag gis pags pa bshus la byin te/_mi mang po phangs pa'i srog bskyabs 
[\[172b.3\]]pa'i bsod nams 'di sems can thams cad la bsngos te/_bdag bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bsgral nas/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la 'god par shog shig ces smon lam 
[\[172b.4\]]btab bo/_/de'i tshe na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/_lha'i pho brang kun ldeg cing g.yos nas lha rnams dngangs te bltas na/_byang chub sems dpas lus kyi pags pa sbyin par byas pa mthong nas/_nam mkha' las babs 
[\[172b.5\]]te kun ta ga la ba der lhags nas lha rdzas kyi me tog gis gtor te mchod pa byas nas mchi ma char bzhin du bab bo/_/pags pa bshus nas song ba'i 'og tu sha rlon pa de la khrag kun nas zag cing /_sbrang ma dang grog ma la sogs pa stong phrag brgyad cu rnyed de'i lus la 'dus nas 
[\[172b.6\]]thams cad de la za zhing de dag bros su dogs pas/_lus kyang mi 'gul te lus kyi sbyin pa byas nas de nyid du tshe'i dus byas so/_/sbrang ma dang srin bu byang chub sems dpa'i sha la zos pa rnams kyang tshe 'phos nas thams cad mtho ris kyi lhar skyes so/_/de'i tshe rngon pa des pags pa 
[\[172b.7\]]de khyer te/_rgyal po la phul nas/_rgyal po rab tu dga' ste/_'di lta bu shin tu 'jam pa'i zla med do zhes rtag tu nyal ba'i stan du bting nas de la nyal lo/_/kun dga' bo de ltar rig par gyis shig_/de'i tshe de'i dus na/_gcan gzan kun ta de ni da ltar nga yin no/_/rgyal po 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]tshangs sbyin de ni lha sbyin yin no/_/srin bu stong phrag brgyad cu de ni nga thog mar mngon par sangs rgyas te/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na 'bras bu thob pa'i lha'i sras po stong phrag brgyad cu po yin te/_lha sbyin gyis de'i tshe na yang nga bsad de da ltar gyi bar du nga la sdig pa'i sems 
[\[173a.2\]]kyis gsod par sems so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_'khor mang po rnams dge ba'i chos la 'dun te/_la la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_la la ni phyir ldog pa dang /_la la ni phyir mi ldog pa dang /_
[\[173a.3\]]dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed/_la la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs te mngon par dga'o/_/gcan gzan 
[\[173a.4\]]kun tas lus kyi sbyin pa byas pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//gang zhig rab tu byung na de'i bsod nams ni rab tu mang ste/_bdag gi bu'am/_bu mo'am/_bran khol las gang yang rung /_rab tu byung ba gnang ngam/_bdag nyid rab tu byung na de'i bsod 
[\[173a.5\]]nams ni dpag tu med do/_/gang zhig sbyin pa byas pa'i bsod nams de ni skye ba bcu'i bar du longs spyod myong bar 'gyur te/_gnam rim pa drug gi lhar yang dang yang du lan stong skyes pa bas/_mi gcig rab tu byung ngam/_bdag nyid rab tu byung na bsod nams 'di ni snga ma bas mchog 
[\[173a.6\]]tu che'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sbyin pa byas pa'i bsod nams ni zad pa'i mtha' yod kyi/_rab tu byung ba'i bsod nams ni dpag tu med/_mtha' med/_gzhan yang tshul khrims bsrungs pa'i bsod nams kyis mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong dang /_mtho ris kyi longs spyod 
[\[173a.7\]]tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du myong bar 'gyur gyi/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i bsod nams ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du bsod nams zad mi shes so/_/gal te kha cig gis rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten mtho khyad sum cu 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]rtsa gsum la thug par byas pa'i bsod nams kyis rab tu byung ba'i bsod nams tsam la mi phod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten ni glen pa ma rung ba dag gis bshig par 'gyur gyis/_rab tu byung ba'i bsod nams gzhig nus pa med do/_/dge ba'i chos 'dod 
[\[173b.2\]]pa na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma gtogs par 'di las lhag pa'i chos gzhan med do/_/dper na long ba brgya'i mig sman pa mkhas pa gcig gis phye ste/_cig car mthong bar byas pa dang /_gzhan yang mi brgya zhig gi mig dbyung ba la thug pa las/_mthu dang ldan pa zhig gis 
[\[173b.3\]]mig 'byung ba de dag de las thar bar byas pa dang /_mi 'di gnyis kyi bsod nams ni dpag tu med mod kyi/_'on kyang gzhan rab tu byung ngam/_bdag rab tu byung ba'i bsod nams tsam mi phod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mi 'di gnyis kyis de dag gi mig byin pa ni 'jig rten gyi phan pa 
[\[173b.4\]]dang /_bde ba tsam mthong bar zad la/_sha'i mig gi rang bzhin ni 'jig pa'i rang bzhin no/_/gzhan rab tu phyung ngam/_bdag rab tu byung na/_gcig gis gcig bstan cing drangs pas sems can gyi khams bskal pa'i mthar bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi mig tu 'gyur te/_shes 
[\[173b.5\]]rab kyi mig gi rang bzhin ni bskal pa'i bar du 'jig par mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i bsod nams kyis lha dang /_mi'i nang na bde ba'i longs spyod zad mi shes pa/_mthar thug pa med pa yid bzhin du myong zhing mthar yang mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab tu byung ba'i 
[\[173b.6\]]chos ni bdud kyi 'khor med par byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi gdung 'tshob par byed do/_/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos med par byed cing dge ba'i chos skyed par byed do/_/kha na ma tho ba'i dri ma med par byed cing /_bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi las skyed par byed do/_/de bas na 
[\[173b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byung ba'i bsod nams ni ri rab lhun po bas 'phang mtho'o/_/rgya mtsho bas gting zab bo/_/nam mkha' bas rgya che'o zhes gsungs so/_/gal te su zhig rab tu byung ba'i bgegs dang bar chad byas te/_bsam pa ltar ma gyur na de kha na ma tho ba'i 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]las shin tu lci ba ni/_dper na mi zhig mun khrod du song ba ci yang mi mthong ba dang 'dra bar de'i sdig pa'i rnam par smin pa yang de dang 'dra ste/_shin tu mi snang ba'i mun pa mun nag chen po'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo /_/dper na rgya mtsho'i nang na chu bo dang chu bran thams cad 
[\[174a.2\]]'bab pa ltar mi de'i sdig pa'i rnam par smin pa ni de dang 'dra ste nyes pa thams cad de'i lus la 'du'o/_/dper na ri rab lhun po ni bskal pa'i me byung na/_lhag ma ma lus par tshig pa dang 'dra bar de'ang sems can dmyal ba'i mes tshig nas lhag ma ma lus pa yang de dang 'dra'o/_/gzhan 
[\[174a.3\]]rab tu byung bar gnang ngam gal te bdag rab tu byung na/_de'i bsod nams ni rab tu che'o/_/rab tu byung ba ni mdo sde'i chu yongs su dag pas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad bkrus te/_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yongs su bsal nas/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/
[\[174a.4\]]'dul ba'i rkang pas tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i sa la 'chag cing /_chos mngon pa'i mig gis 'jig rten gyi dge ba dang /_sdig pa blta zhing yid bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la 'gro ste/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du phyin par byed do/_/de bas na rgan po'am/_
[\[174a.5\]]gzhon nu rab tu byung ngam/_rab tu byung bar gnang ngam/_bdag rab tu byung na/_de'i bsod nams mchog tu che'o/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag dpal skyes zhes bya ba lo brgya lon 
[\[174a.6\]]pa zhig gis rab tu byung ba'i yon tan 'di ltar tshad med do zhes thos nas/_'di snyam du bdag ci'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung snyam bsams nas/_chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bran khol la nga ni rab tu byung ngo zhes byas so/_/mi de rgas 'khogs pas khyim gang gi mi thams cad 
[\[174a.7\]]skyo ste/_dgos pa med do snyam nas rab tu byung ngo zhes zer ba thos pa dang /_de dag dga' ste myur du 'gro ba'i rigs kyi dus la bab bo zhes smras so/_/de nas khyim bdag de khyim nas byung ste 'od ma'i tshal du bcom ldan 'das la rab tu byung bar gsol du song nas/_'od ma'i tshal du phyin pa dang /_
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]dge slong rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po lha dang mi la phan pa'i don rgyas par mdzad pa gang na bzhugs zhes dris so/_/dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni 'gro ba mang po la phan pa'i don du rgyu zhing gzhan du gshegs zhes smras so/_/khyim bdag 
[\[174b.2\]]des kyang dge slong rnams la sangs rgyas ston pa chen po'i 'khor mkhas pa dang shes rab tu ldan pa'i mchog su yin zhes dris pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis btsun pa shA ri'i bu yin no zhes bstan to/_/rgan po de 'khar ba la brten te/_shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_'khar 
[\[174b.3\]]ba bor nas phyag 'tshal te/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag rab tu byung bar gnong shig_/btsun pa shA ri'i bus brtags na khyim bdag 'di rgas pas slob pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_dge 'dun gyi las bya ba rnam gsum las nyams te mi nus so snyam bsams nas/_
[\[174b.4\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod phyir song shig_/khyod ni rgas 'khogs te dus las yol gyis/_rab tu byung du mi rung ngo zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas mthar gyis 'od srung chen po dang /_u pA li dang /_ma 'gags pa la sogs te dgra bcom pa de dag kun gyi drung du song nas gsol ba btab pa las/_
[\[174b.5\]]de dag kun gyis khyod sngar su la yang gsol ba ma btab bam zhes dris na bdag gis sngar btsun pa shA ri'i bu la gsol ba btab bo/_/'o na ci skad zer/_des ni khyod rgas 'khogs te dus las yol bas rab tu byung du mi rung ngo zhes mchi'o/_/de nas dge slong de dag gis smras pa/_shA 
[\[174b.6\]]ri'i bu lta bu mkhas pa shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog des kyang /_ma gnang na/_bdag cag kyang de dang 'dra ste gnang ba med do/_/dper na sman pa mkhas pa sman dpyad la mkhas pas nad pa brtags te/_sman dpyad mi byed par spong na/_sman pa chung ngu gzhan de dag gso bar mi byed 
[\[174b.7\]]de/_de la nges par 'chi ba'i mtshan ma yod par rtogs pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu blo dang ldan pas kyang ma gnang na/_dge slong gzhan yang de dang 'dra ste gnang ba med do zhes bsgo'o/_/khyim bdag de dge slong rnams kyis rab tu byung bar ma gnang bas/_'od ma'i tshal nas phyir byung ste/_
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]sgo'i them pa la 'dug nas skad chen po phyung ste smre sngags 'don cing 'dug go/_/bdag thog ma skyes nas nyes pa chen po ni ma byas na/_ci'i phyir bdag rab tu byung bar mi gnang /_u pA li lta bu 'breg mkhan las byung ba lta bu phyag dar ba ngan skyugs 'dor ba dang /_
[\[175a.2\]]sor 'phreng can lta bu mi grangs med par bsad pa dang /_a si ka lta bu mi rgod ma rungs pa de dag la sogs pa yang rab tu byung na/_bdag la nyes pa ci zhig yod de rab tu byung du ma gnang zhes smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du gshegs te/_sku mngon par bstan na 'od zer 
[\[175a.3\]]gyis lhang nge lham mer gsal te/_mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan ltar mngon du gshegs te/_khyim bdag dpal skyes la khyod ci'i phyir ngu zhes bka' stsal to/_/de'i tshe na khyim bdag des sangs rgyas kyi gsung tshangs 
[\[175a.4\]]pa'i dbyangs lta bu thos nas/_rab tu dga' mgu rangs pa ni/_bus ma mthong ba tsam du dga' ste/_lus smad lnga sa la gtugs nas/_sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sems can gyi nang na mi gsod pa dang /_mi rgod bgyid pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_
[\[175a.5\]]skur klang 'debs pa'i ma rabs kyang rab tu byung na/_bdag 'ba' zhig dngos sdig ci mchis na/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung bar ma gnang /_bdag gi khyim gang gi mi yang rgas 'khogs pas skyo bar gyur te dgos pa med do zhes mchi bas gal te/_sangs rgyas 
[\[175a.6\]]kyi bstan la rab tu byung ba ma gnang na/_slar khyim du mchis kyang gdon mi 'tshal bar bdag khyim du 'jug tu mi ster bas gang du yang mchi ba'i gnas ma mchis te/_deng 'di nyid du nges par srog dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag dpal skyes la 
[\[175a.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_nam mkha' la lag pa bteg pa la 'di ni rab tu 'byung ngo /_/'di ni rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes nges par su zhig smra/_khyim bdag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i 'khor mkhas pa'i mchog_/sangs rgyas kyi 'og tu 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]che ba 'jig rten gyi ded dpon shA ri'i bus/_bdag bstan pa la rab tu byung bar ma gnang ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen pos ji ltar bu sri zhu che ba la pha mas tshig snyan pa smra ba bzhin du khyim bdag dpal skyes de la spro ba bskyed nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyod mya 
[\[175b.2\]]ngan ma byed cig ngas khyod rab tu dbyung ngo /_/shA ri'i bus ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi bar du brtson 'grus dka' ba spyod cing /_bskal pa brgyar bsod nams byas pa ni ma yin/_shA ri'i bus kyang skye ba thams cad du shin tu spyod dka' ba/_mgo bcad pa dang /_mig phyung ba 
[\[175b.3\]]dang /_rus pa dang /_rkang dang /_sha dang /_khrag dang /_pags pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_lag pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna bcad de sbyin pa byin pa ma yin/_shA ri'i bus ni stag mo la lus byin pa dang /_me dong du mchongs pa dang /_lcags gzer stong lus la btab pa dang /_
[\[175b.4\]]lus la mar me stong btsugs pa ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bus ni yul dang /_grong khyer dang /_chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi sbyin pa'i las byas pa ma yin/_shA ri'i bus ni bskal pa grangs med pa thog ma la/_
[\[175b.5\]]sangs rgyas brgyad khri brgyad stong la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /_bskal pa bar ma grangs med pa la sangs rgyas dgu khri dgu stong la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /_bskal pa tha ma grangs med pa la sangs rgyas khri phrag bcu la bsnyen bkur byas shing rab tu byung nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[175b.6\]]pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa ma yin/_shA ri'i bus ni chos la dbang du gyur pa ma yin na/_ci'i phyir 'di ni rab tu 'byung ba'i mi rigs so zhes smra/_nga 'ba' zhig ni chos la dbang mdzad de/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis bteg cing bzod pa'i go cha bgos te/_byang chub kyi shing drung du 
[\[175b.7\]]rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs nas/_bdud kyi sde rnams btul te/_mngon par sangs rgyas pas nga dang mnyam pa med do/_/de bas na khyod nga'i phyi bzhin shog shig rab tu dbyung ngo zhes de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spro ba bskyed pas/_mya ngan kun zhi nas 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/_sangs rgyas kyi phyi bzhin du gtsug lag khang du song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis maud gal ya na chen po la khyim bdag 'di rab tu phyung shig ces bka' stsal to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can ni las gang dang 'thun 
[\[176a.2\]]pa des 'dul bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas dang 'thun pa las ni gzhan gyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang gzhan dang las 'thun pa de la yang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur te/_gang zhig shA ri'i bu dang las 'thun pa ni/_maud gal dang /_'od srung dang /_ma 'gags 
[\[176a.3\]]pa dang /_na bun la sogs pa nye gnas gzhan thams cad kyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur/_de bzhin du gang dang gang las 'thun pas/_de la gzhan gyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe maud gal ya nas kyang khyim bdag 'di rgas 'khogs te/_kha ton slob pa dang /_bsam gtan 
[\[176a.4\]]dang /_dge 'dun gyi las byed mi nus te/_las bya ba gsum las nyams so snyam bsams kyang /_chos kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu phyung shig ces bka' stsal pas/_tshul gyis bzlog tu mi rung ngo snyam bsams nas/_rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs so/_/
[\[176a.5\]]mi 'dis tshe rabs snga ma la thar bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu yang bskyed/_chos kyi lcags kyus zin pa ni ci ltar nya mchil pa thogs nas gdon mi za bar phyir 'byung ba ltar/_thar pa'i rgyu yang bskyed/_dge ba'i tshogs kyang bsags pas nyin mtshan du brtson 'grus bskyed de/_klog pa dang /_
[\[176a.6\]]'don pa la goms shing /_mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_chos mngon pa rgyas par khong du chud cing rtogs par gyur na/_rgas 'khogs pas tshul bzhin du rim gro dang /_bsti stang dang /_bsu skyel dang /_bla ma la gsong por smra ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba ni mi nus so/_/
[\[176a.7\]]de la dge slong gzhon nu sngar rab tu byung ba gral mtho ba dag 'di skad du dge slong rgan po 'don pa dang /_klog pa dang /_slob pa la bsnyems te/_bdag cag la bkur sti yang mi byed snyam nas rtag tu 'tshe bar gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rgan po des 'di snyam du bsams so/_/
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]bdag khyim na 'dug pa'i tshe chung ma dang bus gtses/_da rab tu byung nas 'di lta bu'i bag med par 'gyur snyam nas/_da yang dge slong gzhon nu 'di dag gis gtses na/_sngon nyes pa ci zhig byas na 'di 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pas/_bdag da shi yang rung snyam bsams nas/_
[\[176b.2\]]tshal de'i 'gram na chu chen po zhig 'bab pa'i 'gram du song nas/_chos gos phud de shing gi yal ga la bkal nas/_pus mo sa la btsugs te/_mchi ma blags nas 'di snyam du yi dam bcas so/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun yongs su spong ba ma yin gyi/_
[\[176b.3\]]lus 'di 'ba' zhig btang ngo /_/bdag gis sbyin pa bgyis pa dang /_tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /_mdo sde kha ton byas pa'i bsod nams kyis bdag lus 'di dang bral nas/_btsan zhing phyug la longs spyod dang ldan pa/_'khor 'dum pa'i 
[\[176b.4\]]rigs su skyes te/_bdag dge ba'i chos la 'jug pa'i bgegs mi byed pa dang /_rtag tu dkon mchog gsum dang phrad pa dang /_rab tu byung zhing chos la nan tan byed pa dang /_slob dpon mkhas pa dang phrad de mya ngan las 'da' ba yang ston par shog shig ces dam bcas so/_/gang 
[\[176b.5\]]na chu drag po 'bab cing /_zab pa/_klong 'khyil pa dang /_dpa' rgod par mchongs par gzas so/_/de'i tshe maud gal gyi bus/_lha'i mig gis bdag gi nye gnas rgan po de/_da ltar ci zhig byed snyam bltas na/_bdag gi nye gnas de chur mchongs pa mthong nas/_
[\[176b.6\]]chur ma phyin par rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus blangs nas/_chu'i 'gram du bzhag ste/_chos kyi sras khyod ci zhig byed ces dris pa dang /_rgad po da ngo tsha zhing skyengs nas/_ji skad du lan gdab snyam bsams nas/_gal te bdag gis [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]byas te slob dpon bslus na/_slob dpon 
[\[176b.7\]]bslus pas skye ba thams cad du lce'i dbang po med pa'i kha na ma tho ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste bdag gis [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smras na yang /_slob dpon mngon par shes pa mnga' bas rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/gang 'jig rten na mkhas pa'i shes rab dang yang ldan la rang bzhin gyis drang zhing 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]g.yo sgyu med na lha rnams kyis bkur bar 'gyur ro/_/mkhas pa'i shes rab dang ldan la g.yo sgyu zhig yod na gzhan gyi slob dpon du mi rung ste/_mis bkur bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te shes pa med kyang g.yo sgyu yang med de drang na/_gzhan gyi don byed mi nus kyang bdag 
[\[177a.2\]]gi don byed par 'gyur ro/_/gal te glen pa gti mug can yang yin la g.yo sgyu yod na/_thams cad kyi dgra ma rungs pa yin te/_ci skad smras kyang 'di ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba yin te/_bslus pa yin no zhes zer ro/_/gal te tshig bden pa zhig smras na yang /_kun gyis yid mi ches 
[\[177a.3\]]te/_de bas na bdag gis slob dpon la [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smras te/_bslus na mi rigs mi bsha' bas gang bden pa smra'o snyam bsams nas/_slob dpon la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag khyim gyis skyo ste khyim ma yin par rab tu byung nas bden pa zhu ba 'tshal na/_da yang mi bde 
[\[177a.4\]]bar gyur nas bdag 'gum snyam mo/_/maud gal gyi bus de smras pa thos nas/_'di la ni skye ba dang shi ba'i 'jigs pa zhig gis bdag gis ma bsdigs na/_rab tu byung ba'i don med par 'gyur ro snyam bsams nas/_de la nga'i chos gos kyi mtha' ma 'di la dam 
[\[177a.5\]]du bzung la ma btang shig ces smras nas/_steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags pa ni/_rlung gis spur ma bus pa ltar rdzu 'phrul gyis lag na spu nyag ma gcig tsam khyer ba dang 'dra bar 'di bzhin du phyin to/_/gzhan yang bya khras bye'u phrug khyer ba ltar maud gal gyi bu'i 
[\[177a.6\]]rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la 'phags nas/_skyes bus lag pa brkyang ba las bskum pa dang /_bskum pa las brkyang ba tsam gyis rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin to/_/rgya mtsho'i 'gram de na bud med tshe 'phos ma thag pa'i ro shin tu mdzes pa bzang ba/_mnga' byad legs pa/_
[\[177a.7\]]mtshan dang ldan pa la sbrul zhig kha'i nang du zhugs nas sna'i nang du byung /_mig gi nang nas zhugs nas rna ba'i nang du byung ba maud gal gyi bus rab tu brtags so/_/de nas dge slong dpal skyes kyis bud med 'di lta bu mtshan dang ldan pa su zhig zhes zhus na/_nam dus la bab 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]na bstan to zhes smras te/_yang song ba dang /_bud med gcig zangs chen po zhig btsugs te/_zangs kyi nang du chu blugs nas 'og tu me bo che bus te chu khol ba dang /_gos phud de nang du zhugs te de ma thag tu skra dang spu kun byi nas sha yang tshos te/_rus pa yang byi nas/_chu 
[\[177b.2\]]lud pas rus pa rnams phyir phyung ngo /_/rus pa de dag slar rlung gis bus pas de ma thag tu mi zhig tu gyur nas/_zangs kyi nang nas sha phyung ste za ba zhig mthong ngo /_/dge slong dpal skyes skrag ste ba spu yang langs nas/_slob dpon rang gi sha za ba 'di su yin zhes zhus na/_maud gal 
[\[177b.3\]]gyis dus la bab na bstan to zhes smras pa dang /_yang song song ba las shing chen po zhig lo ma dang yal ga'i bar du khab kyi rtse mo tsam gzug pa'i sa stong ba yang med par srin bu mang pos za ba la skad chen por ngu zhing 'bod pa'i sgra kun tu grags pa sems can dmyal ba'i sgra 'dra ba zhig 
[\[177b.4\]]thos nas/_'di lta bu'i sgra mi snyan pa su lags zhes zhus na/_maud gal gyis dus la bab na bstan to zhes smras so/_/de nas yang mi'i lus la gcan gzan gyi mgo can du 'dug pa'i [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mang pos mi zhig la 'khor bar bskor te/_lag na mda' gzhu thogs shing 
[\[177b.5\]]mda' la me 'bar ba bzhin du kun gyis mi de la mda' 'phangs nas gcig tu 'bar bar mthong ste/_'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong yang 'bros pa'i gnas med pa 'di su lags zhes zhus na/_slob dpon gyis re zhig sdod cig dus la bab na bstan to zhes bsgo'o/_/
[\[177b.6\]]de nas yang song song ba las ring zhig lon pa dang /_ri chen po zhig gi drung nas ral gri dang mtshon rnon po so gyen du bstan te/_btsugs pa las mi zhig ri'i rtse mo nas thur du rgyugs te ral gri dang /_mtshon gyis zug cing ral nas phyin yang /_ral gri dang mtshon 
[\[177b.7\]]sa la btsugs te/_de bzhin du mi dal bar rgyugs pa mthong nas/_'di lta bu su lags zhes zhus na/_slob dpon gyis dus la bab na bstan to zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas yang song ba las/_rus pa'i ri bo che mtho khyad dpag tshad bdun brgya pa nyi ma yang 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]bsgrib cing /_rgya mtsho yang grib mas mun par gyur pa de la maud gal 'dzegs te/_rtsib rus gcig gi steng nas phan tshun du 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin du/_bdag kyang song ba mthong nas 'di snyam du bsams so/_/bdag ni slob dpon dang de'u re 
[\[178a.2\]]bral gyis/_sngar mthong ba'i dngos po de dag zhu'o snyam bsams nas/_slob dpon bdag gis sngar mthong ba'i dngos po de dag bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa dang /_maud gal gyis kyang da dus la bab kyis khyod la bstan par bya'o/_/sngar mthong ba'i bud med de shes par 'dod na de ni 
[\[178a.3\]]rgyal po'i khab na sar phag chen po zhes bya ba'i chung ma yin te/_byad bzhin bzang bas khyim thab kyang lhag par byams so/_/de'i tshe sar phag de rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa las chung ma gtong ma phod pas/_chung ma yang khrid de tshong pa lnga brgya tsam dang /_rgya mtshor zhugs nas de'i tshe de'i 
[\[178a.4\]]chung ma yang rtag tu shing gsum mgo bsdus te mdung khyim ltar byas te de la me long bzhag ste/_me long la bltas na bdag byad bzhin bzang bar mthong nas/_shin tu chags pa skyes so/_/de'i tshe rgya mtsho'i nang nas rus sbal chen po zhig gis gru brdzis te/_gru zhig nas tshong pa lnga brgya 
[\[178a.5\]]tsam thams cad tshe'i dus byas so/_/rgya mtsho'i chos nyid kyis ro zhag lon par mi gnas par chus phul nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin to/_/sems can de dag tshe'i dus byas pa na ci la chags pa der skye bar 'gyur ro/_/'o na su zhig sems can dmyal bar skye bar dga' na sems can 
[\[178a.6\]]dmyal bar mang du skye bar 'gyur/_smras pa/_sems can gang dkon mchog gsum gyi nor brkus sam/_pha ma'i longs spyod brkus sam/_mi'i srog gcod pa'i kha na ma tho ba chen po byas na/_shin tu 'bar ba'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/mi de rlung ngam 
[\[178a.7\]]grang nad kyis zin pas yid la me 'dod par bsams so/_/me'i nang du 'gro bar bsams ma thag tu tshe'i dus byas nas shin tu 'bar ba'i sems can dmyal bar 'gro'o/_/de la gang sangs rgyas la phul ba'i mar me'am rin po che brkus sam/_dge 'dun gyi sgron ma'am shing brkus sam/_
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]dge 'dun gyi gnas khang bshig gam/_chos 'chad pa'i 'dun khang bshig gam/_dgun grang ba'i dus na pha rol po'i gos phrogs sam/_mthu yod pas lhags pa'i nang du bran pho'am/_bran mo'am mi gzhan gyi gos phrogs te chu blugs sam/_gzhan gyi gos bshus shing 
[\[178b.2\]]phrogs na kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa 'dis chab brom gyi sems can dmyal bar lhung ste/_mi de tsha ba'i nad kyis gzir bas rtag tu bsil zhing grang ba'i gnas sems te/_grang bar 'dod pas tshe'i dus byas ma thag tu sems can dmyal ba der skyes te/_ud pa la dang /_
[\[178b.3\]]pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pun da rI ka'i sems can dmyal ba yang de dang 'dra'o/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba na sdug bsngal myong ba na lus kyi sha kham tshad du yos rngo ba ltar/_chad cing gas nas mgo dang rus pa yang dum bu brgya stong du chad cing gas par 'gyur 
[\[178b.4\]]ro/_/sems can gang ser sna byed cing gzhan gyi 'tsho ba bcad de ltogs su bor ba dang /_kha zas dus bzhin du mi ster na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi khams su lhung ste/_mi de kha zas mi chud cing skyug bro ba'i nad kyis btab nas/_nad g.yog gam bshes gnyen dag gis kha 
[\[178b.5\]]zas rnam pa mang po sbyar te/_'di ni mngar ro/_/'di ni skyur ro/_/'di ni bsod pa'o/_/'di ni 'ju sla'o/_/zhes nan tan gyis bstan na/_nad pa de skyug bro ste bdag kha zas 'di mig gis mi mthong ba'i dus yod dam snyam bsams pa de'i tshe'i dus byas ma thag tu [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su 
[\[178b.6\]]lhung ngo /_/sems can gang glen pa gti mug can/_dkon mchog gsum la ma dad pa/_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa ni/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye ste/_de yang nad kyis gzir ba na 'gus te/_nyal mi shes te 'phral du nyal mi shes la dge ba'i phyogs gtam snyan mi 
[\[178b.7\]]'dod na/_nad g.yog gis kyang gdon mi za bar tshe 'phos par shes pas na/_nad g.yog gis khyod chos nyon cig_/tshul khrims kyang nos shig_/sku gzugs dang dge 'dun dag kyang mthong bar byas la de la sbyin pa yang byos shig ces bskul na/_de la ma dad mi dga' ste nan gyis 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]bskul ma btab pa dang /_de khros nas bdag dkon mchog gsum dang /_dge ba'i ming yang mi thos pa zhig tu song na ci ma rung zhes smras na/_tshe 'phos ma thag tu dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye'o/_/de la gang lha dang mi'i rgyur gyur pa'i dge ba'i phyogs la brtson pa de ni nad 
[\[179a.2\]]kyis kyang shin tu gdung bar mi 'gyur te/_tshe'i dus byas pa na sems kyang mi 'khrugs kyi nad g.yog dang bshes gnyen dag gis 'chi bar rtogs nas/_khyod dam pa'i chos thos par 'dod dam/_sku gzugs mthong bar 'dod dam/_dge slong dag las mdo sde'am/_tshigs 
[\[179a.3\]]su bcad pa dag mnyan par 'dod dam/_khyod tshul khrims nod par dga' 'am/_sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun la longs spyod 'bul bar dad dam zhes bskul na/_de dag kun la dad ces zer na/_gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs la yon phul na 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[179a.4\]]chos la mchod cing longs spyod phul na gang nas gang du skyes pa'i gnas thams cad du shes pa dang ldan te/_chos kyi mtshan nyid khong du chud cing rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun la longs spyod kyi sbyin pa byas na/_gang nas gang du skyes kyang rin po che dang longs spyod chen po yid 
[\[179a.5\]]bzhin du ldan par 'gyur ro zhes nad pa la gtam byas nas/_nad pa rab tu dga' mgu rangs te/_bdag skye ba thams cad du dkon mchog gsum dang phrad cing chos thos pa dang /_thos nas kyang khong du chud cing rtogs par gyur cig ces smon lam btab na/_tshe'i dus byed de mi'i 
[\[179a.6\]]nang du skye'o/_/gang zhig lhar skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i phyogs rgya che bar bskyed pa sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims rnam par dag pa/_chos nyan par dga' ba/_dge ba bcu la spyod pa'i gang zag de ni tshe'i dus byas pa na bde bar nyal bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs 
[\[179a.7\]]dang /_lha'i pho brang dang /_lha'i bu mo dag mthong zhing lha'i rol mo dag thos te/_mdangs kyang shin tu bzang ba dang /_lag pa gyen du 'degs pa dang /_de'i tshe'i dus byas nas lha'i gnas su skye'o/_/khyim bdag sar phag gi chung ma de rang gi lus la chags pas/_de'i tshe'i dus 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]byas ma thag tu phyir yang bud med kyi lus de la sbrul du skyes te/_sbrul de las tshe'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa myong bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong des slob dpon la yang gsol pa/_bdag gi sha la za ba'i bud med de su lags/_maud gal gyi bus 
[\[179b.2\]]smras pa/_mnyan du yod pa na dge bsnyen ma zhig la bran mo zhig yod do/_/dge bsnyen ma des tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i dge slong zhig_/dbyar zla ba gsum mchod pa 'bul bar spyan drangs te/_phyogs gcig tu gnas khang byas te bzhag nas/_nyin gcig bzhin du kha zas ro brgya 
[\[179b.3\]]dang ldan pa dri bsung du ldan pa sna tshogs sbyar te/_dro khar dus su bran mo de skyel du btang ngo /_/bran mo des dben par phyin pa dang /_zas zhim po rnams zos nas lhag ma dge slong de la phul lo/_/phyis dge bsnyen mas bran mo de mdog bzang shing sha skyes pa mthong nas/_bran mo la khyod 
[\[179b.4\]]kyis dge slong la phul ba'i kha zas lhag mar ma byas sam zhes dris na/_jo mo bdag la yang dad pa'i sems cung zad kyang mchis te/_ngan par lta ba ni ma lags na ci'i slad du dge slong la 'bul ba'i kha zas lhag mar bgyid/_dge slong gis ma yogs pa'i lhag ma 'tshal to/_/ci ste 
[\[179b.5\]]bdag gis 'tshal bar gyur na bdag gar skyes kyang bdag gi sha la bdag za bar shog shig ces smras pas/_de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis sngar rnam par smin pa mi bzad pa 'di myong nas/_sems can dmyal ba chen por dpag tu med pa'i sdug bsngal gdod myong bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong des 
[\[179b.6\]]gsol pa/_shing chen po la srin bu mang pos za zhing mi snyan pa'i sgra chen po grags pa de su zhig lags/_smras pa/_li ta zhes bya ba'i dge 'dun gyi las byed pa'i dge slong de yin te/_dge 'dun gyi dkor la spyod cing me tog dang /_'bras bu za ba dang /_btung ba dag khyim pa'i 
[\[179b.7\]]phyogs su byin pas/_rnam par smin pa mi bzad pa 'di myong nas tshe'i dus byas ma thag tu sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes te/_shing la za ba'i srin bu de dag ni dge slong gis byin pa thob pa'i mi rnams yin no/_/dge slong des yang gsol pa/_mi zhig la mi mang pos bskor te/_
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]mdas btsugs nas lus gcig tu 'bar ba de su lags/_maud gal gyis smras pa/_mi zhig gis rngon pa byed cing [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mang du bsad pas sdug bsngal 'di lta bu nyams su myong bar gyur te/_de nas tshe 'phos nas sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes te/_de las thar ba'i 
[\[180a.2\]]dus ni shin tu dka'o/_/dge slong gis yang gsol pa/_ri chen po la ral gri dang mtshon khar rgyugs te mchi ba de su lags/_maud gal gyis smras pa/_rgyal po'i blon po shin tu dpa' ba yin te re zhig mtshon rnon po dang ral gri dang mdung dang /_shag ti'i khar rgyugs te/_de 
[\[180a.3\]]nas tshe 'phos nas sems can dmyal ba chen por sdug bsngal yun ring por myong bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong des yang gsol pa/_rus pa'i ri chen po de su'i lags/_maud gal gyis smras pa/_khyod shes par 'dod na de ni khyod kyi lus snga ma'i rus pa yin no/_/dge slong gis de skad 
[\[180a.4\]]ces thos nas shin tu skrag ste/_ba spu kun langs nas rngul yang byung ste/_slob dpon la smras pa/_bdag gi snying ma gas par sngon gyi las kyi rgyu dang rkyen bstan du gsol/_maud gal gyis smras pa/_skye shi 'khor ba'i mtha' dang mu med de/_dge sdig las kyang zhig cing med 
[\[180a.5\]]par mi 'gyur bas/_las ci dang ci byas pa'i rnam par smin pa yang de dang de dag gdon mi za bar myong bar 'gyur ro/_/sngon 'das pa'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po chos kyi 'phags pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims la dga' ba/_chos nyan par 
[\[180a.6\]]mos pa/_shin tu snying rje ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_rang bzhin gyis mi gtum pa/_sems can gyi srog mi gcod pa dang /_rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan pa dam pa'i chos kyi srid 'tsho ba/_lo nyi shu tsam lon pa dang /_de la re zhig gi skabs su mi dang mig [{]mangs kyis [,]mang gis [}]rtse ba las/_
[\[180a.7\]]mi zhig la nyes pa chen po byung nas blon po rnams kyis mi zhig khrims las 'gal ba'i nyes pa chen po bgyis na/_ci ltar bgyi zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal po mig [{]mangs [,]mang [}]la yengs pas/_rgyal pos khrims bzhin du gyis shig ces bsgo nas/_blon po rnams kyis khrims dang 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]sbyar nas bsad pa la thug pas mi de bsad do/_/rgyal po mig [{]mangs kyis [,]mang gis [}]rtse ba zin pas blon po la nyes pa byed pa'i mi de ga re zhal ce gcod do zhes byas na/_blon po rnams kyis bdag cag gis khrims dang sbyar te bkum lags so zhes smras so/_/rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas/_
[\[180b.2\]]'khams te sa la 'gyel ba dang /_blon po rnams kyis chus btab nas phyir langs te/_mchi ma blags nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/pho brang gi slas dang /_glang po che dang /_rta dang rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa thams cad ni 'dir lus kyi/_nga 'ba' zhig sems can dmyal 
[\[180b.3\]]bar sdug bsngal rnams myong bar 'ong ba lta/_bdag rgyal po ma byas pa'i tshe na yang pho brang 'di na rgyal po'i srid 'tsho zhing bzhugs/_bdag ring por mi thogs par shi na yang de bzhin du rgyal po'i srid 'tsho bar 'gyur te/_bdag ni mi bsad pas na rigs ngan gyi rgyal po yin te/_skye ba 
[\[180b.4\]]thams cad du bdag gar 'gro bar 'gyur/_da ni rgyal po yang mi 'dod do zhes smras nas/_rgyal po'i thabs btang ste ri la bdag srung zhing rgyal po de 'dug pa las/_rgyal po de tshe'i dus byas nas/_rgya mtsho chen por chu srin zhig tu skyes te/_lus che khyad dpag tshad bdun brgya yod 
[\[180b.5\]]do/_/rgyal po'am blon po'ang rung mthu rtsal skyes te/_sems can gyi srog gcod dam/_'dod pa dang bral ba'i las byas sam/_sems can la 'tshe ba'i las byas na/_shi ma thag tu phal cher chu srin du skyes te de'i lus la srin bu mang po gnas so/_/de'i lus g.ya' 
[\[180b.6\]]bas shel gyi ri la snyogs shing drud pa dang /_srin bu mang po shi ba'i khrag gis rgya mtsho yang rgyang grags brgya tsam dmar por byas so/_/sdig pa'i las des de dag tshe 'phos nas sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/chu srin de lan cig gnyid kyis log na lo brgya na 
[\[180b.7\]]lan cig sangs te/_bkres pa dang skom pas nyen nas kha gdangs pa dang /_rgya mtsho'i chu khar 'gro ba ni chu chen po rgya mtshor 'bab pa dang 'dra'o/_/de'i tshe na tshong pa lnga brgya tsam zhig rgya mtshor zhugs te/_rin po che len du song ba las chu srin kha gdangs pa dang phrad nas/_
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]gru yang shin tu mgyogs par chu srin gyis za 'dod pa'i khar song ngo /_/tshong pa rnams skad chen po phyung ste ngus nas gcig la gcig 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag ni gdon mi za bar 'chi bar 'gyur gyi so so nas ji ltar brten pa dran par gyis shig ces smras pa dang /_de 
[\[181a.2\]]dag la las ni sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi mtshan nas brjod/_kha cig gis ni 'jig rten gyi lha dang /_ri gtsang po dang /_lha ma yin dang /_pha ma dang /_chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bu mo dang /_phu nu dang /_gnyen po'i ming bos nas bdag cag gis ni deng mthong ba 
[\[181a.3\]]tha ma 'di las 'dzam bu'i gling gtan du mi mthong ngo zhes smras so/_/de'i tshe de dag chu srin gyi khar song la khad pa dang /_thams cad kyis dus gcig tu sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod pa dang /_chu srin gyis sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod pa'i sgra thos ma thag tu kha 
[\[181a.4\]]btsums te/_chu 'bab pa yang chad par gyur nas/_tshong pa de dag shi ba las sos par gyur to/_/chu srin de ltogs nas de nyid du tshe 'phos te/_rgyal po'i khab tu srin bu zhig tu skyes te/_chu srin gyi ro rgya mtsho'i ngogs su phyir byung nas/_nyi mas gdungs/_char 
[\[181a.5\]]pas brlan nas/_sha zad par gyur pa'i rus pa de ni ri 'di yin no/_/dpal skyes 'di ltar rig par gyis shig_/de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po chos kyi 'phags pa ni khyod yin no/_/mi bsad pa'i rkyen gyis rgya mtsho chen por chu srin du skyes so/_/khyod kyi da yang 
[\[181a.6\]]phyir mi'i lus thob pa 'dis/_'khor ba la rgyab kyis ma phyogs na/_'di nas tshe 'phos ma thag tu/_sems can dmyal bar 'gro ste thar bar shin tu dka'o/_/dge slong dpal skyes des bdag gi lus rnying pa yang mthong /_de skad ces bstan pa yang thos nas/_
[\[181a.7\]]'khor bas shin tu skrag ste/_gang la nan tan byed byed pa'i chos de la mthar gyis yid la byas nas/_sems rtse gcig pa la gnas te/_lus rnying pa mthong bas mi rtag pa'i chos khong du chud de/_'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par rtogs nas/_kun nas nyon 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]mongs pa'i zag pa thams cad zad de/_dgra bcom par gyur to/_/maud gal yang shin tu dga' nas smras pa/_chos kyi sras khyod kyis ni/_bya ba thams cad yid la byas kyis/_sngar 'dis 'ongs pa ni nga'i mthus 'ongs so/_/da ni phyir khyod bdag gi mthus 'dong ngo zhes 
[\[181b.2\]]smras nas/_de'i tshe maud gal steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags pa dang /_dge slong dpal skyes kyang /_slob dpon gyi phyi bzhin du 'ongs pa/_bya pha'i phyi bzhin du phrug gu 'brang ba dang 'dra bar 'od ma'i tshal gang na ba der 'ongs so/_/de'i tshe dge slong gzhon nu dag gis dgra bcom 
[\[181b.3\]]par mi shes pas/_sngon bzhin du dpal skyes la tho btsam yang spyod lam ma nyams te cang mi smra'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bur gyur pa mkhyen nas/_dge slong gzhon nu rnams kyis 'di las mi 'byung ba dang /_dge slong rgan po'i yon tan grags par bya ba'i phyir/_
[\[181b.4\]]'khor mang po'i nang du/_dge slong dpal skyes la tshur shog ces bka' stsal nas/_khyod rgya mtsho'i ngogs su phyin tam zhes bka' stsal to/_/dpal skyes kyis gsol pa/_rgya mtsho'i ngogs su mchis so/_/rgya mtsho'i ngogs na ci mthong smros shig ces bka' stsal pa 
[\[181b.5\]]dang /_dge slong gis ci dang ci mthong ba rgyas par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so legs so zhes bya ba gnang nas/_dpal skyes khyod kyis de dag mthong ba bden no/_/khyod kyis da ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yongs su spangs te/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i 
[\[181b.6\]]bde ba thob pas/_lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod pa'i gnas su gyur to/_/dge slong khyod kyis bya ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs so zhes bka' stsal nas/_dge slong gzhon nu de dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas/_
[\[181b.7\]]shin tu 'gyod cing mi dga' ba skyes te/_'di lta bu mkhas pa shes rab can/_'phags pa la bdag cag shes rab med pas/_'tshe ba dang /_tho btsam par bgyis so/_/bdag cag kha na ma tho ba'i rnam par smin pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/_dge slong 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]gzhon nu dag_/dge slong dpal skyes gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_lus smad lnga sa la gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/_'di skad ces smras so/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni snying rje dang lhan cig skyes te/_btsun pa khyod skyes pa yang 
[\[182a.2\]]snying rje chen po dang lhan cig tu skyes pa lags na/_bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/_bdag cag khyod la mthol tshangs bgyi'o zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong des kyang bdag gi lus la yang mi dga' ba'i bsam pa med kyi/_tshangs par gyur cig ces smras 
[\[182a.3\]]so/_/de nas dge slong dpal skyes kyis dge slong gzhon nu de rnams shin tu 'gyod cing gnang bkur ba'i sems dang ldan par rtogs nas/_dge slong de dag la dam pa'i chos bstan to/_/de dag gis 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i chos thos nas/_brtson pa dang 'bad 
[\[182a.4\]]pas nan tan byas te/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i zag pa kun zad nas/_dgra bcom par gyur to/_/de nas khyim bdag dpal skyes kyang /_rgyal po'i khab tu shin tu grags par gyur te/_kun gyis ngo mtshar ya mtshan du gyur nas/_khyim bdag rgad po ci yang mi 
[\[182a.5\]]shes pa yang /_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/_dgra bcom par gyur te/_de lta bu'i dam pa'i chos kyang ston to zhes brjod do/_/de'i tshe na rgyal po'i khab de na gnas pa'i mi dag phal cher bsam pa dag pa'i sems skyes nas/_kha cig ni bu 
[\[182a.6\]]dang /_bu mo dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo la sogs pa rab tu byung bar gnang ngo /_/kha cig ni bdag nyid rab tu byung bar gsol nas/_thams cad rab tu dga' ste/_rjes su yi rang bar gyur to/_/de bas na rab tu byung ba'i yon tan ni tshad med/_grangs 
[\[182a.7\]]med de/_dpal skyes lta bu lo brgya lon nas rab tu byung nas/_de lta bu'i yon tan chen po dang ldan par gyur na/_gzhon nu dar la bab pa rab tu byung na/_'bras bu chen po mchog dam pa rnyed pa lta ci smos/_chos la brtson pa dag ni rab tu byung bar bya'o/_/rab 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]tu byung ba'i yon tan bsngags pa'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o//_//bam po lnga pa/_tshul khrims bsrung ba dag ni lus dang /_srog stor yang bla'i/_nam du yang tshul khrims nyams par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshul khrims ni byang chub tu 
[\[182b.2\]]'jug pa'i rtsa ba zag pa med pa'i mchog_/mya ngan las 'das par bde bar 'gro ba'i lam mo/_/tshul khrims dag par bsrungs pa'i bsod nams ni tshad med dpag tu med do/_/dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni tshad med mtha' med do/_/tshul khrims bsrungs pa'i bsod nams kyang /_
[\[182b.3\]]tshad med mtha' med do/_/dper na rgya mtsho ni lha ma yin dang /_rus sbal dang /_chu srin dang /_chu'i ris su gtogs pa'i sems can chen po'i gnas su gyur pa ltar/_tshul khrims kyang de dang 'dra ste/_theg pa gsum la gnas pa'i skye bo chen po mang du gnas so/_/dper 
[\[182b.4\]]na rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya la sogs pa rin po che mang po yod pa bzhin du/_tshul khrims kyi rgya mtsho yang de dang 'dra ste/_mi rtag pa'i gzhi dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_bsam gtan dang /_
[\[182b.5\]]ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i rin po che mang po yod do/_/dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i gting yang rdo rje yin la/_tha ma yang rdo rje'i ris bskor te/_chu bo bzhi 'bab kyang /_mi 'grib mi ldud pa ltar/_tshul khrims kyi rgya mtsho yang de dang 'dra ste/_'dul ba rdo rje lta bus 
[\[182b.6\]]ni gting byas/_chos mngon pa'i ris ni mtha' bskor/_mdo sde bzhi chu bo lta bur 'bab kyang /_'phel ba yang med/_'grib pa yang med do/_/rgya mtsho ci'i phyir mi ldud ce na/_mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i mes rgya mtsho bskams pas na/_de'i 
[\[182b.7\]]phyir rgya mtsho'i chu mi ldud do/_/chu bo rtag tu 'bab pas mi 'grib bo/_/tshul khrims kyi rgya mtsho yang /_bag yod pas mi skye ste/_yon tan dang ldan pas mi 'grib bo/_/de bas na gang tshul khrims srung ba de'i yon tan ni rab tu mang bar rig par bya'o/_/bcom 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas/_yul an ta zhes bya ba na/_dge slong bsod snyoms pa dgon pa la gnas par dga' ba/_spyod lam dang ldan pa zhig yod do/_/dge slong bsod snyoms pa ni sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags kyis/_phal gyi 
[\[183a.2\]]nang na gnas pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong bsod snyoms pa ni 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa ste/_ci yang mi sogs shing /_za cig pa/_bla gab med pa/_chos gos gsum pa la sogs spyod do/_/btsun pa'o/_/gtso bo'o/_/dge 'dun 
[\[183a.3\]]gyi nang na gnas pa'i dge slong ni/_'dod pa mang ba/_chog mi shes pa/_ser sna byed pa/_ci la yang chags pas grags pa chen po thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/dge slong bsod snyoms pa de yon tan spyod par ldan te/_dge slong gi 'bras bu thob nas/_mngon par 
[\[183a.4\]]shes pa drug dang /_rig pa gsum dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas te/_spyod lam kun mdzes pas kun tu grags par gyur to/_/de'i tshe yul an ta zhes bya ba na/_dge bsnyen dkon mchog gsum la shin tu dad pa/_srog mi gcod pa/_ma byin par 
[\[183a.5\]]mi len pa/_'dod pas log par mi g.yem pa/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du mi smra ba/_smyo ba'i khu ba chang mi 'thung ba'i khrims lnga bsrung ba/_yon tan dang ldan pa zhig yul de na 'dug pa las/_dge bsnyen des dge slong bsod snyoms pa de/_tshe gcig gi bar du 'tsho ba 
[\[183a.6\]]sbyar ba'i bsod nams ni myong bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/_gal te bdag gis khyim du spyan drangs te/_lam du grang ba dang tsha bas nyon mongs te/_bsgom pa'i bar chad du yang 'gyur la/_phyis rnam par smin pa myong ba na yang /_bdag gis bsams shing don du gnyer 
[\[183a.7\]]dgos pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gal te 'tsho ba gnas su bskyal na/_phyis rnam par smin pa yang don du gnyer mi dgos par thob par 'gyur ro snyam bsams nas/_dge bsnyen de dad pa'i sems kyis zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i dri bsung dang /_kha dog tu ldan 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]pa sna tshogs bshams te/_nyin gcig bzhin du skyel to/_/dge slong la bzang ngan rnam pa bzhis brtag dka' ba ni/_ji ltar a mra'i 'bras bu smin nam ma smin brtag dka' ba bzhin no/_/dge slong kha cig spyod lam shin tu mdzes shing gom pa dal gyis 'gro 
[\[183b.2\]]ba gnya' shing gang las mi lta yang /_nang 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug tu bcas la chos ma yin pa spyod cing tshul khrims nyams pa yang yod de/_de ni a mra'i 'bras bu phyi rol smin la/_nang ma smin pa dang 'dra'o/_/dge slong kha cig ni phyi rol 
[\[183b.3\]]gyi spyod lam rtsing la spyod lam dang mi ldan na yang /_nang dge sbyong gi spyod pa dang yon tan du ldan te/_bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab tu ldan pa yod de/_de ni a mra'i 'bras bu nang smin la/_phyi rol ma smin pa dang 'dra'o/_/dge slong 
[\[183b.4\]]kha cig ni spyod lam rtsing la nyes pa byed cing /_tshul khrims kyang nyams la/_nang yang 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_ser sna dang /_phrag dog dang bcas pa yod de/_de ni a mra'i 'bras bu phyi rol yang ma smin la/_nang yang ma smin pa dang 
[\[183b.5\]]'dra'o/_/dge slong kha cig ni spyod lam mdzes shing tshul khrims dang yang ldan la/_nang yang dge sbyong gi yon tan tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab tu ldan pa yang yod de/_de ni a mra'i 'bras bu phyi nang gnyi ga smin pa dang 'dra'o/_/bsod snyoms pa'i 
[\[183b.6\]]dge slong de phyi nang gnyi ga dang ldan pa yang de dang 'dra ste/_yon tan dang spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pas thams cad kyis rim gro dang /_bkur sti byed do/_/de'i tshe yul de na khyim bdag cig_/dkon mchog gsum la shin tu dad pa zhig la bu khye'u zhig yod de/_des 
[\[183b.7\]]'di snyam du bsams so/_/bdag gi bu 'di rab tu byung gi_/ston pa mkhas pa zhig btsal lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa ni/_dge ba yang 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/sdig pa'i grogs po la bsten pa ni/_sdig pa'i chos 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]skye bar 'gyur te/_dper na rlung gi rang bzhin ni mi ldog mod kyi/_tsan dan gyi tshal lam/_tsam pa ka'i tshal nas 'ongs na/_rlung de las dri bsung zhim pa bro'o/_/gal te mnam zhing btsog pa'i rlung ro sum pa'i phyogs nas 'ongs na/_rlung de yang 
[\[184a.2\]]mnam mo/_/dper na gos gsar pa yang /_spos kyi snod du bcug na gos de la yang spos bro'o/_/gal te mnam pa sum pa'i nang du bcug na gos de yang mnam mo/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten na/_dge ba yang phyir zhing 'phel gyis/_sdig pa'i grogs 
[\[184a.3\]]po la bsten na/_sdig pa skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur gyis/_de bas na bdag gi bu 'di yang /_dge slong btsun pa 'di la 'bul te/_rab tu byung ngo snyam bsams nas/_dge slong de gang na ba der song ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag gi bu 'di rab tu byung ba 
[\[184a.4\]]dad kyis/_btsun pas thugs brtse bar dgongs te rab tu byung bar gsol/_gal te mi gnang na slar yang khyim du khrid de mchi'o/_/de nas dge slong gis rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis brtags na/_khye'u 'di rab tu byung na tshul khrims dag par srung zhing /_
[\[184a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos 'phel bar rtogs nas rab tu byung ste/_dge tshul du byas so/_/de'i tshe na 'tsho ba sbyor ba'i dge bsnyen de la khyim bdag mdza' bo zhig yod de/_khyim bdag des dus kyi ston mo zhig sbyar nas/_dge bsnyen dang /_de'i chung ma dang /_bu 
[\[184a.6\]]dang /_bu mo dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_khyim gang gi mi kun bos so/_/phyi nyin mgron du 'gro ba las/_dge bsnyen de 'di snyam du bsams so/_/bdag cag kun mgron du 'gro na khyim 'di sus bsrung /_gal te nan gyis 'ga' zhig 
[\[184a.7\]]bzhag na/_de'i sgor phab ste skal ba chad par 'gyur gyis/_de la su zhig 'dug par dga' na/_mgron las slar log ma thag tu drin gzo zhing lan bya'o zhes smras pa dang /_dge bsnyen de'i bu mo zhig yod pa des/_pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]mi 'di dag thams cad mgron du mchi bar bgyis te/_bdag gis khyim bsrung ngo zhes smras nas/_phas kyang shin tu legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis khyim bsrung na/_khyod kyi ma dang mi 'dra ba med de stor ba'am/_nyes pa byung gis mi dogs so zhes smras 
[\[184b.2\]]nas/_khyim gang gi mi kun mgron du 'dong ngo /_/bu mos kyang sgo rnams dam du bcad de/_gcig pu khyim du 'dug go/_/de'i nyin par dge bsnyen de brel bas bsod snyoms bskyal ba brjed nas/_de'i tshe dge slong de 'di snyam du/_nyi ma yang yol la khad pa 
[\[184b.3\]]dang /_khyim pa la don mang bas brjed pa lta srid dam/_zan mi za ba'i mi rigs kyi len du btang ngo snyam bsams nas/_dge tshul de bsod snyoms len du btang ngo /_/dge tshul de la slob dpon gyis bsgo ba/_khyod spyod lam shin tu bsdams te/_bcom ldan 
[\[184b.4\]]'das kyis gsungs pa ltar grong nas bsod snyoms longs shig_/ci ltar bung ba rnams me tog gi kha dog dang dri bsung la mi gnod pa bzhin/_chags par ma byed par khyim nas bsod snyoms longs shig_/gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_
[\[184b.5\]]reg bya la ma chags par dbang po rnams srungs shig_/gal te tshul khrims bsrungs na/_gdon mi za bar 'bras bu thob par 'gyur gyis/_lha sbyin lta bu mdo sde mang po kha ton shes kyang /_nyes par byas te tshul khrims nyams te/_mtshams med pa'i 
[\[184b.6\]]sems can dmyal bar skyes so/_/ko ka li ka lta bur skur ba 'debs shing tshul khrims nyams pas/_de yang sems can dmyal bar skyes so/_/tsu'u pan ta lta bu tshigs su bcad pa gcig las mi shes mod kyis/_tshul khrims bsrungs pas dgra 
[\[184b.7\]]bcom par gyur to/_/tshul khrims ni mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgor 'jug cing /_shin tu bde ba'i rgyur 'gyur te/_dper na bram ze'i chos kyi zla ba gsum mam/_zla ba bzhi'i bar du chos ston byed de/_de yang bram ze mkhas pa/_rig pa dang ldan pa/_tshul 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]khrims bsrungs pa/_tshangs par spyod pa dag 'bod kyis thams cad ni ma yin no/_/gang ston mo la 'ongs pa lag pa'i mkhrig ma la ke'u le'i rgyas 'debs so/_/bram ze gcig cig yon tan dang ldan yang rang bzhin gyis sred pa can zhig yin pas/_sbrang rtsi dang mngar 
[\[185a.2\]]ba la chags pas mkhrig ma la rgyas btab pa bldags te mi snang bar byas so/_/phyi nyin ston mo la 'dus nas sgo bas rgya bltas na/_kun tu rgyu de la rgya med par gyur nas/_sgo bas kyang nang du ma btang bas/_khyod kyi rgya ga re zhes dris na/_mngar bas bldags te med 
[\[185a.3\]]par byas so zhes smras so/_/de ltar kun du rgyu de mngar ba cung zad tsam la chags pas/_zla ba bzhi'i ston mo kha zas kha dog dang dri bsung dang ldan zhing /_dri zhim po rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_yon tan rin po che mang po yang shor gyis/_khyod kyang de lta bu'i cung zad tsam 
[\[185a.4\]]la chags pa'i phyir/_tshul khrims kyi phyag rgya nyams par ma byed cig_/lha dang mi'i 'dod pa lnga'i ro zhim po dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba dang /_chos rin po che tshad med pa dag 
[\[185a.5\]]stor bar gyur ta re/_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims nyams shing /_dkon mchog gsum dang /_slob dpon dang /_dge 'dun gyi rigs sun par ma byed cig ces bsgo ba dang /_slob dpon gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_de'i khyim du song 
[\[185a.6\]]ngo /_/der phyin pa dang /_sgo brdungs nas bu mos su yin zhes bos so/_/dge tshul gyis bdag slob dpon gyi bsod snyoms len du 'ongs so zhes smras pa dang /_bu mo de rab tu dga' nas da ni re ba rnyed do snyam nas sgo phyes te/_dge tshul nang du 'ongs pa dang /_bu mo 
[\[185a.7\]]yang lo bcu drug las ma lon te/_mnga' byad legs pa dang /_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa bzang ba zhig ste/_'dod chags kyis bslu'o snyam ste/_dge tshul de'i mdun du bslu ba rnam pa mang po byas te/_shin tu 'dod pas dge tshul de la btegs so/_/dge tshul 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]des 'di snyam du bu mo 'di rlung nad langs sam/_smyos sam/_'on te bu mo 'di 'dod chags kyis gdungs te/_'dod chags kyi mes nga'i tshul khrims tshig par byed dam snyam bsams nas/_spyod lam shin tu bsdams te/_mdangs kyang ma gyur par 'dug go/_/bu 
[\[185b.2\]]mo des lus smad lnga sa la gtugs nas phyag byas te/_dge tshul la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag rtag tu re ba yang deng gi dus grub bo/_/bdag khyod la smra ba zhig yod de/_rtag tu dran pa la skabs ma rnyed do/_/khyod kyang rtag tu bdag la dgongs pa 'dra na/_bdag 
[\[185b.3\]]gi re ba bskang du gsol/_khyim 'di'i nang na rin po che dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bang mdzod mang po ni rnam thos kyi bu'i gter dang 'dra bar yod kyang bdag po med kyis/_khyod khyim dang bcas pa'i bdag po mdzad du gsol/_bdag khyod kyi khol mo bgyis te/_bkur 
[\[185b.4\]]sti dang rim gro bgyis/_'di las mi 'gal zhing bdag gi re ba bskang du gsol/_dge tshul gyis bsams pa/_bdag gi sdig pa'i las ci zhig byas na/_'di lta bu'i rkyen dang phrad par gyur/_bdag lus dang srog yal ba yang bla'i/_dus gsum gyi sangs 
[\[185b.5\]]rgyas kyis bcas pa'i tshul khrims nyams par mi bya'o/_/sngon dge slong dag smad 'tshong ma'i nang du phyin kyang me'i dong du mchongs kyang bla'i/_tshul khrims nyams par mi byed do/_/gzhan yang dge slong dag ni mi rgod kyis bcom nas/_rtswa la btags te rlung gis 
[\[185b.6\]]bshud cing /_nyi mas bsregs pa dang /_srin bu mang pos za yang tshul khrims bsrung ba'i phyir rtswa gcod cing mi 'gro'o/_/bya gag gis nor bu med par dge slong gis mthong yang /_tshul khrims bsrung ba'i phyir/_sdug bsngal myong bar byed kyang gtam mi zer ro/_/
[\[185b.7\]]gru zhig pa las dge slong gis shing leb la 'jus kyang /_tshul khrims bsrung ba'i phyir shing leb de dag dge slong grogs po gral mtho ba la phul nas/_rgya mtshor shi ba la sogs pa de dag 'ba' zhig sangs rgyas kyi nye gnas su tshul khrims bsrungs pa yin gyis/_bdag cag 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]gis bsrungs pa ma yin nam/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang de 'ba' zhig gi ston pa yin gyi/_bdag cag gi ston pa ma yin nam/_dper na tsam pa ka'i me tog zar ma dang lhan cig tu btsir na/_tsam pa ka'i dri zhim po zar ma'i mar la bro bar 
[\[186a.2\]]'gyur te/_bdag kyang de lta ma yin nam/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin na/_ci'i phyir deng 'dir sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos byed par 'gyur/_lus dang srog yal yang bla'i/_nam du yang tshul khrims nyams shing /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_
[\[186a.3\]]dge 'dun dang /_pha ma dang /_slob dpon dang /_bla ma'i rigs sun par mi bya'o/_/yang bsams pa/_gal te bdag bros na ni bu mo de 'dod chags kyis gdungs pas khrel dang ngo tsha yang med de/_pha rol tu bdag zin nas/_bdag la skur ba 'debs par 'gyur 
[\[186a.4\]]te/_grong mi dag gis mthong na sun 'byin par 'gyur gyis/_bdag ni nges par khang pa 'di nyid du tshe 'phos par bya'o snyam bsams nas/_bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sgo dag dam du chod cig_/bdag ni khang pa cig gi nang du bya ba cung zad yod pa de byas nas 
[\[186a.5\]]khyod dang phrad par bya'o/_/zhes bsgo nas/_bu mo phyir sgo gcod du song ba'i 'og tu dge tshul khang pa cig gi nang du zhugs nas sgo gtan dam du bcug ste/_nang nas spu gri rnyed pas rab tu dga' ste/_lus la gyon pa'i gos rnams phud nas gdang bu la gzar te/_
[\[186a.6\]]thal mo sbyar nas grong khyer ku sha gang na bar sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas logs su pus mo sa la btsugs nas/_'di skad ces yi dam bcas so/_/bdag gis ni sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun spong ba ma lags/_mkhan po 
[\[186a.7\]]dang /_slob dpon spong ba ma lags/_tshul khrims spong ba ma lags kyis/_tshul khrims bsrung ba'i slad du lus 'di spong ngo /_/bdag gar skyes kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba dang /_tshangs par spyod pa rnam par dag pa dang /_zag pa zad 
[\[186b\]]
