[\[207a.4\]]ces pa ni kha zas zhim po dang bsod pa la bgyi ba ma lags kyi/_su bas kyang phyis zos na bkres pas kha zas kun zhim mo zhes mchi'o/_/rtag tu me long la ltos shig zer ba ni 'khar ba'am/_lcags kyi me long la lta ba ma lags kyi/_sngar langs la phyi nang gi phyag 
[\[207a.5\]]dar dang /_chag chag btab pa dang /_khri stan bting ba la sogs pa las su bgyi ba rnams legs par gyis shig ces mchi ste/_bdag gi mas bsgo ba ni 'di lta bu lags so zhes gsol pa dang /_mna' ma de la lhag par yang byams te/_khyim gyi las thams cad 
[\[207a.6\]]gtad nas thams cad bde zhing skyid par gyur to/_/de'i tshe bya dag cig rgya mtsho'i gling na 'bras za za ba las 'bras kyi snye ma khyer te 'phur nas/_rgyal po'i pho brang gi thad kar phyin pa dang /_'bras kyi snye ma dag cig shor te/_pho brang gi thad kar lhung ngo /_/'bras kyi 
[\[207a.7\]]snye ma de gcig gis rgyal po la phul lo/_/rgyal pos kyang 'bras bzang po 'di lta bu dag ni sman du rung nges kyis sa bon du bya'o snyam nas/_blon po kun la shas shas su bgos te/_rmos shig ces bsgo'o/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag des kyang nyung ngu zhig thob nas/_phyir khyim 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]du 'ongs te mna' ma la 'bras 'di rmos shig ces bsgo'o/_/mna' ma des kyang bsgo ba de bzhin du bran khol gzhan btang nas/_zhing gang gshin par rmos nas/_de bzhin du legs par skyes te 'bras mang zhig byung ngo /_/gzhan gyis rmos pa la ni las su legs par ma byas 
[\[207b.2\]]pas gcig kyang ma skyes so/_/de'i tshe na rgyal po'i btsun mo nad kyis btab pa las sman pas dpyad byas nas/_na ba 'di las rgya mtsho'i gling gi 'bras byin na 'tsho'o zhes dpyad byas so/_/rgyal pos kyang rgya mtsho'i gling gi 'bras zhig so so nas rmed du bcug par dran nas/_
[\[207b.3\]]rgya mtsho'i gling gi 'bras zhig rmed du bcug pa yod dam med ces dris na/_blon po kha cig gis ni 'bras rmos pa ma skyes so zhes mchi'o/_/kha cig gis ni 'bras kun byi bas 'tshal te ma mchis so zhes mchi'o/_/de'i tshe na khyim bdag de yang phyir khyim du song nas mna' ma de la 
[\[207b.4\]]sngon 'bras shig rmor bcug pa skyes sam ma skyes/_rgyal po'i btsun mo nad kyis btab ste sman du dgos so/_/mna' mas gsol pa/_'bras rmos pa de rab tu legs te/_mi gcig gi sman du ma bas kyis/_yul gcig gi mi yang sos pa tsam mchis so/_/khyim 
[\[207b.5\]]bdag des 'bras de las shas cig rgyal po la phul nas/_rgyal pos kyang 'bras des btsun mo'i sman dpyad byas nas/_btsun mo yang sos te/_rgyal po rab tu dga' nas bya dga' mang du byin no/_/de'i tshe na shi ri ti ta'i rgyal po dang /_yul mnyan du yod pa'i rgyal po 
[\[207b.6\]]gnyis gcig la gcig mi dga' bas rtag tu mi 'dum mo/_/de'i tshe na shi ri ti ta'i rgyal pos mnyan yod kyi rgyal po de la blon po mdzangs pa mkhas zhing blo dang ldan pa yod dam med pa bgam mo snyam nas/_pho nya cig yul mnyan yod du btang nas/_pho nya de la rgod ma ma 
[\[207b.7\]]smad gnyis ma dang bu 'dra bar spu mdog gcig pa/_bye brag mi phyed pa/_rgod smad gnyis bsgrigs te/_ma ni gang yin bu ni gang yin bye brag phyes shig ces spring ngo /_/rgyal po dang blon po rnams kyis bltas na gcig gis kyang bye brag ma phyed do/_/de nas khyim bdag de khyim 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]du 'ongs nas/_mna' mas gtam ci gsan zhes zhus na/_gtam 'di lta bu dag grag go zhes mna' ma la rgyas par gtam byas so/_/mna' mas gsol pa/_'di ni shin tu rig par yang sla'o/_/rgod ma ma smad gnyis thogs la lhan cig tu rtswa bzang 
[\[208a.2\]]po zhig byin cig dang /_ma gang yin pa de ni rtswa mchus phul te bu la stobs so/_/khyim bdag gis mna' mas smras pa bzhin du rgyal po la gsol nas/_rgyal pos kyang rtswa byin te bltas na de bzhin du gyur te/_ma dang bu yang rtogs nas/_pho nya de la ma ni 'di'o/_/
[\[208a.3\]]bu ni 'di'o zhes smras pas/_de bzhin du smras pa bzhin te/_ma nor to zhes smras so/_/de nas pho nya de rang yul du song nas/_rgyal po de la de bzhin du rgyas par gsol to/_/de nas yang pho nya cig btang ste/_sbrul sbom phra dang /_ring thung mnyam la 'dra ba gnyis shig 
[\[208a.4\]]bskur nas/_sbrul 'di gnyis la pho ni gang /_mo ni gang yin pa bye brag phyes shig ces bsgo'o/_/rgyal po rab gsal rgyal dang blon po rnams 'dus te dpyad na gcig gis kyang ma rtogs so/_/de nas khyim bdag des khyim du mna' ma la dris nas/_mna' mas bstan 
[\[208a.5\]]pa ras 'jam mo zhig thing la sbrul de'i steng du zhog cig dang /_gang mo yin pa de ni cang mi 'gul bar nyal lo/_/gang pho yin pa de ni mi bzod de 'dug tu mi btub pa'i rigs so/_/cis mngon zhe na/_gang mor gyur pa de ni 'jam zhing yang ba la chags so/_/gang phor gyur 
[\[208a.6\]]pa de ni rang bzhin gyis khros pas 'jam po la mi bzod de/_nyal du mi btub pas des rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag des rgyal po la de bzhin du gsol te/_mna' mas smras pa bzhin du byas na/_pho gang yin pa dang mo gang yin pa bye brag legs par phyed do/_/
[\[208a.7\]]pho nya de la 'di ni pho yin no/_/'di ni mo yin no zhes bsgo nas/_de bzhin du ma nor to zhes mchi'o/_/de nas rgyal po de shin tu dga' nas/_de la nor bu rin po che mang du bya dgar byin no/_/de nas yang shing 'dom do do ba/_sbom phra mnyam pa/_khyad par med pa/_
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]'dzer pa dang /_sta re dang ste'u'i rjes med pa zhig bskur te/_shing 'di'i mgo mjug gang yin pa bye brag phyes shig ces bsgo'o/_/rgyal po dang blon po rnams 'dus te dpyad na/_gcig gis kyang ma shes te/_khyim bdag des yang mna' ma la dris pa 'di ni shin tu sla ste/_
[\[208b.2\]]shing 'di'i mgo mjug rtogs par 'dod na chu'i nang du zhog shig dang /_rtsa ba ni thur du nub kyi mgo ni phyir 'byung ba'i rigs so/_/khyim bdag des kyang rgyal po la de bzhin du gsol te/_mna' mas smras pa bzhin du byas nas/_mgo mjug rtogs par gyur te/_
[\[208b.3\]]'di ni mgo'o 'di ni rtsa ba'o zhes bsgo'o/_/pho nyas kyang de bzhin te bden no zhes smras so/_/de nas rgyal po rab tu dga' nas/_de la bya dga' mang du byin no/_/pho nya de phyir yul du phyin nas rgyal po de la rgyas par gsol pa dang /_rgyal po des pho nya la rin po che mang 
[\[208b.4\]]du bskur te/_rgyal po chen po de la blon po mdzangs pa/_blo dang ldan pa yod kyis/_'di dag phul la phyin cad 'dum par bya'o zhes smras na/_rgyal po rab gsal rgyal gyis de lta bur gyur pa la rab tu dga' ste/_khyim bdag de la khyod kyis de dag ci ltar rtogs shing shes 
[\[208b.5\]]zhes bka' stsal to/_/khyim bdag gis gsol pa/_'di ni bdag gis rtogs pa ma lags kyi/_bdag gi mna' ma blo dang ldan pa zhig mchis pa des rtogs so/_/rgyal pos de skad ces gsol pa gsan nas rab tu dga' ste/_khyim bdag gi mna' ma de 
[\[208b.6\]]da phyin cad nga dang ming sring du bya'o zhes bka' stsal to/_/khyim bdag gi mna' ma de phyis sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_zla ba dgu tshang nas sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ste/_sgo nga re re'i nang nas bu khye'u mnga' byad legs pa blta na sdug pa re re byung ngo /_/bu de dag 
[\[208b.7\]]cher skyes nas dpa' khyad ni zla med de/_gcig gis kyang mi stong thub par gyur to/_/bu de'i pha ma yang bu de dag la rab tu sdug par sems te/_yul mi thams cad kyang de dag la bag byed do/_/phyis yul de na rigs 'thun pa che zhing mtho ba las chung ma yang blangs so/_/
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]de'i tshe na lha mtshams ma dad pa'i sems dang ldan pas sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun spyan drangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pas khyim gang gi mi thams cad kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur na/_khye'u nang gi tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]'ba' zhig 
[\[209a.2\]]gis 'bras bu ma thob bo/_/khye'u de glang po che la zhon nas grong khyer phyi rol tu rtser song ba las/_grong khyer de'i phyi rol tu chu chen po zhig 'bab pa la zam pa zhig yod de/_khye'u de zam pa'i steng du phyin pa dang /_blon po chen po'i bu zhig kyang shing rta'i nang na 'dug ste phyi rol 
[\[209a.3\]]nas nang du 'ongs pa dang /_zam pa'i steng du phrad pa las gnyi ga cho rigs kyis bsnyems nas/_gcig gis gcig la ma byol lo/_/lha mtshams ma'i bu khros nas/_glang po che la zhon bzhin du blon po chen po'i bu shing rta dang bcas pa zam pa'i 'og tu bor ro/_/blon 
[\[209a.4\]]po'i bu de lus dang rkang lag smas nas ngus te khyim du 'ongs nas/_pha ma la 'di skad du lha mtshams ma'i bus bdag ma nongs par 'di ltar gnod pa bgyis nas lus kun gnad do/_/zhes gsol to/_/blon po chen po de shin tu mi dga' bar gyur nas/_bu de dag ni shin 
[\[209a.5\]]tu yang stobs che ba'i steng du rgyal po dang mo nye bas rtsod par dka' na/_'on kyang de la ni rku lto zhig bya'o/_/snyam nas rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i 'khar ba sum cu rtsa gnyis zhig byas te/_'khar ba'i nang du ral gri so rnon po re re bcug nas khye'u sum cu rtsa gnyis po de 
[\[209a.6\]]la re re byin nas 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/khyod ni gzhon dar la bab pas rtse ba'i dus la bab ste/_khyod kyi phyir rtse ba'i rkyen du 'khar ba 'di dag byas kyis/_khyod rnams thogs la rtses shig ces bsgo'o/_/khye'u de dag kyang shin tu dga' nas 'khar ba de dag blangs nas re re thogs 
[\[209a.7\]]so/_/rgyal po'i khrims kyis rgyal po dang phrad pa na mtshon thogs su mi gnang ngo /_/de dag 'khar ba thogs te rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring la 'khod pa las blon po des rgyal po la 'di skad du phra ma gsol to/_/lha mtshams ma'i bu sum cu rtsa gnyis po de ni gzhon zhing 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]dar la bab ste/_stobs kyis ni mi gcig gis kyang mi stong thub pa de dag ni rgyal po la gnod pa zhig bgyid par sems so zhes gsol to/_/'on kyang rgyal po de dag la thugs ma ches pa med pa las/_blon pos yang gsol pa/_bdag gis sngar gsol ba 'di bden te/_
[\[209b.2\]]rdzun ma lags par rtag tu gda'o/_/khye'u 'di dag gi lag na thogs pa'i 'khar ba 'di dag gi nang na ral gri re re mchis pas gnod par bgyid du mngon no/_/blon pos gsol pa bzhin du khye'u de dag gi 'khar ba bltas na mtshon yod par gyur nas/_gcig nas kyang 
[\[209b.3\]]gcig bos te gyad kyis bzung nas kun bsad do/_/khye'u de dag gi mgo bcad nas khye'u de dag gi mgo sum cu rtsa gnyis sgrom cig gi nang du bcug nas/_kha legs par bcad de/_sring mo'i steng du bskur ro/_/de'i tshe na khye'u de dag gi mas sangs rgyas dang /_dge 
[\[209b.4\]]'dun spyan drangs pa las/_rgyal pos sgrom bu bskur te 'ongs nas/_de'i nang nas mchod pa byed pa'i mthud ma zhig yod yang dag snyam nas sgrom kha phyes pa las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis re zhig sgrom kha ma 'byed par zhal zas gsol lags nas phyes shig ces 
[\[209b.5\]]bka' stsal to/_/de nas zhal zas gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u'i ma la chos bstan pa/_lus 'di ni mi rtag pa ste/_sdug bsngal ba stong pa bdag med pa/_snying po med pa/_ring por mi thogs pa/_kun nas nyon mongs pas bcings shing 
[\[209b.6\]]glags pa/_sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba ste/_'dod pa dang bye bral ba'i mya ngan gyis lus 'di chud zos te phan pa med de/_gang mkhas pa shes rab can gyis ni don 'di rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/zhes bka' stsal to/_/lha mtshams mas kyang don rtogs nas lan 
[\[209b.7\]]cig phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te/_rab tu dga' mgu rangs nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag gis gsol ba 'di bzhi zhig gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bdag 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]gis gsol ba bzhi la gcig ni dge slong nad pa rnams la nad kyi rkyen sman dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba yid bzhin du stsal ba dang /_gnyis ni dge slong nad pa'i g.yog bgyid pa'i bza' ba dang /_btung ba yid bzhin du sbyar ba dang /_gsum 
[\[210a.2\]]pa ni dge slong 'gron po'i yo byad sbyor ba dang /_bzhi ni dge slong 'gron du 'gro ba'i rgyags dang yo byad sbyar bar 'tshal lo/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_dge slong nad pa dag ni nad kyi rkyen sman dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_mi ldan pa nad 'tsho dka' ste/_gal te 
[\[210a.3\]]na yang tshe'i bar chad du yang 'gyur ro/_/dge slong nad g.yog kyang kha zas med pa'i rkyen gyis bsod snyoms bgyid do/_/bsod snyoms la dus ma mchis te/_gal te 'phyis sam 'dod pa ma rnyed na/_nad pa zhe sdang skyes te/_nad 'tsho dka' bas/_de la yang kha zas 
[\[210a.4\]]'bul bar 'tshal lo/_/shul ring po nas mchis pa'i dge slong yul ma 'dris te/_bshes ma mchis pas bsod snyoms bgyid do/_/bsod snyoms bgyid pa na khyi'am ma rungs pas gtses na zhe sdang skyes te/_bzod pa nyams par 'gyur bas de la yang kha zas 'bul 
[\[210a.5\]]bar 'tshal lo/_/dge slong 'gron du mchi ba grogs dang ldan pa yang rgyags ma mchis pas grogs po dang bral na/_shul du gcan gzan mang po'am/_mi rgod ma rungs pa mchis te/_gcig pu song na de yang lus kyi bar chad du 'gyur bas/_de'i dgos pa yang sbyar 
[\[210a.6\]]bar 'tshal lo/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mtshams mas gsol pa bzhi gsan nas/_shin tu legs so zhes bsngags te/_khyod kyis gsol pa/_bzhi po 'di'i bsod nams rgya chen po ni sangs rgyas la mchod pa byas pa dang /_tha mi dad do zhes bka' 
[\[210a.7\]]stsal nas/_dge 'dun dang bcas te/_slar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshegs so/_/bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i 'og tu sgrom bu phyes te bltas na/_bu'i mgo sum cu rtsa gnyis yod par mthong nas/_'dod pa dang bral ba'i phyir mi dga' bar ni ma gyur to/_/
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]'di skad du kye ma mi cig skyes pa la tshe zad pa yang yod de de ring por ma thogs so/_/da yang rgyud lnga gang du sdug bsngal myong bar gyur ces smras so/_/khye'u sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi ma'i rigs su nye ba rnams de lta bur gyur pa thos nas shin tu mi dga' ste zhe sdang skyes nas/_'di 
[\[210b.2\]]skad du rgyal po chen po ni 'di ltar mnyes pa thams cad kun bsad kyis dmag pa sogs la dgra bya bar 'dong ngo zhes smras nas/_dmag gi dpung bsags te rgyal po'i pho brang bskor to/_/de'i tshe na rgyal po de skrag nas sangs rgyas gang na ba der bros so/_/de dag gis 
[\[210b.3\]]de skad thos nas dmag gi dpung gis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal yang bskor to/_/de'i tshe kun dga' bos rgyal po rab gsal rgyal gyis lha mtshams ma'i bu sum cu rtsa gnyis bsad de/_ma'i rigs su gtogs pa rnams kyis sha gnyer du 'ongs so/_/zhes thos 
[\[210b.4\]]nas pus mo sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis mi sum cu rtsa gnyis rgyal pos cig char du bkum par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_lha mtshams 
[\[210b.5\]]ma'i bu sum cu rtsa gnyis po de da lta 'ba' zhig tu rgyal pos cig char du bsad par ma zad do/_/mi sum cu rtsa gnyis po ci'i phyir cig char tshe 'phos pa khyod la rgyas par bstan gyis legs par nyon la yid la zung shig ces bka' stsal nas/_kun dga' bos kyang de bzhin du bgyi'o 
[\[210b.6\]]thos par 'tshal lo zhes gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_sngon 'das pa'i dus na mi sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di gcig la gcig dga' zhing bshes pa dang /_yid gcugs par gyur nas/_de dag gros 'thun par pha rol gzhan gyi 
[\[210b.7\]]ba lang cig brkus so/_/de'i tshe yul de na rgan mo dbul mo bu tsa yang med pa zhig yod de/_ba lang brkus pa rnams rgan mo de'i khyim du khrid de 'ongs nas bsad par byas pa dang /_rgan mo yang dga' rangs nas shing la sogs te/_sha 'tshod pa'i yo byad sbyar ro/_/mi de dag 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]gis der ba lang gsod pa na/_ba lang de yang gsod par shes nas 'dun par bzung ste khyod kyis da lta nga bsad pas na/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus su yang ci ste 'bras bu thob na yang mi btang ste/_gsod par shog shig ces dam bcas ma thag tu ba lang yang mi rnams kyis 
[\[211a.2\]]bsad kyis kha cig gis ni btsos/_kha cig gis ni bsregs te zos nas/_rgan mo yang ba lang gi shas 'grangs nas rab tu dga' ste/_sngon cad kyang de lta ba'i 'gron cig 'ongs nas/_deng las phan thogs pa ni med do zhes smras so/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na ba lang 
[\[211a.3\]]de ni rgyal po rab gsal rgyal yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na ba lang brku ba rnams ni lha mtshams ma'i bu sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di yin no/_/de'i tshe na rgan mo khyim bdag mo de ni de dag gi ma yin te/_rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu des tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du rtag tu bsad 
[\[211a.4\]]par gyur to/_/de'i dus na rgan mo de rjes su yi rangs zhing dga' ba tsam gyis rtag tu de dag gi ma byas nas/_de tsam gyi mya ngan gyis rab tu gdungs par gyur te/_da 'di ni nga dang phrad nas 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/kun dga' bos yang thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 
[\[211a.5\]]'das la gsol pa/_de dag gis ni bsod nams ci zhig bgyis nas/_rigs che zhing mtho ba dang /_longs spyod dang ldan pa dang dpa' zhing nyams rtsal dang ldan par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sngon 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas 'od srung 
[\[211a.6\]]'jig rten na gshegs pa'i tshe/_rgan mo dkon mchog gsum la shin tu dad pa zhig yod de/_spos mang du nyos nas mar dang sbyar te rtag tu mchod rten la skud do/_/lam kha zhig na mchod rten skud pa las/_mi sum cu rtsa gnyis zhig der lhags nas/_rgan mo 
[\[211a.7\]]mchod rten la skud pa'i grogs byas te/_rgan mo des kyang mi sum cu rtsa gnyis po de la khyod kyis kho mo mchod rten skud pa la bstangs pa'i bsod nams kyis gang dang gang du skyes kyang mnga' byad legs pa dang /_mthu rtsal dang ldan par gyur cig ces smras nas/_de dag kyang rab 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]tu dga' bzhin du mchod rten skud pa'i las byas nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag ni rgan mo 'di'i dbang gis bsod nams kyi las rnams skyes par gyur to/_/gang dang gang du skyes kyang cho rigs mtho zhing btsan phyug pa dang /_longs spyod dang ldan pa dang /_rgan mo 
[\[211b.2\]]'di yang rtag tu bdag cag gi mar gyur te/_bdag cag kyang 'di'i bur gyur pa dang /_rtag tu sangs rgyas dang /_chos thos pa dang mi bral te 'bras bu yang myur du thob par shog shig ces smon lam btab bo/_/rgan mos kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras pas/_tshe rabs lnga 
[\[211b.3\]]brgya'i bar du cho rigs mtho zhing btsan par gyur to/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na rgan mo de ni da ltar khye'u de dag gi ma yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na mi sum cu rtsa gnyis po de ni khye'u 'di rnams yin no/_/de'i tshe na dmag gi dpung rnams ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas zhe sdang 
[\[211b.4\]]gi sems kun zhi ste/_'di skad du rgyal po chen pos kyang mnyes kyis/_mi 'di dag gi sngon gyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ste/_ba lang cig bsad pa tsam gyis 'di lta bur gyur to/_/rgyal po rab gsal rgyal 'di ni bdag cag gi rje bo yin no/_/ci'i phyir 'di la 'khu 
[\[211b.5\]]zhing gnod pa byed par sems zhes smras nas mtshon cha bor te rgyal po la babs nas nyes pa bshags pas rgyal pos kyang gyod ma rmas par btang ngo /_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byung ba'i gleng gzhi 'di 'khor bzhi po dag la/_dam pa'i chos rgyas par bstan 
[\[211b.6\]]to/_/dge ba'i las ni brtson 'grus bya ba'i rigs pa dang mi dge ba'i las ni bya bar mi rigs par yang bstan/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang rgyas par bstan pas 'khor mang po rnams kyis thos nas thams cad kyis 'bras bu thob par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[211b.7\]]kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/blon po [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi bu bdun gyi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//_//bam po bdun pa/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na yul de'i rgyal po gsal rgyal zhes bya'o/_/de'i lho phyogs na yul gser gyi sa la zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_rgyal po ni ka pyi na zhes bya'o/_/rgyal po de'i sras ni ka pyi na 
[\[212a.2\]]chen po zhes bya'o/_/rgyal po de'i yab nongs nas sras rgyal tshab rgyal sar gshegs te/_de yang rang bzhin gyis yid gzhungs la blo gsal te/_dpa' zhing mthu rtsal chen po dang ldan no/_/de la dmag gi tshogs stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug yod de/_dmag de 
[\[212a.3\]]dag gar bab kyang rlung chen po dang 'dra bar phas rgol mi thub pa med do/_/yul dbus kyi rgyal po dang ni ma 'drul to/_/phyis tshong pa dag cig yul gser sar phyin nas ras 'jam po bzang po yug bzhi zhig rgyal po de la phul lo/_/rgyal pos kyang bzhes nas tshong 
[\[212a.4\]]pa de la 'di lta bu nor bzang po gang las 'ongs zhes dris pa dang /_tshong pas kyang 'di ni yul dbus nas mchis so zhes gsol to/_/rgyal po des smras pa/_yul gyi dbus zhes bya ba ni gang /_yul gyi dbus kyi ming ni ci zhes bya/_tshong pas gsol pa/_
[\[212a.5\]]yul gyi dbus kyi ming ni rgyal po'i khab ces kyang bya/_mnyan yod ces kyang bya ste/_de la sogs pa yul gyi ming gzhan yang mang du mchis so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_rgyal po de dag ci'i phyir nga la phyag 'tshal zhing dpya dbul du mi 'ong /_tshong pas gsol pa/_
[\[212a.6\]]rgyal po de dag kyang so so'i rgyal srid 'dzin cing yul gyi tshis bgyid pas 'dir mi mchi'o/_/rgyal po des bsams pa nga'i mthu dang byin gyis gnam mtha' 'og thams cad kyang thul na/_ci'i phyir rgyal po 'di dag nga la phyag 'tshal zhing dpya dbul du mi 'ong /_da ni nga'i 
[\[212a.7\]]mthu dang byin gyis de dag dbab bo snyam nas/_tshong pa de la smras pa/_yul gyi dbus kyi rgyal po'i nang na rgyal po gang che/_tshong pas smras pa/_mnyan yod kyi rgyal po nang na che'o/_/de nas rgyal po des mnyan yod du pho nya btang ste/_rgyal po gsal 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]rgyal la 'di skad ces spring ngo /_/nga'i mthu dang byin gyis 'dzam bu'i gling na gtogs pa kun la dbang na/_khyod ci'i phyir pho nya yang 'drul bar mi byed/_da yang khyod kyi steng du pho nya btang ba yin gyis/_khyod nyal ba'i tshe nga'i ming thos na 'dug pa'i rigs so/_/'dug 
[\[212b.2\]]pa'i tshe thos na ldang ba'i rigs so/_/zas za ba'i tshe thos na mid mi khom par phyir dor ba'i rigs so/_/khrus byed pa'i 'phro la thos na skra yang phyir mdud pa'i rigs so/_/sdod pa'i tshe thos na rgyugs pa'i rigs kyis/_da ste zhag bdun na 'dir nga dang phrad du shog shig_/de ltar 
[\[212b.3\]]ma byas na/_dmag drangs nas khyod kyi yul med par bya'o zhes spring ngo /_/rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de skad ces spring ba thos nas/_mi dga' zhing dngangs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na bar song nas de bzhin du rgyas par gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[212b.4\]]stsal pa/_rgyal pos kyang pho nya de la rgyal po'i nang na nga mi che ste/_nga bas rgyal po che ba yod do zhes gyis shig_/rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du 'jig rten na 'phrul gyi rgyal po zhig 'di nas mi ring ba zhig na bzhugs kyis khyod nyid 
[\[212b.5\]]der song la khyod kyi rgyal pos spring ba bzhin du gyis shig ces bsgo nas/_pho nya de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas song ngo /_/de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por sprul te/_blon po chen por maud gal sprul nas rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par bzhugs so/_/
[\[212b.6\]]kun dga' ra ba yang rin po cher bsgyur nas/_ra ba'i phyi rol na rin po che'i 'obs rim pa bdun pa dang /_'obs kyi bar na rin po che sna bdun gyi shing dkrigs te/_kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi pad ma grangs med pa lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'tsher ba dang /_ra ba'i nang na 
[\[212b.7\]]rin po che sna tshogs las byas pa'i pho brang na/_rgyal po shin tu byin che bar bzhugs par sprul to/_/pho nya de sprul pa'i pho brang du 'ongs nas/_rgyal po chen po mthong ba tsam gyis 'jigs skrag par gyur te/_'di skad du bdag gi rgyal po'i byin dang bsod nams kyis ni 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]'di la mi thub na/_'on kyang spring ba'i yi ge 'bul lo snyam nas yi ge phul lo/_/'phrul gyi rgyal pos yi ge blangs nas rdog pa'i zhabs su bcug ste/_pho nya la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga ni rgyal po chen po ste gling bzhi la dbang ba yin na/_
[\[213a.2\]]khyod kyi rgyal po glen pa de'i ci'i phyir bka' nyan/_khyod myur du phyir song la ngas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to zhes gyis shig_/khyod kyi pho nya phyir 'ongs nas nga'i bka' thos pa tsam gyis/_nyal ba las thos na ldang ba'i rigs so/_/'dug pa las thos na 'greng ba'i rigs 
[\[213a.3\]]so/_/'gro ba las thos na rgyug pa'i rigs kyis/_da ste zhag bdun na 'dir phyag 'tshal du ma 'ongs te bka' bcag par gyur na/_khrims dang sbyar ro zhes gyis shig_/pho nya des bka' stsal pa bzhin du phyir song nas/_bdag gi yul du phyin pa dang /_gser sa la'i 
[\[213a.4\]]rgyal po la ci mthong ba dang /_ci spring ba rgyas par gsol to/_/rgyal pos de skad spring ba thos nas 'gyod par gyur te/_ci dbang ba'i rgyal phran rnams dang bcas te/_rgyal po chen po'i thad du dong ngo snyam ste/_'on kyang thal byung du 'gro bar mi rigs kyis/_da dung yang lan 
[\[213a.5\]]cig bgam mo snyam nas/_sngar pho nya zhig btang nas/_rgyal po chen po la bdag phyag 'tshal du mchi na/_bdag dbang ba'i rgyal phran khri phrag sum cu rtsa drug mchis na/_de dag ril gyis mchi'am/_phyed tsam mchi ba bka' stsol cig ces mchi'o/_/rgyal po chen 
[\[213a.6\]]pos phyir de la rgyal phran phyed dang chos te shog shig ces bsgo ba dang /_gser sa la'i rgyal po rgyal phran khri brgyad stong dang bcas te/_mnyan yod du rgyal po sprul pa'i spyan sngar lhags nas phyag 'tshal te/_'di snyam du bsams so/_/rgyal po chen po 'di'i byad gzugs ni 
[\[213a.7\]]bdag bas lhag kyang /_mthu stobs ni bdag tsam mi phod do snyam du bsams pa dang /_'phrul gyi rgyal pos blon po rin po che la khyod kyi gzhu gser sa la'i rgyal po la byin cig ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po des kyang blangs zhes byas na ma theg go/_/de nas 'phrul gyi 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]rgyal pos blangs te/_mthe'u chung gis gzhu bdungs te/_gser sa la'i rgyal po la gzhu 'di khong shig ces bka' stsal na/_gser sa la'i rgyal pos blangs na gzhu rgyud kyang ma sgul to/_/de nas 'phrul gyi rgyal pos blangs te drangs na/_gzhu rgyud springs pa tsam gyis 
[\[213b.2\]]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang 'gul zhing g.yos so/_/de nas mda' blangs te mda' cig 'phangs na/_'phangs ma thag tu mda' lngar gyur te/_mda' de dag gi rtse mo las 'od zer grangs med pa byung nas/_pad ma shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam yang re re yod par 
[\[213b.3\]]gyur te/_pad ma re re la yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa re re yod par gyur to/_/'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang snang bar byas nas/_lam rgyud lnga'i sems can thams cad la phan 
[\[213b.4\]]pa'i don du ma gyur pa med do/_/lha rnams kyi gnas su 'od zer de mthong zhing chos ston pa'i gsung yang grag par gyur nas/_de dag gi lus dang sems yongs su dag ste/_kha cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa nas dgra bcom pa'i bar du thob par gyur to/_/kha cig ni bla na 
[\[213b.5\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/kha cig ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to/_/mi'i rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can sangs rgyas kyis 'od zer mthong zhing chos bstan pa thos pa rnams rab tu dga' mgu rangs te/_kha 
[\[213b.6\]]cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa nas lan cig phyir mi ldog pa dang /_rab tu byung zhing dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/sems can grangs med pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to/_/
[\[213b.7\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi rgyud du gtogs pa dag ni sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyis reg cing chos thos pas thams cad kha zas kyis 'grangs te/_lus dang sems la gdung ba med cing tshim par gyur nas/_thams cad snying rje ba'i sems dang ldan pa skyes te/_sangs rgyas la bsnyen 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]bkur byas te/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]las rnam par grol nas lha dang mir skyes so/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer mthong bas 'dod chags dang zhe sdang gi sems kun zhi ste/_gti mug gis mdongs pa 
[\[214a.2\]]yang sad par gyur nas/_thams cad sangs rgyas la dga' zhing dad pas/_dud 'gro las rnam par grol te/_lha dang mir skyes so/_/sems can dmyal ba'i sems can la sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyis reg pas grang ba ni dro bar gyur/_tsha ba ni bsil bar gyur/_/
[\[214a.3\]]sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa yang rgyun chad par gyur te/_lus dang sems rab tu dga' bas/_sangs rgyas la dad par gyur te/_sems can dmyal ba las thar nas lha dang mir skyes so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po ka pyi na chen po dang /_gser sa la'i rgyal phran rnams kyis rdzu 
[\[214a.4\]]'phrul 'di lta bu dag mthong nas/_shin tu dad pa'i sems 'ba' zhig dad pas rdul dang bral/_dri ma dang bral te/_chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur te/_rgyal phran khri brgyad stong gi sems tshim par gyur to/_/de ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul bsdus 
[\[214a.5\]]te/_phyir sangs rgyas kyi skur dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun dang rgyab tu bskor te/_bzhugs par bstan to/_/de nas gser sa la'i rgyal po de yang bcom ldan 'das la rab tu byung bar gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par 'ongs so/_/zhes bka' 
[\[214a.6\]]stsal pas/_skra dang /_kha spu rang byi ste/_ngur smrig gyon pa'i dge slong du gyur nas/_chos yid la byas pas zag pa zad de dgra bcom par gyur to/_/de nas kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_gser sa la'i rgyal po 'dis sngon bsod nams ci zhig bgyis na 
[\[214a.7\]]'di ltar rigs che zhing mtho la/_yon tan 'phags par che zhing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang phrad pas/_de ma thag tu zag pa zad par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_sems can 'di dag gi spyod pa bzhin du las kyi 'bras bu 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/sngon 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas 'od srung 'jig rten na gshegs te/_sangs rgyas de mya ngan las 'das nas/_khyim bdag cig gis mchod rten brtsigs te/_dge 'dun gyi gnas khang byas nas/_'tsho ba'i yo byad rnam pa bzhi 
[\[214b.2\]]yang sbyar te yun ring zhig lon pa dang /_mchod rten de yang zhig_/'tsho ba'i yo byad khri stan dang /_gos dang /_zas kyang rgyun chad par gyur to/_/de nas khyim bdag de la bu dge slong zhig yod pa des mi mang po la chos bshad de phyir yang mchod rten gsos nas/_gos dang /_
[\[214b.3\]]mal cha dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_khri stan la sogs pa'i yo byad sbyar te/_mi de dag dang sems yid 'thun par 'tsho ba'i yo byad sbyar te/_'di skad du smon lam btab bo/_/bdag cag ma 'ongs pa'i dus su btsan zhing phyug pa dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_sangs 
[\[214b.4\]]rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs pa dang phrad de/_chos thos nas 'bras bu yang tha mal par ma gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na/_khyim bdag gi bu dge slong de ni/_yul gser sa la'i rgyal po ka pyi na chen po yin no/_/des chos bstan te/_mchod 
[\[214b.5\]]rten gsos pa dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad bstabs pa ni rgyal phran khri brgyad stong snyed yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_'khor mang po rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i sems bskyed de/_yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/ka pyi na chen po'i le'u ste nyi shu 
[\[214b.6\]]bzhi pa'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/rgyal po gsal rgyal ni nongs/_rgyal tshab bai dUr+ya rgyal sar gshegs 
[\[214b.7\]]te/_/rgyal po'i nang na chos bzhin du rgyal po byed pa ma yin pas/_glang po che'i rmig pas mi brdzis te/_bsad pa yang grangs med do/_/de'i tshe na rigs che zhing btsun pa'i bud med dag cig gis de lta bu dag mthong nas/_khyim la mi dga' bar gyur te/_thams cad 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]rab tu byung nas dge slong mar gyur to/_/rab tu byung ba de dag la la ni shAkya'i rigs/_la la ni rgyal rigs yin te/_dpe med par mnga' byad legs par blta na sdug pa/_rigs che ba lnga brgya snyed bdog pa yongs su spangs te/_rab tu byung bas yul mi 
[\[215a.2\]]thams cad kyang /_de la dga' ste 'tsho ba sbyor ro/_/dge slong ma de dag gcig la gcig 'di skad du bdag cag ni rab tu byung yang chos kyi bdud rtsi'i ro ma myong ste/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug zhi bar ma byas na mi rung gis/_drug sde ma bsnyen dga' mo'i 
[\[215a.3\]]thad du chos nyan du 'dong ngo zhes smras nas/_de dag gang na bar song ste phyin pa dang /_phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad du bdag cag ni rab tu byung na yang /_chos kyi bdud rtsi'i ro ma myong na/_bdag cag la bstan du gsol zhes smras pa dang /_drug sde mos bsams pa bdag gis 
[\[215a.4\]]'di dag chos dang tshul khrims las phyir zlog ste/_'di dag gi chos gos dang /_lhung bzed thob par gyur na/_re legs snyam nas/_'di skad ces smras so/_/khyed rnams ni rigs che zhing mtho ba ste/_rin po che sna bdun dang /_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_
[\[215a.5\]]bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa'i mi dang /_zhing dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad cis mi brel na ci'i phyir de dag yongs su spangs te/_dge slong mar zhugs nas 'di ltar nyon mongs shing sdug bsngal dang bsdos te/_sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la 'jug par byed/_nyes na 
[\[215a.6\]]phyir song ste khyim thab dang /_bu dang bu mor ldan pas lhan cig tu yid bzhin du dga' ste/_rtse zhing tshe 'di la yang dga' skyid pa myong bar byas la/_sbyin pa dang yid bzhin du byas na legs so/_/zhes bsgo'o/_/dge slong ma de rnams de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas mi dga' 
[\[215a.7\]]ste dus nas phyir dong ngo /_/de nas dge slong ma de dag dge slong ma ud pa la'i mdog gang na bar song nas der phyin pa dang /_ud pa la'i mdog la phyag 'tshal te/_chos bzhin du snyun gsol nas 'di skad ces so/_/bdag cag khyim na mchis pa na khyim gyi las kyis 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]bslus/_da rab tu byung yang 'dod pa'i dbang du gyur nas/_nyon mongs pa las thar bar mi nus na/_bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du dam pa'i chos bstan du gsol/_ud pa las smras pa/_khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa 'das pa'am/_ma 'ongs pa'am/_da ltar gyi 
[\[215b.2\]]dngos po gang yang rung ba dris shig dang ngas bstan par bya'o/_/dge slong ma rnams kyis gsol pa/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa re zhig zhog la da ltar gyi bstan te/_bdag cag gi the tsom dgrol du gsol/_ud pa las smras pa/_'dod chags ni me dang 'dra ste/_ri lung 
[\[215b.3\]]tshig par byed do/_/rtswa khri dang 'dra ste mched par 'gyur ro/_/'dod chags kyi dbang gis gcig la gcig 'tshe zhing gnod par byed do/_/de la yun ring nas ngan song gsum du lhung ste thar ba'i dus med do/_/khyim na gnas pa ni sdug pa la chags te/_'dod pa dang bye bral 
[\[215b.4\]]pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_rgyal po'i khrims kyis gtse ba'i sdug bsngal rgyun mi chad par myong ste/_tshe 'phos nas phyir yang sos pa tsam du lus dang sems gdungs te/_khyim gyis glags shing /_bcings pa ni btson ra bas kyang dam 
[\[215b.5\]]mo/_/bdag kyang kun tu rgyu ba'i rigs su skyes te/_kho mo'i pha ma yang rigs che zhing btsun pas kho mo yang kun tu rgyu ba'i rigs che ba mang du thos pa/_mkhas pa'i rig byed dang ldan pa zhig la bag mar btang nas/_de'i chung ma byed de/_de'i bu yang yod par gyur to/_/
[\[215b.6\]]phyis gyos sgyug tshe 'phos pa'i 'og tu kho mo la sems can yod par gyur nas/_khyim thab la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho mo la sems can yod de/_zla ba yang tshang du nye bas gal te 'dir bu btsas na btsog cing mi sdug gis/_kho mo'i pha ma'i khyim du btsar 'gro'o zhes byas na/_
[\[215b.7\]]kho mo la legs so zhes zer te/_khyo shug gnyis 'grogs nas bu zhig kyang khrid de pha ma 'dod par song ba las/_lam phyed tsam du phyin pa dang mngal mi bde bar gyur nas shing cig gi drung du nam phyed tsam na bu btsas so/_/kho mo'i khyim thab kyang /_logs shig tu nyal ba 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]las mtshan mo sbrul gyis zin to/_/mtshan mo bos na cang mi grag nas/_nam nangs nas bltas na khyim thab kyang sbrul gdug pas zin pas tshe 'phos nas/_lus kyang zhig par gyur to/_/de'i tshe na kho mo 'khams te sa la 'gyel ba dang /_bu che ba yang pha sbrul gyis 
[\[216a.2\]]bsad pa mthong nas/_skad phyung ste ngus pas bu ngus pa'i skad kyis kho mo yang phyir sangs nas/_bu che ba ni khur du thogs/_bu chung ba ni pang par khyer te ngu zhing song ba las lam yang dben pa zhig ste/_mi 'ga' yang ma 'drul bas grogs kyang ma rnyed do/_/bar na chu chen po zhig 
[\[216a.3\]]yod de/_chu de kha tshon yang che la zab pas bu gnyi ga ma theg nas/_bu che ba ni/_chu'i tshu rol du bzhag_/bu chung ngu khyer te pha rol tu bskyal nas/_phyir bu che ba bsur 'ong ba dang /_bu yang ma 'ongs pa mthong nas/_chu'i nang du zhugs te chus khyer ba las/_kho mos bsnyags 
[\[216a.4\]]pa las stobs chung bas ma zin te chus khyer ro/_/de nas phyir pha rol na phyin tsam na bu chung ba yang spyang kis zos te/_khrag cung zad tsam sa la snang ngo /_/der yang 'khams nas/_ring shig lon te phyir sangs pa dang /_lam du zhugs te song song ba las kun tu rgyu kho mo'i pha 
[\[216a.5\]]ma dang nye zhing /_bshes pa zhig dang phrad do/_/kun tu rgyu des khyod ci nyes na 'di ltar nyon mongs par gyur ces dris na/_kho mos kyang ci ltar gyur pa'i gtam rgyas par byas pa dang /_kun tu rgyu de yang ngus nas kho mo'i pha ma'i gtam dris na/_khyod kyi pha ma'i khyim du de bar me 
[\[216a.6\]]shor nas pha ma dang /_khyim gang gi mi thams cad mes tshig go zhes zer ro/_/de skad ces smras pa thos nas/_kho mo 'khams te sa la 'gyel to/_/de nas kun tu rgyu des bslang ste/_khyim du khrid de kho mo la bu bzhin du byams shing gdungs pa las/_yang kun tu rgyu 
[\[216a.7\]]cig gis chung mar blangs te/_de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa las sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_zla ba tshang nas bu byung du nye ba na khyim thab gzhan gyis khyim du chang la bos na de'i 'og tu bu btsas te/_sgo dam du bcad nas bu btsir ba las/_khyim thab chang gis myos 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]te/_sgo brdungs pa dang /_sgo 'byed pa med pas/_khros te sgo bcag nas/_nang du 'ongs pa dang /_kho mo yang brdegs so/_/bdag gis bu btsas so zhes byas na bu yang bsad de mar gyi nang du brngos nas kho mo la zar bcug go/_/bu'i sha za ma phod nas ma zos pas yang brdegs te/_
[\[216b.2\]]nan gyis zar bcug go/_/zos pa'i 'og tu khyim thab kyang sad nas bdag gis bsams pa/_bdag bsod nams med cing las ngan no snyam bsams nas/_khyim thab bor te/_yul bA rA Na sIr bros so/_/yul bA rA Na sI'i phyi rol na shing cig gi drung na 'dug pa las/_grong 
[\[216b.3\]]de'i khyim bdag gzhon nu zhig gsar du chung ma tshe 'phos nas grong khyer gyi phyi rol tu chung ma'i rus bu sbas nas/_khyim bdag de chung ma de la chags pas rus bu'i drung na ngu zhig 'dug pa las/_bdag gi drung du 'ongs te kho mo la khyod gcig pu 'di ni ci byed ces dris so/_/kho mos 
[\[216b.4\]]kyang de bzhin du gtam byas pa las khyim bdag des skyed mos tshal du khrid de chung ma bya'o zhes smras nas/_kho mos de bzhin du rung ngo zhes smras so/_/khyo shug 'dus nas ring por ma lon par khyim thab nad kyis btab nas tshe 'phos so/_/de'i tshe na yul chos kyis gson pa'i tshe 
[\[216b.5\]]khyo shug mdza' ba rnams/_khyo'i tshe 'phos na chung ma yang gson por khyo dang lhan cig tu dur du 'dzud do/_/kho mo yang der dur du bcug nas nub mo dur rkun 'ongs te dur brus pa dang /_dur rkun gyi dpon pos kho mo bzang bar mthong bas des kyang chung mar byas so/_/ring po ma lon 
[\[216b.6\]]par dur rkun song song ba las rgyal pos bsad nas/_rkun zla rnams kyis rus bu bskur te/_kho mo dang lhan cig tu yang dur du bcug go/_/dur na zhag gsum 'dug pa las spyang kis dur brus nas/_kho mo yang dur nas phyung ste/_'di snyam du bsams so/_/kho mos 
[\[216b.7\]]sngon sdig pa ci zhig byas nas 'di 'dra bar lan du ma shi ba las phyir sos par gyur/_sngon na thos na shAkya'i rigs kyi sras zhig mngon par byang chub nas/_mtshan yang sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa kun mkhyen to zhes grags na da ni de la skyabs su 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]'gro'o snyam nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gang na ba de logs su song ba dang /_rgyang ma nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi sdong po rgyas pa lta bu'am/_skar ma'i nang na zla ba lta bur mthong ngo /_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis bdag 'dul 
[\[217a.2\]]ba'i dus la bab par shes nas/_bzhengs te kho mo bsu'o/_/kho mo sgren mor 'dug pas ngo tsha ste/_lag pas nu ma bkab nas sa la 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_bud med 'di la gos bskon cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_kho 
[\[217a.3\]]mos gos gyon nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs nas/_bdag rab tu byung bar gnong shig ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal te/_bud med 'di skye dgu'i 
[\[217a.4\]]bdag mo la gtad de/_rab tu phyung shig ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas skye dgu'i bdag mos kho mo rab tu phyung nas/_kho mo la bden pa bzhi'i chos bstan te/_kho mos thos ma thag tu brtson 'grus nan tan byas nas/_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/_'das 
[\[217a.5\]]pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar gyi bya ba kun rtogs par gyur to/_/dge slong ma de rnams kyis smras pa/_sngon sdig pa'i las ci bgyis na/_de lta bu'i rnam par smin pa myong ba ston cig ces smras pa dang /_dge slong ma ud pa las khyod rtag par nyon cig_/
[\[217a.6\]]khyod la bstan par bya'o/_/sngon 'das pa'i dus yun ring po zhig na/_khyim bdag shin tu phyug pa zhig la bu med pa las/_chung ma zhig blangs te/_chung ma de la shin tu byams pas/_ring po ma lon par chung ma de sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_zla ba tshang nas khye'u 
[\[217a.7\]]zhig btsas te/_khyo shug gnyis de bu la byams shing sdug par 'dzin to/_/de nas chen mas 'di snyam du bsams so/_/kho mo ni rigs che zhing btsun mod kyi bu med pas rigs 'tshob pa med do/_/gal te khye'u 'di cher skyes nas rigs 'tshob cing /_nor dang longs spyod 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]kyi bdag por 'gyur te/_bdag la mi ster cing /_bdag sdug par 'gyur ro snyam du phrag dog skyes te/_bsad par bsams nas bu khye'u'i mtshog mar khab kyis btsugs te/_rma yang mi snang bar byas so/_/khye'u de yang ring por ma lon par tshe 'das pa dang /_chun ma 'khams 
[\[217b.2\]]nas chen ma la/_khyod kyis nga'i bu bsad do zhes brgal to/_/chen mas bsnyon nas 'di skad ces mna' bor ro/_/kho mos khyod kyi bu bsad par gyur na/_kho mo skye ba thams cad du/_kho mo'i khyo sbrul gdug pas bsad par shog shig bu zhig yod na yang chus khyer ba dang /_
[\[217b.3\]]spyang kis za bar shog shig_/kho mo'i lus yang nas yang du gson por dur du bcug cing /_bu'i sha za bar shog shig_/pha ma'i khyim du me shor nas thams cad tshig par shog_/ces smras so/_/de'i tshe na de skad ces mna' bor ba'i chen ma de ni kho mo yin te/_de 
[\[217b.4\]]dag thams cad lus kyis myong bar gyur to/_/dge slong ma de dag gis smras pa/_bsod nams ci zhig byas te/_sangs rgyas mthong zhing sangs rgyas kyis bsu nas rab tu phyung ste/_'khor ba'i mthar phyin par gyur/_ud pa las smras pa/_sngon bA rA Na sI 'dir ri drang srong 
[\[217b.5\]]lhags zhes bya ba na/_rang sangs rgyas dang /_nyan thos dang /_mu stegs can mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa mang du gnas so/_/de'i tshe na rang sangs rgyas dag cig bsod snyoms la grong du gshegs pa dang /_khyim bdag gi chung ma zhig gis mthong nas rab tu dga' 
[\[217b.6\]]ste/_bsod snyoms phul nas/_mchod pa byas so/_/de nas rang sangs rgyas de nam mkha' la 'phags te lus la me 'bar ba dang /_chu 'bab pa dang /_'gro ba dang /_nyal ba dang /_'dug pa'i rdzu 'phrul bstan nas/_khyim bdag gi chung ma des kho mo yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus su 
[\[217b.7\]]'di 'dra ba thob par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/de'i tshe na smon lam btab pa'i khyim bdag gi chung ma de ni kho mo yin no/_/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad nas sems rnam par grol te/_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/'di ltar dgra bcom pa thob mod kyis 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]lcags tsha ba'i thur ma spyi bo nas zug nas rkang mthil du byung ste/_rtag tu 'di lta bu'i gnod pa byung ngo /_/de'i tshe rigs che zhing mtho ba'i dge slong ma lnga brgya snyed kyis de skad ces thos nas/_lus dang sems skyi g.ya' ste/_'dod pa la me mur gyi phung po ltar rtogs 
[\[218a.2\]]nas/_'dod chags kyi sems yongs su zad de khyim gyi sdug bsngal la btson ra bas kyang lhag par rtogs te/_dri ma kun zad nas dus gcig tu ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/_dgra bcom par gyur to/_/dge slong ma de dag gis tshig 'thun par dge slong ma ud pa la la bdag cag ni/_
[\[218a.3\]]'dod chags kyis kun nas bcom zhing glags pa las/_khyod kyis chos bstan pas 'khor ba'i mthar phyin par gyur to zhes smras so/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma ud pa las ni legs par bstan to/_/gang chos ston pa ni gcig gis gcig bstan pa'o/_/
[\[218a.4\]]'bras bu thob nas sangs rgyas kyi sras yang dag pa'o zhes bsngags so/_/de skad ces gsungs pa la 'khor mang po rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/dge slong ma ud pa la'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu lnga pa'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_
[\[218a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'dug pa las langs te/_gos tshags bcos te pus mo sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kauN+Di n+ya 
[\[218a.6\]]la sogs pa dge slong lnga po 'di ci'i rgyu/_ci'i rkyen gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ma thag tu chos kyi bdud rtsi sngar myong ba bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong lnga po 'di dag sngon yang nga'i sha 
[\[218a.7\]]sngar zos te bde bar gyur pas 'dir yang chos kyi ro thog mar myong ste/_rnam par grol bar gyur to/_/kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_dge slong 'di lnga pos sngon ci bgyis pa bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_sngon 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'das pa'i sngon rol tu/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po shud do lag gar ni zhes bya ba byung ste/_'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed la dbang byed do/_/de'i tshe yul de na lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du 
[\[218b.2\]]char mi 'bab bo zhes ltas mkhan gyis lung bstan nas/_rgyal pos de skad ces thos pa dang /_rab tu mya ngan gyis yi mug par gyur te/_'di ltar mu ge chen po byung na/_mi mang po 'di dag la lo de snyed kyi kha zas ci ltar snyed snyam nas/_rgyal phran dang blon po kun bsdus te/_bgros 
[\[218b.3\]]nas bang ba na 'bru ji snyed yod pa dang /_da ltar mi ci snyed yod pa rtsis su sbyar nas/_lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du mi re la phul re re'i thad du rtsis na yang lo bcu gnyis su mi thub bo zhes dril bsgrags so/_/de nas yang phyi phyir mu ge che ste tshe 'phos pa yang mang nas/_rgyal po des ji 
[\[218b.4\]]ltar byas na mi mang du 'tsho bar 'gyur snyam bsams te/_btsun mo dang pho brang slas su bcas te/_skyed mos tshal du 'chag tu song ba las/_bsti ba'i gnas zhig tu phyin nas/_btsun mo dang /_mi mang po kun gnyid kyis log pa'i 'og tu nyal ba las langs te/_phyogs 
[\[218b.5\]]bzhir phyag 'tshal te/_'di lta bu'i yi dam bcas so/_/yul 'dir mu ge byung ste/_thams cad bza' ba med par gyur te/_ltogs kyis bdag gis lus 'di btang ste/_tshe 'phos pa'i 'og tu nya chen po zhig tu skyes nas/_thams cad bdag gi sha za zhing 'grangs par shog 
[\[218b.6\]]shig ces smon lam btab nas shing zhig la 'dzeg ste/_shing kha nas lus g.yang du btang ngo /_/der tshe 'phos nas chu chen por brdzus te skyes pa'i nya chen po dpag tshad lnga brgya zhig tu gyur to/_/de'i tshe yul de na shing mkhan mi lnga zhig chu 'gram du shing thur dong ba las nya chen po de 
[\[218b.7\]]mthong nas/_nya des mi'i skad du 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod bkres na nga'i sha la chod la ci 'dod pa zo shig_/'grangs nas kyang ci theg pa khyim du khyer cig_/khyed kyis sngar nga'i sha zos te 'grangs pas na/_phyis mngon par sangs rgyas nas kyang /_thog mar khyod chos kyi zas 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]myang bar bya'o/_/yul mi dag la gang bkres pa thams cad kyis ci dga' bar nga'i sha la long shig ces bsgo shig_/de'i tshe na mi lnga pos sha bcad de zos nas yul mi la sbran te/_de nas gcig gis gcig sbran pas/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad 'dus te/_
[\[219a.2\]]de'i sha bcad nas zos so/_/rtsib logs ngos gcig zad tsam na/_rtsib logs ngos gcig rang bsgyur te/_steng ma zad tsam na 'og ma yang de bzhin du skye'o/_/de bzhin du ltag 'og bsgyur cing lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du thams cad kyis sha bcad de zos nas/_thams cad de la snying 
[\[219a.3\]]rje ba'i sems skyes pas/_de'i sha zos pa de dag thams cad tshe'i dus byas pa yang mtho ris kyi lhar skyes so/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po nyar gyur pa de ni da ltar nga yin no/_/shing mkhan lnga po thog mar nga'i sha bcad de zos pa de ni/_dge slong kauN+Di n+ya la sogs pa 
[\[219a.4\]]lnga po yin no/_/skye bo mang po phyis nga'i sha zos pa de ni/_lha'i sras po brgyad khri dang nga'i nye gnas rnam par grol ba rnams yin no/_/de'i tshe sngar mi lnga po la byin te/_'tsho ba'i srog skyabs pas 'dir yang sngar chos bstan te/_chos kyi sku'i yan lag gis/_dug gsum gyi me 
[\[219a.5\]]zhi bar byas so/_/kun dga' bo dang /_'khor mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/shud do lag gar ni'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[219a.6\]]rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kun dga' bo dang bsod snyoms la gshegs pa las/_lam kha na byis pa dag cig sa la khang bu dang /_bang mdzod dang /_rin po cher bsngos nas rtse zhing 'khod do/_/
[\[219a.7\]]de la khye'u gcig cig gis/_sangs rgyas rgyang ma nas gshegs pa mthong nas rab tu dga' ste/_sbyin pa bya bar bsams nas/_bang bar bsngos pa'i sa las snyim pa gang blangs te/_sangs rgyas la 'bul bar gzas pa na/_khye'u chung ches pas ma slebs nas/_grogs 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]khye'u cig la khyod sa la rgu shig_/kho bo khyod kyi steng du 'greng ste lhung bzed du blugs so zhes smras nas/_grogs pos kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras te/_khye'u de grogs po'i phrag pa la 'dzegs nas/_sa snyim pa gang sangs rgyas la phul lo/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang lhung bzed 
[\[219b.2\]]smad nas sa phul ba bzhes so/_/bzhes nas kun dga' bo la gtad do/_/sa 'di 'jim pa gyis la gtsug lag khang la skus shig ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo byis pa chung ngus dga' ba'i sems kyis da ltar nga las phul ba bzhes nas/_lha khang la bskus pas/_de'i 
[\[219b.3\]]bsod nams kyis nga mya ngan las 'das te lo brgya lon pa'i 'og tu rgyal po a sho ka zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/khye'u cig shos ni de'i blon por 'gyur te/_'dzam bu'i gling la dbang byed cing dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan yang /_yul thams cad du bsgrags nas ring bsrel la yang rgyas par 
[\[219b.4\]]mchod pa byed do/_/'dzam bu'i gling du mchod rten brgyad khri bzhi stong cig char byed par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo dga' mgu rangs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/de bzhin gshegs pas sngon bsod nams ci zhig mdzad pas ring bsrel la yang mchod rten de snyed 
[\[219b.5\]]cig bgyid par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rtag par nyon la shin tu yid la zung shig dang /_khyod la bstan par bya'o/_/sngon bskal pa grangs med pa 'das pa na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po gsal thub ces bya ba rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed la dbang 
[\[219b.6\]]byed pa zhig byung ngo /_/de'i tshe sangs rgyas pur sha zhes bya ba zhig 'jig rten du byung ste/_rgyal po des blon po dang bcas su yo byad rnam pa bzhi sbyar te/_sangs rgyas dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul lo/_/de'i tshe na rgyal po dang yul mi rnams ni/_rtag tu sangs rgyas dang phrad de/_
[\[219b.7\]]phyag 'tshal ba dang /_bsnyen bkur byed de/_rgyal phran gzhan dag ni bsod nams kyang mi byed par/_mtha' 'khob kyi rgyal phran dang /_yul mi dag bsod nams byed du gzhug pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bris la/_rgyal phran rnams la sbyin no snyam bsams nas/_
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]ri mo mkhan mang po bsdus te/_sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs ri mor bris shig ces bsgo ba dang /_ri mo mkhan dag sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar song ste/_sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bltas nas ri mo bris pa las/_mtshan gcig bris na gcig mi 'dra bar gyur te/_ri mo mkhan 
[\[220a.2\]]gyis ri mo bri bar mi nus so/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyis tshon rtsi sbyar te/_sku gzugs bris nas/_de'i ri mo mkhan de la bstan te/_sku gzugs mtshan dang ldan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong bris nas/_rgyal phran re re la sku gzugs re re bskur te/_sku gzugs de la rgyal po dang /_yul 
[\[220a.3\]]mi thams cad kyis me tog dang /_spos dang yo byad thams cad kyis mchod cing phyag 'tshol cig ces bsgo'o/_/rgyal phran de dag dang yul mi de dag gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mthong nas rab tu dga' mgu yi rangs nas/_bsnyen bkur byas so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po 
[\[220a.4\]]gsal thub de ni da ltar nga yin te/_de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs brgyad khri bzhi stong bris te/_rgyal phran dang yul mi kun la spel ba'i bsod nams kyis/_gang dang gang du skyes kyang mtho ris su brgya byin lha'i dbang por skyes te/_byad gzugs bzang ba dang /_
[\[220a.5\]]mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu thob ste mngon par sangs rgyas so/_/mya ngan las 'das nas kyang ring bsrel la mchod rten brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed byed par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs pa la kun dga' bo dang 'khor mang po rnams mngon par 
[\[220a.6\]]dga' nas rjes su yi rang ngo /_/rgyal po a sho ka'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na dge slong 
[\[220a.7\]]dag dbyar so so'i tshul du zhugs nas/_tshul nas byung ba dang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong de dag dang yun ring du ma phrad pas de dag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i phyag bteg ste/_dge slong de dag la bsti 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]stang dang bcas pas khyed na bar ma gyur tam/_bsod snyoms kyis ma brel tam zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan chen po dang ldan pa de dge slong rnams la bsti stang mdzad par dge slong kun dga' bos mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[220b.2\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ni 'jig rten gyi gtso bo yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa/_ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags na/_ci'i slad du thugs smad de dge slong rnams la bsti stang mdzad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[220b.3\]]to/_/sngon bskal pa grangs med tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'das pa na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yul bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag so tshis la mkhas pa zhig yod de/_nor ci snyed kyang gser du bsgyur nas/_gser gyi bum pa gcig byas nas/_sa'i 'og tu sbas so/_/de bzhin du 
[\[220b.4\]]nor ci snyed kyang longs mi spyod de gser du bsgyur nas phyis ring zhig lon pa dang /_gser gyi bum pa snga phyir bsags pa bdun du gyur nas thams cad sa 'og tu sbas so/_/khyim bdag de phyis nad kyis btab nas tshe'i dus byas pa dang /_gser gyi bum pa la chags pas sbrul gdug pa zhig 
[\[220b.5\]]tu skyes te gser de la bsrung ngo /_/phyis yun ring zhig lon pa dang grong khyer de yang zhi gnas su yang mi gnas te/_grong khyer de stongs par gyur to/_/sbrul de yang lo grangs mang du lon nas tshe'i dus byas pas phyir yang de nyid kyi lus su skyes te/_gser gyi bum pa la 'khri zhing nyal lo/_/
[\[220b.6\]]de bzhin du lo khri phrag du ma lon pa dang /_nang gi skye ba tha ma la lus des skyo ste 'di snyam du bsams so/_/bdag ni gser 'di la chags pas 'di 'dra ba'i lus mi sdug pa myong bar gyur gyis da ni bsod nams kyi zhing du phul na snyam nas lam dang nye bar song ste/_rtswa 'khor du lus sbas la mi dag 
[\[220b.7\]]'ong na 'bod do snyam ste/_de'i tshe sbrul gdug pa des mi gcig lam nas 'ong ba mthong nas/_sbrul gyis mi de la bos pa dang mi des bos pa'i sgra thos nas phan tshun du bltas na ci yang mi snang nas lam du zhugs te song song ba las sbrul gyis yang 'bod de/_kye kho bo'i drung du yang bsnyen cig ces smras 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]pa dang /_/mi des smras pa/_khyod kyis kho bo bos te ci zhig bya/_khyod ni shin tu gdug pa can yin pas kho bo bsad du 'ong ngo /_/sbrul gyis smras pa/_kho bos gnod pa bya na khyod drung du ma 'ongs kyang gnod pa bya nus so/_/zhes smras pa dang /_mi de skrag nas 
[\[221a.2\]]sbrul gyi drung du bsnyen to/_/sbrul gyis smras pa/_kho bo la 'di na gser gyi bum pa zhig yod kyis/_khyod la bsod nams shig bya bar bcol bar nus sam/_ci ste ma byas na khyod la gnod par bya'o/_/mi des kho bos nus so zhes smras pa dang /_sbrul gyis mi de gser gyi bum 
[\[221a.3\]]pa'i drung du khrid de/_gser gyi bum pa gcig bskur te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod gser 'di khyer la dge 'dun rnams la mchod ston gsol cig_/mchod ston gsol ba'i nyin par kho bo yang 'ong gis bsus shig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas mi des gser khur te dge 'dun 
[\[221a.4\]]gyi nang du song nas/_dge slong gi gtsang sbyor la gser phul te/_'di ni sbrul gdug pa zhig gi gser lags kyis gser 'dis dge 'dun la mchod ston gsol cig ces mchi'o/_/gser 'dis mchod ston sbyar te/_de nas mchod ston nam gsol ba zhag dus brtsis nas/_
[\[221a.5\]]de'i nyin par mi de gzeb zhig thogs te/_/sbrul gdug pa de gang na 'dug pa der song ngo /_/sbrul gdug pa des kyang mi de 'ong ba mthong nas rab tu dga' bar gyur to/_/mi des sbrul de gzeb kyi nang du bcug nas khyer te song ba las lam du mi cig dang phrad de/_mi des khyod gang nas 
[\[221a.6\]]'ongs zhes lan gsum gyi bar du dris kyang sbrul thogs pa des cang ma smras pas/_sbrul khros nas gdug pa phyung ba las yang 'di snyam bsams so/_/mi 'di ci zhig nyes na/_pha rol pos lan gsum gyi bar du dris na gtam gyi lan yang mi ster snyam ste/_phyir yang khros nas gdug pa 
[\[221a.7\]]byung ba las phyir dgag ste/_yang 'di snyam du bsams so/_/mi 'di bdag gi phyir bsod nams byed na/_byas pa gzo ba'i drin yang dran pa byas par gdug pa mi 'byung ngo snyam bsams te/_mi 'dis bdag la phan pa'i don byed kyi nyes pa zhig byas na yang bzod par bya'o/_/zhes sa 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]dben par phyin pa dang /_re zhig sa la zhog shig ces smras nas sbrul des mi de la sems smad de/_da bdag gi nyes pa 'gyod cing bshags so zhes smras na/_phyir yang khur te/_/dge 'dun gyi gnas su phyin pa dang /_dge 'dun dag kyang gdugs tshod kyi dus la bab pas/_mi des 
[\[221b.2\]]dge 'dun la me tog brims te/_sbrul de dad pa'i sems kyis me tog 'grim pa la lta'o/_/de nas dge 'dun dag zas kyi bya ba byas nas kha lag bkrus nas sbrul de la chos bshad do/_/sbrul de rab tu dga' nas/_gser gyi bum pa drug kyang dge 'dun la phul te/_bsod nams 
[\[221b.3\]]kyi las byas nas de nas tshe 'phos so/_/tshe'i dus byas nas de'i bsod nams kyis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes so/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe na sbrul gdug pa khur du khyer ba'i mi de ni nga yin no/_/sbrul gdug pa de ni shA ri'i bu yin no/_/'das pa'i dus na yang khur du sbrul 
[\[221b.4\]]khyer ba las sbrul gyis spyos te/_de la yang sems smad pas da yang dge slong rnams la sems smad pa yin no/_/kun dga' bo la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/gser gyi bum pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o//_//
[\[221b.5\]]'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 'od ma'i tshal na dge slong grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe yul de na bram ze shin tu dbul zhing phongs pa ci yang mi bdog pa zhig yod de/_bram ze phongs 
[\[221b.6\]]ches nas kun la ci ltar byas na tshe 'di la longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur zhes dris so/_/de la mi zhig gis smras pa/_ci khyod mi shes sam/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba da ltar 'jig rten du gshegs te/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don mdzad do/_/de'i 
[\[221b.7\]]nye gnas 'od srung chen po dang maud gal ya na dang shA ri'i bu dang /_ma 'gags pa la sogs pa 'phags pa bzhi yang rtag tu dbul phongs pa la phan pa'i don byed kyis/_gal te khyod dad pa'i sems kyis 'phags pa de dag la zhal zas kyis mchod na/_'phags pa de dag gis tshe 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]'di nyid la ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de dag dang ldan par mdzad do zhes smras so/_/de'i tshe na bram zes mi des smras pa thos nas/_rab tu dga' ste kun tu rgyu zhing slong mo dang /_gla zos nas nor cung zad cig snyed de phyir khyim du 'ongs nas zhal zas sbyar te/_'phags pa'i 
[\[222a.2\]]dge 'dun rnams spyan drangs nas/_bshos gsol te 'jig rten 'di nyid la phan par re'o/_/de'i tshe na bram ze de'i chung ma bde ba zhes bya ba des dge 'dun la bshos gsol nas nyin zhag gcig pa'i bslab tshigs mnos so/_/de'i tshe na rgyal po gsal rgyal 'chag tu song ba las/_
[\[222a.3\]]phyir 'ong ba'i lam du nyes pa byas pa'i btson zhig lam kha na shing la bcings shing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/btson des rgyal po gshegs pa mthong nas/_ngus te kha zas zhig bslangs pa dang /_rgyal pos kyang sbyin no zhes byas nas/_phyir pho brang du gshegs pa dang /_brjed pa las 
[\[222a.4\]]de'i nub mo nam phyed tsam na btson la kha zas sbyin pa dran te/_kha zas bskyal bar byas nas/_pho brang nang gi mi ni gcig kyang 'gro phod pa med de/_nam phyed tsam na kha zas bskur du lam na 'dre gdon dang srin po'i 'jigs pas srog dang bsdos te 'gro nus pa med do/_/de'i tshe na rgyal 
[\[222a.5\]]pos mi de'i sdug bsngal ba dang bkres pas nyen pa dran nas/_de la shin tu snying brtse nas/_nga'i yul 'di nas su zhig btson de la kha zas bskyal du nus na/_gser srang stong sbyin no/_/zhes bsgrags kyang 'gro nus pa ma byung ngo /_/de'i tshe na bram ze de'i chung ma bde ba des gtam 
[\[222a.6\]]du thos na/_'jig rten pa su yang rung ste nyin zhag gcig pa'i bslab tshigs brgyad mnos nas 'dre gdon la sogs pas mi brdzi ste/_gdon thams cad kyis gnod pa byed mi nus so zhes thos kyis/_bdag ni rgyal pos gar btang bar kho mo 'gro snyam bsams nas mchis so/_/de nas rgyal 
[\[222a.7\]]pos bde ba la khyod kha zas 'di dag khyer la che ge mo zhig na btson 'dug pa de la byin cig dang /_gser srang stong sbyin no zhes dam bcas so de nas bde ba rgyal po'i bka' bzhin du kha zas thogs te/_tshul khrims dran par byas nas/_lam du zhugs te song song ba las/_grong khyer gyi phyi rol 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]tu srin mo lam pa dang phrad do/_/de'i tshe na srin mo de'i bu lnga brgya gsar du btsas pas bkres skom gyis nyen te/_bde ba 'ong ba mthong nas/_bza' bar gzas te/_de'i tshe na dge bsnyen ma tshul khrims ma nyams pas srin mos mthong nas skrag ste/_dge bsnyen ma khyod khyer ba'i kha zas las cung 
[\[222b.2\]]zad cig bslang ngo zhes smras pa dang /_dge bsnyen mas kyang nyung ngu zhig byin te byin pa nyung mod kyi dge bsnyen ma'i mthus mang du sprul pas srin mo ma smad shin tu 'grangs par gyur to/_/de nas srin mos dge bsnyen ma la khyod ci ming zhes dris pa dang /_kho mo ni bde ba'o zhes smras so/_/
[\[222b.3\]]'o na kho mo ma smad kyang ltogs pa las khyod kyis gsos kyis/_kho mo 'dug pa 'di na gser bum pa gang yod kyis phyir log pa'i lam du khyer cig_/khyod phar 'gro na kho mo'i nu mo a lam pa yang lam kha na 'dug ste/_khyod dang phrad kyis kho mo'i 'phrin du khyod bde'am/_kho 
[\[222b.4\]]mo yang bu lnga brgya bde bar btsas so zhes gyis shig_/de nas dge bsnyen ma lam du zhugs te/_song song ba las ring por ma lon par a lam pa dang phrad do/_/a lam pa la phu mo'i 'phrin spring ba dang /_bu lnga brgya bde bar btsas so zhes gtam byas nas/_a lam pa 
[\[222b.5\]]dga' ste dge bsnyen ma khyod kho mo'i phu mo'i 'phrin dang gtam snyan pa byas pa legs kyis/_kho mo 'dug pa'i gnas 'di na gser bum pa gang yod kyis phyir log pa'i lam du khyer cig_/kho mo cag gi ming po cig kyang lam kha na 'dug gi_/de dang phrad na kho mo cag spun gnyis 
[\[222b.6\]]kyi 'phrin dang /_bu lnga brgya btsas pa'i gtam yang gyis shig ces bsgo nas song ngo /_/de nas yun ring por ma phyin par sring mo gnyis kyi ming po dang phrad de/_de la bu mo gnyis kyi 'phrin dang /_bu lnga brgya bde bar btsas pa'i gtam byas nas de yang rab tu dga' ste/_khyod 
[\[222b.7\]]kho bo'i sring mo gnyis kyi gtam dang phrin byas pa legs kyis/_kho bo 'dug pa'i gnas 'dir/_gser bum pa gang yod kyis phyir log pa'i lam du khyer shig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas dge bsnyen ma chas te song song ba las btson de'i drung du phyin te/_kha zas bsnyod nas 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]phyir log pa'i lam du gser bum pa gsum rnyed do/_/rgyal pos kyang gser srang stong bya dgar byin pas/_bram ze dbul po khyo shug gnyis yul de na shin tu phyug cing nor mang bar gyur pas/_lhag par bsod nams byed cing rin po che mang bar gyur to/_/
[\[223a.2\]]rgyal pos kyang de bsod nams las gyur par shes nas blon por bcug ste shin tu phyug par gyur te/_lhag par bsod nams byed pa la dad pa'i sems bskyed de/_sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun spyan drangs te/_mchod pa chen po byas so/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan 
[\[223a.3\]]pas sems rnam par grol te/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/'khor mang po de rnams dang kun dga' bo la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/bram ze mo bde ba'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o//_//bam po 
[\[223a.4\]]brgyad pa/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong chen po'i dge 'dun brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya la 
[\[223a.5\]]bsnyen bkur byed pa'i g.yog gcig dgos so/_/zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_de nas kun shes kauN+Di n+ya stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te/_phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 
[\[223a.6\]]bsnyen bkur yid bzhin du bgyi zhing chos gos dang lhung bzed bzung ngo zhes gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis kauN+Di n+ya la khyod kyang rgas 'khogs te/_khyod nyid la yang bsnyen bkur byed pa yang dgos kyis/_kauN+Di n+ya khyod stan la 'dug shig ces bka' stsal to/_/de bzhin 
[\[223a.7\]]du 'od srung dang /_shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal ya na chen po la sogs te nye gnas lnga brgya snyed kun gyis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/_/zhes gsol na yang gcig kyang ma gnang ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas bcom ldan 'das kyi bsnyen bkur bya 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]ba'i dge slong gang la bgyi snyam brtags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kun dga' bo la dgyes pa ni 'di lta ste/_khang bu brtsegs pa'i shar phyogs kyi skar khung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ba na/_nub phyogs kyi rtsig ngos la shar cing lhan pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kun dga' bo 
[\[223b.2\]]la dgongs shing dgyes par nye gnas kun gyis rtogs nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu chen po gnyis kun dga' bo gang na ba der song ste drung du phyin pa dang /_kun dga' bo dang lhan cig tu yid mgu zhing dga' ba'i gtam rnam pa du ma byas nas/_phyogs gcig 
[\[223b.3\]]tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal ya nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya bar dad dam/_bcom ldan 'das kyang khyod kyis bsnyen bkur bya bar 
[\[223b.4\]]dgyes te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas na khyod la phan pa'i don cher 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya bar mi dad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsgrub par dka' bzod par dka'o/_/'di 
[\[223b.5\]]lta ste me 'bar ba ni bsgrub par yang dka'/_bzod par yang dka' ba yin te de ltar de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsgrub par dka' bas na/_bdag bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyis par mi dad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal ya na'i bu chen pos kun 
[\[223b.6\]]dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kun dga' bo khyod la bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing dgyes pa ni 'di lta ste/_khang bu brtsegs pa'i shar phyogs kyi skar khung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung nas nub phyogs kyi rtsig ngos na shar cing lhan pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs 
[\[223b.7\]]kyang kun dga' bo khyod kyis bsnyen bkur bya bar dgyes kyi dad par gyis shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas na/_khyod la phan pa'i don cher 'gyur ro zhes smras so/_/btsun pa maud gal ya na chen po ci ste bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa 'di gsum 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]gnang na bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod do/_/'di lta ste bcom ldan 'das mi gsol ba'i na bza' bdag la 'tshal du mi stsal ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis mi gsol ba'i bshos kyi lhag ma bdag mi 'tshal ba dang /_bdag dus ma mchis 
[\[224a.2\]]par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchir gnang bar bgyis na ni/_bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyid par dad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang maud gal ya na chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bsnyen bkur byed par 'dod par byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na 
[\[224a.3\]]ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyi bar tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dad par bgyis na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag la 'dod pa 'di gsum gnang na/_gdod bdag gis bcom 
[\[224a.4\]]ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyid par dad do zhes mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa legs so/_/maud gal ya na'i bu dge slong kun dga' bo de ni mkhas pa can te/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams smad pa'i tshig dang rjes su smad pa'i tshig gis chos 
[\[224a.5\]]kyi phyir byung bar mthong bas na/_bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams 'di skad du dge slong kun dga' bo ni gos dang zas kyi phyir ston pa la bsnyen bkur byed do zhes smra bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir/_/maud gal gyi bu de ni dge slong kun dga' bo ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i 
[\[224a.6\]]chos so/_/dge slong kun dga' bo de ni mkhas pa can te/_dus shes shing dus rig pa lags te/_dus shes par 'gyur ba ni bcom ldan 'das la 'khor rnam bzhi lta bar 'gro ba'i dus la bab pa dang /_dus la ma bab pa dang /_gzhan yang mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rnams 
[\[224a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro ba'i dus la bab pa dang /_dus la ma bab pa dang /_gzhan yang mu stegs can kun tu rgyu 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la lan ldon par spobs so/_/'di dag ni lan ldon par mi spobs so/_/bca' ba dang bza' ba 'di ni 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la bde zhing bsod par 'gyur/_'di ni bde zhing bsod par mi 'gyur bar shes pa'i phyir maud gal gyi bu dge slong kun dga' bo 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so/_/de nas shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 
[\[224b.2\]]'das la bsnyen bkur byed par byas nas dad par byas pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang kun dga' bo ni mkhas pa can te/_dus shes shing dus rig go zhes bsngags pas dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge slong kun 
[\[224b.3\]]dga' bo 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis/_dus tshod la mkhas par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa'i pha rol tu rgyal po chen po 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed la dbang byed pa zhig byung ngo /_/de'i 
[\[224b.4\]]tshe grong khyer ba ru te zhes bya ba na bram ze n+ya gro d+ha ces bya ba zhig yod de/_mkhas pa rig pa dang ldan pa dang sman dang gtsug lag dang /_skar ma la mkhas pa zhig pas/_rgyal po de'i ston pa byed de rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed kyang de la rgyal po chen po dang 'dra bar bsnyen bkur byed de bsgo ba'i 
[\[224b.5\]]tshig kyang nyan to/_/bram ze de phyug khyad kyang rnam thos kyi bu dang 'gran te/_de la bu med pas rtag tu mi dga' ste/_sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa las ji ltar byas na bu yod par 'gyur zhes tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_dbang phyug dang /_nyi zla dang /_skar ma dang /_
[\[224b.6\]]ri dang /_chu dang /_nags kyi lha kun la mchod cing brjod do/_/lo bcu gnyis lon nas chung ma chen mo sems can dang ldan par gyur to/_/bud med mkhas pa dag ni sems can dang ldan ma thag tu bu khye'u 'am bu mo yin par nges par rtogs pas/_de yang khye'u yin par shes 
[\[224b.7\]]pas bram ze la gtam smras so/_/bram zes de skad smras pa thos nas rab tu dga' mgu rangs te chung ma'i rim gro lhag par ches bskyed do/_/de nas zla ba dgu tshang nas bu khye'u zhig btsas nas/_gser gyi mdog can skra mthon mthing du 'dug pa bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_mtshan 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]dang ldan pa zhig go/_/de nas btsas ston byas nas mtshan mkhan bkug ste mtshan la bltas nas ming sbyin pa chen po zhes bya bar btags so/_/khye'u de ni rim gyis cher skyes nas dbyar dgun dang /_ston dpyid kyi gnas kyang so sor byas te/_longs spyod 
[\[225a.2\]]byed du bcug go/_/khye'u de yang yid gzhungs shing mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan pa zhig pas rig byed dang gtsug lag rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad la sogs te/_sgyu rtsal gang yang mi shes pa med do/_/phyis sbyin pa chen pos pha ma la gsol pa/_bdag phyi rol tu 'chag cing ltad mo bltar 
[\[225a.3\]]'gro'o zhes byas pa dang /_de'i pha mas kyang bu 'chag tu 'gro'o/_/zhes lam srang phyag dar byed du bcug ste/_rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng nas me tog gis gtor te/_bdug spos kyi bdug pa la sogs pa yo byad mang po bshams nas/_sbyin pa chen po glang po che rin po che 
[\[225a.4\]]sna bdun gyis brgyan pa la bskyon te/_dril bsgrags/_rnga brdungs/_rol mo dang sil snyan dkrol te/_'khor brgya stong snyed kyis bskor nas/_grong khyer gyi phyi rol tu dong ngo /_/yul mi thams cad kyis lam gyi g.yas g.yon du khang bu brtsegs pa'i steng nas/_mig mi 
[\[225a.5\]]'dzums par blta zhing 'di'i byin dang gzi brjid ni tshangs pa dang 'dra'o zhes bsgrags so/_/de nas song song ba las mu lto ba dag gos hrul po gyon zhing snod chag pa dag thogs te cung zad bslang ngo zhes 'bod pa sbyin pa chen pos thos nas/_de dag la khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar nyon mongs 
[\[225a.6\]]shing sdug ces dris so/_/de la kha cig ni 'di skad du bdag cag la pha ma dang /_phu nu dang bu smad dang gnyen bshes ma mchis pas sdug go zhes zer ro/_/de la kha cig ni bdag yun ring du nad kyis btab pas mi sos te sdug zhes zer ro/_/de la kha cig ni bdag bag ma byas pas 
[\[225a.7\]]chom pos bcom ste/_ci yang mi bdog pas slong mo byed do zhes zer ro/_/sbyin pa chen pos de skad smras pa thos nas mchi ma dkrugs te song ngo /_/de nas yang pha zad cig na shan pa dag srog chags bsad nas pags pa bshu ba dang /_dmyal gtub pa dag mthong ngo /_/sbyin 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]pa chen pos e ma ho 'di dag ci byed dris na/_bdag cag ni pha mes rgyud kyi 'di 'dra ba'i gsod pa'i las byed de/_'di ma byas na mi 'tsho'o zhes zer ro/_/de la sbyin pa chen po ngo mtshar du gyur nas/_lta mi phod par song ngo /_/de nas pha zad du phyin pa dang /_zhing pa dag cig 
[\[225b.2\]]zhing rmos te/_zhing rmos pa'i shul du srin bu mang du byung ba las bya mang pos 'bu dag thu zhing za ba mthong ba dang de dag la ci byed ces dris na bdag cag ni zhing rmos te sa rlogs pa'i shul du sa bon btab nas phyis mang du skyes te/_des mang du 'tsho zhing rgyal po'i phyir yang 'bul lo zhes zer ro/_/
[\[225b.3\]]sbyin pa chen pos de la yang ngo mtshar du gyur nas/_pha zad song ba dang /_rngon pa dag bya rgya bres pa dang /_rnyi btsugs nas/_bya rnams bshor ba dang sems can dag bya rgya dang rnyis zin nas lus brdabs shing 'then kyang ma shor te snying rje'i skad phyung ste shin tu 'jigs skrag pa dag 
[\[225b.4\]]mthong nas/_khyod ci byed ces dris na bdag cag kyang rgyud kyi 'di 'dra ba gsod pa'i las byed pas 'tsho'o zhes zer ro/_/sbyin pa chen pos de skad smras pa thos nas/_shin tu yi mug ste/_yang pha zad song ba dang /_nya pa dag nya rgya btsugs pa dang mang du zin te/_thang la phung 
[\[225b.5\]]por spungs nas da dung yang 'gul ba dag mthong nas/_'di dag ci byed ces dris na/_bdag cag rgyud kyis las gzhan med do/_/'di ltar nya bshor zhing 'tsho'o zhes zer ro/_/sbyin pa chen pos 'di lta bu dag mthong nas 'di snyam du bsams so/_/sems can 'di dag ni 
[\[225b.6\]]dbul zhing phongs pas bgo ba dang /_bza' ba'i phyir 'di lta bu'i kha na ma tho ba'i las gsod pa la sogs pa byed de/_'di dag ni tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song gsum du lhung ste mun pa nas mun par 'gro zhing thar pa'i dus med do snyam bsams nas/_phyir khyim du 'ongs te 
[\[225b.7\]]nyin mtshan du de sems shing mi dga' nas pha'i drung du song ste/_pha la bdag gsol pa zhig mchis kyis gnong shig ces smras so/_/phas kyang bu khyod ci zer smras pa bzhin du bya'o zhes smras so/_/yab bdag sngon phyi rol tu 'chag tu mchi mchi ba las/_mi mang pos gos dang zas 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]kyi phyir thams cad nyon mongs te/_gcig la gcig gsod pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang dbang za ba dang mi dge ba'i las rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid pa mthong nas de dag la sbyin pa bgyid par bsams kyis/_yab kyi bang mdzod chen po las phongs pa dag gi phyir yid bzhin 
[\[226a.2\]]du sbyor du gnong shig_/phas smras pa bang mdzod dang rin po che mang du bsags pa thams cad khyod kyi phyir byas par zad na ci'i phyir khyod zer ba ni mi nyan zhes smras so/_/de nas sbyin pa chen pos phas gnang ba'i lung thob nas/_yul mi thams cad la sbyin pa chen pos sbyin gtong chen 
[\[226a.3\]]po byed kyis thams cad 'dus shing shog shig ces bsgrags so/_/de'i tshe dge sbyong dang bram ze dbul phongs pa mgon med pa dang /_nad pa la sogs pa grong khyer gyi phyi rol na lam thog thag gang ngo /_/de dag kyang dpag tshad brgya dang /_nyis brgya dang /_sum brgya dang /_bzhi brgya 
[\[226a.4\]]dang /_lnga brgya dang /_dpag tshad stong gi lam nas 'ongs/_kha cig ni dpag tshad nyis stong sum stong bzhi stong lnga stong nas dpag tshad khri'i bar du lhags te/_de dag sprin bzhin du 'dus te thams cad la yid bzhin du sbyin pa ni gos 'dod pa la gos/_zas 'dod pa la 
[\[226a.5\]]zas/_rin po che dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_mu sa ra gal ba dang /_bzhon pa dang /_theg pa dang /_khyogs dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_zhing dang /_rkang 'gros la sogs te yid bzhin du sbyin pa byas so/_/de ltar sbyin pa sbyin pa la zhugs te/_
[\[226a.6\]]yun ring zhig lon pa dang bang mdzod sum cha zhig zad pa dang /_bang mdzod srung mis bram ze la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sras kyis bang mdzod nas sbyin pa byas pas/_sum cha gcig ni zad/_sum cha gnyis las ma lus na/_phan tshun du 'drul ba'i skyes dang tshong zong ci 
[\[226a.7\]]las bgyid pa dgongs shig ces smras so/_/kho bo ni bu la byams pas ngo mi bzlogs kyis bang mdzod stongs kyang bla'o zhes smras so/_/de nas yang ring zhig lon pa dang /_bang mdzod sum gnyis ni zad sum cha tsam lus pa dang /_mdzod srung gis yang bram ze la bang mdzod 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]sum gnyis ni zad sum cha tsam las ma lus na/_phan tshun skyes bskur ba dang /_tshong zong ci las bya zhes smras so/_/bram ze des smras pa/_kho bo'i bu sdug ches pas ngo mi zlogs te smra mi phod do/_khyod bdag gi ci legs su byos la zhing mi khom pa ltar tha snyad thogs shig_/bang mdzod 
[\[226b.2\]]srung gis bram ze las lung thob nas mdzod sgo bcad de/_don gnyer du song ngo /_/de nas slong ba dag sbyin pa chen po'i thad du lhags nas/_bar 'ga' ni mdzod srung mi rnyed de mdzod sgo mi phyed/_gal te mdzod srung 'ong na yang yid bzhin du mi ster bas sbyin pa chen po 'di snyam du 
[\[226b.3\]]bsams so/_/'di ltar gyur pas 'di ni bang mdzod srung gis thugs mi thub pas pha mas man ngag 'ong gis yong yang bus pha ma'i bang mdzod stongs par bya ba mi rigs kyis/_bdag gi thabs ci zhig byas na/_rin po che yid bzhin du rnyed de/_skye bo mang po la phan thogs 
[\[226b.4\]]par 'gyur bar bsams nas/_mi dag la 'di skad ces dris so/_/'jig rten na las ci byas na rin po che yid bzhin du rnyed de/_nor dbyig mang du rnyed cing zad mi shes par 'gyur zhes dris pa dang /_kha cig ni zhing mang po rmos na nor gyi dbyig mang por 'gyur zhes zer ro/_/
[\[226b.5\]]kha cig ni rkang 'gros spel nas spogs byas na nor mang du rnyed do zhes zer ro/_/kha cig ni lam ring po nas tshong spogs byas na nor mang du rnyed do zhes zer ro/_/kha cig ni rgya mtshor zhugs te nor bu rin po che blangs na rin po che mang du 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/_/sbyin pa chen pos de dag 
[\[226b.6\]]gis smras pa thos nas zhing rmo ba dang /_rkang 'gros spel ba dang /_lam ring por tshong spogs la 'gro ba ni nga'i cha ma yin gyis/_rgya mtshor 'jug pa 'ba' zhig nga'i cha yin no zhes smras nas rgya mtshor 'jug snyam bsams te/_pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag 
[\[226b.7\]]ni rgya mtsho nas rin po che mang po blangs te/_dbul phongs pa la sbyin pa yid bzhin du bya'o/_/bdag rgya mtshor rin po che len du mchir gnong shig ces smras so/_/de'i pha mas de skad smras pa thos nas 'khams te/_bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jig rten na dbul 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]phongs pa ni blo med de/_lus srog dang bsdos nas 'gro bar byed de/_khyod cis phongs na de ltar sems khyod sbyin pa byin 'dod na khyim na yod pa'i nor thams cad sbyin par byos shig_/rgya mtshor 'gror mi rung ste/_rgya mtsho'i nang na chu rlabs dba' klong 'khyil ba 
[\[227a.2\]]dang /_chu srin dang /_klu gdug pa dang /_srin mo dang /_ri chu'i mdog can la sogs te/_shin tu yang ba'i gshed ma mang du yod pas thar bar dka' na/_khyod cis phongs na srog dang bsdo bar byed/_'di la ni nyan pa med kyis ma sems par 'dug cig ces bsgo'o/_/sbyin 
[\[227a.3\]]pa chen pos de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas bsams pa bzhin du ma grub pas yi dam bcas so/_/bsams pa 'di ma grub kyi bar du pha ma'i mdun du sa la kha sbub tu nyal te phyir mi ldang ngo snyam bsams te/_yab yum gyis mkhyen par mdzod cig_/bdag ni bsams pa bzhin du ma 
[\[227a.4\]]grub kyi bar du kha sbub tu nyal ba 'di las mi ldang ngo zhes smras so/_/de nas pha ma mi dga' ste/_gnyen bshes dang bgros nas rgya mtsho'i nang du gshed ma yang mang du yod pa'i gtam yang byas/_bdag kyang rmongs pa las lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du lha kun la mchod do/_/khyod 
[\[227a.5\]]lha zhig_/nga'i bur skyes na nged ma bor bar zan zo shig_/ces zhag gcig zhag gnyis nas zhag drug gi bar du tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gros btab kyang ma nyan te/_sngar ci skad smras pa las ma zlogs so/_/pha ma skrag nas yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag gi bu 'di thog ma 
[\[227a.6\]]btsas nas de tsam gyi bar du brtsam par bya ba mthar ma grub kyi bar du mi gtong bas rgya mtshor btang na brgyal phyir log kyang srid kyi ma btang na zhag bdun lon nas 'phral du bye brag phye ste/_da ni btang dgos so snyam nas bu'i drung du song ste lag pa nas bzung ste/_bu longs la zan zo 
[\[227a.7\]]shig yid bzhin du 'gro bar gnang ngo zhes smras pa dang sbyin pa chen po yang langs te bza' ba zos btung ba 'thungs so/_/de nas phyi rol tu byung ste mi mang po la kho bo rgya mtshor rin po len du 'gro'o/_/khyod su 'gro dga' ba rnams kyang 'grogs te 'dong gis ded dpon kyang kho bos byas 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]la/_yo byad kyang kho bos sbyar ro zhes bsgrags so/_/de'i tshe na mi lnga brgya tsam yang 'gro bar khas blangs nas so so nas yo byad sbyar te/_nam 'gro ba'i dus kyang byas nas/_dus bzhin du lam du zhugs te chas so/_/lam du 'jug pa'i tshe khye'u'i pha ma dang /_rgyal po dang /_
