[\[227b.2\]]rgyal bu dang /_blon po la sogs te yul mi thams cad kyis kyang bskyal nas rdzongs btab bo/_/pha ma yang ngus te phyi phyag byas nas zhag du ma'i lam 'das pa dang /_'brog sa stong du phyin te nub mo'i dgongs lam du mi rgod kyis bcom ste/_nor rdzas kun phrogs so/_
[\[227b.3\]]de nas song song ba las grong khyer nga shu par zhes bya bar phyin nas grong khyer de na bram ze ka pyi li zhes bya ba dang phrad de/_bram ze de'i khyim du song nas bram ze de las sbyin pa chen pos gser srang sum stong bslang bar byas so/_/de'i tshe na bram ze de la bu mo gser gyi mdog can skra mthon 
[\[227b.4\]]mthing gar 'dug pa/_rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed kyi rgyal bu thams cad kyis bslangs na yang ma ster ba cig yod do/_/de'i tshe na sbyin pa chen po bram ze de'i sgor song ste/_bram ze ka pyi li 'dug gam zhes dris pa'i tshe/_bu mos khyim gyi nang nas sbyin pa chen po'i skad thos 
[\[227b.5\]]pa tsam gyis/_phyi sgo na skad grag pa 'di kho mo'i khyim thab yin no/_/zhes pha ma la smras so/_/de nas bram ze sgor byung nas phrad pa dang /_khye'u de la 'di ni nges par gzhan pas 'phags so snyam bsams so/_/khye'u des gser bslangs pa dang /_bram zes kyang sbyin 
[\[227b.6\]]par gnang nas lag pa ya gcig tu gser thogs lag pa ya gcig tu ni bu mo khrid de/_bu mo 'di yang khyed kyi chung mar sbyin gyis long shig ces smras pa dang /_sbyin pa chen pos smras pa/_bdag ni rgya mtsho chen por rin po che len du 'gro ste/_rgya mtsho'i nang na bgegs shin tu mang 
[\[227b.7\]]bas kho bo 'khor tam mi 'khor gtol med de/_khyed kyi bu mo chung mar len pa'i thugs mi thub bo/_/bram zes smras pa/_khyod bde bar 'khor na bu mo 'di chung mar long shig ces smras pa dang /_sbyin pa chen pos kyang 'khor na de bzhin bgyi'o zhes smras so/_/de nas bram 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]zes kyang gser srang sum stong dang gzhan yang yo byad ci dgos pa kun sbyar te/_de nas rgya mtsho'i ngogs su phyin to/_/de nas gru bcos te gru'i nang du zhugs nas de nas thag pa bdun gyis brtod de/_gru'i nang nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgya mtsho'i nang na bgegs 'di 
[\[228a.2\]]dag yod de/_'di lta ste rlung nag po dang srin po dang /_chu'i dba' rlabs 'khyil ba dang /_klu gdug pa dang /_chu'i mdog lta bu'i ri dang /_chu srin la sogs pa'i bgegs kyang ya nga ba mang du yod kyis khyed 'gror mi dad pa zhig yod na 'di nas phyir log shig phyis 'gyod par gyur 
[\[228a.3\]]ta re gal te lus dang srog la mi lta ste/_pha ma dang /_chung ma dang /_phu nu dang /_gnyen bshes la ma chags na 'dong ngo /_/gal te bde bar phyin na rin po che sna bdun gyis bu tsha rabs bdun tshun cad phyug par 'gyur te/_longs spyod zad mi shes par 'gyur ro/_/zhes 
[\[228a.4\]]smras nas thag pa gcig bcad do/_/de bzhin du nyi ma bdun gyi bar du nyin re lan re de skad smras nas/_rtod thag re re bcad de rlung dang sbyar te/_g.yor shing bsgreng bas mgyogs khyad mda' bzhin song ngo /_/de nas tshong pa dag rin po che'i gling du phyin nas/_sbyin pa chen pos mang 
[\[228a.5\]]du thos pas rin po che brtag pa la shin tu mkhas pas rin po che bzang ngan dang /_lci yang dang ci tsam ri ba'i rin thang tshun cad tshong pa rnams la bstan nas/_rin po che kha dog 'di lta bu ni yang mod kyis rin che'o/_/rin po che 'di lta bu ni lci yang rin chung gis ma len shig_/
[\[228a.6\]]ha cang mang ches na yang gru lci bas 'bying ngo /_/ha cang nyung ches na yang nyon mongs te song song ba'i don med pas 'di tsam ni ran no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshod kyang bstan nas rin po che grur brdzangs te ci la yang ma reg nas da phyir 'dong ngo zhes chas pa dang /_sbyin pa chen po gru'i nang 
[\[228a.7\]]du zhugs su ma btub nas/_tshong pa rnams la kho bo ni klu'i rgyal po'i pho brang nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ma thob kyi bar du phyir mi log go zhes smras so/_/de nas tshong pa rnams ngus nas mya ngan gyis yi mug nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag tshong pa rnams ni skyes bu ded dpon 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]khyod kyi g.yog tu 'ongs te/_da khyod kyis 'dir bor te mi 'gro na bdag cag kyang phyir khyim du mi phyin te/_thams cad 'khyam par 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa chen pos smras pa/_tshong pa khyod ma nyes par kho bos yul du phyin pa'i smon lam btab bo zhes pog phor lag tu blangs te/_phyogs 
[\[228b.2\]]bzhir mchod nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag ni rin po che blangs te/_sems can phongs pa la phan gdags par ma zad kyis/_de ltar sbyin pa byed pa'i bsod nams des sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i phyir ro/_/bdag gis smras pa 'di bden te smon lam bzhin du 'grub na tshong pa 'di 
[\[228b.3\]]dag rin po che dang bcas su nye zho med par 'dzam bu'i gling du bde bar phyin par shog shig_/ces smon lam btab nas thag pa bcad de g.yor shing bsgreng nas phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du bde bar song ngo /_/de dag song ba'i 'og tu sbyin pa chen po chur zhugs te song ba las zhag bdun gyi 
[\[228b.4\]]bar du pus mo tsam las ma nub bo/_/de nas yang zhag bdun gyi bar du brla drung tsam las ma nub bo/_/de nas yang zhag bdun song ba las rked pa tsam las ma nub bo zhag bdun gyi bar du phrag pa tsam du phyin to de nas zhag bdun gyi bar du ni rkyal lo/_/de nas ri zhig gi drung du 
[\[228b.5\]]phyin pa dang /_shing la 'jus te ri la 'dzegs nas/_zhag bdun gyis ri'i rtse mor phyin to/_/ri'i rtse mor zhag bdun song song nas yang zhag bdun gyis shod du chu 'gram du phyin to/_/chu 'gram du phyin pa dang /_chu'i nang nas pad ma gser gyi mdog can yod pa la sbrul gdug 
[\[228b.6\]]pas pad ma'i rtsa ba la dkris shing 'dug par mthong ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas sems rtse gcig tu byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/_sbrul gdug pa 'di dag kyang sngon zhe sdang dang phrag dog byas pa'i rkyen gyis 'di lta bu'i lus mi 
[\[228b.7\]]sdug pa myong ngo snyam lhag par de la snying brtse ba'i sems bskyed pas sbrul gdug pa de'i gdug pa kun zhi nas/_byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i steng nas gom pa bor te song song ba las zhag bdun gyis sbrul gdug pa de dag brtol to/_/de nas yang song song ba las srin 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]po dang phrad nas srin po de dag mi'i dri tshor bas kun tu tshol lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems rtse gcig tu byams pa'i sems kyis brtags pas srin po de dag 'jam pa'i tshig gis skyes bu khyod gang nas 'ongs/_gang du 'gro zhes dris so/_de 
[\[229a.2\]]la sbyin pa chen pos kho bo ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che tshol du 'ongs ba yin no zhes smras so/_/de nas srin po de dag rab tu dga' ste/_'di ni bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa zhig go snyam bsams nas/_'di ni da dung klu'i pho brang las shin tu ring ste/_nam yang mi phyin 
[\[229a.3\]]pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis mthu zhig gis bstangs te bskyal lo/_/snyam nas nam mkhar khyer te dpag tshad bzhi brgya'i pha rol na phyin pas yang sa la bzhag go/_/sbyin pa chen po de nas song song ba las ring por ma lon par dngul gyi mkhar zhig mthong nas klu'i gnas 
[\[229a.4\]]zhig yin snyam ste nye bar song ngo /_/mkhar de'i phyi rol 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te/_'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pa 'jigs su rung bas gang ngo /_/sbyin pa chen pos de dag mthong nas/_sbrul gdug pa 'di dag ni sngon zhe sdang che ba'i las kyis 'di lta bu'i lus 'jigs 
[\[229a.5\]]su rung ba myong bar gyur to snyam ste/_de la bu gcig pa dang 'dra ste/_byams shing snying rje'i sems kyis/_de ltar byams pa'i sems bskyed pas sbrul gyi gdug pa yang zhi bar gyur nas de dag brdzis nas klu'i mkhar du song ngo /_/mkhar de la klu gnyis kyis dkris te/_klu'i mgo 
[\[229a.6\]]mkhar sgo la brten te/_klu de gnyis kyis sbyin pa chen po de mthong nas mgo bteg ste gdug pa 'byin pa las/_sbyin pa chen pos byams pa'i sems bskyed pas gdug pa yang zhi nas mgo smad pas sa la nyal lo/_/sbyin pa chen pos klu'i mgo la brdzis nas mkhar gyi nang na song 
[\[229a.7\]]ba dang /_mkhar gyi nang na klu zhig rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang na 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/klu'i rgyal po des byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas/_dngangs te 'di snyam du sems so/_/nga'i gnas 'di 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te/_'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]pas gang bas klu dang gnod sbyin ma yin pa gzhan gang yang 'dir 'ong ba'i thugs mi thub na/_'di lta bu su yin snyam ste 'dug pa las langs nas bsu ste/_bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag byas nas rin po che'i khri la bzhag ste/_kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs byin no/_/kha zas zos 
[\[229b.2\]]nas khyod 'dir ci la 'ongs ci ltar phyin dris so/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams ni dbul phongs pas nor dang /_zas dang /_gos kyi phyir gcig gis gcig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'tshe zhing gnod pa byed de/_tshe 'phos ma thag tu 
[\[229b.3\]]ngan song gsum du lhung ngo /_/bdag ni 'di la snying brtse ste/_de dag gi mgon bya ba'i phyir lam ring po nas nyon mongs pa dang bsdos te/_rgyal po chen po khyod la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che slong du 'ongs so/_/yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches sems can thams 
[\[229b.4\]]cad la phan gdags pa'i bsod nams kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal gyis/_bdag gi yid dang mi 'gal bar rin po che stsal du gsol/_/klu'i rgyal pos smras pa/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba yin te/_khyod don 'di'i phyir 
[\[229b.5\]]'ong na/_'dir zla ba gcig cig 'dug ste bdag gi mchod pa yang bzhes la bdag la chos bstan na/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yang sbyin no zhes byas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpas kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras so/_/de nas klu'i rgyal pos nyin gcig bzhin 
[\[229b.6\]]du kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te phul nas/_rol mos byang chub sems dpa' mchod do/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i chos kyi yan lag zla ba gcig gi bar du bstan nas/_phyir 'gro'o zhes byas pa dang /_klu'i rgyal 
[\[229b.7\]]po dga' nas spyi bo'i gtsug phud nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bkrol te phul lo/_/skyes bu chen po 'gro ba la phan pa'i don du yi dam la shin tu brtan pa khyod gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya'o/_/nam mngon par sangs rgyas pa na bdag kyang khyod kyi nye gnas mchog tu gyur 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]cig ces smras so/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po la nor bu rin po che 'di la mthu stobs ci yod dris na/_smras pa/_nor bu 'di ni dpag tshad nyis stong kho ra khor yug tu dgos pa thams cad char bzhin du 'bebs so/_/byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/_nor 
[\[230a.2\]]bu rin po che 'di mthu stobs che mod kyi/_'on kyang bdag gis bsams pa'i don chen po 'grub nus pa ma yin no/_/snyam bsams nas/_klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas bskyal te song ngo /_/de nas yang song song ba dang /_rgyang ma nas bai dUr+ya sngon po'i mkhar 
[\[230a.3\]]cig mthong ngo /_/mkhar de'i drung du phyin pa dang /_mkhar de yang 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te/_'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pas yongs su gang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpas sbrul gdug pa de dag la snying brtse zhing byams pa'i sems bskyed pas/_sbrul gdug 
[\[230a.4\]]pa zhi nas sbrul de dag brdzis te song ngo /_/mkhar sgor phyin pa dang /_klu gnyis shig mkhar sgor nyal ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' snying brtse zhing byams pa'i sems kyis klu'i gdug pa zhi nas mgo la brdzis nas mkhar gyi nang du song ngo /_/de'i tshe na mkhar de na klu'i 
[\[230a.5\]]rgyal po gcig rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang na 'dug pas/_rgyang ma nas byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas/_'di snyam du bdag gi gnas 'di la 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te/_'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pas gang ba klu dang /_gnod sbyin min pa gzhan 
[\[230a.6\]]'ong ba'i thugs mi thub na mi 'di lta bu su yin/_gang nas 'ongs snyam nas ya mtshan du gyur te/_bsus nas bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag byas te rin po che'i gdan la bzhag go/_/de nas kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te phul lo/_/byang chub 
[\[230a.7\]]sems dpas kha zas zos pa'i 'og tu khyod 'dir ci la 'ongs/_don ci yod ces dris so/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_bdag ni klu'i rgyal po khyod la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che slong du 'ongs so/_/klus smras pa/_rin po che shin tu rnyed par dka' ste/_khyod 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]'dod pa yang dag na kho bos gsol pa bzhin du zla ba gnyis 'dug ste/_bdag cag la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan nas/_bdag cag gi mchod pa bzhes na rin po che yang sbyin no zhes byas pa dang /_sbyin pa chen pos de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras so/_/de nas klu'i rgyal 
[\[230b.2\]]pos zla ba gnyis kyi bar du kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te/_phul nas rol mo sna tshogs kyis mchod do/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i chos kyi rnam grangs zla ba gnyis kyi bar du bstan te/_phyir 'gro bar bsams nas klu'i 
[\[230b.3\]]rgyal pos yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bkrol te phul nas/_skyes bu chen po yi dam la brtan pa khyod gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya'o/_/nam mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/_bdag kyang khyod kyi nye gnas bgyi'o zhes smras pa dang /_de bzhin du gyur cig smras so/_/nor bu rin po 
[\[230b.4\]]che 'di la mthu stobs ci tsam yod ces dris pa na/_nor bu rin po che 'di ni dpag tshad bzhi stong kho ra khor yug tu ci 'dod pa thams cad char bzhin du 'bebs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di snyam du rin po che 'di'i mthu stobs che mod kyi/_bdag gi bsam pa grub nus pa 
[\[230b.5\]]ma yin no snyam nas/_klu'i rgyal po'i mkhar gyi sgo'i phyi rol tu byang chub sems dpa' bskyal lo/_/de nas yang song song ba las/_rgyang ma nas gser gyi mkhar rab tu 'tsher ba zhig mthong nas/_byang chub sems dpa' de'i drung du song ste phyin pa dang /_mkhar de yang 
[\[230b.6\]]'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te/_'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pas yongs su gang ba mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' yang byams pa'i sems bskyed pas/_sbrul gyi gdug pa zhi nas de la brdzis te song ngo /_/mkhar de la yang klu gnyis shig 'khyil te mgo sgo'i phyi 
[\[230b.7\]]rol tu bstan te nyal ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas mgo bteg ste gdug pa phyung ba las byang chub sems dpas snying rje zhing byams pa'i sems bskyed pas gdug pa zhi nas de'i mgo brdzis te mkhar gyi nang du song ste/_mkhar de'i nang na klu'i rgyal pos rin po che'i 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]gzhal med khang nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyang ma nas mthong nas/_'di snyam du bdag gi gnas 'di ni 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te 'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pas gang bas klu dang gnod sbyin ma gtogs par gzhan gang yang 'ong ba'i thugs mi thub na/_mi 'di su yin 
[\[231a.2\]]gang nas 'ongs snyam nas ngo mtshar du bzung ste/_rgyang ma nas bsus te bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal te/_rin po che'i gdan la 'dug tu bcug go/_/de nas kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te/_phul nas kha zas zos pa'i 'og tu khyod su zhig gang nas 'ongs zhes dris 
[\[231a.3\]]so/_/de la byang chub sems dpas bdag ni 'dzam bu'i gling nas mchis te/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can bsod nams chung bas nor dang zas skom gyi phyir gcig la gcig rnam pa sna tshogs pas 'tshe zhing gsod do/_/mi dge ba bcu'i las rdzogs par byas pas tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan 
[\[231a.4\]]song gsum du lhung ste/_sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur bas/_bdag de dag la snying brtse ste mgon bya ba'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyod la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che slong du 'ongs so/_/klu'i rgyal pos smras pa/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni rnyed sla ba ma yin te/_skyes 
[\[231a.5\]]bu khyod bdag la re ste 'ongs na bdag gi gnas 'dir zla ba bzhi 'dug ste/_bdag gi mchod pa bzhes na rin po che yang 'bul lo/_/zhes byas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpas yang de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/zhes smras nas/_klu'i rgyal pos zla ba bzhi'i bar du kha zas ro 
[\[231a.6\]]brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te phul nas/_rol mos kyang mchod do/_/de la byang chub sems dpas chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher phye zhing bstan pas klu'i rgyal po rab tu dga' nas/_klu gzhan dang gnod sbyin gzhan la mi ltos par yo byad thams cad kyang yid bzhin du 
[\[231a.7\]]sbyar ro/_/de lta bu'i tshul du zla ba bzhi byas nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 'gro bar chas pa dang /_klu'i rgyal pos gtsug gi phud bu nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bkrol te/_byang chub sems dpa' la phul nas/_skyes bu chen po yi dam la brtan pa khyod gdon mi za 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]bar 'tshang rgya'o/_/nam mngon par sangs rgyas pa na bdag kyang nye gnas mchog tu gyur te/_bsnyen bkur byed par shog shig ces smon lam btab bo/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras so/_/nor bu rin po che 'di la mthu stobs ci tsam zhig yod ces 
[\[231b.2\]]dris so/_/klu'i rgyal pos smras pa/_nor bu rin po che 'di dpag tshad brgyad stong kho ra khor yug tu rin po che char bzhin du 'bebs te/_ci 'dod pa thams cad 'bebs so zhes smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gdod dga' nas/_'di snyam du 'dzam bu'i gling gi khyon ni 
[\[231b.3\]]dpag tshad bdun stong las med de/_nor bu rin po che 'dis ni bdag gi re ba skong ngo snyam bsams nas/_snga phyir rnyed pa'i nor bu rin po che gsum char gos kyi mthar phyung ste mkhar gyi sgor phyin pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas bskyal nas so sor dong ngo /_/byang chub 
[\[231b.4\]]sems dpa' pha zad zhig tu phyin nas/_nor bu rin po che rnams lag par thogs te/_'di skad ces smon lam btab bo/_/nor bu 'di yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yin yang dag na/_bdag nam mkha' la 'phur bar gyur cig ces smras so/_/de skad ces smras ma thag tu 
[\[231b.5\]]nam mkha' la 'phur te/_rgya mtsho'i bgegs las thar nas/_rgya mtsho'i ngogs su phyin par gyur te/_de na cung zad bsti zhing ngal bsos pa'i lam du gnyid log pa dang de'i tshe na rgya mtsho'i klu phran rnams 'di skad ces bgros so/_/rgya mtsho 'di na nor bu rin po che 'di gsum las 
[\[231b.6\]]med de gsum char mi 'dis khyer te nor bu 'di ni yon tan dang ldan na/_bdag cag la yang dgos kyi phyir brku'o zhes bgros nas/_byang chub sems dpa' gnyid kyis log pa'i tshe yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che klu rnams kyis phyir brkus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sad nas bltas na 
[\[231b.7\]]nor bu rin po che med pas 'di snyam du bsams so/_/'di ni gdon mi za bar rgya mtsho'i klus brkus kyis bdag gis mthu ci yod pas rgya mtsho'i chu bcus te bskam par bya'o snyam ste/_nor bu phyir ma thob kyi bar du lag pa stong par phyir mi 'gro snyam yi dam bcas so/_/rgya mtsho'i ngogs 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]su song ste rus sbal gyi khog pa zhig blangs nas lag pa gnyis kyis rgya mtsho'i chu bcus so/_/de'i tshe na rgya mtsho'i lhas de'i bsam pa shes nas/_de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgya mtsho 'di ni gting zab cing yangs te/_dpag tshad stong phrag sum brgya sum cu yod pas 
[\[232a.2\]]gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad log kyang rgya mtsho bskam par bya mi nus na/_khyod gcig pus nus pa lta ci smos te/_don med do/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_mi gcig gis snying nas las byas na ci yang mi 'grub pa med do/_/bdag gi rin po che de rnyed pas 'gro 
[\[232a.3\]]ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya snyam ste/_de'i bsod nams kyis mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de la sems ma zhum na ci'i phyir rgya mtsho 'di bskam par mi nus zhes smras so/_/de'i tshe na lha khyab 'jug la sogs pas rgyang ma nas byang chub sems dpa' gcig pus lus 
[\[232a.4\]]yid 'thun par rgya mtsho'i chu bcus te/_'gro ba mang po'i don du dka' ba byed par mthong nas/_de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' la btang ngo snyam bsams te/_gcig nas gcig tu sbran nas thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i gan du lhags te/_byang chub sems dpa' snod 
[\[232a.5\]]kyis chu bcu ba mthong nas/_lha de dag thams cad so so'i lha'i gos phud nas chur smyugs te/_lan cig phyir phyung bas rgya mtsho'i chu dpag tshad bzhi bcu 'grib bo/_/yang lan gnyis smyugs pas dpag tshad brgyad cu 'grib bo/_/lan gsum smyugs pas dpag tshad brgya nyi shu 
[\[232a.6\]]'grib pas/_klu de dag 'jigs skrag ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i drung du lhags te/_'di skad du thong zhig rgya mtsho'i chu skams par ma byed cig ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpas btang ngo /_/de nas klu rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la khyod kyi nor bu rin po che 'di ci 
[\[232a.7\]]zhig tu dgos smras pa/_bdag gis sems can la phan pa'i don du dgos so/_/klus smras pa/_sems can la phan pa'i don du dgos na/_rgya mtsho'i nang na yang sems can mang du yod na ci'i phyir bskur zhes smras so/_/smras pa rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas pa yang /_sems 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]can yin mod kyi/_de la phongs pa'i sdug bsngal med do/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can dag ni nor gyi phyir gcig gis gcig rnam par 'tshe zhing gnod par byed de/_mi dge ba bcu rdzogs par byed pas tshe 'phos nas kun sems can dmyal bar skye ste/_bdag ni de dag la snying 
[\[232b.2\]]brtse ba'i phyir rin po che 'di dgos so zhes smras pa dang /_klu rnams kyis nor bu rin po che phyung ste slar phul lo/_/rgya mtsho'i lhas byang chub sems dpa' de ltar brtson 'grus brtan pa mthong nas/_'di gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya'o snyam bsams te/_nam mngon par sangs rgyas pa na bdag 
[\[232b.3\]]kyang nye gnas kyi mchog tu gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas rin po che phyir thob nas steng gi nam mkha' la 'phur te/_gnas su 'ongs nas sngar tshong pa grogs po rnams dong ba yod dam/_bde bar phyin tam zhes dris so/_/tshong pa grogs po 
[\[232b.4\]]dag kyang bde bar phyin nas/_de dag gcig la gcig dga' nas/_grogs po rnams kyis ngo mtshar ya mtshan du bzung ngo /_/de nas bram ze ka pyi li'i sgor phyin nas/_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho las phyir log go zhes thos nas/_thams cad kyis sgor bsus te rab tu 
[\[232b.5\]]dga' nas/_tshong pa grogs po rnams dang bcas pa la dga' ston chen po bgyis so/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas rin po che thogs nas khyim du 'ongs pa dang /_bram ze de'i bang mdzod thams cad yongs su gang bar gyur to/_/de nas bram ze ka pyi lis rin po che sna tshogs kyis 
[\[232b.6\]]bu mo brgyan nas rin po che'i chu snod bskur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang rkang pa bkrus nas/_bu mo'i lag pa nas bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' la gtad do/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang bzhes nas/_bram ze rab tu dga' ste/_bu mo'i g.yog bu mo lnga brgya dang 
[\[232b.7\]]glang po che lnga brgya yang rin po ches brgyan te/_rol mo byas nas byang chub sems dpa' la brdzangs so/_/de'i tshe na sbyin pa chen po'i pha ma bu dang bral ba'i 'og tu rtag tu ngus pas pha ma gnyi ga'i mig mdongs par gyur te/_bu rgya mtsho nas log nas pha ma dang phrad pas/_
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]bus pha ma la phyag 'tshal te/_de la lag pa nas 'jus nas bu yin par rtogs so/_/sbyin pa chen po khyod kyis nged bor nas song ba'i 'og tu mig kyang mdongs so/_/khyod rgya mtshor song song na ci rnyed ces dris pa dang /_sbyin pa chen pos nor bu rin po che pha'i lag tu byin te/_
[\[233a.2\]]bdag gis 'di rnyed do zhes smras nas/_pha mas lag tu blangs te bsnams nas/_'di lta bu'i rdo ba ni nga'i mdzod na sngar yang mang du yod na/_'di ltar nyon mongs pa dang bsngo ci dgos zhes smras so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpas nor bu phyir blangs te/_pha ma'i mig phyis 
[\[233a.3\]]pa tsam gyis 'di ltar rlung drag pos sprin bus pa bzhin du pha ma gnyi ga'i mig kyang sngar bas gsal bar mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas pha ma gnyi ga dga' ste/_de ni nor bu rin po che yin yang dag par lta ste/_nyon mongs pa'i don sel bar gyur to zhes smras so/_/de nas sbyin 
[\[233a.4\]]pa chen pos rin po che thogs te/_khyod yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yin yang dag na/_kho bo'i pha ma'i 'og tu rin po che sna bdun gyi gdan 'byung zhing rin po che'i bla bres steng khebs par shog shig ces smon lam btab ma thag tu de bzhin grub nas/_rgyal po'i bang mdzod thams 
[\[233a.5\]]cad kyang gang bar gyur to/_/de nas rgyal pos pho nya gcig glang po che dpag tshad brgya stong du 'gro ba zhig bskyon te/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad la sbyin pa chen pos rgya mtsho nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rnyed de/_nor bu yon tan can des da ste zhag bdun na nor bu rin po che la 
[\[233a.6\]]sogs te gos dang zas dang dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad char bzhin du 'bebs kyis so so nas ci bde bar long shig ces bsgrags so/_/de ltar kun tu bsgrags nas/_sbyin pa chen pos khrus byas te/_gos gsar pa bgos nas/_ga la'i thang du mnyam por rgyal mtshan 
[\[233a.7\]]btsugs te/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas pog phor lag tu blangs te 'di skad ces smon lam btab bo/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi mi dag ni dbul phongs pa sha stag ste/_de dag la phan gdags dgos kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]rin po che yin te/_mi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]na so so nas ci dang ci dgos pa tha dad pa de dag thams cad yid bzhin du char ltar phob shig_/ces smras ma thag tu phyogs bzhi nas rlung nag po g.yos nas/_de ma thag tu mi gtsang ba'i nyal nyil thams cad phyags te/_char zim bu mi drag pa zhig bab nas/_
[\[233b.2\]]rdul mi 'thul bar byas pa'i 'og tu thog mar bza' ba dang /_btung ba ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs char bzhin du bab bo/_/de nas 'bru rnams char bzhin du bab bo/_/de nas gos char bzhin du bab bo/_/de nas rin po che char bzhin du bab ste/_/'dzam bu'i gling na nor bu 
[\[233b.3\]]rin po che'i phung pos yongs su gang nas/_rin po che dag gseg ma dang gyo mo lta bur byas so/_/byang chub sems dpas de ltar kun chog par byas nas/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can dag ni gos dang /_zas dang 
[\[233b.4\]]nor gyi phyir gcig gis gcig gsod cing rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtse bas sdig pa mi dge ba'i las 'ba' zhig byed de/_tshe'i dus byas nas ngan song gsum du lhung ste/_mun pa nas mun par 'gro ste/_bdag ni de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir rgya mtsho'i bgegs dang /_nyon mongs 
[\[233b.5\]]pa mang po khyad du bsad de/_khyed rnams bde bar bya ba'i phyir rgya mtsho nas nor bu rin po che dag blangs nas/_da khyed kun cis kyang mi brel te bde bar gyur gyis/_khyed rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la lus dang ngag dang yid bsdus te/_brtson par gyis shig ces thabs 
[\[233b.6\]]rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas bstan cing bskul lo/_/de ltar bstan cing bskul nas/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan byed du bcug pas/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de dag tshe 'phos nas/_mtho ris kyi lhar skyes so/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na de'i pha bram ze n+ya gro d+ha ni da ltar nga'i 
[\[233b.7\]]yab zas gtsang ma yin no/_/de'i mar gyur pa de ni nga'i yum lha mdzes yin no/_/sbyin pa chen po ni nga yin no/_/dngul gyi mkhar na 'dug pa'i klu de ni shA ri'i bu yin no/_/bai dUr+ya'i mkhar na 'dug pa'i klu de ni maud gal gyi bu yin no/_/gser gyi mkhar na 'dug pa'i klu de ni kun 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]dga' bo yin no/_/rgya mtsho'i lha de ni ma 'gags pa yin no/_/kun dga' bo 'di klu'i rgyal po byed pa na yang nga la bsnyen bkur byas te/_dus la mkhas pa da ltar gyi bar du yang dus la mkhas kyis/_'dod pa gsum yang yid bzhin du gnang ngo /_/zhes bka' stsal pa 
[\[234a.2\]]dang /_kun dga' bo dga' mgu rangs nas/_pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bdag gis nam 'tsho'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bgyi'o zhes gsol lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_'khor mang po rnams la la ni rgyun du 
[\[234a.3\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa nas/_dgra bcom pa'i bar du thob bo/_/la la ni rang sangs rgyas su gyur to/_/la la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/la la ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob nas/_rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/sbyin pa chen po rgya 
[\[234a.4\]]mtshor zhugs pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab n+ya gro d+ha'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pas bskor cing bzhugs pa las/_
[\[234a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan dang dpe byad dang gser gyi mdog lta bu'i sku la 'khor mang po thams cad ngo mtshar du 'dzin te/_bstod cing bsngags so/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'khor kun las 'phags te/_thams cad kyi mchog gtso bor gyur pas/_dge slong dag the 
[\[234a.6\]]tsom du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da ltar 'ba' zhig tu 'khor kun las 'phags te/_mchog gtsor gyur pa ma yin no/_/sngon 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di dag kun las 'phags te gtso bor gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[234a.7\]]dge slong dag gis sngon ci ltar gtso bor gyur pa bstan par gsol pa dang /_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sngon 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pha rol na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po chen po 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong la dbang byed pa zhig byung ste/_de la bu ni lnga brgya yod do/_/dus phyi zhig na btsun mo chen mo la bu zhig btsas te/_gser gyi mdog can skra mthon mthing lta bu lag mthil na 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i mtshan yod pa/_rkang pa g.yon gyi mthil na rta'i ri mo 
[\[234b.2\]]yod pa/_rkang pa g.yas kyi mthil na glang po che'i ri mo yod pa/_bsod nams dang ldan pa zhig btsas te/_ming yang me long gdong zhes bya bar btags so/_/rgyal po chen po nad kyis btab ste tshe'i dus byed du nye ba na/_blon po rnams kyis sras 'di rnams kyi nang na rgyal tshab 
[\[234b.3\]]tu gang gzhug_/rgyal po'i dbang gang la bskur zhes dris pa dang /_rgyal po nga'i yon tan dang mtshan rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan na/_rgyal por chug la dbang skur shig ces bsgo'o/_/bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_lus kyi mdog gser lta bu la skra mthon mthing du 'dug pa dang /_
[\[234b.4\]]lag pa gnyis kyi mthil na 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang /_rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthil na glang po che'i ri mo yod pa dang /_rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthil na rta'i ri mo yod pa dang /_rgyal po'i gos gon na lus dang 'tsham zhing mi che ba dang mi chung ba dang /_rgyal po'i stan la 
[\[234b.5\]]'dug na gzi brjid dang mthu dang ldan pa dang /_rgyal phran rnams kyis rim gro bsnyen bkur cher byed de/_btsun mo dang pho brang slas rnams kyang de la dga' zhing phyag byed pa dang /_lha rnams kyi rten du khrid na lha rnams kyis phyir phyag byed pa dang /_yon tan dang bsod nams kyi mthus 
[\[234b.6\]]rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bebs shing /_thams cad kyi yid tshim par byed pa dang /_btsun mo chen mo las btsas pa dang bcu ste/_yon tan 'di dag dang ldan na rgyal po'i dbang skur shig ces bsgo nas/_mi rtag pa mngon sum du gyur te tshe 'phos so/_/de nas rgyal bu dang blon 
[\[234b.7\]]po rnams 'dus te/_rgyal bu nang gi che ba las mthar gyi yon tan bcu gang la yod pa brtags na/_rgyal bu gzhan thams cad ni lus gser lta bu'i mdog can ma yin/_skra mthon mthing du 'dug pa ma yin/_lag pa'i mthil na 'khor lo'i mtshan yod pa ma yin/_rkang 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]pa'i mthil na glang po che dang rta'i ri mo yod pa ma yin/_rgyal po'i gos dang 'tsham pa ma yin/_rgyal po'i gdan la bzhag na dngangs pa ltar 'greng bar gyur/_rgyal phran dang /_blon po rnams bsti stang dang phyag mi byed de/_btsun mo dang pho brang slas rnams dga' ba dang /_
[\[235a.2\]]phyag bya ba ma yin/_lha rten du khrid na lha rnams kyis phyag bya ba ma yin/_rin po che'i char 'bebs pa nus pa ma yin/_btsun mo chen mo'i sras kyang ma yin te/_rgyal bu lnga brgya las mtshan gcig dang ldan pa 'ga' yang ma byung ste/_sras nang gi tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]'ba' zhig lus 
[\[235a.3\]]gser gyi mdog can la/_skra mthon mthing gi kha dog lta bu la lag pa gnyis 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ni ldan/_rkang pa gnyis kyi mthil na glang po dang /_rta'i ri mo yang yod/_gos dang lus su 'tsham/_rgyal po'i gdan la bzhag na gzi brjid dang byin che/_rgyal phran thams cad 
[\[235a.4\]]kyis bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag byed cing btsun mo dang pho brang slas kyang dga' bas phyag byed do/_/lha'i rten du 'ongs na lha rnams phyag byed/_rin po che phobs shig ces smras ma thag tu char bzhin du 'babs/_btsun mo yang nang gi chen mo las btsas te/_mtshan rdzogs par 
[\[235a.5\]]ldan pas rgyal phran dang blon po rnams kyis rgyal por dbang bskur te/_tshes bco lnga'i nyin par nyi ma thog mar shar ba na/_gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa che khyad dpag tshad gcig pa shar phyogs nas 'ongs te/_de la pus mo btsugs nas gal te bdag yon tan 
[\[235a.6\]]dang ldan te rgyal por 'gyur na/_'khor lo 'di bdag gi drung du nye bar shog shig ces smras pa dang /_nam mkha'i phyogs nas nye bar 'ongs so/_/glang po rin po che ni ri spos kyi ngad can las 'ongs te/_mjug ma la nor bus brgyan pa/_rgyal po de la zhon nas nam mkha' la 'phur 
[\[235a.7\]]te/_nyi ma phyed kyis gling bzhi las 'khor ro/_/gal te rkang pas 'gro na rkang pa'i rjes gang rigs par gser gyi bye mar gyur to/_/rta rin po che ni kha dog mthing ga la rnga rngog dmar ba rin po che sna bdun 'bab pa/_rgyal po de la zhon na zan cig bza' rin tsam gyis gling bzhi nas 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]'khor te/_mi ngal mi dub bo/_/nor bu rin po che ni 'od zer nyin mtshan du gsal te/_rgyang grags brgya nyi shu tshun cad 'od kyis snang bar byed la/_rin po che sna bdun char bzhin du 'bebs shing thams cad la sbyin par byed do/_/bud med rin po che ni bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_
[\[235b.2\]]rgyal po'i yid tshim par byed do/_/khyim bdag rin po che ni rgyal po'i rin po che sna bdun ci dgos pa yid bzhin du sbyar te/_zad mi shes par byed do/_/blon po rin po che ni rgyal pos dpung rnam bzhi bgos na/_bltas pa tsam gyis dpung gi tshogs 'dus te rtsal dang mthur 
[\[235b.3\]]ldan no/_/de ltar rin po che sna bdun dang ldan nas de 'di snyam bsams so/_/thabs 'di lta bu thob pa yang sngon gyi bsod nams las skyes kyis rgyal po'i gdung rgyud mi chad par bya'o snyam bsams nas/_spos chus khrus byas te gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos nas lag 
[\[235b.4\]]na pog phor thogs te/_shar phyogs logs su pus mo sa la btsugs nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/shar phyogs na skyes bu 'phags pa bzhugs pa rnams bdag gsol ba bzhin du gshegs su gsol zhes smras pa dang /_shar phyogs nas rang sangs rgyas nyi khri snyed rgyal 
[\[235b.5\]]po'i pho brang du gshegs so/_/lho dang nub dang byang phyogs su yang de bzhin du gsol pa dang /_de dag kyang so so nas rang sangs rgyas nyi khri snyed rgyal po'i pho brang du gshegs so/_/de nas rgyal po dang /_blon po rnams kyis yo byad rnam bzhi sbyar te mchod pa byas so/_/de nas 
[\[235b.6\]]rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed phyir yul du 'gro bar gsol te/_mchi phyag 'tshal ba na rgyal phran rnams kyis 'phags pa rnams la shas kyis/_bdag cag kyang mchod pa 'tshal te bsod nams bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal po dang blon po rnams kyis lo brgyad khri bzhi 
[\[235b.7\]]stong gi bar du rang sangs rgyas bzhi khri la yid bzhin du mchod nas/_tshe'i dus byas pa dang /_mtho ris kyi lhar skyes so/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe na rgyal po me long gdong de ni da ltar nga yin no/_/rgyal po de'i pha de ni nga'i yab zas gtsang ma yin no/_/btsun mo de ni nga'i yum 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]lha mdzes yin no/_/rgyal bu lnga brgya de ni shAkya'i rigs lnga brgya yin no/_/de'i dus na yang thams cad kyi gtso bo mchog tu gyur te/_da sangs rgyas nas kyang mtshan dang ldan pa'i mchog gtso bor gyur to/_/'khor mang po rnams sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la rjes su 
[\[236a.2\]]yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/rgyal po me long gdong gi le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o//_//bam po dgu pa/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun 
[\[236a.3\]]dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na lha sbyin rab tu byung mod kyis rnyed pa la chags pas mtshams med pa'i las kyis ri bsnyil nas sangs rgyas mnan pa dang /_zhabs la shing gi tshal ba 'dzugs pa dang /_glang po che smyon pa btang ba dang /_'thun pa'i dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed 
[\[236a.4\]]pa dang /_zag pa zad pa'i dge slong ma bsad pa dang /_mi dge ba'i las 'di dag byas nas/_skye ba phyi ma la rnam par smin pas 'jigs te/_mu stegs pa'i ston pa drug gi thad du song nas dris so/_/ston pa drug gis kyang ngan par lta ba'i chos sdig pa byas kyang sdig par mi 
[\[236a.5\]]'gyur la dge ba byas kyang bsod nams su mi 'gyur ba'i chos bstan nas/_de la yid ches te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad do/_/de'i tshe na kun dga' bos phu nu bo la snying brtse ba'i phyir rab tu mi dga' ste/_ngus nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha sbyin gti 
[\[236a.6\]]mug can ni mi dge ba'i las kha na ma tho ba bgyis te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad nas shAkya'i rigs rnams kyang sun 'byin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_lha sbyin 'di ni tshe 'di 'ba' zhig la rnyed pa dang grags pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad par ma zad kyi/_
[\[236a.7\]]'das pa'i dus na yang rnyed pa dang grags pa'i phyir lus dang srog kyang stong pa'i las byas so/_/de la dge slong dag the tshom du gyur nas/_kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha sbyin gyis 'das pa'i dus na yang rnyed pa dang grags pa'i slad du lus 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]dang srog stong pa'i las bgyis pa ci lta bu lags zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo sngon 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pha rol na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 
[\[236b.2\]]yul bA rA Na sI na bram ze ha yi zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te ring por ma lon par chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_zla ba dgu tshang ba na bu khye'u zhig btsas te/_de nas btsas ston chen po byas nas/_bu'i ming yang legs tshol zhes bya 
[\[236b.3\]]bar btags te/_ma ma la gtad nas gsos so/_/de nas yang sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_sngon ma de mnyen zhing des pa las sems can dang ldan pa'i 'og tu gtum zhing khro bar gyur to/_/de nas zla ba dgu tshang ba dang khye'u zhig btsas te/_de ltar ma yang sngon las gyur 
[\[236b.4\]]pas/_bu'i ming yang nyes tshol zhes bya bar btags te/_ma ma la gtad nas gsos so/_/khye'u spun gnyis phyis cher skyes nas/_spun gnyis rgya mtshor rin po che len par dong ngo /_/so so nas 'khor dang grogs lnga brgya lnga brgya rnyed nas lam du zhugs so/_/lam 
[\[236b.5\]]ring bas zhag bdun gyi gnas su ma phyin par rgyags chad de/_srog dang bral du nye nas/_legs tshol dang tshong pa grogs po rnams nyam thag ste/_thams cad lta brjod cing lha rnams la mchod par byed do/_/de nas 'brog stong pa de na rgyang ma nas skyed shing bzang po zhig mthong nas/_
[\[236b.6\]]thams cad skyed shing gi drung du lhags pa dang /_shing gi drung na chu mig bzang po zhig kyang yod de/_tshong pa rnams chu mig de la 'thungs nas/_bdag cag gis lha mchod pa'i rtags 'di yin no/_/zhes smras pa dang /_lhas mngon sum du smras te/_skyed shing gi yal ga chog shig 
[\[236b.7\]]dang 'dod pa thams cad 'byung ngo zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas yal ga gcig bcad pa dang /_btung ba zhim por byung ngo /_/de nas yal ga gcig bcad pa dang /_kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa thams cad byung nas/_de dag kun gyis tshim par zos so/_/de nas yang yal ga gcig 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]bcad pa dang /_gos rnam pa sna tshogs byung ngo /_/de nas yang yal ga gcig bcad pa dang nor bu rin po che sna tshogs byung ste/_khal thams cad longs so/_/de nas nyes tshol la sogs pa thams cad kyang der lhags te/_snga ma'i yal ga bcad pa las rin po 
[\[237a.2\]]che sna tshogs khal longs pa mthong nas/_'di snyam du bsams so/_/snga ma 'di dag gis yal ga las kyang rin po che chog par rnyed na/_shing 'di'i rtsa ba phyung na ni nor bu rin po che sna tshogs mang du rnyed do/_/snyam bsams nas/_shing gi rtsa ba brko bar gzas so/_/
[\[237a.3\]]de nas legs tshol mi dga' ste smras pa/_bdag cag ni phongs te srog dang bral ba las shing 'dis bdag cag gi srog gsos kyis khyod shing 'di ma gcod ces smras na nyes tshol ma nyan te shing rtsa ba bcad do/_/de nas legs tshol kyang mthong mi 'dod par khal dang bcas pa song ba'i 'og 
[\[237a.4\]]tu shing gi rtsa ba nas srin po lnga brgya byung ste/_nyes tshol dang tshong pa kun zos so/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na legs tshol de ni da ltar nga yin no/_/de'i pha de ni da ltar nga'i yab zas gtsang ma yin no/_/de'i ma de ni da ltar nga'i yum lha mdzes ma yin no/_/nyes tshol de ni da ltar lha 
[\[237a.5\]]sbyin yin no/_/kun dga' bo lha sbyin gyis da ltar 'ba' zhig nga la gnod pa byed par ma zad kyis rnyed pa dang grags pa'i phyir skye ba thams cad du nga la gnod pa byas na/_ngas phan pa'i chos bstan te phan par byas kyang /_lha sbyin ni nga la dgrar 'dzin to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[237a.6\]]de skad ces gsungs nas/_'khor mang po rnams rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/legs tshol dang nyes tshol gnyis kyi le'u ste sum cu gnyis pa'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod 
[\[237a.7\]]spungs pa'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos lha sbyin gyis thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la gnod par bya bar bsams kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pas ni lha sbyin dang sgra gcan zin 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]gnyis la mi 'dra bar med par dgongs te/_rtag tu de la thugs brtse bar mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/_lha sbyin 'dis dus 'di nyid nang la gnod pa byas par ma zad de/_skye ba gzhan 
[\[237b.2\]]du yang nga la gnod sems bskyed do/_/dge slong dag the tsom du gyur nas kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha sbyin 'dis skye ba gzhan dag na bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa ci ltar bgyis zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' 
[\[237b.3\]]bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa tshad med grangs med dpag tu med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pha rol du/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po rin po che go cha zhes bya ba rgyal phran lnga brgya la dbang byed pa zhig byung ngo /_/de la btsun mo dang pho brang 
[\[237b.4\]]gi slas lnga brgya snyed yod kyang bu med de/_nyi zla'i lha la sogs te lha thams cad la gsol ba byas te/_lo du ma lon kyang bu med pas mi dga' bar gyur te/_'di snyam du sems so/_bdag la bu ni gcig kyang med de/_de'u re tshe zad pas rgyal phran lnga brgya yang 
[\[237b.5\]]gcig la gcig mi nyan te/_thams cad 'khrugs nas/_yul mi bde bar 'gyur ro snyam nas sems khongs su chud de/_lag pa 'gram pa la brten nas 'dug pa las/_de'i tshe na lha zhig rgyal po'i bsam pa shes nas/_rmi lam du rgyal po la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/
[\[237b.6\]]pho brang gi phyi rol tshal gyi nang na/_drang srong gnyis shig yod de gcig gi lus gser gyi mdog tu 'dug gi_/de'i gan du song la gsol ba thob shig dang /_bur skye bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes bsgo ma thag tu gnyid log pa las sad nas/_drang srong gnyis gang na 'dug pa 
[\[237b.7\]]tshol du song ste/_drang srong de dang phrad nas/_bdag la rgyal po'i rigs 'tshob pa med kyis khyod bdag gi rigs su skyes te/_rigs gso shig ces gsol ba btab nas/_drang srong des kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras so/_/drang srong gcig gis kyang bdag khyod kyi 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]rigs su skye bar bya'o zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal po rab tu dga' nas/_khyod kyang bdag gi rigs su skye bar shog shig_/ces smras so/_/de nas rgyal po phyir log nas dus phyi zhig na drang srong gser gyi mdog can tshe'i dus byas nas/_btsun mo chen mo'i 
[\[238a.2\]]mngal du skyes so/_/bud med mkhas pas bu yod par shes nas bu phor shes te bdag la nges par bu pho yod do/_/zhes rgyal po la smras pa dang /_rgyal pos kyang btsun mo'i rim gro bskyed do/_/zla ba dgu tshang nas bu khye'u gser gyi mdog can/_skra mthon mthing khar 'dug pa/_
[\[238a.3\]]mtshan dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/_/rgyal po rab tu dga' nas btsas ston byas te/_mtshan mkhan gyis mtshan btags nas/_bu'i ming yang dge don du btags so/_/de nas btsun mo gcig kyang sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_drang srong cig shos kyang tshe'i dus byas 
[\[238a.4\]]nas btsun mo'i mngal du skyes so/_/de nas yang btsas ston byas te/_mtshan mkhan gyis mtshan bltas nas/_khye'u'i ming sdig don du btags so/_/rgyal po bu la byams shing sdug pas bu 'dug pa'i gnas dbyar dgun ston dpyid so sor byas so/_/khye'u cher skyes nas 
[\[238a.5\]]rig pa bco brgyad la sogs te/_gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas par gyur to/_/phyis dge don gyis rgyal po la gsol te/_bdag phyi rol tu 'chag cing ltad mo ltar 'gro'o zhes byas pa dang /_de'i pha mas kyang bu 'chag tu 'gro'o zhes lam srang phyag dar byed du bcug ste/_
[\[238a.6\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgrengs nas me tog gis gtor to/_/bdug pa dang /_spos kyis bdug pa la sogs pas yo lang bshams nas/_dge don glang po rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa la bskyon te/_dril bsgrags rdza rnga brdungs rol mo dang sil snyan dkrol te/_
[\[238a.7\]]rkya pa brgya stong snyed kyis bskor te/_grong khyer gyi phyi rol tu song ngo /_/yul mi thams cad lam gyi g.yas g.yon na khang bu brtsegs pa'i steng na mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing /_'di byin dang gzi brjid ni tshangs pa dang 'dra'o zhes bsgrags so/_/de nas song song ba las mu 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]lto ba dag cig gis gos hrul po gyon nas snod chag pa thogs te/_cung zad bslang ngo zhes 'bod pa dge don gyis thos nas/_de dag la khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar nyon mongs shing sdug ces dris so/_/de dag las kha cig ni 'di skad du bdag la pha ma dang phu nu dang bu smad dang /_gnyen 
[\[238b.2\]]bshes ma mchis pas sdug go zhes zer ro/_/de la kha cig ni bdag cag yun ring du nad kyis btab pas mi sos te sdug go zhes zer ro/_/de la kha cig ni bdag cag bag ma byas pas chom pos bcom ste ci yang mi bdog pas slongs mo byed do zhes zer ro/_/dge don gyis 
[\[238b.3\]]de skad ces smras pa thos nas/_mchi ma blags te song ngo /_/pha zad cig tsam nas shan pa dag cig srog chags bsad nas pags pa bshu ba dang /_dmyal gtub pa dag mthong nas/_dge don gyis e ma ho 'di dag ci byed ces dris pa na/_bdag cag gi pha mes rgyud 
[\[238b.4\]]kyis 'di 'dra ba'i gsad pa'i las byed de/_'di ma byas na mi 'tsho'o/_/zhes zer ro/_/de la dge don ngo tsha bar gyur te blta mi phod par song ngo /_/de nas yang pha zad phyin pa dang zhing pa dag cig zhing rmos pa'i 'og tu srin bu mang du byung ba las/_bya mang po dag sbrul gdug pa 
[\[238b.5\]]dag thu zhing za ba mthong ba dang /_'di dag ci byed ces dris pa na bdag cag ni zhing rmos te sa rlogs pa'i shul du sa bon btab nas/_phyis mang du skyes te des 'tsho zhing rgyal po'i dpya yang dbul zhes zer ro/_/dge don de la yang ngo tsha bar gyur nas pha zad song ba dang /_rngon pa bya rgya bres 
[\[238b.6\]]pa dang /_rnyi btsugs nas bya rnams bshor ba dang /_sems can dag bya rgya dang rnyi la zin nas lus rdeg cing 'then kyang ma shor te/_snying rje'i skad phyung ste/_shin tu 'jigs skrag pa dag mthong nas/_khyod 'di ci byed ces dris na bdag cag kyang rgyud kyis 'di 'dra ba 
[\[238b.7\]]gsod pa'i las byed pas 'tsho zhes zer ro/_/dge don gyis de skad ces smras pa thos nas shin tu yi mug ste/_yang pha zad song ba dang /_nya pa dag nya rgya btsugs nas mang du zin te/_thang du phung por spungs nas da dung yang 'gul ba dag mthong nas 'di dag ci byed dris na/_
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]bdag cag kyang rgyud kyi las gzhan mi byed kyis 'di ltar nya bshor zhing 'tsho bar byed do/_/zhes zer ro/_/dge don gyis de lta bu dag mthong nas 'di snyam du bsams so/_/sems can 'di dag ni dbul phongs pas bgo ba dang /_bza' ba'i phyir 'di lta 
[\[239a.2\]]bu'i kha na ma tho ba'i las gsod pa sogs byed de/_'di dag ni tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song gsum du lhung ste/_mun pa nas mun par 'gro zhing /_thar pa'i dus med do snyam du bsams nas phyir khyim du 'ongs te/_nyin mtshan du sems shing ni mi dga' nas/_pha'i drung du song ste 
[\[239a.3\]]pha la yab bdag la gsol ba zhig mchis kyis gnong shig ces smras so/_/phas kyang bu khyod ci zer khyod ci smras pa bzhin du bya'o zhes smras so/_/yab bdag sngon phyi rol tu 'chag tu mchis pa las mi mang pos gos dang /_zas kyi phyir thams cad nyon mongs te/_gcig gis 
[\[239a.4\]]gcig la gsod pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]dang /_dbang za ba dang /_mi dge ba'i las rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid par mthong nas/_de dag la sbyin pa bgyid par bsams kyis yab kyis bang mdzod chen po las brel zhing phongs pa dag gi phyir yid bzhin du spyod du gnong shig phas smras pa/_ngas 
[\[239a.5\]]rin po che dang bang mdzod mang du bsags pa thams cad khyod kyi phyir byas par zad na/_ci'i phyir khyod zer bzhin du mi nyan ces smras so/_/de nas dge don gyis phas gnang ba'i lung thob nas/_yul mi thams cad la dge don ni sbyin pa chen po byed kyis/_thams cad 'dus shing 
[\[239a.6\]]shog shig ces smras so/_/de'i tshe na dge sbyong dang bram ze dang /_dbul phongs pa mgon med pa dang /_na ba la sogs te/_grong khyer gyi phyi rol na lam thog thag gang ngo /_/de dag kyang dpag tshad brgya dang /_nyis brgya dang /_sum brgya dang /_bzhi brgya dang /_lnga brgya 
[\[239a.7\]]dang /_dpag tshad stong gi lam nas 'ongs/_kha cig ni dpag tshad nyis stong /_sum stong /_bzhi stong /_lnga stong /_dpag tshad khri'i lam nas lhags te/_sprin bzhin du 'dus nas thams cad las yid bzhin du sbyin pa ni gos 'dod pa la gos/_zas 'dod pa la zas/_
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]rin po che dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_mu sa ra gal ba dang /_bzhon pa dang /_theg pa dang /_khyogs dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_zhing dang /_rkang 'gros la sogs te/_yid bzhin du sbyin pa byas so/_/de ltar sbyin pa la zhugs te/_yun 
[\[239b.2\]]ring zhig lon pa dang /_bang mdzod sum cha ni zad nas/_mdzod srung gis rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sras kyis bang mdzod las sbyin pa bgyis nas sum cha ni zad pas/_sum gnyis tsam las ma lus na/_phan tshun 'drul ba'i skyes dang /_tshong zong ci 
[\[239b.3\]]las bgyid dgongs shig ces smras so/_/nga ni sras 'di la byams pas ngo mi zlogs kyis bang mdzod stongs kyang sla'o zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas yang ring zhig lon pa dang /_bang mdzod sum gnyis ni zad/_sum cha tsam lus pa dang /_mdzod srung gis yang rgyal po 
[\[239b.4\]]la da ni bang mdzod sum gnyis tsam ni zad/_/sum cha tsam las ma lus na/_phan tshun skyes bskur ba dang /_tshong zong ci las bgyi zhes smras so/_/rgyal pos de la bsgo ba/_nga'i sras sdug ches pas ngo mi zlogs pas smra ba mi phod kyis/_khyod kyis thabs ci legs 
[\[239b.5\]]su byos la brel cing mi khom pa ltar tha snyad thogs shig_/mdzod srung gis rgyal po las lung thob nas/_mdzod sgo bcad de/_don gnyer du song ngo /_/de nas slong ba dag dge don gyi thad du song song nas/_bar 'ga' ni mdzod srung mi snyed de mdzod sgo mi phyed/_gal 
[\[239b.6\]]te mdzod srung 'ongs na yang yid bzhin du mi ster bas/_dge don gyis 'di snyam sems so/_/'di ltar gyur pa 'di ni mdzod srung gis ni thugs mi thub kyis/_yab kyi man ngag 'ongs kyis yod yang bus ni pha'i bang mdzod stongs par byas pa'i mi rigs kyis/_bdag gis 
[\[239b.7\]]da thabs ci zhig byas na rin po che yid bzhin du rnyed de/_skye bo mang po la phan 'dogs par 'gyur snyam bsams nas/_mi dag la 'di skad ces dris so/_/'jig rten na las ci byas na/_nor dbyig mang du rnyed cing zad mi shes par 'gyur zhes dris pa dang /_kha cig ni 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]zhing cher rmos na nor dbyig mang du 'gyur zhes zer ro/_/kha cig ni rkang 'gros spel te/_spogs byas na nor mang du rnyed zer ro/_/kha cig ni lam ring por tshong spogs byas na nor mang du rnyed ces zer ro/_/kha cig ni rgya mtshor zhugs te/_nor bu rin po che 
[\[240a.2\]]blangs na rin po che mang du 'gyur ro zhes zer ro/_/dge don gyis de dag smras pa thos nas zhing rmo ba dang /_rkang 'gros spel ba dang /_lam ring por tshong pa la 'gro ba ni nga'i cha ma yin no/_/rgya mtshor 'jug pa 'ba' zhig nga'i cha yin no zhes smras nas/_rgya mtshor 
[\[240a.3\]]'jug go/_/zhes bsams te/_pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag ni rgya mtsho nas rin po che mang po blangs te/_dbul phongs pa la sbyin pa yid bzhin du bya'o/_/bdag rgya mtshor rin po che len du 'gro bar gnong shig ces smras so/_/de'i pha mas de skad 
[\[240a.4\]]ces smras pa thos nas 'khams te bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jig rten na dbul phongs pa dag blo med de/_lus dang /_srog dang bsdos nas/_'gro bar byed do/_/khyod cis phongs na/_de lta bu'i sems khyod sbyin par 'dod na/_khyim na yod pa'i nor 
[\[240a.5\]]thams cad sbyin par byos shig_/rgya mtshor ni 'gro mi rung ste/_rgya mtsho'i nang na chu rlabs dang /_dba'i glong 'khyil ba dang /_chu srin dang /_klu gdug pa dang /_srin mo dang /_ri chu'i mdog can la sogs te shin tu ya nga ba'i bgegs mang du yod pas thar dka' 
[\[240a.6\]]na/_khyod cis phongs shing srog dang sdo bar byed/_'di la ni nyan pa med kyis ma sems par 'dug cig ces bsgo'o/_/dge don gyis de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas/_bsam pa bzhin du ma grub pas yi dam bcas te/_bsam pa 'di ma grub kyi bar du/_pha 
[\[240a.7\]]ma'i mdun du sa la kha sbub tu nyal te/_mi ldang ngo snyam bsams nas/_yab dang yum gyis mkhyen par mdzod cig_/bdag ni bsam pa bzhin du ma grub kyi bar du/_kha sbub tu nyal ba 'di las mi ldang ngo zhes smras so/_/de nas pha ma mi dga' ste/_
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]gnyen bshes dang bgros te/_rgya mtsho'i nang na bgegs ya nga ba mang du yod pa'i gtam byas so/_/bdag kyang rmongs pas lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du lha kun mchod de/_khyod lta zhig nga'i bur skyes na/_nged ma bor bar zan zo shig ces zhag gcig gnyis nas zhag 
[\[240b.2\]]drug gi bar du tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gros btab kyang ma nyan te/_sngar ci smras pa las ma zlogs so/_/pha ma yang dngangs nas 'di skad ces bgros so/_/bdag gi bu thog ma btsas nas da lta tsam gyi bar du bya ba brtsams pa mthar ma grub kyi bar du mi gtong bas/_
[\[240b.3\]]rgya mtshor btang na gal te phyir log kyang srid kyis/_ma btang na zhag bdun lon nas 'phral du bye bral byed de/_da ni btang dgos so snyam bgros nas/_bu'i gan du song ste/_lag pa nas bzung nas/_bu longs la zan zo shig_/yid bzhin du 'gro bar gnang ngo zhes smras 
[\[240b.4\]]pa dang /_dge don langs te/_zan zos btung ba 'thungs so/_/de nas phyi rol tu byung ste/_mi mang po la kho bo ni rgya mtshor rin po che len du 'gro'o/_/khyod su 'gro ba dag kyang 'grogs te/_'dong gis ded dpon yang kho bos byas la yo byad kyang kho bos sbyar ro 
[\[240b.5\]]zhes bsgrags so/_/de'i tshe na yul de na tshong pa lnga brgya snyed kyis bdag cag kyang rgya mtshor rin po che len du mchi'o/_/zhes thams cad 'dus nas chas so/_/de'i tshe na yul de na ded dpon rgan po zhig sngon cad kyang rgya mtshor lan du ma zhig phyin pa yod de/_rgyal bu 
[\[240b.6\]]nyid de'i gan du song nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho bo rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i sa mkhan du 'gro dgos kyis/_khyod kyang chos shig ces bsgo ba dang /_ded dpon gyis bdag ni rgas 'khogs pa'i steng du mig gis kyang mi mthong bas/_'gro mi nus so/_/zhes smras so/_/
[\[240b.7\]]de nas rgyal bu pha'i thad du song nas/_rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ded dpon rgan po zhig mchis pa sngon cad rgya mtshor lan du ma zhig phyin te/_rgya mtsho'i rgyus mchis kyi bdag rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i sa mkhan du bka' stsol cig ces gsol pa dang /_rgyal po de 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]nyid ded dpon long ba'i gan du song nas/_ded dpon de la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/rgyal bu rgya mtshor 'gro 'dod de/_nged kyis 'gror mi rung ba'i gros de lta zhig btab na ma nyan gyis/_rgyal bu rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i sa mkhan du khyod song shig_/ces bka' stsal 
[\[241a.2\]]pa dang /_ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag rgas 'khogs pa'i steng du mig gnyis kyang mdongs mod kyis/_nga rgyal pos bka' stsal na/_bka' mi bcag go zhes gsol to/_/rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs nas/_nga'i bu dang rgya mtshor 'gro phod pa su yod ces 
[\[241a.3\]]dris pa dang /_rgyal bu sdig don yang bdag phu bo'i g.yog tu 'gro'o zhes gsol to/_/rgyal pos bsams pa/_gzhan song ba bas nu bo song na phan snyam nas/_nu bo yang 'gro bar gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal bus gser srang sum stong zhig phyung nas/_srang stong ni 
[\[241a.4\]]gru zong du byas/_srang nyis stong ni 'phral du dgos pa'i yo byad du sbyar te chas nas/_rgyal po dang btsun mo la sogs pa thams cad kyis bskyal lo/_/de nas rgya mtsho'i ngogs su phyin nas grur zhugs nas thag pa bdun gyis brtod nas/_rlung phyogs dang sbyar te 'gro ba'i tshong 
[\[241a.5\]]pa rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgya mtsho'i nang na bgegs rnam pa sna tshogs yod de/_snga phyir 'dong ba ni rab tu mang na/_phyir 'khor ba ni nyung rab bo/_/de las the tsom za ba zhig yod na phyir deng shig_/gal te lus dang /_srog la mi lta nas/_pha ma 
[\[241a.6\]]dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_gnyen bshes dag la yang ma chags te/_rin po che'i gling du phyin te/_phyir yang bde bar 'khor na bu tsha rabs bdun tshun cad nor gyis mi brel bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes bsgo nas thag pa gcig bcad do/_/de bzhin du nyi ma bdun gyi bar du 
[\[241a.7\]]nyin re lan re de skad bsgo nas/_thag pa re re bcad de rlung phyogs su bab pa la g.yor shing bsgrengs te/_mgyogs khyad mda' bzhin song ngo /_/de nas rin po che'i gling du phyin nas/_rgyal bu rin po che brtag pa la shin tu mkhas pas/_rin po che bzang ngan dang /_mang 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]nyung gi tshad kyang bstan nas so so nas rin po che tshol lo/_/ded dpon dang gnyis gru chung ngu zhig gi nang du zhugs nas/_tshong pa phal rnams der bor ro/_/de nas song song ba las ded dpon gyis da ni ri dkar po zhig snang ba'i rigs na ma mthong ngam zhes dris na/_rgyal bus kyang 
[\[241b.2\]]de 'dra ba zhig snang ngo /_/zhes smras pa dang /_de ni dngul gyi ri yin no zhes zer ro/_/de nas yang song song ba las da ni ri sngon po zhig snang ba'i rigs na mthong ngam zhes dris na/_de 'dra ba zhig snang ngo zhes smras pa dang /_de ni bai DUr+ya'i ri yin no/_/zhes smras so/_/
[\[241b.3\]]de nas yang song song ba las da ni ri ser po zhig snang ba'i rigs so zhes dris na/_ri ser po 'dra ba zhig snang ngo zhes smras pa dang /_de ni gser gyi ri yin no zhes smras so/_/de nas gser gyi ri'i drung du phyin te/_gser gyi bye ma'i steng du 'dug nas ded dpon des 'di skad ces 
[\[241b.4\]]smras so/_/bdag ni rgas zham ste da ni 'gro mi phod do/_/nga 'di nyid du tshe'i dus byas par 'gyur gyis/_khyod 'di nas song shig dang mdun na rin po che sna bdun gyi mkhar zhig dang phrad pa'i rigs kyis/_gal te mkhar sgo bcad cing 'dug na sgo drung du rdo rje'i gtun zhig yod 
[\[241b.5\]]pa'i rigs kyis/_rdo rje'i gtun gyis mkhar gyi sgo rdungs shig dang /_nang nas lha mo lnga brgya zhig so so nas/_rin po che thogs te 'bul du 'ong ngo /_/de nas lha mo gcig kyang rin po che sngon po cig thogs shing mdun du 'ong gi_/de ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 
[\[241b.6\]]yin no/_/thob ma thag tu ma shor bar dam du zung shig_/bu mo gzhan dag gi nor bu rin po che yang long shig_/dbang po rab tu sdoms la de dag la ma smra shig_/bdag ni nyam thag ste 'dir tshe 'phos na drin dran par gyis la/_'di nyid du rus bu sbas te/_song shig ces 
[\[241b.7\]]bsgo ma thag tu tshe'i dus byas so/_/de nas ded dpon gyi bus rus bu gser gyi bye ma'i nang du sbas nas/_bsgo ba bzhin du song nas ring po ma lon par rin po che sna bdun gyi mkhar gyi drung du phyin to/_/sgo yang dam du bcad pa las drung du rdo rje'i gtun blangs te/_sgo brdungs 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]pa dang sgo yang rang bye ba dang /_lha mo lnga brgya so so nas 'ong 'ong nas rin po che thogs te 'bul bar byed do/_/nang gi lha mo snga ma gcig gis lag pa na nor bu rin po che sngon po zhig thogs te/_smras pa bzhin blangs nas gos kyi tha mar phur te/_de ma thag 
[\[242a.2\]]tu phyir log go/_/rgyal bu dang bral ba'i 'og tu rgyal bu sdig don gyis tshong pa rnams la rin po che mang du long shig ces byas pas tshong pa rnams kyis mang du blangs pas rin po che [{]mangs [,]mang [}]pas gru yang bar 'ga' ni nub/_bar 'ga' ni byung nas/_rgyal bu dge don 'ba' 
[\[242a.3\]]zhig ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yod pas chur ma nub bo/_/rgyal bu sdig don skrag nas dge don la yang skyobs shig ces smras pa dang /_sdig don khrid de rgya mtsho brgal to/_/de nas skam sar phyin pa dang /_sdig don gyis phu bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_bdag 
[\[242a.4\]]cag spun gnyis pha ma dang bral te/_rgya mtshor rin po che len du song ba las ma stes te/_rin po che dang bral nas lag pa stong par khyim du 'gro ba ni ngo tsha'o/_/rgyal bu dge don rang bzhin gyis drang bas/_nu bo la bdag gis rin po che thob na ci'i phyir ngo tsha zhes smras 
[\[242a.5\]]so/_/rin po che ci lta bu zhig rnyed pa bdag la bstan du gsol zhes smras pa dang /_phu bos rin po che bkrol te nu bo la bstan to/_/nu bos rin po che mthong nas 'di snyam du bsams so/_/bdag gi pha ma yang bur 'dra ba las phu bo la byams te/_bdag la mi byams pa'i steng du 
[\[242a.6\]]bdag gnyis 'grogs te/_rin po che len du song ba las/_phu bos rin po che rnyed kyis/_bdag ni ci yang ma rnyed pas da khyim du 'ongs na bdag la pha mas de bas kyang mi byams par 'gyur gyis/_bdag gis phu bo gnyid log pa'i tshe bsad la/_nor bu rin po che 
[\[242a.7\]]khyer la 'gro'o/_/gal te pha mas dris na phu bo ni rgya mtsho'i nang du nub bo/_/zhes bya snyam bsams nas/_phu bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag spun gnyis rin po che thogs te/_gnyi ga cig car nyal ba'i mi rigs kyis/_res kyis nyal la mel 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]tse bya'o zhes smras pa dang /_phu bos kyang de bzhin bya'o zhes smras te/_spun gnyis res kyis mel tse byed do/_/de nas phu bo sngar mel tse byed pa las mel tse thun 'khor bas kyang ring zhig tu langs su ma btub bo/_/phu bos yun ring du mel tse byas nas nu bo gdod langs 
[\[242b.2\]]te phu bo yun ring du 'dug pas gnyid bro nas/_gnyid log pa'i 'og tu tshal gyi nang nas tsher ma ring po gnyis shig blangs nas/_phu bo gnyid kyis log pa'i 'og tu mig tu tsher ma re re btsugs te/_rin po che khyer nas bros so/_/dge don dngangs nas chom po byung ngo /_/
[\[242b.3\]]zhes bos na cang mi zer te/_de nas shing gi lha mo zhig gis khyod kyi chom po ni sdig don yin no zhes smras so/_/de nas dge don mig na ba ma bzod nas 'bod 'grogs te/_gog cing song song ba las yul li shi ba de dang nye bar byin pa nas ba lang rdzi'u ba lang lnga brgya 
[\[242b.4\]]tsam 'tsho ba dang phrad do/_/ba lang de'i nang nas khyu mchog cig gis rgyal bu mig mdongs pa mthong nas rgyal bu'i mig la lces bldags so/_/de nas ba lang kun kyang der 'dus pas/_/gnag rdzi yang der 'ongs nas mi zhig sa la 'gre ba mthong nas/_drung du 
[\[242b.5\]]brtags na mig tu tsher ma zug pa mthong nas/_tsher ma gnyis dal gyis phud de gnas su khrid do/_/de nas 'o ma dang snum gyis rma kha bskus nas kha zas kyis bsnyod de gsos so/_/de nas phyi zhig na rma yang bags kyis sos nas da ni 'gro'o/_/zhes byas pa dang 
[\[242b.6\]]ba lang rdzis ma btang ngo /_/de nas phyi zhig nas rma yang legs par sos nas/_da ni grong khyer 'o nir 'gro'o zhes byas nas/_mthar grong khyer dang nye bar bskyal te/_bdag la rol mo'i cha byad ki ma zhes bya ba byin cig des byas pa dang /_rdzi'us rol mo'i cha byad ki ma 
[\[242b.7\]]zhig byin no/_/de nas rgyal bus rol mo byed cing glu dang tshig snyan par byas te blangs pas/_thams cad de la nyan te/_kun gyis zas dang skom bskyal lo/_/de nas sprang po lnga brgya yang rgyal bu la brten te gsos so/_/phyis zhig na rgyal po de'i skyed mos tshal 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]srung ba zhig der 'ongs nas/_rol mo snyan pa thos nas de dag dga' ste/_khyod nga'i skyed mos tshal du rol mo byed cing skyed mos tshal yang srung na/_mi nus sam zhes dris na/_bdag gis mig long nas mi nus so zhes smras so/_/des smras pa/_khyod 
[\[243a.2\]]mig ma mthong yang bla'i/_shing gi kha na the gu la dril bu btags te/_bya'i skad grags na the gu drangs pas chog gi_/nga'i skyed mos tshal du 'dong ngo zhes smras so/_/rgyal bu de'i tshal du 'dug cing rol mo byed do/_/de'i tshe na sdig don phyir 'ongs ba dang /_
[\[243a.3\]]rgyal pos khyod kyi phu bo dang tshong pa gzhan dag ga re zhes dris na/_bdag gi phu bo dge don dang tshong pa gzhan ni nor bu rin po che mang du rnyed nas gru dang bcas te/_chur nub bo/_/bdag ni rkyal 'tshal bas bdag 'ba' zhig thar ro/_/zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal 
[\[243a.4\]]po yab dang btsun mo gnyi ga 'khams nas sa la 'gyel lo/_/yul na mi 'khod pa gzhan dag kyang de skad thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur nas mya ngan gyis brnangs so/_/rgyal po yab dang btsun mo gnyis mya ngan gyis yid gdungs nas/_sdig don khyod kyang phu bo dang lhan 
[\[243a.5\]]cig 'gro na ci nyes ces bsgo'o/_/rgyal bu dge don 'dug pa'i tshe bya ngang pa gcig gsos pa de la rgyal pos 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/rgyal bu dge don rgya mtshor rin po che len du song ba las/_rgya mtshor nub ste dge don dag ces zer te/_khyod rtog cing tshol du song 
[\[243a.6\]]shig ces bsgo ba dang /_yi ge bris te mgul du btags nas song ngo /_/de nas bya ngang pa kun tu 'phur zhing tshol tshol ba las/_skyed mos tshal de na rgyal bu'i skad grags nas/_der babs te bltas na rgyal bu der 'dug pa dang phrad do/_/rgyal bus kyang ngang 
[\[243a.7\]]pa'i skad shes pas mgul nas yi ge bkrol te klog tu bcug go/_/de nas yi ge lan bris nas sdig don gyis ci ltar mig tu tsher ma btsugs te bros pa yang zhib tu spring ngo /_/de'i tshe na rgyal po li shi bar de la bu mo 'jig rten na dkon pa zhig yod de/_bu mo skyed mos tshal du 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]'chag cing song song ba las rgyal bu dge don 'dug pa dang phrad nas rgyal bu dge don skra ni 'dzings/_gdong ni mchi mas gang /_gos ni ngan pa gon cing shing drung na 'dug pa mthong nas/_bu mo de de la chags nas phan tshun gar yang ma song bas/_de'i drung na 'dug cing 
[\[243b.2\]]gtam byas so/_/dro la bab nas rgyal pos bu mo bos na/_bdag gi 'tshal ma 'dir skyol cig_/phar mi mchi'o de nas rgyal pos yang zan bskyal ba dang /_bu mos rgyal bu la bdag cag gnyis lhan cig zan za'o zhes byas pa dang /_rgyal bus bdag long 
[\[243b.3\]]ba sprang po lags pas/_rgyal po'i sras mo dang lhan cig tu 'tshal ma 'tshal du mi rung ngo /_/gal te rgyal pos gsan na bdag la gyod mchis pas mi rung ngo /_/zhes smras so/_/bu mos smras pa/_khyod bdag dang zan lhan cig mi za na/_bdag kyang zan 
[\[243b.4\]]mi za'o/_/zhes lan du ma'i bar du smras pa dang /_de nas lhan cig zos te/_gtam legs par byas nas de la bu mo chags te/_gzhan du 'gror ma btub bo/_/de nas nyi ma nub tu nye bar rgyal pos bu mo phyir shog shig ces sbran pa dang /_bu mos phyir 'di 
[\[243b.5\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bdag ni skyed mos tshal srung ba 'di'i chung mar dga' bas gzhan su'i yang mi 'tshal lo/_/yab rgyal pos bdag gi bsam pa 'di las mi bsgyur du gsol/_zhes spring ba dang /_rgyal pos de skad ces spring ba thos nas/_bu mo'i ngo ma zlogs 
[\[243b.6\]]te/_'di ni ngo mtshar ya mtshan che'o/_/bu mo 'di rgyal po rin po che go cha'i mna' mar bslangs te/_rgyal bu rgya mtsho nas ma 'khor bar sprang po 'di lta bu zhig gi chung mar dga' ba 'di ni nga'i rigs sun te/_nga'i mgo yang 'deg tu med pa 'di ngo mtshar che zhes yang 
[\[243b.7\]]'bod du btang ba las bu mo'i tshig snga ma las ma gyur te 'gro ru ma btub bo/_/de nas rgyal pos bu mo la byams pas ngo ma zlogs nas/_gnyi ga bsus te pho brang nang du khrid nas khyo shug tu bsdus so/_/de nas zhag du ma zhig lon pa dang /_bu mo nyin par rtag tu song 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]zhing nub mo phyir 'ongs pas/_rgyal bu dogs pa skyes te/_chung ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod bdag gi chung ma bya zhes khyo shug tu 'dus na/_nyin par ni rtag tu 'gro'o/_/mtshan mo 'ba' zhig ni phyir 'ong na/_'dir mi rtag pa la phyir bltas na/_
[\[244a.2\]]khyod gzhan du sems pa yod par nges so zhes smras pa dang /_bu mos dam bcas pa bdag ni khyod 'ba' zhig la sems te/_bsam pa gzhan na ba spu tsam yang med do/_/bdag gis smras pa'i tshig bden na/_bden par smras pa 'dis khyod kyi mig ya gcig mthong bar 
[\[244a.3\]]gyur cig_/ces smras ma thag tu mig ya gcig mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas gtam de dag glengs nas/_rgyal bu la khyod kyi pha ma dang yul gang na 'dug ces dris pa dang /_rgyal bus chung ma la smras pa/_khyod kyi rgyal po rin po che go cha zhes bya ba zhig thos sam/_
[\[244a.4\]]chung mas smras pa/_bdag gis thos so/_/'o na de ni nga'i pha yin no/_/rgyal bu dge don zhes bya ba thos sam/_chung mas smras pa thos so/_/'o na rgyal bu dge don ces bya ba ni bdag yin no zhes smras pa dang /_chung ma dngangs nas/_'o na ci'i phyir 'di ltar nyon mongs par gyur zhes dris 
[\[244a.5\]]pa las/_rgyal bus ci ltar gyur pa zhib tu gtam byas pa dang /_bu mos rgyal bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal bu sdig don gyis khyed kyi mig phyung ba 'di ni 'jig rten gang na yang mi srid na/_khyod de dang phrad na ji ltar bya snyam/_rgyal bus smras pa/_sdig don 
[\[244a.6\]]gyis nga'i mig phyung ba nyes mod kyi/_bdag de la cung zad tsam mi dga' ba'am 'khon du 'dzin pa med do/_/chung mas smras pa/_bdag shin tu yid ches par dka' bas gnod pa 'di lta bu byas pas mi dga' ba med ces smras pa ni/_tshig tu mi rung ngo /_/rgyal bus 
[\[244a.7\]]smras pa/_bdag ni rgyal bu sdig don la mi dga' ba spu nyag ma tsam yang med do/_/bdag gi tshig 'di bden na bden pa'i tshig gis mig 'di ya gcig kyang mthong bar gyur cig_/ces smras pa dang /_mig ya gcig kyang gsal bar mthong bar gyur to/_/
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]de ltar rgyal bus mig gnyi gas kyang mthong nas mtshan dang dbyibs kyang gzhan pas lhag par che bas/_bu mo dga' bas yab rgyal po gang na 'dug par song ste/_'di skad ces smras so/_/yab rgyal po rin po che go cha'i sras rgyal bu dge don mkhyen tam/_rgyal pos 
[\[244b.2\]]smras pa/_ngas shes so/_/'o na rgyal po gzigs bzhed dam/_rgyal bu de da ltar ga re blta'o zhes pa dang /_bus mos smras pa/_da ltar bdag gi khyim thab bgyid pa nyid lags so zhes gsol to/_/rgyal pos bu mo la bgad de/_bu mo 'di smyos sam/_
[\[244b.3\]]'on te mi dran nam ci nyes/_rgyal bu de ni rgya mtsho nas phyir ma 'khor na sprang po la rgyal bu dge don yin zhes smra/_bu mos yang gsol pa/_thugs mi ches na brtag tu gsol zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal po bltar phyin pa na rgyal bu dngos yin te/_lto ba sa la phab 
[\[244b.4\]]nas bdag gis ngo ma shes pa nongs kyis 'gyod do zhes smras so/_/de nas rgyal po des gsangs te rgyal bu dge don lam srang zhig tu bskyal nas/_dge don rgya mtsho nas gdod 'khor ba skad bsgrags te/_blon po rnams dang rgyal bu dge don bsus nas pho brang du 'ongs pa dang /_
[\[244b.5\]]gdod bu mo yang chung mar byin pa skad du bsgrags so/_/de'i tshe na bya ngang pa yang yi ge dang phyir yul du phyin te/_yi ge bklags nas rgyal bu dge don yang 'dug par shes nas sdig don yang btson du bzung /_rgyal po li shi bar gyi steng du yang pho nya btang nas/_nga'i bu 
[\[244b.6\]]dge don khyod kyi yul na 'ongs te nyon mongs shing 'dug pa thos kyis/_sngar ma sbran pa yang nyes so/_/da yang glang po che dang rta'i tshogs mang pos skyol cig_/ma bskyal na nga nyid kyang 'ong ngo zhes spring ngo /_/de'i tshe na rgyal bu dge don gyis phyugs rdzi'i drin dran nas/_
[\[244b.7\]]phyis rgyal po li shi bar la gsol nas/_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_gos dang /_khang khyim dang /_zhing dang /_'brog dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_rin po che dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa'i mi la sogs te/_bya dga' mang du byin 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]nas tshe gcig tu bde skyid par byas so/_/de nas rgyal po rin po che go cha'i pho nya yang der phyin nas/_rgyal po li shi bar gyis glang po lnga brgya zhig rin po ches brgyan to/_/g.yog lnga brgya dang /_bu mo'i g.yog gzhon nu lnga brgya dang /_shing rta lnga brgya snyed kyang 
[\[245a.2\]]brdzangs/_rgyal po nyid kyang blon po dang bcas te/_'khor brgya stong du mas rol mo sna tshogs byas te bu mo bskyal lo/_/pho nya sngar phyin nas rgyal po rin po che go cha yang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te rgyal bu bsu'o/_/rgyal bu dang phrad pa'i tshe bzhon pa las babs nas pha ma 
[\[245a.3\]]la phyag 'tshal nas/_lag pa nas 'jus te/_snyun gsol nas rol mo byas te pho brang du dong ngo /_/de nas rgyal bu dge don gyis sdig don ga re zhes smras pa dang /_da ltar btson du bzung ngo zhes smras so/_/de nas rgyal bu sdig don thong shig ces smras pa dang /_
[\[245a.4\]]nyes pa chen po byas kyis gtang du mi rung ngo zhes bsgo'o/_/de ltar rgyal bu sdig don ma btang na bdag kyang pho brang du mi mchi'o zhes gsol nas/_sdig don yang btang ngo /_/de nas rgyal bu sdig don yang phu bo la phyag 'tshal zhing bsur 'ongs nas zhes zer ro/_/spun 
[\[245a.5\]]gnyis gcig la gcig 'jus te/_nu bo la sngar bas kyang lhag par byams par gyur bas thams cad ngo mtshar du 'dzin to/_/de nas pho brang gi nang du 'ongs nas rin po che ga re zhes bags kyis dris na/_'ongs pa'i lam du sa rkos pa'i nang du sbas so/_/de nas len 
[\[245a.6\]]du btang nas ma rnyed pa las/_dge don dang 'grogs te gnas su phyin ma thag tu dge don gyis mthong nas rnyed do/_/de nas rin po che rnams rnyed de/_pho brang du 'ongs nas rgyal phran lnga brgya kun la re re byin te/_gcig pu zhig bzhag pa lag tu thogs te/_'di skad 
[\[245a.7\]]ces smon lam btab bo/_/rin po che 'di nyid yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yin yang dag na/_bdag gi pha ma 'dug pa'i khri rin po che sna bdun gyi khrir gyur cing /_rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs kyang yod par gyur cig ces smras ma thag tu de bzhin du gyur to/_/de 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]nas yang 'di skad du rgyal po'i bang mdzod dang blon po'i bang mdzod las bdag gis sngon sbyin pa bgyis te/_god pa'i rnam pa thams cad phyir gang bar shog shig ces smras nas/_de phyogs su bstan pa tsam gyis bang mdzod thams cad rin po ches yongs su gang bar gyur to/_/
[\[245b.2\]]de nas dril bsgrags te da phyin cad zhag bdun na rgyal bu dge don rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bebs kyis/_thams cad 'dus shig ces bsgo nas/_rgyal bu dge don spos chus lus bkrus te gos gsar pa gtsang ma gyon te/_rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la yid bzhin 
[\[245b.3\]]gyi nor bu rin po che btags te/_lag na pog phor thogs te/_phyogs bzhir phyag 'tshal nas/_'di skad ces smras so/_/nor bu 'di yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yin yang dag na/_thams cad ci 'dod pa thams cad yid bzhin phob shig ces smras ma thag tu/_
[\[245b.4\]]phyogs bzhi nas sprin langs nas sprin rlung gis mi gtsang ba thams cad phyag dar byas te/_thog mar char zim bu babs nas rdul mi ldang bar byas so/_/de nas kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs bab bo/_/de nas gos rnams bab bo/_/de nas rin po che sna 
[\[245b.5\]]bdun babs nas yul thams cad gang ngo /_/de'i tshe na thams cad kyis rin po che dang gser 'dra ba'i sems su gyur nas/_de nas rgyal bus 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/khyod kyi dgos pa thams cad yid bzhin du thob nas/_/da ni phongs shing brel ba med par gyur 
[\[245b.6\]]gyis/_so so nas lus dang ngag yid bsdams te/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la brtson par gyis shig ces bsgo nas/_thams cad kyis bsgo ba bzhin du/_dge ba bcu la nan tan byas te/_sdig pa ma byas pas tshe 'phos nas mtho ris kyi lhar skyes so/_/kun 
[\[245b.7\]]dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po rin po che go cha ni da ltar nga'i yab zas gtsang ma yin no/_/rgyal po'i btsun mo de ni da ltar nga'i yum lha mdzes yin no/_/rgyal bu dge don ni da ltar nga yin no/_/rgyal po li shi bar ni da ltar 'od srung yin no/_/de'i tshe na rgyal bu'i chung 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]mar gyur pa de ni da ltar skye dgu'i bdag mo yin no/_/rgyal bu sdig don ni da lta lha sbyin yin no/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi mi la nga'i drin gyis khyab pa ni nga thog mar sangs rgyas pa na/_lha'i sras po brgyad khri 'ongs pa dang /_nga'i nye gnas lung bstan pa 
[\[246a.2\]]rnams yin no/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na de ltar nga la gnod pa chen po byas kyang de la snying brtse ba'i sems bskyed na/_da mngon par sangs rgyas nas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ni zad/_thugs rje chen pos rgyas par khyab pas na/_gnod pa cung zad byas 
[\[246a.3\]]pa la thugs brtse ba lta ci smos/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs nas/_'khor mang po la la ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa dang dgra bcom pa thob bo/_/kha cig ni rang sangs rgyas su gyur/_kha cig ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/
[\[246a.4\]]de skad ces gsungs pa la thams cad rjes su yi rangs te mngon par dga'o/_/rgyal bu dge don gyi le'u ste sum cu gsum pa'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 
[\[246a.5\]]tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na yul de na sprang po lnga brgya zhig rtag tu sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun la brten te 'tsho'o/_/phyis nas sprang po de dag 'di 
[\[246a.6\]]snyam du bsams so/_/da bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo snyam nas/_sangs rgyas gang na ba der lhags te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag cag ni sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun gyi thugs rjes 'tsho bar gyur te/_
[\[246a.7\]]bdag cag rab tu byung ngo zhes gsol pa dang /_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ngas bstan pa'i chos ni rnam par dag pa ste/_btsan nyan dang phyug dbul med de/_dper na chu dang 'dra bas na/_btsan nyan dang phyug dbul bzang 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]ngan kun 'khru ste/_chus bkrus na mi dag pa med do/_/dper na me dang 'dra ste/_ri dang brag dang gnam sa'i bar na dngos po chen po dang /_chung ngu yang mi 'tshig pa med do/_/gzhan yang nga'i chos ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ste/_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_
[\[246b.2\]]khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_phyug po dang /_dbul po gang su yang rung mi chud pa med do/_/yid bzhin du spyod du gnang ngo /_/zhes sprang po lnga brgyas thos nas/_dga' mgu rangs par gyur te/_lhag par sangs rgyas la rab tu byung ngo /_/zhes gsol pa dang /_
[\[246b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par 'ongs so/_/zhes bka' stsal pa tsam gyis/_skra dang kha spu rang byi ste ngur smrig gyon pa'i dge slong du gyur nas bsnyen par rdzogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pas lus dang sems rnam par grol te/_zag pa 
[\[246b.4\]]zad nas dgra bcom par gyur to/_/de'i tshe na yul de na gnas pa'i khyim bdag dang /_tshong dpon rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams mu lto ba dag sangs rgyas kyis rab tu phyung ngo zhes thos nas brnyas shing dpyas par gyur te/_'di skad du gal te bcom ldan 'das dang /_
[\[246b.5\]]'phags pa'i dge 'dun spyan 'dren cing bsod nams byed na/_rigs ngan mu lto ba dag rab tu phyung ba de dag ci lta bur bdag gis stan la bzhag cing snod la 'bag par bya ba zhes smras so/_/de'i tshe na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyis sangs rgyas dang /_dge 'dun rnams 
[\[246b.6\]]bshos la spyan drangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas dang /_dge 'dun rnams spyan 'dren gyis/_mu lto ba gsar zhugs pa rnams ni ma lags so/_/phyi nyin du gdugs tshod la bab nas/_sangs rgyas dang /_dge 
[\[246b.7\]]'dun spyan 'dren nas gshegs pa dang /_mu lto ba'i dge slong ma bos pa rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyod ni yon bdag gis ma bos kyis byang sgra mi snyan du deng la sa bon ma btab ma rmos par skyes pa'i 'bras longs la/_yon bdag gi khyim du zar 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]shog shig ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong de dag bka' stsal pa bzhin du dgra bcom pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis byang gi sgra mi snyan du song song nas/_'bras kyis lhung bzed bkang nas/_spyod lam mdzes par steng gi nam mkha' la ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar rgyal 
[\[247a.2\]]bu rgyal byed kyi khyim du lhags nas/_rim bzhin du 'khod de 'bras la za'o/_/de'i tshe na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyis dge slong de dag spyod lam mdzes par rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' las 'ongs par mthong ste/_lhag par dga' rangs te ngo mtshar du gyur nas/_
[\[247a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di lta bu'i 'phags pa gzi brjid dang /_yon tan dang ldan pa spyod lam mdzes par lhags pa phyogs gang nas mchi zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'di dag shes par 
[\[247a.4\]]'dod na legs par nyon cig dang /_khyod la bstan par bya'o/_/dge slong 'di dag ni rgyal bus ma bos pa'i dge slong rnams yin te/_rgyal bus ma bos pas so so nas byang gi sgra mi snyan du 'bras blangs nas za ba yin no/_/de nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyis de skad 
[\[247a.5\]]ces gsungs pa thos nas/_shin tu ngo tsha zhing 'gyod de/_bdag ni gti mug gis mdongs pas 'phags pa ngo ma 'tshal to zhes smras nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_sprang po 'di dag 
[\[247a.6\]]ni yul 'di dag na shin tu yang rigs chung zhing ngan pa lags na/_'dir 'jig rten 'di'i bde ba yang thob la yun ring po'i don yang rnyed par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du gshegs pa ni don 'di dag 'ba' zhig gi slad du gshegs so/_/gzhan yang bcom 
[\[247a.7\]]ldan 'das sprang po dag sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba ci bsrungs shing /_bsod nams kyi las gang la nan tan bgyis pas/_bcom ldan 'das dang phrad de/_rnam par grol bar gyur/_sdig ci bgyis na thog mar btsas nas sprang por skyes nas dbul phongs par gyur/_
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed la bka' stsal pa/_sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'das pa'i pha rol na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir grong khyer bA rA Na sI zhes bya ba na ri drang srong lhags zhes bya ba na sngon yang rang sangs rgyas mang po 
[\[247b.2\]]bzhugs te/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten na ma gshegs na yang /_rang sangs rgyas de na gnas te/_ri de la rang sangs rgyas med na yang lnga mngon par shes pa'i drang srong dag gnas so/_/de'i tshe na de la drang srong nyis stong zhig gnas te/_phyi zhig na ltas 
[\[247b.3\]]mkhan dag gis lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du char chu mi 'bebs so/_/zhes lung bstan pa dang /_de'i tshe na yul de na khyim bdag phyug po zhig longs spyod dang ldan pa sdums byed ces bya ba'i drung du song ste/_khyim bdag de la bdag cag rab tu byung ba drang srong stong po 'di 
[\[247b.4\]]dag lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du zas dang skom yod dam/_smras pa/_bdag cag la mchis kyis 'phags pa rnams gud du ma gshegs par bzhugs su gsol lo/_/de nas yang drang srong stong yang lhags nas/_khyim bdag sdums byed la bdag cag la lo bcu gnyis 
[\[247b.5\]]kyi bar du zas dang skom dgos so zhes smras pa dang /_khyim bdag gis bang mdzod srung ba la 'phags pa 'di rnams kyi 'tsho ba lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du 'byor tam zhes dris nas/_mdzod srung gis 'byor to zhes gsol pa dang /_khyim bdag des drang srong nyis 
[\[247b.6\]]stong gi 'tsho ba sbyar ba'i las mi lnga brgya bskos nas/_bsod snyoms sbyor du bcug go/_/de'i tshe na las mi dag bsod snyoms kyi g.yos byed pa la yun ring bar gyur te skyo bas/_'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag 'di ltar rtag tu nyon mongs par gyur pa ni sprang po 
[\[247b.7\]]'di dag gi phyir ro zhes smras so/_/de'i tshe na khyim bdag des rtag tu gdugs tshod la rtag tu spyan 'dren pa'i las mi gcig cig bskos so/_/spyan 'dren de la khyi zhig yod de/_/khyi de rtag tu spyan 'dren gyi phyi bzhin du song ba las/_nyin gcig spyan 'dren brjed pa dang /_
[\[248a\]]
