[\[248a.1\]]khyi de gdugs tshod kyi dus su drang srong de dag gi drung du song nas/_skad chen po phyung ste zug pa dang /_drang srong de dag kyang khyi zug pa thos nas/_gdugs tshod la bab par shes te/_bsod snyoms la gshegs so/_/phyi zhig na drang srong de dag bsod 
[\[248a.2\]]snyoms kyi bya ba byas nas khyim bdag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag da ni char 'ong gis zhing pa dag zhing gi las byed du chug shig ces bsgo ba dang /_khyim bdag gis kyang zhing pa rnams zhing gi las byed du bcug ste/_nas dang /_gro dang /_'bru mang po rmos 
[\[248a.3\]]so/_/de nas phyi zhig na 'bru rmos pa'i rnam pa thams cad ku bar skyes nas khyim bdag ya mtshan du gyur te/_drang srong rnams la 'di dag don med par mi 'gyur ram zhes smras pa dang /_drang srong gis smras pa/_don med par mi 'gyur gyis dus su char chu 'bab 
[\[248a.4\]]pa la sogs te/_las byos shig ces smras so/_/phyis ring po ma lon par ku ba kun cher skyes nas bkas te bltas nas/_ci dang ci rmos pa bzhin du de dang /_de dag ku ba'i nang kun gang bar skyes te/_khyim bdag rab tu dga' mgu rangs nas bang ba kun 
[\[248a.5\]]gang bar gyur to/_/las byed pa'i mi lnga brgya po yang de lta bu dag mthong nas/_'gyod pa'i sems skyes nas/_bdag cag gis ni tshig ngan pas 'phags pa la smad do zhes 'gyod tshangs byas te/_so so nas bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'phags pa dang 
[\[248a.6\]]phrad nas/_rnam par grol bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/sprang po lnga brgya po 'dis tshig ngan smras pas skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du rtag tu sprang por gyur to/_/'gyod tshangs byas te smon lam btab pas/_nga dang phrad de 'khor ba'i mthar phyin to/_/rgyal bu 
[\[248a.7\]]'di ltar rig par bya'o/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag phyug po sdums byed de ni nga yin no/_/bang mdzod srung ba de ni rgyal bu rgyal byed yin no/_/nyin gcig bzhin du spyan 'dren mi de ni rgyal po u dra ya na yin no/_/de'i tshe na khyi de ni khyim bdag skad snyan yin te/_/
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]de'i dbang gis skye ba thams cad du skad snyan par gyur to/_/de'i tshe na las byas pa'i mi lnga brgya po ni dgra bcom pa lnga brgya po 'di dag yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs nas/_'khor mang po rnams kha cig gis ni 'bras bu dang po thob pa nas 'bras 
[\[248b.2\]]bu bzhi pa'i bar du thob par gyur to/_/kha cig gis bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/khyim bdag sdums byed kyi le'u ste sum cu bzhi pa'o//_//
[\[248b.3\]]bam po bcu pa/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/skye bo mang po la dam pa'i chos bstan to/_/de'i tshe na grong khyer gyi mi kun 
[\[248b.4\]]chos nyan du chas pa dang /_grong de na bram ze long ba cig lam ka na 'dug pa las mi mang po song ba las khyod myur bar gar 'dong zhes dris so/_/mi rnams kyis smras pa/_khyod ci ma thos sam de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du byung ste/_da ltar yul 'di na bzhugs 
[\[248b.5\]]shing chos ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du byung ba dang phrad par shin tu dka' bas/_bdag cag ni sangs rgyas la chos nyan du 'gro'o zhes zer ro/_/bram ze de skad rnam pa brgyad la shin tu mkhas pa zhig ste/_skad du phyung ba tsam gyis dbang thang dang 
[\[248b.6\]]tshe ci thub pa rtogs so/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_bya bang lta bu'i skad dang /_khwa lta bu'i skad dang /_skad 'dzer 'dzer po dang /_glang po che'i skad dang /_rnga'i skad dang /_'brug gi skad dang /_dril gyi skad dang /_tshangs pa'i skad dang brgyad do/_/bya bang lta bu'i 
[\[248b.7\]]skad smra ba ni/_khrel ltas med pa drin du mi gzo'o/_/khwa lta bu'i skad du smra ba ni khro zhing gtum la gsod pa la dga' zhing snying rje med pa'o/_/skad 'dzer 'dzer po ni pho dag mo'i skad du smra ba dang /_mo dag pho'i skad du smra ba ste/_de ni dbang thang med cing dbul ba dang 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]ma rabs so/_/glang po che'i skad lta bur smra ba ni/_rang bzhin gyis drang zhing bshes gnyen la phan 'dogs par sems so/_/rnga skad lta bur smra ba ni smra mkhas la blo myur zhing rig pa 'dzin te rgyal po'i brten pa'o/_/'brug skad lta bur smra ba ni 
[\[249a.2\]]mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan zhing chos mkhas so/_/dril skad du smra ba ni/_phyug cing longs spyod dang ldan la gser srang brgya stong mang po bdog pa'o/_/tshangs pa'i skad du smra ba ni/_bsod nams dang dbang thang chen po dang ldan te/_khyim na 'dug cing 'khor los 
[\[249a.3\]]sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/rab tu byung na ni gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya'o/_/de'i tshe na bram ze des mi rnams la bdag ni skad la shin tu mkhas te/_yang dag par sangs rgyas yin na/_tshangs pa'i skad dang ldan pa'i rigs kyis/_kho bo yang khrid la 
[\[249a.4\]]'grogs te 'dong ngo /_/de dag gis kyang bram ze long ba de khrid de song song ba las/_phyogs der nye bar 'ongs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i dbyangs de thos nas long ba dga' mgu rangs nas dad pa skyes te/_mig gnyis rang bye nas sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[249a.5\]]sku gser gyi mdog can mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/_nyi ma'i 'od ltar shin tu gsal bar mthong nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_tshad med pa'i dga' ba skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan te/_spro ba 
[\[249a.6\]]bskyed pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i las khri phrag nyi shu zad de/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas/_shes rab kyi mig dang ldan par gyur te/_bstan pa la rab tu byung bar gsol lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par 'ongs so zhes bka' stsal 
[\[249a.7\]]nas/_dge slong du gyur te ci rigs pa'i chos bstan pas dgra bcom par gyur to/_/'khor mang po the tsom du gyur nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'dug pa stan las langs nas/_thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]ldan 'das 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad pa mdongs pa thams cad la thugs rje'i nang na/_bram ze dmus long 'di la lhag par thugs rje che'o/_/bram ze mdongs pa gcig sha'i mig kyang thob la shes rab kyi mig kyang thob par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[249b.2\]]kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_bram ze long ba 'di la dus 'di 'ba' zhig tu mig byin par ma zad do/_/'das pa'i dus na yang mig byin no/_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i dus na ci lta bu'i mig stsal ba legs par bstan 
[\[249b.3\]]du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pha rol na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yul pu ka la da zhes bya ba na/_rgyal po mig 'byed ces bya ba zhig yod de/_rgyal po de 
[\[249b.4\]]brag dang /_rtsig pa la yang thogs pa med par dpag tshad bzhi bcu tshun chad mthong bas mig 'byed ces bya bar btags te/_'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong kun la dbang byed do/_/rgyal po de la btsun mo dang /_pho brang gi slas nyi khri yod de/_
[\[249b.5\]]rgyal bu lnga brgya snyed yod do/_/rgyal tshab ni tshul khrims bzang po zhes bya ste/_rgyal po de tshul bzhin du rgyal po byed pas/_sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar sems te/_rlung dang char las dus mi yol bas lo tog legs te thams cad bde skyid 
[\[249b.6\]]do/_/de nas rgyal po de dben pa zhig na 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/_/bdag tshe snga ma'i bsod nams kyis mi'i rgyal por gyur te/_nor bu rin po che dang longs spyod chen po dang ldan zhing thams cad kyi ngag mnyan na/_ci ltar rtswa 'jam po rlung gis btab na phyogs 
[\[249b.7\]]gcig tu nyal ba bzhin no/_/tshe 'di la yang phyi ma'i 'bras bu ma bskyed na/_sdug bsngal bar 'gyur te/_dper na zhing pa thams cad dag dpyid mang du rmos na/_ston mang du bsdur yod pas/_bdag kyang tshe 'dir dpyid sa bon ma btab na/_tshe phyi mar ston 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]bsdur med pas da ni le lo bya bar mi rigs kyi/_bsod nams kyi zhing la sa bon rgyas par btab bo/_/snyam bsams nas/_blon po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga'i dkor mdzod thams cad phyung la grong khyer gyi sgo dang /_lam srang mi 
[\[250a.2\]]mang po 'du ba'i gnas su thams cad spungs la 'gro ba mang po la sbyin par bya'o/_/rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bang mdzod thams cad kyang yid bzhin byin cig ces bsgo nas/_gser gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ngo /_/dril chen po bsgrags te/_'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[250a.3\]]gi dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang dbul phongs pa dang /_rgas pa dang na ba'i rnam pa thams cad 'dus shig_/ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de thams cad yid bzhin du sbyin no zhes bsgrags so/_/de'i tshe na 'bangs thams cad kyang rgyal po chos bzhin byed pa de la dga' ste/_
[\[250a.4\]]bstod cing snyan par bsgrags te/_mtha' 'khob kyi rgyal phran pa la da bar ne zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po de'i bka' mi nyan pa zhig yod de/_chos ma yin pas rgyal po byed do/_/rgyal phran de la blon po mkhas pa blo gros dang ldan pa lo da ra zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_blon pos 
[\[250a.5\]]rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rgyal po ni yid thung la gtum ste/_snga bsam phyi mno med par phyis 'gyod par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po mig 'byed ni shin tu snying rje dang ldan pas/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad la drin gyis khyab ste/_rgyal po thams cad de'i 
[\[250a.6\]]bka' nyan na/_rgyal po 'ba' zhig gis de la bsngo ba mi rigs kyi/_de'i bka' nyan na bu tsha rgyud du bde'o zhes gsol pa dang /_phyir blon po de la khros te gros ma nyan to/_/de nas blon po de yang mi dga' nas 'di snyam du bsams so/_/rgyal pos chos ma yin pa 
[\[250a.7\]]dang mi rigs pa byas pas/_bdag gi phan pa'i gros btab na khros te ma nyan to/_/rgyal po 'di la ni 'bangs thams cad mi dga' bas med par bya'o snyam bsams nas/_gros byas pa las gsang shor nas rgyal pos dmag bzlog nas 'dzin du bcug go/_/blon po 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]des kyang 'phrigs nas/_rta mgyogs pa la zhon nas bros so/_/dmag gi dpung gi phyi bzhin bdas te slebs pa dang /_blon po de 'phongs skyen pa zhig pas 'phral du mi [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga mda' 'phangs te bsad do/_/de nas snyegs mas yang snyegs ma nus pas blon po de yang mig 
[\[250b.2\]]'byed kyi yul du phyin to/_/rgyal po mig 'byed la phyag 'tshal nas gtam byas te/_rgyal po dga' bas de yang blon por bcug go/_/de nas rgyal po de bka' mi nyan to/_/zhes gsol nas/_blon po rnams la rgyal po de nga dbang ba la ma gtogs sam/_zhes dris na/_
[\[250b.3\]]de la rgyal po mi dbang ngo zhes gsol to/_/de nas blon po des dpung gi tshogs bsdus te/_rgyal po de dbab par gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos kyang de bzhin gnang ngo /_/de nas dpung gi tshogs mchog rnams bsdus te/_pa la da bar ne'i yul du 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i 
[\[250b.4\]]zhag dus bgros so/_/de'i tshe na rgyal po des kyang dpung gi tshogs bdag gi yul du 'ong ngo zhes thos nas rab tu mi dga' ste/_sems khongs su chud nas ci bya'i gtol med de/_gos dri ma can bgos nas mun khung du zhugs so/_/de'i tshe yul de na bram ze ma rungs pa zhig 
[\[250b.5\]]yod pa des rgyal po la khyod cis mi dga' na 'di ltar mya ngan byed ces dris pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_khyod ma thos sam/_kho bo'i blon po lo dar bros pas/_rgyal po mig 'byed kyi yul du song nas/_phyir kho bo'i yul du dmag 'dren no zhes zer bas mi dga'o/_/
[\[250b.6\]]gal te dmag 'dren na/_bdag cag kyang med par 'gyur zhes smras pa dang /_bram zes smras pa/_blon po rnams bsdus shig dang gros bgyi'o zhes gsol to/_/de nas blon po dang bram ze 'dus te bgros nas bram zes smras pa/_rgyal po mig 'byed de bdag gi 
[\[250b.7\]]pha ma ma gtogs par gzhan ci la yang mi chags te/_sbyin pa byed do zhes thos kyis/_yul 'di na bram ze long ba zhig yod pa des/_rgyal po de la mig ya gcig slong du btang ngo /_/gal te mig sbyin na dmag kyang mi 'dren par 'gyur ro zhes bgros te/_rgyal po la 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas/_bram ze long ba 'bod du btang ngo /_/bram ze long ba 'ongs nas/_rgyal pos long ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho bos khyod la bsgrub tu gsol ba zhig yod kyis khyod kyis bya dgos so 
[\[251a.2\]]zhes bsgo ba dang /_bram zes smras pa/_bdag mig gnyi ga long na ci zhig bsgrub tu yod ces gsol to/_/rgyal pos bsgo ba rgyal po mig 'byed dpung gi tshogs bshams te/_'dir 'ongs pas kho bo ni gzhon pas bros kyang thar na/_khyod mig med pa gar bros pa'i 
[\[251a.3\]]sa yang med pas/_rgyal po des sbyin pa gtong ba la pha rol gyi yid 'thun par gtong ngo zhes grag gi_/khyod song la de la de'i mig slong shig dang /_gal te ster na dmag kyang mi 'ong bar 'gyur gyis/_khyod de la mig slong du song shig ces bsgo ba dang /_bram zes 
[\[251a.4\]]bdag mig mi mthong na ci ltar bya zhes gsol to/_/rgyal pos bsgo ba khyod song shig dang /_lam rgyags dang /_lam 'dren pa dang /_yo byad gzhan yang ci dgos pa sbyar ro/_/gal te mig thob na bya dga' yang cher sbyin no zhes bsgo nas song ngo /_/de'i tshe na rgyal po mig 
[\[251a.5\]]'byed kyi yul na ltas ngan pa rnam pa sna tshogs byung ngo /_/'di lta ste/_gnam grum pa dang gnam lcags 'bab pa dang /_skar ma lhung ba dang /_nam rmugs pa dang /_gnam lcags bab nas sa kun gas pa dang /_bya rnams nam mkha' la ngu ba'i skad 'byin cing sa la 
[\[251a.6\]]ltung ba dang /_seng ge dang stag dang /_'phar spyang dag snying rje'i skad 'byin cing mi'i nang du 'ongs te/_sa la 'gre ba la sogs pa'i ltas ngan pa sna tshogs byung ngo /_/de nas bram ze long ba yang mthar gyis yul der phyin te/_pho brang gi sgor 'ongs nas/_skad chen 
[\[251a.7\]]pos 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag ni yul gzhan nas 'dir mchis kyi/_rgyal po khyod kyi yon tan kun tu grags pa ni slong ba 'ongs na ci yang gtong ste/_slong ba'i yid dang mi 'gal bar mdzad ces thos nas/_nyon mongs pa dang bsdos te 'dir slong du 'ongs kyis/_ci 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]'dod pa byin cig ces smras so/_/rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos nas bsus te/_khyod lam na ngal bar ma gyur tam/_nyon ma mongs sam/_bde bar 'ongs sam/_zhes spro ba'i tshig gis smras nas/_rgyal srid dam/_rin po che'am/_rta'am/_theg pa'am/_gos 
[\[251b.2\]]sam/_bza' ba'am/_btung ba'am/_nad kyi rkyen rtsi'am/_ci dang ci dgos pa slong shig dang /_de dang de dag chog par sbyin no zhes smras pa dang /_bram zes smras pa/_phyi rol gyi zang zing byin pas ni bsod nams kyi dam par mi 'gyur gyi/_nang gi sbyin pa byas 
[\[251b.3\]]na 'bras bu che ste/_bdag mig stor nas yun ring du lon pas rtag tu mdongs shing 'thoms par 'gyur gyi/_bdag ni rgyal po'i spyan 'tshal lo zhes smras so/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_rgyal po rab tu dga' nas/_bram ze la khyod la mig sbyin no zhes bsgo'o/_/
[\[251b.4\]]bram zes smras pa/_rgyal pos bdag la stsal na nam stsol ces smras pa dang /_da ste zhag bdun na sbyin no zhes bsgo nas/_dril bsgrags nas/_rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong la sbran no/_/rgyal po mig 'byed da ste zhag bdun na bram ze la mig sbyin pa byed kyis/_lta 'dod 
[\[251b.5\]]na thams cad shog shig ces bsgo'o/_/de'i tshe na 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de dag 'di skad ces bsgo ba thos nas/_thams cad myur bar der lhags so/_/rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed kyang so so'i blon po dang chas te/_rgyal po'i thad du lhags nas/_lto ba sa la 
[\[251b.6\]]phab ste/_mchi ma blags nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag cag 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad rgyal po la brten nas 'tsho na ci'i slad du mi gcig gi phyir bdag cag kun spangs zhes gsol to/_/blon po rnams dang /_btsun mo dang /_pho brang gi slas 
[\[251b.7\]]rnams kyang mgo bo sa la rdebs shing /_sa la kha sbub tu nyal nas/_bram ze mi gcig gi slad du bdag cag kun ma spangs shig ces gsol nas/_cho nges 'debs so/_/rgyal bu lnga brgya rnams kyang ngus nas/_bdag cag la mgon ma mchis so/_/skyabs ma mchis 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]so/_/thugs brtse ba'i slad du spyan gyi sbyin pa gtang ba mdzad pa'i thugs slar bzlog tu gsol/_rgyal tshab tshul khrims bzang pos kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rgyal po yab kyi sbyin par bdag gi mig stsal du gsol/_bdag gum pa ni tshod mchis kyi yab 
[\[252a.2\]]spyan mi mnga' bar gyur na/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad mgon ma mchis te/_dpung gnyen med par 'gyur ro zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos rgyal phran dang /_blon po dang /_btsun mo dang /_rgyal bu rnams la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/nga ni skye ba yun ring por 
[\[252a.3\]]lus 'dis skye ba ci yang myong ste/_rus pa spungs pa ni ri rab bas mtho/_/khrag bsags na rgya mtsho bzhi bas mang /_ma'i nu zho 'thungs pa yang chu bo bzhi bas che ste/_'dod pa dang bye bral nas ngus pa'i mchi ma yang rgya mtsho dang mnyam mo/_/sems can dmyal bar yang 
[\[252a.4\]]bsregs pa dang /_btsos pa dang /_mig phyung ba'i grangs kyang shin tu mang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi khams su lus rnam pa sna tshogs myong ste/_lus la me 'bar ba nas lus dang /_mig bcas su tshig pa grangs med/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa ni gcig la gcig gsod 
[\[252a.5\]]cing 'chi bas lus grangs med pa zhig chud zos/_mi'i nang du skyes pa na shi ma ran par shi ba'i grangs ni mang /_tshe'i mthar thug pa'i grangs ni nyung ste/_'dod pa la chags pas gcig la gcig gsod cing gnod par byed do/_/der yang lus dang mig grangs med pa zhig chud gsan 
[\[252a.6\]]na/_gal te lhar skyes na yang ring por mi thub ste/_mdor na khams gsum gyi rgyud drug tu 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi rdul phra mo snyed kyi lus chud zos na lan 'ga' yang sbyin pa ma byas te/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub btsal ma myong /_shin tu btsog 
[\[252a.7\]]cing mnam pa'i mig 'di de'u re rul cing 'jig pas/_da sbyin pa bya ba'i rigs kyi mi sbyin pa'i mi rigs te/_sha'i mig 'di byin la sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi spyan thob par bya'o/_/nam nga'i smon lam 'di grub na/_khyod la yang rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]chos kyi mig sbyin par bya'o/_/khyed nga'i bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi bar du ma gcod cig ces bsgo ba dang /_'khor thams cad kyang cang mi zer bar 'khod do/_/de nas blon po rnams la khyed las gcig gis nga'i mig phyung shig ces bsgo na/_de dag gis bdag 
[\[252b.2\]]cag gi lus rdul du bgyis kyang rgyal po'i ba spu gcig tsam yang 'byin mi phod na/_rgyal po'i spyan la lag dar ba lta ci smos zhes gsol to/_/rgyal pos yang bsgo ba/_khyod kyis mi sha mdog gnag la mig 'og nas mig tshugs su lta ba cig tshol cig ces bsgo ba dang /_
[\[252b.3\]]sha tshugs de 'dra ba cig snyed nas/_rgyal pos de'i lag tu gri byin te/_nga'i mig phyung shig ces bsgo nas/_des rgyal po'i mig phyung ste/_rgyal po'i lag tu bzhag go/_/rgyal pos mig lag tu bzhag nas 'di skad ces smon lam btab bo/_/bdag gi mig 
[\[252b.4\]]sbyin pa byed pa 'dis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shog shig_/gal te mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya na/_bram ze long bas nga'i mig thob ma thag tu mthong bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab ma thag tu rgyal po'i mig thogs pa bram ze'i mig tu bcug go/_/de 
[\[252b.5\]]nas mod la mthong bar gyur te/_rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rgyal po'i spyan 'dir mthong bar gyur te/_mthong ba 'dis 'tshal gyis ya gcig ni mi 'tshal lo zhes gsol to/_/rgyal pos bsgo ba/_kho bo'i mig gnyi ga khyod la sbyin par byas pas ya gcig bzhag na sngar 
[\[252b.6\]]smras pa dang 'gal lo zhes bsgo nas/_mig ya gcig kyang phyung ste/_lag tu blangs nas smon lam sngar bzhin du btab bo/_/bram ze'i mig tu bcug nas bram ze'i mig gnyi gas mthong bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe na gnam sa kun g.yos so/_/lha'i pho brang kun yang 'gul 
[\[252b.7\]]zhing ldeg ste/_lha rnams ngo mtshar du gyur nas thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpas mig gi sbyin pa byas par mthong nas/_steng gi nam mkha' la lhags te/_lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_spos kyi mchod pa byas nas/_legs so legs so zhes bstod do/_/brgya byin yang 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]der 'ongs te/_byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di ltar shin tu spyad pa dka' ba 'dis rnam par smin pa'i las ci zhig 'dod/_byang chub sems dpas smras pa bdud kyi rgyal po'am/_tshangs pa'am/_brgya byin nam/_rgyal chen 
[\[253a.2\]]bzhi'am/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la sogs te/_khams gsum gyi bde ba 'dod pa ma yin gyis/_bsod nams 'dis mngon par byang chub nas/_sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la 'god pa'i phyir ro/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_
[\[253a.3\]]'di ltar mig phyung ba sdug bsngal bar gyur na/_'gyod pa'am/_khro bo'i sems ma byung ngam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_'gyod pa yang med do/_/khro bo'i bag kyang med do/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_bdag gis bltas na mig gnyis nas khrag gzag cing 
[\[253a.4\]]mdangs kyang 'gyur bzhin du/_'gyod pa med ces byas pa ni yid ches par dka'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_bdag gi mig sbyin pa 'di la 'gyod pa yang med la/_bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur zhe na bden par smra ba 'dis bdag gi mig gnyis sngon bzhin du 
[\[253a.5\]]mthong bar gyur cig ces smras ma thag tu mig gnyis kyang sngon bas gsal bar gyur pas/_de'i tshe na lha dang mi thams cad kyang rab tu dga' zhing mgu rangs par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal pos bram ze la bsgo ba/_ngas mig sbyin pas khyod kyang mthong bar 'gyur gyis/_nam 
[\[253a.6\]]sangs rgyas na yang khyod la chos kyi mig sbyin par bya'o/_/rin po che 'di dag kyang khyer la phyir song shig ces bsgo'o/_/bram ze mig dang rin po che thob nas phyir yul du phyin pa dang /_rgyal po de nyid kyis kyang bsus nas phrad ma thag tu mig thob bam zhes dris 
[\[253a.7\]]so/_/bram zes smras pa/_mig kyang thob nas bdag kyang 'di ltar mthong bar gyur to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'o na tshe 'phos sam ma 'phos smras pa/_da ltar lha rnams der lhags nas/_smon lam btab pas mig gnyis sngon bas gsal bar gyur to/_/
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]rgyal po pa la dbar nes de skad ces smras pa thos nas 'khams te snying gas nas/_tshe 'phos so/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po spyan 'byed zhes bya ba de ni da ltar nga yin no/_/pa la da bar ni lhas byin yin no/_/bram ze mig slong ba de ni da ltar gyi bram ze 
[\[253b.2\]]long ba dgra bcom pa thob pa 'di yin no/_/sngar yang mig byin da ltar gyi bar du shes rab kyi mig byin te/_khyod kyi phyir skye ba thams cad du dka' ba spyad nas/_mngon par sangs rgyas so/_/khyod kyang 'byung ba'i lam la brtson par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 
[\[253b.3\]]'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_'khor mang po rnams kha cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir ldog pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa dang /_dgra bcom pa thob par gyur to/_/kha cig ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/kun dga' bo 
[\[253b.4\]]dang /_'khor mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/rgyal po mig 'byed kyi le'u ste sum cu lnga pa'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[253b.5\]]mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal la blon po chen po mkhas pa rig pa dang ldan pa btsan phyug pa zhig yod de/_de'i chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas khye'u 
[\[253b.6\]]mtshan dang ldan pa/_byad gzugs legs pa dpe byad zla med pa zhig btsas te/_mtshan mkhan bos te bu bstan pa dang /_mtshan mkhan dga' ba'i mdangs kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu 'di ni bsod nams kyi mtshan dang ldan te/_kun las 'phags 
[\[253b.7\]]par yid gzhungs pa mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan no/_/khye'u'i phas de skad smras pa thos nas/_khye'u'i ming ci skad gdags zhes dris pa dang /_mtshan mkhan gyis khye'u 'di mngal du chags nas/_ya mtshan du gyur pa ci yod ces dris so/_/blon pos smras pa/_
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]khye'u 'di'i ma sngon rang bzhin 'jam zhing des pa ma yin pa las/_bu 'di mngal du chags nas lhag par 'jam des so/_/gzhan gyi yon tan dang /_legs pa brjod par dga'i nyes pa brjod par mi dga' la/_nyon mongs pas phongs pa la byams shing 
[\[254a.2\]]brtse bar gyur to/_/mtshan mkhan gyis smras pa/_'di bu'i yon tan yin no/_/bu'i ming mi gdung ba zhes btags so/_/de nas gsos bskyed de cher skyes nas/_stobs kyang gyad stobs po che'i tshad du phyin te/_gcig pus mi stong thub pa nam mkha' la bya 
[\[254a.3\]]'phur ba yang mchongs pas zin te/_mgyogs khyad kyang rta dang bang mnyam pas/_bu de la lhag par sdug cing byams par gyur to/_/de'i tshe na yul de na bram ze mkhas pa'i rig pa dang ldan pa mang du thos pa/_gtsug lag la mkhas pa zhig yod de/_bram ze de 
[\[254a.4\]]la slob ma lnga brgya tsam rtag tu rjes su slob bo/_/de'i tshe na blon po de dag kyang bu khrid de/_bram ze la gtad nas slob tu bcug go/_/khye'u mi gdung ba slob pa la 'grus pas nyi ma gcig bslabs na/_gzhan lor bslab pa bas mkhas te/_ring po ma lon par 
[\[254a.5\]]thams cad khong du chud cing rtogs par gyur to/_/slob dpon bram ze des kyang de la lhag par yid rton te/_rtag tu 'grogs shing lhan cig tu 'dug pas slob ma gzhan dag kyang de la bsti stang byed do/_/de'i tshe slob dpon bram ze de'i chung mas khye'u de'i byad gzugs bzang 
[\[254a.6\]]zhing legs pa dang /_slob pa la yang gzhan bas lhag par mkhas par mthong nas de la chags te/_yid la bzung yang slob ma rnams dang mi bral te nyin mtshan 'grogs pas gtam bya ba'i skabs med de/_bsam pa ltar ma gyur bas rtag tu yid la gcags par gyur to/_/
[\[254a.7\]]dus phyi zhig na sbyin bdag cig gis slob dpon de dang /_slob mar bcas su zla ba gsum gyi bar du 'tsho ba sbyar nas mgron du gnyer to/_/de'i tshe na slob dpon bram ze chung ma dang gnyis 'di skad ces bgros so/_/kho bo ni slob ma dang bcas su sbyin bdag gis zla ba gsum 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]gyi bar du 'tsho ba sbyar ro zhes bos kyis/_da slob ma las gcig cig phyi na las su bskos te/_bzhag pa'i rigs sam zhes chung ma la smras pa dang /_chung ma dga' nas bram ze la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim gyi so tshis dang bya ba mang po la shes pa mkhas pa ldan pa 
[\[254b.2\]]zhig gis bya dgos pas/_khye'u mi gdung ba yid brtan te phyir bzhag pa'i rigs so zhes smras nas/_bram zes kyang khye'u mi gdung ba khyod kyis phyir 'dug la khyim gyi so tshis dang zhal ta byos shig_/kho bo ni sbyin bdag gis bos pas 'gro'o zhes bsgo'o/_/
[\[254b.3\]]khye'u mi gdung ba yang slob dpon gyis bsgo ba bzhin du phyir 'dug go/_/de'i tshe na slob dpon bram ze slob ma dang bcas te song ba'i 'og tu bram ze'i chung ma de rab tu dga' mgu nas shin tu byi bdar byas te/_bslu ba'i rnam pas khye'u dang smras kyang mi gdung bas sran btsugs te 
[\[254b.4\]]sems ma gyur to/_/de nas 'dod chags kyi sems skyes nas tshig drang por smras te/_kho mo ni khyod la chags kyang sngan cad skabs med do/_/da ni slob dpon yang song nas ched du khyod phyir bzhag pa yin gyis/_da ni dben zhing skabs la bab ste/_kho mo'i yid dang sbyor cig ces 
[\[254b.5\]]bsgo'o/_/mi gdung bas smras pa/_bdag ni bram ze yin pas bram ze'i chos kyis slob dpon gyi chung ma dang nyal du mi rung ste/_gal te 'di 'dra ba zhig byas na bram ze ma yin pas bdag shi yang bla'i 'di ni mi phod do zhes smras pa dang /_slob dpon gyi chung ma re ba ltar ma gyur 
[\[254b.6\]]pas/_ngo tsha zhing skyengs nas/_khon du bzung ste dkrugs bya bar bsams nas/_slob dpon phyir 'ong du nye ba na/_gos kyang dral gdong yang spar mos brad nas/_sa rdul gyis gos shing sma bab pa ltar cang mi smra bar sa la nyal lo/_/de nas slob dpon bram ze slar 'ongs nas/_
[\[254b.7\]]khyim du zhugs pa dang /_chung ma de 'dra bar 'dug pa mthong nas/_ci'i phyir khyod 'di ltar gyur ces dris pa dang /_chung mas mchi ma blags nas dri ba'i rin mi chog go zhes smras so/_/slob dpon bram zes ci nyes pa smros shig ces nan tan gyis dris pa dang chung ma ngus 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]te 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod kyis rtag tu bstod pa'i mi gdung ba de ni/_khyod song ba'i 'og tu rtag par kho mo la nyal bar bsgrubs te/_kho mo ma btub pas kho mo'i gos kyang dral/_gdong la yang rma phyung ba yin te/_khyod la 'di 'dra ba'i slob 
[\[255a.2\]]ma bdog gam/_bram zes de skad ces thos nas/_shin tu khros te/_chung ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/mi gdung ba 'di stobs ni gcig pus kyang mi stong yang thub la/_blon po chen po'i bu yin te/_cho rigs btsun pas nyes pa zhig byas na yang bags 
[\[255a.3\]]kyis bya dgos so zhes smras nas/_mi gdung ba'i drung du song ste/_ci rigs par snyan pa'i tshig gis spro ba bskyed nas/_kho bo song ba'i 'og tu las chen po dang nyon ma mongs sam zhes gtam dris nas/_'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/khyod kyis snga phyir kho bo la chu gang gis 
[\[255a.4\]]snying brtse ste/_khyod kyi drin ni rtag tu dran pas/_da ni khyod la gsang ba'i chos gcig pu zhig yod pa sngon cad ma bstan pa khyod la bstan gyis/_gal te khyod kyis de bzhin du byas na gdon mi za bar tshangs pa'i lhar skye'o/_/zhes smras so/_/khye'u mi gdung bas pus mo 
[\[255a.5\]]sa la btsugs te/_bstan par gsol pa dang /_mi gdung ba la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/khyod nyin zhag bdun gyis dge ba bsrungs te mi stong gi mgo bcad nas sor mo re re zhing blangs nas sor mo stong gis lus kyi 'phreng ba byas na/_de'i tshe tshangs pa'i lha mngon sum du 
[\[255a.6\]]mthong ste/_tshe 'phos ma thag tu tshangs pa'i lhar skye'o zhes lung bstan to/_/khye'u mi gdung bas slob dpon gyis de skad bstan pa thos nas the tsom skyes te/_slob dpon la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/srog bcad pas tshangs pa'i lhar skye ba ni rigs pa ma lags so/_/
[\[255a.7\]]slob dpon gyis smras pa/_khyod ci na kho bo'i slob ma yin na ci kho bos bstan pa'i man ngag mi nyan tam/_ci ste yid mi ches na khrel ltas yod pa ma yin te/_'dir ma 'dug par gar dga' bar song shig ces bsgo nas/_gsang sngags kyis btab ste/_ral gri gcig 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]sa la btsugs te/_sngags kyis btab pas/_khye'u mi gdung ba khros pa'i sems skyes te/_slob dpon gyis khros par rig nas/_ral gri lag tu byin nas mi gdung ba ral gri thogs nas sgor brgyugs te/_mi phrad dgu bsad nas sor mo bcad de/_lus kyi 'phreng 
[\[255b.2\]]bar btags pas kun gyis sor 'phreng can du btags so/_/kun tu gsod cing zhag bdun du phyin pa'i nyin par sor mo dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu ni rnyed kyi sor mo gcig gis bsnan na gsod pa'i grangs kyang stong du tshang ba las/_mi thams cad bros shing gab pas gcig 
[\[255b.3\]]kyang mi rgyu ste/_kun tu btsal kyang ma rnyed de/_zhag bdun gyi bar du kha zas ma zos pas khye'u'i ma bu la snying brtse nas kha zas skyel du btang na/_thams cad 'jigs pas gcig kyang ma spobs so/_/de nas khye'u'i ma nyid kha zas thogs te/_bu'i drung du song ba las 
[\[255b.4\]]rgyang ma nas ma 'ongs pa mthong ba dang /_ma'i thog tu brgyugs te/_gsad par gzas pa las/_de la mas sri zhu med par khyod ci log pas bsams te/_mtshams med pa'i las byed cing /_ma gsod dam zhes smras pa dang /_phyir ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[255b.5\]]bdag ni slob dpon gyis bstan pa bzhin du nyin zhag bdun gyis sor mo stong kham skongs te/_sor mo stong du tshang na tshangs pa'i lhar skye bas sor mo grangs ma tshang ste/_mi byar mi rung bas da gsad dgos so zhes byas pa dang /_de la khye'u'i mas 'di ltar gyur na/_kho mo 
[\[255b.6\]]mi gsad par sor mo gcod du mi rung ngam zhes bsgo ba'i tshe/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rgyang ma nas 'dul ba'i dus la bab par gzigs shing mkhyen nas/_dge slong zhig tu sprul te/_de'i phyogs su gshegs so/_/sor 'phreng can gyis dge slong mthong ba 
[\[255b.7\]]dang ma gsod par bya ba btang nas/_dge slong gi thog tu mchongs te/_gsad par gzas so/_/sangs rgyas kyis de ltar 'ongs par gzigs nas/_zhabs kyis dal gyis gshegs kyang sor 'phreng can mthu stobs gtugs te/_brgyugs kyang ma slebs 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]nas/_rgyang ma nas dge slong khyod cung zad cig sdod cig ces bos so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rgyang ma nas/_nga ni rtag tu sdod na khyod mi sdod zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_sor 'phreng can gyis ji ltar khyod ni sdod la kho bo ni mi sdod ces smras pa dang /_bcom 
[\[256a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga'i dbang po rnams ni rtag tu zhi zhing ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang thob pas sdod do/_/khyod ni slob dpon gyis log par bstan te/_sdig pa la yang yid ches pas/_khyod kyis sems kyang bslus te mi sdod pas/_nyin mtshan 
[\[256a.3\]]du gsod pa'i las byed de/_sdig pa mtha' med pa'i las byed do/_/sor 'phreng can gyis thos pa tsam gyis sems kyis rtogs shing chud do/_/ral gri sa la bor te rgyang ma nas skyabs su gsol lo zhes phyag 'tshal to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyang der gshegs te 
[\[256a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi skur sprul nas/_'od zer lhang nge lhan ner mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis gsal bar brgyan par bstan to/_/sor 'phreng can gyis sangs rgyas kyi sku 'od zer dang mtshan du ldan pa mthong nas/_lus sa la brdabs nas nyes pa mthol zhing 'gyod de/_bcom 
[\[256a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pas chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur to/_/dad pas rab tu byung bar gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par 'ongs so zhes bka' stsal pas/_skra dang kha spu rang byi ste dge slong du gyur to/_/de la bcom ldan 
[\[256a.6\]]'das kyis ci rigs pa'i chos bstan pas sems kyi dri ma kun zad nas dgra bcom par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du khrid do/_/de'i tshe yul de na gnas pa'i mi la sogs pa'i srog chags thams cad sor 'phreng can gyi ming thos pa tsam 
[\[256a.7\]]gyis mi skrag pa med de/_mi dang srog chags sbrum ma rnams kyang skrag nas bu btsa' ba'i thabs mi thub bo/_/de'i tshe bal glang mo zhig bu mi phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis sor 'phreng can la bka' stsal pa/_khyod bal glang mo'i drung du song la 'di skad du bdag 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]thog ma skyes nas da tsam gyi bar du mi gcig kyang ma bsad do zhes bden pa'i tshig smros shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_sor 'phreng can gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag gis ni mi yang mang du bkum na de skad ces ma bkum zhes bgyi/_bcom 
[\[256b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyod ni 'phags pa'i chos las skyes ma thag pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas sor 'phreng can gos tshags bcos te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du bal glang mo'i drung du song ste de skad ces smras pas/_bde bar btsas nas sor 'phreng 
[\[256b.3\]]can yang phyir gnas su 'ongs so/_/rgyal po gsal rgyal dpung gi tshogs dang bcas te/_sor 'phreng can 'dzin du chas pa las/_dpung gi tshogs 'gro ba'i lam rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi drung du byung bas/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na dge slong lus thung la mi sdug pa dbyangs 
[\[256b.4\]]rab tu snyan pa zhig yod de/_gtsug lag khang na dbyangs byed par dpung gi tshogs kyis thos nas/_skyo mi shes pa tsam du nyan 'dod de/_glang po che dang rta yang rna ba btud nas 'gror mi btub par nyan to/_/rgyal po ya mtshan can du gyur te/_ci'i phyir glang po che dang rta la sogs pa 'gror 
[\[256b.5\]]mi btub zhes smras pa dang /_dbyangs snyan pa nyan 'dod pa'i phyir 'gro mi btub bo zhes gsol to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye ba yang 'di ltar chos nyan par dga' na/_bdag mi'i nang du skye ba lta ci smos te/_skad cig nyan par bya'o zhes rgyal bu rgyal byed 
[\[256b.6\]]kyi tshal du song nas/_glang po che'i shing rta las babs te ral gri yang bkrol/_gdugs kyang bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das gang na bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar song ste phyin pa dang /_spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge slong dbyangs snyan 
[\[256b.7\]]pa de su lags/_blta bar 'tshal te/_kA ra ShA pa Na stong phrag bzhi bcu zhig kyang 'bul lo zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sngar sbyin pa byin pa'i 'og tu phrad par bya'o/_/gal te sngar phrad na kAr ShA pa Na 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]gcig kyang sbyin mi 'dod par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po de dang dge slong de phrad nas/_ha cang mi sdug la thung ches pas/_kAr ShA pa Na gcig tsam yang sbyin pa'i sems ma skyes te/_rgyal pos pus mo sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[257a.2\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong 'di'i lus shin tu mi sdug cing thung la/_dbyangs shin tu snyan pa 'di sngon las ci zhig bgyis na/_'di lta bu'i rnam par smin pa thob par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_legs par nyon 
[\[257a.3\]]la yid la zung shig dang bstan par bya'o/_/sngon 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du gshegs te/_sems can gyi don mdzad nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu rgyal po kr-i kI byi zhes bya bas ring bsrel bsdus te/_mchod rten brtsigs 
[\[257a.4\]]par byas pa las/_klu'i rgyal po bzhi zhig mir sprul te/_rgyal po'i drung du lhags nas/_ring bsrel gyi phyir mchod rten brtsigs pa 'di rin po che las bgyi'am/_sa las bgyi zhes gsol to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_mchod rten ni rin po ches brtsigs dgos 
[\[257a.5\]]na/_rin po che mang po med pas sa las bya dgos so/_/gru bzhi ngos gcig kyang dpag tshad lngar phyin pa dang /_'phang du dpag tshad nyi shu lnga pa kun tu snang ba zhig brtsigs dgos so/_/klu'i rgyal po de bzhis rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag cag bzhi 
[\[257a.6\]]ni klu'i rgyal po yin te/_rgyal po mchod rten byed pas bdag cag kyang rin po che btang snyam mo/_/rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas rab tu dga' mgu rangs te/_'di ltar bstabs pa legs so zhes smras pa dang /_klu rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces 
[\[257a.7\]]gsol to/_/grong khyer ngos bzhi'i phyi rol na/_chu mig chen po bzhi zhig yod de/_shar phyogs kyi logs kyi chu mig la bcus te/_phag gu byas na thams cad baidUr+ya sngon por 'gyur ro/_/lho phyogs kyi chu mig la chu bcus te/_phag gu byas na thams cad gser du 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/nub phyogs kyi chu mig la bcus nas/_phag gu byas na thams cad dngul du 'gyur ro/_/byang phyogs kyi chu mig la bcus te/_phag gu byas na thams cad shel dkar por 'gyur ro zhes smras te/_rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas/_lhag 
[\[257b.2\]]par dga' mgu rangs te/_ngos bzhi'i lag dpon re re bskos nas/_ngos re re byed du bcug pa las/_ngos gsum gyi lag dpon gyis mchod rten nyid du zin pa na/_ngos gcig gi lag dpon gyis le lo byas pas zin du mi nye ste/_rgyal po nyid mchod rten byed pa 
[\[257b.3\]]la ltar 'ongs te/_le lo byas pa de la khyod kyis legs par ma byas pas ma zin te/_chad pas gcod do zhes bsgo ba dang /_mi de rgyal po la khros nas/_'di lta bu'i mchod rten ha cang yang ches pas 'di nam yang mi zin to zhes gsol to/_/de nas rgyal pos nan 
[\[257b.4\]]thur bskyed pas kun gyis nyin mtshan la brtson 'grus byas nas/_dus gcig tu cig car zin to/_/mchod rten ngo mtshar du mthong la rin po che rnams 'tsher zhing dbyibs kyang lhag par legs pas/_ngos dpon khros pa de yang shin tu dga' nas/_sngar nyes pa rnams 
[\[257b.5\]]'gyod cing bshags te/_gser gyi dril bu gcig mchod rten gyi rtse mo la btags nas 'di skad ces smon lam btab bo/_/bdag gang nas gang du skyes kyang sgra skad shin tu snyan pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyis thos pa dang dga' bar shog shig_/ma 'ongs 
[\[257b.6\]]pa'i dus na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang phrad de/_'khor ba las rnam par grol bar shog shig ces smon lam btab bo/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na ngos gcig gi lag dpon mchod rten ha cang yang ches so zhes khros pa de ni dge slong 'di yin te/_de'i tshe na khros 
[\[257b.7\]]bzhin mchod rten ha cang ches so zhes smras pa tsam gyis/_rtag tu lus thung la mi sdug par gyur to/_/phyis dga' ba'i sems kyis gser gyi dril bu phul nas mchod rten la btags te sgra skad snyan pa dang /_nga dang phrad par shog shig ces smon lam btab pas skye ba 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]lnga brgya'i bar du sgra skad rab tu snyan te/_da 'dir nga dang phrad nas rnam par grol ba thob par gyur to/_/rgyal pos de skad ces gsungs pa thos nas/_phyir 'gro bar chas pa las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po khyod gar 'gro zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[258a.2\]]rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/yul 'di na dgra ma rungs ba sor 'phreng can zhes bya ba mi kun bsad nas ma 'os par gnod par bgyid pas/_bdag cag de la dmag rgol du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sor 
[\[258a.3\]]'phreng can 'di da ltar ni grog sbur yang mi gsod na/_gzhan gsod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_rgyal po des da tsam bcom ldan 'das kyis ma btul lam snyam bsams pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sor 'phreng can 'di 
[\[258a.4\]]da ltar rab tu byung nas dgra bcom ste/_nyes pa'i skyon thams cad zad nas/_da lta gnas khang na 'dug go/_/rgyal po de dang phrad par 'dod na de dang sprad do zhes bka' stsal te/_sor 'phreng can gyi gnas khang du btang ngo /_/sor 'phreng can gyi gnas khang gi sgor phyin nas 
[\[258a.5\]]dge slong sor 'phreng can gnas khang gi nang na lud pa lu ba'i sgra phyung ba thos pa tsam gyis/_sngar mi mang po bsad par dran te/_'jigs skrag nas 'khams te sa la 'gyel to/_/de nas ring zhig lon pa dang phyir langs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song 
[\[258a.6\]]nas ji ltar lags pa/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po legs par nyon cig dang /_sngon 'das pa'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yul bA rA Na sI zhes bya ba na/_bya 
[\[258a.7\]]shin tu gdug pa zhig yod de/_zas su srin bu gdug pa 'ba' zhig za'o/_/lus kyang shin tu gdug pas reg par nyer yang mi bzod do/_/gar 'phur gar 'gro ba'i 'og tu sems can yod pa kun kyang dog sa la lhung shing kun skrag par gyur to/_/de'i tshe bya 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]gdug pa de tshal zhig gi nang na phyin nas shing khar 'dug ste/_skad phyung ste de'i tshe shing de'i drung na/_glang po che'i rgyal po zhig yod de/_bya gdug pa'i skad thos pa tsam gyis 'khams nas sa la 'gyel to/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na/_bya gdug pa de ni 
[\[258b.2\]]da ltar gyi sor 'phreng can yin no/_/glang po che'i rgyal po de ni rgyal po nyid yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das sor 'phreng can 'di ni khro gtum pas sems can de snyed cig bsad de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba la bzhag_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[258b.3\]]rgyal po chen po dge slong sor 'phreng can 'di da ltar gyi dus 'ba' zhig na mi mang po bsad de/_ngas btul bar ma zad de/_sngon 'das pa'i dus na yang sor 'phreng can gyis mi 'di dag kun bsad pa las ngas btul te/_dge ba sems par gyur to/_/rgyal pos 
[\[258b.4\]]yang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sngon 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di dag bsad pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug pa'i dngos po rnam par phye ste bstan du gsol zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sngon 'das pa'i dus na bskal 
[\[258b.5\]]pa grangs med pa'i pha rol na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yul bA rA Na sI zhes bya ba na/_rgyal po ba la ma dar zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo /_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i dpung rnam bzhi dang bcas te/_tshal gyi nang du rtser song song ba las/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang phrad de [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi phyi bzhin 
[\[258b.6\]]rgyugs rgyugs pa las/_rgyal po gcig pu 'khor dang bral te tshal stug por phyin nas/_de'i tshe rgyal po de ngal nas rta las babs te/_'dug pa las tshal stug po de'i nang na seng ge mo zhig gnas pa dang /_'dod chags kyis nyen nas song song ba las tshal gyi nang na 
[\[258b.7\]]rgyal po gcig pu 'dug pa dang phrad nas/_seng ge mo lhag par 'dod chags skyes te/_rgyal po la bsnyen nas mjug ma bteg ste snyegs so/_/rgyal pos kyang 'dod chags skyes par rig nas 'di snyam du bsams so/_/'di gcan gzan khro ba yin te/_bdag 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]gsad pa'i mthu yang yod pas/_gal te yid bzhin du ma byas na bdag gi srog la 'bab bo snyam nas/_skrag bzhin du seng ge mo la 'dod chags spyad do/_/de nas seng ge mo phyir song ba'i 'og tu g.yog rnams kyang lhags te/_rgyal po bsus te 
[\[259a.2\]]pho brang du khrid do/_/de'i tshe seng ge mo de sbrum par gyur te/_zla ba tshang nas bu zhig byung na/_lus gzugs thams cad mi dang 'dra ste/_rkang pa 'ba' zhig khra bor 'dug go/_/seng ge mos kyang rgyal po'i bu yin par dran nas rgyab tu bkal te/_rgyal po'i thad du 
[\[259a.3\]]bskyal lo/_/rgyal pos kyang bdag gi bu yin par shes te/_gsos bskyed de de'i rkang pa bkra ba'i phyir ming yang rkang bkrar btags so/_/gsos bskyed de tshad du skyes pa dang /_shin tu dpa' zhing rtul phod par skyes so/_/rgyal po tshe 'phos pa'i 'og tu 
[\[259a.4\]]rgyal po'i dbang thob nas/_btsun mo gnyis blangs so btsun mo gcig ni rgyal rigs so/_/gcig ni bram ze'i rigs so/_/phyis rkang bkra de skyed mos tshal du 'chag tu song nas/_btsun mo gnyis la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/btsun mo khyod gnyis gang 
[\[259a.5\]]nga'i phyi bzhin mgyogs par 'ongs te/_gang nga dang sngar phrad pa de la nyi ma gcig gi bar du rtse dga' zhing yongs su spyad do/_/gang phyir 'ong ba de ni nga dang phrad du mi btub bo ces bsgo na/_rgyal po de song ba'i 'og tu btsun mo gnyis kyang rgyan gyis brgyan te/_
[\[259a.6\]]bzhon pa bshams nas dus gcig tu chas so/_/lam gyi bar du na lha'i rten zhig yod pa la btsun mo bram ze'i rigs can bzhon pa las babs te/_phyag byas te myur du song ba las phyis bar gyur to/_/de nas rgyal pos kyang sngar byas pa bzhin du ma bsten to/_/de nas 
[\[259a.7\]]btsun mo de zhe sdang skyes te lha la khros te/_bdag ni khyod la phyag 'tshal ba'i bar du phyis nas rgyal pos ma dad do/_/gal te lha khyod la mthu zhig yod yang dag na ci'i phyir nga'i mgon dang skyabs mi byed ces shin tu khros rngam nas/_yid la 'di snyam du/_gnod pa bya bar 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]bsams so/_/rgyal po de phyir pho brang du 'ongs nas/_btsun mos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag nyi ma gcig ci dga' bar bgyid du gnang bar dbang bskur cig byas pa dang /_rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du gnang ngo zhes bsgo ba dang /_mi mang po bzlog ste lha'i rten bcom 
[\[259b.2\]]nas sa yang bsnyams so/_/de nas lha rten srung ba'i lha de shin tu mi dga' ste/_'khrugs nas/_rgyal po la gnod par bya bar bsams te/_pho brang gi nang na song ba las pho brang srung ba'i lha des nang du ma btang ngo /_/de'i tshe na drang srong gcig ri drang srong lhags zhes 
[\[259b.3\]]bya ba la gnas te/_rgyal po rkang bkra des drang srong de la mchod pa byas pas nyin gcig bzhin du nam mkha' la 'phur zhing pho brang du 'ongs te/_zas bzang po ni mi 'dod kyis/_zas tha mal ba tsam zos nas phyir 'gro'o/_/nyi ma gcig drang srong de mi 'ong bar lha des 
[\[259b.4\]]shes pas/_drang srong gi lus su sprul te/_pho brang gi nang du 'gro bar bsams pa las/_pho brang srung ba'i lhas shes nas nang du ma btang ba dang /_sgo nas bos te nang du 'ong du mi ster ro/_/zhes byas pa dang /_rgyal pos thos nas drang srong phyi rol nas 'bod pa myur du nang 
[\[259b.5\]]du thong shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_pho brang srung ba'i lhas kyang rgyal po'i bka' bzhin du ma bkag ste nang du btang ngo /_/nang du 'ongs pa dang drang srong gi stan la 'dug nas/_rgyal pos kyang rtag tu kha zas ci za ba tsam du sbyar te phul lo/_/de'i tshe na drang srong sprul pa 
[\[259b.6\]]des kha zas zar ma btub nas/_rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kha zas 'di ni ngan ches kyi sha dang nya ni za'o zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal pos kyang 'di skad ces smras so/_/drang srong chen po sngan cad ni kha zas tha mal pa za bas na sha dang nya ma sbyar ba yin no/_/drang srong 
[\[259b.7\]]sprul pas smras pa/_da phyin cad ni kha zas ngan pa 'di dag mi 'dod kyis sha dang nya sbyor cig ces smras nas song ngo /_/de nas rgyal pos kyang drang srong sprul pas smras pa bzhin du sha dang nya sbyar nas/_phyi de nyin drang srong rnying pa 'ong ba la phul lo/_/drang srong de zhe sdang 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]skyes te rgyal po la khros pa dang /_rgyal pos kyang drang srong la 'di skad ces smras so/_/drang srong chen po khar rtsang 'ong ba na kha zas 'di lta bu sbyor cig ces ma bsgo'am drang srong gis smras pa/_khar rtsang na bas nyi ma gcig zan bcad de ma 'ongs pa yin 
[\[260a.2\]]na/_de skad ces sus bsgo/_khyod kyis nga la brnyas pas 'di lta bur byas pa yin gyis/_rgyal po khyod lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du mi sha 'ba' zhig za bar gyur cig ces smras nas song ngo /_/de nas nyin gcig rgyal po'i g.yos mkhan gyis sha ma 'byor nas 'phral du 
[\[260a.3\]]sha gzhan ma rnyed de/_byis pa'i ro zhig dang phrad nas/_sha 'di yang rung ngo snyam bsams nas mgo dang rkang lag bcad de g.yos su byas te/_spos sna tshogs kyis btab nas rgyal po la byin no/_/rgyal pos kyang sha de zos nas sngon gyi sha bas lhag par zhim mo/_/
[\[260a.4\]]g.yos mkhan la sngan cad kyi sha 'di lta bu ro med do/_/sha 'di ni lhag par zhim na ci'i sha zhes dris pa dang /_g.yos mkhan skrag nas lto ba sa la phab ste/_rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te rgyal pos gyod mi rmo na drang por gsol lo zhes smras pa dang /_
[\[260a.5\]]rgyal pos kyang khyod kyis drang por smras dang /_gyod mi rmo'o zhes bsgo'o/_/g.yos mkhan gyis smras pa/_bdag cag 'phral brtad pas sha gzhan ni ma rnyed de/_byis pa chung ngu 'gum pa'i ro zhig rnyed de de g.yos su bgyis te gsol ba las rgyal pos mkhyen par gyur 
[\[260a.6\]]to/_/rgyal pos bsgo ba sha 'di lhag par zhim gyi da phyin cad sha 'di lta bu rtag tu sbyor cig_/ces bsgo ba dang /_g.yos mkhan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sngar ni byis pa gum pa'i ro zhig rnyed de g.yos su bgyis pa lags kyis/_'di las ni mi rnyed do 
[\[260a.7\]]zhes gsol to/_/rgyal pos kyang bsgo ba da phyin cad khyod kyis gsang thub cing gzhan gyis ma tshor bar long shig dang /_nga la dbang yod zhes bsgo'o/_/g.yos mkhan gyis kyang rgyal pos bsgo ba bzhin du mtshan mo gsang ste brkus nas bsad de/_sang 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]de nyin bzhin du g.yos su byas so/_/de'i tshe na grong khyer de'i mi dag phal cher cho nges 'debs shing /_bu stor ro zhes gcig nas gcig tu bsgrags te/_ci'i phyir 'di ltar gyur ces blon po rnams 'dus te bgros nas/_mtshan mo lam srang mdor mel tshe byas te/_
[\[260b.2\]]bltas na rgyal po'i g.yos mkhan gyis bu chung ngu rnams brkus te khyer ba zin nas/_bcings te rgyal po'i spyan sngar khrid nas snga phyir bu 'di snyed cig stor ro zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar du gsol kyang 
[\[260b.3\]]cang mi smra ba las/_da bdag cag gis nyes pa byed byed pa zin te/_nyes par mngon na zhal ce bcad pa'i rigs kyi/_mi smra ba'i mi rigs so zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos ngas bsgo ba yin zhes smras so/_/de nas blon po rnams mi dga' ste/_khon du 
[\[260b.4\]]bzung nas so sor song ngo /_/phyi rol tu phyin pa dang /_gcig la gcig 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal pos ni bdag cag la sogs pa'i bu kun zos pa'i dgra yin te/_mi sha za ba'i rgyal po dang lhan cig tu srid gcig tu byar mi rung gis gnod par gyur pa'i 
[\[260b.5\]]dgra 'di lta bu ni med par bya ba'i rigs so zhes thams cad gros 'thun par rgyal po bsad par gros byas so/_/grong khyer de'i phyi rol tu skyed mos tshal zhig yod de/_der rdzing bu zhig yod pa'i nang na rgyal po nyin gcig bzhin du khrus byed du 'gro ba la/_blon po 
[\[260b.6\]]rnams kyis skyed mos tshal gyi nang du dpung gi tshogs sbas nas/_rgyal po rdzing bur khrus byed pa na dpung gi tshogs mang pos bskor te bzung nas/_gsad par byas pa las/_rgyal po de skrag nas dpung gi tshogs de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci'i phyir khyod 
[\[260b.7\]]kyis nga bskor te 'dzin du 'ong zhes byas pa dang /_blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po zhes bya ba ni 'bangs mang po gso ba yin na/_rgyal pos 'bangs kyi bu kun zos pas 'bangs thams cad gnas med par gyur te/_sdug bsngal 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]mi bzod pas da rgyal po khyod gsad do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'di ltar byas pa nga ni nyes mod kyi da phyin cad 'di ltar mi bya bas/_'di'i tshe btang du rung ngam mi rung zhes bsgo ba dang /_blon po rnams kyis de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal 
[\[261a.2\]]te gnam la kha ba nag po bab pa'am/_khyod kyi mgo la sbrul nag po skyes kyang btang ba med kyis dam smra shig_/rgyal po rkang bkras kyang blon pos smras pa'i tshig thos nas/_da ni gdon mi za bar srog dang 'bral lo snyam ste yang blon po rnams la 'di skad ces 
[\[261a.3\]]smras so/_/da ni khyod kyis bsad par chad na/_skad cig kho na zhig kho bo bde bar sems su chug la/_gdod sod cig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas blon pos yang cung zad de bsdad de sems su bcug pa dang /_rgyal po des yid la 'di snyam du yi dam bcas so/_/
[\[261a.4\]]bdag gi sngan cad dge ba ci byas pa dang /_rgyal po'i srid chos bzhin byas pa dang /_drang srong la sbyin pa byas pa'i bsod nams ci yod pa thams cad kyi mthus/_bdag nam mkha' la 'phur ba'i srin por gyur cig ces bsngos te/_de skad ces smras nas/_bsngos 
[\[261a.5\]]ma thag tu srin por gyur te/_steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas blon po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod kyi mthus bsdos te nga la gsad par byas kyang nga'i bsod nams kyis rang sos par gyur te/_da phyin cad ni khyod bzod par byos shig_/khyod kyi 
[\[261a.6\]]chung ma dang bu sdug cing phongs pa thams cad bza' bar bya'o zhes smras nas/_'phur te ri la babs nas phyin cad mi'i nang du mi za bar gyur to/_/mi mang po yang 'jigs skrag nas rtag tu bros shing gab par gyur to/_/de nas srin po mi la za zhing srin po mang du 
[\[261a.7\]]bsdongs nas 'khor dang g.yog kyang mang bar gyur te/_srin po'i 'khor rnams kyis srin po rkang bkra la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag cag ni khyod kyi 'khor dang g.yog tu gyur na/_bdag cag la ston mo chen mo byin cig ces gsol pa dang /_srin po rkang bkras 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]kyang de bzhin du gnang nas/_rgyal po lnga brgya bsad de ston mo bya bar bgros nas song song nas rgyal po blangs te brag phug tu bcug go/_/bzhi brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu ni rnyed de/_rgyal po gcig ma tshang ba la rgyal po de dag brag phug na gcig la gcig 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[261b.2\]]bdag cag ni da phangs te skyabs su gyur pa yang med de/_gal te su ta so ma stobs dang ldan pa de 'dir 'ongs na bdag cag thar kyang srid kyis su ta so ma 'dir 'ongs par srin po la gsol bar bya'o zhes bgros nas/_srin po'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[261b.3\]]rgyal po khyod kyi ston mo byed na/_bdag cag mi'i rgyal po 'ba' zhig bsad de ston mo byas pas ston mo bzang por mi 'gyur gyis/_su ta so ma zhes bya ba yon tan chen po dang ldan te/_de rnyed na gdod ston mo chen por 'gyur ro zhes gsol pa dang /_srin po'i rgyal 
[\[261b.4\]]pos 'di ni ci dga' zhes smras pa dang /_nam mkha' la 'phur te su ta so ma len du song ngo /_/de'i tshe na su ta so ma bu mo gzhon nu dang grong khyer gyi phyi rol tu khrus byed du 'gro ba las/_lam du bram ze slong ba zhig dang phrad de/_sbyin par byas nas bram ze la 'di skad ces 
[\[261b.5\]]smras so/_/bdag khrus zhig byed du 'gro/_da phyir log nas sbyin par bya'o zhes smras nas/_khrus byed du song ba las khrus byed pa na srin po'i rgyal po 'ongs te brag phug tu khyer ro/_/de'i tshe su ta so ma mi dga' ste/_ngus pa dang rkang bkras 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[261b.6\]]khyod ni gzhan pas lhag par yon tan dang ldan pa'i mchog go zhe na/_skyes bu chen po ni cis kyang mi skrag pa yin na/_ci'i phyir mi dga' ste/_byis pa chung ngu ltar ngu zhes smras so/_/su ta so mas srin po la smras pa/_bdag ni lus la chags shing /_srin po'i 'jigs 
[\[261b.7\]]pas mi dga' ba ma yin gyis/_bdag thog ma nas [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba ma myong na/_da ci khrus la 'gro ba'i lam du bram ze slong ba zhig dang phrad de/_bdag gis kyang khrus byas nas phyir log ste sbyin pa sbyin no zhes smras nas/_khrus byed du song ba las rgyal po khyod kyis 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]bdag 'dir khyer te 'ongs pas/_bdag gis [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smras so snyam ste mi dga'o/_/lus dang srog la chags pa ni ma yin te/_rgyal po khyod bdag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir zhag bdun zhig bshol te/_bram ze de la sbyin pa byas nas phyir yang 
[\[262a.2\]]'gum du mchi'o zhes gsol to/_/srin pos smras pa/_khyod da btang na phyir 'ong du btub bam/_smras pa gal te ma 'ong na yang khyod la blangs pa'i mthu yod do zhes smras nas/_phyir btang ngo /_/su ta so ma phyir khyim du phyin tsam na/_bram ze de yang da dung 
[\[262a.3\]]'dug ste rab tu dga' nas/_bram ze la sbyin pa sbyin no/_/bram ze des kyang su ta so ma ring por mi thogs par srog dang bral bar 'gro bas phyir yul la chags na mi dga' bar shes nas/_de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_bskal pa'i mtha' la thug pa na/_/
[\[262a.4\]]gnam dang klung yang rab 'bar te/_/ri rab lhun po rgya mtsho yang /_/thams cad thal ba rdul du 'gyur/_/lha dang klu dang lha ma yin/_/thams cad 'jig cing nyam nyes te/_/gnam dang sa yang med 'gyur na/_/rgyal srid lta zhig ga la rtag_/skye rga na dang 'chi 
[\[262a.5\]]ba yi/_/'khor ba'i mtha' ni zad mi shes/_/re zhig 'dod pa ma grub na/_/mya ngan gyis ni gnod par 'gyur/_/'dod pa skyon du rab che ste/_/nyes pa gzhan nas 'ong ba min/_/khams gsum sdug bsngal bcas pa na/_/yul srid yid brtan rung re 
[\[262a.6\]]skan/_/yod pa ye nas med pa ste/_/rgyu dang rkyen gyis 'grub par 'gyur/_/dar ba yod na rgud pa yod/_/bden pa nges par [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]'gyur ro/_/so so'i skye bo mtha' thog dag_/sgyu ma la ni kun gnas te/_/khams gsum ci ltar stong bzhin du/_/yul gyi srid 
[\[262a.7\]]kyang de bzhin no/_/rnam par shes pa gzugs med do/_/gdug pa'i sbrul bzhi la gnas te/_/ma rig pa las skyes pa la/_/bde ba'i gnas su kun 'dzin to/_/gzugs la rtag pa'i bdag med de/_/sems la rtag pa'i khyim yod min/_/lus 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]dang sems kyang bral gyur na/_/yul srid lta zhig yod re skan/_/de'i tshe su ta so mas tshigs su bcad de smras pa thos nas/_don yid la bsams pa bzhin du dga' ste/_rgyal tshab rgyal por bcug nas/_blon po rnams la phyi phyag byas te/_'thams pa bzhin 
[\[262b.2\]]du phyir 'gro bar byas pa las/_blon po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rgyal po rkang bkras ma bsnyengs shig bdag cag gis bsams na/_rgyal po sku bsrung ba'i slad du lcags kyi khang pa byas pa'i nang du rgyal po bzhugs na/_rkang bkra dpa' mod kyi ci 
[\[262b.3\]]bgyir yang ma mchis so/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams dang mi mang po rnams la bsgo ba/_mi ci skyes pa la [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]mi zer ba'i khrel ltas dgos te/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra na gson kyang dga' ba ma yin pas/_thog ma 'thams pa bzhin du tshe 'phos kyang bla'i/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smras te 
[\[262b.4\]]gson par mi 'dod do zhes khrel ltas byas pa'i legs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba'i skyon mang po smras pa dang /_blon po rnams kyang mya ngan gyis brnangs te/_tshig med par gyur to/_/thams cad kyis rgyal po bskyal nas/_thams cad kyis 
[\[262b.5\]]cho nges btab ste/_brgyal zhing 'khams par gyur to/_/su ta so ma lam du zhugs te song ba'i tshe/_srin po rkang bkras kyang su ta so ma 'dir 'ongs pa'i dus yin no snyam bsams nas/_ri'i rtse mor byung ste bltas pa dang /_su ta so ma lam du rgyang ma nas srog 'dor du 
[\[262b.6\]]'ong ba mthong ngo /_/de nas nye bar 'ongs te bltas na sngon pas kyang lhag par dga' ba'i mdangs yod pas srin pos rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/srog 'dor ba lta ba dag la dga' ba ci zhig yod na/_khyod 'tsho ba gtong ba las srog kyang mi phangs sam/_
[\[262b.7\]]khyod yul du phyin nas phan pa'i don ci zhig rnyed na 'di ltar dga' zhes dris so/_/su ta so mas smras pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis thugs dpag mdzad de/_bdag gi 'tsho ba yun ring du bshol nas bdag gis sngar dam bcas pa las ma 'gal te/_sbyin pa 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]chen po yang byin/_dam pa'i chos kyang thos nas yid la gcags te/_bsam pa grub pas 'dir srog btang yang gson pa bas dga'o zhes smras so/_/rgyal po rkang bkras smras pa/_khyod kyis chos ci zhig thos pa kho bo la yang smros shig ces bsgo ba dang /_su 
[\[263a.2\]]ta so mas tshigs su bcad pa ji skad thos pa yang smras/_de ma yin pa yang gzhan yang gsod pa'i las kha na ma tho ba'i sdig pa dang /_mi dge ba'i las rnam par smin pa yang thabs mkhas pas rgya cher smras so/_/srog mi gcod pa'i yon tan dang /_bsod nams rgya chen 
[\[263a.3\]]po dang /_byams pa'i sems kyang rgyas par bstan pa dang /_srin po rkang bkra rab tu dga' rangs te/_spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bstan pa bzhin du phyin cad srog gcod pa spangs nas/_rgyal bu brag phug tu bcug pa rnams kyang so so'i yul du bskyal lo/_/de nas su ta 
[\[263a.4\]]so mas dpung gi tshogs bshams nas rgyal po rkang bkra bsus nas phyir yang rgyal por bcug go/_/de drang srong gis dmod pa bor ba'i lo bcu gnyis kyang tshang bas/_de phyin cad mi sha yang mi za ste/_sngon bzhin du rgyal po byas so/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus 
[\[263a.5\]]na/_su ta so ma ni da ltar nga yin no/_/rgyal po rkang bkra de ni da ltar sor 'phreng can yin no/_/de'i tshe rkang bkras lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du mi zos pa rnams ni/_sor 'phreng can gyis bsad pa'i mi rnams yin no/_/mi 'di dag kyang gang dang gang du skye bar rtag tu sor 'phreng can 
[\[263a.6\]]gyis bsad par gyur la/_ngas kyang skye ba thams cad du dge ba la bkod par gyur to/_/ngas mngon du dran pa sngon ma rabs byed pa'i tshe ngas gsod pa las bzlog nus na/_da mngon par sangs rgyas te/_yon tan phun sum tshogs la/_sdig pa yongs su zad na/_'di 
[\[263a.7\]]dag 'dul bar gyur pa lta ci smos/_rgyal pos yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/mi 'di dag sngon ci zhig bgyis na skye ba thams cad du sor 'phreng can gyis rtag tu bsad par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]rgyal po chen po legs par nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o/_/sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa'i pha rol na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'di yul bA rA Na sIr rgyal po ba la dar zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_rgyal po de la sras gnyis yod de/_byad gzugs legs pa/_
[\[263b.2\]]blta na sdug pa/_rtsal dang ldan pa'o/_/de'i sras chung shos 'di snyam du sems so/_/gal te bdag gi pha tshe 'phos nas phu bo rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/bdag gzhon pas rgyal po yang mi thob na/_mir skyes la rgyal po yang ma thob na/_tha mal par 'dug pa yang ci rung /_
[\[263b.3\]]dben par song nas drang srong gi lam btsal bar bya snyam nas rgyal po'i drung du song ste/_yab rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag ni dben par drang srong gi lam btsal bar dga'o/_/bdag la sdug par 'dzin na bsam pa 'di las ma bzlog cig ces yang dang yang 
[\[263b.4\]]du gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du gnang nas de dben par song ngo /_/de nas lo mang zhig lon pa dang /_rgyal po yab tshe 'phos nas phu bo rgyal sar gshegs so/_/phu bo yang rgyal sar zhugs nas/_ring por ma lon par nad kyis btab nas tshe 'phos te/_
[\[263b.5\]]rigs 'tshob pa'i mi med do/_/blon po rnams 'dus nas ji ltar bya ba bgros pa dang /_de la blon po gcig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rgyal po chen po'i sras chung ngu zhig rgyal po la gsol te/_da ltar ri la drang srong byed cing 'dug go/_/de spyan drangs nas rgyal 
[\[263b.6\]]por gzhug go zhes smras pa dang /_blon po rnams kyis de 'dra ba zhig nges par yod na da ltar spyan drangs la/_rgyal por gzhug go zhes bgros nas/_ri la rgyal bu tshol du song ngo /_/de dag rgyal bu dang phrad nas bdag cag la rgyal po med de khyod kyis rgyal po bya dgos kyis 
[\[263b.7\]]'dong ngo /_/zhes smras pa dang /_drang srong gis tshig 'di ni 'jigs su rung ste/_kho bo dben pa 'di na rab tu bde ste mya ngan ci yang med do/_/'jig rten pa ni rang bzhin gyis ma dul ba yin pas/_rgyal po yang gsod de/_bdag gis mi nus so/_/blon po rnams 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]kyis smras pa/_rgyal po'i gdung chad de gdung 'tshob pa med kyis/_drang srong khyod 'ba' zhig rgyal po'i gdung la gtogs pa yin te/_yul mi thams cad mgon med par gyur pas/_'gro ba mang po la brtse ba'i phyir rgyal por gshegs su gsol lo zhes smras 
[\[264a.2\]]pa dang /_drang srong gis kyang ma bzod nas blon po rnams kyis gsol pa bzhin du phyir yang yul du 'ongs te rgyal po byas so/_/drang srong de chung ngu nas 'dod chags la ma 'bags pa las/_srid 'tsho zhing bags kyis bud med dang 'bags pas phyir 'dod chags che bar gyur 
[\[264a.3\]]to/_/nyin mtshan du 'dod chags la bag med pas/_'di skad bkar btags so/_/nga'i yul mi las bu mo yod pa rnams bag mar btang na/_sngar nga dang phrad pa'i 'og tu bag mar thong shig ces bkar btags so/_/yul du bud med sdug gu yid du 'ong ba thams cad 
[\[264a.4\]]la yang mi rigs par spyod do/_/de'i tshe bud med gcig cig mi mang po tshogs pa'i mdun du sgren mor byung ste/_gcin gci ba dang /_thams cad kyis bgad de ngo tsha mi shes pa 'di ci byed ces spyos pa dang /_bud med des 'di skad ces smras so/_/bud med kyis bud 
[\[264a.5\]]med kyi mdun du gcin gcir ba la ngo tsha ci zhig yod de/_khyed cag gcig gi mdun du gcig gis gcin gcir kyang ngo mi tsha na kho mo bud med du 'dra ba'i nang du gcin gcir ba la ngo tsha ci zhig yod/_mi mang pos smras pa/_khyod kyis 'di skad smras pa 'di ni ci'i tha tshig ces 
[\[264a.6\]]smras pa dang /_bud med des 'di skad ces smras so/_/yul 'di na rgyal po gcig po skyes pa yin gyis/_gzhan mi thams cad bud med yin du nges so/_/khyed kun skyes pa yin na/_de 'dra ba mi rigs pa rgyal pos byed pa mi rigs so/_/de nas mi mang po ngo tsha zhing 
[\[264a.7\]]skyengs par gyur te/_bud med 'dis smra ba bden te/_rigs pa ma yin pas/_rgyal po 'di med par bya'o zhes bgros nas/_thams cad gros 'thun nas rgyal po skyed mos tshal du khrus la 'gro ba'i tshe gsad par bya'o/_/de nas skyed mos tshal du dpung gi 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]tshogs sbas nas/_rgyal po rdzing bur 'ongs pa'i tshe thams cad log nas bzung ste/_bsad par byas so/_/rgyal po skrag nas mi khyed cag ci byed ces smras pa dang /_blon po rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chos bzhin du ma byas nas 'dod chags kyis 
[\[264b.2\]]myos nas yul mi thams cad kyang rigs sun cing sma phab ste/_bdag cag ma bzod ches nas khyed med par byas te/_rgyal po mdzangs pa gdod btsal lo snyam mo/_/rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas skrag par gyur te/_blon po rnams la 'di skad ces 
[\[264b.3\]]smras so/_/sngon cad ni bdag gis nyes pa bden gyis/_phyin cad de ltar mi bya na gtang du rung ngam zhes smras pa dang /_blon po rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te gnam la kha ba nag po bab pa'am/_mgo la sbrul nag po skyes kyang mi gnang gi ma smra 
[\[264b.4\]]shig ces bsgo'o/_/rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos nas da ni gdon mi za bar gsod do snyam ste/_khros nas blon po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/nga sngon ri la 'dug ste/_'jig rten la mi dga' ba las nan gyis rgyal por bcug ste/_da ni nga gsod do/_/
[\[264b.5\]]gar skyes kyang khyod nga dang phrad de khyod kyang ngas gsod par shog ces dam bcas so/_/de ltar dam bcas mod kyi 'on kyang ma gnang ste bsad do/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po drang srong de ni da ltar sor 'phreng can yin no/_/de'i tshe mi mang po gros 'thun 
[\[264b.6\]]par rgyal po gsod pa ni sor 'phreng can gyis gsad pa'i mi 'di dag yin te/_rtag tu sor 'phreng can gyis gsod par gyur to/_/rgyal pos pus mo sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge slong sor 'phreng can 'dis mi 'di snyed cig 
[\[264b.7\]]bsad na de ltar 'bras bu thob pa'i 'og tu rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ram/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po sdig pa byas na rnam par smin pa nges par myong ste/_dge slong 'di yang da ltar gnas khang na sems can dmyal ba'i me ba spu'i khung bu 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]kun nas 'bar te sdug bsngal mi bzad pa myong zhing 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po la sdig pa'i las byas na nges par sdig pa rnam par smin pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_dge slong gcig la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge 
[\[265a.2\]]slong khyod song la lde mig khyer te/_dge slong sor 'phreng can gyi sgo'i bu gur chug cig ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong gis bka' bzhin du lde mig thogs te/_sgo'i bu gur bcug ste de ma thag tu zhu'o/_/dge slong de dngangs skrag ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[265a.3\]]spyan sngar 'ongs te de bzhin du gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sdig pa byas pa'i rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin no zhes bka' stsal nas/_rgyal po dang 'khor rnams yid ches par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[265a.4\]]dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge slong sor 'phreng can sngon legs pa ci bgyis na mthu stobs gyad chen po'i stobs dang mnyam zhing rtsal che la bya ltar mgyogs par gyur/_legs pa ci bgyis na bcom ldan 'das dang phrad de 'khor ba las grol 
[\[265a.5\]]bar gyur pa/_'khor mang po la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyod legs par nyon cig_/sngon 'das pa'i dus na/_sangs rgyas 'od srung gi tshe dge slong gcig gang zag gi las byas pa las/_'bru'i khal 
[\[265a.6\]]cig bkal te song song ba las lam du char pas non te/_bros pa'i gnas med pas 'bru dang snod du bcas pa thams cad gsher bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe na dge slong dag mgyogs par 'gro 'dod pa las chu 'thungs pas 'gro bul bas mgyogs par ma gyur pas 'di skad 
[\[265a.7\]]ces smon lam btab bo/_/bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus su mthu mi stong dang mnyam zhing lus yang mgyogs khyad bya 'phur ba dang 'dra bar shog shig_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa 'jig rten du gshegs pa dang phrad nas 'khor ba las grol bar gyur 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/kun dga' bo de la gzhan du ma sems shig de'i tshe na gang zag gi las byas pa'i dge slong de ni da ltar gyi dge slong sor 'phreng can yin no/_/de'i tshe na rab tu byung zhing tshul khrims bsrungs te/_dge 'dun gyi las byas pas/_smon 
[\[265b.2\]]lam bzhin du gang nas gang du skyes kyang byad gzugs bzang ba dang /_mthu stobs dang rtsal che bar gyur to/_/nga dang phrad par smon pas 'khor ba las grol bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe kun dga' bo dang dge slong rnams dang /_rgyal po'i 'khor mang po rnams/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[265b.3\]]kyis rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu gsungs pa thos nas/_thams cad kyis brtson 'grus bskyed de/_bden pa bzhi yid la byas pas la la rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom par gyur to/_/la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[265b.4\]]bskyed do/_/la la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to/_/thams cad lus dang ngag dang yid dge ba la 'dun te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/mi gdung ba sor 'phreng can gyi 
[\[265b.5\]]le'u ste sum cu drug pa'o//_//bam po bcu gcig pa/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe yul de na 
[\[265b.6\]]bud med bsnyen dga' mo zhes bya ba dbul phongs pa 'tsho ba slong mo la ltos pa zhig yod de/_bud med des rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_mi mang pos so so nas sangs rgyas dang /_dge 'dun la mchod par byed pa mthong nas 'di snyam du bsams so/_/bdag gis sngon 
[\[265b.7\]]sdig pa ci zhig byas na/_'di ltar dbul zhing rigs ngan par skyes te/_da bsod nams kyi zhing dang phrad kyang sa bon mi bdog snyam nas/_shin tu yi chad de 'gyod pa skyes nas/_nyi ma gcig gi bar du thog thag bslang na dong tse gcig las ma rnyed de/_dong tse gcig pu de 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]thogs nas mar tshong ba'i khyim du song nas mar zhig nyo bar byas so/_/mar tshong ba'i khyim bdag gis smras pa/_dong tse gcig gis mar nyo ba 'di ha cang nyung ches te/_khyod ci zhig bya zhes byas pa dang /_bsnyen dga' mos kyang drang por gtam byas 
[\[266a.2\]]nas/_mar tshong ba'i bdag po snying brtse ste/_mar lhag par byin no/_/bsnyen dga' mos mar de thob nas/_rab tu dga' ste gtsug lag khang du song nas bcom ldan 'das la 'bul lo/_/zhes sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar mar me btsugs te/_smon lam 'di 
[\[266a.3\]]skad ces btab bo/_/bdag da ltar dbul phongs te/_mar me chung ngu 'dis sangs rgyas la mchod do/_/bsod nams 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus su bdag shes rab kyi mar me dang ldan te/_sems can thams cad kyi mun pa'i dri ma bsal bar shog shig ces 
[\[266a.4\]]smon lam btab nas phyir gnas su song ngo /_/de'i tshe mtshan mo mar me gzhan ni zad kyi/_bsnyen dga' mo'i mar me gcig pu ni nam nangs kyi bar du 'bar ro/_/de'i tshe maud gal ya nas dus 'dzin pa'i res la bab pas/_nam nangs nas mar gyi snod rnams 
[\[266a.5\]]sdud du song ba la/_me mar gcig pu zhig lhag par gsal te/_mar dang snying po yang mnyams par gsar du btsugs ma thag pa 'dra bas 'di snyam du sems so/_/nyin par mar me btsugs kyang phan pa med kyi gsad do snyam nas gsad par gzas na ma sod de/_de nas 
[\[266a.6\]]lag dar te gsad par gzas nam sod de ma nyams so/_/de nas gos kyis gsad par gzas na yang ma sod pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas/_maud gal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyod kyis mar me 'di gsad par sems kyang /_mar me 'di 
[\[266a.7\]]khyod kyis mi sod do/_/khyod nyan thos kyis bsgul zhing bskyod nus pa yang ma yin no/_/gal te khyod kyis rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu 'bab pa'i rdzing rlung yug pas bus kyang sod par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bas na me mar 'di mi kun gyi don rgya chen po byed par bsam pa chen po 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]bskyed pas phul ba yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs nas/_bsnyen dga' mo yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs te zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal ba dang /_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan te/_khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa 
[\[266b.2\]]gnyis 'das nas mngon par sangs rgyas te/_mtshan yang mar me 'od ces bya ste/_dbang bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe na bsnyen dga' mos bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan pa thos nas rab tu dga' ste/_pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs nas rab tu byung 
[\[266b.3\]]bar gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rab tu byung bar gnang ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_maud gal gyi bus bud med dbul mo lung bstan pa thob ste/_rab tu byung ba mthong nas pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar nas bcom 
[\[266b.4\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bsnyen dga' mo 'dis sngon las ci zhig bgyis na/_de srid kyi bar du dbul phongs te/_'tsho ba yang mi rnyed par gyur/_ci zhig bgyis na bcom ldan 'das dang phrad de/_'khor rnam bzhi mchod pa byas par gyur/_
[\[266b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_sngon 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas 'od srung 'jig rten du gshegs te/_de'i tshe khyim bdag gi chung ma zhig gis/_sangs rgyas dang dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa spyan drangs pa las/_sngar bud med dbul mo 
[\[266b.6\]]zhig gis spyan drangs te gshegs par gnang ngo /_/bud med dbul mo de yang lan cig phyir mi ldog pa zhig ste/_de'i tshe na khyim bdag gi chung ma de btsan zhing phyug pa dang /_cho rigs btsun pas dbul mos sngar spyan drangs pa la brnyas smad nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[266b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag gis sngar spyan drangs par mi gshegs par sprang mos spyan drangs par gshegs zhes tshig ngan pa smras te/_'phags pa la brnyas smad pas/_skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du dbul phongs pa/_'tsho ba slong mo la ltos pa'i rigs su skyes so/_/
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]phyi de nyin sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun la dad pas mchod de dga' bas na/_da sangs rgyas dang phrad de/_rab tu byung nas lung bstan pa yin no/_/de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la rab tu dga' bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe rgyal 
[\[267a.2\]]po dang /_blon po dang /_mi mang po dag gis bud med dbul mos sangs rgyas la mar me phul bas sangs rgyas su lung bstan to zhes thos nas thams cad kyis bkur sti byas te/_'tsho ba'i yo byad mchog dam pa rnam pa bzhi chog par sbyar te phul lo/_/de'i tshe yul de'i khye'u dang /_
[\[267a.3\]]bu mo ya rabs dang /_ma rabs thams cad kyis mar me dri bsung can sbyar te/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/_/mar me phul ba'i mi mang pos me mar gyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal kun yongs su gang ste/_phyogs bzhi nas skar ma nam mkha' 
[\[267a.4\]]la snang ba dang 'dra bar nyin gcig bzhin du phul te/_de lta bur rgyun ma chad par nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du phul lo/_/de'i tshe kun dga' bo shin tu dga' nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan ni 'di snyed cig mnga'o zhes bsngags nas/_bcom 
[\[267a.5\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon phrin las ci zhig bgyis na/_'di lta bu'i mar me tshad med pa dang ldan par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_sngon 'das pa'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po 
[\[267a.6\]]pa si li zhes bya ba zhig rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed la dbang byed do/_/rgyal po'i btsun mo la sras gcig byung ste/_lus kyi mdog gser lta bur 'dug la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cur ldan te/_spyi bo la rin po che kha dog gsal 
[\[267a.7\]]ba/_blta na mig sbrid pa zhig yod do/_/mtshan mkhan bos nas bzang ngan brtags te/_ming btags pa las/_mtshan mkhan gyis bltas na/_mtshan ngo mtshar du bzung bas/_lag pa btegs nas shin tu legs so/_/zhes smras te/_rgyal bu 'di ni 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]'jig rten na lha dang mi'i nang du bsgrun du med do/_/gal te khyim na gnas na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/gal te rab tu byung na mngon par 'tshang rgya'o zhes smras te/_mtshan mkhan gyis rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rgyal bu 'di thog ma btsas pa na ngo mtshar 
[\[267b.2\]]ya mtshan gyi ltas ci byung zhes dris pa na/_rgyal bu 'di btsas pa'i spyi bo nas rin po che shin tu gsal ba zhig yod do/_/zhes smras nas/_rgyal bu'i ming rin chen gtsug phud ces btags so/_/phyis cher skyes nas rab tu byung ste/_byang chub la nan tan byas nas mngon par sangs 
[\[267b.3\]]rgyas te/_sems can grangs med pa'i don byas so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po yab kyis sangs rgyas dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum du spyan drangs nas mchod ston gsol to/_/de'i nang na dge slong 'phags pa'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba zhig zla ba gsum 
[\[267b.4\]]du me mar sbyor ba'i yon bdag tu khas blangs nas/_nyin gcig bzhin du grong rgyu zhing grong khyer du song nas tshong dpon dang /_khyim bdag dang mi mang po las mar dang 'bru mar dang /_me mar dang snying po bslangs so/_/de'i tshe na rgyal po de la bu mo thub pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_
[\[267b.5\]]yang thog gi steng na dge slong de nyin gcig bzhin du grong rgyu zhing nyon mongs pa mthong nas de la snying brtse ste/_mi zhig mngags nas/_btsun pa khyod ci zhig bsgrubs na/_rtag tu 'di lta bu nyon mongs zhes dris na dge slong des 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag ni zla ba gsum 
[\[267b.6\]]gyi bar du sangs rgyas dang /_dge 'dun gyi mar me sbyor ba'i yon bdag tu khas blangs te/_de bas na grong rgyu zhing dge bsnyen rnams las mar dang 'bru mar dang /_me mar gyi snying po dang mar me 'dzugs pa'i yo byad rnams blang ngo zhes bu mo la spring ba dang /_bu mo de rab tu dga' 
[\[267b.7\]]nas/_dge slong 'phags pa'i bshes gnyen la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/da phyin cad de lta bur rtag tu 'gro mi dgos kyis/_me mar gyi yo byad kho mos sbyar gyi/_long shig ces bsgo ba dang /_dge slong de yang de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/_de phyin cad rtag tu me mar dang 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]'bru mar dang /_mar me'i yo byad kun sbyar te/_gtsug lag khang du bskyal to/_/dge slong 'phags pa'i bshes gnyen gyis de ltar nyin gcig bzhin du mar me phul te/_kun la phan pa'i don rgya chen po'i sems bskyed pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan 
[\[268a.2\]]te/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa 'das nas/_mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/_mtshan yang mar me mdzad ces bya bar lung bstan nas mtshan sum cu dang ldan par gyur te/_rgyal po'i bu mo thub pas dge slong 'phags pa'i bshes gnyen lung bstan to zhes thos nas 'di snyam du 
[\[268a.3\]]bsams so/_/sangs rgyas la phul ba'i mar me ni bdag gis sbyar te/_dge slong des bskul ma tsam byas kyang lung bstan na bdag la ni lung ma bstan to snyam bsams nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/_de bzhin du drang por gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[268a.4\]]kyis lung bstan te/_bu mo thub pa khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig 'das nas mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/_mtshan yang shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar mtshan bcu dang ldan par lung bstan to/_/de ltar rgyal po'i bu mos kyang sangs rgyas las lung bstan pa 
[\[268a.5\]]thos nas/_rab tu dga' ba skyes par gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas rab tu byung bar gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rab tu byung bar gnang nas/_bar chad med par brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la 
[\[268a.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong 'phags pa'i bshes gnyen ni sngon 'das pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad yin no/_/rgyal po'i bu mo thub pa ni da ltar nga yin te/_sngon mar me phul bas bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du lha dang mi'i 'jig rten na bsod nams myong ste/_
[\[268a.7\]]gzugs kyang gzhan pas 'phags par bzang ste/_da mngon par sangs rgyas nas kyang mar me mang po dang ldan par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs nas/_'khor mang po rnams la la ni 'bras bu dang po nas 'bras bu bzhi pa'i bar du thob bo/_/la la 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]ni rang sangs rgyas su dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do/_/la la ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_'khor mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs te mngon par dga'o/_/bu mo bsnyen dga' mo'i le'u ste 
[\[268b.2\]]sum cu bdun pa'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod spungs pa'i ri la bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na yul de na khyim bdag shi ri tsi zhes bya ba shin tu phyug cing longs spyod dang ldan pa rin po che sna 
[\[268b.3\]]bdun gyis bang mdzod gang ba zhig yod de/_rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/_dus phyi zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_zla ba tshang nas bu khye'u sdug pa mdzes par 'jig rten na dpe med pa zhig btsas te/_pha ma shin tu byams pas mtshan mkhan bos 
[\[268b.4\]]te/_mtshan bltas na/_mtshan mkhan gyis kyang khye'u 'di ni bsod nams kyi mtshan dang ldan te/_rigs kyang 'tshob par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_khye'u'i pha ma lhag par dga' nas/_mtshan mkhan de la bu'i ming thogs shig ces smras pa dang /_mtshan mkhan gyis 
[\[268b.5\]]smras pa/_bu 'di yod par gyur nas/_ltas sam ya mtshan ci byung zhes dris na/_smras pa gzhan ni med kyi khye'u'i ma sngon smra mi mkhas pa las khye'u 'di yod tshun cad smra mkhas par gyur to/_/zhes byas pa dang /_bu'i ming yang ba shi tsir zhes btags so/_/gsos bskyed 
[\[268b.6\]]de cher skyes nas yid gzhungs te rtsal dang ldan par gyur to/_/dus gzhan zhig na byis pa grogs po dag dang rtse zhing song song ba las rigs ngan pa zhig gi khyim na bu mo sdug gu ma tshul du shis pa zhig yod pa mthong nas/_de la chags te chung mar blang bar bsams nas/_phyir khyim 
[\[268b.7\]]du 'ongs te pha ma la bu mo de bdag gi chung mar long shig smras so/_/pha mas smras pa/_bdag ni cho rigs btsun pa yin te/_bu mo de ni rigs chung zhing ngan pa yin na/_ji ltar chung mar blangs zhes byas pa dang /_khye'u rab tu mi dga' ste/_pha ma la yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[269a\]]
