[\[269a.1\]]cho rigs la ma lta bar bu mo de nyid la dga' bas chung mar long shig_/gal te chung mar ma blangs na bdag kyang 'gum mo zhes smras pa dang /_pha mas kyang bu'i ngo ma bzlog pas bu mo slong du btang ngo /_/bu mo'i pha mas smras pa/_khyod ni cho rigs btsun pa yin te/_
[\[269a.2\]]bdag ni rigs chung zhing ngan pa yin pas gnyen zla yang ma yin na/_ci'i phyir bu mo slong zhes byas so/_/'on kyang khye'u de bu mo de la chags so/_/yang bskyar te bu mo slong du btang ba dang /_bu mo'i pha mas 'di skad smras so/_/gal te bdag gi dmag par bya ba rtsal sna tshogs 
[\[269a.3\]]kyang yod la/_glu dang gar dang rtsed mo'i bag ci yang shes shing rgyal po ci la dgyes pa kun shes na gnyen bya'o/_/zhes smras pa dang /_khye'u de rol mo la sogs pa'i las bslab pa la ngo tsha ba dang bsdos nas/_ring por ma lon par kun byang bar bslabs so/_/dus gzhan 
[\[269a.4\]]zhig na rgyal pos rol mo byas te/_rtsal che ba kun bsags nas shing 'dzegs pa dang /_mchongs pa dang /_thag 'dzegs la sogs pa'i rtsed mo sna tshogs byed pa las/_khyim bdag gi bu yang der 'ongs nas thag pa la 'dzegs te/_thag pa la rgyug cing thag 'dzegs byas pa 
[\[269a.5\]]dang /_rgyal po yengs te ma mthong bas gdod byos shig ces bsgo'o/_/khye'u ngal bas thag 'dzegs byas pa dang /_thag pa'i dbus tsam du phyin nas thag pa las lhung ste/_shin tu skrag pas skyabs med do zhes smras so/_/de'i tshe maud gal gyi bu der 'ongs nas sa la ma lhung bar 
[\[269a.6\]]bzung ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod da lus dang srog ma yal bar rab tu byung ngam/_'on te sa la lhung ste bu mo chung mar blang bar bya/_smras pa srog ma yal na chung ma mi 'dod do zhes smras pa dang /_maud gal gyis nam mkha' la sa gzhi mnyam par sprul nas bde bar bzhag 
[\[269a.7\]]pa dang /_khye'u de 'jigs pa med par gyur te/_bde bar sa la bzhag pas khye'u rab tu dga' nas/_maud gal gyi phyi bzhin bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo /_/der phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_sangs rgyas la 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]mchod pa byas so/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin pa'i gtam dang /_tshul khrims kyi gtam dang /_mtho ris kyi lhar skyes pa'i gtam dang /_'dod pa mi gtsang ba dang /_rab tu byung ba ni bde'o zhes rgyas par bstan pas yid rnam par grol te/_'bras bu dang po thob nas/_
[\[269b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la rab tu byung ba gsol zhing dam pa'i chos slob par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas/_skra dang kha spu rang byi ste/_dge slong du gyur nas/_dge slong gi chos la nan tan byas pas zag pa kun zad nas dgra bcom par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan 
[\[269b.3\]]pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge slong 'di bu mo de dang /_sngon gyi las ci ltar 'thun na lus srog la bab kyi bar du chags par gyur/_maud gal gyi bu la dge ba'i rtsa ba ci bskyed na srog bskyabs/_ci'i rkyen gyis mthar dgra bcom par gyur 
[\[269b.4\]]pa bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med pa'i pha rol na/_yul bA rA Na sI 'dir khyim bdag zhig la bu sdug cing bzang ba dpe med pa zhig btsas so/_/de'i tshe na khyim bdag de'i khyim du rgya mtsho nas mi zhig 
[\[269b.5\]]'ongs nas/_khyim bdag de la bya sgong gcig cig phul lo/_/khyim bdag gis lag tu blangs pa dang /_ring po ma lon par sgo nga gas nas/_bya phrug tshar ma gcig byung ngo /_/khyim bdag gis bya phrug de bu la byin nas/_cher skyes pa dang gcig la gcig chags 
[\[269b.6\]]te/_khyim bdag gi bu phan tshun du ltad mo la 'gro na bya de'i rgyab na 'dug nas byas khyer zhing nam mkha' la 'phur te 'gro'o/_/nam skyon yang phyir khyim du 'ongs te/_de bzhin du nyin gcig bzhin du 'phyan te 'gro'o/_/de nas ring zhig lon pa dang /_dus gzhan zhig 
[\[269b.7\]]na rgyal po gzhan zhig gi yul na rol mo byed do zhes thos nas/_khye'u de bya de la zhon nas yul pha rol por ltad mo bltar song nas/_bya shing khar bzhag ste khye'u ni ltad mo bltar zhugs so/_/ltad mo blta ba'i lam du rgyal po'i bu mo dang phrad nas/_rgyal po'i bu mo la chags te/_
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]bu mo dang nyal nas phyir gsang shor te/_rgyal pos zin nas gsod du bcug pa las/_khyim bdag gi bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag la mtshon gyis 'gum yang ci 'tshal/_bdag nyid shing khar 'dzegs te shing khar g.yang du 'gum par gsol 
[\[270a.2\]]pa dang /_rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du gnang nas/_khye'u shing khar 'dzegs te/_bya la zhon nas 'phur te song ba las bya des srog thar bar byas so/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag gi bu de ni ba shi tsir yin no/_/rgyal po'i bu mo de ni bu mo 'di yin no/_/bya de ni 
[\[270a.3\]]maud gal gyi bu yin te/_'das pa'i dus na yang 'dod chags kyi rkyen gyis tshe zad pa las thar bar byas so/_/da yang 'dod chags kyi dbang gis tshe 'phos pa las maud gal gyi bus thar bar byas so/_/dge slong 'di yid gzhungs shing zag pa med pa'i 'bras bu thob pa ni/_sngon 'das 
[\[270a.4\]]pa'i dus na bA rA Na sI 'dir khyim bdag cig la rang sangs rgyas zhig gis bsod snyoms slongs pa las/_khyim bdag des bsod snyoms phul te/_chos ston par gsol pa dang /_de'i tshe rang sangs rgyas des chos bstan mi nus so zhes smras nas/_/lhung bzed nam mkha' la 
[\[270a.5\]]bskyur nas 'phur te song ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag des 'di snyam du bsams te/_skyes bu des rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu ni che na/_dam pa'i chos bstan mi nus pa lta bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus su 'phags pa dang phrad de/_skyes bu 'di bas lhag par dam pa'i chos bstan pa la zad mi shes 
[\[270a.6\]]par shog shig ces smon lam btab bo/_/de'i rkyen gyis yid gzhungs shing dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs pa la/_'khor mang po rnams mngon par dga' nas/_la la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir ldog 
[\[270a.7\]]pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa/_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/kha cig ni rang sangs rgyas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed/_kha cig ni byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang ngo /_/ba shi tsir gyi le'u ste/_sum cu brgyad 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]pa'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe yul de na bram ze phyin te lo shu sha zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_
[\[270b.2\]]bram ze de'i chung ma de rab tu mi sdug cing mig gnyis kyang mi mthong ste/_mi mthong ba de la bu pho ni med kyi/_bu mo bdun yod de rab tu dbul phongs so/_/bram ze'i bu mo de dag kyang so sor bag mar btang ste/_phyis dmag pa dag 'dus nas/_bram ze'i chung ma 
[\[270b.3\]]yang khro shing gtum mo zhig ste bu mo dang /_dmag pa dag 'ong ba la khros nas/_bu mo dag kyang phyir ma la gshe'o/_/de'i tshe zhing dag kyang brnga ran nas/_khyim tshes la ba lang zhig brnyas te/_zhing thog tu song song ba las/_legs par ma bsrungs pas stor to/_/
[\[270b.4\]]de'i tshe na phyin te lo shu shas 'di snyam du bsams so/_/bdag gis sngon nyes pa ci zhig byas na/_khyim du 'ong na ni chung mas rtag tu spyo zhing bu mo bdun dang dmag pa rnams kyis 'dug tu mi ster/_da khyim tshes kyi ba lang brnyas na ni stor bar gyur te/_bdag gis btsal kyang 
[\[270b.5\]]ma rnyed na/_ci ltar bya snyam mya ngan gyis yi mug ste/_'dug 'dug pa las rgyang ma nas de bzhin gshegs pa shing drung na dbang po kun zhi zhing bde bar bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/bram ze des 'khar ba la rkom tshugs bcas te rgyang tshad kyi bar du brtags nas yang 'di snyam du 
[\[270b.6\]]bsams te/_dge sbyong gau ta ma ni rab tu bde ba bskyed do/_/de la ni chung mas spyo ba yang med/_bu mo ngan pa dang dmag pas gtse ba yang med/_zhing brnga ran te/_glang brnyas kyang mi dgos te/_mya ngan med do snyam bsams nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[270b.7\]]de'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/_'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyod kyis bsams pa bzhin te/_nga la yang dag par nyes pa'i skyon gang yang med/_chung ma ngan pa yang med na/_gshe zhing spyo ba lta ci smos/_bu mo bdun gyis 'tshe ba yang med/_dmag pa 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]yang med/_zhing brnga ran pa yang med/_glang stor ba'i mya ngan byed pa yang med do/_/khyod rab tu byung bar dga' 'am zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_bram zes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag da ltar khyim la dur tsam du 'dzin te/_chung ma dang 
[\[271a.2\]]bu mo la dgra tsam du sems so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu byung bar gnang na bdag rab tu 'byung ngo zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par 'ongs so/_/zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_skra dang kha spu rang byi ste dge slong du gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[271a.3\]]kyis ci rigs par chos bstan nas/_de nyid du dri ma kun zad de dgra bcom par gyur to/_/de nas kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi don mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/bram ze 'dis sngon legs pa ci zhig 
[\[271a.4\]]bgyis na nyes pa'i skyon kun bral te/_ras dkar po gtsang ma la tshon zhan pa sla ba ltar dge ba la phan pa'i don byed par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_bram ze 'di da ltar 'ba' zhig ngas phan btags te/_bde bar byas par ma zad kyi/_sngon 
[\[271a.5\]]'das pa'i dus na yang /_nyes pa kun las thar cing /_byas pa bde bar byas so/_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_'das pa'i dus na bram ze 'di la ji ltar bde bar mdzad pa rgyas par bstan du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyod shin tu legs 
[\[271a.6\]]par nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_khyod la bstan par bya'o/_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_de bzhin du thos par 'tshal lo zhes gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med tshad med pa'i 
[\[271a.7\]]pha rol na/_rgyal po mdzes pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_chos bzhin du srid 'tsho'o/_/de'i tshe yul de na bram ze dbyug pa can zhig 'dug ste/_rab tu dbul phongs pa bza' ba dang bgo ba med pa zhig go/_/des khyim bdag zhig las glang zhig brnyas te/_nyin par spyad nas glang de khrid de 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ba dang /_de na khyim bdag ni zan za ste/_dbyug pa can gyis glang de khyim gyi nang du btang ba dang /_glang sgo gzhan du song nas stor ro/_/khyim bdag de zan de zos nas langs pa dang /_de na glang ma mthong nas/_des dbyug pa can la glang 
[\[271b.2\]]ga re zhes byas pa dang /_des smras pa/_khyod kyi khyim du btang ngo /_/khyod kyis nga'i glang bor gyis slar byin cig ces smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_ngas ma bor ro/_/de nas de gnyis 'grogs te/_rgyal po'i thad du 'dong ba dang /_de'u cag gi rigs pa dang /_mi 
[\[271b.3\]]rigs pa rtogs so zhes smras nas de gnyis dong ba dang /_mi gzhan zhig gi rta rgod ma zhig bros nas/_des dbyug pa can la smras pa/_rgod ma ma btang zhes smras pa dang /_des rdo zhig blangs te 'phangs pa dang rta'i rkang pa la phog nas rkang pa bcag go/_/des smras pa/_
[\[271b.4\]]khyod kyis nga'i rta bsad kyis nga'i rta byin cig_/de ci'i phyir rta byin/_des smras pa tshur shog_/rgyal po'i drung du 'dong dang /_de'u cag gi zhal ce gcod du 'ong ngo /_/zhes smras nas/_de dag der song ba dang /_dbyug pa can de bros par brtsams te/_des rtsig pa 
[\[271b.5\]]zhig gi steng du mchongs pa dang /_de'i drung na thag pa zhig thags 'thag cing 'dug pa de'i steng du lhung nas thag pa de tshe 'phos pa dang thag pa'i chung mas dbyug pa can de bzung nas/_khyod kyis nga'i khyo bsad kyis nga'i khyo byin cig ces smras pa dang /_ngas khyod kyi khyo ci ltar byin zhes smras 
[\[271b.6\]]nas/_tshur shog rgyal po'i drung du 'du 'dong ngo /_/de'u cag gi zhal ce gcod do zhes de dag dong ba las lam gyi bar de na chu bo gting zab pa zhig yod de/_chu de'i nang nas tshur shing mkhan zhig ste'u kha nas khyer te 'ong ngo /_/de la dbyug pa can gyis chu'i gting ci tsam zhes dris pa 
[\[271b.7\]]dang /_chu'i gting zab bo zhes smras pas ste'u chur lhung ste/_ste'u ma rnyed pa dang /_des dbyug pa can bzung nas/_khyod kyis nga'i ste'u chur bskyur ro/_/des smras pa ngas ma bskyur ro/_/tshur shog rgyal po'i drung du 'dong dang /_de'u cag gi zhal ce gcod do zhes 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]smras nas 'dong ngo /_/de lus ngal nas chang tshong gi khyim du song ste/_chang bslangs nas chang tshong ma de la bu pho zhig btsas te/_bu gos kyis g.yogs te bsnyal ba la ba las/_dbyug pa can de'i steng du 'dug pa dang /_khye'u de srog dang bral bar gyur to/_/
[\[272a.2\]]des kyang dbyug pa can bzung ste/_khyod kyis nga'i bu bsad kyis bu byin cig_/des smras pa/_ngas ma bsad na khyod kyi bu ngas ji ltar byin/_des tshur shog rgyal po'i drung du 'dong dang /_de'u cag gi zhal ce gcod do zhes smras nas/_de dag dong ba las gnas gzhan zhig 
[\[272a.3\]]na shing sha ko ta ka la bya rog cig 'dug pa des dbyug pa can mthong nas/_gar 'gro zhes smras pa dang /_nga ni mi 'gro na 'di dag gis nga khrid do/_/gang du khrid rgyal po'i drung du'o/_/'o na kho bo'i 'phrin zhig kyang rgyal po la byos shig_/gnas 'di zhes bgyi ba na 
[\[272a.4\]]shing sha ko ta ka de la bya rog cig 'dug pa/_bdag shing gzhan gyi kha na 'dug pa'i tshe skad mi snyan la/_shing 'di'i khar 'ongs na ngo mtshar du skad snyan na/_de ci'i phyir de skad mchi'o zhes smros shig_/de nas yang gnas gzhan zhig tu sbrul zhig gis mthong nas snga ma 
[\[272a.5\]]bzhin du bdag gi 'phrin 'di zhus shig_/bdag nam khung nas phyir 'byung ba'i tshe ni bde/_slar 'jug pa'i tshe ni sdug bsngal na ci'i phyir de ltar gyur ces zhus shig_/de dag dong ba las/_gnas gzhan zhig na na chung ma gzhon nu zhig gis mthong nas/_snga ma bzhin du kho mo'i 'phrin yang 
[\[272a.6\]]zhus shig_/nam kho mo pha ma'i khyim na 'dug pa'i tshe/_gyos po'i khyim 'dod gyos po'i khyim na 'dug pa'i tshe pha ma'i khyim 'dod na/_de ci'i phyir zhus shig ces smras nas/_de dag dong ba las rgyal po'i drung du phyin pa dang /_de dag rgyal po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_
[\[272a.7\]]phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal pos de dag la khyod ci la 'ongs zhes dris pa dang /_de dag gis dbyug pa can dang /_khyim bdag rtsod pa de dag thams cad smras so/_/rgyal pos dbyug pa can la smras pa/_khyod kyis glang brnyas sam/_brnyas so/_/
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]'o na phyir byin nam/_glang bdag gis mthong bar byin to/_/khas ni ma gtad do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_dbyug pa can des glang phyir byin te/_ma smras pas na/_lce chod cig khyim bdag kyang glang 'ongs par mthong la ma btags pas ni/_mig phyung shig ces brjod do/_/
[\[272b.2\]]khyim bdag gis smras pa/_dbyug pa can gyis gcig tu na bdag gi glang phrogs/_gnyis su na bdag gi mig phyung ba bas/_dbyug pa can rgyal bar gyur kyang bla'o/_/mi gcig gis lha dbyug pa can gyis bdag gi rta rgod ma bkum mo zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal 
[\[272b.3\]]pos dbyug pa can la khyod kyis rta ci ltar bsad ces dris na/_bdag lam du zhugs te mchis pa las/_mi 'dis rta ma gtong shig ces mchi ba las/_bdag gis rdo ba gcig blangs te/_'phangs pa las rta gum mo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_rta bdag gis rta ma 
[\[272b.4\]]gtong shig ces smras pas/_rta bdag ni lce chod shig_/dbyug pa can ni rdo ba 'phangs pas lag pa chod cig_/mi des smras pa/_gcig tu na bdag gi rta bsad/_gnyis su bdag gi lce bcad pa bas/_dbyug pa can rgyal bar gyur kyang bla'o/_/shing mkhan 
[\[272b.5\]]gyis smras pa/_dbyug pa can gyis bdag la chu'i gting ci tsam du zab ces dris pas/_kha na ste'u thogs pa chur ltung ngo zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_rdzas ci khyer yang phrag pa la bkur ba'i rigs kyi kha na khyer bas/_shing mkhan gyi mdun so gnyis 
[\[272b.6\]]chog shig_/dbyug pa can ni chu'i gting zab bam zhes dris pas lce chod cig_/shing mkhan gyis smras pa/_gcig tu na bdag gi ste'u stor/_gnyis su na bdag gi so bcag pa pa bas/_dbyug pa can rgyal bar gyur kyang bla'o/_/chang tshong mas smras pa/_dbyug 
[\[272b.7\]]pa can gyis bdag gi bu bsad do/_/dbyug pa can gyis smras pa/_bdag ngal bas chang slong du mchis pas/_stan la ma bltas par stan la 'dug pas/_'og na bu mchis pa ma tshor te bu gum mo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_chang tshong ma khyod bu gor bsnyal la gos 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]kyis mi mngon par g.yogs pas nyes so/_/dbyug pa can khyod stan la mi rtog par 'dug pa nyes kyis/_dbyug pa can khyod khyo byos la bu yod par gyis shig ces smras so/_/chang tshong mas smras pa/_gcig tu na bdag gi bu bsad/_gnyis su na bdag gi khyo 
[\[273a.2\]]byas pa bas/_dbyug pa can rgyal bar gyur kyang bla'o/_/thag pa'i chung mas smras pa/_dbyug pa can gyis bdag gi khyo bkum mo/_/dbyug pa can gyis smras pa/_bdag la dgra [{]mangs [,]mang [}]pas 'jigs te/_rtsig pa las brgal nas bros pa las/_phag na 
[\[273a.3\]]mi yod pa ma mthong ste gum mo/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_song la 'di nyid khyod kyi khyo gyis shig_/des smras pa/_gcig tu na bdag gi khyo bsad gnyis su na 'di khyo byas pa bas/_dbyug pa can rgyal bar gyur kyang bla'o/_/de dag so so nas zhal ce bcad de/_
[\[273a.4\]]dbyug pa can yul byin nas nyes pa kun las thar ro/_/rgyal po de yang bud med gnyis shig bu gcig la rtsod de/_rgyal po blo mkhas pas brtags nas/_bud med gnyis la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/khyod gnyis kyis bu'i lag pa re re nas bzung ste/_drangs la 
[\[273a.5\]]gang gis thob pa bur khyer cig ces bsgo ba dang /_bu'i ma ma yin pa des bu la snying rje med pas snad kyis mi dogs te/_mthu ci yod pas drangs so/_/bu'i ma gang yin pa des ni bu la byams pas snad kyis dogs te/_stobs kyis thub kyang drag tu mi 'dren no/_/rgyal 
[\[273a.6\]]pos kyang brtags nas/_drag tu drangs pa de la 'di ni khyod kyi bu ma yin te/_bud med cig shos kyi bu yin pas na/_drang por smros shig ces smras pa dang /_dal gyis 'dren pa'i bu yin par gyur te bu khyer ro/_/de nas yang mi gnyis shig ras yug gcig la rtsod de/_/
[\[273a.7\]]rgyal po'i drung du lhags pa las/_rgyal pos brtags nas zhal ce gong ma bzhin du bcad do/_/de nas dbyug pa can gyis rgyal po la 'di skad gsol to/_/'di dag gis bdag bzung ste/_khrid cing mchi ba na/_sbrul zhig gi 'phrin du 'di skad ces mchi'o/_/bdag 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]khung bu nas phyir byung zhing mchi ba'i tshe ni bde/_slar 'jug pa'i tshe ni sdug bsngal na/_ci'i phyir na de ltar gyur pa zhus shig ces mchi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_sbrul de la khyod kyis 'di skad ces gyis shig_/khyod mi khro zhing bkres pas khung nas phyir 'byung ba'i tshe bde'o/_/
[\[273b.2\]]phyir byung nas kha zas mang du zos pa las bya rnams kyis gtses pas/_khyod khros nas sbom par gyur pas/_slar 'jug pa'i tshe khung bur thogs nas sdug bsngal lo zhes gyis shig_/khyod kyis da ste kha zas kyi tshod shes la mi khro na/_ji ltar phyir 'byung ba dang 'dra bar bde bar 'jug 
[\[273b.3\]]go zhes smros shig_/de nas na chung ma gzhon nu'i 'phrin smras pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_na chung ma gzhon nu de la khyod pha ma'i khyim na mdza' bo zhig 'dug ste/_nam gyos po'i khyim na 'dug pa'i tshe ni mdza' bo la chags pas pha ma'i khyim du 'gro 'dod nam pha ma'i khyim na 
[\[273b.4\]]'dug pa'i tshe mdza' bo skyo ste/_khyo la chags pas gyos po'i khyim du 'gro 'dod pa yin pas/_gnas gcig spongs la gcig legs par zung shig_/de lta bu'i gnod pa med par 'gyur ro zhes smros shig_/gnas gzhan zhig na shing sha ko ta ka la bya rog cig 'dug pa'i 
[\[273b.5\]]'phrin smras pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_shing de'i 'og na gser yod pas khyod kyi skad snyan pa yin no/_/shing gzhan gyi drung na gser med pas skad mi snyan no zhes gyis shig_/rgyal pos dbyug pa can la smras pa/_khyod la nyes pa mang du byung yang ngas btang 
[\[273b.6\]]ngo /_/khyod ni dbul phongs kyi shing gi 'og na gser gyi gter yod pa brkos la khyer cig_/dbyug pa can gyis rgyal pos bsgo ba bzhin so so'i 'phrin yang bsgo nas/_shing drung nas gser yang phyung ste khyer ro/_/de phyin cad so tshis tshugs nas cis kyang mi brel te/_
[\[273b.7\]]tshe gcig tu phyug cing bde skyid par gyur to/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po mdzes pa de gzhan du ma sems shig_/de ni da ltar nga yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze dbyug pa can de ni bram ze phyin te lo shu sha yin no/_/ngas sngon yang sdug bsngal ba las 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]thar bar byas te/_rin po che byin nas bde skyid par byas so/_/da mngon par sangs rgyas nas kyang sdug bsngal ba las thar bar byas te/_zad mi shes pa'i chos rin po che'i gter byin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe 
[\[274a.2\]]dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_'khor mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/khyim bdag dbyug pa can zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu dgu pa'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig 
[\[274a.3\]]na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe yul de na bram ze shin tsir zhes bya ba cho rigs btsun zhing phyug pa zhig bu med pas/_ston pa drug gi thad du song nas dris pa dang /_
[\[274a.4\]]ston pa drug gis khyod la bu'i mtshan ma yod med do zhes smras so/_/de nas bram ze phyir khyim du 'ongs nas gos dri ma can gyon te/_mya ngan gyi khang bur zhugs nas mi dga' ste/_'di snyam du bsams so/_/bdag la bu ni med kyi gal te nang gcig tshe'i dus byas na 
[\[274a.5\]]khyim dang nor rdzas bcas su rgyal pos dbang ngo snyam bsams nas/_rab tu mi dga' zhing 'dug go/_/de'i tshe bram ze de'i chung ma dge slong ma dang bshes pas/_dge slong ma bram ze'i khyim du 'ongs nas/_bram ze de shin tu mi dga' zhing mya ngan gyis gdungs pa 
[\[274a.6\]]mthong nas/_chung ma la khyod kyi khyo ci'i phyir/_mi dga' zhes dris pa dang /_bram ze'i chung mas smras pa/_bdag la bu med de/_ston pa drug la dris na/_khyod la bu'i mtshan ma med do zhes bsgo bas mi dga' zhing mya ngan byed do/_/de nas dge slong ma des smras 
[\[274a.7\]]pa/_ston pa drug ni thams cad shes pa ma yin na des las kyi rgyu rkyen ga la zhig rig_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na bzhugs te/_thams cad rtogs shing mkhyen pas 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa la thogs pa med pa na/_ci'i phyir bu yod dam med ces 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]mi 'dri zhes bsgo'o/_/dge slong ma de phyir song nas/_bram ze'i chung mas khyo la de skad ces smras pa dang /_bram ze de dga' rangs nas rtogs shing khong du chud par gyur to/_/de ma thag tu gos gsar pa gyon nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas 
[\[274b.2\]]phyin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag la mtshan dang /_dbang thang gi bu ma mchis sam zhes gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze khyod la bu yod par 'gyur te/_bsod nams dang yang 
[\[274b.3\]]ldan la/_cher skyes nas rab tu byung ba la dga' bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/_/bram zes de skad ces bka' stsal ba thos nas/_rab tu dga' mgu yi rang ste/_bu yod par gyur na lta rab tu byung yang bla ste/_sdug bsngal med do zhes smras nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[274b.4\]]'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bshos la gshegs par spyan drangs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gshegs su gnang nas/_phyi de nyin gdugs tshod la bab nas/_sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun rnams dang bcas su bram ze de'i 
[\[274b.5\]]khyim du gshegs nas/_gdan bting ba la bzhugs te/_bram ze khyo shug gis bsti stang dang bcas pas bsod snyoms gsol to/_/bsod snyoms gsol nas/_sangs rgyas dang /_dge 'dun dang bcas su slar gshegs pa dang /_de'i bar na ne'u 
[\[274b.6\]]gsing zhig yod de/_de na chu mig shin tu gtsang ma zhig yod pa la/_bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams mnyel bshol te/_so so nas chu mig de la chu bcus te/_lhung bzed dang rkang lag bkrus so/_/de nas spre'u zhig der 'ongs 
[\[274b.7\]]nas/_kun dga' bo las lhung bzed blangs pa dang /_bcag gis dogs pas kun dga' bos lhung bzed ma ster ba las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la lhung bzed spre'u la byin cig ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas kun dga' bos lhung bzed spre'u la 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]byin pa dang /_spre'us shing kha nas sbrang rtsi blangs te/_lhung bzed bkang nas bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrang rtsi'i nang gi mi gtsang ba sol cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_spre'us srin bu'i ro la sogs pa bsal te phul 
[\[275a.2\]]lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrang rtsi'i lhung bzed bzhes nas sbrang rtsi chu dang /_sbyor la stsol cig ces bka' stsal nas/_chu dang sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la yang bgos 
[\[275a.3\]]te/_byin nas thams cad ngoms par gyur to/_/de'i tshe spre'u des de lta bu dag mthong nas rab tu dga' ste/_mchongs pa dang gar byas pa las g.yang du lhung ste tshe'i dus byas nas/_de ma thag tu bram ze'i bur skyes te/_bram ze de'i chung ma sems can dang ldan par 
[\[275a.4\]]gyur te/_zla ba tshang nas khye'u bzang ba blta na sdug pa cig btsas so/_/thog mar btsas pa'i tshe khyim gyi nang na snod ci yod pa de dag thams cad kyi nang na sbrang rtsis gang bar gyur to/_/bram ze khyo shug rab tu dga' nas mtshan mkhan bos te/_mtshan bltas so/_/
[\[275a.5\]]mtshan mkhan gyis khye'u 'di btsas pa na/_ltas sam ya mtshan ci zhig byung zhes dris na/_thog mar btsas pa'i tshe sbrang rtsis gang ngo zhes smras nas/_bu'i ming yang sbrang rtsi mchog ces btags so/_/de nas bu gsos bskyed de cher skyes nas pha ma la rab tu byung bar 
[\[275a.6\]]gsol to/_/pha ma bu la chags pas ma btang ngo /_/khye'us yang dang yang du gsol te/_pha mas bdag gi bgegs bgyis na bdag 'gum phod kyi/_'du 'dzi'i nang du 'tsho mi phod do zhes smras so/_/de nas khye'u'i pha mas bgros te/_sngon bcom ldan 
[\[275a.7\]]'das kyis kyang rab tu byung ngo zhes lung bstan te/_da bar chad byed na srog dang bral bar gyur du 'ong gis/_gnang bar bya'o zhes gros byas nas/_bu khyod yid bzhin du rab tu byung bar gnang ngo zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas khye'u dga' mgu rangs nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]'das gang na ba der song gis phyin pa dang /_zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_rab tu byung bar gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang legs par 'ongs so/_/zhes bka' stsal nas/_skra dang kha spu rang byi ste/_dge slong du gyur to/_/de nas bden pa bzhi'i 
[\[275b.2\]]chos rgyas par bstan pas sems rnam par grol lo/_/zag pa kun nas zad nas dgra bcom par gyur to/_/dge slong dag dang phan tshun sems can gyi don la 'gro ba'i tshe/_gal te skom mam ngal na nam mkhar lhung bzed bor ba sbrang rtsis rang gang ste/_kun dang thun mong 
[\[275b.3\]]du 'thung ngo /_/de nas kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge slong sbrang rtsi mchog gis sngon bsod nams ci zhig bgyis na rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon par dgra bcom pa chos las bsam pa yid bzhin du thob par gyur/_bcom ldan 
[\[275b.4\]]'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod sngon bram ze shin tsir zhes bya bas bsod snyoms gsol ba dran nam/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis zas kyi bya ba byas nas/_ne'u gsing la bsti ba na/_spre'u zhig gis khyod las lhung bzed blangs te/_sbrang 
[\[275b.5\]]rtsis bkang nas nga la phul ba dang /_spre'u dga' nas mchongs pa dang /_gar byas pa las g.yang du song ste/_tshe brjes pa dran nam/_gsol pa dran no/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe na sbrang rtsi phul ba'i spre'u de ni dge slong sbrang rtsi mchog 'di yin no/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[275b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das mthong nas dga' ba'i sems kyis sbrang rtsi phul bas bram ze de'i bur skyes te/_byad gzugs bzang ba dang /_rab tu byung nas zag pa med par gyur to/_/de nas kun dga' bos pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[275b.7\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge slong 'dis nyes pa ci zhig byas nas spre'u'i nang du skyes par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_sngon 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas 'od srung 'jig rten du gshegs pa'i tshe dge slong gsar zhugs gzhon nu zhig 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]gis/_dge slong zhig yur ba la mchongs par mthong nas/_'di skad du khyod ni rab tu myur te spre'u dang 'dra'o zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong des thos nas de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod kyis nga shes sam/_smras pa khyod ni sangs rgyas 'od 
[\[276a.2\]]srung gi dge slong yin te/_de ci'i phyir mi shes/_dge slong des smras pa/_khyod nga la ma 'phya shig_/nga ni ming tsam gyi dge slong ma yin te/_dge slong gi 'bras bu bzhi yang ngas thob bo zhes bsgo ba dang /_dge slong gzhon nu de dngangs te/_ba spu yang 
[\[276a.3\]]langs te/_lus smad lnga sa la gtugs te/_'gyod tshangs su gsol te/_de ltar 'gyod tshangs byas pas ni/_sems can dmyal bar ma skyes so/_/dgra bcom pa la 'phyas pa ni/_skye ba lnga brgya'i bar du rtag tu spre'ur skyes so/_/sngon yang rab tu byung 
[\[276a.4\]]ste/_tshul khrims bsrungs pas nga dang phrad nas bkrus pa bzhin du sdug bsngal kun zad do/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na/_dge slong gzhon nu de ni da ltar sbrang rtsi mchog yin no/_/de'i tshe kun dga' bo dang /_'khor mang po sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas 
[\[276a.5\]]kun gyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las ni mi bsrung du mi rung ngo /_/dge slong 'di yang ngag gi las ma bsrungs pas las kyi rnam par smin pa 'di lta bur gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun 
[\[276a.6\]]dga' bo khyod kyis smras pa bzhin no zhes bka' stsal nas/_bden pa bzhi rgyas par bstan pas/_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las rnam par dag cing sems kyi dri ma kun dang bral bas/_kha cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir ldog pa dang /_
[\[276a.7\]]phyir mi ldog pa dang /_dgra bcom pa thob par gyur to/_/kha cig ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/la la ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la 'khor mang po rnams rjes 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]su yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/bram ze shin tsir gyi le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa'i 'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe yul 
[\[276b.2\]]ko sa la na/_khyim bdag dam shin tsir zhes pa phyug pa/_btsan pa/_rigs che ba zhig yod de/_de la bu med nas lha klu la sogs te/_lha thams cad kyi rten la mchod pa byas nas bu bslangs so/_/khyim bdag des lha kun la snying nas mchod de bu bslangs 
[\[276b.3\]]pas/_phyis de'i chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/_zla ba tshang nas bu khye'u bzang ba blta na sdug pa/_'jig rten na dkon pa zhig byung ngo /_/mtshan mkhan bos nas mtshan bltas so/_/mtshan mkhan gyis kyang mtshan dang sbyar te/_bu'i ming yang dan 
[\[276b.4\]]byi la zhes bya bar btags so/_/gsos bskyed de cher skyes pa dang /_rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi pha shi nas khye'u de rgyal pos pha'i gor rgyal por bcug go/_/de ltar pha'i gor rgyal por dbang bskur ba na/_khang khyim kun rin po che sna bdun du gyur te/_bang mdzod 
[\[276b.5\]]mang po thams cad yongs su gang nas/_ci yang yod par gyur to/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i sras bai dUr+ya zhes bya ba tsha ba'i nad kyis btab ste/_sman pas sman dpyad byas nas sman du gor shi sha tsan dan gyis lus bskus na 'tsho'o zhes smras nas/_rgyal pos yul mi la 'di skad 
[\[276b.6\]]ces bkar btags so/_/khyod su la gor shi sha tsan dan yod na rgyal po la phul cig_/bya dgar gser srang stong byin no/_/zhes kun tu bsgo na/_gcig tsam la yang ma byung ngo /_/de'i tshe na gcig gis rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yul ko sa lar 
[\[276b.7\]]khyim bdag dan byi la'i khyim na mang du yod do zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal po nyid rta'i theg pa la zhon te/_tsan dan slong du chas so/_/khyim bdag de'i sgor phyin pa dang /_khyim bdag de'i sgo na sgo srung dag gis rgyal po gsal rgyal 'dir gshegs te/_da lta ni phyi 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]rol na bzhugs so zhes smras pa dang /_khyim bdag de rab tu dga' nas sgor byung ste/_rgyal po nang du bsus so/_/rgyal po sgor phyin te bltas na/_sgo nyid kyang dngul las byas te/_sgo'i nang rol na bud med mdzes shing sdug pa 'jig rten na zla med pa 
[\[277a.2\]]zhig dngul gyi khri la 'dug ste/_dngul gyi skud pa 'khal lo/_/drung na na chung bzang mo bcu yang g.yog byed de/_rgyal pos de mthong nas khyim bdag de la 'di khyod kyi chung ma yin nam/_zhes dris na ma yin te/_sgo srung ba'i bran mo yin no zhes smras so/_/'o na 
[\[277a.3\]]na chung bzang mo 'di dag ci la dgos zhes dris na/_'di ni phyi nang du bzlugs pa'i mngag gzhug yin no zhes smras so/_/de nas sgo rim pa gcig gi nang du phyin te bltas na/_sgo ni bai dUr+ya mthon mthing las byas te/_sgo'i nang rol na na chung bzang mo blta na sdug pa snga ma 
[\[277a.4\]]bas kyang lhag pa g.yog na chung ma bzang mo snga ma bas phyed kyis mang ba zhig 'dug go/_/de nas yang sgo rim pa gcig tu phyin te/_bltas na/_sgo yang gser las byas te/_sgo'i nang rol na na chung bzang mo blta na sdug pa snga ma bas kyang shin tu lhag pa zhig gser 
[\[277a.5\]]gyi khri la 'dug ste/_gser gyi thags 'thag go/_/g.yas g.yon na na chung bzang mo g.yog byed pa snga ma bas kyang shin tu mang bas/_khyim bdag de la 'di yang khyod kyi chung ma yin nam zhes dris na/_'di yang ma yin no zhes smras so/_/de nas khyim gyi nang du phyin te 
[\[277a.6\]]bltas na/_sa gzhi kun bai dUr+ya las byas pa/_shin tu gsal ba ni chu'i mdog dang 'dra ste/_steng gi khang pa la gcan gzan gyi gzugs dang /_chu srin dang nya la sogs pa'i gzugs spyangs te/_rlung gis bskyod na 'gul bas gzugs brnyan sa gzhi la snang ngo /_/
[\[277a.7\]]rgyal pos yang dag par chu yin snyam bsams te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/chu gud nas med dam/_ci nyes na khang pa'i nang du rdzing bu bskyil zhes smras so/_/dan byi las smras pa/_'di ni chu ma lags te/_bai dUr+ya mthon mthing ngo zhes smras so/_/lag 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]gi gdu bu phud nas steng du bor ro/_/rgyal pos de lta bu gzigs nas khang pa'i nang du gshegs te/_rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa'i nang du bai DUr+ya mthon mthing gi khri bshams nas rgyal po bzhugs su gsol to/_/khyim bdag gi chung ma yang de na 'dug pa las mig nas mchi 
[\[277b.2\]]ma byung nas/_rgyal pos ci'i phyir mig nas mchi ma byung /_nga 'ongs pa mi dga' 'am ci nyes dris na/_khyim bdag gi chung mas gsol pa/_rgyal po 'dir gshegs pa ni legs te dga' na/_rgyal po'i na bza' la dud pa cung zad cig bro bas mig nas mchi ma byung 
[\[277b.3\]]gis/_rgyal po mthong mi 'tshal ba ni ma lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_khyod kyi khyim na me tsam yang mi 'bud dam/_smras pa me ma mchis so/_/'o na kha zas ci zhig gis g.yo/_/smras pa kha zas ni/_bsams pa tsam gyis kha zas ro brgya dang ldan par 'byung 
[\[277b.4\]]ngo /_/rgyal pos smras pa/_mtshan mo cha'i mun pa'i nang na ci zhig gis mthong bar 'gyur/_smras pa nor bu rin po ches snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sgo bcad kyang skar khung nas nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis nyin par dang 'dra bar snang ngo /_/de nas dan byi las pus mo gnyis 
[\[277b.5\]]sa la btsugs te/_rgyal po ci'i phyir 'o brgyal te 'dir gshegs zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos 'di skad ces smras so/_/nga'i bu bai DUr+ya tsha ba'i nad kyis btab nas/_sman pas dpyad de sman du gor shi sha tsan dan gyis bsku dgos so zhes zer na/_'dir 
[\[277b.6\]]khyod la slong du 'ongs so/_/zhes smras pa dang /_khyim bdag de rab tu dga' nas rgyal po nyid bang mdzod du gshegs su gsol te/_rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa nor dbyig thams cad bstan nas/_tsan dan gyi phung po tshad med pa snyed kyang bstan nas ci bzhed 
[\[277b.7\]]bzhes shig ces gsol ba dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_nga la srang gnyis las ni mi dgos kyi byin cig ces smras pa dang /_khyim bdag gis ci bzhed pa phul lo/_/de nas rgyal po slar gshegs pa dang /_khyim bdag de la khyod sangs rgyas dang phrad du 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]song shig ces bsgo'o/_/khyim bdag des smras pa/_sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ci lta bu/_rgyal pos smras pa/_ci khyod kyis ma thos sam/_grong khyer ser skya'i rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sras rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_shi ba la skyo nas rab tu byung ste/_
[\[278a.2\]]byang chub la nan tan byas pas mngon par sangs rgyas te/_mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku brgyan pa nas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ye shes ni dpe zla med de/_lha dang mi'i gtso bor gyur bas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/khyim bdag gis 
[\[278a.3\]]de skad ces smras pa thos nas/_shin tu dad pa'i sems skyes nas/_rgyal po la sangs rgyas da ltar gang na bzhugs zhes gsol ba dang /_rgyal bos smras pa/_da ltar rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/rgyal po gshegs zin ma thag tu khyim bdag de yang 
[\[278a.4\]]sangs rgyas gang na bzhugs pa der song nas phyin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku la brtags na rgyal po kun bas kyang shin tu lhag par mthong nas/_dga' mgu ste rangs nas/_mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas snyun gsol to/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyis ci rigs 
[\[278a.5\]]par chos bstan pas/_khyim bdag de yang rgyun du zhugs pa thob par gyur te/_des pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la rab tu byung bar gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang legs par 'ongs so zhes bka' stsal nas/_skra dang 
[\[278a.6\]]kha spu rang byi ste/_dge slong du gyur to/_/de nas yang bden pa bzhi'i chos ci rigs par bstan pas sems kyi dri ma yongs su dag ste/_dgra bcom par gyur to/_/de nas kun dga' bo dang 'khor mang po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[278a.7\]]dge slong dan byi las bsod nams ci zhig bgyis na mi'i nang du skyes la/_lha'i longs spyod dang ldan yang khyim la ma chags te/_rab tu byung bar dga' nas de ma thag tu 'bras bu thob par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_shin tu 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]legs par nyon cig sngon 'das pa'i pha rol na bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig 'das pa'i pha rol na/_sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du gshegs te/_sangs rgyas de mya ngan las 'das nas gzugs brnyan la chos spyod pa'i tshe/_dge slong lnga brgya tsam 
[\[278b.2\]]zhig lhan cig tu 'di skad ces dam bcas so/_/bdag cag gis dben pa'i gnas shig btsal la byang chub kyi lam bsgom mo zhes byas nas/_/tshal zhig gi nang na gsing ma dang /_chu mig yod pa zhig ta dben pa'i gnas bcas te/_dge slong de dag yid 'thun par dge 
[\[278b.3\]]slong gcig la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab bo/_/bdag cag gi gnas 'di grong khyer dang ring bas thams cad bsod snyoms la 'gro na/_kun nyon mongs kyis khyod bsod nams bya ba'i phyir/_khyod kyis nged kyi bsod snyoms slong la byin cig ces smras pa dang /_dge 
[\[278b.4\]]slong des kyang de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/_rtag tu grong du song ste/_sbyin bdag mang po la chos bstan nas bsod snyoms bslangs so/_/de'i nang na mi bzhi zhig lus las su rung bas bsgoms nas/_zhag dgu bcu lon pa dang 'bras bu thob par gyur te/_de dag 
[\[278b.5\]]yid 'thun par dge slong bsod snyoms slong ba la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/bdag cag ni khyod kyi phyir rab tu bde ste/_thob par re ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob kyis/_khyod cir smon pa nga la byos shig dang /_khyod kyi re ba bskang ngo /_/zhes bsgo'o de'i tshe dge slong 
[\[278b.6\]]de yang rab tu dga' nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus su lha'am mir skyes kyang phyug cing longs spyod dang ldan te/_ci dgos pa thams cad ched du las ma byas par thams cad rang skyes par gyur cig_/slob dpon 'phags pa dang phrad nas 
[\[278b.7\]]khyod bas kyang brgya 'gyur stong 'gyur du chos thos nas/_sems yongs su dag cing 'bras bu thob par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dan byi las dge slong grogs po bzhi'i 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]bsod snyoms sbyar bas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du lha dang mi'i nang na cho rigs btsun par skyes te/_dbul zhing phongs pa'i rigs su ma skyes so/_/da yang nga mthong ba tsam gyis dad pa thob par gyur to/_/de'i tshe na kun dga' bo dang dge slong rnams 
[\[279a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa thos nas/_so so nas brtson 'grus brtsams pas 'bras bu dang po nas 'bras bu bzhi pa'i bar du thob bo/_/kha cig ni rgya chen po'i sems bskyed de/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad 
[\[279a.3\]]ces bka' stsal pa la/_so so nas rjes su yi rang ste mngon par dga'o/_/khyim bdag dan byi la zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gcig pa'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu 
[\[279a.4\]]rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe yul ma ga d+hA na/_khyim bdag cig la bu zhig btsas te/_bzang ba blta na sdug pa mtshan dang ldan pa zhig go/_/khye'u thog ma btsas pa na/_bang mdzod kyi nang nas ngo mtshar ba gser 
[\[279a.5\]]gyi glang po che'i phrug gu zhig rang byung ngo /_/khye'u'i pha mas de lta bu mthong nas rab tu dga' ste/_mtshan mkhan la bstan nas mtshan mkhan gyis kyang khye'u bsod nams kyi mtshan dang ldan par rtogs so/_/khye'u thog ma btsas na ngo mtshar che ba'i ltas ci byung zhes dris 
[\[279a.6\]]so/_/khye'u'i pha mas smras pa/_khye'u 'di btsas pa na bang mdzod nang nas gser gyi glang po che'i phrug gu zhig rang byung ngo zhes smras pa dang /_khye'u'i ming yang glang po skyong zhes bya bar btags so/_/khye'u ji tsam du cher skyes pa bzhin du gser gyi glang po che'i 
[\[279a.7\]]phrug gu yang skyes te/_khye'u 'gro na glang po che'i phrug gu yang 'gro ste/_rtag tu 'grogs te/_glang po che'i phrug gu'i gcin rtug kyang gser du byung ngo /_/glang po skyong cher skyes nas khyim bdag gi bu lnga brgya tsam dang /_rtag tu lhan cig tu rtse ste/_gcig 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]la gcig yid gcugs pas phyi zhig na byis pa de dag so so nas/_khyim na ngo mtshar che ba ci yod pa'i gtam byas pa dang /_de la kha cig ni nga'i khyim khri stan dang /_nyal ba'i mal cha la sogs pa thams cad rin po che sna bdun las byas so/_/zhes zer ro/_/
[\[279b.2\]]kha cig ni nga'i khyim dang skyed mos tshal la sogs pa thams cad rin po che zhes zer ro/_/kha cig ni nga'i bang mdzod rtag tu rin po che'i dam pas yongs su gang ngo zhes zer te/_kun gyis so so nas ya mtshan ci yod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kun smras pa dang /_de nas 
[\[279b.3\]]glang po skyong gis kyang bdag thog ma btsas pa na/_gser gyi glang po che'i phrug gu gcig kyang rang byung ste/_kho bo ji tsam skyes pa bzhin du glang po che'i phrug gu yang de bzhin du skyes te/_kho bo yang bsams pa bzhin du 'gro la glang po che la zhon nas ltad mo 
[\[279b.4\]]lta ba la sogs pa gar yang yid bzhin du mgyogs par 'gro ste/_gcin rtug kyang gser du 'gyur zhes smras pa dang /_de'i tshe na rgyal bu ma skyes dgra yang de na 'dug ste/_glang po skyong gis smras pa thos nas 'di snyam du bdag nam rgyal por gyur pa na glang po che 
[\[279b.5\]]'phrog go snyam bsam mo/_/phyis rgyal por gyur nas glang po skyong bkug ste/_khyod kyi glang po che 'on cig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas glang po skyong gi pha mas bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ma skyes dgra lta bu khro zhing gtum la 'dod pa che ba med de/_bdag 
[\[279b.6\]]gi pha yang gsod na gzhan lta ci smos te/_da khyod kyi glang po che 'phrogs par byas kyis glang po che sbyin dgos so/_/bus smras pa/_bdag gi glang po che 'di sus kyang 'phrogs mi nus so zhes smras nas/_spun gnyis glang po che la zhon te/_rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor 
[\[279b.7\]]'ongs pa dang /_sgo srung dag gis rgyal po la gsol to/_/rgyal pos kyang glang po skyong spun gnyis la glang po che ma babs par nang du shog shig ces bsgo ba dang /_glang po skyong spun gnyis glang po che la zhon te/_pho brang gi nang du 'ongs nas gdod babs so/_/de 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]nas rgyal po la phyag byas te/_bde bar gyur cig ces smras pa dang /_rgyal po rab tu dga' ste/_stan bting ba la 'dug tu bcug ste/_bza' ba dang /_btung ba byin to/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_'og tu phyir 'gro zhes byas pa 
[\[280a.2\]]dang /_glang po skyong la gser gyi glang po zhog la khyed cag phyir deng shig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas glang po skyong yang rgyal po'i bka' bzhin glang po che phyir bzhag nas/_spun gnyis rkang pas song ste/_sgor phyin pa tsam na ring por ma lon par glang po che de 
[\[280a.3\]]yang de nyid du sa'i 'og tu nub nas sgo'i phyi rol tu glang po skyong gi drung du byung ngo /_/glang po skyong spun gnyis de la phyir zhon te/_khyim du song nas 'di snyam du sems so/_/rgyal po yang chos bzhin du byed pa ma yin te/_ma nyes pa dag kyang khrims dang sbyar bas/_
[\[280a.4\]]bdag gis kyang ma ster na/_glang po che 'di'i phyir srog la rgal bar 'ong gis da ltar bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten na 'gro ba mang po la bde ba'i don mdzad pa de'i drung du song la/_khyim nas rab tu byung zhing tshangs par spyod pa la dga' bar bya'o snyam bsams nas pha ma 
[\[280a.5\]]la rab tu byung bar gsol pa dang pha mas kyang rab tu byung bar gnang nas/_'phyi phyag 'tshal te gser gyi glang po che la zhon nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gang na bar song ngo bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin pa dang zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_ji ltar gyur 
[\[280a.6\]]pa rgyas par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par 'ongs so zhes bka' stsal pas/_skra dang kha spu rang byi ste/_dge slong du gyur to/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa bzhi'i chos ci rigs par bstan pas dgra bcom par gyur to/_/dge 
[\[280a.7\]]slong glang po skyong yang dge slong grogs gzhan dang lhan cig gang na 'dug kyang rung ste/_gser gyi glang po che rtag tu drung na 'dug go/_/de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na 'khod pa rnams kyis gser gyi glang po che blta ba'i phyir mi thams cad 'du bar gyur te/_rnal 'byor 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]spyod pa la 'du 'dzi mang bar gyur to/_/dge slong de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i phyir dge slong glang po skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyod kyi glang po che la blta bas mang po mi dben par gyur gyis/_myur 
[\[280b.2\]]du spong shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_glang po skyong gis gsol pa/_bdag gis kyang thog ma nas spangs par bsams na/_'gror ma btub bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyod glang po che la lan gsum gyi bar du 'di skad ces smros 
[\[280b.3\]]shig_/nga ni skye ba'i phyogs zad de da phyin cad mi dgos kyi smros shig dang med par 'gyur ro/_/glang po skyong gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du glang po che la mi dgos zhes lan gsum gyi bar du smras pas gser gyi glang po che yang sa'i nang du nub bo/_/
[\[280b.4\]]dge slong dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/dge slong glang po skyong 'dis sngon bsod nams kyi zhing ci lta bu la dge ba'i rtsa ba ci lta bu zhig bskyed na 'di lta bu'i 'bras bu rnam par smin par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[280b.5\]]kun dga' bo dang dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/so so'i skye bo gang yang rung ba dkon mchog gsum gyi bsod nams kyi zhing la/_dge ba'i sa bon cung zad cig btab na 'bras bu tshad med pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/sngon 'das pa'i dus 
[\[280b.6\]]na sangs rgyas 'od srung 'jig rten du gshegs pa'i tshe mi tshe ni lo stong phrag nyi shu'i bar du gnas so/_/sangs rgyas de sems can gyi don byas nas/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu ring bsrel la mchod rten mang du byas so/_/de'i tshe mchod rten gcig gi 
[\[280b.7\]]nang na byang chub sems dpa' thog ma dga' ldan gyi gnas nas babs te/_yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa'i tshe/_bcibs pa glang po che de'i mchod rten zhig kyang yod de/_de'i tshe glang po che'i gzugs cung zad cig zhig nas/_de la mi zhig phyag 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]'tshal du 'ongs nas/_glang po che cung zad cig zhig pa de mthong nas de 'di snyam du bsams so/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bcibs pa'i theg pa yin te/_'di ltar zhig par gyur gyi bdag gis slar gso snyam bsams nas/_
[\[281a.2\]]'jim pa zhig sbyar te bskus pa'i steng du ldong ros kyis bskus nas 'di skad ces smon lam btab bo/_/bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus su rtag tu cho rigs btsun zhing longs spyod zad mi shes pa dang ldan par shog shig ces smon lam btab bo/_/mi de tshe 'phos nas mtho 
[\[281a.3\]]ris kyi lhar skyes te/_lha las tshe'i dus byas nas mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/_rtag tu cho rigs btsun pa dang /_longs spyod dang ldan zhing /_byad gzugs 'phags par bzang ste/_gser gyi glang po che rtag tu bsrungs par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[281a.4\]]'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_de'i tshe de'i dus na glang po che gsos pa'i mi de ni da ltar dge slong glang po skyong yin no/_/de'i tshe glang po che gsos pa de tshun cad lha dang mi'i nang na longs spyod chen po dang ldan par gyur to/_/dkon mchog gsum la 
[\[281a.5\]]gus shing bsti stang byas pas da ltar nga dang phrad nas bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/_sems kyi dri ma kun zad de/_dgra bcom par gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_'khor mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa 'di thos nas thams cad 
[\[281a.6\]]kyis don rtogs shing khong du chud de/_la la ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir ldog pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa dang /_dgra bcom pa yang thob par gyur to/_/kha cig ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas 
[\[281a.7\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la 'khor mang po mngon par dga' nas rjes su yi rang ngo /_/glang po skyong gi le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o//_//bam po bcu gnyis pa/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo zhabs 'bring du khrid de/_bsod snyoms la gshegs pa na/_bcom ldan 'das gsol ba'i 
[\[281b.2\]]na bza' rdol ba cung zad cig yod de/_de yang sems can 'dul bar rigs pa'i don du dgongs so/_/bsod snyoms bslangs nas slar gshegs pa'i tshe/_bram ze zhig 'ongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[281b.3\]]kyi mtshan lhang nge lhan ner gsal ba la brtags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi na bza' cung zad cig rdol ba mthong nas sbyin pa bya bar bsams te/_khyim na ras dkar po zhig yod pa las dum bu gcig bcad nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phul te/_
[\[281b.4\]]ras kyi dum bu 'dis na bza' zhig lhan pa mdzod cig ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bzhes pa dang /_bram ze rab tu dga' nas mgu rangs par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la thugs brtse ba'i slad du lung 
[\[281b.5\]]bstan te/_bram ze khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa brgya 'das nas mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/_mtshan yang mngon par shes pa bzang po zhes bya ste/_stobs bcu rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa dang /_rab tu dga' nas song ngo /_/de'i 
[\[281b.6\]]tshe yul de na cho rigs btsun pa'i tshong dpon dang /_khyim bdag la sogs pas 'di snyam du bsam mo/_/ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa cung zad tsam gyi lan rab tu che ba byin snyam bsams nas/_so so nas ras dkar po bshams nas/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[281b.7\]]pa'i na bza' rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas/_sangs rgyas la phul lo/_/kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig mdzad na/_thams cad kyis na bza' mang po phul zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyod legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang khyod la bstan par bya'o/_/sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med tshad med pa'i pha rol na/_sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig 
[\[282a.2\]]rten du gshegs te/_'khor stong phrag dgu bcu dang /_lhan cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po ni ban du zhes bya ste/_de'i tshe blon po chen po gcig gis sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun dang bcas te/_zla ba gsum gyi bar du bzhugs par spyan drangs nas/_
[\[282a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de bzhin du gnang ba dang /_blon po de phyir khyim du 'ongs nas/_yo byad rnams sbyor zhing shom mo/_/de'i tshe rgyal pos kyang sangs rgyas dang /_dge 'dun spyan drang bar bsams te/_sangs rgyas gang na bar song ste phyin pa dang /_
[\[282a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dang /_'phags pa'i dge 'dun dang bcas te/_zla ba gsum gyi bar du bdag gi mchod pa bzhes shig ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po la 'di skad ces 
[\[282a.5\]]bka' stsal to/_/ngas sngar blon po chen pos spyan drangs pas gshegs par byas te/_skyes bu chen po'i chos kyi sngar gnang ba las 'gal bar byar mi rung ngo /_/de nas rgyal po phyir pho brang du 'ongs te/_blon po chen po la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/yul 'di na 
[\[282a.6\]]nga las che ba med de/_bcom ldan 'das nga'i yul na bzhugs pa/_ngas sngar mchod pa bya bar bsams te/_spyan drangs nas sngar khyod kyis spyan drangs kyi khyod re zhig sdod cig ngas sngar spyan drangs pa'i 'og tu khyod kyis spyan drongs shig ces bsgo ba dang /_
[\[282a.7\]]blon po des rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha khyod kyis bdag gi lus dang srog kyang mi nyes par gnya' spyod la/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang rtag par bzhugs pa dang /_rgyal po'i yul yang rtag tu bde skyid cing yi 'grog mi 'byung zhing gnya' 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]spyod na bdag kyang re shig sdod do zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos 'di ni mi rung snyam bsams nas bdag cag gnyis nyin res kyi spyan drang ngo zhes bsgo nas nyi ma gcig ni rgyal pos spyan drangs/_nyi ma gcig ni blon pos spyan drangs te/_gnyi ga'i re ba bskangs so/_/
[\[282b.2\]]de'i tshe blon po chen po des de bzhin gshegs pa la chos gos smad gsum phul nas dge slong gi dge 'dun stong phrag dgu bcu rnams la yang chos gos bdun pa re re sbyar te phul lo/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na blon po chen pos chos gos sbyar te/_sangs rgyas 
[\[282b.3\]]dang dge 'dun rnams la phul ba de gzhan du ma sems shig_/de ni da ltar nga yin no/_/nga ni skye ba thams cad du bsod nams byed pa la skyo ba med pas de dag thams cad kyi rnam par smin pa yang myong nas chud ma zos so/_/kun dga' bo la sogs pa 'khor mang po 
[\[282b.4\]]rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa thos nas/_bsod nams kyi las byed pa la brtson par gyur te/_mngon par dga' nas rjes su yi rang ngo /_/bram zes lhan pa phul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gsum pa'o//_//'di skad 
[\[282b.5\]]bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe dge slong dag dbyar tshul las byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin 
[\[282b.6\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas snyun mi mnga' 'am zhes snyun gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byams pa'i thugs kyis spro ba bskyed de/_dge slong khyod sdug bsngal bar ma gyur tam/_zhes shin tu thugs brtse zhing byams pa'i thugs 
[\[282b.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa dang /_kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la thugs brtse zhing byams pa'i thugs bskyed nas yun ci srid cig lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_khyod shes par 'dod na khyod la bstan par bya'o/_/sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa brjod du med pa'i pha rol na/_sdig pa byas pa'i mi gnyis shig sems can dmyal bar ltung ste/_dmyal ba'i srung 
[\[283a.2\]]mas lcags kyi shing rta 'dren du bcug nas/_lcags thos brdegs te/_phan tshun du mi dal bar rgyug tu bcug go/_/de la mi gcig stobs chung ste/_'dren ma nus nas 'dug pa dang /_lcags kyi tho bas brdegs te/_tshe brjes nas phyir sos so/_/
[\[283a.3\]]grogs po gcig gis de lta bu'i sdug bsngal mthong nas/_byams shing snying rje ba'i sems bskyed do/_/dmyal ba'i srung ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag 'ba' zhig gis shing rta 'di drang gis mi 'di thong shig ces smras pa dang /_srung ma khros 
[\[283a.4\]]nas lcags kyi tho bas brdegs te/_der tshe 'phos pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes so/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can dmyal ba na 'dug pa las/_byams zhing snying brtse ba'i sems bskyed pa de ni da ltar nga yin no/_/ngas 
[\[283a.5\]]de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba na de la thog mar snying brtse ba'i sems bskyed de/_sems can thams cad la yang da tsam gyi bar du thugs brtse zhing byams pa'i sems bskyed do/_/kun dga' bo dang 'khor mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la 
[\[283a.6\]]rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/sangs rgyas thog ma byams pa'i thugs bskyed pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal 
[\[283a.7\]]byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong chen po'i dge 'dun brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang /_thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag 'jo sgeg cing /_rnyed pa dang grags pa la chags 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]nas/_lhag par byas pa mang du 'chang zhing /_chog mi shes par ba[{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]par gyur pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas/_dge slong rnams rnyed pa la chags pa'i skyon 'di dag gsungs so/_/gang rnyed pa la chags pa ni lus zhig nas tshe 'phos 
[\[283b.2\]]ma thag tu ngan song gsum du ltung ste/_sdug bsngal tshad med pa myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na ngas mngon du dran pa sngon 'das pa'i dus na/_'dod pa'i dbang gis ltung bar gyur te/_sdug bsngal mang po myong ngo /_/de nas kun dga' bos pus mo sa la btsugs te/_
[\[283b.3\]]thal mo sbyar nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sngon bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa la chags pa'i dbang gis ltung bar gyur pa ci lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs 
[\[283b.4\]]med tshad med mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med pa'i pha rol na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po gus pa de zhes bya ba 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong la dbang byed de/_btsun mo dang pho brang slas ni stong phrag nyi shu yod do/_/blon 
[\[283b.5\]]po chen po ni stong phrag bcu yod do/_/dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po'i spyi bo la sgo nga 'dra ba'i chu bur cig byung ste/_gsal ba yongs su dag pa na tsha med do/_/bags kyis je che je cher skyes te/_ku ba tsam du gyur pa dang bkas pa na/_nang nas 
[\[283b.6\]]khye'u blta na sdug pa mtshan dang ldan pa skra mthon mthing du 'dug pa/_lus kyi mdog gser lta bur 'dug pa zhig byung bar gyur te/_mtshan mkhan gyis bltas nas bu 'di ni ngo mtshar che ba'i yon tan gyi mtshan dang ldan te/_gdon mi za bar 'khor los 
[\[283b.7\]]sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur zhing gling bzhi la dbang byed par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/_khye'u'i ming yang spyi bo skyes zhes btags so/_/cher skyes nas yon tan dang ldan pas rgyal pos kyang yul gcig gi rgyal phran du bcug go/_/dus gzhan zhig 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]na rgyal po chen po nad kyis btab pa dang /_rgyal phran kun 'dus nas nad g.yog dang dpyad byas kyang ma phan te/_de tshe'i dus byas so/_/de nas rgyal phran rnams 'dus te/_spyi bo skyes ga na 'dug par song nas phyin pa dang /_'di skad ces 
[\[284a.2\]]smras so/_/rgyal po chen po ni tshe'i dus byas kyis/_khyod rgyal por gshegs su gsol zhes smras pa dang /_spyi bo skyes kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te nga rgyal por 'gyur ba'i bsod nams dang dbang thang zhig yod na/_rgyal chen bzhi dang /_brgya 
[\[284a.3\]]byin la sogs pas nga la gsol ba btab ste/_dbang bskur bar shog shig ces smras ma thag tu rgyal chen bzhi'i rgyal po yang babs nas/_rin po che'i bum pa spos chus bkang ba thogs te/_spyi bor blugs nas dbang bskur ro/_/brgya byin lha'i dbang po yang babs 
[\[284a.4\]]nas/_rin po che'i cod pan phul te/_mgo la bzhag nas yon tan bsngags so/_/de nas rgyal phran rnams kyis dbus kyi yul chen por gshegs par gsol pa dang /_spyi bo skyes kyis yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag la rgyal por 'gyur ba'i 
[\[284a.5\]]dbang thang zhig yod na/_yul sa nga'i drung du 'ong ba'i rigs kyis/_nga yul sa snyegs su mi 'gro'o zhes smras pa dang /_de ma thag tu yul chen po rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_khrus kyi rdzing bu la sogs te/_dgos pa thams cad der 
[\[284a.6\]]byung bar gyur nas/_gser gyi 'khor lo dang /_glang po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_bud med rin po che dang /_blon po rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che la sogs pa thams cad 'dus nas gling bzhi la dbang byed pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur te/_
[\[284a.7\]]chos bzhin du srid 'tsho'o/_/de nas mi mang po dag sa brko zhing /_zhing rmos pa mthong nas blon po rnams la 'di dag ci byed ces bka' stsal pa dang /_smras pa ji tsam du srog dang bcas pa/_thams cad zas kyis 'tsho bas 'di dag kyang zhing rmos nas 'tsho 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]bar byed do/_/de nas rgyal pos 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te nga la rgyal por gyur ba'i bsod nams kyi dbang thang zhig yod na/_las bya mi dgos par ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas rang yod par gyur te/_thams cad chog cing 'grangs nas/_bkres pa dang /_
[\[284b.2\]]skom pa med par gyur cig ces smras so/_/de skad ces smras ma thag tu bza' ba dang /_btung ba yod par gyur to/_/de nas yang 'chag tu song song ba las thag pa dag cig 'khal ba dang 'thag pa mthong nas 'di dag ci byed ces dris pa dang /_smras pa kha zas 
[\[284b.3\]]ni rang yod par gyur la/_lus brgyan pa'i gos med de/_'di dag ni bgo ba'i gos byed do/_/de nas rgyal pos yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te bdag rgyal por gyur ba'i dbang thang zhig yod na bgo ba'i gos rang yod par gyur te/_dbul phongs pa 
[\[284b.4\]]thams cad kyang gos kyis chog par shog shig ces smras so/_/de skad ces smras ma thag tu shing thams cad las bgo ba'i gos kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan par rang skyes te/_mi thams cad kyi bgos kyang zad mi shes par byung ngo /_/de nas yang rgyal 
[\[284b.5\]]po 'chag cing song song ba las/_mi dag rol mo'i cha byad thogs pa mthong nas/_'di dag ci yin zhes dris pa dang /_smras pa kha zas dang bgo ba'i gos ni chog par yod na/_rol mo mang po byed de 'di dag rang dga' zhing rtse ba'i rol mo yin no/_/rgyal pos 
[\[284b.6\]]smras pa/_gal te bdag la rgyal po'i dbang thang zhig yod na/_rol mo dang dam pa'i cha byad thams cad rang yod par gyur cig ces smras ma thag tu shing thams cad kyi yal ga las rol mo'i cha byad mang po 'phyang ste/_rol mo 'dod pa zhig yod na/_rang 'khrol 
[\[284b.7\]]zhing snyan pa dang /_thos pa tsam gyis dga' rangs par gyur to/_/rgyal po'i bsod nams dang dbang thang chen pos nam mkha' las rin po che sna bdun char bzhin du babs nas/_yul kun gang nas rgyal pos blon po dag la 'di lta bur gyur pa 'di su'i yon tan zhes 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]dris pa dang /_blon po rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di ni rgyal po'i yon tan dang /_sems can gyi bsod nams kyis 'di ltar gyur to zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal pos yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te sems can gyi bsod 
[\[285a.2\]]nams kyi mthus yin na/_rin po che 'di dag kun tu 'babs par gyur cig_/gal te nga 'ba' zhig gi dbang thang yin na pho brang gi nang du 'bab par shog shig ces smras pa dang /_gzhan kun nas 'bab pa ni chad kyi/_pho brang gi nang 'ba' zhig tu nyin zhag bdun gyi 
[\[285a.3\]]bar du bab bo/_/rgyal po spyi bo skyes 'dzam bu'i gling du lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod pa las/_gzhan zhig na pho brang gi sgor gnod sbyin zhig byung ste/_skad chen por 'di skad ces smras so/_/shar phyogs na shar gyi lus 'phags gling zhes 
[\[285a.4\]]bya ba yod de/_de na yang bde skyid la dpe med par bzang gis rgyal po chen po der yang rol cing gshegs pa'i rigs so zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal po yang der 'gro bar dga' nas/_gser gyi 'khor lo nam mkha' la 'phags pa dang /_blon po dang /_rin po che 
[\[285a.5\]]sna bdun la sogs pa yang rjes su 'phags te/_shar gyi lus 'phags gling du phyin to/_/rgyal phran phyag ma 'tshal ba rnams kyang thams cad phyag 'tshal nas/_lus 'phags kyi gling na 'dod pa lnga la lo stong phrag brgyad cu'i bar du longs spyod do/_/de nas 
[\[285a.6\]]yang gnod sbyin gyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/nub phyogs na nub kyi ba lang spyod ces bya ba yod de/_de na yang rab tu bde skyid kyi rgyal po chen po yang der gshegs pa'i rigs so zhes smras so/_/rgyal po yang der 'gro bar dga' nas/_nub kyi ba lang spyod du lo 
[\[285a.7\]]stong phrag bcu'i bar du bde ba la longs spyod do/_/de nas yang gnod sbyin gyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/byang phyogs na byang gi sgra mi snyan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na gnas pa'i mi dag 'byor pa lo legs pa longs spyod dang ldan gyis rgyal po yang yul der gshegs pa'i rigs 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]so/_/zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal po 'gro bar dga' nas/_byang gi sgra mi snyan du 'dod pa lnga'i dam pa la lo stong phrag brgyad kyi bar du longs spyod par gyur to/_/de nas dus phyi zhig na gnod sbyin gyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i rgyal 
[\[285b.2\]]po'i gnas kyang rab tu bde ba ni tshad byar yang dka'o/_/rgyal po der yang gshegs pa'i rigs so zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal po dang blon po dang dpung gi tshogs rnam bzhi dang bcas te/_nam mkha' la 'phags te dong ngo /_/rgyal chen bzhi pos rgyang ma nas 
[\[285b.3\]]mthong ba dang /_'jigs skrag nas dpung gi tshogs bshams te/_phyi rol tu byung ba dang /_ci byar yang med nas phyir gnas su dong ngo /_/spyi bo skyes der yang lo stong phrag bcu'i bar du 'dod pa la longs spyod nas yang 'di snyam du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i 
[\[285b.4\]]ris su 'gro bar bsams nas/_'khor dang bcas te steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags te/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris su song ngo /_/de'i tshe drang srong lnga brgya tsam zhig ri rab lhun po'i sul na gnas pa las rgyal po'i glang po che dang /_rta'i gcin rtug lhung 
[\[285b.5\]]bas drang srong de dag gi lus la reg par gyur pas/_de dag gcig la gcig 'di ci zhes dris pa dang /_drang srong mkhas pa blo dang ldan pa zhig gis drang srong gzhan dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po spyi bo skyes yar sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i ris su song ngo zhes 
[\[285b.6\]]zer gyis/_'di ni gdon mi za bar de dag gi glang po che dang rta'i mi gtsang ba yin no zhes zer nas/_drang srong rnams khros te gsang sngags dang phyag rgyas bcings pas spyi bo skyes dang 'khor mang po 'gror med par byas so/_/rgyal pos kyang de ltar shes shing rig 
[\[285b.7\]]nas 'di skad ces dam bcas so/_/gal te bdag la bsod nams dang dbang thang zhig yod na/_drang srong de dag nga'i thad du lhags te/_nga la mchod par shog shig ces smras nas/_rgyal po'i yon tan gyi che ba'i byin dang /_shugs kyis drang srong lnga brgya po 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]ril gyis der lhags nas/_g.yog byas te/_sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i ris su dong ngo /_/yar ma phyin par rgyang ma nas lha'i pho brang yid du 'ong ba shin tu bkra bar snang ba lhang nge lham mer mthong bar gyur to/_/lha'i pho brang yid du 'ong ba la sgo chen 
[\[286a.2\]]po brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gnyis yod de/_lha rnams 'jigs dngangs nas/_sgo rnams bcad de/_lcags kyi gtan pa sum rim bcug go/_/spyi bo skyes dpung gi tshogs dang bcas su thogs pa med par der phyin pa dang /_rgyal pos kyang dung bus te gzhu bdungs 
[\[286a.3\]]pas gzhu rgyud springs pa dang /_lha'i pho brang gi sgo brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gnyis dus gcig tu rang bye ba dang /_brgya byin gyis phyi rol tu bsus te/_lha'i pho brang du khrid nas brgya byin gyi stan phyed la 'dug tu bcug go/_/lha'i dbang po dang mi'i dbang po gnyis byad 
[\[286a.4\]]gzugs 'dra ste/_dbang po mthong ba dag gis bye brag mi phyed na/_lha'i mgyogs bul gyis rtogs so/_/rgyal po lha'i pho brang du 'dod pa lnga'i dam pa la lha'i dbang po sum cu rtsa drug brjes kyi bar du longs spyod do/_/lha'i dbang po nang gi mtha' ma de byang chub sems 
[\[286a.5\]]dpa' 'od srung zhes bya ste/_de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi rgyal pos lha rnams la dmag drangs nas/_brgya byin dang 'thab pa las/_brgya byin gyis ma thub nas dpung gi tshogs dang phyir gnas su bros so/_/de nas spyi bo skyes phyir byung ste/_dung bus gzhu rgyud springs pas/_lha ma yin gyi 
[\[286a.6\]]dmag kun de ma thag tu byer ro/_/de'i tshe spyi bo skyes 'di snyam du bsams so/_/bdag gi mthu'i stobs ni gang dang yang mi mnyam ste/_brgya byin dang thun mong du 'dug pa lta ci rung /_gnyis na bsad la nga 'ba' zhig gis byas na legs so snyam mo/_/sdig pa'i 
[\[286a.7\]]sems skyes ma thag tu nam mkha' las lhung nas/_sngon gyi pho brang rnying pa'i sgo drung du lhung ste/_srog dang bral la khad pa tsam du nyam thag par gyur to/_/de nas mi dag lhags te 'di skad ces dris so/_/gal te 'jig rten gyi khyim pa dag rgyal po spyi bo skyes ji ltar tshe'i 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]dus byas zhes dri na/_de la bdag gis ci skad ces bya/_smras pa/_gal te de skad ces 'dri ba yod na/_de la 'di skad ces gyis shig_/rgyal po spyi bo skyes ni 'dod pa'i dbang gis tshe 'phos so/_/des gling bzhi la lo bye ba phrag bzhi bcu'i bar du dbang byas 
[\[286b.2\]]te/_nyin zhag bzhi'i bar du rin po che yang char bzhin du bab/_lha'i ris gnyis su byon kyang chog ma shes pas/_nam mkha' las lhung ste/_tshe 'phos zhes byos shig de bas na dge slong dag rnyed pa dang /_grags pa ni yang dag par nyes pa'i skyon chen po 
[\[286b.3\]]ste/_ci nas kyang ring du spangs par sems la yang dag par byang chub la nan tan gyis shig_/de nas kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/rgyal po spyi bo skyes de sngon bsod nams ci zhig bgyis na/_de lta bu'i 'bras bu chen po thob par gyur/_
[\[286b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'das pa'i pha rol na/_sangs rgyas phur sha zhes bya ba 'jig rten du gshegs te 'khor dang bcas su 'jig rten gyi don mdzad do/_/de'i tshe bram ze'i bu zhig chung ma len to/_/
[\[286b.5\]]'jig rten pa chos kyis chung ma len na/_sran ma spar gang thogs te gtor ba'i rigs so/_/khye'u de yang sran ma thogs te 'thor du song ba las/_lam du bcom ldan 'das dang phrad nas sems yid dga' ste/_lag na sran ma thogs pa dag bcom ldan 'das la gtor ba dang /_
[\[286b.6\]]'brum bu bzhi lhung bzed kyi nang du song ngo /_/'brum bu gcig ni dbu'i rtse mor chags so/_/bsod nams kyi rgyu dang rkyen de tsam gyis bsod nams chen po 'thob ste/_sran ma 'brum bu bzhi lhung bzed kyi nang du song bas gling bzhi la dbang byed par gyur/_'brum 
[\[286b.7\]]bu gcig spyi bor chags pas lha'i rim pa gnyis kyi longs spyod myong bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe nye gnas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thos nas/_la las ni 'bras bu dang po nas gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]'khor mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/rgyal po spyi bo skyes kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga pa'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom 
[\[287a.2\]]ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu mo tha [{]chungs su [,]chung du [}]ma na zhes bya ba mnga' byad mdzes shing blta na sdug pa zhig yod de/_bu'i nang na bu mo tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]de 
[\[287a.3\]]la nang na byams pas/_gar 'gror yang khrid do/_/dus gzhan zhig na/_khyim bdag sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal du song ba dang /_bu mo yang phyi bzhin du song nas bu mo des sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_lhag par dga' ba skyes te/_spos kyis sangs rgyas 
[\[287a.4\]]bzhugs pa'i gnas kun tu byug par bsams pa dang /_de'i tshe bu mo de'i lag na a mra'i 'bras bu zhig thogs pa las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'on cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bu mos kyang de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag tu phul lo/_/bcom ldan 
[\[287a.5\]]'das kyis a mra'i 'bras bu bzhes nas spos dam pa'i ming rnam pa mang po bris te/_bu mo'i lag tu phyir byin no/_/de nas bu mo'i pha ma dang bcas pa khyim du 'ongs nas tshong dus su song ste/_bcom ldan 'das bzhed pa'i spos rnam pa mang po sna tshogs nyos nas phyir yang rgyal bu 
[\[287a.6\]]rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/_nyin gcig bzhin du spos bdar nas gnas kun tu nyug go/_/dus gzhan zhig na yul tig ca shi ri'i rgyal po'i bu zhig rgyal po'i khab tu mngags nas phyir zhing song song ba las mthar gyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa dang /_bu mo spos 
[\[287a.7\]]bdar zhing 'dug pa mthong nas bu mo la chags te chung mar blangs bsams nas rgyal po gsal rgyal la bu mo de bslangs pa dang /_rgyal pos de su'i bu mo yin zhes smras so/_/de ni khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu mo'o zhes smras so/_/'o na nga la gsol yang 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]mi phan gyis/_bu mo nyid kyi pha ma la gsol cig ces bsgo'o/_/rgyal bu des rgyal po la dus kyis gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos yang de bzhin gyis shig ces bsgo ba dang /_rgyal bu des bdag gi g.yog dang 'khor kun phyir yul du btang nas glang po che gcig pu 
[\[287b.2\]]zhig phyir bzhag go/_/dus gzhan zhig na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas bu mo su ma na brkus te/_glang po che la bskyon nas bros pa dang /_mgon med zas sbyin gyis bsnyags kyang ma slebs te/_phyir yul du phyin nas chung mar byas so/_/de nas chung ma de sems 
[\[287b.3\]]can dang ldan par gyur to/_/phyis zla ba tshang nas sgo nga bcu zhig btsas so/_/sgo nga bcag pa dang /_sgo nga re re'i nang nas khye'u blta na sdug cing mdzes shing /_bzang ba gzhan las 'phags pa re re byung ngo /_/bu de dag cher skyes nas dpa' zhing rtsal che bas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[287b.4\]]gsod pa la dga' bar gyur pa dang /_khye'u'i mas 'di ltar [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gsod par ma byed ces bsgo ba dang /_bu rnams kyis ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bshor ba las dga' ba med de/_bdag cag gis mas gsad du mi gnang ba las nam bdag 
[\[287b.5\]]cag la sdang ba lta/_mas smras pa kho mo ni khyod la sdang ba ma yin gyis/_khye'u'i mas 'di ltar khyod la ma byams pa'i phyir [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gsod du ma bcug pa yin gyis 'di lta ste/_srog gcod pa'i sdig gis sems can dmyal bar lo brgya stong du ma'i bar du sdug bsngal 
[\[287b.6\]]myong ste/_rtag tu sha ba'i mgo can dang /_lug gi mgo can dang /_ri bong gi mgo can la sogs te/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]thams cad kyi mgo can du gyur nas/_dmyal ba'i srung mas lo grangs med pa'i bar du gsod par 'gyur ro/_/gal te de las thar bar 'dod na 
[\[287b.7\]]yang sdig pa'i las las mi thar ro/_/bu rnams kyis smras pa ji ltar khyod kyis bsgo ba bzhin du byas na/_'di skad bsgo ba 'di gzhan las gsan tam/_khyed nyid kyis bsams te smras/_tshig 'di ni kho mos sangs rgyas las thos so zhes smras pa dang 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]bu rnams kyis sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni gang yin smros shig ces smras so/_/ci khyod kyis ma thos sam rgyal po yab zas gtsang ma'i sras sku mdzes shing bzang ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa las/_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba mi 
[\[288a.2\]]'dod de rab tu byung nas/_lam bsgoms pas smon lam bzhin du grub ste/_bla na med pa'i 'bras bu thob nas sku khru bcu drug pa mtshan dang dpe byad kyis yongs su brgyan pa/_rig pa gsum dang mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa/_snga ma 'das pa shes pa yang mtha' med la phyis 
[\[288a.3\]]'byung ba shes pa yang mtha' med de/_dus gsum ni lag mthil na 'bras bu bzhag pa dang 'dra'o zhes smras nas/_bu rnams kyis thos pa dang /_rab tu dga' ste/_sangs rgyas de da ltar 'di nas nye ring ci tsam na bzhugs/_mthong bar rung ngam zhes smras pa dang /_mas smras pa/_
[\[288a.4\]]da ltar mnyan yod na bzhugs te mthong du rung ngo /_/bu rnams kyis smras pa/_'o na bdag cag sangs rgyas bltar 'gro'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bu'i mas kyang gnang nas bu rnams cig car mnyan yod du dong ngo /_/der phyin pa dang /_mes po mgon med zas sbyin gyis mthong 
[\[288a.5\]]nas/_rab tu dga' mgu rangs te/_tsha bo rnams khrid de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du de bzhin gshegs pa bltar dong ngo /_/byis pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi mtshan sngon thos pa bas stong 'gyur gyis lhag par bzang ba mthong nas shin tu dga' bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom 
[\[288a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis ci rigs par chos bstan pas/_khye'u bcu char dus gcig tu chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur nas/_sangs rgyas la rab tu byung bar gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byis pa rnams khyod kyi pha mas gnang ngam zhes bka' stsal pa na/_
[\[288a.7\]]bdag cag gis da dung ma gsol lo zhes gsol pa dang /_pha mas ma gnang gi bar du rab tu phyung du mi gnang ngo zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nas mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag ni 'di dag gi mes po lags te/_bdag gi 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]tsha bo la bdag kyang dbang bas bdag gis rab tu byung bar gnang ngo zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de bzhin du gnang nas skra dang kha spu rang byi ste dge slong du gyur to/_/dge slong gi lam la de dag gis brtson 'grus bskyed pas/_thams cad dgra bcom par gyur to/_/
[\[288b.2\]]dge slong bcu po gcig la gcig lhag par dga' bar 'gro na yang lhan cig 'gro 'dug na yang lhan cig 'dug ste/_yul mi thams cad kyang dga' nas rjes su yi rang ngo /_/de nas kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_dge slong bcu po 'dis bsod nams 
[\[288b.3\]]ci zhig bgyis na/_cho rigs btsun par skyes la byad gzugs bzang ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das dang phrad nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi pha 
[\[288b.4\]]rol na/_sangs rgyas thams cad skyob ces bya ba 'jig rten du gshegs te/_sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad nas mya ngan las 'das nas ring bsrel rgyas par spel nas/_mchod rten tshad med pa snyed byas so/_/de'i tshe na mchod rten gcig zhig ral du 
[\[288b.5\]]gyur nas/_rgan mo zhig gis gso zhing 'dug pas mi 'gron po bcu der lhags pas mthong ba dang rgan mo la khyod las ci byed ces smras so/_/rgan mos smras pa/_'di ni mchod gnas kyi rten mchod rten yin no/_/'di bcos na bsod nams lhag par che'o/_/de bas na dge 
[\[288b.6\]]ba'i 'bras bu 'dod pa'i phyir 'di 'chos so/_/gzhon nu de dag kyang rgan mos smras pa la rab tu dga' nas/_bdag cag gis kyang bstod do zhes smras nas/_mchod rten bcos pa'i 'og tu gzhon nu bcu char rgan mo de'i bur skyes par gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas/_de tshun cad 
[\[288b.7\]]bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du lha dang mi'i nang du lhan cig tu skyes nas bde ba la longs spyod de/_dngos po 'di gsum gyis mi gzhan las khyad du 'phags so/_/gsum gang zhe na/_gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa dang /_kun gyis bkur ba dang /_rtag tu tshe ring zhing de 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]srid kyi bar du sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ngo /_/da nga dang phrad nas rdul dang dri ma kun dang bral nas dgra bcom par gyur to/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na rgan mo de ni bu mo su ma na yin no/_/mi gzhon nu bcu ni dgra bcom pa 'di bcu yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[289a.2\]]kyis de skad ces gsungs nas/_'khor mang po rnams la la ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig phyir ldog pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa dang /_dgra bcom pa thob bo/_/kha cig ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur te/_
[\[289a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par dga'o/_/bu mo su ma na'i bu bcu'i le'u ste bzhi bcu drug pa'o//_//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 
[\[289a.4\]]mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe yul de na kun tu rgyu u pa gub te zhes bya ba yid gzhungs shing sems gsal ba ni 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba la mkhas pa zhig ste/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas rab tu 'byung 
[\[289a.5\]]ngo zhes bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/gal te bdag rab tu byung nas shes rab dang /_spobs pa shA ri'i bu dang mnyam na rab tu byung gi de tsam mi phod na phyir khyim du mchi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de tsam mi phod do zhes bka' stsal nas/_kun tu rgyu 
[\[289a.6\]]de rab tu 'byung du ma btub nas phyir khyim du song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dus gzhan zhig na 'khor mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya phrag lon pa dang /_bram ze 'di rab tu byung nas mngon par shes pa drug dang shes rab tu ldan te/_
[\[289a.7\]]sems can rdul snyed cig gi don byed par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das kar yang kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga mya ngan las 'das nas mdo sde'i sde snod thams cad khyod la gtad kyis gzungs su zung la rgyas par byos shig ces bka' stsal nas/_
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas/_de'i 'og tu kun dga' bos chos kyi sde snod kun bzung ngo /_/kun dga' bos lus yongs su gtong ba na nye gnas ya she'i ki la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/nga 'das pa'i 'og tu mdo sde kun khyod la gtad kyis gzungs su zung shig ces 
[\[289b.2\]]bsgo nas/_yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/yul bA rA Na sIr khyim bdag gub ta zhes bya ba la bu u pa gub ta zhes bya ba zhig yod kyis khyod kyis slong la rab tu phyung shig_/khyod 'das pa'i 'og tu chos kyang de la gtod cig ces bsgo'o/_/kun dga' bo 'das pa'i 'og tu ya she'i kis 
[\[289b.3\]]dam pa'i chos bzung ste/_'jig rten na sems can gyi don mang du byas so/_/de nas bA rA Na sIr grong du song ste/_khyim bdag de dag de dang bshes par byas nas/_yang dang yang du de'i khyim du song ste/_yid gcugs par byas so/_/khyim bdag de la bu khye'u zhig 
[\[289b.4\]]btsas nas/_ming u pa gub ta zhes btags te/_chung ngu shed ma bye ba nas ya she'i kis bslangs te/_rab tu phyung bar byas pa las khyim bdag gis 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag 'dod pa'i bu 'di 'dra ba zhig yod do/_/rigs 'tsho ba snyam ste mi rung ngo /_/gal te 
[\[289b.5\]]yang gcig btsas na gdod sbyin no/_/phyis dus gzhan zhig na yang bu gcig btsas nas/_ming yang nan tan ku ba ta zhes btags so/_/de nas ya she'i ki yang der song ste/_bu blangs pa dang /_khyim bdag gis yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu chen po 'di ni 
[\[289b.6\]]phyi rol gyi bya ba bsgrubs dgos so/_/bu chung ngu ni nang gi bya ba bsgrubs na gdod bde bar 'gyur ro zhes sbyin du ma btub ste/_phyis yang bu gcig byung na gdod dbul lo zhes smras so/_/ya she'i ki ni dgra bcom pa'i nang na rig pa gsum dang ldan te/_sems can gyi 
[\[289b.7\]]dbang po la mkhas pas/_khye'u de gnyis la brtags na rab tu byung ba'i skal ba yod par mi 'dra nas/_ma bskul bar bzhag go/_/de nas yang khyim bdag de la bu gcig btsas nas byad gzugs legs par blta na sdug pa zhig ste/_yang khyim bdag gi thad 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]du song ste/_bu bslangs pa dang 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu da dung chung bas g.yog kyang mi nus la bdag kyang dbul bas slang du med do/_/re zhig skad cig nam skyes na sbyin no zhes smras so/_/de nas cher skyes nas shes rab dang ldan par gyur te/_
[\[290a.2\]]phas kyang nor rdzas lag tu gtad nas tshong byed du bcug go/_/dus gzhan zhig na ya she'i ki nyid de'i drung du song ste/_chos bstan nas sems rtse gcig pa yid la byed du bcug ste/_dge ba'i rtog pa byung na rde'u dkar ru zhig zhog la/_mi dge ba'i rtog pa byung na rde'u na gu 
[\[290a.3\]]zhig zhog la dus dus su gang mang rtsis shig ces bsgo'o/_/u pa gub tas kyang bsgo ba bzhin du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rtog pa byung ba las rde'u bzhag ste brtsis na/_thog ma ni rde'u na gu mang rab la/_dkar ru nyung rab bo de nas yang bags kyis dkar nag mnyam mo/_/
